analyzed: atha śrī vāmanapurāṇam
nārāyaṇam namaskṛtya naram ca eva narottamam
devīm sarasvatīm vyāsam tatas jayam udīrayet
trailokya rājyam ākṣipya baleḥ indrāya yaḥ dadau
śrīdharāya namaḥ tasmai chadma vāmana rūpiṇe
pulastya muṣim āsīnam āśrame vāc vidām varam
nāradaḥ paripapraccha purāṇam vāmana āśrayam
katham bhagavatā brahman viṣṇunā prabhaviṣṇunā

original: vāmanatvaṃ dhṛtaṃ pūrvaṃ tanmamācakṣva pṛcchataḥ // VamP_1.3 //
analyzed: vāmana tvam dhṛtam pūrvam tat mama ācakṣva pṛcchataḥ

original: kathaṃ ca vaiṣṇavano bhūtvā prahlādo daityasattamaḥ /
analyzed: katham ca vaiṣṇavanaḥ bhūtvā prahlādaḥ daitya sattamaḥ

original: tridaśairyuyudhe sārthamatra mai saṃśayo mahān // VamP_1.4 //
analyzed: tridaśaiḥ yuyudhe sārtham atra mai saṃśayaḥ mahān

original: śrūyate ca dvijaśreṣṭha dakṣasya duhitā satī /
analyzed: śrūyate ca dvijaśreṣṭha dakṣasya duhitā satī

original: śaṅkarasya priyā bhāryā babhuva varavarṇinī // VamP_1.5 //
analyzed: śaṅkarasya priyā bhāryā babhuva varavarṇinī
kimartham sā parityajya svarīram varānanā

original: jātā himavato gehe girīndrasya mahātmanaḥ // VamP_1.6 //
analyzed: jātāḥ himavataḥ gehe giri indrasya mahātmanaḥ
punar ca devadevavasya patnī tvam agamat śubhā

original: etanme saṃśayaṃ chindhi sarvavit tvaṃ mato 'si me // VamP_1.7 //
analyzed: etat me saṃśayam chindhi sarva vid tvam si me

original: tīrthānāṃ caiva māhātmyaṃ dānānāṃ caiva sattama /
analyzed: tīrthānām ca eva māhātmyam dānānām ca eva sattama

original: vratānāṃ vividhānāṃ ca vidhimācakṣva me dvija // VamP_1.8 //
analyzed: vratānām vividhānām ca vidhim ācakṣva me dvija
eva bhuktaḥ nāradena suni sattamaḥ

original: provāca vadatāṃ śreṣṭho nāradaṃ tapaso nidhima // VamP_1.9 //
analyzed: provāca vadatām śreṣṭhaḥ nāradam tapasaḥ
pulastyaḥ uvāca
purāṇam vāmanam vakṣye kramāt nikhilam āditas

original: avadhānaṃ sthiraṃ kṛtvā śṛṇuṣva munisattma // VamP_1.10 //
analyzed: avadhānam sthiram kṛtvā śṛṇuṣva muni sattma
purā haimavatī devī mandara stham maheśvaram
uvāca vacanam dṛṣṭvā grīṣma kālam upasthitam

original: grīṣmaḥ pravṛtto deveśa na ca te vidyate gṛham /
analyzed: grīṣmaḥ pravṛttaḥ deveśa na ca te vidyate gṛham

original: yatra vātātapau grīṣme sthitayornau gamiṣyataḥ // VamP_1.12 //
analyzed: yatra vāta ātapau grīṣme sthitayoḥ nau gamiṣyataḥ
evam uktaḥ bhavānyā tu śaṅkaraḥ vākyam abravīt
nirāśrayaḥ ham sudatī sadā araṇya caraḥ śubhe
iti uktā śaṅkareṇa atha vṛkṣa chāyāsu nārada

original: nidāghakālamanayat samaṃ śarveṇa sā satī // VamP_1.14 //
analyzed: nidāgha kālam anayat samam śarveṇa sā satī
nidāgha ante samudra bhūtaḥ nirjana ācaritaḥ dbhutaḥ
ghana andhakārita āśaḥ vai prāvṛṣ kāla uṣati rāgavān
tam dṛṣṭvā dakṣa tanujā prāvṛṣ kālam upasthitam

original: provāca vākyaṃ deveśaṃ satī sapraṇayaṃ tadā // VamP_1.16 //
analyzed: provāca vākyam deveśam satī sa praṇayam tadā

original: vivānti vātā hṛdayāvadāraṇā garjantyamī loyadharā maheśvara /
analyzed: vivānti vātāḥ hṛdaya avadāraṇāḥ garjanti amī loya dharāḥ maheśvara

original: sphuranti nīlābhragaṇeṣu vidyuto vāśanti kekāravameva barhiṇaḥ // VamP_1.17 //
analyzed: sphuranti nīla abhra gaṇeṣu vidyutaḥ vāśanti kekā ravam eva barhiṇaḥ

original: patanti dhārā gaganāt paricyutā bakā balākāśca saranti toyadān /
analyzed: patanti dhārāḥ gaganāt paricyutāḥ bakāḥ balākāḥ ca saranti toyadān

original: śrutvaiva maghasya dṛḍhaṃ tu garjitaṃ tyajanti haṃsāśca sarāṃsi tatkṣaṇāt /
analyzed: śrutvā eva maghasya dṛḍham tu garjitam tyajanti haṃsāḥ ca sarāṃsi tad kṣaṇāt

original: yathāśrayān yogigaṇaḥ samantāt pravṛddhamūlānapi saṃtyajanti // VamP_1.19 //
analyzed: yathā āśrayān yogi gaṇaḥ samantāt pravṛddha mūlān api saṃtyajanti

original: imāni yūthāni vane mṛgāṇāṃ caranti dhāvanti ramanti śaṃbho /
analyzed: imāni yūthāni vane mṛgāṇām caranti dhāvanti ramanti śaṃbho

original: tathācirābhāḥ sutarāṃ sphuranti paśyeha nīleṣu ghaneṣu deva /
analyzed: tathā acira ābhāḥ sutarām sphuranti paśya iha nīleṣu ghaneṣu deva

original: nūnaṃ samṛddhiṃ salilasya dṛṣṭvā caranti śūrāstaruṇadrumeṣu // VamP_1.20 //
analyzed: nūnam samṛddhim salilasya dṛṣṭvā caranti śūrāḥ taruṇa drumeṣu
udvat tvegāḥ sahasā eva nimnagāḥ jātāḥ śaśaṅka aṅkita cāru maile

original: kimatra citraṃ yadanujjvalaṃ janaṃ niṣevya yoṣid bhavati tvaśīlā // VamP_1.21 //
analyzed: kim atra citram yat anujjvalam janam niṣevya yoṣit bhavati tu aśīlā

original: nīlaiśca meghaiśca samāvṛtaṃ nabhaḥ puṣṣaiśca sarjjā mukulaiśca nīpāḥ /
analyzed: nīlaiḥ ca meghaiḥ ca samāvṛtam nabhaḥ puṣṣaiḥ ca sarjjāḥ mukulaiḥ ca nīpāḥ

original: phalaiśca bilvāḥ payasā tathāpagāḥ patraiḥ sapadmaiśca mahāsarāṃsi // VamP_1.22 //
analyzed: phalaiḥ ca bilvāḥ payasā tathā āpagāḥ patraiḥ sa padmaiḥ ca mahā sarāṃsi
kāle su raudre nanu te bravīmi

original: gṛhaṃ kuruṣvātra mahācajalottame sunirvṛtā yena bhavāmi śaṃbho // VamP_1.23 //
analyzed: gṛham kuruṣva atra mahāca jala uttame su nirvṛtā yena bhavāmi śaṃbho

original: itthaṃ trinetraḥ śrutirāmaṇīyakaṃ śrutvā vaco vākyamidaṃ babhāṣe /
analyzed: ittham trinetraḥ śruti rāmaṇīyakam śrutvā vacaḥ vākyam idam babhāṣe

original: na me 'sti vittaṃ gṛhasaṃcayārthe mṛgāricarmāvaraṇaṃ mama priye // VamP_1.24 //
analyzed: na me sti vittam gṛha saṃcaya arthe mṛgāri carma āvaraṇam mama priye

original: mamopavītaṃ bhujageśvaraḥ śubhe karṇe 'pi padmaśca tathaiva piṅgalaḥ /
analyzed: mama upavītam bhujageśvaraḥ śubhe karṇe pi padmaḥ ca tathā eva piṅgalaḥ

original: keyūramekaṃ mama kambalastvahirdvitīyamanyo bhujago dhanañjayaḥ // VamP_1.25 //
analyzed: keyūram ekam mama kambalaḥ tu ahiḥ dvitīyam anyaḥ bhujagaḥ dhanañjayaḥ

original: nīlo 'pi nīlāñjanatulyavarṇaḥ śroṇītaṭe rājati supratiṣṭhaḥ // VamP_1.26 //
analyzed: nīlaḥ pi nīlāñjana tulya varṇaḥ śroṇī taṭe rājati su pratiṣṭhaḥ
pulastyaḥ uvāca

original: iti vacanamathograṃ śaṅkarātsā mṛḍānī ṛtamapi tadasatyaṃ śrīmadākarṇya bhītā /
analyzed: iti vacanam atha ugram śaṅkarāt sā mṛḍānī ṛtam api tat asatyam śrīmat ākarṇya bhītā

original: avanitasamavekṣya svāmino vāsakṛcchrāt parivadati saroṣaṃ lajjayocchvasya coṣm // VamP_1.27 //
analyzed: avanitasam avekṣya svāminaḥ vāsa kṛcchrāt parivadati sa roṣam lajjayā ucchvasya ca ūṣm
devī uvāca
katham hi devadeveśa prāvaṭ kālaḥ gamiṣyati

original: vṛkṣamūle sthitāyā me suduḥkhena vadāmyataḥ // VamP_1.28 //
analyzed: vṛkṣa mūle sthitāyāḥ me su duḥkhena vadāmi atas
śaṅkaraḥ uvāca
ghana avasthita dehāyāḥ prāvṛṣ ghana khaṇḍam unnatam āruhya tasthau saha dakṣa kanyayā

original: tato 'bhavannāma tedaśvarasya jīmūtaketustviti viśrutaṃ divi // VamP_1.30 //

iti śrī vāmanapurāṇe prathamaḥ dhyāyaḥ
pulastyaḥ uvāca
tatas trinetrasya gataḥ prāvṛṣ kālaḥ ghana upari

original: tyajanti nīlāmbudharā nabhastalaṃ vṛkṣāṃśca kaṅkāḥ saritastaṭāni /
analyzed: tyajanti nīla ambudharāḥ nabhastalam vṛkṣān ca kaṅkāḥ saritaḥ taṭāni

original: padmāḥ sugandhaṃ nilayāni vāyasā rururviṣāṇaṃ kaluṣaṃ jalāśayaḥ // VamP_2.2 //
analyzed: padmāḥ sugandham nilayāni vāyasāḥ ruruḥ viṣāṇam kaluṣam jalāśayaḥ

original: vikāsamāyanti ta paṅkājāni candrāṃśavo bhānti latāḥ supuṣpāḥ /
analyzed: vikāsam āyanti paṅka ajāni candra aṃśavaḥ bhānti latāḥ su puṣpāḥ

original: nandanti hṛṣṭānyapi gokulāni santaśca saṃtoṣamanuvrajanti // VamP_2.3 //
analyzed: nandanti hṛṣṭāni api go kulāni santaḥ ca saṃtoṣam anuvrajanti

original: sarassu padma gagane ca tārakā jalāśayeṣveva tathā payāṃsi /
analyzed: sarassu gagane ca tārakāḥ jalāśayeṣu eva tathā payāṃsi

original: satāṃ ca cittaṃ hi diśāṃ mukhaiḥ samaṃ vaimalyamāyānti śaśaṅkakāntayaḥ // VamP_2.4 //
analyzed: satām ca cittam hi diśām mukhaiḥ samam vaimalyam āyānti śaśaṅka kāntayaḥ
tādṛśe haraḥ kāle magha pṛṣṭha adhivāsinīm
satīm ādāya śaila indram mandaram samupāyayau
tatas mandara pṛṣṭhe sau sthitaḥ sama śilā tale

original: rarāma śaṃbhurbhagavān satyā saha mahādyutiḥ // VamP_2.6 //
analyzed: rarāma śaṃbhuḥ bhagavān satyā saha mahā dyutiḥ

original: tato vyatīte śaradi pratibuddhe ca keśave /
analyzed: tatas vyatīte śaradi pratibuddhe ca keśave
dakṣaḥ prajāpati śreṣṭhaḥ yaṣṭum ārabhata kratum

original: dvādaśeva sa cādityāñ śakrādīṃś ca surottamān /
analyzed: dvādaśa iva sa ca adityām śakra ādīn ca sura uttamān

original: sahānasūyayātriṃ ca saha dhṛtyā ca kauśikam // VamP_2.9 //

ahalyayā gautamam ca bharadvājam amāyayā

āmantrya kṛtāvān dakṣaḥ sadasyān yajña saṃsadi
vidvān guṇa saṃpannān veda veda aḍga pāragān

original: dharmaṃ ca sa samāhūya bhāryayāhiṃsayā saha /
analyzed: dharmam ca sa samāhūya bhāryayā ahiṃsayā saha
nimantrya yajñavāṭasya dvārapāla tvam ādiśat
ariṣṭa neminam cakre idhma āharaṇa kāriṇam

original: bhṛguṃ ca mantrasaṃskāre samyag dakṣaṃ prayuktavān // VamP_2.13 //
analyzed: bhṛgum ca mantra saṃskāre samyak dakṣam prayuktavān

original: tathā candramasaṃ devaṃ rohiṇyā sahitaṃ śucim /
analyzed: tathā candramasam devam rohiṇyā sahitam śucim

original: dhanānāmādhipatye ca yuktavān hi prajāpatiḥ // VamP_2.14 //

original: saśaṅkarāṃ satīṃ muktvā makhe sarvān nyamantrayat // VamP_2.15 //
analyzed: sa śaṅkarām satīm muktvā makhe sarvān nyamantrayat
nāradaḥ uvāca

original: jyeṣṭhaḥ śreṣṭho variṣṭho 'pi ādyo 'pi na nimantritaḥ // VamP_2.16 //
analyzed: jyeṣṭhaḥ śreṣṭhaḥ variṣṭhaḥ pi ādyaḥ pi na nimantritaḥ
pulastyaḥ uvāca

original: kapālīli viditveśo dakṣeṇa na nimantritaḥ // VamP_2.17 //
analyzed: kapāli ili viditvā īśaḥ dakṣeṇa na nimantritaḥ

original: kimarthaṃ devatāśreṣṭhaḥ śūlapāṇistrilocanaḥ kapālī bhagavāñjātaḥ karmaṇā kena śaṅkaraḥ // VamP_2.18 //
analyzed: kimartham devatā śreṣṭhaḥ śūlapāṇiḥ trilocanaḥ kapālī bhagavān jātaḥ karmaṇā kena śaṅkaraḥ
śṛṇuṣva avahitaḥ bhūtvā kathām etām purātanīm
proktam ādipurāṇe ca brahmaṇā avyakta mūrttinā
purā tu ekārṇavam sarvam jagat sthāvara jaṅgamam
naṣṭa ṭandra arka nakṣatram praṇaṣṭa pavana analam
apratarkyam avijñeyam bhāva abhāva vivarjitam
nimagnu parvata taru tamaḥ bhūtam su durdasam

original: tasmin sa śete bhagavān nidrāṃ varṣasahasrikīm /
analyzed: tasmin sa śete bhagavān nidrām varṣa sahasrikīm

original: rātryante sṛjate lokān rājasaṃ rūpāsthitaḥ // VamP_2.22 //
analyzed: rātri ante sṛjate lokān rājasam rūpa āsthitaḥ
rājasaḥ pañca vadanaḥ veda vedāṅga pāragaḥ
sraṣṭā carācarasya asya jagataḥ dbhuta darśanaḥ
tamaḥ mayaḥ tathā eva anyaḥ samudbhūtaḥ trilocanaḥ

original: śūlapāṇiḥ kaparddī ca akṣamālāṃ ca darśayan // VamP_2.24 //
analyzed: śūla pāṇiḥ kaparddī ca akṣamālām ca darśayan
tatas mahātmā hi asṛjat ahaṅkāram su dāruṇam

original: yenākrāntāv ubhau devau tāveva brahmaśaṅkarau // VamP_2.25 //
analyzed: yena ākrāntau ubhau devau tau eva brahma śaṅkarau
ahaṅkāra āvṛtaḥ rudraḥ pratyuvāca pitāmaham

original: ko bhavāniha saṃprāptaḥ kena sṛṣṭo 'si māṃ vada // VamP_2.26 //
analyzed: kaḥ bhavān iha saṃprāptaḥ kena sṛṣṭaḥ si mām vada

original: bhavato janakaḥ ko 'tra jananī vā taducyatām // VamP_2.27 //
analyzed: bhavataḥ janakaḥ jananī vā tat ucyatām
iti anyonyam purā tābhyām brahma īśābhyām kalipriya
parivādaḥ bhavat tatra utpattiḥ bhavataḥ bhavat
bhavān pi antarikṣam hi jāta mātraḥ tadā utpatat
dhārayan atulām vīṇām kurvan kilakilā dhvanim
tatas vinirjitaḥ śaṃbhuḥ māninā padmayoninā

original: tasthāvadhomukho dīno grahākrānto yathā śaśī // VamP_2.30 //
analyzed: tasthau adhomukhaḥ dīnaḥ graha ākrāntaḥ yathā śaśī
parājite lokapatau devena parameṣṣinā
krodha andhakāritam rudram mukhaḥ brovīt
aham te pratijānāmi tamaḥ mūrto tri locana
digvāsāḥ vṛṣabha ārūḍhaḥ loka kṣaya karaḥ bhavān
iti uktāḥ śaṅkaraḥ kruddhaḥ vadanam ghora cakṣuṣā
nirdagdhu kāmaḥ tu aniśam dadarśa bhagavān ajaḥ
tatas trinetrasya samudbhavanti vaktrāṇi pañca atha sudarśanāni

original: śvetaṃ ca raktaṃ kanakāvadātaṃ nīlaṃ tathā piṅgajaṭaṃ ca śubhram // VamP_2.34 //
analyzed: śvetam ca raktam kanaka avadātam nīlam tathā piṅga jaṭam ca śubhram

original: vaktrāṇi dṛṣṭvār'kasamāni sadyaḥ paitāmahaṃ vaktramuvāca vākyam /
analyzed: vaktrāṇi dṛṣṭvā arka samāni sadyas paitāmaham vaktram uvāca vākyam

original: samāhatasyātha jalasya budbudā bhavanti kiṃ teṣu parākramo 'sti // VamP_2.35 //
analyzed: samāhatasya atha jalasya budbudāḥ bhavanti kim teṣu
tat śrutvā krodha yuktena śaṅkareṇa mahātmanā
nakha agreṇa śiraḥ chinnam brāhmam paruṣa vādinam
tat chinnam śaṅkarasya eva savye kara tale patat
patate na kadācid ca tat śaṅkara karāt śiraḥ
atha krodha āvṛtena api brahmaṇā adbhuvata karmaṇā

original: sṛṣṭastu puruṣo dhīmān kavacī kuṇḍalī śarī // VamP_2.38 //
analyzed: sṛṣṭaḥ tu puruṣaḥ dhīmān kavacī kuṇḍalī śarī
dhanuṣpāṇiḥ mahā bāhuḥ bāṇa śakti dharaḥ vyayaḥ
catur bhujaḥ mahā tūṇī āditya sama darśanaḥ

original: sa prāha gaccha durbuddhe mā tvāṃ śūlin nipātaye /
analyzed: sa prāha gaccha durbuddhe mā tvām śūlin nipātaye

original: bhavān pāpasamāyuktaḥ pāpiṣṭhaṃ ko jighāṃsati // VamP_2.40 //
analyzed: bhavān pāpa samāyuktaḥ pāpiṣṭham kaḥ jighāṃsati
iti uktāḥ śekaraḥ tena puruṣeṇa mahātmanā
trapā yuktaḥ jagāma atha rudraḥ badarikāśramam
nara nārāyaṇa sthānam parvate hi hima āśraye

original: sarasvatī yatra puṇyā standane saritāṃ varā // VamP_2.42 //
analyzed: sarasvatī yatra puṇyā standane saritām varā

original: tatra gatvā ca taṃ dṛṣṭvā nārāyaṇamuvāca ha /
analyzed: tatra gatvā ca tam dṛṣṭvā nārāyaṇam uvāca ha

original: bhikṣāṃ prayaccha bhagavan mahākāpāliko 'smi bhoḥ // VamP_2.43 //
analyzed: bhikṣām prayaccha bhagavat mahākāpālikaḥ smi bhoḥ
iti uktaḥ dharmaputraḥ tu rudram vacanam abravīt

original: savyaṃ bhujaṃ tāḍayasva triśūlena maheśvara // VamP_2.44 //
analyzed: savyam bhujam tāḍayasva triśūlena maheśvara
nārāyaṇa vacaḥ śrutvā triśūlena trilocanaḥ
savyam nārāyaṇa bhujam tāḍayāmāsa vegavān
triśūla abhihatāt mārgāt tisraḥ dhārāḥ viniryayuḥ
ekā gaganam ākramya sthitā

original: dvitīyā nyapatad bhūmau tāṃ jagrāha tapodhanaḥ /
analyzed: dvitīyā nyapatat bhūmau tām jagrāha tapodhanaḥ
atriḥ tasmāt samudbhūtaḥ durvāsāḥ śaṅkara aṃśataḥ
tṛtīyā nyapatat dhārā kapāle raudra darśane
tasmāt śiśuḥ samabhavat saṃnaddha kavacaḥ yuvā
śyāma avadātaḥ śara cāpa pāṇiḥ garjan yathā prāvṛṣi sau

original: itthaṃ bruvan kasya viśātayāmi skandhācchiras tālaphalaṃ yathaiva // VamP_2.49 //

analyzed: jayā krodhāt gadām gṛhya pūrvadakṣiṇataḥ sthitā
madhye śarvaḥ tasthau krodhāt mahā mune
maḍagāri vadanam dṛṣṭvā devāḥ śakra purogamāḥ
ṛṣayaḥ yakṣa gandharvāḥ kim idam tu iti acintayan
tatas tu dhanuḥ ādāya śarān ca āśīviṣa upamān
dvārapālaḥ tadā dharmaḥ vīrabhadram upādravat
tam āpatantam sahasā dharmam dṛṣṭvā gaṇeśvaraḥ
kareṇa ekena jagrāha triśulam vahni sannibham
kārmukam ca dvitīyena tṛtīyena atha mārgaṇān

original: caturthena gadāṃ gṛhya dharmamabhyadravad gaṇaḥ // VamP_4.25 //
analyzed: caturthena gadām gṛhya dharmam abhyadravat gaṇaḥ
tatas caturbhujam dṛṣṭvā dharmarājaḥ gaṇeśvaram
tasthau aṣṭa bhunajaḥ bhūtvā nānā āyudha dharaḥ vyayaḥ
khaḍga carma gadā prāsa paraśvadha vara aṅkuśaiḥ
cāpa mārgaṇa bhṛt tasthau hantu kāmaḥ gaṇeśvaram
gaṇeśvaraḥ pi saṃkruddhaḥ hantum dharma sanātanam

original: vavarṣa mārgaṇāstīkṣṇān yathā prāvṛṣi toyadaḥ // VamP_4.28 //
analyzed: vavarṣa mārgaṇāḥ tīkṣṇān yathā prāvṛṣi toyadaḥ
tau anyonyam mahātmānau śara cāpa dharau mune
rudhira aruṇa sikta aṅgau kiṃśukau iva rejatuḥ

original: tato varāstrairgaṇanāyakena jitaḥ sa dharmaḥ tarasā prasahya /
analyzed: tatas vara astraiḥ gaṇanāyakena jitaḥ sa dharmaḥ tarasā prasahya

original: parāṅmukho 'bhūdvimanā munīndra sa vīrabhadraḥ praviveśa yajñam / /
analyzed: parāṅmukhaḥ bhūt vimanāḥ muni indra sa vīrabhadraḥ praviveśa yajñam
yajña āvāṭam praviṣṭam tam vīrabhadram gaṇeśvaram

original: dṛṣṭvā tu sahasā devā uttasthuḥ sāyudhā mune // VamP_4.31 //
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā tu sahasā devāḥ uttasthuḥ sa āyudhāḥ mune
vasavaḥ ṣṭau mahābhāgāḥ grahāḥ nava su dāruṇāḥ
indra ādyāḥ dvādaśa ādityāḥ rudrāḥ tu ekādaśā eva hi
viśvedevāḥ ca sādhyāḥ ca siddha gandharva pannagāḥ
yakṣāḥ kiṃpuruṣāḥ ca eva khagāḥ kradharāḥ tathā
rājā vaivastāt vaṃśāt dharmakīrtiḥ tu viśrutaḥ
soma vaṃśa udbhavaḥ ca ugraḥ bhoja kīrtiḥ mahā bhujaḥ
dīti jāḥ dānavāḥ ca anye ye nye tatra samāgatāḥ
te sarve bhyadravan raudram vīrabhadra mud āyudhāḥ
tān āpatataḥ eva āśu cāpa bāṇa dharaḥ gaṇaḥ
abhidudrāva vegena sarvān eva śara utkaraiḥ
te śastra varṣam atulam gaṇeśāya samutsṛjan

original: gaṇeśo 'pi varāstraistān praciccheda bibheda ca // VamP_4.37 //
analyzed: gaṇeśaḥ pi vara astraiḥ tān praciccheda bibheda ca
śaraiḥ śastraiḥ ca satatam vadhyamānāḥ mahātmanā
vīrabhadreṇa deva ādyāḥ
tatas viveśa gaṇapaḥ yajña madhyam su vistṛtam

original: juhvānā ṛṣayo yatra havīṃṣi pravitanvate // VamP_4.39 //
analyzed: juhvānāḥ ṛṣayaḥ yatra havīṃṣi pravitanvate
tatas mahā ṛṣayaḥ dṛṣṭvā mṛgendra vadanam gaṇam

original: bhītā hotraṃ parityajya jagmuḥ śaraṇamacyutam // VamP_4.40 //
analyzed: bhītāḥ hotram parityajya jagmuḥ śaraṇam acyutam
tān ārtāḥ cakrabhṛt dṛṣṭvā mahā ṛṣīḥ trasta mānasān
na bhetavyam iti iti uktvā samuttasthau vara āyudhaḥ
samānamya tatas śārṅga śarān agni śikhā upamān
mumoca vīrabhadrāya kāya āvaraṇa dāraṇān

original: te tasya kāyamāsādya amoghā vai hareḥ śarāḥ /
analyzed: te tasya kāyam āsādya amoghāḥ vai hareḥ śarāḥ
nipetuḥ bhuvi bhagna āśāḥ nāstikāt iva yācakāḥ
śarāḥ tu amoghān mogha tvam āpannān vīkṣya keśavaḥ
divyaiḥ astraiḥ vīrabhadram pracchādayitum udyataḥ
tān astrān vāsudevena prakṣiptān gaṇanāyakaḥ
vārayāmāsa śūlena gadayā mārgaṇaiḥ tathā
dṛṣṭvā vipannāni astrāṇi gadām cikṣepa mādhavaḥ
tri śulena samāhatya pātayāmāsa bhū tale
muśalam vīrabhadrāya pracikṣepa halāyudhaḥ

original: lāṅgalaṃ ca gaṇeśo 'pi gadayā pratyavārayat // VamP_4.47 //
analyzed: lāṅgalam ca gaṇeśaḥ u pi gadayā pratyavārayat

original: muśalaṃ sagadaṃ dṛṣṭvā lāṅgalaṃ ca nivāritam /
analyzed: muśalam sa gadam dṛṣṭvā lāṅgalam ca nivāritam

original: vīrabhadrāya cikṣepa cakraṃ krodhāt khagadhvajaḥ // VamP_4.48 //
analyzed: vīrabhadrāya cikṣepa cakram krodhāt khagadhvajaḥ
tam āpatantam śata sūrya kalpam sudarśanam vīkṣya gaṇeśvaraḥ tu

original: śūlaṃ parityajya jagāra cakraṃ yathā madhuṃ mīnavapuḥ surendraḥ // VamP_4.49 //
analyzed: śūlam parityajya jagāra cakram yathā madhum mīna vapuḥ surendraḥ
cakre nigīrṇe gaṇanāyakena krodha ati raktaḥ sita cāru netraḥ

original: murārirabhyetya gaṇādhipendramutkṣipya vegād bhuvi niṣpipapeṣa // VamP_4.50 //
analyzed: murāriḥ abhyetya gaṇādhipa indram utkṣipya vegāt bhuvi niṣpipapeṣa
hari bāhu ūru vegena viniṣpiṣṭasya bhū tale
sahitam rudhira udgāraiḥ mukāt cakram vinigatam
tatas niḥsṛtam ālokya cakram kaiṭabhanāśanaḥ

original: samādāya hṛṣīkeśo vīrabhadro mumoca ha // VamP_4.52 //
analyzed: samādāya hṛṣīkeśaḥ vīrabhadraḥ mumoca ha
hṛṣīkeśena muktaḥ tu vīrabhadraḥ jaṭādharam
gatvā nivedayāmāsa vāsudevāt parājayam
tatas jaṭādharaḥ dṛṣṭvā gaṇeśam śoṇita āplutam

original: niśvasantaṃ yathā nāgaṃ krodhaṃ cakre tadāvyayaḥ // VamP_4.54 //
analyzed: niśvasantam yathā nāgam krodham cakre tadā avyayaḥ
tatas krodha abhibhūtena śaṃbhunā

original: pūrvoddiṣṭe tadā sthāne sāyudhastu niveśitaḥ // VamP_4.55 //
analyzed: pūrva uddiṣṭe tadā sthāne sa āyudhaḥ tu niveśitaḥ
vīrabhadram atha ādiśya bhadrakālīm ca śaṅkaraḥ
viveśa krodha tāmra akṣaḥ yajña vāṭam triśūlabhṛt
tatas tu deva pravare jaṭādhare triśūla pāṇau tripurānta kāriṇi

original: dakṣasya yajñaṃ viśati kṣayaṅkare jāto ṛṣīṇāṃ pravaro hi sādhvasaḥ // VamP_4.57 //
analyzed: dakṣasya yajñam viśati kṣayaṅkare jātaḥ u ṛṣīṇām pravaraḥ hi sādhvasaḥ
iti śrī vāmanapurāṇe caturthaḥ dhyāyaḥ
pulastyaḥ uvāca
jaṭādharam hariḥ ddaṣṭvā krodhāt ārakta locanam
tasmāt sthānāt apākramya kubjāmre ntarhitaḥ sthitaḥ
vasavaḥ ṣṭau haram dṛṣṭvā susruvuḥ vegataḥ mune

original: sā tu jātā saricchreṣṭhā sītā nāma sarasvatī // VamP_5.2 //
analyzed: sā tu jātā sarit śreṣṭhā sītā nāma sarasvatī
ekādaśa tathā rudrāḥ tri netrāḥ vṛṣa ketanāḥ

original: kāndiśīkā layaṃ jagmuḥ samabhyetyaiva śaṅkaram // VamP_5.3 //
analyzed: kāndiśīkāḥ layam jagmuḥ samabhyetya eva śaṅkaram
viśve śvinau ca ca sādhyāḥ ca marutaḥ nala bhāskarāḥ
samāsādya puroḍāśam bhakṣyāḥ ca mahā mune
candraḥ samam ṛkṣa gaṇaiḥ niśām samupadarśayan
utpatya ruhya gaganam svam adhiṣṭhānam āsthitaḥ
kaśyapa ādyāḥ ca ṛṣayaḥ japantaḥ śatarudriyam

original: puṣpāñjalipuṭā bhūtvā praṇatāḥ saṃsthitā mune // VamP_5.6 //
analyzed: puṣpa añjali puṭāḥ bhūtvā praṇatāḥ saṃsthitāḥ mune
asakṛt dakṣa dayitā dṛṣṭvā rudram bala adhikam

original: śakrādīnāṃ sureśānāṃ kṛpaṇaṃ vilalāpa ha // VamP_5.7 //
analyzed: śakra ādīnām sura īśānām kṛpaṇam vilalāpa ha
tatas krodha abhibhūtena śaṅkareṇa mahātmanā
tala prahāraiḥ amarāḥ bahavaḥ vinipātitāḥ
pāda prahāraiḥ amarā tri śulena apare mune
dṛṣṭi agninā tathā eva anye deva ādyāḥ pralayīkṛtāḥ

original: tataḥ pūṣā haraṃ vīkṣya vinighnantaṃ surāsurān /
analyzed: tatas pūṣā haram vīkṣya vinighnantam sura asurān

original: krodhād bāhū prasāryatha pradudrāva maheśvaram // VamP_5.10 //
analyzed: krodhāt bāhū prasārī atha pradudrāva maheśvaram
tam āpatantam bhagavān saṃnirīkṣya trilocanaḥ
bāhubhyām pratijagrāha kareṇa ekena śaṅkaraḥ
karābhyām pragṛhītasya śaṃbhunā aṃśumataḥ hi
kara aṅgulibhyaḥ niśceruḥ asṛj dhārāḥ samantataḥ
tatas vegena mahatā aṃśumantam divākaram

original: bhrāmayāmāsa satataṃ siṃho mṛgaśiśuṃ yathā // VamP_5.13 //
analyzed: bhrāmayāmāsa satatam siṃhaḥ mṛga śiśum yathā
bhrāmitasya ativegena hi
bhujau hasva tvam āpannau truṭita snāyu bandhanau
rudhira āpluta sarva aṅgam aṃśumantam maheśvaraḥ
saṃnirībhya utsasarja enam anyatas
bhijagāma ha
tatas tu pūṣā vihasan daśanāni vidarśayan
provāca ehi ehi kāpālin punar punar atha īśvaram
tatas krodha abhibhūtena pūṣṇe vegena śaṃbhunā
muṣṭinā āhatya daśanāḥ pātitāḥ dharaṇī tale
bhagna dantaḥ tathā pūṣā śoṇita abhipluta ānanaḥ

original: papāta bhuvi niḥsaṃjño vajrāhata ivācalaḥ // VamP_5.18 //
analyzed: papāta bhuvi niḥsaṃjñaḥ vajra āhataḥ iva acalaḥ
pūṣāṇam patitam rudhira ukṣitam
netrābhyām ghora rūpābhyām vṛṣadhvajam avaikṣata
tripura ghnaḥ tatas kruddhaḥ talena āhatya cakṣuṣī
nipātayāmāsa bhuvi kṣobhayan sarva devatāḥ
tatas divākarāḥ sarve puraskṛtya śatakratum
marudbhiḥ ca hutāśaiḥ ca bhayāt jagmuḥ diśaḥ daśa
pratiyāteṣu deveṣu prahlāda ādyāḥ ditīsvarāḥ

original: namaskṛtya tataḥ sarve tasthuḥ prāñjalayo mune // VamP_5.22 //
analyzed: namaskṛtya tatas sarve tasthuḥ prāñjalayaḥ mune
tatas tam yajña vāṭam tu śaṅkaraḥ ghora cakṣuṣā

original: dadarśa dagdhuṃ kopena sarvāṃścaiva surāmurān // VamP_5.23 //
analyzed: dadarśa dagdhum kopena sarvān ca eva sura amurān
tatas nililyire vīrāḥ praṇemuḥ dudruḥ tathā

original: bhayādanye haraṃ dṛṣṭvā gatā vaivasvatakṣayam // VamP_5.24 //
analyzed: bhayāt anye haram dṛṣṭvā gatāḥ vaivasvata kṣayam
trayaḥ gnayaḥ tribhiḥ neḥ duḥsaham samavaikṣata
dṛṣṭa mātrāḥ trinetreṇa bhasmībhūtāḥ abhavan kṣaṇāt
agnau praṇaṣṭe bhūtvā divya vapuḥ mṛgaḥ
dudrāva viklava gatiḥ dakṣiṇā sahitaḥ mbare
tam eva anusasāra īśaḥ cāpam ānamya vegavān

original: śaraṃ pāśupataṃ kṛtvā kālarūpī maheśvaraḥ // VamP_5.27 //
analyzed: śaram pāśupatam kṛtvā kāla rūpī maheśvaraḥ
arddhena yajña vāṭa ante jaṭādharaḥ iti śrutaḥ

original: arddhena gagane śarvaḥ kālarūpī ca kathyate // VamP_5.28 //
analyzed: arddhena gagane śarvaḥ kālarūpī ca kathyate
nāradaḥ uvāca
kāla rūpī tvayā ākhyātaḥ śaṃbhuḥ gagana gocaraḥ

original: lakṣaṇaṃ ca svarūpaṃ ca sarvaṃ vyākhyātumarhasi // VamP_5.29 //
analyzed: lakṣaṇam ca svarūpam ca sarvam vyākhyātum arhasi
pulastyaḥ uvāca
svarūpam tripura ghnasya vadiṣye kāla pūpiṇaḥ
yena ambaram muni śreṣṭha vyāptam loka hita īpsunā
yatra aśvinī ca bharaṇī kuttikāyāḥ tathā aṃśakaḥ

original: meṣo rāśiḥ kujakṣetraṃ tacchiraḥ kālarūpiṇaḥ // VamP_5.31 //
analyzed: meṣaḥ rāśiḥ kuja kṣetram tad śiraḥ kāla rūpiṇaḥ
āgneya āśāḥ trayaḥ brahman prājāpatyam kaveḥ gṛham
vṛṣa nāmā idam vadanam parikīrtitam
mṛga arddham ārdra āditya aṃśāḥ trayaḥ saumya gṛham tu idam
mithunam bhujayoḥ tat asya gagana sthasya śūlinaḥ

original: ādityāṃśaśca puṣyaṃ ca āśleṣā śaśino gṛham /
analyzed: āditya aṃśaḥ ca puṣyam ca āśleṣā śaśinaḥ gṛham
rāśiḥ karkaṭakaḥ nāma pārśve
pitrya ṛkṣam bhaga daivatyam uttarān ca kesarī
sūrya kṣetram vibhoḥ brahman hṛdayam parigīyate
uttara aṃśāḥ trayaḥ pāṇiḥ citra ardham kanyakā tu iyam

original: somaputrasya sadmaitad dvitīyaṃ jaṭharaṃ vibhoḥ // VamP_5.36 //
analyzed: somaputrasya sadma etat dvitīyam jaṭharam vibhoḥ
citra aṃśa dvitayam svātiḥ viśākhāyāḥ aṃśaka trayam
dvitīyam sukra sadanam tulā nābhiḥ udāhṛtā
viśākhā aṃśam anūrādhā jyeṣṭhā bhauma gṛham tu idam
dvitīyam vṛścikaḥ rāśiḥ meḍhram kāla sava rūpiṇaḥ
mūlam pūrva uttara aṃśaḥ ca devācajārya gṛham dhanuḥ
ūru yugalam īśasya amara ṛṣe pragīyate
uttara aṃśāḥ trayaḥ ṛkṣam śravaṇam makaraḥ mune
dhaniṣṭhā ardham śatabhiṣā jānunī parameṣṭhinaḥ
dhaniṣṭhā ardham śatabhiṣā prauṣṭhapadyā aṃśaka trayam

original: saureḥ sadmāparamidaṃ kumbho jaṅghe ca viśrate // VamP_5.41 //
analyzed: saureḥ sadma aparam idam kumbhaḥ jaṅghe ca
proṣṭhapadyā aṃśam ekam tu uttarā revatī tathā
dvitīyam jīva sadanam mīnaḥ tu caraṇau ubhau

original: evaṃ kṛtvā kālarūpaṃ trinetro yajñaṃ krodhānmārgarājaghāna /
analyzed: evam kṛtvā kāla rūpam trinetraḥ yajñam krodhāt mārga rājaghāna

original: viddhaścāsau vedanābuddhimuktaḥ khe saṃtasthau tārakābhiścitāṅgaḥ // VamP_5.43 //
analyzed: viddhaḥ ca asau vedanā buddhi muktaḥ khe saṃtasthau tārakābhiḥ cita aṅgaḥ
nāradaḥ uvāca

original: rāśayo gaditā brahmaṃstvayā dvādaśa vai mama /
analyzed: rāśayaḥ gaditāḥ brahman tvayā dvādaśa vai mama

original: teṣāṃ viśeṣato brūhi lakṣaṇāni svarūpataḥ // VamP_5.44 //
analyzed: teṣām viśeṣataḥ brūhi lakṣaṇāni svarūpataḥ
pulastyaḥ uvāca

original: svarūpaṃ tava vakṣyāmi rāśīnāṃ śṛṇu nārada /
analyzed: svarūpam tava vakṣyāmi rāśīnām śṛṇu nārada

original: yādṛśā yatra saṃcārā yasmin sthāne vasanti ca // VamP_5.45 //
analyzed: yādṛśāḥ yatra saṃcārāḥ yasmin sthāne vasanti ca
meṣaḥ samāna mūrtiḥ ca ajāvika dhana ādiṣu
saṃcāra sthānam eva asya dhānya ratna ākara ādiṣu
nava śādūla saṃchanna vasudhāyām ca sarvaśas

original: nityaṃ carati phulleṣu sarasāṃ pulineṣu ca // VamP_5.47 //
analyzed: nityam carati phulleṣu sarasām pulineṣu ca
vṛṣaḥ sadṛśa rūpaḥ hi carate go kula ādiṣu
tasya adhivāsa bhūmiḥ tu kuṣīvala dhara āśrayaḥ
strīpuṃsayoḥ samam rūpam śayyā āsana parigrahaḥ
vīṇā vādya dhṛk mithunam gīta nartaka śilpiṣu
sthitaḥ krīḍā ratiḥ nityam vihāra avaniḥ asya tu

original: mithunaṃ nāma vikhyātaṃ rāśirdvedhātmakaḥ sthitaḥ // VamP_5.50 //
analyzed: mithunam nāma vikhyātam rāśiḥ dvedhā ātmakaḥ sthitaḥ
karkiḥ kulīreṇa samaḥ salila sthaḥ prakīrtitaḥ
kedāra vāpī puline vivikta avaniḥ eva ca
sihaḥ tu parvata araṇya durga kandara bhūmiṣu

original: vasate vyādhapallīṣu gahvareṣu guhāsu ca // VamP_5.52 //
analyzed: vasate vyādha pallīṣu gahvareṣu guhāsu ca
vrīhipradīpikakarā manau ārūḍhā ca kanyakā

original: carate strīratisthāne vasate naḍvaleṣu ca // VamP_5.53 //
analyzed: carate strī rati sthāne vasate naḍvaleṣu ca
tulā pāṇiḥ ca puruṣaḥ vīthi āpaṇa vicārakaḥ
nagara adhvāna śālāsu vasate tatra nārada
śvabhra valmīka saṃcārī vṛścikaḥ vṛścika ākṛtiḥ
viṣa gomaya kīṭa ādi pāṣāṇa ādiṣu saṃsthitaḥ
dhanuḥ tu raṅga jaghanaḥ dīpyamānaḥ dhanurdharaḥ
vāji śūra astra vid vīraḥ sthāyī gaja ratha ādiṣu

original: makaro 'sau nadīcārī vasate ca mahodadhau // VamP_5.57 //
analyzed: nadī cārī vasate ca mahā udadhau
riktamumbhaḥ ca puruṣaḥ skandhadhārī jala āplutaḥ
dyūta śālā caraḥ kumbhaḥ sthāyī śauṇḍika sadmasu
mīna dvayam atha āsaktam mīnaḥ tīrtha abdhi saṃcaraḥ
vasate puṇya deśeṣu deva brāhnaṇa sadmasu
lakṣaṇāḥ gaditāḥ tubhyam meṣa ādīnām mahā mune
na kasyacid tvayā ākhyeyam guhyam etat purātanam

original: etan mayā te kathitaṃ surarṣe yathā trinetraḥ pramātha yajñam /
analyzed: etat mayā te kathitam sura ṛṣe yathā trinetraḥ pramātha yajñam

original: puṇyaṃ purāṇaṃ paramaṃ pavitramākhyātavānpāpaharaṃ śivaṃ ca // VamP_5.61 //
analyzed: puṇyam purāṇam paramam pavitram ākhyātavān pāpa haram śivam ca
iti śrī vāmanapurāṇe pañcamaḥ dhyāyaḥ
pulastyaḥ uvāca
hṛd bhavaḥ brahmaṇaḥ sau dharmaḥ divya vapuḥ mune
dākṣāyāṇī tasya bhāryā tasyām ajanayat sutān

original: hariṃ kuṣṇaṃ ca devarṣe nārāyaṇanarau tathā /
analyzed: harim kuṣṇam ca deva ṛṣe nārāyaṇa narau tathā
yoga abhyāsa ratau nityam hari kṛṣṇau babhūvatuḥ
nara nārāyaṇau ca eva jagataḥ hita kāmyayā

original: tapyetāṃ ca tapaḥ saumyau purāṇavṛṣisattmau // VamP_6.3 //
analyzed: tapyetām ca tapaḥ saumyau purāṇa vṛṣi sattmau
prāleyādrim samāgamya tīrthe badarikāśrame

original: gṛmantau tatparaṃ brahma gaṅgāyā vipule taṭe // VamP_6.4 //
analyzed: gṛmantau tat param brahma gaṅgāyāḥ vipule taṭe
nara nārāyaṇābhyām ca jagat etat carācaram

original: tāpitaṃ tapasā brahman śakraḥ kṣobhaṃ tadā yayau // VamP_6.5 //
analyzed: tāpitam tapasā brahman śakraḥ kṣobham tadā yayau
saṃkṣubdhaḥ tapasā tābhyām kṣobhamaṇāya śatakratuḥ
rambhā ādyā apsarasaḥ śreṣṭhāḥ preṣayat sa mahā āśramam
kandarpaḥ ca su durdharṣaḥ cūta aṅkura mahā āyudhaḥ
samam sahacareṇa eva vasantena āśramam gataḥ
tatas mādhava kandarpau tāḥ ca eva apsarasaḥ varāḥ
badaryāśramam āgamya vicikrīḍuḥ yathā icchayā
tatas vasante saṃprāpte siṃśukāḥ jvalana prabhāḥ

original: niṣpatrāḥ satataṃ rejuḥ śomabhayanto dharātalam // VamP_6.9 //
analyzed: niṣpatrāḥ satatam rejuḥ śoma bhayantaḥ dharā talam
śiśiram nāma mātaṅgam vidārya nakharaiḥ iva
vasantakesarī prāptaḥ palāśa kusumaiḥ mune
mayā tuṣāra ogha karī nirjitaḥ svena tejasā
tam eva hasata iti uccais vasantaḥ kunda kuḍmalaiḥ
vanāni karṇikārāṇām puṣpitāni virejire
yathā narendra putrāṇi kanaka ābharaṇāni hi

original: teṣāmanu tathā nīpāḥ piṅkarā iva rejire /
analyzed: teṣām anu tathā nīpāḥ piṅkarāḥ iva rejire
svami saṃlabdha saṃmānāḥ bhṛtyāḥ rāja sutān iva
rakta aśoka vanāḥ bhānti puṣpitāḥ sahasā ujjvalāḥ
bhṛtvā vasanta nṛpateḥ saṃgrāme sṛj plutāḥ iva
mṛga vṛndāḥ piñjaritāḥ rājante gahane vane
pulaka abhirvṛtāḥ yadvat sat janāḥ suhṛd āgame
mañjarībhiḥ virājante nadī kūleṣu vetasāḥ

original: vaktukāmā ivāṅgulyā ko 'smākaṃ sadṛśo nagaḥ // VamP_6.16 //
analyzed: vaktu kāmāḥ iva aṅgulyā kaḥ smākam sadṛśaḥ nagaḥ
rakta aśoka karā tanvī devarṣe kiśuka aṅghrikā
nīla aśoka kacā śyāmā vikāsi kamala ānanā
nīla indīvara netrā ca brahman bilva phala stanī
praphulla kunda daśanā mañjarī kara śobhitā
bandhujīva adharā śubhrā
puṃskokila svanā divyā aṅkola vasanā śubhā
barhi vṛnda kalāpā ca sārasa svara nūpurā
prāc vaṃśa rasanā brahman matta haṃsa gatiḥ tathā
vasanta lakṣmīḥ saṃprāptā badarikāśrame
tatas nārāyaṇaḥ dṛṣṭvā āśramasya anavadya tām
samīkṣya ca diśaḥ sarvāḥ tatas naṅgam apaśyata
nāradaḥ uvāca
kaḥ saḥ anaṅgaḥ brahmarṣe tasmin badarikāśrame

original: yaṃ dadarśa jagannātho devo nārāyaṇo 'vyayaḥ // VamP_6.23 //
analyzed: yam dadarśa jagannāthaḥ devaḥ nārāyaṇaḥ vyayaḥ
pulastyaḥ uvāca
kandarpaḥ harṣa tanayaḥ sau kāmaḥ nigadyate
sa śaṅkareṇa saṃdagdhaḥ hi anaṅga tvam upāgataḥ
nāradaḥ uvāca
kimartham devadevena śaṃbhunā
dagdhaḥ tu kāraṇe kasmin etat vyākhyātum arhasi
pulastyaḥ uvāca

original: yadā dakṣasutā brahman satī yātā yamakṣayam /
analyzed: yadā dakṣa sutā brahman satī yātā yama kṣayam

original: vināśya dakṣayajñaṃ taṃ vicacāra trilocanaḥ // VamP_6.26 //
analyzed: vināśya dakṣa yajñam tam vicacāra trilocanaḥ
tatas vṛṣadhvajam dṛṣṭvā kandarpaḥ kusumāyudhaḥ
apatnīkam tadā astreṇa unmādena abhyatāḍayat
tatas haraḥ śareṇa atha unmādena āśu tāḍitaḥ

original: vicacāra tadonmattaḥ kānanāni sarāṃsi ca // VamP_6.28 //
analyzed: vicacāra tadā unmattaḥ kānanāni sarāṃsi ca
smaran satīm mahādevaḥ tathā unmādena tāḍitaḥ

original: na śarma lebhe devarṣe bāṇaviddha iva dvipaḥ // VamP_6.29 //
analyzed: na śarma lebhe deva ṛṣe bāṇa viddhaḥ iva dvipaḥ
tatas papāta deveśaḥ kālindī saritam mune

original: nimagne śaṅkare āpo dagdhāḥ kṛṣṇātvamāgatāḥ // VamP_6.30 //
analyzed: nimagne śaṅkare āpaḥ dagdhāḥ kṛṣṇā tvam āgatāḥ
tadā prabhṛti kālindyāḥ bhṛṅga añjana nibham jalam
āsyandat puṇya tīrthā sā keśapāśam iva a vane

original: tato nadīṣu puṇyāsu sarassu ca nadeṣu ca /
analyzed: tatas nadīṣu puṇyāsu sarassu ca nadeṣu ca

original: puluneṣu ca ramyeṣu vāpīṣu nalinīṣu ca // VamP_6.32 //
analyzed: puluneṣu ca ramyeṣu vāpīṣu nalinīṣu ca

original: parvateṣu ca ramyeṣu kānaneṣu ca sānuṣu /
analyzed: parvateṣu ca ramyeṣu kānaneṣu ca sānuṣu

original: vicāran svecchayā naiva śarma lebhe maheśvaraḥ // VamP_6.33 //
analyzed: vicāran sva icchayā nā eva śarma lebhe maheśvaraḥ

original: kṣaṇaṃ gāyati devarṣe kṣaṇaṃ roditi śaṅkaraḥ /
analyzed: kṣaṇam gāyati deva ṛṣe kṣaṇam roditi śaṅkaraḥ

original: kṣaṇaṃ dhyāyati tanvaṅgīṃ dakṣakanyāṃ manoramām // VamP_6.34 //
analyzed: kṣaṇam dhyāyati tanvaṅgīm dakṣakanyām manoramām

original: dhyātvā kṣaṇaṃ prasvapiti kṣaṇaṃ svapnāyate haraḥ /
analyzed: dhyātvā kṣaṇam prasvapiti kṣaṇam svapnāyate haraḥ

original: svapne tathedaṃ gadati tāṃ dṛṣṭvā dakṣakanyakām // VamP_6.35 //
analyzed: svapne tathā idam gadati tām dṛṣṭvā dakṣa kanyakām

original: nirghṛṇe tiṣṭha kiṃ mūḍhe tyajase māmanindite /
analyzed: nirghṛṇe tiṣṭha kim mūḍhe tyajase mām anindite

original: mugdhe tvayā virahito dagdho 'smi madanāgninā // VamP_6.36 //
analyzed: mugdhe tvayā virahitaḥ dagdhaḥ smi madana agninā

original: sati satyaṃ prakupitā mā kopaṃ kuru sundari /
analyzed: sati satyam prakupitā mā kopam kuru sundari
pāda praṇāma avanatam abhibhāṣitu m arhasi

original: śrūyase dṛśyase nityaṃ spṛśyase vandyase priye /
analyzed: śrūyase dṛśyase nityam spṛśyase vandyase priye

original: āliṅgyase ca satataṃ kimarthaṃ nābhibhāṣase // VamP_6.38 //
analyzed: āliṅgyase ca satatam kimartham nā abhibhāṣase

original: vilapantaṃ janaṃ dṛṣṭvā kṛpā kasya na jāyate /
analyzed: vilapantam janam dṛṣṭvā kṛpā kasya na jāyate

original: viśeṣataḥ patiṃ bāle nanupa tvamatinirghṛṇā // VamP_6.39 //
analyzed: viśeṣataḥ patim bāle nanupa tvam ati nirghṛṇā
tvayā uktāni vacāṃsi evam pūrvam mama kṛśa udari

original: vinā tvayā na jīveyaṃ tadasatyaṃ tvayā kṛtam // VamP_6.40 //
analyzed: vinā tvayā na jīveyam tat asatyam tvayā kṛtam
ehi ehi kāma saṃtaptam pariṣvaja su locane

original: nānyathā naśyate tāpaḥ satyenāpi śape priye // VamP_6.41 //
analyzed: nā anyathā naśyate tāpaḥ satyena api śape priye
ittham vilapya svapna ante pratibuddhaḥ tu tad kṣaṇāt

original: utkūjati tathāraṇye muktakaṇṭhaṃ punaḥ punaḥ // VamP_6.42 //
analyzed: utkūjati tathā araṇye mukta kaṇṭham punar punar

original: taṃ kūjamānaṃ vilapantamārāt samīkṣya pācaṃ tarasā vṛṣaketanaṃ hi /
analyzed: tam kūjamānam vilapantam ārāt samīkṣya pācam tarasā vṛṣaketanam hi

original: vivyādha cāpaṃ tarasā vināmya saṃtāpanāmnā tu śareṇa bhūyaḥ // VamP_6.43 //
analyzed: vivyādha cāpam tarasā vināmya saṃtāpa nāmnā tu śareṇa bhūyas

original: saṃtāpanāstreṇa tadā sa viddho bhūyaḥ sa saṃtaptataro babhūva /
analyzed: saṃtāpana astreṇa tadā sa viddhaḥ bhūyas sa saṃtaptataraḥ babhūva

original: saṃtāpayaṃścāpi jagatsamagraṃ phūtkṛtya phūtkṛtya vivāsate sma // VamP_6.44 //
analyzed: saṃtāpayan ca api jagat samagram phūtkṛtya phūtkṛtya vivāsate sma

original: taṃ cāpi bhūyo madano jaghāna vijṛṇbhaṇāstreṇa tato vijṛmbhe /
analyzed: tam ca api bhūyas madanaḥ jaghāna vijṛṇbhaṇa astreṇa tatas vijṛmbhe

original: tato bhṛśaṃ kāmaśarairvitunno vijṛmbhamāṇaḥ parito bhramaṃśca // VamP_6.45 //
analyzed: tatas bhṛśam kāma śaraiḥ vitunnaḥ vijṛmbhamāṇaḥ paritas bhraman ca
dadarśa yakṣa adhipateḥ tanūjam pāñcālikam nāma jagat pradhānam

original: dṛṣṭvā trinetro dhanadasya putraṃ pārśvaṃ samabhyetya vaco babhāṣe /
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā trinetraḥ dhanadasya putram pārśvam samabhyetya vacaḥ babhāṣe

original: bhrātṛvya vakṣyasi vaco yadadya tat tvaṃ kuruṣvāmitavikramo 'si // VamP_6.46 //
analyzed: bhrātṛvya vakṣyasi vacaḥ yat adya tat tvam kuruṣva amita vikramaḥ si
pāñcālikaḥ uvāca

original: yannātha māṃ vakṣyasi tatkariṣye suduṣkaraṃ yadyapi devasaṃghai /
analyzed: yat nātha mām vakṣyasi tat kariṣye su duṣkaram yadi api deva saṃghaiḥ

original: ājñāpayasvātulavīrya śaṃbho dāso 'smi te bhaktiyutastatheśa // VamP_6.47 //
analyzed: ājñāpayasva atula vīrya śaṃbho dāsaḥ smi te bhakti yutaḥ tathā īśa
īśvaraḥ uvāca
nāśam gatāyām vara da ambikāyām kāma agninā smi

original: vijṛmbhaṇonmādasarairvibhinno dhṛtiṃ na vindāmi ratiṃ sukhaṃ vā // VamP_6.48 //
analyzed: vijṛmbhaṇa unmāda saraiḥ vibhinnaḥ dhṛtim na vindāmi ratim sukham vā
vijṛmbhaṇam putra tathā eva tāpam unmādam ugram madana praṇunnam

original: nānyaḥ pumān dhārayituṃ hi śakto muktvā bhavantaṃ hi tataḥ pratīccha // VamP_6.49 //
analyzed: na anyaḥ pumān dhārayitum hi śaktaḥ muktvā bhavantam hi tatas pratīccha
pulastyaḥ uvāca

original: ityevamukto vṛṣabhadhvajena yakṣaḥ pratīcchat sa vijṛmbhaṇādīn /
analyzed: iti evam uktaḥ vṛṣabhadhvajena yakṣaḥ pratīcchat sa vijṛmbhaṇa ādīn

original: toṣaṃ jagāmāśu tatastriśūlī tuṣṭastadaivaṃ vacanaṃ babhāṣe // VamP_6.50 //
analyzed: toṣam jagāma āśu tatas triśūlī tuṣṭaḥ tadā evam vacanam babhāṣe
haraḥ uvāca
yasmāt tvayā putra su durdharāṇi vijṛmbhaṇa ādīn pratīcchitāni

original: tasmādvaraṃ tvāṃ pratipūjanāya dāsyāmi lokya ca hāsyakāri // VamP_6.51 //
analyzed: tasmāt varam tvām pratipūjanāya dāsyāmi ca hāsya kāri

original: yastvāṃ yadā paśyati caitramāse spṛśennaro vārcayate ca bhaktyā /
analyzed: yaḥ tvām yadā paśyati caitra māse spṛśet naraḥ vā arcayate ca bhaktyā

original: vṛddho 'tha bālo 'tha yuvātha yoṣit sarve tadonmādadharā bhavanti // VamP_6.52 //
analyzed: sarve tadā unmāda dharāḥ bhavanti

original: gāyanti nṛtyanti ramanti yakṣa vādyāni yatnādapi vādayanti /
analyzed: gāyanti nṛtyanti ramanti yakṣa vādyāni yatnāt api vādayanti

original: tavāgrato hāsyavaco 'bhiraktā bhavanti te yogayutāstu te syuḥ // VamP_6.53 //
analyzed: tava agratas hāsya vacaḥ abhiraktāḥ bhavanti te yoga yutāḥ tu te syuḥ

original: mamaiva nāmnā bhavitāsi pūjyaḥ pāñcālikeśaḥ prathitaḥ pṛthivyām /
analyzed: mama eva nāmnā bhavitāsi pūjyaḥ pāñcālikeśaḥ prathitaḥ pṛthivyām

original: mama prasādād varado narāṇāṃ bhaviṣyase pūjyatamo 'bhigaccha // VamP_6.54 //
analyzed: mama prasādāt vara daḥ narāṇām bhaviṣyase pūjyatamaḥ bhigaccha

original: ityevamukto vibhunā sa yakṣo jagāma deśān sahasaiva sarvān /
analyzed: iti evam uktaḥ vibhunā sa yakṣaḥ jagāma deśān sahasā eva sarvān

original: kālañjarasyottarataḥ supuṇyo deśo himādrerapi dakṣiṇasthaḥ // VamP_6.55 //
analyzed: kālañjarasya uttaratas su puṇyaḥ deśaḥ himādreḥ api dakṣiṇa sthaḥ
tasmin su puṇye viṣaye niviṣṭaḥ rudra prasādāt abhipūjyate sau

original: tasmin prayāte bhagavāṃstrinetro devo 'pi vindhyaṃ girimabhyagacchat // VamP_6.56 //
analyzed: tasmin prayāte bhagavān trinetraḥ devaḥ vindhyam girim abhyagacchat
tatra api madanaḥ gatvā dadarśa vṛṣaketanam

original: dṛṣṭvā praharttukāmaṃ ca tataḥ prāduvacaddharaḥ // VamP_6.57 //
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā praharttu kāmam ca tatas prāduvacat haraḥ
tatas dāru vanam ghoram madana abhisṛtaḥ haraḥ

original: viveśa ṛṣayo yatra sapatnīkā vyavasthitāḥ // VamP_6.58 //
analyzed: viveśa ṛṣayaḥ yatra sa patnīkāḥ vyavasthitāḥ

original: te cāpi ṛṣayaḥ sarve dṛṣṭvā mūrdhnā natābhavan /
analyzed: te ca api ṛṣayaḥ sarve dṛṣṭvā mūrdhnā natāḥ abhavan

original: tatastān prāha bhagavān bhikṣā me pratidīyatām // VamP_6.59 //
analyzed: tatas tān prāha bhagavān bhikṣā me pratidīyatām
tatas te mauninaḥ tasthuḥ sarve eva mahā ṛṣayaḥ
tadā āśramāṇi sarvāṇi paricakrāma nāradaḥ
tam praviṣṭam tadā dṛṣṭvā bhārgava ātreya yoṣitaḥ
prakṣobham agaman sarvāḥ hīna sattvāḥ samantataḥ
ṛte tu arundhatīm ekām anasūyām ca bhāminīm

original: etābhyāṃ bhartṛpūjāsu taccintāsu sthitaṃ manaḥ // VamP_6.62 //
analyzed: etābhyām bhartṛ pūjāsu tad cintāsu sthitam manaḥ

original: tataḥ saṃkṣubhitāḥ sarvā yatra yāti maheśvaraḥ /
analyzed: tatas saṃkṣubhitāḥ sarvāḥ yatra yāti maheśvaraḥ
tatra prayānti kāma ārttāḥ mada vihvalita indriyāḥ
tyaktvā āśramaṇi śūnyāni svānitāḥ muni yoṣitaḥ

original: anuḍajagmuryathā mattaṃ kariṇya iva kuñjaram // VamP_6.64 //
analyzed: anuḍajagmuḥ yathā mattam kariṇyaḥ iva kuñjaram
tatas tu ṛṣayaḥ dṛṣṭvā bhārgava aṅgirasaḥ mune
krodha anvitāḥ abruvan sarve liṅge sya patatām bhuvi

original: tataḥ papāta devasya liṅgaṃ pṛthvīṃ vidārayan /
analyzed: tatas papāta devasya liṅgam pṛthvīm vidārayan
antarddhānam jagāma atha triśūlī nīlalohitaḥ

original: tataḥ sa patito liṅgo vibhidya vasudhātalam /
analyzed: tatas sa patitaḥ liṅgaḥ vibhidya vasudhā talam
rasātalam viveśa āśu brahmaṇḍam ca ūrdhvatas bhinat
tatas cacāla pṛthivī girayaḥ saritaḥ nagāḥ
pātāla bhuvanāḥ sarve jaṅgama ajaṅgamaiḥ vṛtāḥ
saṃkṣubdhān bhuvanān dṛṣṭvā bhūrloka ādīn pitāmahaḥ

original: jagāma mādhavaṃ draṣṭuṃ kṣīrodaṃ nāma sāgaram // VamP_6.69 //
analyzed: jagāma mādhavam draṣṭum kṣīrodam nāma sāgaram

original: tatra dṛṣṭvā hṛṣīkeśaṃ praṇipatya ca bhaktitaḥ /
analyzed: tatra dṛṣṭvā hṛṣīkeśam praṇipatya ca bhaktitaḥ

original: uvāca deva bhuvanāḥ kimartha kṣubhitā vibho // VamP_6.70 //
analyzed: uvāca deva bhuvanāḥ kimartha kṣubhitāḥ vibho
athā uvāca hariḥ brahman śārvaḥ liṅgaḥ mahā ṛṣibhiḥ
pātitaḥ tasya bhāra ārtā saṃcacāla vasuṃdharā
tatas tat adbhutatamam śrutvā devaḥ vitāmahaḥ

original: tatra gacchāma deveśa evamāha punaḥ punaḥ // VamP_6.72 //
analyzed: tatra gacchāma deveśaḥ evam āha punar punar
tatas pitāmahaḥ devaḥ keśavaḥ ca jagatpatiḥ

original: ājagmatustamuddeśaṃ yatra liṅgaṃ bhavasya tat // VamP_6.73 //
analyzed: ājagmatuḥ tam uddeśam yatra liṅgam bhavasya tat
tatas nantam hariḥ liṅgam dṛṣṭvā āruhya khageśvaram
pātālam praviveśa atha vismaya antaritaḥ vibhuḥ
brahma padma vimānena urdhvam ākramya sarvatas
na eva antam alabhat brahman vismitaḥ punar āgataḥ
viṣṇuḥ gatvā atha pātālān sapta loka parāyaṇaḥ
cakrapāṇiḥ viniṣkrāntaḥ lebhe n tam na mahā mune
viṣṇuḥ pitāmahaḥ ca ubhau hara liṅgam sametya hi

original: kṛtāñjalipuṭau bhūtvā stotuṃ devaṃ pracakratuḥ // VamP_6.77 //
analyzed: kṛta añjali puṭau bhūtvā stotum devam pracakratuḥ
hari brahmāṇau ūcatuḥ
namaḥ stu te śūlapāṇe namaḥ stu vṛṣabhadhvaja

original: jīmūtavāhana kave śarva tryambaka śaṅkara // VamP_6.78 //
analyzed: jīmūtavāhana kave śarva tryambaka śaṅkara
maheśvara maheśāna suparṇa akṣa vṛṣākape
dakṣa yajña kṣaya kara kāla rūpa namaḥ stu te
tvam ādiḥ asya jagataḥ tvam madhyam parameśvara

original: bhavānantaśca bhagavān sarvagastvaṃ namo 'stu te // VamP_6.80 //
analyzed: bhavān antaḥ ca bhagavān sarvagaḥ tvam namaḥ stu te
pulastyaḥ uvāca
evam saṃstūyamānaḥ tu tasmin dāru vane haraḥ

original: svarūpī tāvidaṃ vākyamuvāca vadatāṃ varaḥ // VamP_6.81 //
analyzed: svarūpī tau idam vākyam uvāca vadatām varaḥ
haraḥ uvāca
kimartham devatā nāthau paribhūta kramam tu iha
mām stuvāte bhṛśa asvastham kāma tāpita vigraham
devau ūcatuḥ

original: bhaktaḥ pātitaṃ liṅgaṃ yadetad bhuvi śaṅkara /
analyzed: bhaktaḥ pātitam liṅgam yat etat bhuvi śaṅkara

original: etat pragṛhyatāṃ bhūya ato deva stuvāvahe // VamP_6.83 //
analyzed: etat pragṛhyatām bhūyaḥ atas deva stuvāvahe
haraḥ uvāca
yadi arcayanti tridaśāḥ mama liṅgam sura uttamau
tat etat pratigṛhṇīyām na anyathā iti kathañcana
tatas provāca bhagavān evam astu iti keśava

original: brahma svayaṃ ca jagrāha liṅgaṃ kanakapiṅgalam // VamP_6.85 //
analyzed: brahma svayam ca jagrāha liṅgam kanaka piṅgalam
tatas cakāra bhagavān cāturvarṇyam hara arcane
śāstrāṇi ca eṣām mukhyāni nānā ukti viditāni ca
ādyam śaivam parikhyātam anyat pāśupatam mune

original: tṛtīyaṃ kālavadanaṃ caturthaṃ ca kapālinam // VamP_6.87 //
analyzed: tṛtīyam kālavadanam caturtham ca kapālinam
śaivaḥ ca āsīt svayam śaktiḥ vasiṣṭhasya priyaḥ śrutaḥ

original: tasya śiṣyo babhūvātha gopāyana iti śrutaḥ // VamP_6.88 //
analyzed: tasya śiṣyaḥ babhūva atha gopāyanaḥ iti śrutaḥ
mahā pāśupataḥ ca āsīt bharadvājaḥ tapodhanaḥ
tasya śiṣyaḥ u pyabhūt rājā ṛṣabhaḥ somaka īśvaraḥ
kālasyaḥ bhagavān āsīt āpastambaḥ tapodhanaḥ

original: tasya śiṣyobhavadvaiśyo nāmnā krātheśvaro mune // VamP_6.90 //
analyzed: tasya śiṣyaḥ bhavat vaiśyaḥ nāmnā krātheśvaraḥ mune
mahāvratī ca dhanadaḥ tasya śiṣyaḥ ca viryavān

original: karṇodara iti khyāto jātyā śūdro mahātapāḥ // VamP_6.91 //
analyzed: karṇodaraḥ iti khyātaḥ jātyā śūdraḥ mahā tapāḥ

original: evaṃ ma bhagavānbrahma pūjanāya śivasya tu /
analyzed: evam ma bhagavān brahma pūjanāya śivasya tu

original: kṛtvā tu cāturāśramyaṃ svameva bhavanaṃ gataḥ // VamP_6.92 //
analyzed: kṛtvā tu cāturāśramyam svam eva bhavanam gataḥ

original: gate ba3hmaṇi śarvo 'pi upasaṃhṛtya taṃ tadā /
analyzed: gate śarvaḥ pi upasaṃhṛtya tam tadā

original: liṅgaṃ citravane sūkṣmaṃ pratiṣṭhāpya cacāra ha /
analyzed: liṅgam citravane sūkṣmam pratiṣṭhāpya cacāra ha
vicarantam tadā bhūyas maheśam kusumāyudhaḥ
ārāt sthitvā agratas dhanvī saṃtāpayitum udyataḥ
tatas tam agratas dṛṣṭvā krodha ādhmāta dṛśā haraḥ
smaram ālokayāmāsa śikhā agrāt caraṇa antikam
ālokitaḥ trinetreṇa madanaḥ dyutimān api

original: prādahyata tadā brahman pādādārabhya kakṣavat // VamP_6.96 //
analyzed: prādahyata tadā brahman pādāt ārabhya kakṣa vat
pradahyamānau caraṇau dṛṣṭvā asau kusumāyudhaḥ

original: utsasarja dhanuḥ śreṣṭhaṃ tajjagāmātha pañcadhā // VamP_6.97 //
analyzed: utsasarja dhanuḥ śreṣṭham tat jagāma atha pañcadhā
yadā āsīt muṣṭi bandham tu rukma pṛṣṭham mahā prabham
sa campaka taruḥ jātaḥ su gandha āḍhyaḥ guṇa ākṛtiḥ
nāha sthānam śubha ākāram yadā āsīt vajra bhūṣitam

original: tajjātaṃ kesarāraṇyaṃ bakulaṃ nāmato mune // VamP_6.99 //
analyzed: tat jātam kesarāraṇyam bakulam nāmataḥ mune
yā ca koṭī subhā hi āsīt indranīla vibhūṣitā

original: jātā sā pāṭalā ramyā bhṛṅgarājivibhūṣitā // VamP_6.100 //
analyzed: jātā sā pāṭalā ramyā bhṛṅga rāji vibhūṣitā
nāha upari tathā muṣṭau sthānam śaśimaṇi prabham
pañca gulmā abhavat jātī śaśāṅka kiraṇa ujjvalā

original: ūrddhva muṣṭyā adhaḥ koṭyoḥ sthānaṃ vidrumabhūṣitam /
analyzed: ūrddhva muṣṭyāḥ adhas koṭyoḥ sthānam vidruma bhūṣitam

original: tasmādbhupuṭā mallī saṃjātā vividhā mune // VamP_6.102 //
analyzed: tasmāt bhupuṭā mallī saṃjātā vividhā mune
puṣpa uttamāni ramyāṇi surabhīṇi ca nārada
jāti yuktāni devena svayam ācaritāni ca

original: mumoca mārgaṇān bhūmyāṃ śarīre dahyati smaraḥ /
analyzed: mumoca mārgaṇān bhūmyām śarīre dahyati smaraḥ
phala upagāni vṛkṣāṇi saṃbhūtāni sahasraśas
cūta ādīni sugandhīni svādūni vividhāni ca
hara prasādāt jātāni bhojyāni api sura uttamaiḥ

original: evaṃ dagdhvā smaraṃ rudraḥ saṃyamya svatanuṃ vibhuḥ /
analyzed: evam dagdhvā smaram rudraḥ saṃyamya sva tanum vibhuḥ

original: puṣyārthā śiśirādriṃ sa jagāma tapase 'vyayaḥ // VamP_6.106 //
analyzed: puṣya arthā śiśirādrim sa jagāma tapase vyayaḥ

original: evaṃ purā devavareṇa śaṃbhunā kāmastu dagdhaḥ saśaraḥ sacāpaḥ /
analyzed: evam purā deva vareṇa śaṃbhunā kāmaḥ tu dagdhaḥ sa śaraḥ sa cāpaḥ

original: tatastvanaṅgeti mahādhanurddharo devaistu gītaḥ surapūrvapūjitaḥ // VamP_6.107 //
analyzed: tatas tu anaṅga iti mahā dhanurddharaḥ devaiḥ tu gītaḥ sura pūrva pūjitaḥ
iti śrī vāmanapurāṇe ṣaṣṭhaḥ dhyāyaḥ
pulastyaḥ uvāca
tatas naṅgam vibhuḥ ddaṣṭvā brahman nārāyaṇaḥ muniḥ

original: prahasyaivaṃ vacaḥ prāha kandarva iha āsyatām // VamP_7.1 //
analyzed: prahasya evam vacaḥ prāha kandarvaḥ iha āsyatām
tat akṣubdha tvam īkṣya asya kāmaḥ vismayam āgataḥ
mahā cintām jagāma āśu mahā mune
tatas ca apsarasaḥ dṛṣṭvā svāgatena abhipūjya ca
vasantam āha bhagavān ehi ehi sthīyatām iti
tatas vihasya bhagavān mañjarīm kusuma āvṛtām
ādāya prāc suvarṇa aṅgīm ūrvoḥ bālām vinirmame
ūru udbhavām sa kandarpaḥ dṛṣṭvā sarva aṅga sundarīm

original: amanyata tadānaṅgaḥ kimiyaṃ sā priyā ratiḥ // VamP_7.5 //
analyzed: amanyata tadā anaṅgaḥ kim iyam sā priyā ratiḥ
tat eva vadanam cāru su akṣi bhrū kuṭila alakam
su nāsā vaṃśa adhara uṣṭham ālokana parāyaṇam
tau eva āhārya viralau pīvarau magna cūcukau

original: rājete 'syaḥ kucau pīnau sajjanāvi saṃhatau // VamP_7.7 //
analyzed: rājete syaḥ kucau pīnau sat janāvi saṃhatau
tat eva tanu cāru aṅgyā vali traya vibhūṣitam
udaram rājate ślakṣṇam roma āvali vibhūṣitam
roma āvalī ca jaghanāt yāntī stana taṭam tu iyam
rājate bhṛṅga mālā iva pulināt kamala ākaram
jaghanam tu ati vistīrṇa bhāti asyāḥ raśanā āvṛtam
śrīroda mathane bhūjaṅgena iva mandaram
kadalī stambha sadṛśaiḥ ūrdhva mūlaiḥ atha ūrubhiḥ
vibhāti sā su cāru aṅgī padma kiḍhjalka sannibhā

original: jānunī gūḍhagulphe ca śubhe jaṅghe tvaromaśe /
analyzed: jānunī gūḍha gulphe ca śubhe jaṅghe tu aromaśe
syāḥ tathā pādau alaktaka sama tviṣau
iti saṃcintayan kāmaḥ tām anindita locanām

original: kāmāturo 'sau saṃjātaḥ kimutānyo jano mune // VamP_7.13 //
analyzed: kāma āturaḥ sau saṃjātaḥ kim uta anyaḥ janaḥ mune
mādhavaḥ pi urvaśīm dṛṣṭvā saṃcintayata nārada

original: kiṃsvit kāmanarendrasya rājadhānī svayaṃ sthitā // VamP_7.14 //
analyzed: kim svid kāma narendrasya rājadhānī svayam sthitā
āyātā śaśinaḥ nūnam iyam kāntiḥ niśā kṣaye
ravi raśmi pratāpa ārti bhītā śaraṇam āgatā
ittham saṃcitayan eva avaṣṭabha apsaraḥ gaṇam

original: tasthau muniriva dhyānamāsthitaḥ sa tu mādhavaḥ // VamP_7.16 //
analyzed: tasthau muniḥ iva dhyānam āsthitaḥ sa tu mādhavaḥ

original: tataḥ sa vismitān sarvān kandarpādīn mahāmune /
analyzed: tatas sa vismitān sarvān kandarpa ādīn mahā mune

original: dṛṣṭvā provāca vacanaṃ smitaṃ kṛtvā śubhavrataḥ // VamP_7.17 //
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā provāca vacanam smitam kṛtvā śubha vrataḥ
iyam mama ūru saṃbhṛtā kāmā apsarasaḥ mādhava

original: nīyatāṃ suralokāya dīyatāṃ vāsavāya ca // VamP_7.18 //
analyzed: nīyatām sura lokāya dīyatām vāsavāya ca
iti uktāḥ kampamānāḥ te jagmuḥ gṛhya urvaśīm divam
sahasrākṣāya tām prādāt rūpa yauvana śālinīm
ācakṣuḥ caritam tābhyām dharma jābhyām mahā mune
devārājāya kāma ādyāḥ tatas bhṛt vismayaḥ paraḥ

original: etādśaṃ hi caritaṃ khyātimagryāṃ jagāma ha /
analyzed: hi caritam khyātim agryām jagāma ha

original: pātāleṣu tathā martyai dikṣvaṣṭāsu jagāma ca // VamP_7.21 //
analyzed: pātāleṣu tathā martyai dikṣu aṣṭāsu jagāma ca
ekadā nihate raudraḥ hiraṇyakaśipau mune

original: abhiṣiktastadā rājye prahlādau nāma dānavaḥ // VamP_7.22 //
analyzed: abhiṣiktaḥ tadā rājye prahlādau nāma dānavaḥ
tasmin śāsati daitya indre deva brāhmaṇa pūjake

original: makhāni bhuvi rājāno yajante vidhivattadā // VamP_7.23 //
analyzed: makhāni bhuvi rājānaḥ yajante vidhivat tadā
brāhmaṇāḥ ca tapaḥ dharmam tīrtha yātrāḥ ca kurvate

original: vaiśyāśca paśuvṛttisthāḥ śūdrāḥ śuśrūṣaṇe ratāḥ // VamP_7.24 //
analyzed: vaiśyāḥ ca paśu vṛtti sthāḥ śūdrāḥ śuśrūṣaṇe ratāḥ

original: cāturvarṇyaṃ tataḥ sve sve āśrame dharmakarmaṇi /
analyzed: cāturvarṇyam tatas sve sve āśrame dharma karmaṇi

original: āvarttata tato devā vṛttyā yuktābhavān mune // VamP_7.25 //
analyzed: āvarttata tatas devāḥ vṛttyā yuktāḥ abhavāt mune
tatas tu cyavanaḥ nāma bhārgava indraḥ mahā tapāḥ

original: jagāma narmadāṃ snātuṃ tīrthaṃ caivākulīśvaram // VamP_7.26 //
analyzed: jagāma narmadām snātum tīrtham ca eva ākulīśvaram
tatra dṛṣṭvā mahādevam nadīm snātum avātarat
avatīrṇam prajagrāha nāgaḥ kekara lohitaḥ
gṛhītaḥ tena nāgena sasmāra manasā harim
saṃsmṛte puṇḍarīkākṣe nirviṣaḥ bhūt mahā uragaḥ
nītaḥ tena ati raudreṇa pannagena rasātalam
nirviṣaḥ ca api tatyāja cyavanam bhujaga uttamaḥ
saṃtyakta mātraḥ nāgena cyavanaḥ bhārgava uttamaḥ
cacāra nāga kanyābhiḥ samantataḥ
vicāran praviveśa atha dānavānām mahat puram

original: saṃpūjyamāno daityendraḥ prahlādo 'tha dadarśa tam // VamP_7.31 //
analyzed: saṃpūjyamānaḥ daitya indraḥ dadarśa tam
bhṛguputre mahā tejāḥ pūjām cakre yathārhataḥ
saṃpūjita upaviṣṭaḥ ca pṛṣṭaḥ ca āgamanam prati
sa ca uvāca mahā rāja mahā tīrtham mahā phalam
snātum evā āgataḥ smi adya draṣṭum ca eva ākulīśvaram
nadyām evā avatīrṇaḥ smi gṛhītaḥ ca ahinā balān
samānītaḥ smi pātāle dṛṣṭaḥ ca atra bhavān api
etat śrutvā tu vacanam cyavanasya ditīśvaraḥ

original: provāca dharmasaṃyuktaṃ sa vākyaṃ vākyakovidaḥ // VamP_7.35 //
analyzed: provāca dharma saṃyuktam sa vākyam vākya kovidaḥ
prahlādaḥ uvāca

original: bhagavan kāni tīrthāni pṛthivyāṃ kāni cāmbare /
analyzed: bhagavan kāni tīrthāni pṛthivyām kāni ca ambare

original: rasātale ca kāni syuretad vaktuṃ mamārhasi // VamP_7.36 //
analyzed: rasātale ca kāni syuḥ etat vaktum mama arhasi
cyavanaḥ uvāca
pṛthivyām naimiṣam tīrtham antarikṣe ca puṣkaram
cakratīrtham mahā bāho rasātala tale viduḥ
pulastyaḥ uvāca
śrutvā tat bhārgava vacaḥ daitya rājaḥ mahā mune
nemiṣaiḥ gantu kāmaḥ tu dānavān itat abravīt
prahlādaḥ uvāca

original: uttiṣṭhadhvaṃ gamiṣyāmaḥ snātuṃ tīrthaṃ hi naimiṣam /
analyzed: uttiṣṭhadhvam gamiṣyāmaḥ snātum tīrtham hi naimiṣam
drakṣyāmaḥ puṇḍarīkākṣam pītavāsasam acyutam
pulastyaḥ uvāca
iti uktāḥ dānava indreṇa sarve te daitya dānavāḥ
cakruḥ udyogam atulam nirjagmuḥ ca rasātalāt
te samabhyetya daiteyāḥ dānavāḥ ca mahā balāḥ
nemiṣa araṇyam āgatya snānam cakruḥ mudā anvitāḥ

original: tato ditīśvaraḥ śrīmān mṛgavyāṃ sa cacāra ha /
analyzed: tatas ditīśvaraḥ śrīmān mṛgavyām sa cacāra ha

original: caran sarasvatīṃ puṇyāṃ dadarśa vimalodakām // VamP_7.42 //
analyzed: caran sarasvatīm puṇyām dadarśa vimala udakām
tasya adūre mahā śākham śala vṛkṣam śaraiḥ citam

original: dadarśa bāṇānaparān mukhe lagnān parasparam // VamP_7.43 //
analyzed: dadarśa bāṇān aparān mukhe lagnān parasparam
tatas tān adbhuta ākārān bāṇān nāga upavītakān

original: dṛṣṭvātulaṃ tadā cakre krodhaṃ daityeśvaraḥ kila // VamP_7.44 //
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā atulam tadā cakre krodham daitya īśvaraḥ kila
sa dadarśa tatas dūrāt kṛṣṇa ajina dharau munī
samunnata jaṭā bhārau tapasi āsakta mānasau
tayoḥ ca pārśvayoḥ divye dhanuṣī lakṣaṇa anvite

original: śārṅgamāgavaṃ caiva akṣyyau ca maheṣudhī // VamP_7.46 //
analyzed: śārṅgam āgavam ca eva akṣyau ca mahā iṣudhī
tau dṛṣṭvā amanyata tadā dāmibikau iti dānavaḥ

original: tataḥ provāca vacanaṃ tāvubhau puruṣottamau // VamP_7.47 //
analyzed: tatas provāca vacanam tau ubhau puruṣa uttamau
kim bhavadbhyām samāraḥdham dambham dharma vināśanam

original: kva tapaḥ kva jaṭābhāraḥ kva cemau pravarāyudhau // VamP_7.48 //
analyzed: kva tapaḥ kva jaṭā bhāraḥ kva ca imau pravara āyudhau

original: athovāca naro daityaṃ kā te cintā ditīśvara /
analyzed: athā uvāca naraḥ daityam kā te cintā ditīśvara

original: sāmarthye sati yaḥ kuryāt tatsaṃpadyeta tasya hi // VamP_7.49 //
analyzed: sāmarthye sati yaḥ kuryāt tat saṃpadyeta tasya hi
athā uvāca ditīśaḥ tau kā śaktiḥ yuvayoḥ iha
mayi tiṣṭhati daitya indre dharma setu pravartake
naraḥ tam pratyuvāca atha āvābhyām śaktiḥ ūrjitā

original: na kaścicchaknuyād yoddhuṃ naranārāyaṇau yudhi // VamP_7.51 //
analyzed: na kaścid śaknuyāt yoddhum nara nārāyaṇau yudhi
daitya īśvaraḥ tastaḥ kruddhaḥ pratijñām āruroha ca
yathā kathañcid jeṣyāmi nara nārāyaṇau raṇe

original: ityevamuktvā vacanaṃ mahātmā ditīśvaraḥ sthāpya balaṃ vanānte /
analyzed: iti evam uktvā vacanam mahātmā ditīśvaraḥ sthāpya balam vanānte

original: vitatya cāpaṃ guṇamāvikṛṣya taladhvaniṃ ghorataraṃ cakāra // VamP_7.53 //
analyzed: vitatya cāpam guṇam āvikṛṣya tala dhvanim ghorataram cakāra

original: tato narastvājagavaṃ hi cāpamānamya bāṇān subahuñśitāgrān /
analyzed: tatas naraḥ tu ājagavam hi cāpam ānamya bāṇān su bahun śita agrān
mumoca tān apratimaiḥ pṛṣatkaiḥ ciccheda daityaḥ tapanīya puṅkhaiḥ

original: chinnān samīkṣyātha naraḥ pṛṣatkān daityeśvareṇāpratimeva saṃkhye /
analyzed: chinnān samīkṣya atha naraḥ pṛṣatkān daitya īśvareṇa apratimā iva saṃkhye

original: kruddhaḥ samānamya mahādhanustato mumoca cānyān vividhān pṛṣatkān // VamP_7.55 //
analyzed: kruddhaḥ samānamya mahā dhanuḥ tatas mumoca ca anyān vividhān pṛṣatkān

original: ekaṃ naro dvau ditijeśvaraśca trīn dharmasūnuścaturo ditīśaḥ /
analyzed: ekam naraḥ dvau ditija īśvaraḥ ca trīn dharmasūnuḥ caturaḥ ditīśaḥ

original: narastu bāṇān pramumoca pañca ṣaḍ dratyanātho niśitān pṛṣatkān // VamP_7.56 //
analyzed: naraḥ tu bāṇān pramumoca pañca ṣaṭ dratyanāthaḥ niśitān pṛṣatkān

original: saptarṣimukhyo dvicatuśca daityo narastu ṣaṭ trīṇi ca daityamukhye /
analyzed: saptarṣi mukhyaḥ dvi catuḥ ca daityaḥ naraḥ tu ṣaṣ trīṇi ca daitya mukhye

original: ṣaṭtrīṇi caikaṃ ca ditīśvareṇa muktāni bāṇāni narāya vipra // VamP_7.57 //
analyzed: ṣaṣ trīṇi ca ekam ca diti īśvareṇa muktāni bāṇāni narāya vipra

original: ekaṃ ca ṣaṭ pañca nareṇa muktāstvaṣṭau śarāḥ sapta ca dānavena /
analyzed: ekam ca ṣaṭ pañca nareṇa muktāḥ tu aṣṭau śarāḥ sapta ca dānavena

original: ṣaṭ sapta cāṣṭau nava ṣaṇnareṇa dvisaptatiṃ daityapatiḥ sasarjja // VamP_7.58 //
analyzed: ṣaḍ sapta ca aṣṭau nava ṣaṣ nareṇa dvisaptatim daitya patiḥ sasarjja

original: śataṃ narastrīṇi śatāni daityaḥ ṣaḍ dharmaputro daśa daityarājaḥ /
analyzed: śatam naraḥ trīṇi śatāni daityaḥ ṣaḍ dharmaputraḥ daśa daitya rājaḥ

original: tato 'pyasaṃkhyeyatarān hi bāṇān mumocatustau subhṛśaṃ hi kopāt // VamP_7.59 //
analyzed: tatas pi asaṃkhyeyatarān hi bāṇān mumocatuḥ tau su bhṛśam hi kopāt
tatas naraḥ bāṇa gaṇaiḥ asakhyaiḥ avāstarat bhūmim atho diśaḥ kham

original: sa cāpi daityapravaraḥ pṛṣatkaiściccheda vegāt tapanīyapuṅkhaiḥ // VamP_7.60 //
analyzed: sa ca api daitya pravaraḥ pṛṣatkaiḥ ciccheda vegāt tapanīya puṅkhaiḥ
tatas patattribhiḥ vīrau su bhṛśam nara dānavau
yuddhe vara astraiḥ yudhyetām ghora rūpaiḥ parasparam

original: tatastu daityena varāstrapāṇinā cāpe niyuktaṃ tu pitāmahāstram /
analyzed: tatas tu daityena vara astra pāṇinā cāpe niyuktam tu pitāmaha astram

original: maheśvarāstraṃ puruṣottameva samaṃ samāhatya nipetatustau // VamP_7.62 //
analyzed: maheśvara astram puruṣottamā iva samam samāhatya nipetatuḥ tau
brahmastre tu praśamite prahlādaḥ krodha mūrchitaḥ

original: gadāṃ pragṛhya tarasā pracaskanda rathottamāt // VamP_7.63 //
analyzed: gadām pragṛhya tarasā pracaskanda ratha uttamāt
gadā pāṇim samāyāntam daityam nārāyaṇaḥ tadā

original: dṛṣṭvātha pṛṣṭhataścakre naraṃ yoddhūmanāḥ svayam // VamP_7.64 //
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā atha pṛṣṭhatas cakre naram yoddhū manāḥ svayam

original: tato dītīśaḥ sagadaḥ samādravat saśārṅgapāṇiṃ tapasāṃ nidhānam /
analyzed: tatas dītīśaḥ sa gadaḥ samādravat sa śārṅgapāṇim tapasām nidhānam

original: khyātaṃ purāṇarṣimudāravikramaṃ nārāyaṇaṃ nārada lokapālam // VamP_7.65 //
analyzed: khyātam purāṇa ṛṣim udāra vikramam nārāyaṇam nārada lokapālam
iti śrī vāmanapurāṇe saptamaḥ dhyāyaḥ
pulastyaḥ uvāca
śārṅgapāṇinam āyāntam dṛṣṭvā agre dānava īśvaraḥ

original: paribhrāmya gadāṃ vegāt mūrdhni sādhyamatāḍayat // VamP_8.1 //
analyzed: paribhrāmya gadām vegāt mūrdhni sādhyam atāḍayat
tāḍitasya atha gadayā dharmaputrasya nārada
netrābhyām apatat vāri vahni varṣa nibham bhuvi
mūrdhni nārāyaṇasya api sā gadā dānava arpitā
jagāma śatadhā brahman śaila śṛṅge yathā aśaniḥ

original: tato nivṛtya daityendraḥ samāsthāya rathaṃ drutam /
analyzed: tatas nivṛtya daitya indraḥ samāsthāya ratham drutam

original: ādāya kārmukaṃ vīrastūṇad bāṇaṃ samādade // VamP_8.4 //
analyzed: ādāya kārmukam vīraḥ tūṇat bāṇam samādade
ānamya cāpam vegena gārddhū patrān silīmukhān
mumoca sādhyāya tadā krodha andhaka ārita ānanaḥ
tān āpatataḥ eva āśu bāṇān candra arddha sannibhān
ciccheda bāṇaiḥ aparaiḥ nirbibheda ca dānavam

original: tato nārāyaṇaṃ daityo daityaṃ nārāyaṇaḥ śaraiḥ /
analyzed: tatas nārāyaṇam daityaḥ daityam nārāyaṇaḥ śaraiḥ
āvidhyetām tadā anyonyam marma bhidbhiḥ ajihyagaiḥ
tatas mbare saṃnipātaḥ devānām abhavat mune

original: didṛkṣūṇāṃ tadā yuddhaṃ laghu citraṃ ca suṣṭhu ca // VamP_8.8 //
analyzed: didṛkṣūṇām tadā yuddham laghu citram ca suṣṭhu ca
tatas surāṇām dundubhyaḥ tu avādyanta mahā svanāḥ
puṣpa varṣam anaupamyam mumucuḥ sādhya daitya yauḥ
tatas paśyatsu deveṣu gagana stheṣu tau ubhau
ayudhyetām mahā iṣvāsau prekṣaka prīti varddhanam
babandhatuḥ tat ākāśam tau ubhau śara vṛṣṭibhiḥ
diśaḥ ca vidiśaḥ ca eva chādayetām śara utkaraiḥ
tatas nārāyaṇaḥ cāpam samākṛṣya mahā mune
bibheda mārgaṇaiḥ tīkṣṇaiḥ prahlādam sarva marmasu
tathā daitya īśvaraḥ kruddhaḥ cāpam ānamya vegavān

original: bibheda hṛdaye bāhvorvadane ca narottamam // VamP_8.13 //
analyzed: bibheda hṛdaye bāhvoḥ vadane ca narottamam
tatas syataḥ daitya pateḥ kārmukam muṣṭi bandhanāt
ciccheda ekena bāṇena candra ardha ākāra varcasā
apāsyata dhanuḥ chinnam cāpam ādāya ca aparam

original: adhijyaṃ lāghavāt kṛtvā vavarṣa niśitāñśarān // VamP_8.15 //
analyzed: adhijyam lāghavāt kṛtvā vavarṣa niśitān śarān
tān api asya śarān sādhyaḥ chittvā bāṇaiḥ avārayat

original: kārmukaṃ ca kṣurapreṇa ciccheda puruṣottamaḥ // VamP_8.16 //
analyzed: kārmukam ca kṣurapreṇa ciccheda puruṣottamaḥ
chinnam chinnam dhanuḥ daityaḥ tu anyat anyat samādade

original: samādattaṃ tadā sādhyo mune ciccheda lāghavāt // VamP_8.17 //
analyzed: samādattam tadā sādhyaḥ mune ciccheda lāghavāt
saṃchinneṣu atha cāpeṣu jagrāha ditija īśvaraḥ

original: parighaṃ dāruṇāṃ dīrghaṃ sarvalohamayaṃ dṛḍham // VamP_8.18 //
analyzed: parigham dāruṇām dīrgham sarva loha mayam dṛḍham
parigṛhya atha parigham bhrāmayāmāsa dānavaḥ

original: bhrāmyamāṇaṃ sa ciccheda nārācena mahāmuniḥ // VamP_8.19 //
analyzed: bhrāmyamāṇam sa ciccheda nārācena mahā muniḥ

original: chinne tu parighe śrīmān prahlādo dānaveśvaraḥ /
analyzed: chinne tu parighe śrīmān prahlādaḥ dānava īśvaraḥ

original: mudgaraṃ bhrāmya vegena pracikṣepa narāgraje // VamP_8.20 //
analyzed: mudgaram bhrāmya vegena pracikṣepa narāgraje
tam āpatantam balavān mārgaṇaiḥ daśabhiḥ mune

original: ciccheda daśadhā sādhyaḥ sa chinno nyapatad bhuvi // VamP_8.21 //
analyzed: ciccheda daśadhā sādhyaḥ sa chinnaḥ nyapatat bhuvi
mudgare vitathe jāte prāsam āvidhya vegavān

original: pracikṣepa narāgryāya taṃ ca ciccheda dharmajaḥ // VamP_8.22 //
analyzed: pracikṣepa nara agryāya tam ca ciccheda dharmajaḥ

original: prāse chinne tato daityaḥ śaktimādāya cikṣipe /
analyzed: prāse chinne tatas daityaḥ śaktim ādāya cikṣipe

original: tāṃ ca ciccheda balavān kṣurapreṇa mahātapāḥ // VamP_8.23 //
analyzed: tām ca ciccheda balavān kṣurapreṇa mahā tapāḥ
chinneṣu teṣu śastreṣu dānavaḥ nyan mahat dhanuḥ
samādāya tatas bāṇaiḥ avatastāra nārada
tatas nārāyaṇaḥ devaḥ daitya nātham jagadguruḥ
nārācena jaghāna atha hṛdaye sura tāpasaḥ
brahman devena adbhuta karmaṇā
nipapāta rathopasthe tam apovāha sārathiḥ
sa saṃjñām su cireṇa eva pratilabhya diti īśvaraḥ
su dṛḍham cāpam ādāya bhūyas yoddham upāgataḥ
tam āgatam saṃnirīkṣya pratyuvāca narāgrajaḥ
gaccha daitya indra yotsyāmaḥ prātar tu āhnikam ācara
evam uktaḥ ditīśaḥ tu sādhyena adbhuta karmaṇā

original: jagāma naimiṣāraṇyaṃ kriyāṃ cakre tadā'hnikīm // VamP_8.29 //
analyzed: jagāma naimiṣa araṇyam kriyām cakre tadā āhnikīm

original: evaṃ yudhyati deve ca prahlādo hyasuro mune /
analyzed: evam yudhyati deve ca prahlādaḥ hi asuraḥ mune

original: rātrau cintayate yuddhe kathaṃ jeṣyāmi dāmbhikam // VamP_8.30 //
analyzed: rātrau cintayate yuddhe katham jeṣyāmi dāmbhikam
evam nārāyaṇena asau saha ayudhyata nārada

original: divyaṃ varṣasasraṃ tu daityo devaṃ na cājayat // VamP_8.31 //
analyzed: divyam varṣa sasram tu daityaḥ devam na ca ajayat
tatas varṣa sahasra ante hi ajite puruṣottame
pīta vāsasam abhyetya dānavaḥ vākyam abravīt

original: vijetuṃ nādya śaknomi etanme kāraṇaṃ vada // VamP_8.33 //
analyzed: vijetum na adya śaknomi etat me kāraṇam vada
pīta vāsāḥ uvāca
durjayaḥ sau mahā bāhuḥ tvayā prahlāda dharmajaḥ

original: sādhyo vipravaro dhīmān mṛdhe devāsurairapi // VamP_8.34 //
analyzed: sādhyaḥ vipra varaḥ dhīmān mṛdhe deva asuraiḥ api
prahlādaḥ uvāca

original: yadyasau durjayo deva mayā sādhyo raṇājire /

iti evam uktvā vacanam deva agre dānava īśvaraḥ

original: śiraḥsnātastadā tasthau gṛṇan brahma sanātanam // VamP_8.37 //
analyzed: śiraḥ snātaḥ tadā tasthau gṛṇan brahma sanātanam

original: gaccha jeṣyasi bhaktyā taṃ na yuddhena kathañcana // VamP_8.38 //
analyzed: gaccha jeṣyasi bhaktyā tam na yuddhena kathañcana
prahlādaḥ uvāca
mayā jitam devadeva trailokyam api suvrata

original: jito 'yaṃ tvatprasādena śakraḥ kimuta dharmajaḥ // VamP_8.39 //
analyzed: jitaḥ yam tvad prasādena śakraḥ kim uta dharmajaḥ
asau yadi ajayaḥ deva trailokyena api suvrataḥ

original: na sthātuṃ tvatprasādeva śakyaṃ kimu karomyaja // VamP_8.40 //
analyzed: na sthātum tvad prasāda iva śakyam kimu karomi aja
pīta vāsāḥ uvāca
saḥ u ham dānava śārdūla lokānām hita kāmyayā
dharmam pravarttāpayitum tapaḥ caryām samāsthitaḥ

original: taṃ parājeṣyase bhaktyā tasmācchuśrūṣa dharmajam // VamP_8.42 //
analyzed: tam parājeṣyase bhaktyā tasmāt śuśrūṣa dharmajam
pulastyaḥ uvāca
iti uktaḥ pīta vāsena dānava indraḥ mahātmanā
abravīt vacanam hṛṣṭaḥ samāhūya andhakam
daityāḥ ca dānavāḥ ca eva paripālyāḥ tvayā andhaka
mayā utsṛṣṭam idam rājyam pratīcchasva mahā bhuja
iti evam uktaḥ jagrāha rājyam hairaṇyalocaniḥ
prahlādaḥ pi tadā agacchat puṇyam badarikāśramam

original: dṛṣṭvā nārāyaṇaṃ devaṃ naraṃ ca ditijeśvaraḥ /
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā nārāyaṇam devam naram ca ditija īśvaraḥ

original: kṛtāñjalipuṭo bhūtvā vavande caraṇau tayoḥ // VamP_8.46 //
analyzed: kṛta añjali puṭaḥ bhūtvā vavande caraṇau tayoḥ
tam uvāca mahā tejāḥ vākyam nārāyaṇaḥ vyayaḥ

prahlādaḥ uvāca

original: kastvāṃ jetuṃ prabho śaktaḥ kastvattaḥ puruṣo 'dhikaḥ /
analyzed: kaḥ tvām jetum prabho śaktaḥ kaḥ tvattaḥ puruṣaḥ dhikaḥ

original: tvaṃ hi nārāyaṇo 'nantaḥ pītavāsā janārdanaḥ // VamP_8.48 //
analyzed: tvam hi nārāyaṇaḥ nantaḥ pīta vāsāḥ janārdanaḥ
tvam devaḥ puṇḍarīkākṣaḥ tvam viṣṇuḥ śārṅga cāpa dhṛk
tvam avyayaḥ maheśānaḥ śāśvataḥ puruṣottamaḥ
tvām yoginaḥ cintayanti ca arcayanti manīṣiṇaḥ

original: japanti snātakāstvāṃ ca yajanti tvāṃ ca yājñikāḥ // VamP_8.50 //
analyzed: japanti snātakāḥ tvām ca yajanti tvām ca yājñikāḥ

mahā mīnaḥ haya śirāḥ tvam eva vara kacchapaḥ
hiraṇyākṣa ripuḥ śrīmān bhagavān atha sūkaraḥ

original: brahma trinetro 'mararāḍ hutāśaḥ pretādhipo nīrapatiḥ samīraḥ /
analyzed: brahma trinetraḥ mararāj hutāśaḥ pretādhipaḥ nīrapatiḥ samīraḥ

original: sūryo mṛgāṅko 'calajaṅgamādyo bhavān vibho nātha khagendraketo // VamP_8.53 //
analyzed: sūryaḥ mṛgāṅko cala jaṅgama ādyaḥ bhavān vibho nātha khaga indra keto

original: tvaṃ pṛthvī jyotirākāśaṃ jalaṃ bhūtvā sahasraśaḥ /

original: tvayā vyāptaṃ jagatsarvaṃ kastvāṃ jeṣyati mādhava // VamP_8.54 //
analyzed: tvayā vyāptam jagat sarvam kaḥ tvām jeṣyati mādhava

original: nānyathā tvaṃ praśakto 'si jetuṃ sarvagatāvyaya // VamP_8.55 //
analyzed: na anyathā tvam praśaktaḥ si jetum sarva gata avyaya
bhagavān uvāca

original: bhaktyā tvanānyayā cāhaṃ tvayā daitya parājitaḥ // VamP_8.56 //
analyzed: bhaktyā tu anānyayā ca aham tvayā daitya parājitaḥ
parājitaḥ ca puruṣaḥ daitya daṇḍam prayacchati

original: daṇḍārthaṃ te pradāsyāmi varaṃ vṛṇu yamicchasi // VamP_8.57 //
analyzed: daṇḍa artham te pradāsyāmi varam vṛṇu yam icchasi
prahlādaḥ uvāca

original: nārāyaṇa varaṃ yāce yaṃ tvaṃ me dātumarhasi /
analyzed: nārāyaṇa varam yāce yam tvam me dātum arhasi

original: tanme pāpaṃ layaṃ yātu śārīraṃ mānasaṃ tathā // VamP_8.58 //
analyzed: tat me pāpam layam yātu śārīram mānasam tathā

original: vācikaṃ ca jagannātha yattvayā saha yudhyataḥ /
analyzed: vācikam ca jagannātha yat tvayā saha yudhyataḥ

nārāyaṇaḥ uvāca

original: evaṃ bhavatu daidyendra pāpaṃ te yātu saṃkṣayam /

original: dvitīyaṃ prārthaya varaṃ taṃ dadāmi tavāsura // VamP_8.60 //
analyzed: dvitīyam prārthaya varam tam dadāmi tava asura
prahlādaḥ uvāca

original: yā yā jāyeya me buddhiḥ sā sā viṣṇo tvadāśritā /
analyzed: yā yā jāyeya me buddhiḥ sā sā viṣṇo tvad āśritā

original: devārcane ca niratā tvaccittā tvatparāyaṇā // VamP_8.61 //
analyzed: deva arcane ca niratā tvad cittā tvad parāyaṇā

tam vṛṇīṣva mahā bāho pradāsyāmi a vicārayan

original: tvatpādapaṅkajābhyāṃ hi khyātirastu sadā mama // VamP_8.63 //
analyzed: tvad pāda paṅkajābhyām hi khyātiḥ astu sadā mama
evam astu aparam ca astu nityam eva akṣayaḥ vyayaḥ
ajaraḥ ca amaraḥ ca api mad prasādāt bhaviṣyasi

original: na karmabandho bhavato maccittsya bhaviṣyati // VamP_8.65 //
analyzed: na karma bandhaḥ bhavataḥ mad cittsya bhaviṣyati

iti uktaḥ lokanāthena prahlādaḥ devam abravīt

original: kathaṃ rājyaṃ samādāsye parityaktaṃ jagadguro // VamP_8.67 //
analyzed: katham rājyam samādāsye parityaktam jagadguro
tam uvāca jagatsvāmī gaccha tvam nijam āśrayam

original: hitopadeṣṭā daityānāṃ dānavānāṃ tathā bhava // VamP_8.68 //
analyzed: hita upadeṣṭā daityānām dānavānām tathā bhava

original: praṇipatya vibhuṃ tuṣṭo jagāma nagaraṃ nijam // VamP_8.69 //
analyzed: praṇipatya vibhum tuṣṭaḥ jagāma nagaram nijam

original: nimantritaśca rājyāya na pratyaicchatsa nārada // VamP_8.70 //
analyzed: nimantritaḥ ca rājyāya na pratyaicchat sa nārada

original: rājyaṃ parityajya mahāsurendro niyojayan satpathi dānavendrān /
analyzed: rājyam parityajya mahā asura indraḥ niyojayan sat pathi dānava indrān

original: dhyāyan smaran keśavamaprameyaṃ tasthau tadā yogaviśuddhadehaḥ // VamP_8.71 //
analyzed: dhyāyan smaran keśavam aprameyam tasthau tadā yoga viśuddha dehaḥ

original: parājitaścāpi vimucya rājyaṃ tasthau mano dhātari sanniveśya // VamP_8.72 //
analyzed: parājitaḥ ca api vimucya rājyam tasthau manaḥ dhātari sanniveśya

netra hīnaḥ katham rājye prahlādena andhakaḥ mune

original: lalo 'bhiṣikto daityena prahlādena nije pade // VamP_9.2 //
analyzed: lalaḥ bhiṣiktaḥ daityena prahlādena nije pade
nāradaḥ uvāca

original: devādibhiḥ saha kathaṃ samāste tad vadasva me // VamP_9.3 //
analyzed: deva ādibhiḥ saha katham samāste tat vadasva me
pulastyaḥ uvāca

tapasā ārādhya deveśam śūlapāṇim trilocanam
ajeya tvam avadhya tvam sura siddha ṛṣi pannagaiḥ

original: adāhyatvaṃ hutāśena akledyatvaṃ jalena ca // VamP_9.5 //
analyzed: a dāhya tvam hutāśena a kledya tvam jalena ca
evam sa vara labdhaḥ tu daityaḥ rājyam apālayat

original: śukraṃ purohitaṃ kṛtvā samadhyāste tato 'ndhakaḥ // VamP_9.6 //
analyzed: śukram purohitam kṛtvā samadhyāste tatas ndhakaḥ

original: ākramya vasudhāṃ sarvāṃ manujendrān parājayat // VamP_9.7 //
analyzed: ākramya vasudhām sarvām manuja indrān parājayat
