taiḥ samam meru śikharam jagāma adbhuta darśanam
śakraḥ pi sura sainyāni samudyojya mahāgajam
samāruhya amarāvatyām guptim kṛtvā viniryayau
śakrasya anu tathā eva anye lokapālāḥ mahā ojasaḥ

original: āruhya vāhanaṃ svaṃ svaṃ sāyudhā niryayurbahiḥ // VamP_9.10 //
analyzed: āruhya vāhanam svam svam sa āyudhāḥ niryayuḥ bahis
deva senā api ca samam śakroṇā adbhuta karmaṇā
nirjagāma ativegena gaja vāji rātha ādibhiḥ
agratas dvādaśa ādityāḥ pṛṣṭhatas ca tri locanāḥ
madhye ṣṭau vasavaḥ viśve sādhya aśvi marutām gaṇāḥ
yabha vidyādhara ādyāḥ ca svam svam vāhanam āsthitāḥ
nāradaḥ uvāca
rudra ādīnām vadasva iha vāhanāni ca sarvaśas

original: ekaikasyāpi dharmatra paraṃ kautūhalaṃ mama // VamP_9.13 //
analyzed: ekaikasya api param kautūhalam mama
pulastyaḥ uvāca
śṛṇuṣva kathayiṣyāmi sarveṣām api nārada
vāhanāni samāsena ekaikasya anupūrvaśas
rudra hastala utpannaḥ mahā vīryaḥ mahā javaḥ
śveta varṇaḥ gaja patiḥ devarājasya vāhanam
rudra ūru saṃbhavaḥ bhīmaḥ kṛṣṇa varṇaḥ manojavaḥ

original: pauṇḍrako nāma mahiṣo dharmarājasya nārada // VamP_9.16 //
analyzed: pauṇḍrakaḥ nāma mahiṣaḥ dharmarājasya nārada

original: śiśumāro divyagatiḥ vāhanaṃ varuṇasya ca // VamP_9.17 //
analyzed: śiśumāraḥ divya gatiḥ vāhanam varuṇasya ca
raudraḥ śakaṭa cakra akṣaḥ śaila ākāraḥ nara uttamaḥ
ambikā pāda saṃbhūtaḥ vāhanam dhanadasya tu
ekādaśānām rudrāṇām vāhanāni mahā mune
gandharvāḥ ca mahā vīryāḥ bhujaga undrāḥ ca dāruṇāḥ
śvetāni saurabheyāṇi vṛṣāṇi ugra javāni ca
ratham candramasaḥ ca ārddhū sahasram haṃsa vāhanam
harayaḥ ratha vāhāḥ ca ādityāḥ muni sattama
kuñjara sthāḥ ca vasavaḥ yakṣāḥ ca nara vāhanāḥ
kinnarāḥ bhujaga ārūḍhāḥ haya ārūḍhau tathā aśvinau
sāraṅga dhiṣṭhitāḥ brahman marutaḥ ghora darśanāḥ
su kārūḍhāḥ ca kavayaḥ gandharvāḥ ca padātinaḥ
āruhya vāhanāni evam svāni svāni amara uttamāḥ
saṃnahya niryayuḥ hṛṣṭāḥ yuddhāya su mahā ojasaḥ
nāradaḥ uvāca
gaditāni sura ādīnām vāhanāni tvayā mune
daityānām vāhanāni evam yathāvat vaktum arhasi
pulastyaḥ uvāca
śṛṇuṣva dānava ādīnām vāhanāni dvijottama
kathayiṣyāmi tattvena yathāvat śrotum arhasi
andhakasya rathaḥ divyaḥ yuktaḥ parama vājibhiḥ
kṛṣṇa varṇaiḥ sahasrāraḥ tranalva parimāṇavān
prahlādasya rathaḥ divyaḥ candra varṇaiḥ haya uttamaiḥ
uhyamānaḥ tathā aṣṭābhiḥ śveta rukma mayaḥ subhaḥ
virojanasya ca gajaḥ kujambhasya turaṅgamaḥ

original: jambhasya tu ratho dviyo hayaiḥ kāñjanasannibhaiḥ // VamP_9.28 //
analyzed: jambhasya tu rathaḥ hayaiḥ kāñjana sannibhaiḥ
śaṅkukarṇasya turagaḥ hayagrīvasya kuñjaraḥ
rathaḥ mayasya vikhyātaḥ dundubheḥ ca mahā uragaḥ
śambarasya vimānaḥ bhū dayaḥ śaṅkoḥ mṛgādhipaḥ
vabala vṛtrau ca balinau gadā musala dhāriṇau
padbhyām daivata sainyāni abhidravitum udyatau
tatas raṇaḥ bhūt tumulaḥ saṃkulaḥ ti bhayaṅkaraḥ

original: rajasā saṃvṛto lokī piṅgavarṇena nārada // VamP_9.31 //
analyzed: rajasā saṃvṛtaḥ lokī piṅga varṇena nārada

original: nājñāsīcca pitā putraṃ na putraḥ pitaraṃ tathā /
analyzed: na ajñāsīt ca pitā putram na putraḥ pitaram tathā

original: svānevānaye nijaghnurvai parānanye ca suvrata // VamP_9.32 //
analyzed: svān eva anaye nijaghnuḥ vai parān anye ca suvrata
abhidrutaḥ mahā vegaḥ ratha upari rathaḥ tadā

original: gajo mattagajendraṃ ca sādī sādinamabhyagāt // VamP_9.33 //
analyzed: gajaḥ matta gaja indram ca sādī sādinam abhyagāt
padātiḥ api saṃkruddhaḥ padātinam atha ulbaṇam
parasparam tu pratyaghnan anyonya jaya kāṅkṣiṇaḥ

original: tatastu saṃkule tasmin yuddhe daivāsure mune /
analyzed: tatas tu saṃkule tasmin yuddhe daiva āsure mune

original: prāvartata nadī ghorā śamayantī raṇādrajaḥ // VamP_9.35 //
analyzed: prāvartata nadī ghorā śamayantī raṇāt rajaḥ
śoṇita udā ratha āvarttā yodha saṃghaṭṭa vāhinī
tīkṣṇa agra prāsa makarā mahā asi grāha vāhinī
antra śaivala saṃkīrṇā
vana vāyasa kādambā gomāyu śvāpada ākulā
piśāca muni saṃkīrṇā dustarā prākṛtaiḥ janaiḥ
ratha plavaiḥ saṃtarantaḥ śūrāḥ tām prajagāhire
ā gulphaāt avamajjantaḥ sūdayantaḥ parasparam
samuttarantaḥ vegena yodhāḥ jaya dhana īpsavaḥ
tatas tu raudraḥ sura daitya sādane mahā āhave bhīru bhayaṅkare

original: rakṣāṃsi yakṣāśca susaprahṛṣṭāḥ piśācayūthāstvabhiremire ca // VamP_9.41 //
analyzed: rakṣāṃsi yakṣāḥ ca su sa prahṛṣṭāḥ piśāca yūthāḥ tu abhiremire ca
pibanti asṛj gāḍhataram bhaṭānām āliṅgya māṃsāni ca bhakṣayanti

original: vasāṃ vilumpanti ca vanisphuranti garjantyathānyonyamatho vayāṃsi // VamP_9.42 //
analyzed: vasām vilumpanti ca vani sphuranti garjanti atha anyonyam atho vayāṃsi

original: muñcanti phetkāraravāñśivāśca krandanti yodhā bhuvi vedanārttāḥ /
analyzed: muñcanti phetkāra ravān śivāḥ ca krandanti yodhāḥ bhuvi vedanā ārttāḥ

original: śastraprataptā nipatanti cānye yuddhaṃ śmaśānapratimaṃ babhūva // VamP_9.43 //
analyzed: śastra prataptāḥ nipatanti ca anye yuddham śmaśāna pratimam babhūva
tasmin śiva aghora rave pravṛtte mura asurāṇām su bhayaṅkare ha

original: yuddhaṃ babhau prāṇapaṇepaviddhaṃ dvandve 'tiśastrākṣagato durodaraḥ // VamP_9.44 //
analyzed: yuddham babhau prāṇa paṇa ipaviddham dvandve ti śastra akṣa gataḥ durodaraḥ
hiraṇya cakṣuḥ tanayaḥ raṇe ndhakaḥ rathe sthitaḥ vāji sahasra yojite
sameyivān devapatim śatakratum

original: samāpatantaṃ mahiṣādhirūḍhaṃ yamaṃ pratīcchad balavān ditīśaḥ /
analyzed: samāpatantam mahiṣa adhirūḍham yamam pratīcchat balavān ditīśaḥ

original: prahlādanāmā turagāṣṭayuktaṃ rathaṃ samāsthāya samudyātāstraḥ // VamP_9.46 //
analyzed: prahlāda nāmā turaga aṣṭa yuktam ratham samāsthāya samudyāta astraḥ
virocanaḥ ca api jaleśvaram tu agāt jambhaḥ tu atha agāt dhanadam bala āḍhyam

original: vāyuṃ samabhyetya ca śambaro 'tha mayo hutāśaṃ yuyudhe munīndra // VamP_9.47 //
analyzed: vāyum samabhyetya ca mayaḥ hutāśam yuyudhe muni indra
anye hayagrīva mukhāḥ mahā balāḥ diteḥ tanūjāḥ danu puṅgavāḥ ca

original: surān hutāśārkavasūrakeśvarān dvandvaṃ samāsādya mahābalānvitāḥ // VamP_9.48 //
analyzed: surān hutāśa arka vasūraka īśvarān dvandvam samāsādya mahā bala anvitāḥ
garjanti atha anyonyam upetya yuddhe cāpāni karṣanti ati vegitāḥ ca

original: muñcanti nārācagaṇān sahasraśa agaccha he tiṣṭhasi kiṃ bruvantaḥ // VamP_9.49 //
analyzed: muñcanti nārāca gaṇān sahasraśas agaccha he tiṣṭhasi kim bruvantaḥ
śaraiḥ tu tīkṣṇaiḥ atitāpayantaḥ śastraiḥ amoghaiḥ abhitāḍayantaḥ

original: mandākinīveganibhāṃ vahantīm pravartayanto bhayadāṃ nadīṃ ca // VamP_9.50 //
analyzed: mandākinī vega nibhām vahantīm pravartayantaḥ bhaya dām nadīm ca
trailokyam ākāṅkṣibhiḥ ugra vegaiḥ sura asuraiḥ nārada saṃprayuddhe
piśāca rakṣaḥ gaṇa puṣṭi vardhanīm uttartum icchadbhiḥ asṛgnadī babhai

original: vādyanti tūryāṇi surāsurāṇām paśyanti khasthā munisiddhasaṃghāḥ /
analyzed: vādyanti tūryāṇi sura asurāṇām paśyanti kha sthāḥ muni siddha saṃghāḥ

original: nayanti tānpsarasāṃ gaṇāgryā hatā raṇe ye 'bhimukhāstu śūrāḥ // VamP_9.52 //
analyzed: nayanti tān psarasām gaṇa agryāḥ hatāḥ raṇe ye bhimukhāḥ tu śūrāḥ
iti śrī vāmanapurāṇe navamaḥ dhyāyaḥ
pulastyaḥ uvāca
tatas pravṛtte saṃgrāme bhīrūṇām bhaya vardhane
sahasrakṣaḥ mahā cāpam ādāya vyasṛjat śarān
andhakaḥ pi mahā vegam dhanuḥ ākṛṣya bhāsvaram
purandarāya cikṣepa śarān barhiṇa vāsasaḥ
tau anyonyam su tīkṣṇa agraiḥ śaraiḥ saṃnata parvabhiḥ
rukma puṅkhaiḥ mahā vegaiḥ ājaghnatuḥ ubhau api

original: cacaḥ kruddhūḥ śatamakhaḥ kuliśaṃ bhrāmya pāṇinā /
analyzed: śatamakhaḥ kuliśam bhrāmya pāṇinā

original: cikṣepa daityarājāya taṃ dadarśa tathāndhakaḥ // VamP_10.4 //
analyzed: cikṣepa daitya rājāya tam dadarśa tathā andhakaḥ
ājaghāna ca bāṇa oghaiḥ astraiḥ sa nārada

original: tān bhasmasāttadā cakre nagāniva hutāśanaḥ // VamP_10.5 //
analyzed: tān bhasmasāt tadā cakre nagān iva hutāśanaḥ
tiveginam vajram dṛṣṭvā balavatām varaḥ

original: samāplutya rathāttasthau bhuvi bāhu sahāyavān // VamP_10.6 //
analyzed: samāplutya rathāt tasthau bhuvi bāhu sahāyavān
ratham sārathinā sārdham sa aśva dhvaja sa kūbam
bhasma kṛtvā atha kuliśam andhakam samupāyayau
tam āpatantam vegena muṣṭinā āhatya bhū tale

original: pātayāmāsa balavān jagarja ca tadāndhakaḥ // VamP_10.8 //
analyzed: pātayāmāsa balavān jagarja ca tadā andhakaḥ
tam garjamānam vīkṣya atha vāsavaḥ sāyakaiḥ dṛḍham

original: vavarṣa tān vārayan sa samabhyāyācchatakratum // VamP_10.9 //
analyzed: vavarṣa tān vārayan sa samabhyāyāt śatakratum
ājaghāna talena ibham kumbha madhye padā kare

original: jānunā ca samāhatya viṣāṇaṃ prababhañja ca / /
analyzed: jānunā ca samāhatya viṣāṇam prababhañja ca
vāma muṣṭyā tathā pārśvam samāhatya andhakaḥ tvaran
gaja indram pātayāmāsa prahāraiḥ jarjarīkṛtam
gaja indrāt patamānāt ca avaplutya śatakratuḥ
pāṇinā vajram ādāya praviveśa amarāvatīm
paraṅmukhe sahasrākṣe tadā daivata balam mahat
pātayāmā pāda muṣṭi tala ādibhiḥ
tatas vaivasvataḥ daṇḍam paribhrāmya dvijottama
samabhyadhāvat prahlādam hantu kāmaḥ sura uttamaḥ
tam āpatantam bāṇa eghaiḥ vavarṣam ravinandanam
hiraṇyakaśipoḥ putraḥ ca apam ānamya vegavān
tām bāṇa vṛṣṭim atulām daṇḍena āhatya bhāskariḥ
śātayitvā pracikṣepa daṇḍam loka bhayaṅkaram
sa vāyupatham āsthāya dharmarāja kare sthitaḥ

original: jajvāla kālagninibho yadvad dagdhuṃ jagattrayam // VamP_10.17 //
analyzed: jajvāla kāla agni nibhaḥ yadvat dagdhum jagattrayam
jājvalyamānām āyāntam daṇḍam dṛṣṭvā diteḥ sutāḥ

original: prākrośanti hataḥ kaṣṭaṃ prahlādo 'yaṃ yamena hi // VamP_10.18 //
analyzed: prākrośanti hataḥ kaṣṭam prahlādaḥ yam yamena hi
tam ākranditam ākarṇya hiraṇyākṣa sutaḥ ndhakaḥ

original: provāca mā bhaiṣṭaca mayi sthite ko 'yaṃ surādhamaḥ // VamP_10.19 //
analyzed: provāca mā bhaiṣṭaca mayi sthite kaḥ yam sura adhamaḥ
iti eva suktvā vacanam vegena abisasāra ca

original: jagrāha pāṇinā daṇeḍaṃ hasan savyena nārada // VamP_10.20 //
analyzed: jagrāha pāṇinā daṇa iḍam hasan savyena nārada
tam ādāya tatas vegāt bhrāmayāmāsa ca andhakaḥ

original: jagarja ca mahānādaṃ yathā prāvṛṣi toyadaḥ // VamP_10.21 //
analyzed: jagarja ca mahā nādam yathā prāvṛṣi toyadaḥ

original: prahlādaṃ rakṣitaṃ dṛṣṭvā daṇḍād daityeśvareṇa hi /
analyzed: prahlādam rakṣitam dṛṣṭvā daṇḍāt daitya īśvareṇa hi
sādhuvādam daduḥ hṛṣṭāḥ daitya dānava yūthapāḥ
bhrāmayantam mahā daṇḍam dṛṣṭvā bhānusutaḥ mune

original: duḥsahaṃ durdharaṃ matvā antardhānamagād yamaḥ // VamP_10.23 //
analyzed: duḥsaham durdharam matvā antardhānam agāt yamaḥ
antarhite dharmarāje prahlādaḥ pi mahā mune
dārayāmāsa balavān deva sainyam samantataḥ
varuṇaḥ śiśumāra sthaḥ baddhvā pāśaiḥ mahā asurān
gadayā dārayāmāsa tam abhyāgāt virocanaḥ
tomaraiḥ vajra saṃsparśaiḥ śaktibhiḥ mārgaṇaiḥ api
jaleśam tāḍayāmāsa mudgaraiḥ kaṇapaiḥ api
tatas tam gadayā abhyetya pātayitvā dharā tale
abhidrutya babandha atha pāśaiḥ matta gajam balī
tān pāśān śatadhā cakre vegāt ca danuja īśvaraḥ

original: varuṇaṃ ca samabhyetya madhye jagrāha nārada // VamP_10.28 //
analyzed: varuṇam ca samabhyetya madhye jagrāha nārada

original: tato dantī ca śṛṅgābhyāṃ pracikṣepa tadāvyayaḥ /
analyzed: tatas dantī ca śṛṅgābhyām pracikṣepa tadā avyayaḥ

original: mamarda ca tathā padbhyāṃ savāhaṃ salileśvarām // VamP_10.29 //
analyzed: mamarda ca tathā padbhyām sa vāham salileśvarām
tam mardyamānam vīkṣya atha śaśāṅkaḥ śiśira āśumān
abhyetya tāḍayāmāsa mārgaṇaiḥ kāya dāraṇaiḥ

original: sa tāḍyamānaḥ śiśirāṃśubāṇairavāpa pīḍāṃ paramāṃ gajendraḥ /
analyzed: sa tāḍyamānaḥ śiśirāṃśu bāṇaiḥ avāpa pīḍām paramām gaja indraḥ

original: duṣṭaśca vegāt payasāmadhīśaṃ muhurmuhuḥ pādatalairmamarda // VamP_10.31 //
analyzed: duṣṭaḥ ca vegāt payasām adhīśam muhur muhur pāda talaiḥ mamarda

original: sa mṛdyamāno varuṇo gajendraṃ padbhyāṃ sugāḍhaṃ jagṛhe maharṣe /
analyzed: sa mṛdyamānaḥ varuṇaḥ gaja indram padbhyām su gāḍham jagṛhe mahā ṛṣe

original: pādeṣu bhūmiṃ karayoḥ spṛśaṃśca mūrddhānamullālya balānmahātmā // VamP_10.32 //
analyzed: pādeṣu bhūmim karayoḥ spṛśan ca mūrddhānam ullālya balāt mahātmā

original: gṛhyāṅgulībhiśca gajasya pucchaṃ kṛtveha bandhaṃ bhujageśvareṇa /
analyzed: gṛhya aṅgulībhiḥ ca gajasya puccham kṛtvā iha bandham bhujaga īśvareṇa

original: utpāṭya cikṣepa virocanaṃ hi sakuñjaraṃ khe saniyantṛvāham // VamP_10.33 //
analyzed: utpāṭya cikṣepa virocanam hi sa kuñjaram khe sa niyantṛ vāham

original: kṣipto jaleśena virocanastu sakuñjaro bhūmitale papāta /
analyzed: kṣiptaḥ jaleśena virocanaḥ tu sa kuñjaraḥ bhūmi tale papāta

original: sāṭṭaṃ sanyatrārgalaharmyabhūmi puraṃ sukeśeriva bhaskareṇa // VamP_10.34 //
analyzed: sa aṭṭam san yatra argala harmya bhūmi puram su keśeḥ iva bhaskareṇa

original: tato jaleśaḥ sagadaḥ sapāśaḥ sambhyadhāvad ditijaṃ nihantum /
analyzed: tatas jaleśaḥ sa gadaḥ sa pāśaḥ sambhyadhāvat ditijam nihantum

original: tataḥ samākrandamanuttamaṃ hi muktaṃ tu daityairghanarāvatulyam // VamP_10.35 //
analyzed: tatas samākrandam anuttamam hi muktam tu daityaiḥ ghana rau atulyam

original: hā hā hato 'sau varuṇena vīro virocano dānavasainyapālaḥ /
analyzed: hā hā hataḥ sau varuṇena vīraḥ virocanaḥ dānava sainya pālaḥ

original: prahlāda he jambhakujambhakādyā rakṣadhvamabhyetya sahāndhakena // VamP_10.36 //
analyzed: prahlāda he jambha kujambhaka ādyāḥ rakṣadhvam abhyetya saha andhakena

original: aho mahātmā balavāñjaleśaḥ saṃcūrṇayan daityabhaṭaṃ savāham /
analyzed: aho mahātmā balavān jaleśaḥ saṃcūrṇayan daitya bhaṭam sa vāham

original: pāśena baddhvā gadayā nihanti yathā paśuṃ vājimakhe mahendraḥ // VamP_10.37 //
analyzed: pāśena baddhvā gadayā nihanti yathā paśum vāji makhe mahā indraḥ

original: śrutatvātha śabdaṃ ditijaiḥ samīritaṃ jambhapradhānā ditijeśvarāstataḥ /
analyzed: śruta tvā atha śabdam ditijaiḥ samīritam jambha pradhānāḥ ditija īśvarāḥ tatas

original: samabhyadhāvaṃstvaritā jaleśvaraṃ yathā pataṅgā jvalitaṃ hutāśanam // VamP_10.38 //
analyzed: samabhyadhāvan tvaritāḥ jaleśvaram yathā pataṅgāḥ jvalitam hutāśanam

original: tānāgatān vai prasamīkṣya devaḥ prāhlādisutsṛjya vitatya pāśam /
analyzed: tān āgatān vai prasamīkṣya devaḥ prāhlādiḥ utsṛjya vitatya pāśam

original: gadāṃ samudbhrāmya jaleśvarastu dudrāva tān jambhamukhānarātīn // VamP_10.39 //
analyzed: gadām samudbhrāmya jaleśvaraḥ tu dudrāva tān jambha mukhān arātīn

original: jambhaṃ ca pāśena tathā nihatya tāraṃ talenāśanisaṃnibhena /
analyzed: jambham ca pāśena tathā nihatya tāram talena aśani saṃnibhena

original: pādena vṛtraṃ tarasā kujambhaṃ nipātayāmāsa balaṃ ca muṣṭyā // VamP_10.40 //
analyzed: pādena vṛtram tarasā kujambham nipātayāmāsa balam ca muṣṭyā

original: tenārditā devavareṇa daityāḥ saṃprādravan dikṣu vimuktaśastrāḥ /
analyzed: tena arditāḥ deva vareṇa daityāḥ saṃprādravan dikṣu vimukta śastrāḥ

original: tato 'ndhakaḥ satvarito 'bhyupeyād raṇāya yoddhuṃ jalanāyakena // VamP_10.41 //
analyzed: tatas ndhakaḥ sa tvaritaḥ bhyupeyāt raṇāya yoddhum jalanāyakena

original: tamāpatantaṃ gadayā jaghāna pāśena baddhvā paruṇo 'sureśam /
analyzed: tam āpatantam gadayā jaghāna pāśena baddhvā paruṇaḥ sureśam

original: taṃ pāśamāvidhya gadāṃ pragṛhya cikṣepa daityaḥ sa ca jaleśvarāya // VamP_10.42 //
analyzed: tam pāśam āvidhya gadām pragṛhya cikṣepa daityaḥ sa ca jaleśvarāya

original: tamāpatantaṃ prasamīkṣya pāśaṃ gadāṃ ca dākṣāyaṇinandanastu /
analyzed: tam āpatantam prasamīkṣya pāśam gadām ca dākṣāyaṇinandanaḥ tu

original: viveśa vegāt payasāṃ nidhānaṃ tato 'ndhako devabalaṃ mamarda // VamP_10.43 //
analyzed: viveśa vegāt payasām nidhānam tatas ndhakaḥ deva balam mamarda

original: tato hutāśaḥ suraśatrusainyaṃ dadāha roṣāt pavanāvadhūtaḥ /
analyzed: tatas hutāśaḥ sura śatru sainyam dadāha roṣāt pavana avadhūtaḥ

original: tamāpatantaṃ saha śambareṇa samīkṣya vahniḥ pavanena sārdham /
analyzed: tam āpatantam saha śambareṇa samīkṣya vahniḥ pavanena sārdham

original: śaktyā mayaṃ śambarametya kaṇṭhe saṃtāḍya jagrāha balānmaharṣe // VamP_10.45 //
analyzed: śaktyā mayam śambaram etya kaṇṭhe saṃtāḍya jagrāha balāt mahā ṛṣe

original: śaktyā sa kāyāvaraṇe vidārite saṃbhinnadeho nyapatat pṛthivyām /
analyzed: śaktyā sa kāya āvaraṇe vidārite saṃbhinna dehaḥ nyapatat pṛthivyām

original: mayaḥ prajajvāla ca śamvaro 'pi kaṇṭhāvalagne jvalane pradīpte // VamP_10.46 //

original: sa dahyamāno ditijo 'gninātha suvisvaraṃ ghorataraṃ rurāva /
analyzed: sa dahyamānaḥ ditijaḥ gninā atha su visvaram ghorataram rurāva

original: siṃhābhipanno vipine yathaiva matto gajaḥ krandati vedanārttaḥ // VamP_10.47 //
analyzed: siṃha abhipannaḥ vipine yathā eva mattaḥ gajaḥ krandati vedanā ārttaḥ

original: taṃ śabdamākarṇya ca śambarasya daityeśvaraḥ krodhaviraktadṛṣṭiḥ /
analyzed: tam śabdam ākarṇya ca śambarasya daitya īśvaraḥ krodha virakta dṛṣṭiḥ

original: āḥ kiṃ kimetannanu kena yuddhe jito mayaḥ śambaradānavaśca // VamP_10.48 //
analyzed: āḥ kim kim etat nanu kena yuddhe jitaḥ mayaḥ śambara dānavaḥ ca

original: tato 'bruvan daityabhaṭā ditīśaṃ pradahyate hyeṣa hutāśanena /
analyzed: tatas bruvan daitya bhaṭāḥ ditīśam pradahyate hi eṣa hutāśanena

original: rakṣasva cābhyetya na śakyate 'nyairhutāśano vārayituṃ raṇāgre // VamP_10.49 //
analyzed: rakṣasva ca abhyetya na śakyate nyaiḥ hutāśanaḥ vārayitum raṇa agre

original: udyamya vegāt parighaṃ hutāśaṃ samādravat tiṣṭha tiṣṭha bruvan hi // VamP_10.50 //

śrutvā andhakasya api vacaḥ vyaya ātmā saṃkruddha cittaḥ tvaritaḥ hi daityam

original: utpāṭya bhūmyāṃ ca viniṣpipeṣa tato 'ndhakaḥ pāvakamāsasāda // VamP_10.51 //
analyzed: utpāṭya bhūmyām ca viniṣpipeṣa tatas andhakaḥ pāvakam āsasāda
samājaghāna atha hutāśanam hi vara yudhena atha varāṅga madhye

original: samāhato 'gniḥ parimucya śambaraṃ tathāndhakaṃ sa tvarito 'bhyadhāvat // VamP_10.52 //
analyzed: samāhataḥ agniḥ parimucya śambaram tathā andhakam sa tvaritaḥ bhyadhāvat

original: sa tāḍito 'gnirditijeśvareṇa bhayāt pradudrāva raṇājirādvi // VamP_10.53 //
analyzed: sa tāḍitaḥ agniḥ ditija īśvareṇa bhayāt pradudrāva raṇa ajirāt vi
tatas ndhakaḥ māruta candra bhāskarān sādhyān sa rudra aśvi vasūn mahā uragān

original: tato vijityāmarasainyasugraṃ sendraṃ sarudraṃ sayamaṃ sasomam /

analyzed: devānām paramaḥ dharmaḥ sadā yajña ādikāḥ kriyāḥ

original: sarasvatyāṃ sthirā bhaktirgāndharvo dharma ucyate // VamP_11.18 //

analyzed: sarvatra kāma cāritavam dharmaḥ yam paitṛkaḥ smṛtaḥ

analyzed: brahmacaryam yata āśi tvam japyam jñānam ca rākṣasa

original: svādhyāyaṃ brahmacaryaṃ ca dānaṃ yajanameva ca /

original: tasyāpi dviguṇaḥ plakṣo bāhyataḥ saṃpratiṣṭhitaḥ // VamP_11.35 //

original: tato 'pi dviguṇaḥ proktaḥ samudro dadhisaṃjñitaḥ // VamP_11.38 //

original: ete ca dviguṇāḥ sarve parasparamapi sthitāḥ // VamP_11.39 //
analyzed: ete ca dviguṇāḥ sarve parasparam api sthitāḥ
catvāriṃśat imāḥ koṭyaḥ lakṣāḥ ca navatiḥ smṛtāḥ

original: tathāṣṭādaśamī proktā ghorā vaitaraṇī nadī // VamP_11.57 //

original: dāturnivārakāye ca teṣu te nipatanti hi / /
analyzed: dātuḥ nivāra kāye ca teṣu te nipatanti hi
suhṛd dampati sodarya svāmi bhṛtya pitā sutān
yājya upādhyāyayoḥ yaiḥ ca kṛtaḥ bhedaḥ dhamaiḥ mithas
kanyām ekasya dattvā ca dadati anyasya ye dhamāḥ

original: karapatreṇa pāṭyante te dvidhā yamakiṅkaraiḥ // VamP_12.6 //
analyzed: kara patreṇa pāṭyante te dvidhā yama kiṅkaraiḥ
para upatāpa janakāḥ candana uśīra hāriṇaḥ
bāla vyajana harttāraḥ karambha sikatā āśritāḥ
nimantritaḥ nyatas bhuṅkte śrāddhe daive sa paitṛke

original: sa dvidhā kṛṣyate mūḍhastīkṣṇatuṇḍaiḥ khagottamaiḥ // VamP_12.8 //
analyzed: sa dvidhā kṛṣyate mūḍhaḥ tīkṣṇa tuṇḍaiḥ khaga uttamaiḥ
marmāṇi yaḥ tu sādhūnām tudan vāgbhiḥ nikṛntati
tasya upari tudantaḥ tu tuṇḍaiḥ tiṣṭhanti pattriṇaḥ
yaḥ karoti ca paiśunyam sādhūnām anyathāmatiḥ
vajra tuṇḍa nakhāḥ jihvām ākarṣante sya vāyasāḥ
mātā pitṛ gurūṇām ca ye vajñām cakruḥ uddhatāḥ
majjante pūya vim mūtre hi adhas sukhāḥ
devatā atithi bhūteṣu bhṛtyeṣu abhyāgateṣu ca
a bhuktavatsu ye śnanti bāla pitṛ agni mātṛṣu
duṣṭacā asṛj pūya niryāsam bhuñjate tu adhamāḥ ime
sūcīmukhāḥ ca jāyante kṣudhā ārttāḥ giri vigrahāḥ
eka paṅkti upaviṣṭānām viṣamam bhojayanti ye

original: viḍbhojanaṃ rākṣasendra narakaṃ te vrajanti ca // VamP_12.14 //
analyzed: viś bhojanam rākṣasa indra narakam te vrajanti ca
eka sārtha prayātam ye paśyantaḥ ca arthinam narāḥ

original: asaṃvibhajya bhuñjanti te yānti śleṣmabhojanam // VamP_12.15 //
analyzed: a saṃvibhajya bhuñjanti te yānti śleṣma bhojanam
go brāhṇaṇa agnayaḥ spṛṣṭāḥ yaiḥ ucchiṣṭaiḥ kṣapācara

original: kṣipyante hi karāsteṣāṃ taptasumbhe sudāruṇe // VamP_12.16 //
analyzed: kṣipyante hi karāḥ teṣām tapta sumbhe su dāruṇe
sūrya indu tārakāḥ dṛṣṭāḥ yaiḥ ucchiṣṭaiḥ ca kāmataḥ
teṣām netra gataḥ vahniḥ dhamyate yama kiṅkaraiḥ

original: mitrajāyātha jananī jyeṣṭho bhrātā pitā svasā /
analyzed: mitra jāyā atha jananī jyeṣṭhaḥ bhrātā pitā svasā

original: jāmayo guravo vṛddhā yaiḥ saṃspṛṣṭāḥ padā nṛbhiḥ // VamP_12.18 //
analyzed: jāmayaḥ guravaḥ vṛddhāḥ yaiḥ saṃspṛṣṭāḥ padā nṛbhiḥ
baddha aṅghrayaḥ te vigaḍaiḥ lohaiḥ vā ahni pratāpitaiḥ
kṣipyante raurave ghore hi ājānu paridāhinaḥ

original: pāyasaṃ kṛśaraṃ māṃsaṃ vṛthā bhuktāni yairnaraiḥ /
analyzed: pāyasam kṛśaram māṃsam vṛthā bhuktāni yaiḥ naraiḥ
teṣām ayaḥ guḍāḥ taptāḥ kṣipyante vadane dbhutāḥ
guru deva dvijātīnām vedānām ca nara adhamaiḥ

original: nindā niśāmitā yaistu pāpānāmiti kurvatām // VamP_12.21 //
analyzed: nindā niśāmitā yaiḥ tu pāpānām iti kurvatām

original: teṣāṃ lohamayāḥ kīlā vahnivarṇāḥ punaḥ punaḥ /
analyzed: teṣām loha mayāḥ kīlāḥ vahni varṇāḥ punar punar
śravaṇeṣu nikhanyante dharmarājasya kiṅkaraiḥ
prapā devakula ālāmān vipra veśma sabhā maṭhān
kūpa vāpī taḍāgān ca bhaṅktvā vidhvaṃsayanti ye

original: teṣāṃ vilapatāṃ carma dehataḥ kriyate pṛthak /
analyzed: teṣām vilapatām carma dehataḥ kriyate pṛthak
karttikābhiḥ su tīkṣṇībhiḥ su raudraiḥ yama kiṅkaraiḥ

original: gobrāhmaṇārkamagniṃ ca ye vai mehanti mānavāḥ /
analyzed: go brāhmaṇa arkam agnim ca ye vai mehanti mānavāḥ

original: teṣāṃ gudeva cāntrāṇi viniḥkṛntanti vāyasāḥ // VamP_12.25 //
analyzed: teṣām gudā iva ca antrāṇi viniḥkṛntanti vāyasāḥ
sva poṣaṇa paraḥ yaḥ tu parityajati mānavaḥ
putra bhṛtya kalatra ādi bandhu vargam akiñcanam

original: durbhikṣe saṃbhrame cāpi sa śvabhojye nipātyate // VamP_12.26 //
analyzed: durbhikṣe saṃbhrame ca api sa śvabhojye nipātyate

original: śaraṇāgataṃ ye tyajanti ye ca bandhanapālakāḥ /
analyzed: śaraṇa āgatam ye tyajanti ye ca bandhana pālakāḥ

original: patanti yantrapīḍe te tāḍya mānāstu kiṅkaraiḥ // VamP_12.27 //
analyzed: patanti yantra pīḍe te tāḍya mānāḥ tu kiṅkaraiḥ

original: kleśayanti hi viprādīn ye hyakarmasu pāpinaḥ /
analyzed: kleśayanti hi vipra ādīn ye hi akarmasu pāpinaḥ

original: te piṣyante śilāpeṣe śoṣyanate 'pi ca śoṣakaiḥ // VamP_12.28 //
analyzed: te piṣyante śilā peṣe śoṣya nate ca śoṣakaiḥ
nyāsa apahāriṇaḥ pāpāḥ badhyante nigaḍaiḥ api
śrut kṣāmāḥ śuṣka tālu oṣṭhāḥ pātyante vṛścika aśane

original: te vahnitaptāṃ kūṭāgrāmāliṅgante ca śālmalīm // VamP_12.30 //
analyzed: te vahni taptām kūṭa agrām āliṅgante ca śālmalīm

original: teṣāmadhyāpako yaśca sa śilāṃ śirasā vahet // VamP_12.31 //
analyzed: teṣām adhyāpakaḥ yaḥ ca sa śilām śirasā vahet

original: te pātyante ca viṇmūtre durgandhe pūyapūrite // VamP_12.32 //
analyzed: te pātyante ca viṣ mūtre durgandhe pūya pūrite

original: parasparaṃ bhakṣayante māṃsāni svāni bāliśāḥ // VamP_12.33 //
analyzed: parasparam bhakṣayante māṃsāni svāni bāliśāḥ
veda vahni guru tyāgī bhāryā pitroḥ tathā eva ca
giri śṛḍgāt adhaḥpātam pātyante yama kiṅkaraiḥ
punar bhūpatayaḥ ye ca kanyā vidhvaṃsakāḥ ca ye
tad garbha śrāddha bhuj yaḥ ca kṛmīn bhakṣet pipīlikāḥ

yājakaḥ yajamānaḥ ca saḥ sma antaḥ sthūlakīṭakaḥ
pṛṣṭha māṃsa āśinaḥ mūḍhāḥ tathā eva utkoca jīvinaḥ

original: kṣipyante vṛkabhakṣe te narake rajanīcara // VamP_12.37 //
analyzed: kṣipyante vṛka bhakṣe te narake rajanīcara
svarṇa steyī ca brahma ghnaḥ surā paḥ guru lalpa gaḥ

original: eta narā dvijā ye ca goṣu vikrayiṇastathā /
analyzed: eta narāḥ dvijāḥ ye ca goṣu vikrayiṇaḥ tathā
soma vikrayiṇaḥ ye ca veda vikrayiṇaḥ tathā

original: kūṭasākṣyapradā ye ca te mahāraurave sthitāḥ // VamP_12.40 //
analyzed: kūṭasākṣya pradāḥ ye ca te mahāraurave sthitāḥ
daśa varṣa sahasrāṇi tāvat tāmisrake sthitāḥ

original: prapāto bhavate teṣāṃ yairidaṃ duṣkṛtaṃ kṛtam // VamP_12.42 //
analyzed: prapātaḥ bhavate teṣām yaiḥ idam duṣkṛtam kṛtam

original: mukhyaḥ purāṇeṣu yathaiva mātsyaḥ svāyaṃbhuvoktistvapi saṃhitāsu /
analyzed: mukhyaḥ purāṇeṣu yathā eva mātsyaḥ svāyaṃbhuva uktiḥ tu api saṃhitāsu

original: kuśasthalī śreṣṭhatamā pureṣu deśeṣu sarveṣu ca madhyadeśaḥ /
analyzed: kuśasthalī śreṣṭhatamā pureṣu deśeṣu sarveṣu ca madhyadeśaḥ

original: kalāsu mukhyā gaṇitajñatā ca vijñānamukhyeṣu yathendrajālam /

original: śākeṣu mukhyā tvapi kākamācī raseṣu mukhyaṃ lavaṇaṃ yathaiva // VamP_12.53 //
analyzed: śākeṣu mukhyā tu api kākamācī raseṣu mukhyam lavaṇam yathā eva

original: yathā vṛṣāṇāmapi nīlavarṇo yathaiva sarveṣvapi duḥsaheṣu /

analyzed: pāpīyasām tadvat iha kṛ ghnāḥ sarveṣu pāpeṣu vanaśācara indra

original: brahmaghnagoghnādiṣu niṣkṛtirhi vidyetata naivāsya tu duṣṭacāriṇaḥ /
analyzed: brahma ghna go ghna ādiṣu niṣkṛtiḥ hi na eva asya tu duṣṭa cāriṇaḥ

original: na niṣkṛtiścāsti kṛtaghnavṛtteḥ suhṛtkṛtaṃ nāśayato 'bdakoṭibhiḥ // VamP_12.56 //
analyzed: na niṣkṛtiḥ ca asti kṛtaghna vṛtteḥ suhṛd kṛtam nāśayataḥ bda koṭibhiḥ
iti śrī vāmanapurāṇe dvādaśaḥ dhyāyaḥ
sukeśiḥ uvāca
bhavadbhiḥ uditā ghorā puṣkaradvīpa saṃsthitiḥ
jambūdvīpasya saṃsthānam kathayantu mahā ṛṣayaḥ
ṛṣayaḥ ūcuḥ

nava bhedam su vistīrṇam svarga sokṣa phala pradam
madhye tu ilāvṛtaḥ varṣaḥ bhadraśvaḥ pūrvatas dbhutaḥ

bhārataḥ dakṣiṇe proktaḥ hariḥ dakṣiṇa paśa cime

uttare ca kuruḥ varṣaḥ kalpavṛkṣa samāvṛtaḥ

original: ilāvṛtādyā ye cāṣṭau varṣaṃ muktvaiva bhāratam // VamP_13.6 //

original: na teṣvasti yugāvasthā jarāmṛtyubhayaṃ na ca /

yat etat bhāratam varṣam navadvīpam nisācara

indrīpaḥ kaserumān tāmra varṇaḥ gabhastimān
nāgadvīpaḥ kaṭāhaḥ ca siṃhalaḥ vāruṇaḥ tathā
ayam tu navamaḥ teṣām dvīpaḥ sāgara saṃvṛtaḥ

original: pūrve kirātā yasyānte paścime yavanāḥ sthitāḥ /
analyzed: pūrve kirātāḥ yasya ante paścime yavanāḥ sthitāḥ

original: āndhrā dakṣimate vīra turuṣkāstvapi cottare // VamP_13.11 //
analyzed: āndhrāḥ dakṣimate vīra turuṣkāḥ tu api ca uttare

vistāra ucchrāyiṇaḥ ramyāḥ vipulāḥ śubha sānavaḥ

taiḥ vimiśrāḥ janapadāḥ mlecchāḥ āryāḥ ca bhāgaśas

original: taiḥ pīyante saricchreṣṭhā yāstāḥ samyaṅ niśāmayaḥ // VamP_13.19 //
analyzed: taiḥ pīyante sarit śreṣṭhāḥ yāḥ tāḥ samyak

original: madhurā hārarāvī ca uśīrā dhātukī rasā /
analyzed: madhurā hārarāvī ca uśīrā dhātukī rasā

original: gomatī dhūtapāpā ca bāhudā sadṛṣadvatī // VamP_13.21 //

original: niścirā gaṇḍakī citrā kauśikī ca vadhūsarā /

original: parṇāśā nandinī caiva pāvanī ca mahī tathā // VamP_13.23 //
analyzed: parṇāśā nandinī ca eva pāvanī ca mahī tathā

analyzed: siprā hi avantī ca tathā pāriyātra āśrayāḥ smṛtāḥ
śoṇaḥ mahānadaḥ ca eva narmadā surasā kṛpā
mandākinī daśārṇā ca citrakūṭā apavāhikā
citrotpalā vai tamasā karamodā piśācikā
tathā anyā pippalaśroṇī vipāśā vañjulāvatī
satsantajā śuktimatī mañjiṣṭhā kṛttisā vasuḥ
ṛkṣa pāda prasūtā ca tathā anyā bala vāhinī
śivā payoṣṇī nirvindhyā tāpī sa niṣadhāvatī

original: veṇa vaitaraṇī caiva sinīvāhuḥ kumudvatī // VamP_13.28 //
analyzed: veṇa vaitaraṇī ca eva sinīvāhuḥ kumudvatī

original: toyā caiva mahāgairī durgandhā vāśilāḥ tathā /
analyzed: toyā ca eva mahāgairī durgandhā vāśilāḥ tathā
vindhya pāda prasūtāḥ ca nadyaḥ puṇya jalāḥ śubhāḥ
godāvarī bhīmarathī kṛṣṇā veṇā sarasvatī

original: tuṅgabhadrā suprayogā vāhyā kāverireva ca // VamP_13.30 //
analyzed: tuṅgabhadrā suprayogā vāhyā kāveriḥ eva ca
dugdha udā nalinī reva vāri senā kala svanā
etāḥ tu api mahā nadyaḥ sahya pāda vinirgatāḥ

original: sinī caiva sudāmā ca śuktimatprabhavāstvimāḥ // VamP_13.32 //
analyzed: sinī ca eva sudāmā ca śuktimat prabhavāḥ tu imāḥ
sarvāḥ puṇyāḥ sarasvatyaḥ pāpa praśamanāḥ tathā

original: jagato mātaraḥ sarvāḥ sarvāḥ sāgarayoṣitaḥ // VamP_13.33 //
analyzed: jagataḥ mātaraḥ sarvāḥ sarvāḥ sāgara yoṣitaḥ
anyāḥ sahasraśas ca atra kṣudra nadyaḥ hi rākṣasa
sadā kāla vahāḥ ca anyāḥ pravṛṣ kāla vahāḥ tathā

original: udaṅmadhyodbhavā deśāḥ pibanti svecchayā śubhāḥ // VamP_13.34 //
analyzed: udak madhya udbhavāḥ deśāḥ pibanti sva icchayā śubhāḥ

original: matsyāḥ kuśaṭṭāḥ kuṇikuṇḍalāśca pāñjālakāśyāḥ saha kosalābhiḥ // VamP_13.35 //
analyzed: matsyāḥ kuśaṭṭāḥ kuṇi kuṇḍalāḥ ca pāñjāla kāśyāḥ saha kosalābhiḥ
vṛkāḥ śabara kauvīrāḥ sabhūliṅgāḥ janāḥ tu ime
śakāḥ ca eva samaśakāḥ madhyadeśya janāḥ tu ime
vāhlīkāḥ vāṭadhānāḥ ca ābhīrāḥ kālatoyakāḥ
aparāntāḥ tathā śūdrāḥ pahlāvāḥ ca sa kheṭakāḥ
gāndhārāḥ yavanāḥ ca eva sindhusauvīra madrakāḥ
śātadravāḥ lalitthāḥ ca pārāvatasamūṣakāḥ
māṭhara udaka dhārāḥ ca ja kaikaiyāḥ daśamāḥ tathā
śratriyāḥ prativaiśyāḥ ca vaiśya śūdra kulāni ca
kāmbojāḥ daradāḥ ca eva barbarāḥ hi aṅgalaukikāḥ
cīnāḥ ca eva tuṣārāḥ ca bahudhā bāhyatas udarāḥ
ātreyāḥ sa bharadvājāḥ prasthalāḥ ca daśerakāḥ
lampakāḥ tāvaka ārāmāḥ śūlikāḥ taṅgaṇaiḥ sahā
aurasāḥ ca ali madrāḥ ca kirātānām ca jātayaḥ
tāmasāḥ kramamāsāḥ ca supārśvāḥ puṇḍrakāḥ tathā
kulūtāḥ kuhukāḥ ūrṇāḥ tūṇī pādāḥ su kukkuṭāḥ
māṇḍavyāḥ mālavīyāḥ ca uttarāpatha vāsinaḥ
aṅgāḥ vaṅgāḥ mudgara vāstu antargiri bahirgirāḥ

original: tathā pravaṅgā vāṅgeyā māṃsādā baladantikāḥ // VamP_13.44 //
analyzed: tathā pravaṅgāḥ vāṅgeyāḥ māṃsādāḥ baladantikāḥ
brahmottarā prāvijayāḥ bhārgavāḥ keśavarrāḥ
pragjyotiṣāḥ ca śūdraḥ ca videhāḥ tāmraliptakāḥ
mālāḥ magadha gonandāḥ prācya najapadāḥ tu ime

original: puṇḍrāśca keralāścaiva cauḍāḥ kulyāśca rākṣasa // VamP_13.46 //
analyzed: puṇḍrāḥ ca keralāḥ ca eva cauḍāḥ kulyāḥ ca rākṣasa
jātuṣāḥ mūṣikādāḥ ca kumārādāḥ mahāśakāḥ
mahārāṣṭrāḥ māhiṣikāḥ kāliṅgāḥ ca eva sarvaśas

original: ābhīrāḥ saha naiṣīkā āraṇyāḥ śabarāśca ye /
analyzed: ābhīrāḥ saha naiṣīkāḥ āraṇyāḥ śabarāḥ ca ye

original: valindhyā vindhyamauleyā vaidarbhā daṇḍakaiḥ saha // VamP_13.48 //
analyzed: valindhyāḥ vindhyamauleyāḥ vaidarbhāḥ daṇḍakaiḥ saha
paurikaḥ sauśikāḥ ca eva aśmakāḥ bhoga varddhanāḥ
vaiṣikāḥ kundalāḥ andhrāḥ udbhidāḥ nalakārakāḥ
dākṣiṇātyāḥ janapadāḥ tu ime śāla kaṭaṅkaṭaḥ
sūrpārakā kāri vanā durgāḥ tālīkaṭaiḥ saha
pulīyāḥ sasinīlāḥ ca tāpasāḥ tāmasāḥ tathā
kāraskarāḥ tu raminaḥ nāsikya antara narmadāḥ
bhārakacchāḥ samāheyāḥ saha sārasvataiḥ api
vātseyāḥ ca surāṣṭrāḥ ca āvantyāḥ ca arbudaiḥ saha
iti ete paścimām āśām sthitāḥ jānapadāḥ janāḥ
kāruṣāḥ ca ekalavyāḥ ca mekalāḥ ca utkalaiḥ saha

original: uttamarṇā daśārṇāśca bhojāḥ kiṅkavaraiḥ saha // VamP_13.53 //
analyzed: uttamarṇāḥ daśārṇāḥ ca bhojāḥ kiṅka varaiḥ saha
tośalā kośalāḥ ca eva traipurāḥ caillikāḥ tathā
turusāḥ tumbarāḥ ca eva vahanāḥ naiṣadhaiḥ saha
anūpāḥ tuṇḍikerāḥ ca vītahotrāḥ tu avantayaḥ
sukeśe vandhya mūla sthaḥ tu ime janapadāḥ smṛtāḥ
atho deśān pravakṣyāmaḥ parvata āśrayiṇaḥ tu ye
nirāhārāḥ haṃsamārgāḥ kupathāḥ taṅgaṇāḥ khaśāḥ
kutha prāvaraṇāḥ ca eva ūrṇāḥ capuṇyāḥ sahūhukāḥ
trigarttāḥ ca kirātāḥ ca tomarāḥ śiśirādrikāḥ

original: ime tavoktā viṣayāḥ suvistarād dvipe kumāre rajanīcareśa /
analyzed: ime tava uktāḥ viṣayāḥ su vistarāt dvipe kumāre rajanīcara īśa

original: eteṣu deśeṣu ca deśadharmān saṃkīrtyamānāñ śṛṇu tattvāto hi // VamP_13.58 //
analyzed: eteṣu deśeṣu ca deśa dharmān saṃkīrtyamānām śṛṇu tattva atas hi
iti śrī vāmanapurāṇe trayodaśaḥ dhyāyaḥ
ṛṣayaḥ ūcuḥ
ahiṃsā satyam astam dānam kṣāntiḥ damaḥ śamaḥ

original: akārpaṇyaṃ ca śaucaṃ ca tapaśca rajanīcara // VamP_14.1 //
analyzed: akārpaṇyam ca śaucam ca tapaḥ ca rajanīcara
daśa aṅgaḥ rākṣasa śreṣṭha sārvavarṇikaḥ
brāhmaṇasya api vihitā cāturāśramya kalpanā
sukeśiḥ uvāca
viprāṇām cāturāśramyam vistarāt me tapodhanāḥ

original: ācakṣadhvaṃ na me tṛptiḥ śṛṇvataḥ pratipadyate // VamP_14.3 //
analyzed: ācakṣadhvam na me tṛptiḥ śṛṇvataḥ pratipadyate
ṛṣayaḥ ūcuḥ
kṛta upanayanaḥ samyak brahmacārī gurau vaset

original: tatra dharmo 'sya yastaṃ ca kathyamānaṃ niśāmaya // VamP_14.4 //
analyzed: tatra yaḥ tam ca kathyamānam niśāmaya
svādhyāyaḥ u thā agni śuśruṣā snānam bhikṣā aṭanam tathā
guroḥ niṃvedya tat ca ādyam anujñātena sarvadā
guroḥ karmaṇi sodyogaḥ samyak prīti upapādanam
tena āhūtaḥ paṭhet ca eva tad paraḥ na anya mānasaḥ

original: ekaṃ dvau sakalān vāpi vedān prāpya surormukhāt /
analyzed: ekam dvau sakalān vā api vedān prāpya suroḥ mukhāt

original: anujñāto varaṃ dattvā gurave dakṣiṇāṃ tataḥ // VamP_14.7 //
analyzed: anujñātaḥ varam dattvā gurave dakṣiṇām tatas
gārhasthya āśrama kāmaḥ tu gārhasthya āśramam āvaset
vānaprastha āśramam vā api caturtham sva icchayā ātmanaḥ
tatra eva vā guroḥ gehe dvijaḥ niṣṭhām avāpnuyāt

original: gurorabhāve tatputre tacchiṣye tatsutaṃ vinā // VamP_14.9 //
analyzed: guroḥ abhāve tad putre tad śiṣye tad sutam vinā
śuśrūṣan nirabhīmānaḥ brahmacarya āśramam vaset

original: evaṃ jayati mṛtyuṃ sa dvijaḥ śālakaṭaṅkaṭa // VamP_14.10 //
analyzed: evam jayati mṛtyum sa dvijaḥ śāla kaṭaṅkaṭa
upāvṛttaḥ tatas tasmāt gṛhastha āśrama kāmyayā
asamāna ṛṣi kula jām kanyām udvahet niśācara
sva karmaṇā dhanam labdhvā pitṛ deva atithīn api

original: samyak saṃprīṇayed bhaktyā sadācārarato dvijaḥ // VamP_14.12 //
analyzed: samyak saṃprīṇayet bhaktyā sat ācāra rataḥ dvijaḥ
sat ācāraḥ nigaditaḥ yuṣmābhiḥ mama suvratāḥ

original: lakṣaṇaṃ śrotumicḥāmi kathayadhvaṃ tamadya me // VamP_14.13 //
analyzed: lakṣaṇam śrotum icḍāmi kathayadhvam tam adya me
ṛṣayaḥ ūcuḥ
sat ācāraḥ nigaditaḥ tava smābhiḥ ādarāt
lakṣaṇam tasya vakṣyāmaḥ tat śṛṇuṣva niśācara
gṛhasthena sadā kāryam ācāra paripālanam

original: na hyācāravihinasya bhadramatra paratra ca // VamP_14.15 //
analyzed: na hi ācāra vihinasya bhadram atra paratra ca
yajña dāna tapāṃsi iha puruṣasya na bhūtaye

original: bhavanti yaḥ samullaṅghya sadācāraṃ pravartate // VamP_14.16 //
analyzed: bhavanti yaḥ samullaṅghya sat ācāram pravartate

original: hurācāro hi puruṣo neha nāmutra nandate /
analyzed: huḥ ācāraḥ hi puruṣaḥ na iha na amutra nandate

original: kāryo yatnaḥ sadācāre ācāro hantyalakṣaṇam // VamP_14.17 //
analyzed: kāryaḥ yatnaḥ sat ācāre ācāraḥ hanti alakṣaṇam
tasya svarūpam vakṣyāmaḥ sat ācārasya rākṣasa
śṛṇuṣva ekamanāḥ tat ca yadi śreyaḥ bhivāñchasi

original: dharmo 'sya mūlaṃ dhanamasya śākhā puṣpaṃ ca kāmaḥ phalamasya mokṣaḥ /
analyzed: dharmaḥ sya mūlam dhanam asya śākhā puṣpam ca kāmaḥ phalam asya mokṣaḥ

original: asau sadācārataruḥ sukeśin saṃsevito yena sa puṇyabhokta // VamP_14.19 //
analyzed: asau sat ācāra taruḥ sukeśin saṃsevitaḥ yena sa puṇya bhokta

original: brahmo muhūrte prathamaṃ vibudhyedanusmared devavarān maharṣīn /
analyzed: brahmaḥ muhūrte prathamam vibudhyet anusmaret deva varān mahā ṛṣīn

original: prābhātikaṃ maṅgalameva vācyaṃ yaduktavān devapatistrinetraḥ // VamP_14.20 //
analyzed: prābhātikam maṅgalam eva vācyam yat uktavān devapatiḥ trinetraḥ
sukeśiḥ uvāca
kim tat uktam su prabhātam śaṅkareṇa mahātmanā

original: prabhāte yat paṭhan martyo mucyate pāpabandhanāt // VamP_14.21 //
analyzed: prabhāte yat paṭhan martyaḥ mucyate pāpa bandhanāt
ṛṣayaḥ ūcuḥ
śrūyatām rākṣasa śreṣṭha su prabhātam hara uditam

original: śrutvā smṛtvā paṭhitvā ca sarvapāpaiḥ pramucyate // VamP_14.22 //
analyzed: śrutvā smṛtvā paṭhitvā ca sarva pāpaiḥ pramucyate

original: brahma murāristripurāntakārī bhānuḥ śaśī bhūmisuto budhaśca /
analyzed: brahma murāriḥ tripurāntakārī bhānuḥ śaśī bhūmisutaḥ budhaḥ ca

original: guruśca śukraḥ saha bhānujena kurvantu sarve mama suprabhātam // VamP_14.23 //
analyzed: guruḥ ca śukraḥ saha bhānujena kurvantu sarve mama su prabhātam

original: bhṛgurvasiṣṭhaḥ kraturaṅgirāśca manuḥ pulastyaḥ pulahaḥ sagautamaḥ /
analyzed: bhṛguḥ vasiṣṭhaḥ kratuḥ aṅgirāḥ ca manuḥ pulastyaḥ pulahaḥ sa gautamaḥ

original: raibhyo marīciścyavano ṛbhuśca kurvantu sarve mama suprabhātam // VamP_14.24 //
analyzed: raibhyaḥ marīciḥ cyavanaḥ ṛbhuḥ ca kurvantu sarve mama su prabhātam
sanatkumāraḥ sanakaḥ sanandanaḥ sanātanaḥ pi āsuri piṅgalau ca

original: sapta svarāḥ sapta rasātalāśca kurvantu sarve mama suprabhātam // VamP_14.25 //
analyzed: sapta svarāḥ sapta rasātalāḥ ca kurvantu sarve mama su prabhātam

original: pṛthvī sagandhā sarasāstathā'paḥ sparśaśca vāyurjvalanaḥ satejāḥ /
analyzed: pṛthvī sa gandhā sa rasāḥ tathā āpaḥ sparśaḥ ca vāyuḥ jvalanaḥ sa tejāḥ

original: nabhaḥ saśabdaṃ mahatā sahaiva yacchantu sarve mama suprabhātam // VamP_14.26 //
analyzed: nabhaḥ sa śabdam mahatā saha eva yacchantu sarve mama su prabhātam

original: saptārṇavāḥ sapta kulācalāśca saptarṣayo dvīpavarāśca sapta /
analyzed: sapta arṇavāḥ sapta kula acalāḥ ca sapta ṛṣayaḥ dvīpa varāḥ ca sapta

original: bhūrādi kṛtvā bhuvanāni sapta dadantu sarve mama suprabhātam // VamP_14.27 //
analyzed: bhūḥ ādi kṛtvā bhuvanāni sapta dadantu sarve mama su prabhātam

original: itthaṃ prabhāte paramaṃ pavitraṃ paṭhet smaredvā śṛmuyācca bhaktyā /
analyzed: ittham prabhāte paramam pavitram paṭhet smaret vā śṛmuyāt ca bhaktyā

original: duḥsvapnanāśo 'nagha suprabhātaṃ bhavecca satyaṃ bhagavatprasādāt // VamP_14.28 //
analyzed: duḥsvapna nāśaḥ nagha su prabhātam bhavet ca satyam bhagavat prasādāt

original: tataḥ samutthāya vicintayena dharmaṃ tathārthaṃ ca vihāya śayyām /
analyzed: tatas samutthāya dharmam tathā artham ca vihāya śayyām

original: utthāya paścāddharirityudīrya gacchet tadotsargavidhiṃ hi kartum // VamP_14.29 //
analyzed: utthāya paścāt hariḥ iti udīrya gacchet tadā utsarga vidhim hi kartum

original: na devagobrāhmaṇavahnimārge na rājamārge na catuṣpathe ca /
analyzed: na deva go brāhmaṇa vahni mārge na rājamārge na catuṣpathe ca

original: kuryādathotsargamapīha goṣṭhe pūrvāparāṃ caiva samāśrito gām // VamP_14.30 //
analyzed: kuryāt atha utsargam api iha goṣṭhe pūrva aparām ca eva samāśritaḥ gām

original: tatastu śaucārthamupāharenmṛdaṃ gude trayaṃ pāṇitale ca sapta /
analyzed: tatas tu śauca artham upāharet mṛdam gude trayam pāṇi tale ca sapta

original: tathobhayoḥ pañca catustathaikāṃ liṅge tathaikāṃ mṛdamāhareta // VamP_14.31 //
analyzed: tathā ubhayoḥ pañca catuḥ tathā ekām liṅge tathā ekām mṛdam āhareta
na antar jalāt drākṣasa mūṣika sthalāt śauca avaśiṣṭā śaraṇāt tathā anyā

original: valmīkamṛccaiva hi śaucanāya grāhya sadācāravidā nareṇa // VamP_14.32 //
analyzed: valmīka mṛd ca eva hi sat ācāra vidā nareṇa

original: udaṅmukhaḥ prāṅmukho vāpi vidvān prakṣālya pādau bhuvi saṃniviṣṭaḥ /
analyzed: udak mukhaḥ prāc mukhaḥ vā api vidvān prakṣālya pādau bhuvi saṃniviṣṭaḥ
samācamet adbhiḥ aphenilābhiḥ ādau parimṛjya mukham dvis adbhiḥ

original: tataḥ spṛśetkhāni śiraḥ kareṇa saṃdhyāmupāsīta tataḥ krameṇa /
analyzed: tatas spṛśet khāni śiraḥ kareṇa saṃdhyām upāsīta tatas krameṇa

original: keśāṃstu saṃśodhya ca dantadhāvanaṃ kṛtvā tathā darpaṇadarśanaṃ ca // VamP_14.34 //
analyzed: keśān tu saṃśodhya ca danta dhāvanam kṛtvā tathā darpaṇa darśanam ca

original: kṛtvā śiraḥsnānamathāṅiḍkaṃ vā saṃpūjya toyena pitṝn sadevān /
analyzed: kṛtvā śiraḥsnānam atha āṅiḍkam vā saṃpūjya toyena pitṝn sa devān

original: homaṃ ca kṛtvālabhanaṃ śubhānāṃ kṛtvā bahirnirgamanaṃ praśastam // VamP_14.35 //
analyzed: homam ca kṛtvā ālabhanam śubhānām kṛtvā bahis nirgamanam praśastam
dūrvā dadhi sarpiḥ atha uda kumbham dhenum sa vatsām vṛṣabham suvarṇam

original: mṛdgomayaṃ svastikamakṣatāni lājāmadhu brāhmaṇakanyakāṃ ca // VamP_14.36 //
analyzed: mṛd gomayam svastikam akṣatāni lājā madhu brāhmaṇa kanyakām ca
śvetāni puṣpāṇi atha śobhanāni hutāśanam candam arka bimbam

original: aśvatthavṛkṣaṃ ca samālabheta tatastu kuryānnijajātidharmam // VamP_14.37 //
analyzed: aśvattha vṛkṣam ca samālabheta tatas tu kuryāt nija jāti dharmam

original: deśānuśiṣṭaṃ kula dharmamagryaṃ svagotradharmaṃ na hi saṃtyajet /
analyzed: deśa anuśiṣṭam kula dharmam agryam sva gotra dharmam na hi saṃtyajet

original: tenārthasiddhiṃ samupācareta nāsatpralāpaṃ na ca satyahīnam // VamP_14.38 //
analyzed: tena artha siddhim samupācareta na asat pralāpam na ca satya hīnam

original: na niṣṭhuraṃ nāgamaśāstrahīnaṃ vākyaṃ vadetsādhujanena yena /
analyzed: na niṣṭhuram na āgama śāstra hīnam vākyam vadet sādhu janena yena

original: nindyo bhavennaiva ca dharmaḥedī saṃgaṃ na cāsatsu nareṣu kuryāt // VamP_14.39 //
analyzed: nindyaḥ bhavet nā eva ca dharmaḥedī saṃgam na ca asatsu nareṣu kuryāt

original: saṃdhyāsu varjyaṃ surataṃ divā ca sarvāsu yonīṣu parābalāsu /
analyzed: saṃdhyāsu varjyam suratam divā ca sarvāsu yonīṣu para abalāsu

original: āgāraśūnyeṣu mahītaleṣu rajasvalāsveva jaleṣu vīra // VamP_14.40 //
analyzed: āgāra śūnyeṣu mahī taleṣu rajasvalāsu eva jaleṣu vīra

original: vṛthāṭanaṃ thā dānaṃ vṛthā ca paśumāraṇam /
analyzed: vṛthā aṭanam thā dānam vṛthā ca paśu māraṇam

original: na karttavyaṃ gṛhasthena vṛtā dāraparigraham // VamP_14.41 //
analyzed: na karttavyam gṛhasthena vṛtāḥ dāra parigraham
vṛthā aṭanāt nitya hāniḥ vṛthā dānāt dhana kṣayaḥ

original: vṛthā paśughnaḥ prāpnoti pātakaṃ narakapradam // VamP_14.42 //
analyzed: vṛthā paśu ghnaḥ prāpnoti pātakam naraka pradam
saṃtatyāḥ hāniḥ aślāghayā varṇa saṃkarataḥ bhayam
bhetavyam ca bhavet loke vṛthā dāra parigrahāt

original: parasve paradāre ca na kāryā buddhiruttamaiḥ /
analyzed: para sve para dāre ca na kāryā buddhiḥ uttamaiḥ

original: nekṣet parastriyaṃ nagnāṃ na saṃbhāṣena taskarān /
analyzed: na īkṣet para striyam nagnām na saṃbhāṣena taskarān

original: udkyādarśanaṃ sparśaṃ saṃbhāṣaṃ ca vivarjayet // VamP_14.45 //

original: tathaiva syānna mātuśca tathā svaduhitustvapi // VamP_14.46 //
analyzed: tathā eva syāt na mātuḥ ca tathā sva duhituḥ tu api

original: na ca snāyīta vai nagno na śayīta kadācana /

original: nandāsu nābhyaṅgamupācareta kṣauraṃ ca riktāsu jayāsu māṃsam /
analyzed: nandāsu na abhyaṅgam upācareta kṣauram ca riktāsu jayāsu māṃsam

original: pūrṇāsu yoṣitparivarjayeta bhadrāsu sarvāṇi samācareta // VamP_14.48 //
analyzed: pūrṇāsu yoṣit parivarjayeta bhadrāsu sarvāṇi samācareta

original: nābhyaṅgamarke na ca bhūmiputre kṣauraṃ ca śukre ravije ca māṃsam /
analyzed: na abhyaṅgam arke na ca bhūmiputre kṣauram ca śukre ravi je ca māṃsam

original: budheṣu yoṣinna samācareta śeṣeṣu sarvāṇi sadaiva kuryāt // VamP_14.49 //
analyzed: budheṣu yoṣit na samācareta śeṣeṣu sarvāṇi sadā eva kuryāt

original: citrāsu haste śravaṇe ca tailaṃ kṣauraṃ viśākhāsvabhijitsuvarjyam /

original: mūle mṛge bhāgrapadāsu māṃsaṃ yoṣinmaghākṛttikayottarāsu // VamP_14.50 //
analyzed: mūle mṛge bhā agrapadāsu māṃsam yoṣit maghā kṛttikayā uttarāsu

original: sadaiva jarjyaṃ śayanamudakśirās tathā pratīcyāṃ rajanīcareśa /

analyzed: bhuñjīta na eva iha ca dakṣiṇā mukhaḥ na ca pratīcyām abhibhojanīyam

original: devālayaṃ caityataruṃ catuṣpathaṃ vidyādhikaṃ cāpi guruṃ pradakṣiṇam /
analyzed: devālayam caitya tarum catuṣpatham vidyā adhikam ca api gurum pradakṣiṇam

original: snāyācchiraḥsnānatayā ca nityaṃ na kāraṇaṃ caiva vinā niśāsu /

original: grahoparāge svajanāpayāte muktvā ca janmarkṣagate śaśaṅke // VamP_14.53 //

original: nābhyaṅgitaṃ kāyamupaspṛśecca snāto na keśān vidhunīta cāpi /

original: gātrāṇi caivāmbarapāṇinā ca snāto vimṛjyād rajanīcareśa // VamP_14.54 //

original: na teṣu deśeṣu vaseta buddhimān sadā nṛpo daṇḍarucistvaśaktaḥ /
analyzed: na teṣu deśeṣu vaseta buddhimān sadā nṛpaḥ daṇḍaruciḥ tu aśaktaḥ

original: jano 'pi nityotsavabaddhavairaḥ sadā jigīṣuśca niśācarendra // VamP_14.56 //

iti śrī vāmanapurāṇe caturdaśaḥ dhyāyaḥ
ṛṣayaḥ ūcuḥ
yat ca jarjyam mahā bāho sadā adharma sthitaiḥ naraiḥ

original: yadbhojyaṃ ca samuddiṣṭaṃ kathayiṣyāmahe vayam // VamP_15.1 //

original: asnehā vrīhayaḥ ślakṣṇā vikārāḥ payasastathā // VamP_15.2 //
analyzed: asnehāḥ vrīhayaḥ ślakṣṇāḥ vikārāḥ payasaḥ tathā
śaśakaḥ śalyakaḥ godhā śvāvidhaḥ matsya kacchapau
tadvat dvi dalaka ādīni bhojyāni manuḥ abravīt
maṇi ratna pravālānām tadvat muktāphalasya ca
śailadāru mayānām ca tṛṇa mūla auṣadhāni api
śūrpa dhānya ajinānām ca saṃhatānām ca vāsasām
valkalānām aśeṣāṇām ambunā śuddhiḥ iṣyate

original: kārpāsikānāṃ vastrāṇāṃ suddhiḥ syātsaha bhasmanā // VamP_15.6 //

original: punaḥ pākena bhāṇḍānāṃ mṛnmayānāṃ ca medhyatā // VamP_15.7 //
analyzed: punar pākena bhāṇḍānām mṛd mayānām ca medhya tā

original: śuci bhaikṣaṃ kāruhastaḥ paṇyaṃ yoṣinmukhaṃ tathā /
analyzed: śuci bhaikṣam kāru hastaḥ paṇyam yoṣit mukham tathā
rathyā gatam avijñātam dāsa vargeṇa yat kṛtam

bhūmiḥ viśudhyate khāta dāha mārjana go kramaiḥ

keśa kīṭa avapanne nne go ghrāte makṣikā anvite
mṛd ambu bhasma kṣārāṇi prakṣeptavyāni śuddhaye

original: bhasmāmbibhiśca kāṃsyānāṃ śuddhiḥ plāvodravasya ca // VamP_15.13 //
analyzed: bhasma ambibhiḥ ca kāṃsyānām śuddhiḥ plāva udravasya ca
amedhya aktasya mṛd toyaiḥ gandha apaharaṇena ca
anyeṣām api dravyāṇām śuddhiḥ gandha apahārataḥ

original: gardabho bhāravāhitve śvā mṛgagrahaṇe śuciḥ // VamP_15.15 //
analyzed: gardabhaḥ bhāra vāhi tve śvā mṛga grahaṇe śuciḥ
rathyā kardama toyāni nāvaḥ pathi tṛṇāni ca

original: agramuddhṛtya saṃtyājyaṃ śeṣasya prokṣaṇaṃ smṛtam // VamP_15.17 //

original: ajñāte jñātapūrve ca naiva śuddhirvidhīyate // VamP_15.18 //

original: ācamyaiva tu niḥsnehaṃ gāmālabhyārkamīkṣya ca // VamP_15.20 //

na laṅghayet purīṣa asṛ kṣṭhīvana udvarttanāni ca

pañca piṇḍān an uddhatya na snāyāt para vāriṇi
snāyīta devakhāteṣu sarohada saritsu ca
na udyāna ādau vikāleṣu prājñaḥ tiṣṭhet kadācana

original: nālaped janavidviṣṭaṃ vīrahīnāṃ tathā striyam // VamP_15.23 //

devatā pitṛ sat śāstra yajña veda ādi nindakaiḥ

abhojyāḥ sūtikā ṣaṇḍha mārjāra ākhu śva kukkuṭāḥ
patita apaviddha nagnāḥ cāṇḍāla ādi adhamāḥ ca ye
sukeśiḥ uvāca

original: amīṣāṃ śrotumicchāmi tattvato lakṣaṇāni hi // VamP_15.26 //
analyzed: amīṣām śrotum icchāmi tattvataḥ lakṣaṇāni hi
ṛṣayaḥ ūcuḥ
brāhmaṇī brāhmaṇasya eva yā avarodha tvam āgatā

original: na juhotyucite kāle na snāti na dadāti ca /

original: dambhārthaṃ japate yaśca tapyate yajate tathā /

original: na paratrārthamudyakto sa mārjāraḥ prakīrtitiḥ // VamP_15.29 //
analyzed: na sa mārjāraḥ prakīrtitiḥ

analyzed: vibhave sati na eva atti na dadāti juhoti ca

original: tamāhurākhuṃ tasyānnaṃ bhuktvā kṛcchreṇa suddhyati // VamP_15.30 //
analyzed: tam āhuḥ ākhum tasya annam bhuktvā kṛcchreṇa

original: nityaṃ paraguṇadveṣī sa śvāna iti kathyate // VamP_15.31 //

original: anāpadi sa vidvadbhiḥ patitaḥ parikīrtyate // VamP_15.33 //

original: yeṣāṃ kule na vedo 'sti na sāstraṃ naiva ca vratam /
analyzed: yeṣām kule na vedaḥ sti na sa astram na eva ca vratam

original: te nagnāḥ kīrtitāḥ sadbhis teṣāmannaṃ vigarhitam // VamP_15.35 //
analyzed: te nagnāḥ kīrtitāḥ sadbhiḥ teṣām annam vigarhitam

original: śaraṇāgataṃ yastyajati sa cāṇḍālo 'dhamo naraḥ // VamP_15.36 //
analyzed: śaraṇa āgatam yaḥ tyajati sa cāṇḍālaḥ dhamaḥ naraḥ

original: kuṇḍāśī yaśca tasyānnaṃ bhuktvā cāndrāyaṇaṃ caret // VamP_15.37 //
analyzed: kuṇḍāśī yaḥ ca tasya annam bhuktvā cāndrāyaṇam caret

original: bhuktvānnaṃ tasya śuddhyeta trirātropoṣito naraḥ // VamP_15.38 //
analyzed: bhuktvā annam tasya śuddhyeta tri rātra upoṣitaḥ naraḥ

original: bāle pravrāji saṃnyāse deśāntaramṛte tathā // VamP_15.44 //

original: prīṇanaṃ tasya karttavyaṃ yathā śrutinidarśanāt // VamP_15.49 //

original: kuryādyenāsya suprītāḥ pitaro yānti rākṣasa // VamP_15.50 //
analyzed: kuryāt yena asya su prītāḥ pitaraḥ yānti rākṣasa

original: yad yadiṣṭatamaṃ kiñcid yaccāsya dayitaṃ gṛhe /

tat tat guṇavate deyam tat eva akṣayam icchatā

original: adhyetavyā trayī nityaṃ bhāvyaṃ ca viduṣā sadā /
analyzed: adhyetavyā trayī nityam bhāvyam ca viduṣā sadā

original: dharmato dhanamāhāryaṃ yaṣṭavyaṃ cāpi śaktitaḥ // VamP_15.52 //
analyzed: dharmataḥ dhanam āhāryam yaṣṭavyam ca api śaktitaḥ

original: tat karttavyamaśaṅkena yanna gopyaṃ mahājane // VamP_15.53 //
analyzed: tat karttavyam aśaṅkena yat na gopyam mahājane
evam ācarataḥ loke puruṣasya gṛhe sataḥ
dharma artha kāma saṃprāptiḥ paratra iha ca śobhanam
eṣa proktaḥ gṛstha āśramaḥ uttamaḥ
vānaprastha āśramam dharmam pravakṣyāmaḥ
apatya saṃtatim dṛṣṭvā prājñaḥ dehasya ca ānatim
vānaprastha āśramam dharmam pravakṣyāmaḥ
tatra araṇya upabhogaiḥ ca tapobhiḥ ca ātma karṣaṇam
bhūmau śayyā brahmacaryam pitṛ deva atithi kriyā
homaḥ triṣavaṇam snānam jaṭā valkala dhāraṇam
vanya sneha niṣevi tvam vānaprastha vidhiḥ tu ayam
sarva saṅga parityāgaḥ brahmacaryam amāni tā
jita indriya tvam āvāse na ekasmin vasatiḥ ciram
an anārambhaḥ tathā āhāraḥ bhaikṣa annam na ati kopi tā
ātma jñāna avabodha icchā tathā ca ātma avabodhanam
caturthe tu āśrame dharmāḥ asmābhiḥ te prakīrtitāḥ
varṇa dharmāṇi ca anyāni niśāmaya niśācara
gārhasthyam brahmacaryam ca vānaprastham traya āśramāḥ

original: kṣatriyasyāpi kathitā ye cācārā dvijasya hi // VamP_15.62 //
analyzed: kṣatriyasya api kathitāḥ ye ca ācārāḥ dvijasya hi
vaikhānasa tvam gārhasthyam āśrama dvitayam viśaḥ
gārhasthya yam uttamam tu ekam śūdrasya kṣaṇadā cara

original: yo hāpayati tasyāsau parikupyati bhāskaraḥ // VamP_15.64 //
analyzed: yaḥ hāpayati tasya asau parikupyati bhāskaraḥ

original: bhānurvai yatate tasya narasya kṣaṇadācara // VamP_15.65 //
analyzed: bhānuḥ vai yatate tasya narasya kṣaṇadā cara

original: tasmāt svaradharmaṃ na hi saṃtyajeta na hāpayeccāpi hi nātmavaṃśam /
analyzed: tasmāt svara dharmam na hi saṃtyajeta na hāpayet ca api hi na ātma vaṃśam

original: yaḥ saṃtyajeccāpi nijaṃ hi dharmaṃ tasmai prakupyeta divākarastu // VamP_15.66 //
analyzed: yaḥ saṃtyajet ca api nijam hi dharmam tasmai prakupyeta divākaraḥ tu

original: ityevamukto munibhiḥ sukeśī praṇamya tān brahmanidhīn maharṣīn /

original: jagāma cotpatya puraṃ svakīyaṃ muhurmuhurdharmamavekṣamāṇaḥ // VamP_15.67 //
analyzed: jagāma ca utpatya puram svakīyam muhur muhur dharmam avekṣamāṇaḥ
