original: samhūyābravīt sarvān rākṣasān dhārmikaṃ vacaḥ // VamP_16.1 //
analyzed: samhūya abravīt sarvān rākṣasān dhārmikam vacaḥ
ahiṃsā satyam asteyam śaucam indriya saṃyamaḥ

original: dānaṃ dayā ca kṣāntiśva brahmacaryamamānitā // VamP_16.2 //
analyzed: dānam dayā ca brahmacaryam amāni tā

original: śubhā satyā ca madhurā vāṅ nityaṃ satkriyā ratiḥ /
analyzed: śubhā satyā ca madhurā vāc nityam satkriyā ratiḥ
sat ācāra niṣevi tvam para loka pradāyakāḥ
iti ūcuḥ munayaḥ mahyam dharmam ādyam purātanam
sā u ham ājñāpaye sarvān kriyatām avikalpataḥ
pulastyaḥ uvāca
tatas sukeśi vacanāt sarve eva niśācarāḥ
trayodaśa aṅgam te dharma cakruḥ mudita mānasāḥ
tatas pravṛddhim sutarām agacchanta niśācarāḥ
putra pautra artha saṃyuktāḥ sa dāṭāra samanvitāḥ
tat jayotiḥ tejaḥ teṣām mahātmanām

original: gantuṃ nāśaktuvan sūryo nakṣatrāṇi na candramāḥ // VamP_16.7 //
analyzed: gantum na aśaktuvan sūryaḥ nakṣatrāṇi na candramāḥ
tatas tribhuvane brahman niśācara puraḥ bhavat

original: divā candrasya sadṛśaḥ kṣaṇadāyāṃ ca sūryavat // VamP_16.8 //
analyzed: divā candrasya sadṛśaḥ kṣaṇadāyām ca sūrya vat
na jñāyate gatiḥ vyomni bhāskarasya tatas mbare
śaśaṅkam iti tejaḥ tvāt amanyanta pura uttamam
svam vikāsam vimuñcanti niśām iti vyacintayan
kamala ākareṣu kamalā mitram iti avagamya hi

original: rātrau vikasitā brahman vibhūtiṃ dātumīpsavaḥ // VamP_16.10 //
analyzed: rātrau vikasitāḥ brahman vibhūtim dātum īpsavaḥ
kauśikāḥ rātri samayam buddhvā niragaman kila

original: tān vāyasāstadā jñātvā divā nighnanti kauśikān // VamP_16.11 //
analyzed: tān vāyasāḥ tadā jñātvā divā nighnanti kauśikān
snātakāḥ tu āpagāsu eva snāna japya parāyaṇāḥ
ā kaṇṭha magnāḥ tiṣṭhanti rātrau jñātvā atha vāsaram

original: na vyayujyanta cakraāśca tadā vai puradarśane /
analyzed: na vyayujyanta cakraāḥ ca tadā vai pura darśane
manmānāḥ tu divasam idam uccais bruvanti ca
nūnam kāntā vihīnena kenacid cakra pattriṇā

original: utsṛṣṭaṃ jīvitaṃ śūnye phūtkṛtya saritastaṭe // VamP_16.14 //
analyzed: utsṛṣṭam jīvitam śūnye phūtkṛtya saritaḥ taṭe
tatas nu kṛpayā āviṣṭaḥ vivasvān tīvra raśmibhiḥ
saṃtāpayan jagat sarvam na astam eti kathañcana

original: anye vadanti cakraāhvo nṛnaṃ kaścin mṛto bhavet /
analyzed: anye vadanti cakraāhvaḥ kaścid mṛtaḥ bhavet
tat kāntayā tapaḥ taptam bhartṛ śoka ārttayā bata
ārādhitaḥ tu bhagavān tapasā vai divākaraḥ
tena asau śaśi nirjetā na astam eti raviḥ dhruvam
yajvinaḥ homaśālāsu saha ṛtvigbhiḥ adhvare
prāvarttayanta karmāṇi rātrau api mahā mune
mahā bhāgavatāḥ pūjām viṣṇoḥ kurvanti bhaktitaḥ

original: ravau śaśini caivānye brahmaṇo 'nye harasya ca // VamP_16.19 //
analyzed: ravau śaśini ca eva anye brahmaṇaḥ nye harasya ca
kāminaḥ ca api amanyanta sādhu candramasā kṛtam

original: yadiyaṃ rajanī ramyā kṛtā satatakaumudī // VamP_16.20 //
analyzed: yat iyam rajanī ramyā kṛtā satata kaumudī
anye bruvan loka guruḥ asmābhiḥ cakrabhṛt vaśī
nirvyājena mahā gandhaiḥ arcitaḥ kusumaiḥ śubhaiḥ
saha lakṣmyā mahā yogī nabhasi ādi caturṣu api
a śūnyaśayanā nāma dvitīyā sarva kāma dā
tena asau bhagavān prītaḥ prādāt śayanam uttamam
a śūnyam ca mahā bhogaiḥ an astamita śekharam
anaye bruvan dhruvam devyāḥ rohiṇyāḥ śaśinaḥ kṣayam

original: dṛṣṭvā taptaṃ tapo ghoraṃ rudrārādhanakāmyayā // VamP_16.24 //
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā taptam tapaḥ ghoram rudra ārādhana kāmyayā
puṇyāyām akṣayāṣṭamyām veda ukta vidhinā svayam

original: tuṣṭena śaṃbhunā dattaṃ varaṃ cāsyai yadṛcchayā // VamP_16.25 //
analyzed: tuṣṭena śaṃbhunā dattam varam ca asyai yadṛcchayā
anye bruvan candramasā dhruvam ārādhitaḥ hariḥ

original: vrateneha tvakhaṇḍena tenākhaṇḍaḥ śaśī divi // VamP_16.26 //
analyzed: vratena iha tu akhaṇḍena tena akhaṇḍaḥ śaśī divi
anye bravan śaśāṅkena dhruvam rakṣā kṛtātmanaḥ
pada dvayam samabhyarcya viṣṇoḥ amita tejasaḥ
tena asau dīptimān candraḥ paribhūya divākaram
asmākam ānanda karaḥ divā tapati sūrya vat
lakṣyate kāraṇaiḥ anyaiḥ bahubhiḥ satyam eva hi

original: śaśaṅkanirjitaḥ sūryo na vibhāti yathā purā // VamP_16.29 //
analyzed: śaśaṅka nirjitaḥ sūryaḥ na vibhāti yathā purā
yathā amī kamalāḥ ślakṣṇāḥ raṇat bhṛṅgaṇa āvṛtāḥ

original: vikacāḥ pratibhāsante jātaḥ sūryodayo dhruvam // VamP_16.30 //
analyzed: vikacāḥ pratibhāsante jātaḥ sūrya udayaḥ dhruvam
yathā ca amī vibhāsanti vikacāḥ kumuda ākarāḥ

original: ato vijñāyate candra uditaśca pratāpavān // VamP_16.31 //
analyzed: atas vijñāyate candraḥ uditaḥ ca pratāpavān

original: evaṃ saṃbhāṣatāṃ tatra sūryo vākyānī nārada /
analyzed: evam saṃbhāṣatām tatra sūryaḥ vākyānī nārada

original: amanyata kimetaddhi loko vakti śubhāśubham // VamP_16.32 //
analyzed: amanyata kim etat hi lokaḥ vakti śubha aśubham

original: evaṃ saṃcintya bhagavān dadhyau dhyānaṃ divākaraḥ /
analyzed: evam saṃcintya bhagavān dadhyau dhyānam divākaraḥ
āsamantāt jagat grastam trailokyam rajanīcaraiḥ
tatas tu bhagavān jñātvā te ajasaḥ pi a sahiṣṇu tām
niśācarasya vṛddhim tām acintayata yoga vid
tatas jñāsīt ca tān sarvān sat ācāra ratān śucīn
deva brāhmaṇa pūjāsu saṃsaktān dharma saṃyutān
tatas tu rakṣaḥ kṣaya kṛt timira dvipa kesarī
mahā aṃśu nakharaḥ sūryaḥ tad vighātam acintayat
jñātavān ca tatas chidram rākṣasānām divaspatiḥ
svadharma vicyutiḥ nāma sarva dharma vighāta kṛt
tatas krodha abhibhūtena bhānunā ripu bhedibhiḥ

original: bhānubhī rākṣasapuraṃ tad dṛṣṭaṃ ca yathaicchayā // VamP_16.38 //
analyzed: bhānubhiḥ rākṣasa puram tat dṛṣṭam ca yathā aicchayā

original: sa bhānunā tadā dṛṣṭaḥ krodhādhmātena catruṣā /
analyzed: sa bhānunā tadā dṛṣṭaḥ krodha ādhmātena catruṣā

original: nipapātāmbarād bhraṣṭaḥ kṣīṇapuṇya iva grahaḥ // VamP_16.39 //
analyzed: nipapāta ambarāt bhraṣṭaḥ kṣīṇa puṇyaḥ iva grahaḥ
patamānam samālokya puram śāla kaṭaṅkaṭaḥ
namaḥ bhavāya śarvāya idam uccais udīrayat
tam ākranditam ākarṇya cāraṇāḥ gaganecarāḥ

original: hā deti cukruśuḥ sarve harabhaktaḥ patatyasau // VamP_16.41 //
analyzed: hā dā iti cukruśuḥ sarve hara bhaktaḥ patati asau
tat cāraṇa vacaḥ śarvaḥ śrutavān sarva gaḥ vyayaḥ

original: śrutvā saṃcintayāmāsa kenāsau pātyate bhuvi // VamP_16.42 //
analyzed: śrutvā saṃcintayāmāsa kena asau pātyate bhuvi
jñātavān devapatinā sahasrakiraṇena tat
pātitam rākṣasa puram tatas kruddhaḥ trilocanaḥ
kruddhaḥ tu bhagavantam tam bhānumantam apaśyata
dṛṣṭa mātraḥ triṇetreṇa nipapāta tatas mabarāt
gaganāt sa paribhraṣṭaḥ pathi vāyu niṣevite
yadṛcchayā nipatitaḥ yantra muktaḥ yathā upalaḥ
tatas vāyu pathāt muktaḥ kiṃśuka ujjvala vigrahaḥ
nipapāta antarikṣāt sa vṛtaḥ kinnara cāraṇaiḥ
cāraṇeḥ veṣṭitaḥ bhānuḥ pravibhāti ambarāt patan

original: arddhapakvaṃ yathā tālāt phalaṃ kapibhirāvṛtam // VamP_16.47 //
analyzed: arddha pakvam yathā tālāt phalam kapibhiḥ āvṛtam
tatas tu ṛṣayaḥ bhyetya pratyūcuḥ bhānumālinam
nipatasva hari kṣetre yadi śreyaḥ bhivāñchasi
tatas vravīt patan eva vivasvān tān tapodhanān

original: kiṃ tat kṣetraṃ hareḥ puṇyaṃ vadadhvaṃ śīghrameva me // VamP_16.49 //
analyzed: kim tat kṣetram hareḥ puṇyam vadadhvam śīghram eva me
tam ūcuḥ munayaḥ sūryam śṛṇu kṣetram mahā phalam

original: sāmprataṃ vāsudevasya bhāvi tacchaṅkarasya ca // VamP_16.50 //
analyzed: sāmpratam vāsudevasya bhāvi tat śaṅkarasya ca
yoga śāyinam ārabhya yāvat keśava darśanam

original: etat kṣetraṃ hareḥ puṇyaṃ nāmnā vārāṇasī purī // VamP_16.51 //
analyzed: etat kṣetram hareḥ puṇyam nāmnā vārāṇasī purī
tat śrutvā bhagavān bhānuḥ bhava netra agni tāpitaḥ
varaṇāyāḥ tathā eva asyāḥ tu antare nipapāta ha

original: tataḥ pradahyati tanau nimajyāsyāṃ lulad raviḥ /
analyzed: tatas pradahyati tanau nimajjya asyām lulat raviḥ
varaṇāyām samabhyetya nyamajjata yathā icchayā
bhuyaḥ sim varaṇām bhūyas bhūyas pi varaṇām asim
lulan trinetra vahni ārttaḥ bhramate lāta cakra vat
etasmin antare brahman ṛṣayaḥ yakṣa rākṣasāḥ
nāgāḥ vidyādharāḥ ca api pakṣiṇaḥ psarasaḥ tathā
yāvantaḥ bhāskara rathe bhūta preta ādayaḥ sthitāḥ

original: tāvanto brahmasadanaṃ gatā vedayituṃ mune // VamP_16.56 //
analyzed: tāvantaḥ brahma sadanam gatāḥ vedayitum mune

original: tato brahma surapatiḥ suraiḥ sārdha samabhyagātaṭ /
analyzed: tatas brahma surapatiḥ suraiḥ sārdha
ramyam maheśvara āvāsam mandaram ravi kāraṇāt

original: gatvā dṛṣṭvā ca deveśaṃ śaṅkaraṃ śūlapāṇinam /
analyzed: gatvā dṛṣṭvā ca deveśam śaṅkaram śūlapāṇinam
prasādya bhāskara arthāya vārāṇasyām upānayat
tatas divākaram bhūyas pāṇinā ādāya śaṅkaraḥ

original: kṛtvā nāmāsya loleti rathamāropayat punaḥ // VamP_16.59 //
analyzed: kṛtvā nāma asya lolā iti ratham āropayat punar
āropite dinakare brahmā abhyetya sukeśinam
sa bāndhavam sa nagaram punar āropayat divi

original: samāropya sukeśiṃ ca pariṣvajya ca śaṅkaram /
analyzed: samāropya sukeśim ca pariṣvajya ca śaṅkaram

original: praṇamya keśavaṃ devaṃ vairājaṃ svagṛhaṃ gataḥ // VamP_16.61 //
analyzed: praṇamya keśavam devam vairājam sva gṛham gataḥ

original: evaṃ purā nārada bhāskareṇa puraṃ sukeśerbhuvi sannipātitam /
analyzed: evam purā nārada bhāskareṇa puram sukeśeḥ bhuvi sannipātitam

original: divākaro bhūmitale bhavena kṣiptastu dṛṣṭyā na ca saṃpradagdhaḥ // VamP_16.62 //
analyzed: divākaraḥ bhūmi tale bhavena kṣiptaḥ tu dṛṣṭyā na ca saṃpradagdhaḥ

original: āropito bhṛmitalād bhavena bhūyo 'pi bhānuḥ pratibhāsanāya /
analyzed: āropitaḥ bhṛmi talāt bhavena bhūyas u pi bhānuḥ pratibhāsanāya

original: svayaṃbhuvā cāpi niśācarendras tvāropitaḥ khe sapuraḥ sabandhuḥ // VamP_16.63 //
analyzed: svayaṃbhuvā ca api niśācara indraḥ tu āropitaḥ khe sa puraḥ sa bandhuḥ
iti śrī vāmanapurāṇe ṣoḍaśaḥ dhyāyaḥ
nāradaḥ uvāca

original: yānetān bhagavān prāha kāmibhiḥ śaśinaṃ prati /
analyzed: yān etān bhagavān prāha kāmibhiḥ śaśinam prati

original: ārādhanāya devābhyāṃ harīśābhyāṃ vadasva tān // VamP_17.1 //
analyzed: ārādhanāya devābhyām hari īśābhyām vadasva tān
pulastyaḥ uvāca

original: śṛṇuṣva kāmibhiḥ proktān vratān puṇyān kalipriya /
analyzed: śṛṇuṣva kāmibhiḥ proktān vratān puṇyān kalipriya

original: ārādhanāya śarvasya keśavasya ca dhīmataḥ // VamP_17.2 //
analyzed: ārādhanāya śarvasya keśavasya ca dhīmataḥ
yadā tu āṣāḍhī saṃyāti vrajate ca uttarāyaṇam

original: tadā svapiti deveśo bhogibhoge śriyaḥ patiḥ // VamP_17.3 //
analyzed: tadā svapiti deveśaḥ bhogi bhoge śriyaḥ patiḥ
pratisupte vibhau tasmin deva gandharva guhyakāḥ
devānām mātaraḥ ca api prasuptāḥ ca api anukramāt
nāradaḥ uvāca
kathayasva kura ādīnām śayane vidhim uttamam
sarvam anukrameṇa eva puraskṛtya janārdanam
pulastyaḥ uvāca
mithuna abhigate sūrye śukla pakṣe tapodhana
ekādaśyām jagatsvāmī śayanam parikalpayet
śeṣa ahi bhoga paryaṅkam kṛtvā saṃpūjya keśavam

original: kṛtvopavītakaṃ caiva samyaksaṃpūjya vai dvijān // VamP_17.7 //
analyzed: kṛtvā upavītakam ca eva samyak saṃpūjya vai dvijān
anujñānam brāhmaṇebhyaḥ ca dvādaśyām prayataḥ śuciḥ

original: labdhvā pītāmbaradharaḥ svasti nidrāṃ samānayet // VamP_17.8 //
analyzed: labdhvā pīta ambara dharaḥ svasti nidrām samānayet

original: trayodaśyāṃ tataḥ kāmaḥ svapate śayane śubhe /
analyzed: trayodaśyām tatas kāmaḥ svapate śayane śubhe
kadambānām sugandhānām kusumaiḥ parikalpite
caturdaśyām tatas yakṣāḥ svapanti sukha śītale
sauvarṇa paṅkaja kṛte sukha āstīrṇa upadhānake
paurmamāsyām umānāthaḥ svapate carma saṃstare
vaiyāghre ca jaṭā bhāram samudgranthya anya carmaṇā

original: tato divākaro rāśiṃ saṃprayāti ca karkaṭam /
analyzed: tatas divākaraḥ rāśim saṃprayāti ca karkaṭam
tatas marāṇām rajanī bhavate dakṣiṇāyanam
brahmā pratipadi tathā nīlotpala maye nagha

original: talpe svapiti lokānāṃ darśayan mārgamuttamam // VamP_17.13 //
analyzed: talpe svapiti lokānām darśayan mārgam uttamam
viśvakarmā dvitīyāyām tṛtīyāyām gireḥ sutā
vināyakaḥ curthyā tu pañcamyām api dharmarāj
ṣaṣṭhyām skandaḥ prasvapiti saptamyām bhagavān raviḥ
kātyāyanī tathā aṣṭamyām navamyām kamalālayā
daśamyām bhujaga indrāḥ ca svapante vāyu bhojanāḥ

original: ekādaśyāṃ tu kṛṣṇāyāṃ sādhyā brahman svapanti ca // VamP_17.16 //
analyzed: ekādaśyām tu kṛṣṇāyām sādhyāḥ brahman svapanti ca

original: eṣa kramaste gadito nabhādau svapane mune /
analyzed: eṣa kramaḥ te gaditaḥ nabha ādau svapane mune

original: svapatsu tatra deveṣu prāvṛṭkālaḥ samāyayau // VamP_17.17 //
analyzed: svapatsu tatra deveṣu prāvṛṣ kālaḥ samāyayau
kaṅkāḥ samam balākābhiḥ ārohanti naga uttamān
vāyasāḥ ca api survanti nīḍāni ṛṣi puṅgava
vāyasāḥ ca svapanti ete ṛtau garbha bhara alasāḥ
yasyām tithyām prasvapiti viśvakarmā prajāpatiḥ

original: dvitīyā sā śubhā puṇyā aśūnyaśayanoditā // VamP_17.19 //
analyzed: dvitīyā sā śubhā puṇyā a śūnya śayana uditā
tasyām tithau arcya harim śrīvatsa aṅkam caturbhujam
paryaṅka stham samam lakṣmyā gandha puṣpa ādibhiḥ mune

original: tato devāya śayyāyāṃ phalāni prakṣipet kramāt /
analyzed: tatas devāya śayyāyām phalāni prakṣipet kramāt
surabhīṇī nivedya ittham vijñāpyaḥ madhusūdanaḥ

original: yathā hi lakṣmyā na viyujyase tvaṃ trivikramānanta jagannivāsa /
analyzed: yathā hi lakṣmyāḥ na viyujyase tvam trivikrama ananta jagannivāsa

original: tathāstvaśūnyaṃ śayanaṃ sadaiva asmākameveha tava prasādāt // VamP_17.22 //
analyzed: tathā astu a śūnyam śayanam sadā eva asmākam eva iha tava prasādāt

original: yathā tvaśūnyaṃ tava deva talpaṃ samaṃ hi lakṣmyā varadācyuteśa /
analyzed: yathā tva śūnyam tava deva talpam samam hi lakṣmyā vara da acyuta īśa

original: satyena tenāmitavīrya viṣṇo gārhasthyanāśo mama nāstu deva // VamP_17.23 //
analyzed: satyena tena amita vīrya viṣṇo gārhasthya nāśaḥ mama nā astu deva

original: ityuccārya praṇamyeśaṃ prasādya ca punaḥ punaḥ /
analyzed: iti uccārya praṇamya īśam prasādya ca punar punar
bhuñjīta deva ṛṣe taila kṣāra vivarjita maṭ
dvitīye hni dvijāgryāya phalān dadyāt vicakṣaṇaḥ

original: lakṣmīdharaḥ prīyatāṃ me ityuccārya nivedayet // VamP_17.25 //
analyzed: lakṣmīdharaḥ prīyatām me iti uccārya nivedayet
anena tu vidhānena cāturmāsya vratam caret
yāvat ca vṛścika rāśi sthaḥ pratibhāti divākaraḥ

original: tato vibudhyanti surāḥ kramaśaḥ kramaśo mune /
analyzed: tatas vibudhyanti surāḥ kramaśas kramaśas mune

original: tulāsther'ke hariḥ kāmaḥ śivaḥ paścādvibudhyate // VamP_17.27 //
analyzed: tulā stha irke hariḥ kāmaḥ śivaḥ paścāt vibudhyate
tatra dānam dvitīyāyām mūrttiḥ lakṣmīdharasya tu
sa śayyā āstaraṇa upetā yathā vibhavam ātmanaḥ
eṣa vrataḥ tu prathamaḥ proktaḥ tava mahā mune

original: yasmiṃś cīrṇe viyogastu na bhavediha kasyacit // VamP_17.29 //
analyzed: yasmin cīrṇe viyogaḥ tu na bhavet iha kasyacid

original: nabhasye māsi ca tathā yā syātkṛṣṇāṣṭamī śubhā /
analyzed: nabhasye māsi ca tathā yā syāt kṛṣṇāṣṭamī śubhā

original: yuktā mṛgaśireṇaiva sā tu kālāṣṭamī smṛtā // VamP_17.30 //
analyzed: yuktā mṛgaśireṇa eva sā tu kālāṣṭamī smṛtā

original: tasyāṃ sarveṣu liṅgeṣu tithau svapiti śaṅkaraḥ /
analyzed: tasyām sarveṣu liṅgeṣu tithau svapiti śaṅkaraḥ

original: vasate saṃnidhāne tu tatra pūjākṣayā smṛtā // VamP_17.31 //
analyzed: vasate saṃnidhāne tu tatra pūjā akṣayā smṛtā

original: tatra snāyīna vai vidvān gomūtreṇa jalena ca /
analyzed: tatra vai vidvān go mūtreṇa jalena ca
snātaḥ saṃpūjayet puṣpaiḥ dhattūrasya trilocanam
dhūpam kesara niryāsam naivedyam madhu sarpiṣī
prīyatām me virūpākṣaḥ tu iti uccārya ca dakṣiṇām
viprāya dadyāt naivedyam sa hiraṇyam dvijottama
tadvat āśvayuje māsi upavāsī jita indriyaḥ
navamyām gomaya snānam kuryāt pūjām tu paṅkajaiḥ
dhūpayet sarjaniryāsam naivedyam madhu modakaiḥ
kṛta upavāsaḥ te aṣṭamyām navamyām snānam ācaret

original: prīyatāṃ me hiraṇyākṣo dakṣiṇā satilā smṛtā // VamP_17.35 //
analyzed: prīyatām me hiraṇyākṣaḥ dakṣiṇā sa tilā smṛtā
kārttike payasā snānam karavīreṇa ca arcanam
dhupam śrīvāsa niryāsam naivedyam madhu pāyasam
sa naivedyam ca rajatam dātavyam dānam agraje
prīyatām gavān sthāsuḥ iti vācyam aniṣṭhuram
kṛtvā upavāsam aṣṭamyām navamyām snānam ācaret

original: māsi mārgaśire snānaṃ dadhnārcā bhadrayā smṛtā // VamP_17.38 //
analyzed: māsi mārgaśire snānam dadhnā arcā bhadrayā smṛtā
dhūpam śrīvṛkṣa niryāsam naivedyam madhu nodanam
saṃnivedyā raktaśāliḥ dakṣiṇā parikīrttitā

original: namo 'stu prīyatāṃ śarvastviti vācyaṃ ca paṇḍitaiḥ // VamP_17.39 //
analyzed: namaḥ stu prīyatām śarvaḥ tu iti vācyam ca paṇḍitaiḥ

original: pauṣe snānaṃ ca haviṣā pūjā syāttagaraiḥ subhaiḥ /
analyzed: pauṣe snānam ca haviṣā pūjā syāt tagaraiḥ subhaiḥ

original: dhūpo madhukaniryāso naivedyaṃ madhu śaṣkulī // VamP_17.40 //
analyzed: dhūpaḥ madhuka niryāsaḥ naivedyam madhu śaṣkulī
samudgāḥ dakṣiṇā proktā jagadguroḥ

original: vācyaṃ namaste deveśa tryambaketi prakīrtayet // VamP_17.41 //
analyzed: vācyam namaḥ te deveśa tryambaka iti prakīrtayet
māghe kuśa udaka snānam mṛgamadena ca arcyanam
dhūpaḥ padamba niryāsaḥ naivedyam sa tila udanam
payaḥ bhaktam sa naivedyam sa rukmam pratipādayet
prīyatām me mahādevaḥ umāpatiḥ iti īrayet
evam eva samuddiṣṭam ṣaḍbhiḥ māsaiḥ tu pāraṇam
pāraṇa ante trinetrasya snapanam kārayet kramāt

original: gorocanāyāḥ sahitā guḍena devaṃ samālabhya ca pūjayeta /
analyzed: gorocanāyāḥ sahitā guḍena devam samālabhya ca pūjayeta

original: prīyasva dīno 'smi bhavantamīśa macchokanāśaṃ prakuruṣva yogyam // VamP_17.45 //
analyzed: prīyasva dīno smi bhavantam īśa mad śoka nāśam prakuruṣva yogyam
tatas tu phālgune māsim kṛṣṇa aṣṭamyām yata vrata
upavāsam samudītam kartavyam dvijasattama
dvitīye hni tatas snānam pañcagavyena kārayet
pūjayet kunda kusumaiḥ dhūpayet candanam tu api
naivedyam sa ghṛtam dadyāt tāmra pātre guḍodanam
dakṣiṇām ca dvijātibhyaḥ naivedya sahitām mune
vāsaḥ yugam prīṇayet ca rudram uccārya nāmataḥ
caitre ca udumbara phalaiḥ snānam mandāraka arcanam

original: gugguluṃ mahiṣākhyaṃ ca ghṛtāktaṃ dhūpayed budhaḥ // VamP_17.49 //
analyzed: ca     dhūpayet
samodakam tathā sarpiḥ prīṇanam vinivedayet
dakṣiṇā ca sa naivedyam sṛk ājinam udāhṛtam
nāṭya īśvara namaḥ te stu idam uccārya nārada
prīṇanam devanāthāya kuryāt śraddhā samanvitaḥ
vaiśākhe snānam uditam su gandha kusuma ambhasā
pūjanam śaṅkarasya uktam cūta mañjaribhiḥ vibho

original: dhūpaṃ sarjājyayuktaṃ ca naivedyaṃ saphalaṃ ghṛtam /
analyzed: dhūpam sarja ājya yuktam ca naivedyam sa phalam ghṛtam
nāma japyam api īśasya kālaghna iti vipaścitā
jala kumbhān sa naivedyān brāhmaṇāya nivedayet
sa upavītān saha annādyān tad cittaiḥ tad parāyaṇaiḥ
jyeṣṭhe snānam ca āmalakaiḥ pūjā arka kusumaiḥ tathā
dhūpayet tat trinetram ca āyatyām puṣṭi kārakam
saktūn ca sa ghṛtān deve dadhnā aktān vinivedayet

original: upānadyagalaṃ chatraṃ dānaṃ dadyācca bhaktimān // VamP_17.56 //
analyzed: upānadya galam chatram dānam dadyāt ca bhaktimān
namaḥ te bhaga netra ghna pūṣṇaḥ daśana nāśana
idam uccārayet bhaktyā prīṇanāya jagatpateḥ
āṣāḍhe snānam uditam śrīphalaiḥ arcanam tathā
dhattūra kusumaiḥ śuklaiḥ dhūpayet silhakam tathā

original: naivedyāḥ saghṛtāḥ pūpāḥ dakṣiṇā saghṛtā yavāḥ /
analyzed: naivedyāḥ sa ghṛtāḥ pūpāḥ dakṣiṇā sa ghṛtāḥ yavāḥ
namaḥ te dakṣa yajña ghne idam uccais udīrayet
śrāvaṇe mṛga bhojyena snānam kṛtvā arcayet haram
śrīvṛkṣa patraḥ sa phalaiḥ dhūpam dadyāt tathā agurum

original: naivedyaṃ saghṛtaṃ dadyāt dadhi pūpān samodakān /
analyzed: naivedyam sa ghṛtam dadyāt dadhi pūpān samodakān
dadhi odanam sa kṛsaram māṣa dhānāḥ sa śaṣkulīḥ

original: dakṣiṇāṃ śvetavṛṣabhaṃ dhenuṃ ca kapilāṃ śubhām /
analyzed: dakṣiṇām śveta vṛṣabham dhenum ca kapilām śubhām
kanakam rakka vasanam pradadyāt brāhmaṇāya hi

original: gaṅgādhareti japtavyaṃ nāma śaṃbhośca paṇḍitaiḥ // VamP_17.62 //
analyzed: gaṅgādhara iti japtavyam nāma śaṃbhoḥ ca paṇḍitaiḥ
amībhiḥ ṣaḍbhiḥ aparaiḥ māsaiḥ pāraṇam uttamam
evam saṃvatsaram pūrṇam saṃpūjya ṣabhadhvajam

original: akṣayān labhate kāmān maheśvaravaco yathā // VamP_17.63 //
analyzed: akṣayān labhate kāmān maheśvara vacaḥ yathā
idam uktam vratam puṇyam sarva akṣaya karam śubham

original: svayaṃ rudraṇa devarṣe tattathā na tadanyathā // VamP_17.64 //
analyzed: svayam deva ṛṣe tat tathā na tat anyathā
iti śrī vāmanapurāṇe saptadaśaḥ dhyāyaḥ
pulastyaḥ uvāca

original: māsi cāśvayuje brahman yadā padmaṃ jagatpateḥ /
analyzed: māsi ca āśvayuje brahman yadā padmam jagatpateḥ

original: nābhyā niryāti hi tadā deveṣvetānyatho 'bhavan // VamP_18.1 //
analyzed: nābhyāḥ niryāti hi tadā deveṣu etāni atha u bhavan
kandarpasya kara agre tu kadambaḥ cāru darśanaḥ

original: tena tasya parā prītiḥ kadambena vivarddhate // VamP_18.2 //
analyzed: tena tasya parā prītiḥ kadambena vivarddhate
yakṣāṇām adhipasya api maṇibhadrasya nārada

original: vaṭavṛkṣaḥ samabhavat tasmistasya yatiḥ sadā // VamP_18.3 //
analyzed: vaṭa vṛkṣaḥ samabhavat tasmin tasya yatiḥ sadā
maheśvarasya hṛdaye dhattūra viṭapaḥ śubhaḥ

original: saṃjātaḥ sa ca śarvasya patikṛt tasya nityaśaḥ // VamP_18.4 //
analyzed: saṃjātaḥ sa ca śarvasya pati kṛt tasya nityaśas
brahmaṇaḥ madhyatas dehān jātaḥ marakata prabhaḥ
daraḥ kaṇṭakī śreyān abhavat viśvakarmaṇaḥ
girijāyāḥ kara tale kunda sulmaḥ tu ajāyata
gaṇādhipasya kumbha sthaḥ rājate sindhuvārakaḥ
yamasya kṣiṇe pārśve pālāśaḥ dakṣiṇa uttare
skandasya bandhujīvaḥ tu raveḥ aśvatthaḥ eva ca
śamījātā bilvaḥ lakṣmāyāḥ kare bhavat
nāgānām pataye brahman śarastambaḥ vyajāyata

original: vāsukervistṛte pucche pṛṣṭhe dūrvā sitāsitā // VamP_18.9 //
analyzed: vāsukeḥ vistṛte pucche pṛṣṭhe dūrvā sitā asitā
sādhyānām hṛdaye jātaḥ vṛkṣaḥ harita candanaḥ

original: evaṃ jāteṣu sarveṣu tena tat ratirbhavet // VamP_18.10 //
analyzed: evam jāteṣu sarveṣu tena tat ratiḥ bhavet

original: tatra ramye śubhe kāle yā śuklaikādaśī bhavet /
analyzed: tatra ramye śubhe kāle yā śukla ekādaśī bhavet

original: tasyāṃ saṃpūjayed viṣṇuṃ tena khaṇḍo 'sya pūryate // VamP_18.11 //
analyzed: tasyām saṃpūjayet viṣṇum tena khaṇḍaḥ sya pūryate
puṣṣaiḥ putraiḥ phalaiḥ vā api
oṣadhībhiḥ ca mukhyābhiḥ yāvat syāt śarad āgamaḥ
ghṛtam tilāḥ brīhi yavāḥ hiraṇya kanka ādi yat
maṇi muktā pravālāni vastrāṇi vividhāni ca
rasāni svādu kaṭu amla kaṣāya lavaṇāni ca

original: tiktāni ca nivedyāni tānyakhaṇḍāni yāni hi // VamP_18.14 //
analyzed: tiktāni ca nivedyāni tāni akhaṇḍāni yāni hi
tad pūjā artham pradātavyam keśavāya mahātmane

original: yadā saṃvatsaraṃ pūrṇamakhaṇḍaṃ bhavate gṛhe // VamP_18.15 //
analyzed: yadā saṃvatsaram pūrṇam akhaṇḍam bhavate gṛhe
kṛta upavāsaḥ deva ṛṣe dvitīye hani saṃyataḥ

original: snānena tena snāyīta yenākhaṇḍaṃ hi vatsaram // VamP_18.16 //
analyzed: snānena tena snāyīta yena akhaṇḍam hi vatsaram
siddha ārtakaiḥ tilaiḥ vā api tena eva udvartanam smṛtam
haviṣā padmanābhasya snānam eva samācaret

original: home tadeva gaditaṃ dāne śaktirnijā dvija // VamP_18.17 //
analyzed: home tat eva gaditam dāne śaktiḥ nijā dvija
pūjayeta atha kusumaiḥ pādāt ārabhya keśavam

original: dhūpayed vividhaṃ dhūpaṃ yena syād vatsaraṃ param // VamP_18.18 //
analyzed: dhūpayet vividham dhūpam yena syāt vatsaram param
hiraṇya ratna vāsobhiḥ pūjayeta jagat gurum
rāga khāṇḍa va coṣyāṇi haviṣyāṇi nivedayet

original: tataḥ saṃpūjya deveśaṃ padmanābhaṃ jagad gurum /
analyzed: tatas saṃpūjya deveśam padmanābham jagat gurum
vijñāpayet muni śreṣṭha mantreṇa anena suvrata
namaḥ stu te padmanābha padmādhava mahā dyute
dharma artha kāma mokṣaṇi tu akhaṇḍāni bhavantu me
vikāsi padma patra akṣa yathā ākhaṇḍaḥ asi sarvatas

original: tena satyena dharmādya akhaṇḍāḥ santu keśava // VamP_18.22 //
analyzed: tena satyena dharma ādya akhaṇḍāḥ santu keśava
evam saṃvatsaram pūrṇam sa upavāsaḥ jita indriyaḥ

original: aghaṇḍaṃ pārayed brahman vrataṃ vai sarvavastuṣu // VamP_18.23 //
analyzed: aghaṇḍam pārayet brahman vratam vai sarva vastuṣu
asmin cīrṇe vratam vyaktam parituṣyanti devatāḥ
dharma artha kāma mokṣa ādyāḥ tu akṣayāḥ saṃbhavanti hi
etāni te mayā uktāni vratāni uktāni kāmibhiḥ
prakṣyāmi adhunā tu etat vaiṣṇavam pañjaram śubham

original: namo namaste govinda cakraṃ gṛhya sudarśanam /
analyzed: namaḥ namaḥ te govinda cakram gṛhya sudarśanam

original: prācyāṃ rakṣasva māṃ viṣṇo tvāmāhaṃ śaraṇaṃ gataḥ // VamP_18.26 //
analyzed: prācyām rakṣasva mām viṣṇo tvām ā aham śaraṇam gataḥ
gadām kaumodakīm gṛhya padmanābha amita dyute

original: yāmyāṃ rakṣasva māṃ viṣṇo tvamāhaṃ śaraṇaṃ gataḥ // VamP_18.27 //
analyzed: yāmyām rakṣasva mām viṣṇo tvam ā aham śaraṇam gataḥ
halam ādāya saunandam namaḥ te puraṣa uttama

original: pratīcyāṃ rakṣa me viṣṇo bhavantaṃ śaraṇaṃ gataḥ // VamP_18.28 //
analyzed: pratīcyām rakṣa me viṣṇo bhavantam śaraṇam gataḥ

original: musalaṃ śātanaṃ gṛhya puṇḍarīkākṣa rakṣa māma /
analyzed: musalam śātanam gṛhya puṇḍarīkākṣa rakṣa māma

original: uttarasyāṃ jagannātha bhavantaṃ śaraṇaṃ gataḥ // VamP_18.29 //
analyzed: uttarasyām jagannātha bhavantam śaraṇam gataḥ
śārṅgam ādāya ca dhanuḥ astram nārāyaṇam hare

original: namaste rakṣa rakṣaghna aiśānyāṃ śaraṇaṃ gataḥ // VamP_18.30 //
analyzed: namaḥ te rakṣa rakṣa ghna aiśānyām śaraṇam gataḥ
pāñcajanyam mahā śaṅkham antar bodhyam ca paṅkajam

original: pragṛhay rakṣa māṃ viṣṇo āgneyyāṃ yajñasūkara // VamP_18.31 //
analyzed: pragṛhay rakṣa mām viṣṇo āgneyyām yajña sū kara

original: carma sūryaśataṃ gṛhya khaṅgaṃ candramasaṃ tathā /
analyzed: carma sūrya śatam gṛhya khaṅgam candramasam tathā

original: nairṛtyāṃ māṃ ca rakṣasva divyamūrte nṛkesarin // VamP_18.32 //
analyzed: nairṛtyām mām ca rakṣasva divya mūrte nṛ kesarin
vaijayantīm pragṛhya tvam śrīvatsam kaṇṭha bhūṣaṇam

original: vāyavyāṃ rakṣa māṃ deva aśvaśīrṣa namo 'stu te // VamP_18.33 //
analyzed: vāyavyām rakṣa mām deva aśva śīrṣa namaḥ stu te
vainateyam samāruhya antarikṣe janārdana

original: māṃ tvaṃ rakṣājita sadā namaste tvaparājati // VamP_18.34 //
analyzed: mām tvam rakṣa ajita sadā namaḥ te tu aparājati

original: viśālākṣaṃ samāruhya rakṣa māṃ tvaṃ rasātale /
analyzed: viśāla akṣam samāruhya rakṣa mām tvam rasātale

original: akūpāra namastubhyaṃ mahāmoha namo 'stu te // VamP_18.35 //
analyzed: akūpāra namaḥ tubhyam mahā moha namaḥ stu te
kara śīrṣa aṅghrarveṣu tathā aṣṭa bāhu pañjaram

original: kṛtvā rakṣasva māṃ deva namaste puruṣottama // VamP_18.36 //
analyzed: kṛtvā rakṣasva mām deva namaḥ te puruṣottama
etat uktam bhagavatā vaiṣṇavam pañjaram mahat
purā rakṣā artham īśena kātyāyanyāḥ dvijottama
nāśayāmāsa sā yatra dānavam mahiṣa asuram

original: namaraṃ raktabījaṃ ca tathānyān surakaṇṭakān // VamP_18.38 //
analyzed: namaram raktabījam ca tathā anyān surakaṇṭakān
nāradaḥ uvāca

original: kāsau kātyāyānī nāma yacā jaghne mahiṣāsuram /
analyzed: kā asau kātyāyānī nāma yacā jaghne mahiṣa asuram

original: namaraṃ raktabījaṃ ca tathānyān kurakaṇṭakān // VamP_18.39 //
analyzed: namaram rakta bījam ca tathā anyān kurakaṇṭakān

original: kaścasau mahiṣo nāma kule jātaśca kasya saḥ /
analyzed: kaḥ ca asau mahiṣaḥ nāma kule jātaḥ ca kasya saḥ
kaḥ ca asau raktabīja ākhyaḥ namaraḥ kasya ca ātmajaḥ
etat vistarataḥ tāta yathāvat vaktum arhasiḥ
pulastyaḥ uvāca
śrūyatām saṃpravakṣyāmi kathām pāpa praṇāśinīm

original: sarvadā varadā durgā yeyaṃ kātyāyanī mune // VamP_18.41 //
analyzed: sarva dā vara dā durgā yā iyam kātyāyanī mune
purā asura varau raudrau jagat kṣobha karau ubhau

original: rambhaścaiva karambhaś ca dvāvāstāṃ sumābalau // VamP_18.42 //
analyzed: rambhaḥ ca eva karambhaḥ ca dvau āstām sumā balau
tau aputrau ca deva ṛṣe putra artham tepatuḥ tapaḥ

original: bahūn varṣagaṇān daityau sthitau pañcanade jale // VamP_18.43 //
analyzed: bahūn varṣa gaṇān daityau sthitau pañcanade jale
tatra ekaḥ jala madhya sthaḥ dvitīyaḥ pi agni pañcamī

original: karambhaścaiva rambhaśca yakṣaṃ mālapaṭaṃ prati // VamP_18.44 //
analyzed: karambhaḥ ca eva rambhaḥ ca yakṣam mālapaṭam prati
ekam mimagnam salile grāha rūpeṇa vāsavaḥ
caraṇābhyām samādāya nijaghāna yathā icchayā

original: tato bhrātari naṣṭe ca rambhaḥ kopapariplutaḥ /
analyzed: tatas bhrātari naṣṭe ca rambhaḥ kopa pariplutaḥ

original: vahnau svaśīrṣaṃ saṃkṣidya hotumaiccan mahābalaḥ // VamP_18.46 //
analyzed: vahnau sva śīrṣam saṃkṣidya hotum aiccat mahā balaḥ

original: tataḥ pragṛhya keśeṣu khaṅgaṃ ca ravisaprabham /
analyzed: tatas pragṛhya keśeṣu khaṅgam ca ravi saprabham

original: chettukāmo nijaṃ śīrṣaṃ vahninā pratiṣedhitaḥ // VamP_18.47 //
analyzed: chettu kāmaḥ nijam śīrṣam vahninā pratiṣedhitaḥ
uktaḥ ca mā daitya vara nāśaya ātmānam ātmanā
dustarā para vadhyā api sva vadhyā api ati dustarā
yat ca prārthayase vīra tat dadāmi yathā īpsitam

original: mā mriyasva mṛtasyeha naṣṭā bhavati vai kathā // VamP_18.49 //
analyzed: mā mriyasva mṛtasya iha naṣṭā bhavati vai kathā

original: tato 'bravīd vaco rambho varaṃ cenme dadāsi hi /
analyzed: tatas bravīt vacaḥ rambhaḥ varam ced me dadāsi hi
trailokya vijayī putraḥ syāt me tvad tejasā adhikaḥ
ajeyaḥ daivataiḥ sarvaiḥ pubhiḥ daityaiḥ ca pāvaka
mahā balaḥ vāyuḥ iva kāmarūpī kṛtāstra vid
tam provāca kaviḥ brahman bāñam evam bhaviṣyati

original: yasyāṃ cittaṃ samālambi kariṣyasi tataḥ sutaḥ // VamP_18.52 //
analyzed: yasyām cittam samālambi kariṣyasi tatas sutaḥ
iti evam uktaḥ devena vahninā dānavaḥ yayau

original: draṣṭuṃ mālavaṭaṃ yakṣaṃ yakṣaiśca parivāritam // VamP_18.53 //
analyzed: draṣṭum māla vaṭam yakṣam yakṣaiḥ ca parivāritam
teṣām padma nidhiḥ tatra vasate na anya cetanaḥ
gajaḥ ca mahiṣāḥ ca aśvāḥ gāvaḥ

original: tān dṛṣṭvaiva tadā cakre bhāvaṃ dānavapārthivaḥ /
analyzed: tān dṛṣṭvā eva tadā cakre bhāvam dānava pārthivaḥ
mahiṣyām rūpa yuktāyām trihāyaṇyām tapodhana
sā samāgāt ca daitya aindram kāmayantī tarasvinī

original: sa cāpi gamanaṃ cakre bhavitavyapracoditaḥ // VamP_18.56 //
analyzed: sa ca api gamanam cakre bhavitavya pracoditaḥ
tasyām samabhavat garbhaḥ tām pragṛhya atha dānavaḥ

original: pātālaṃ praviveśātha tataḥ svabhavanaṃ gataḥ // VamP_18.57 //
analyzed: pātālam praviveśa atha tatas sva bhavanam gataḥ
dṛṣṭaḥ ca dānavaiḥ sarvaiḥ parityaktaḥ ca bandhubhiḥ
akārya kāraka iti evam bhṛyaḥ māla vaṭam gataḥ
sā api tena eva patinā mahiṣī cāru darśanā

original: samaṃ jagāma tat puṇyaṃ yakṣamaṇḍalamuttamam // VamP_18.59 //
analyzed: samam jagāma tat puṇyam yakṣa maṇḍalam uttamam

original: tatastu vasatastasya śyāmā sā suṣuve mune /
analyzed: tatas tu vasataḥ tasya śyāmā sā suṣuve mune

original: ajījanat sutaṃ śubhraṃ mahiṣaṃ kāmarūpiṇam // VamP_18.60 //
analyzed: ajījanat sutam śubhram mahiṣam kāmarūpiṇam
etām ṛtumatīm jātām mahiṣaḥ nyaḥ dadarśa ha

original: sā cābhyagād ditivaraṃ rakṣantī śīlamātmanaḥ // VamP_18.61 //
analyzed: sā ca abhyagāt diti varam rakṣantī śīlam ātmanaḥ
tam unnāmita nāsam ca mahiṣam vīkṣya dānavaḥ

original: khaṅga niṣkṛṣya tarasā mahiṣaṃ samupādravat // VamP_18.62 //
analyzed: khaṅga niṣkṛṣya tarasā mahiṣam samupādravat
tena api daityaḥ tīkṣṇābhyām śṛṅgābhyām hṛdi tāḍitaḥ
nirbhinna hṛdayaḥ bhūmau nipapāta mamāra ca

original: 18.63 mṛte bhartari sā śyāmā yakṣāṇāṃ śaraṇaṃ gatā /
analyzed: mṛte bhartari sā śyāmā yakṣāṇām śaraṇam gatā

original: rakṣitā guhyakaiḥ sādhvī nivārya mahiṣaṃ tataḥ // VamP_18.64 //
analyzed: rakṣitā guhyakaiḥ sādhvī nivārya mahiṣam tatas
tatas nivāritaḥ yakṣaiḥ hayāriḥ madana āturaḥ

original: nipapāta saro divyaṃ tato daityai'bhavanmṛtaḥ // VamP_18.65 //
analyzed: nipapāta saraḥ divyam tatas daityaiḥ bhavat mṛtaḥ
namaraḥ nāma vikhyātaḥ mahā bala parākramaḥ

original: yakṣānāśritya tasthau sa kālayan śvāpadān mun // VamP_18.66 //
analyzed: yakṣān āśritya tasthau sa kālayan śvāpadān
sa ca daitya īśvaraḥ yakṣaiḥ mālavaṭa purassaraiḥ

original: citāmāropitaḥ sā ca śyāmā taṃ cāruhat patim // VamP_18.67 //
analyzed: citām āropitaḥ sā ca śyāmā tam ca aruhat patim
tatas gni madhyāt uttasthau puruṣaḥ raudra darśanaḥ

original: vyadrāvayat sa tān yakṣān khaṅgapāṇirbhayaṅkaraḥ // VamP_18.68 //
analyzed: vyadrāvayat sa tān yakṣān khaṅga pāṇiḥ bhayaṅkaraḥ

original: tato hatāstu mahiṣāḥ sarva eva mahātmanā /
analyzed: tatas hatāḥ tu mahiṣāḥ sarve eva mahātmanā

original: ṛte saṃrakṣitāraṃ hi mahiṣaṃ rambhanandanam // VamP_18.69 //
analyzed: ṛte saṃrakṣitāram hi mahiṣam rambha nandanam

original: sa nāmataḥ smṛto daityo raktabījo mahāmun /
analyzed: sa nāmataḥ smṛtaḥ daityaḥ raktabījaḥ
yaḥ jayat sarvatas devān sa indra rudra arka mārutān

original: evaṃ prabhāvā danupuṅgavāste tejo 'dhikastatra babhau hayāriḥ /
analyzed: evam prabhāvāḥ danu puṅgavāḥ te tejaḥ dhikaḥ tatra babhau haya ariḥ
rājye bhiṣiktaḥ ca mahā asura indraiḥ vinirjitaiḥ śambara tāraka ādyaiḥ
a śaknuvadbhiḥ sahitaiḥ ca devaiḥ sa lokapālaiḥ sa hutāśa bhāskaraiḥ

original: sthānāni tyaktāni śaśīndrabhāskarairdharmaśca dūre pratiyojitaśca // VamP_18.72 //
analyzed: sthānāni tyaktāni śaśi indra bhāskaraiḥ dharmaḥ ca dūre pratiyojitaḥ ca
iti śrī vāmanapurāṇe aṣṭādaśaḥ dhyāyaḥ
pulastyaḥ uvāca

original: tatastu devā mahiṣema nirjitāḥ sthānāni saṃtyajya savāhanāyudhāḥ /
analyzed: tatas tu devāḥ nirjitāḥ sthānāni saṃtyajya sa vāhana āyudhāḥ

original: jagmuḥ puraskṛtya ricāmahaṃ te draṣṭuṃ tadā cakradharaṃ śriyaḥ patim // VamP_19.1 //
analyzed: jagmuḥ puraskṛtya ricām aham te draṣṭum tadā cakradharam śriyaḥ patim

original: gatvā tvapaśyaṃśca mithaḥ surottamau sthitau khagendrāsanaśaṅkarau hi /
analyzed: gatvā tu apaśyan ca mithas sura uttamau sthitau khaga indra āsana śaṅkarau hi

original: dṛṣṭāvā praṇamyaiva ca siddisādhakau nyavedayaṃstanmahiṣādiceṣṭitam // VamP_19.2 //
analyzed: dṛṣṭau ā praṇamya eva ca siddi sādhakau nyavedayan tat mahiṣa ādi ceṣṭitam
prabho śvi sūrya indu anila agni vedhasām jaleśa śakra ādiṣu ca adhikārān

original: ākramya nākāttu nirākṛtā vayaṃ kṛtāvanisthā mahiṣāsureṇa // VamP_19.3 //
analyzed: ākramya nākāt tu nirākṛtāḥ vayam kṛta avani sthāḥ mahiṣa asureṇa

original: etad bhavantau śaraṇāgatānāṃ śrutvā vaco brūta hitaṃ surāṇām /
analyzed: etat bhavantau śaraṇa āgatānām śrutvā vacaḥ brūta hitam surāṇām

original: na ced vrajāmo 'dya rasātalaṃ hi saṃkālyamānā yudhi dānavena // VamP_19.4 //
analyzed: na ced vrajāmaḥ rasātalam hi saṃkālyamānāḥ yudhi dānavena

original: itthaṃ murāriḥ saha śaṅkareṇa śrutvā vaco viplutacetasastān /
analyzed: ittham murāriḥ saha śaṅkareṇa śrutvā vacaḥ vipluta cetasaḥ tān

original: dṛṣṭvātha cakre sahasaiva kopaṃ kālāgnikalpo hariravyayātmā // VamP_19.5 //
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā atha cakre sahasā eva kopam kālāgni kalpaḥ hariḥ avyaya ātmā
tatas nu kopāt madhusūdanasya sa śaṅkarasya api pitāmahasya

original: tathaiva śakrādiṣu daivateṣu maharddhi tejo vadanād viniḥsutam // VamP_19.6 //
analyzed: tathā eva śakra ādiṣu daivateṣu maharddhi tejaḥ vadanāt viniḥsutam

original: taccaikatāṃ parvatakūṭasannibhaṃ jagāma tejaḥ pravarāśram mune /
analyzed: tat ca eka tām parvata kūṭa sannibham jagāma tejaḥ pravara aśram mune

original: kātyāyanasyāpratimasya tena maharṣiṇā teja upākṛtaṃ ca // VamP_19.7 //
analyzed: kātyāyanasya apratimasya tena mahā ṛṣiṇā tejaḥ upākṛtam ca
tena ārṣi sṛṣṭena ca tejasā vṛtam jvalat prakāśa arka sahasra tulyam

original: tasmācca jātā taralāyatākṣī kātyāyanī yogaviśuddhadehā // VamP_19.8 //
analyzed: tasmāt ca jātā tarala āyata akṣī kātyāyanī yoga viśuddha dehā

original: māheśvarād vaktramatho babhūva netratrayaṃ pāvakatejasā ca /
analyzed: māheśvarāt vaktram atho babhūva netra trayam pāvaka tejasā ca

original: yāmyena keśā haritejasā ca bhujāstathāṣṭādaśa saṃpjajñire // VamP_19.9 //
analyzed: yāmyena keśāḥ hari tejasā ca bhujāḥ tathā aṣṭādaśa saṃpjajñire

original: saumyena yugmaṃ stanayoḥ susaṃhataṃ madhyaṃ tathaindreṇa ca tejasābhavat /
analyzed: saumyena yugmam stanayoḥ su saṃhatam madhyam tathā aindreṇa ca tejasā bhavat

original: ūraba cajaṅghe ca nitambasaṃyute jāte jaleśasya tu tejasā hi // VamP_19.10 //
analyzed: ca nitamba saṃyute jāte jaleśasya tu tejasā hi
ca loka prapitāmahasya padma abhikośa pratimau babhūvatuḥ
divākarāṇam api tejasā aṅgulīḥ kara aṅgulīḥ ca vasu tejasā eva

original: prajāpatīnāṃ daśanāśca tejasā yākṣeṇa nāsā śravaṇau ca mārutāt /
analyzed: prajāpatīnām daśanāḥ ca tejasā yākṣeṇa nāsā śravaṇau ca mārutāt

original: sādhyena ca bhrayugalaṃ sukāntimat kandarpabāṇāsanasannibhaṃ babhau // VamP_19.12 //
analyzed: sādhyena ca bhra yugalam su kāntimat kandarpa bāṇāsana sannibham babhau
tartha ārṣi tejaḥ uttamam uttamam mahat nāmnā pṛthivyām abhavat prasiddham

original: kātyāyanītyeva tadā babhau sā nāmnā ca tenaiva jagatprasiddhā // VamP_19.13 //
analyzed: kātyāyanī iti eva tadā babhau sā nāmnā ca tena eva jagat prasiddhā

original: dadau triśūlaṃ varadastriśūlī cakraṃ murārirvaruṇaśca śaṅkham /
analyzed: dadau triśūlam vara daḥ triśūlī cakram murāriḥ varuṇaḥ ca śaṅkham

original: śaktiṃ hutāśaḥ śvasanaśca cāpaṃ tūṇau tathākṣyyaśarau vivasvān // VamP_19.14 //
analyzed: śaktim hutāśaḥ śvasanaḥ ca cāpam tūṇau tathā akṣyya śarau vivasvān

original: vajraṃ tathendraḥ saha ghaṇṭayā ca yamo 'tha daṇḍaṃ dhanado gadāṃ ca /
analyzed: vajram tathā indraḥ saha ghaṇṭayā ca daṇḍam dhanadaḥ gadām ca

original: brahma'kṣamālāṃ sakamaṇḍaluṃ ca kālo 'simugraṃ saha carmaṇā ca // VamP_19.15 //
analyzed: brahma kṣamālām sa kamaṇḍalum ca simugram saha carmaṇā ca

original: hāraṃ ca somaḥ saha cāmareṇa mālaṃ samudro himavān mṛgendram /
analyzed: hāram ca somaḥ saha cāmareṇa mālam samudraḥ himavān mṛgendram

original: cūḍāmaṇiṃ kuṇḍalamarddhacandraṃ prādāt kuṭhāraṃ vasuśilpakarttā // VamP_19.16 //
analyzed: cūḍāmaṇim kuṇḍalam arddhacandram prādāt kuṭhāram vasu śilpa karttā

original: gandharvarājo rajatānuliptaṃ pānasya pūrṇaṃ sadṛśaṃ ca bhājanam /
analyzed: gandharva rājaḥ rajata anuliptam pānasya pūrṇam sadṛśam ca bhājanam

original: bhujaṅgahāraṃ bhujageśvaro 'pi amlānapuṣpāmṛtavaḥ srajaṃ ca // VamP_19.17 //
analyzed: bhujaṅga hāram srajam ca
tadā ati tuṣṭā sura sttamānām aṭṭāṭṭahāsam mumuce trinetrā
tām tuṣṭuvuḥ deva varāḥ saha indrāḥ sa viṣṇu rudra indu anila agni bhāskarāḥ

original: namo 'stu daivyai surapūjitāyai yā saṃsthitā yogaviśuddhadehā /
analyzed: namaḥ stu daivyai sura pūjitāyai yā saṃsthitā yoga viśuddha dehā

original: nidrāsvarūpeṇa mahīṃ vitatya tṛṣṇā trapā kṣud bhayadātha kāntiḥ // VamP_19.19 //
analyzed: nidrā sva rūpeṇa mahīm vitatya tṛṣṇā trapā kṣudh bhaya dā atha kāntiḥ

original: śraddhā smṛtiḥ puṣṭiratho kṣamā ca chāyā ca śaktiḥ kamalālayā ca /
analyzed: śraddhā smṛtiḥ puṣṭiḥ atho kṣamā ca chāyā ca śaktiḥ kamalālayā ca

original: vṛttirdayā bhrānti ratheha māyā namo 'stu daivyai bhavarūpikāyai // VamP_19.20 //
analyzed: vṛttiḥ dayā bhrānti rathā iha māyā namaḥ stu daivyai bhava rūpikāyai
tatas stutāḥ deva varaiḥ mṛgendram āruhya devī pragatā avanīdhram

original: vindhyaṃ mahāparvatamuccaśṛṅgaṃ cakāra yaṃ nimnataraṃ tvagastyaḥ // VamP_19.21 //
analyzed: vindhyam mahā parvatam uccaśṛṅgam cakāra yam nimnataram tu agastyaḥ
nāradaḥ uvāca
kirmatham adrim bhagavān agastyaḥ tam nimna śṛṅgam kṛtavān mahā ṛṣiḥ

original: kasmai kṛte kena ca kāraṇena etad vadasvāmalasattvavṛtte // VamP_19.22 //
analyzed: kasmai kṛte kena ca kāraṇena etat vadasva amala sattva vṛtte
pulastyaḥ uvāca

original: purā hi vindhyena divākarasya gatirniruddhā gaganecarasya /
analyzed: purā hi vindhyena divākarasya gatiḥ niruddhā gaganecarasya

original: ravistataḥ kumabhabhavaṃ sametya homāvasāne vacanaṃ babhāṣe // VamP_19.23 //
analyzed: raviḥ tatas kumabha bhavam sametya homa avasāne vacanam babhāṣe

original: samāgato 'haṃ dvija dūratastvāṃ kuruṣva māmuddharaṇaṃ munīndra /
analyzed: samāgataḥ ham dvija dūratas tvām kuruṣva mām uddharaṇam muni indra

original: dadasva dānaṃ mama yanmanīṣinaṃ carāmi yena tridiveṣu nirvṛtaḥ // VamP_19.24 //
analyzed: dadasva dānam mama yat manīṣinam carāmi yena tridiveṣu nirvṛtaḥ

original: itthaṃ divākaravaco guṇasaṃprayogi śrutvā tadā kalaśajo vacanaṃ babhāṣe /
analyzed: ittham divākara vacaḥ guṇa saṃprayogi śrutvā tadā kalaśajaḥ vacanam babhāṣe

original: dānaṃ dadāmi tava yanmanasastvabhīṣṭaṃ nārthi prayāti vimukho mama kaścideva // VamP_19.25 //
analyzed: dānam dadāmi tava yat manasaḥ tu abhīṣṭam na arthi prayāti vimukhaḥ mama kaścid eva

original: śrutvā vaco 'mṛtamayaṃ kalaśodbhavasya prāha prabhuḥ karatale vinidhāya mūrdhni /
analyzed: śrutvā vacaḥ mṛta mayam kalaśodbhavasya prāha prabhuḥ kara tale vinidhāya mūrdhni

original: eṣo 'dya me girivaraḥ praruṇāddhi mārgaṃ vindhyasya nimnakaraṇe bhagavan yatasva // VamP_19.26 //
analyzed: eṣaḥ dya me giri varaḥ praruṇāt hi mārgam vindhyasya nimnakaraṇe bhagavan yatasva

original: iti ravivacanādathāha kumbhajanmā kutamiti viddhi mayā hi nīcaśṛṅgam /
analyzed: iti ravi vacanāt atha āha kumbhajanmā kutam iti viddhi mayā hi nīca śṛṅgam

original: tava kiraṇajito bhaviṣyate mahīdhro mama caraṇasamśritasya kā vyathā te // VamP_19.27 //
analyzed: tava kiraṇajitaḥ bhaviṣyate mahīdhraḥ mama caraṇa samśritasya kā vyathā te

original: ityevamuktvā kalaśodbhāvastu sūryaṃ hi saṃstūya vinamya bhaktyā /
analyzed: iti evam uktvā kalaśodbhāvaḥ tu sūryam hi saṃstūya vinamya bhaktyā

original: jagāma saṃtyajya hi daṇḍakaṃ hi vindhyācalaṃ vṛddhvapurmaharṣiḥ // VamP_19.28 //
analyzed: jagāma saṃtyajya hi daṇḍakam hi vindhya acalam vṛddhvapuḥ mahā ṛṣiḥ

original: gatvā vacaḥ prāha munirmahīdhraṃ yāsye mahātīrthavaraṃ supuṇyam /
analyzed: gatvā vacaḥ prāha muniḥ mahīdhram yāsye mahā tīrtha varam su puṇyam

original: vṛddhosmayaśaktaśca tavādhiroḍhuṃ tasmād bhavān nīcataro 'stu sadyaḥ // VamP_19.29 //
analyzed: vṛddhaḥ usmaya śaktaḥ ca tava adhiroḍhum tasmāt bhavān nīcataraḥ stu sadyas
iti evam uktaḥ muni sttamena sa nīca śṛṅgaḥ tu abhavat mahīdhraḥ

original: samākramaccāpi maharṣimukyaḥ prollaṅghya vindhyaṃ tvidamāha śailam // VamP_19.30 //
analyzed: samākramat ca api mahā ṛṣi mukyaḥ prollaṅghya vindhyam tu idam āha śailam

original: yāvanna bhūyo nijamāvrajāmi mahāśramaṃ dhautavapuḥ sutīrthāt /
analyzed: yāvat na bhūyas nijam āvrajāmi mahā āśramam dhauta vapuḥ su tīrthāt

original: tvayā na tāvattviha vardhitavyaṃ no ced viśapsye 'hamavajñayā te // VamP_19.31 //
analyzed: tvayā na tāvat tu iha vardhitavyam no ced viśapsye ham avajñayā te

original: ityevamuktvā bhagavāñjagāma diśaṃ sa yāmyāṃ sahasāntarikṣam /
analyzed: iti evam uktvā bhagavān jagāma diśam sa yāmyām sahasā antarikṣam

original: ākramya tasthau sa hi tāṃ tadāśāṃ kāle vrajāmyatra yadā munīndraḥ // VamP_19.32 //
analyzed: ākramya tasthau sa hi tām tad āśām kāle vrajāmi atra yadā muni indraḥ
tatra āśramam ramyataram hi kṛtvā saṃśuddha jāmbūnada toraṇa antam

original: tatrātha nikṣipya vidarbhaputrīṃ svamāśramaṃ saumyamupājagāma // VamP_19.33 //
analyzed: tatra atha nikṣipya vidarbha putrīm svam āśramam saumyam upājagāma

original: ṛtāvṛtau parvakāleṣu nityaṃ tammabare hyāśramamāvasat saḥ /
analyzed: ṛtau ṛtau parva kāleṣu nityam tammabare hi āśramam āvasat saḥ

original: śeṣaṃ ca kālaṃ sa hi daṇḍakasthas tapaścārāmitakāntimān muniḥ // VamP_19.34 //
analyzed: śeṣam ca kālam sa hi daṇḍaka sthaḥ tapaḥ cāra amita kāntimān muniḥ

original: vinandhyo 'pi dṛṣṭvā gagane mahāśramaṃ vṛddhiṃ na yātyeva bhayānmaharṣeḥ /
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā gagane mahā āśramam vṛddhim na yāti eva bhayāt mahā ṛṣeḥ

original: nāsau nivṛtteti matiṃ vidhāya sa saṃsthito nīcatarāgraśṛṅgaḥ // VamP_19.35 //
analyzed: na asau nivṛttā iti matim vidhāya sa saṃsthitaḥ nīcatara agra śṛṅgaḥ

original: evaṃ tvagastyena mahācalendraḥ sa nīcaśṛṅge hi kṛto maharṣe /
analyzed: evam tu agastyena mahā acala indraḥ sa nīcaśṛṅge hi kṛtaḥ mahā ṛṣe

original: tasyordhvaśṛṅge munisaṃstutā sā durgā sthitā dānavanāśanārtham // VamP_19.36 //
analyzed: tasya ūrdhva śṛṅge muni saṃstutā sā durgā sthitā dānava nāśana artham

original: devāśca siddhāśca mahoragāśca vidyādharā bhūtagaṇāśca sarve /
analyzed: devāḥ ca siddhāḥ ca mahoragāḥ ca vidyādharāḥ bhūta gaṇāḥ ca sarve
sarva apsarobhiḥ pratirāmayantaḥ kātyāyanīm tasthuḥ apeta śokāḥ
iti śrī vāmanapurāṇe ekonaviṃśaḥ dhyāyaḥ
pulastyaḥ uvāca

original: tatastu tāṃ tatra tadā vasantīṃ kātyāyanīṃ śailavarasya śṛṅge /
analyzed: tatas tu tām tatra tadā vasantīm kātyāyanīm śailavarasya śṛṅge

original: apaśyatāṃ dānavasattamau dvau caṇḍaś ca muṇḍaśca tapasvinīṃ tām // VamP_20.1 //
analyzed: apaśyatām dānava sattamau dvau caṇḍaḥ ca muṇḍaḥ ca tapasvinīm tām
dṛṣṭvā eva śaulāt avatīrya śīghram ājagmatuḥ sva bhavanam surārī

original: dṛṣṭvocatustau mahiṣāsurasya dūtāvidaṃ caṇḍamuṇḍau ditīśam // VamP_20.2 //
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā ūcatuḥ tau mahiṣa asurasya dūtau idam caṇḍa muṇḍau ditīśam

original: svastho bhavān kiṃ tvasurendra sāmpratamāgaccha paśyāma ca tatra vindhyam /
analyzed: svasthaḥ bhavān kim tu asura indra sāmpratam āgaccha paśyāma ca tatra vindhyam

original: tatrāsti devī sumahānubhāvā kanyā surūpā surasundarīṇām // VamP_20.3 //
analyzed: tatra asti devī su mahā anubhāvā kanyā surūpā sura sundarīṇām

original: jitāstayā toyadharālakairhi jitaḥ śaśaṅko vadanena tanvyā /
analyzed: jitāḥ tayā toyadhara alakaiḥ hi jitaḥ śaśaṅkaḥ vadanena tanvyā

original: netraistribhistrīṇi hutāśanāni jitāni kaṇṭhena jitastu śaṅkhaḥ // VamP_20.4 //
analyzed: netraiḥ tribhiḥ trīṇi hutāśanāni jitāni kaṇṭhena jitaḥ tu śaṅkhaḥ

original: stanau suvṛttāvatha magnacūcukau sthitau vijityeva gajasya kumbhau /
analyzed: stanau su vṛttau atha magna cūcukau sthitau vijitya iva gajasya kumbhau

original: tvāṃ sarvajotāramiti pratarkya kucau smareṇaiva kṛtau sudurgau // VamP_20.5 //
analyzed: tvām sarva jotāram iti pratarkya kucau smareṇa eva kṛtau su durgau

original: pīnāḥ saśastrāḥ piraghopamāśca bhujāstathāṣṭādaśa bhānti tasyāḥ /
analyzed: pīnāḥ sa śastrāḥ piragha upamāḥ ca bhujāḥ tathā aṣṭādaśa bhānti tasyāḥ

original: parākramaṃ vai bhavato viditvā kāmena yantrā iva te kṛtāstu // VamP_20.6 //
analyzed: parākramam vai bhavataḥ viditvā kāmena yantrā iva te kṛtā astu

original: madhyaṃ ca tasyāstrivalītaraṅgaṃ vibhāti daityendra suromarāji /
analyzed: madhyam ca tasyāḥ trivalī taraṅgam vibhāti daitya indra su romarāji
bhaya ātura ārohaṇa kātarasya kāmasya sopānam iva prayuktam

original: sā romarājī sutarāṃ hi tasyā virājate pījakucāvalagnā /
analyzed: sā romarājī sutarām hi tasyāḥ virājate pīja kuca avalagnā
ārohaṇe tvad bhaya kātarasya sveda pravāhaḥ ṭasura manmathasya
nābhiḥ gabhīrā sutarām vibhāti pradakṣiṇā asyāḥ parivartamānā

original: tasyaiva lāvaṇyagṛhasya mudrā kandarparājñā svayameva dattā // VamP_20.9 //
analyzed: tasya eva lāvaṇya gṛhasya mudrā kandarpa rājñā svayam eva dattā

original: vibhāti ramyaṃ jaghanaṃ mṛgākṣyāḥ samantato mekhalayāvajuṣṭam /
analyzed: vibhāti ramyam jaghanam mṛga akṣyāḥ samantataḥ mekhalayā avajuṣṭam

original: manyāma taṃ kāmanarādhipasya prākāraguptaṃ nagaraṃ sudurgam // VamP_20.10 //
analyzed: manyāma tam kāma narādhipasya prākāra guptam nagaram su durgam

original: vṛttāvaromau ca mṛdū kumāryāḥ śobheta ūrū samanuttamau hi /
analyzed: vṛttau aromau ca mṛdū kumāryāḥ śobheta ūrū samanuttamau hi

original: āvāsanārthaṃ makaradhvajena janasya deśāviva sanniviṣṭau // VamP_20.11 //
analyzed: āvāsana artham makaradhvajena janasya deśau iva sanniviṣṭau

original: tañjānuyugmaṃ mahiṣāsurendra arddhennataṃ bhāti tathaiva tasyāḥ /
analyzed: tat jānu yugmam mahiṣa asura indra bhāti tathā eva tasyāḥ

original: sṛṣṭvā vidhātā hi nirūpaṇāya śrāntastathā hastatale dadau hi // VamP_20.12 //
analyzed: sṛṣṭvā vidhātā hi nirūpaṇāya śrāntaḥ tathā hasta tale dadau hi

original: jaṅghe suvṛtte 'pi ca romahīne śobheta daityeśvara te tadīye /
analyzed: jaṅghe su vṛtte ca roma hīne śobheta daitya īśvara te tadīye

original: ākramya lokāniva mirmitāyā rūpārjitasyaiva kṛtādharau hi // VamP_20.13 //
analyzed: ākramya lokān iva mirmitāyāḥ rūpa arjitasya eva kṛta adharau hi

original: pādau ca tasyāḥ kamalodarābhau prayatnatastau hi kṛtau vidhātrā /
analyzed: pādau ca tasyāḥ kamala udara ābhau prayatnataḥ tau hi kṛtau vidhātrā

original: ājñāpi tābhyāṃ nakharatnamālā nakṣatramālā gagane yathaiva // VamP_20.14 //
analyzed: ājñā api tābhyām nakha ratna mālā nakṣatra mālā gagane yathā eva

original: evaṃsvarūpā danunātha kanyā mahograśastrāṇi ca dhārayantī /
analyzed: evaṃsvarūpā danunātha kanyā mahā ugra śastrāṇi ca dhārayantī

original: dṛṣṭvā yatheṣṭaṃ na ca vidma kā sā sutāthavā kasyacideva bālā // VamP_20.15 //
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā yatheṣṭam na ca vidma kā sā sutā athavā kasyacid eva bālā

original: tadbhūtale ratnamanuttamaṃ sthitaṃ svargaṃ parityajya mahāsurendra /
analyzed: tat bhū tale ratnam anuttamam sthitam svargam parityajya mahā asura indra

original: gatvāttha vindhyaṃ svayameva paśya kuruṣva yat te 'bhimataṃ kṣamaṃ ca // VamP_20.16 //
analyzed: gatvā āttha vindhyam svayam eva paśya kuruṣva yat te bhimatam kṣamam ca

original: śrutvaiva tābhyāṃ mahiṣāsurastu devyāḥ pravṛttiṃ kamanīyarūpām /
analyzed: śrutvā eva tābhyām mahiṣa asuraḥ tu devyāḥ pravṛttim kamanīya rūpām

original: cakre matiṃ nātra vicāramasti ityevamuktvā mahiṣo 'pi nāsti // VamP_20.17 //
analyzed: cakre matim na atra vicāram asti iti evam uktvā na asti

original: prāgeva puṃsastu śubhāśubhāni sthāne vidhātrā pratipāditāni /
analyzed: prāk eva puṃsaḥ tu śubha aśubhāni sthāne vidhātrā pratipāditāni

original: yasmin yathāyāni yato 'thavipra sa nīyate vā vrajati svayaṃ vā // VamP_20.18 //
analyzed: yasmin sa nīyate vā vrajati svayam vā

original: tatonu muṇḍaṃ namaraṃ sacaṇḍe viḍālanetraṃ sapiśaṅgavāṣkalam /
analyzed: tatas nu muṇḍam namaram sa caṇḍe viḍāla netram sa piśaṅga vāṣkalam
ugrāyudham cikṣura raktabījau samādideśa atha mahā asura indraḥ

original: āhatya bherī ramakarkaśāste svargaṃ parityajya mahīdharaṃ tu /
analyzed: āhatya bherī rama karkaśāḥ te svargam parityajya mahīdharam tu

original: āgamya mūle śiviraṃ niveśya tasthuśca sañjā danunandanāste // VamP_20.20 //
analyzed: āgamya mūle śiviram niveśya tasthuḥ ca sañjāḥ danu nandanāḥ te
tatas tu daityaḥ mahiṣa asureṇa saṃpreṣitaḥ dānava yūtha pālaḥ

original: mayasya putro ripusainyamardī sa dundubhirdundubhiniḥkhanastu // VamP_20.21 //
analyzed: mayasya putraḥ ripu sainya mardī sa dundubhiḥ dundubhi niḥkhanaḥ tu

original: abhyetya devīṃ gaganasthito 'pi sa dundubhirvākyamuvāca vipra /
analyzed: abhyetya devīm gagana sthitaḥ sa dundubhiḥ vākyam uvāca vipra

original: kumāri dūto 'smi mahāsurasya rambhātmajasyāpratimasya yuddhe // VamP_20.22 //
analyzed: kumāri smi mahā asurasya rambhā ātmajasya apratimasya yuddhe

original: kātyāyānī dundubhimabhyuvāca ehyehi daityendra bhayaṃ vimucya /
analyzed: kātyāyānī dundubhim abhyuvāca ehi ehi daitya indra bhayam vimucya

original: vākyaṃ ca yadrambhasuto babhāṣe vadasva tatsatyamapetamohaḥ // VamP_20.23 //
analyzed: vākyam ca yat rambha sutaḥ babhāṣe vadasva tat satyam apeta mohaḥ
tathā ukta vākye ditijaḥ bhūmi tale niṣaṇṇaḥ

original: sukhopaviṣṭaḥ paramāsane ca rambhātmajenoktamuvāca vākyam // VamP_20.24 //
analyzed: sukha upaviṣṭaḥ parama āsane ca rambhā ātmajena uktam uvāca vākyam
dundubhiḥ uvāca

original: evaṃ samājñāpayate surāristvāṃ devi daityo mahiṣāsurastu /
analyzed: evam samājñāpayate surāriḥ tvām devi daityaḥ mahiṣa asuraḥ tu

original: yathāmarā hīnabalāḥ pṛthivyāṃ bhramānti yuddhe vijitā mayā te // VamP_20.25 //
analyzed: yathā amarāḥ hīna balāḥ pṛthivyām bhramānti yuddhe vijitāḥ mayā te

original: svargaṃ mahī vāyupathāśca vaśyāḥ pātālamanye ca maheśvarādyāḥ /
analyzed: svargam mahī vāyu pathāḥ ca vaśyāḥ pātālam anye ca maheśvara ādyāḥ

original: indro 'smi rudro 'smi divākaro 'smi sarveṣu lokṣvadhipo 'smi bāle // VamP_20.26 //
analyzed: indraḥ smi rudraḥ smi divākaraḥ smi sarveṣu lokṣu adhipaḥ smi bāle

original: na so 'sti nāke na mahītale vā rasātale devabhaṭo 'suro vā /
analyzed: na saḥ sti nāke na mahī tale vā rasātale deva bhaṭaḥ suraḥ vā

original: yo māṃ hi saṃgrāmamupeyivāṃstu bhūto na yakṣo na jijīviṣuryaḥ // VamP_20.27 //
analyzed: yaḥ mām hi saṃgrāmam upeyivān tu bhūtaḥ na yakṣaḥ na jijīviṣuḥ yaḥ

original: yānyeva ratnāni mahītale vā svarge 'pi pātālatale 'tha mugdhe /
analyzed: yāni eva ratnāni mahī tale vā svarge pi pātāla tale

original: srāvaṇi māmadya samāgatāni vīryārjitānīha viśālanetre // VamP_20.28 //
analyzed: srāvaṇi mām adya samāgatāni vīrya arjitāni iha viśāla netre

original: strīratnamagryaṃ bhavatī ca kanyā prāpto 'smi śailaṃ tava kāraṇena /
analyzed: strī ratnam agryam bhavatī ca kanyā smi śailam tava kāraṇena

original: tasmād bhajasveha jagatpatiṃ māṃ patistavārhe 'smi vibhuḥ prabhuśca // VamP_20.29 //
analyzed: tasmāt bhajasva iha jagatpatim mām patiḥ tava arhe smi vibhuḥ prabhuḥ ca
pulastyaḥ uvāca

original: ityevamuktā ditijena durgā kātyāyanī prāha mayasya putram /
analyzed: iti evam uktā ditijena durgā kātyāyanī prāha mayasya putram

original: satyaṃ prabhurdānavarāṭ pṛthivyāṃ satyaṃ ca yuddhe vijitāmarāśca // VamP_20.30 //
analyzed: satyam prabhuḥ dānava rāj pṛthivyām satyam ca yuddhe vijita amarāḥ ca

original: kiṃ tvasti daityeśa kule 'smadīye dharmo hi śulkākhya iti prasiddhaḥ /
analyzed: kim tu asti daitya īśa kule smadīye dharmaḥ hi śulka ākhyaḥ iti prasiddhaḥ

original: taṃ cet pradadyānmahiṣo mamādya bhajāmi satyena patiṃ hayārim // VamP_20.31 //
analyzed: tam ced pradadyāt mahiṣaḥ mama adya bhajāmi satyena patim hayārim
śrutvā atha vākyam maya jaḥ bravīt ca śulkam vadasva ambuja patra netre

original: dadyātsvamūrdhānamapi tvadarthe kiṃ nāma śulkaṃ yadihaiva tabhyam // VamP_20.32 //
analyzed: dadyāt sva mūrdhānam api tvad arthe kim nāma śulkam yat iha eva tabhyam
pulastyaḥ uvāca
iti evam uktā danu nāyakena kātyāyanī sa svanam unnaditvā

original: vihasya caitadvacanaṃ babhāṣe hitāya sarvasya carācarasya // VamP_20.33 //
analyzed: vihasya ca etat vacanam babhāṣe hitāya sarvasya carācarasya
śrī devī uvāca

original: kule 'smadīye śṛṇu daitya śulkaṃ kṛtaṃ hi yatpūrvataraiḥ prasahya /
analyzed: kule smadīye śṛṇu daitya śulkam kṛtam hi yat pūrvataraiḥ prasahya

original: yo jeṣyate 'smatkulajāṃ raṇāgre tasyāḥ sa bharttāpi bhaviṣyatīti // VamP_20.34 //
analyzed: yaḥ jeṣyate smad kula jām raṇa agre tasyāḥ sa bharttā api bhaviṣyati iti
pulastyaḥ uvāca
tat śrutvā vacanam devyāḥ dundubhiḥ dānava īśvaraḥ
gatvā nivedayāmāsa mahiṣāya yathātatham
sa ca abhyagāt mahā tejāḥ sarva daitya puras saraḥ
āgatya vindhya śikharam yoddhadhu kāmaḥ sarasvatīm
tatas senāpatiḥ daityaḥ cikṣuraḥ nāma nārada

original: senāgragāminaṃ cakre namaraṃ nāma dānavam // VamP_20.37 //
analyzed: senā agra gāminam cakre namaram nāma dānavam
sa ca api tena adhikṛtaḥ catur aṅgam samūrjitam
baleka deśam ādāya durgā dudrāva vegitaḥ
tam āpatantam vīkṣya atha devāḥ brahma purogamāḥ

original: ūcurvākyaṃ mahādevīṃ varma hyābandha cāmbike // VamP_20.39 //
analyzed: ūcuḥ vākyam mahādevīm varma hi ābandha ca ambike

original: athovāca surān durgā nāhaṃ badhnāmi devatāḥ /
analyzed: athā uvāca surān durgāḥ na aham badhnāmi devatāḥ

original: kavacaṃ ko 'tra saṃtiṣṭhet mamāgre dānavādhamaḥ // VamP_20.40 //
analyzed: kavacam saṃtiṣṭhet mama agre dānava adhamaḥ

original: yadā na devyā kavacaṃ kṛtaṃ śastranibarhaṇam /
analyzed: yadā na devyā kavacam kṛtam śastra nibarhaṇam
tadā rakṣā artham asyāḥ tu viṣṇu pañjaram uktavān

original: sā tena rakṣitā brahman durgā dānavasattamam /
analyzed: sā tena rakṣitā brahman durgā dānava sattamam
avadhyam daivataiḥ sarveḥ mahiṣam pratyapīyat

original: evaṃ purā devavareṇa śaṃbhunā tadvaiṣṇavaṃ pañjaramāyatākṣyāḥ /
analyzed: evam purā deva vareṇa śaṃbhunā tat vaiṣṇavam pañjaram āyata akṣyāḥ

original: proktaṃ tayā cāpi hi pādaghātairniṣūdito 'sau mahiṣāsurendraḥ // VamP_20.43 //
analyzed: proktam tayā ca api hi pāda ghātaiḥ niṣūditaḥ sau mahiṣa asura indraḥ

original: evaṃprabhāvo dvija viṣṇupañjaraḥ sarvāsu rakṣāsvadhiko hi gītaḥ /
analyzed: evaṃprabhāvaḥ dvija viṣṇu pañjaraḥ sarvāsu rakṣāsu adhikaḥ hi gītaḥ

original: kastasya kuryād yudhi darphahāniṃ yasya sthitaścetasi cakrapāṇiḥ // VamP_20.44 //
analyzed: kaḥ tasya kuryāt yudhi darpha hānim yasya sthitaḥ cetasi cakrapāṇiḥ
iti śrī vāmanapurāṇe viṃśaḥ dhyāyaḥ
nāradaḥ uvāca
katham kātyāyanī devī sānagam mahiṣa asuram

original: savāhanaṃ hatavatī tathā vistarato vāda // VamP_21.1 //
analyzed: sa vāhanam hatavatī tathā vistarataḥ vāda

original: etacca saṃśayaṃ brahman hṛdi me parivartate /
analyzed: etat ca saṃśayam brahman hṛdi me parivartate
vidyāmāneṣu śastreṣu yat padbhyām tam amardayat
pulastyaḥ uvāca
śṛṇuṣva avahitaḥ bhūtvā kathām etām purātanīm
vṛttām deva yugasya ādau puṇyām pāpa bhaya apahām

original: evaṃ sa namaraḥ kruddhaḥ samāpatata vegavān /
analyzed: evam sa namaraḥ kruddhaḥ samāpatata vegavān

original: sagajāśvaratho brahman dṛṣṭo devyā yathecchayā // VamP_21.4 //
analyzed: sa gaja aśva rathaḥ brahman dṛṣṭaḥ devyā yathā icchayā
tatas bāṇa gaṇaiḥ daityaḥ samānamya atha kārmukam
vavarṣa śailam dhārā oghaiḥ dyaiḥ iva ambuda vṛṣṭibhiḥ
śara varṣeṇa tena atha vilokya adrim samāvṛtam
kruddhā bhagavatī vegāt ācakarṣa dhanuḥ varam
tat dhanuḥ dānave sainye durgayā nāmitam balān
suvarṇa pṛṣṭham vibabhau vidyut ambudhareṣu iva
bāṇaiḥ sura ripūn anyān khaḍgena anyān śubha vrata
gadayā musalena anyān carmaṇā anyān apātayat
ekaḥ pi asau bahūn devyāḥ kesarī kāla saṃnibhaḥ
vidhunvan kesara saṭām niṣūdayati dānavān
kuliśa abhihatāḥ daityāḥ śaktyā nirbhinna vakṣasaḥ
lāṅgalaiḥ dārita grīvāḥ vinikṛttāḥ paraśvadhaiḥ
daṇḍa nirbhiṃnna śirasaḥ cakra vicchinna bandhanāḥ

original: celuḥ petuśca mamluś ca tatyajuścāpare raṇam // VamP_21.11 //
analyzed: celuḥ petuḥ ca mamluḥ ca tatyajuḥ ca apare raṇam
te vadhyamānāḥ durgayā daitya dānavāḥ
kālarātrim manyamānāḥ dudruvuḥ bhaya pīḍitāḥ
sainya agram bhagnam ālokya durgām agre tathā sthitām
dṛṣṭvā jagāma namaraḥ matta kuñjara saṃsthitaḥ

original: samāgamya ca vegena devyāḥ śaktiṃ mumoca ha /
analyzed: samāgamya ca vegena devyāḥ śaktim mumoca ha

original: triśulamapi siṃhāya prāhiṇod dānavo raṇe // VamP_21.14 //
analyzed: triśulam api siṃhāya prāhiṇot dānavaḥ raṇe
tau āpatantau devyā tu huṅkāreṇa atha bhasmasāt

original: kṛtāvatha gajendreṇa gṛhīto madhyato hariḥ // VamP_21.15 //
analyzed: kṛtau atha gaja indreṇa gṛhītaḥ madhyatas hariḥ
athā utpatya ca vegena talena āhtaya dānavam

original: gatāsuḥ suñjaraskandhāt kṣipya daivyai niveditaḥ // VamP_21.16 //
analyzed: gatāsuḥ suñjara skandhāt kṣipya daivyai niveditaḥ

original: gṛhītvā dānavaṃ madhye brahman kātyāyanī ruṣā /
analyzed: gṛhītvā dānavam madhye brahman kātyāyanī ruṣā

original: savyena pāṇinā bhrāmya vādayat pahaṃ yathā // VamP_21.17 //
analyzed: savyena pāṇinā bhrāmya vādayat yathā
tatas ṭṭahāsam mumuce tādṛśe vādya tām gate
hāsyāt samudbhavan tasyāḥ bhūtāḥ nānāvidha adbhutāḥ
kecid vyāghra mukhāḥ raudrāḥ vṛka ākārāḥ tathā pare
haya āsyāḥ mahiṣa āsyāḥ ca varāha vadanāḥ pare
ākhu kukkuṭa vaktrāḥ ca jāvika mukhāḥ tathā
nānā vaktra akṣi caraṇāḥ nānā āyudha dharāḥ tathā
gāyanti anye hasanti anye pamanti anye tu saṃghaśas
vādayanti apare tatra stuvanti anye tathā ambikām
sā taiḥ bhūta gaṇaiḥ devī sārddha tat dānavam balam

original: śātayāmāsa cākramya yathā sasyaṃ mahāśaniḥ // VamP_21.22 //
analyzed: śātayāmāsa ca ākramya yathā sasyam mahā aśaniḥ
senā agre nihate tasmin tathā senā agra gāmini
cikṣuraḥ sainya pālaḥ tu yodhayāmāsa devatāḥ
kārmukam dṛḍham ākarṇam ākṛṣya rathinām varaḥ

original: vavarṣa śarajālāni yathā megho vasundharām // VamP_21.24 //
analyzed: vavarṣa śara jālāni yathā meghaḥ vasundharām
tān durgā sva śaraiḥ chittvā śara saṃghān su parvabhiḥ
sauvarṇa puṅkhān aparān śarān jagrāha ṣoḍaśa
tatas caturbhiḥ caturaḥ turaṅgan api bhāminī
hatvā sārathim ekena dhvajam ekena cicchide
tatas tu sa śaram cāpam ciccheda eka iṣuṇā ambikā

original: chinne dhanuṣu khaṅgaṃ ca carma cādattavān balī // VamP_21.27 //
analyzed: chinne dhanuṣu khaṅgam ca carma ca ādattavān balī

original: taṃ khaṅga carmaṇā sārdha daityasyādhunvato balāt /
analyzed: tam khaṅga carmaṇā sārdha daityasya a dhunvataḥ balāt
śaraiḥ caturbhiḥ ciccheda tatas śūlam samādade
samudbhrāmya mahat śūlam saṃprādravat atha ambikām
kroṣṭukaḥ muditaḥ raṇye mṛgarāja vadhūm yathā

original: tasyābhipatataḥ pādau karau śīrṣa ca pañcabhiḥ /
analyzed: tasya abhipatataḥ pādau karau śīrṣa ca pañcabhiḥ
śaraiḥ cicchada saṃkruddhā nyapatit nihataḥ suraḥ
tasmin senāpatau kṣuṇṇe tadā ugrāsyaḥ mahā asuraḥ
samādravata vegena karāla āsyaḥ ca dānavaḥ
bāṣkalaḥ ca uddhataḥ ca eva udagra ākhyā ugra kārmukaḥ
durddharaḥ durmukhaḥ ca eva paraḥ

original: ete 'nye ca mahātmāno dānavā balināṃ varāḥ /
analyzed: ete nye ca mahātmānaḥ dānavāḥ balinām varāḥ
kātyāyanīm ādravanta nānā śastra astra pāṇayaḥ

original: tān dṛṣṭvā līlayā durgā vīṇāṃ jagrāha pāṇinā /
analyzed: tān dṛṣṭvā līlayā durgā vīṇām jagrāha pāṇinā

original: vādayāmāsa hasatī tathā ḍamarukaṃ varam // VamP_21.34 //
analyzed: vādayāmāsa hasatī tathā ḍamarukam varam

original: yathā yathā vādayate devī vādyāni tāni tu /
analyzed: yathā yathā vādayate devī vādyāni tāni tu

original: tathā tathā bhūtagaṇā nṛtyanti ca hasnti ca // VamP_21.35 //
analyzed: tathā tathā bhūta gaṇāḥ nṛtyanti ca hasnti ca
tatas surāḥ śastra dharāḥ samabhyetya sarasvatīm

original: abhyaghnaṃstāṃś ca jagrāha keśeṣu parameśvarī // VamP_21.36 //
analyzed: abhyaghnan tān ca jagrāha keśeṣu parameśvarī

original: prahṛhya keśeṣu mahāsurāṃstān utpatya siṃhāttu nagasya sānum /
analyzed: prahṛhya keśeṣu mahā asurān tān utpatya siṃhāt tu nagasya sānum

original: nanarta vīṇāṃ parivādayantī papau ca pānaṃ jagato janitrī // VamP_21.37 //
analyzed: nanarta vīṇām parivādayantī papau ca pānam jagataḥ janitrī
tatas tu devyāḥ balinaḥ mahā asurāḥ

original: visrastavastrā vyasavaśca jātāḥ tatastu tān vīkṣya mahāsurendrān // VamP_21.38 //
analyzed: visrasta vastrāḥ vyasavaḥ ca jātāḥ tatas tu tān vīkṣya mahā asura indrān

original: devyā mahaujā mahiṣāsurastu vyadrāvayad bhūtagaṇān khurāgraiḥ /
analyzed: devyā mahā ojāḥ mahiṣa asuraḥ tu vyadrāvayat bhūta gaṇān khura agraiḥ

original: tuṇḍena pucchena tathorasānyān niḥśvāsavātena ca bhūtasaṃghān // VamP_21.39 //
analyzed: tuṇḍena pucchena tathā urasā anyān niḥśvāsa vātena ca bhūta saṃghān
nādena ca eva aśani sannibhena viṣāṇā koṭyā tu aparān pramathya

original: dudrāva siṃhaṃ yudhi hantukāmaḥ tato 'mbakā krodhavaśaṃ jagāma // VamP_21.40 //
analyzed: dudrāva siṃham yudhi hantu kāmaḥ tatas mbakā krodha vaśam jagāma

original: tataḥ sa kopādatha tīkṣṇaśṛṅgaḥ kṣipraṃ girīn bhūmimaśīrṇayacca /
analyzed: tatas sa kopāt atha tīkṣṇaśṛṅgaḥ kṣipram girīn bhūmim aśīrṇayat ca

original: saṃkṣobhayayayaṃstoyanidhīn ghanāṃś ca vidhvaṃsayan prādvatātha gurgām // VamP_21.41 //
analyzed: saṃkṣobhayayayan toyanidhīn ghanān ca vidhvaṃsayan gurgām

original: sā cātha pāśena babandha duṣṭaṃ sa cāpyabhūt klinnakaṭaḥ karīndraḥ /
analyzed: sā ca atha pāśena babandha duṣṭam sa ca api abhūt klinna kaṭaḥ karīndraḥ

original: karaṃ praciccheda ca hastino 'graṃ sa cāpi bhṛyo mahiṣo 'bhijātaḥ // VamP_21.42 //
analyzed: karam praciccheda ca hastinaḥ sa ca api bhṛyaḥ mahiṣaḥ

original: tato 'sya śūlaṃ vyasṛjanyamṛḍānī sa śīrṇamūlo nyapatat pṛthivyām /
analyzed: tatas sya śūlam vyasṛjan yamṛḍānī sa śīrṇa mūlaḥ nyapatat pṛthivyām

original: śaktiṃ pracikṣepa hutāśadattāṃ sā kuṇṭhitāgrā nyapatanamārṣe // VamP_21.43 //
analyzed: śaktim pracikṣepa hutāśa dattām sā kuṇṭhita agrā nyapatanam ārṣe
cakram hareḥ dānapa cakra hantuḥ kṣiptam tu a cakra tvam upāgatam hi

original: gadāṃ samāvidhya dhaneśvarasya kṣiptātu bhagnā nyapatat pṛthivyām // VamP_21.44 //
analyzed: gadām samāvidhya dhaneśvarasya kṣiptā atu bhagnā nyapatat pṛthivyām
jaleśa pāśaḥ pi mahā asureṇa viṣāṇa tuṇḍa agra khura praṇunnaḥ

original: nirasya tatkopitayā ca mukto daṇḍastu yāmyo bahukhaṇḍatāṃ gataḥ // VamP_21.45 //
analyzed: nirasya tad kopitayā ca muktaḥ daṇḍaḥ tu yāmyaḥ bahu khaṇḍatām gataḥ

original: vajraṃ surendrasya ca vigrahe 'sya muktaṃ susūkṣmatvamupājagāma /
analyzed: vajram sura indrasya ca vigrahe sya muktam su sūkṣma tvam upājagāma

original: saṃtyajya siṃhaṃ mahiṣāsurasya durgādhirūḍhā sahasaiva pṛṣṭham // VamP_21.46 //
analyzed: saṃtyajya siṃham mahiṣa asurasya durgā adhirūḍhā sahasā eva pṛṣṭham
pṛṣṭha sthitāyām mahiṣa asuraḥ pi poplūyate vīryam adāt mṛḍānyām

original: sā cāpi padbhyāṃ mṛdukomalābhyāṃ mamarda taṃ klinnamivājinaṃ hi // VamP_21.47 //
analyzed: sā ca api padbhyām mṛdu komalābhyām mamarda tam klinnam iva ajinam hi

original: sa mṛdyamāno dharaṇīdharābho devyā balī hīnabalo babhūva /
analyzed: sa mṛdyamānaḥ dharaṇīdhara ābhaḥ devyāḥ balī hīna balaḥ babhūva

original: tato 'sya śūlena bibeda kaṇṭhaṃ tasmāt pumān khaṅgadharo vinirgataḥ // VamP_21.48 //
analyzed: tatas sya śūlena bibeda kaṇṭham tasmāt pumān khaṅga dharaḥ vinirgataḥ

original: niṣkrāntamātraṃ hṛdaye padā tam āhatya saṃgṛhya kaceṣu kopāt /
analyzed: niṣkrānta mātram hṛdaye padā tam āhatya saṃgṛhya kaceṣu kopāt

original: śiraḥ praciccheda varāsināsya hāhākṛtaṃ daityabalaṃ tadābhūt // VamP_21.49 //
analyzed: śiraḥ praciccheda vara asinā asya hāhākṛtam daitya balam tadā abhūt
sa caṇḍa muṇḍāḥ sa mayāḥ sa tārāḥ saha asi lomnā bhaya kātara akṣāḥ
saṃtāḍyamānāḥ pramathaiḥ bhavānyāḥ pātalam eva āviviśuḥ bhaya ārtāḥ

original: devyā jayaṃ devāgaṇā vilokya stuvanti devīṃ stutibhirmaharṣe /
analyzed: devyāḥ jayam devā gaṇāḥ vilokya stuvanti devīm stutibhiḥ mahā ṛṣe

original: nārāyaṇīṃ sarvajagatpratiṣṭhāṃ kātyāyanīṃ ghoramukhīṃ surūpām // VamP_21.51 //
analyzed: nārāyaṇīm sarva jagat pratiṣṭhām kātyāyanīm ghora mukhīm surūpām
saṃstūyamānā sura siddha saṃghaiḥ niṣaṇṇa bhūtā hara pāda mule

original: bhūyo bhaviṣyāmyamarārthamevamuktvā surāṃstān praviveśa durgā // VamP_21.52 //
analyzed: bhūyas bhaviṣyāmi amara artham evam uktvā surān tān praviveśa durgā
iti śrī vāmanapurāṇe ekaviṃśaḥ dhyāyaḥ
nāradaḥ uvāca

original: pulastya kathyatāṃ tāvad devyā bhūyaḥ samudbhavaḥ /
analyzed: pulastya kathyatām tāvat devyāḥ bhūyas samudbhavaḥ
mahat kautūhalam me vistarāt brahma vittama
pulastyaḥ uvāca
śrūyatām kathayiṣyāmi bhūyas syāḥ saṃbhavam mune
śumbha asura vadha arthāya lokānām hita kāmyayā

original: yā sā himavataḥ putrī bhavenoḍhā tapodhanā /
analyzed: yā sā himavataḥ putrī bhavena ūḍhā tapodhanā

original: umā nāmnā ca tasyāḥ sā kośāñjātā tukauśikī // VamP_22.3 //
analyzed: umā nāmnā ca tasyāḥ sā

original: saṃbhīya vindhyaṃ gatvā ca bhṛyo bhūtagaṇairvṛtā /
analyzed: saṃbhīya vindhyam gatvā ca bhṛyas bhūta gaṇaiḥ vṛtā

original: śumbhaṃ caiva niśumbhaṃ ca vadhiṣyati varāyudhaiḥ // VamP_22.4 //
analyzed: śumbham ca eva niśumbham ca vadhiṣyati vara āyudhaiḥ
nāradaḥ uvāca
brahman tvayā samākhyātā mṛtā dakṣa tmajā satī

original: sā jātā himavatputrītyevaṃ me vaktumarhasi // VamP_22.5 //
analyzed: sā jātā himavat putrī iti evam me vaktum arhasi

original: yathā ca pārvatīkośāt samuddhabhūtā hi kauśikī /
analyzed: yathā ca pārvatī kośāt hi kauśikī

original: yathā hatavatī śumbhaṃ nisumbhaṃ ca mahāsuram // VamP_22.6 //
analyzed: yathā hatavatī śumbham nisumbham ca mahā asuram

original: kasya cemau sutau vīrau khyātau śumbhaniśumbhakau /
analyzed: kasya ca imau sutau vīrau khyātau śumbha niśumbhakau

original: etad vistarataḥ sarvaṃ yathāvad vaktumarhasi // VamP_22.7 //
analyzed: etat vistarataḥ sarvam yathāvat vaktum arhasi
pulastyaḥ uvāca
etat te kathayiṣyāmi pārvatyāḥ saṃbhavam mune

original: śṛṇuṣvāvahito bhūtvā skandotpattiṃ ca śāśvatīm // VamP_22.8 //
analyzed: śṛṇuṣva avahitaḥ bhūtvā skanda utpattim ca śāśvatīm
rudraḥ satyām praṇaṣṭāyām brahmacāri vrate stitaḥ
nirāśraya tvam āpannaḥ tapaḥ taptum vyavasthitaḥ
sa ca āsīt deva senā nīḥ daitya darpha vināśanaḥ
tatas nirākṛtāḥ devāḥ senā nāthena śaṃbhunā
dānava indreṇa vikramya mahiṣeṇa parājitāḥ

original: śvetdavīpe mahāhaṃsaṃ prapannāḥ śaraṇaṃ harim // VamP_22.12 //
analyzed: śvetdavīpe mahāhaṃsam prapannāḥ śaraṇam harim
tān āgatān surān dṛṣṭvā tatas śakra purogamān
vihasya megha gambhīram provāca puruṣottamaḥ
kim jitāḥ tu asura indreṇa mahiṣeṇa durātmanā

original: yena sarve sametyaivaṃ mama pārśvamupāgatāḥ // VamP_22.14 //
analyzed: yena sarve sametya evam mama pārśvam upāgatāḥ

original: tad yuṣmākaṃ hitārthāya yad vadāmi surottamāḥ /
analyzed: tat yuṣmākam hita arthāya yat vadāmi sura uttamāḥ

original: tatkurudhvaṃ jayo yena samāśritya bhaveddhi vaḥ // VamP_22.15 //
analyzed: tat kurudhvam jayaḥ yena samāśritya bhavet hi vaḥ
ye ete pitaraḥ divyāḥ tu agniṣvātta iti viśrutāḥ

original: amīṣāṃ mānasī kanyā menā nāmnāsti devatāḥ // VamP_22.16 //
analyzed: amīṣām mānasī kanyā menā nāmnā asti devatāḥ
tām ārādhya mahā ātithyām śraddhayā parayā amarāḥ
prārthayadhvam satīm menām prāleyādreḥ iha arthataḥ

original: dakṣakopād yayā muktaṃ malavajjīvitaṃ priyam // VamP_22.18 //
analyzed: dakṣa kopāt yayā muktam malavat jīvitam priyam

original: sā śaṅkarāt svatejoṃ'śaṃ janayiṣyati yaṃ sutam /
analyzed: sā śaṅkarāt sva tejaḥ oṃśam janayiṣyati yam sutam

original: sa haniṣyati daityendraṃ mahiṣaṃ sapadānugam // VamP_22.19 //
analyzed: sa haniṣyati daitya indram mahiṣam sa padānugam

original: tasmād gacchata puṇyaṃ tat kurukṣetraṃ mahāphalam /
analyzed: tasmāt gacchata puṇyam tat kurukṣetram mahā phalam

original: tatra pṛthūdake tīrthe pūjyantāṃ pitaro 'vyayaḥ // VamP_22.20 //
analyzed: tatra pṛthūdake tīrthe pūjyantām pitaraḥ vyayaḥ

original: jihāsatātmanaḥ sarve itthaṃ vai kriyatāmiti // VamP_22.21 //
analyzed: jihāsata ātmanaḥ sarve ittham vai kriyatām iti
pulastyaḥ uvāca
iti uktvā vāsudevena devāḥ śakra purogamāḥ
kṛta añjali puṭāḥ bhūtvā papracchuḥ para mūvaram
devāḥ ūcuḥ

original: ko 'yaṃ kurukṣetra iti yatra puṇyaṃ pṛthūdakam /
analyzed: kaḥ yam kurukṣetre iti yatra puṇyam pṛthūdakam

original: udbhavaṃ tasya tīrthasya bhagavān prabravītu naḥ // VamP_22.23 //
analyzed: udbhavam tasya tīrthasya bhagavān prabravītu naḥ
kā iyam proktā mahā puṇyā tithīnām uttamā tithiḥ

original: yasyāṃ hi pitaro divyāḥ pūjyāsmābhiḥ prayantataḥ // VamP_22.24 //
analyzed: yasyām hi pitaraḥ divyāḥ pūjyāḥ asmābhiḥ
tatas surāṇām vacanāt murāriḥ kaiṭabha ardanaḥ
kurukṣetra udbhavam puṇyam proktavān tām tithīm api
śrī bhagavān uvāca
soma vaṃśa udbhavaḥ rājā ṛkṣaḥ nāma mahā balaḥ
kṛsi ādau samabhavat ṛkṣāt saṃvaraṇaḥ vat

original: sa ca pitrā nije rājye bāla evābhiṣecitaḥ /
analyzed: sa ca pitrā nije rājye bālaḥ evā abhiṣecitaḥ
bālye dharma nirataḥ mad bhaktaḥ ca sadā abhavat
purohitaḥ tu tasya āsīt vasiṣṭhaḥ varuṇa ātmajaḥ
sa ca asya adhyāpayāmāsa sa aṅgān vedān udāra dhīḥ
tatas jagāma ca araṇyam tu anadhyāye nṛpa ātmajaḥ

original: sarvakarmasu nikṣipya vasiṣṭhaṃ tapasāṃ nidhim // VamP_22.29 //
analyzed: sarva karmasu nikṣipya vasiṣṭham tapasām nidhim
tatas mṛgayā vyākṣepāt ekākī vijanam vanam
vaibhrājam sa jagāma atha atha unmādanam abhyayāt
tatas tu kautuka āviṣṭaḥ vane

original: avitṛpataḥ sugandhasya samantād vyacarad vanam // VamP_22.31 //
analyzed: a vitṛpataḥ sugandhasya samantāt vyacarat vanam
sa vanantam ca dadṛśe phulla kokanada āvṛtam
kahlāra padma kumudaiḥ kamala indīvaraiḥ api

original: tāsāṃ madhye dadarśātha kanyāṃ saṃvaraṇo 'dhikām // VamP_22.33 //
analyzed: tāsām madhye dadarśa atha kanyām saṃvaraṇaḥ dhikām
darśanāt eva sa nṛpaḥ kāma mārgaṇa pīḍitaḥ

original: jātaḥ sā ca tamīkṣyaiva kāmabāṇāturābhavat // VamP_22.34 //
analyzed: jātaḥ sā ca tam īkṣya eva kāma bāṇa āturā abhavat

original: ubhau tau pīḍitau mohaṃ jagmatuḥ kāmamārgaṇaiḥ /
analyzed: ubhau tau pīḍitau moham jagmatuḥ kāma mārgaṇaiḥ

original: rājā calāsano bhūmyāṃ nipapāta turaṅgamāt // VamP_22.35 //
analyzed: rājā cala āsanaḥ bhūmyām nipapāta turaṅgamāt
tam abhyetya mahātmānaḥ gandharvāḥ kāmarūpiṇaḥ
siṣicuḥ vāriṇā abhyetya labdha saṃjñaḥ bhavat kṣaṇāt
sā ca apsarobhiḥ utpātya nītā pitṛ kulam nijam
tābhiḥ āśvāsitā ca api madhuraiḥ vacana ambubhiḥ
sa ca api a ruhya turagam pratiṣṭhānam pura uttamam
gataḥ tu meru śikharam kāma cārī yathā amaraḥ

original: yadāprabhṛti sā dṛṣṭā ārkṣiṇā tapatī girau /
analyzed: yadā prabhṛti sā dṛṣṭā ārkṣiṇā tapatī girau

original: tadāprabhṛti nāśnāti divā svapiti no niśi // VamP_22.39 //
analyzed: tadā prabhṛti na aśnāti divā svapiti no niśi
tatas sarva vid avyagraḥ viditvā varuṇa ātmajaḥ

original: tapatītāpitaṃ vīraṃ pārthivaṃ tapasāṃ nidhiḥ // VamP_22.40 //
analyzed: tapatītāpitam vīram pārthivam tapasām nidhiḥ

original: viveśa devaṃ tigmāṃśu dadarśa syandane sthitam // VamP_22.41 //
analyzed: viveśa devam tigmāṃśu dadarśa syandane sthitam

original: taṃ dṛṣṭvā bhāskaraṃ devaṃ praṇamad dvijasattamaḥ /
analyzed: tam dṛṣṭvā bhāskaram devam praṇamat dvijasattamaḥ
pratipraṇamitaḥ ca asau bhāskareṇa āviśat rathe

original: śobhate vāruṇiḥ śrīmān dvitīya iva bhāskaraḥ // VamP_22.43 //
analyzed: śobhate vāruṇiḥ śrīmān dvitīyaḥ iva bhāskaraḥ
tatas saṃpūjita ūrghārbhāskareṇa tapodhanaḥ
pṛṣṭaḥ ca āgamane hetum pratyuvāca divākaram

original: sutāṃ saṃvaraṇasyārthe tasya tvaṃ dātumarhasi // VamP_22.45 //
analyzed: sutām saṃvaraṇasya arthe tasya tvam dātum arhasi

original: tato vasiṣṭhāya divākareṇa niveditā sā tapatī tanūjā /
analyzed: tatas vasiṣṭhāya divākareṇa niveditā sā tapatī tanūjā

original: gṛhāgatāya dvijapuṅgavāya rājñor'thataḥ saṃvaraṇasya devāḥ // VamP_22.46 //
analyzed: gṛhāgatāya dvija puṅgavāya rājñaḥ ūrthataḥ saṃvaraṇasya devāḥ
sāvitrim ādāya tatas vasiṣṭhaḥ svam āśramam puṇyam upājagāma

original: sā cāpi saṃsmṛtya nṛpātmajaṃ taṃ kṛtāñjalirvāruṇimāha devī // VamP_22.47 //
analyzed: sā ca api saṃsmṛtya nṛpa ātmajam tam kṛtāñjaliḥ vāruṇim āha devī
