original: brahman mayā khedamupetya yo hi sahāpsarobhiḥ paricārikābhiḥ /
analyzed: brahman mayā khedam upetya yaḥ hi saha apsarobhiḥ paricārikābhiḥ
dṛṣṭaḥ hi araṇye mara garbha tulyaḥ nṛpa ātmajaḥ lakṣaṇataḥ bhijāne

original: pādau śubhau cakragadāsicihnau jaṅghe tathorū karihastatulyau /
analyzed: pādau śubhau cakra gadā asi cihnau jaṅghe tathā ūrū kari hasta tulyau

original: kaṭistathā siṃhakaṭiryathaiva kṣāmaṃ ca madhyaṃ tribalīnibaddham // VamP_22.49 //
analyzed: kaṭiḥ tathā siṃha kaṭiḥ yathā eva kṣāmam ca madhyam tri balī nibaddham

original: grīvāsya śaṅkhākṛtimādadhāti bhujau ca pīnau kaṭhanausudīrghau /
analyzed: grīvā asya śaṅkha ākṛtim ādadhāti bhujau ca pīnau

original: hastau tathā padmadalodbhavāṅkau chatrākṛtistasya śiro vibhāti // VamP_22.50 //
analyzed: hastau tathā padma dala udbhava aṅkau chatra ākṛtiḥ tasya śiraḥ vibhāti

original: nīlāśca keśāḥ kuṭilāśca tasya karṇau samāṃsau susamā ca nāsā /
analyzed: nīlāḥ ca keśāḥ kuṭilāḥ ca tasya karṇau sa māṃsau su samā ca nāsā

original: dīrghāśca tasyāṅgulayaḥ suparvāḥ padbhyāṃ karābhyāṃ daśanāśca subhrāḥ // VamP_22.51 //
analyzed: dīrghāḥ ca tasya aṅgulayaḥ su parvāḥ padbhyām karābhyām daśanāḥ ca su bhrāḥ
samunnataḥ ṣaḍbhiḥ udāra vīryaḥ tribhiḥ gabhīraḥ tripu ca pralambaḥ
raktaḥ tathā pañcasu rāja putraḥ kṛṣṇaḥ caturbhiḥ tribhiḥ ānataḥ

original: dvābhyāṃ ca śuklaḥ surābhiścaturbhiḥ dṛśyanti padmāni daśaiva cāsya /
analyzed: dvābhyām ca śuklaḥ surābhiḥ caturbhiḥ dṛśyanti padmāni daśa eva ca asya

original: vṛtaḥ sa bhartā bhagavān hi pūrvaṃ taṃ rājaputraṃ bhuvi saṃvicintya // VamP_22.53 //
analyzed: vṛtaḥ sa bhartā bhagavān hi pūrvam tam rāja putram bhuvi saṃvicintya

original: dadasva māṃ nātha tapasvine 'smai guṇopapannāya samīhitāya /
analyzed: dadasva mām nātha tapasvine smai guṇa upapannāya samīhitāya

original: nehānyakāmāṃ pravadanti santo dātuṃ tathānyasya vibho kṣamasva // VamP_22.54 //
analyzed: na iha anya kāmām pravadanti santaḥ dātum tathā anyasya vibho kṣamasva
devadevaḥ uvāca

original: ityevamuktaḥ savituśca putryā ṛṣistadā dhyānaparo babhūva /
analyzed: iti evam uktaḥ savituḥ ca putryāḥ ṛṣiḥ tadā dhyāna paraḥ babhūva

original: jñātvā ca tatrārkasutāṃ sakāmāṃ mudā yuto vākyamidaṃ jagāda // VamP_22.55 //
analyzed: jñātvā ca tatra arkasutām sa kāmām mudā yutaḥ vākyam idam jagāda

original: sa eva putri nṛpatestanūjo dṛṣṭaḥ purā kāmayase yamadya /
analyzed: saḥ eva putri nṛpateḥ tanūjaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ purā kāmayase yam adya

original: sa eva cāyāti mamāśramaṃ vai ṛkṣātmajaḥ saṃvaraṇo hi nāmnā // VamP_22.56 //
analyzed: saḥ eva ca āyāti mama āśramam vai ṛkṣa ātmajaḥ saṃvaraṇaḥ hi nāmnā
atha ājagāma sa nṛpasya putraḥ tam āśramam brāhmaṇapuṅkavasya

original: dṛṣṭvā vasiṣṭhaṃ praṇipatya mūrdhnā sthitastvapaśyat tapatīṃ narendraḥ // VamP_22.57 //
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā vasiṣṭham praṇipatya mūrdhnā sthitaḥ tu apaśyat tapatīm narendraḥ

original: dṛṣṭvā ca tāṃ padmaviśālanetrāṃ tāṃ pūrvadṛṣṭāmiti cintayitvā /
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā ca tām padma viśāla netrām tām pūrva dṛṣṭām iti cintayitvā

original: papraccha keyaṃ lalanā dvijendra sa vāruṇiḥ prāha narādhipendram // VamP_22.58 //
analyzed: papraccha kā iyam lalanā dvijendra sa vāruṇiḥ prāha narādhipa indram

original: iyaṃ vivasvadduhitā narendra nāmnā prasiddhā tapatī pṛthivyām /
analyzed: iyam vivasvat duhitā narendra nāmnā prasiddhā tapatī pṛthivyām

original: mayā tavārthāya divākaro 'rthitaḥ prādānmayā tvāśramamānininye // VamP_22.59 //
analyzed: mayā tava arthāya divākaraḥ rthitaḥ prādāt mayā tu āśramam ānininye

original: tasmāt masuttiṣcha narendra devyāḥ pāṇiṃ tapatyā vidhivad gṛhāṇa /
analyzed: tasmāt narendra devyāḥ pāṇim tapatyāḥ vidhivat gṛhāṇa

original: ityevamukto nṛpatiḥ prahṛṣṭo jagrāha pāṇiṃ vidhivat tapatyāḥ // VamP_22.60 //
analyzed: iti evam uktaḥ nṛpatiḥ prahṛṣṭaḥ jagrāha pāṇim vidhivat tapatyāḥ

original: sā taṃ patiṃ prāpya mano 'bhirāmaṃ sūryāmajā śakrasamāprabhāvam /
analyzed: sā tam patim prāpya manaḥ abhirāmam sūryām ajā śakra samā prabhāvam

original: rarāma tanvī bhavanottameṣu yatā mahaindraṃ divi daityakanyā // VamP_22.61 //
analyzed: rarāma tanvī bhavana uttameṣu yatā mahā aindram divi daitya kanyā
devadevaḥ uvāca

original: tasyāṃ tapatyāṃ narasattamena jātaḥ sutaḥ pārthivalakṣaṇastu /
analyzed: tasyām tapatyām nara sattamena jātaḥ sutaḥ pārthiva lakṣaṇaḥ tu

original: sa jātakarmādibhireva saṃskṛto vivarddhatājyena huto yathāgniḥ // VamP_23.1 //
analyzed: sa jātakarma ādibhiḥ eva saṃskṛtaḥ vivarddhata ājyena hutaḥ yathā agniḥ
kṛtaḥ sya cūḍākaraṇaḥ ca devāḥ mitrāvaruṇa ātmajena

original: navābdikasya vratabandhanaṃ ca vede ca śāstre vidhipārago 'būt // VamP_23.2 //
analyzed: nava ābdikasya vrata bandhanam ca vede ca śāstre vidhi pāragaḥ
tatas catur paḍbhiḥ api iha varṣaiḥ sarvajña tām abhyagamata

original: khyātaḥ pṛthivyāṃ puruṣottamo 'sau nāmnā kuruḥ saṃvaraṇasya putraḥ // VamP_23.3 //
analyzed: khyātaḥ pṛthivyām puruṣa uttamaḥ sau nāmnā kuruḥ saṃvaraṇasya putraḥ
tatas narapatiḥ dṛṣṭvā dharmikam tanayam śubham
dārakriyā artham akarot yatnam śubha kule tatas
sodāminīm sudāmnaḥ tu sutām rūpa adhikām napaḥ

original: kurorarthāya vatavān sa prādāt kurave 'pi tām // VamP_23.5 //
analyzed: kuroḥ arthāya sa prādāt kurave pi tām
sa tām nṛpa sutām labdhvā dharma arthau avirodhayan

original: reme tanvyā saha tayā paulomyā maghavāniva // VamP_23.6 //
analyzed: reme tanvyā saha tayā paulomyā maghavān iva
tatas narapatiḥ putram rājya bhāra kṣamam balī
viditvā yovarājyāya vidhānena abhyaṣecayat

original: tato rājye 'bhiṣiktastu kuruḥ pitrā nije pade /
analyzed: tatas rājye bhiṣiktaḥ tu kuruḥ pitrā nije pade

original: pālayāmāsa sa mahīṃ putravacca svayaṃ prajāḥ // VamP_23.8 //
analyzed: pālayāmāsa sa mahīm putra vat ca svayam prajāḥ

original: sa eva kṣetrapālo 'bhūt paśupālaḥ sa eva hi /
analyzed: saḥ eva kṣetrapālaḥ bhūt paśupālaḥ saḥ eva hi
sa sarva pālakaḥ ca āsīt prajāpālaḥ mahā balaḥ
tatas sya buddhiḥ upannā kīrtiḥ loke garīyasī

original: yāvatkīrtiḥ susaṃsthā hi tāvadvāsaḥ suraiḥ saha // VamP_23.10 //
analyzed: yāvat kīrtiḥ su saṃsthā hi tāvat vāsaḥ suraiḥ saha
sa tu evam nṛpati śreṣṭhaḥ yāthātathyam avekṣya ca

original: vicacāra mahīṃ sarvāṃ kīrtyarthaṃ tu narādhipaḥ // VamP_23.11 //
analyzed: vicacāra mahīm sarvām kīrti artham tu narādhipaḥ

original: tato dvaitavanaṃ nāma puṇyaṃ lokeśvaro balī/ /
analyzed: tatas dvaitavanam nāma puṇyam loka īśvaraḥ balī
tat āsādya su saṃtuṣṭaḥ viveśa ābhyā antaram tatas
tatra devīm dadarśa atha puṇyām pāpa vimocanīm

original: plakṣajāṃ brahmaṇaḥ putrīṃ harijihvāṃ sarasvatīm // VamP_23.13 //
analyzed: plakṣajām brahmaṇaḥ putrīm hari jihvām sarasvatīm
sudarśanasya jananīm hvandam kṛtvā su vistaram
sthitām bhagavatīm kūle tīrtha koṭibhiḥ āplutām
tasyāḥ tat jalam īkṣya eva snātvā prītaḥ bhavat nṛpaḥ

original: samājagāma ca punaḥ brahmaṇo vedimuttarām // VamP_23.15 //
analyzed: samājagāma ca punar brahmaṇaḥ vedim uttarām
samantapañcakam nāma dharma sthānam anuttamam

original: ākamantād yojanāni pañca ca sarvataḥ // VamP_23.16 //
analyzed: ākamantāt yojanāni pañca ca sarvatas
devāḥ ūcuḥ
kiyantyaḥ vedayaḥ santi brahmaṇaḥ puruṣottama
yena uttara tayā vediḥ gāditā sarva pañcakā
devadevaḥ uvāca
vedayaḥ loka nāthasya pañca dharmasya setavaḥ

original: yāsu yaṣṭaṃ sureśena lokanāthena śaṃbhunā // VamP_23.18 //
analyzed: yāsu yaṣṭam sureśena lokanāthena śaṃbhunā
prayāgaḥ madhyamā vediḥ pūrvā vediḥ gayāśiraḥ
virajāḥ dakṣiṇā vediḥ ananta phala dāyinī
pratīcī puṣkarā vediḥ tribhiḥ kuṇḍaiḥ alaṅkṛtā
samantapañcakā ca uktā vediḥ evā uttarā avyayā
tam amanyata rājarṣiḥ idam kṣetram mahā phalam

original: kariṣyāmi kṛṣiṣyāmi sarvān kāmān yathepsitān // VamP_23.21 //
analyzed: kariṣyāmi kṛṣiṣyāmi sarvān kāmān yathā īpsitān
iti saṃcintya manasā tyaktvā syantanam uttamam
cakre kīrti artham atulam saṃsthānam pārthiva ṛṣabhaḥ

original: kṛtvā sīraṃ sa sauvarṇaṃ gahya rudravṛṣaṃ prabhuḥ /
analyzed: kṛtvā sīram sa sauvarṇam gahya rudra vṛṣam prabhuḥ
pauṇḍrakam yāmya mahiṣam svayam karṣitum udyataḥ
tam karṣantam nara varam samabhyetya takratuḥ

original: provāca rājan kimidaṃ bhavān kartumihodyataḥ // VamP_23.23 //
analyzed: provāca rājan kim idam bhavān kartum iha udyataḥ
tam karṣantam nara varam samabhyetya śatakratuḥ

original: provāca rājan kimidaṃ bhavān kartumihodyataḥ // VamP_23.24 //
analyzed: provāca rājan kim idam bhavān kartum iha udyataḥ

original: rājābravīt suravaraṃ tapaḥ satyaṃ kṣamāṃ dayām /
analyzed: rājā abravīt suravaram tapaḥ satyam kṣamām dayām

original: kṛṣāmi śaucaṃ dānaṃ ca yogaṃ ca brahmacāritām // VamP_23.25 //
analyzed: kṛṣāmi śaucam dānam ca yogam ca brahmacāri tām
tasya uvāca hariḥ devaḥ kasmāt bījaḥ nareśvara
labdhaḥ u ṣṭa aṅgā iti sahasā avahasya gataḥ tatas
gate pi śakra rājarṣiḥ ahani ahani sīradhṛk
kṛṣate nyān samantāt ca sapta krośāt mahīpatiḥ
tatas ham abruvam gatvā kuro kim idam iti atha

original: tadāṣṭāṅgaṃ mahādharmaṃ samākhyātaṃ nṛpeṇa hi // VamP_23.28 //
analyzed: tadā aṣṭāṅgam mahā dharmam samākhyātam nṛpeṇa hi

original: tato mayāsya gaditaṃ nṛpa bījaṃ kva tiṣṭhati /
analyzed: tatas mayā asya gaditam nṛpa bījam kva tiṣṭhati

original: sa cāha mama dehasthaṃ bījaṃ tamahamabruvam /
analyzed: sa ca āha mama deha stham bījam tam aham abruvam

original: dehyahaṃ vāpayiṣyāmi sīraṃ kṛṣatu vai bhavān // VamP_23.29 //
analyzed: dehi aham vāpayiṣyāmi sīram kṛṣatu vai bhavān
tatas nṛpatinā bāhuḥ dakṣiṇaḥ prasṛtaḥ kataḥ

original: prasṛtaṃ taṃ bhujaṃ dṛṣṭvā mayā cakreṇa vegataḥ // VamP_23.30 //
analyzed: prasṛtam tam bhujam dṛṣṭvā mayā cakreṇa vegataḥ
sahasradhā tatas chidya dattaḥ yuṣmākam eva hi

original: tataḥ savyo bhujo rājñā dattaś chinno 'pyasau mayā // VamP_23.31 //
analyzed: tatas savyaḥ bhujaḥ rājñā dattaḥ chinnaḥ u pi asau mayā
tathā evā ūru yugam prādāt mayā chinnau ca tau ubhau

original: tataḥ sa me śiraḥ prādāt tena prīte 'smi tasya ca /
analyzed: tatas sa me śiraḥ prādāt tena prīte smi tasya ca
vara daḥ smi iti atha iti ukte kuruḥ varam ayācata
yāvat etat mayā kṛṣṭam dharma kṣetram tat astu ca

original: snātānāṃ ca mṛtānāṃ ca mahāpuṇyaphalaṃ tviha // VamP_23.33 //
analyzed: snātānām ca mṛtānām ca mahā puṇya phalam tu iha

original: upavāsaṃ ca dānaṃ ca snānaṃ japyaṃ ca mādhava /
analyzed: upavāsam ca dānam ca snānam japyam ca mādhava
homa yajña ādikam ca anyat śubham vā api aśubham vibho
tvad prasāt hṛṣīkeśa śaṅkha cakra gadā dhara

original: akṣayaṃ pravare kṣetre bhavatvatra mahāphalam // VamP_23.35 //
analyzed: akṣayam pravare kṣetre bhavatu atra mahā phalam

original: tathā bhavān suraiḥ sārdhaṃ samaṃ devena śalinā /
analyzed: tathā bhavān suraiḥ sārdham samam devena śalinā
vasa tvam puṇḍarīkākṣa mad nāma vyañjake cyuta
iti evam uktaḥ tena aham rājñā bāḍham uvāca tam

original: tathā ca tvaṃ divyavapurbhava bhūyo mahīpate /
analyzed: tathā ca tvam divya vapuḥ bhava bhūyas mahīpate
tathā antakāle mām eva layaṭam eṣyasi suvrata

original: kīrtiśca śāśvatī tubhyaṃ bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ /
analyzed: kīrtiḥ ca śāśvatī tubhyam bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ

original: tatraiva yājakā yajñān yajiṣyanti sahasraśaḥ // VamP_23.38 //
analyzed: tatra eva yājakāḥ yajñān yajiṣyanti sahasraśas

original: tasya kṣetrasya rakṣārthaṃ dadau sa puruṣottamaḥ /
analyzed: tasya kṣetrasya rakṣā artham dadau sa puruṣottamaḥ

original: yakṣaṃ ca candranāmānaṃ vāsukiṃ cāpi pannagam // VamP_23.39 //
analyzed: yakṣam ca candra nāmānam vāsukim ca api pannagam
vidyādharam śaṅkukarṇam sukeśim rākṣaseśvaram

original: ajāvanaṃ ca nṛpatiṃ mahodevaṃ ca pāvakam // VamP_23.40 //
analyzed: ajāvanam ca nṛpatim mahodevam ca pāvakam
etāni sarvatas bhyetya rakṣanti kurujāṅgalam
amīṣām balinaḥ nye ca bhṛtyāḥ ca eva anuyāyinaḥ

original: aṣṭau sahasrāṇi dharanurdharāṇāṃ ye vārayantīha suduṣkṛtān vai /
analyzed: aṣṭau sahasrāṇi dharanurdharāṇām ye vārayanti iha su duṣkṛtān vai

original: snātuṃ na yacchanti mahograrūpāstavanyasya bhūtāḥ sacarācarāṇām // VamP_23.42 //
analyzed: snātum na yacchanti mahā ugra rūpāḥ tava nyasya bhūtāḥ sa carācarāṇām

original: tasyaiva madhye bahupuṇya uktaḥ pṛthūdakaḥ pāpaharaḥ śivaśca /
analyzed: tasya eva madhye bahu puṇyaḥ uktaḥ pṛthūdakaḥ pāpa haraḥ śivaḥ ca

original: puṇyā nadī prāṅmukhatāṃ prayātā yatraughayuktasya śubhā jatāḍhyā // VamP_23.43 //
analyzed: puṇyā nadī prāc mukha tām prayātā yatra ogha yuktasya śubhā jata āḍhyā

original: pūrvaṃ prajeyaṃ prapitāmahena sṛṣṭā samaṃ bhūtagaṇaiḥ samastaiḥ /
analyzed: pūrvam prajā iyam prapitāmahena sṛṣṭā samam bhūta gaṇaiḥ samastaiḥ

original: mahī jalaṃ vahnisamīrameva khaṃ tvevamādau vibabhau pṛthūdakaḥ // VamP_23.44 //
analyzed: mahī jalam vahni samīram eva kham tu evam ādau vibabhau pṛthu udakaḥ

original: tathā ca sarvāṇā mahārṇavāni tīrthāni nadyaḥ stravaṇāḥ sarāṃsi /
analyzed: tathā ca mahā arṇavāni tīrthāni nadyaḥ stravaṇāḥ sarāṃsi

original: saṃnirmitānīha mahābhujena taccaikyamāgāt salilaṃ mahīṣu // VamP_23.45 //
analyzed: saṃnirmitāni iha mahā bhujena tat ca aikyam āgāt salilam mahīṣu
devadevaḥ uvāca
evam pṛthūdakaḥ devāḥ puṇyaḥ pāpa bhaya apahaḥ

original: taṃ gacchadhvaṃ mahātīrthaṃ yāvat saṃnidhivodhitam // VamP_24.1 //
analyzed: tam gacchadhvam mahā tīrtham yāvat saṃnidhi vodhitam
yadā mṛgaśiraḥ ṛkṣe śaśi sūryau bṛhaspatiḥ

original: tiṣṭhanti sā tithiḥ puṇyā tvakṣayā parigīyate // VamP_24.2 //
analyzed: tiṣṭhanti sā tithiḥ puṇyā tu akṣayā parigīyate

original: taṃ gacchadhvaṃ suraśreṣṭhā yatra prācī sarasvatī /
analyzed: tam gacchadhvam sura śreṣṭhāḥ yatra prācī sarasvatī

original: pitṝn ārādhayadhvaṃ hi tatra śrāddhena bhaktitataḥ // VamP_24.3 //
analyzed: pitṝn ārādhayadhvam hi tatra śrāddhena bhakti tatas
tatas murāri vacanam śrutvā devāḥ sa vāsavāḥ
samājagmuḥ kurukṣetre puṇya tīrtham pṛthūdakam
tatra snātvā surāḥ sarve bṛhaspatim acodayan
viśasva bhagavan ṛkṣam imam mṛśiram kuru

original: puṇyāṃ tithiṃ pāpaharāṃ tava kālo 'yamāgataḥ // VamP_24.5 //
analyzed: puṇyām tithim pāpa harām tava kālaḥ yam āgataḥ
pravartate raviḥ tatra candramāḥ api viśati asau

original: tvadāyattaṃ guro kāryaṃ surāṇāṃ tat kuruṣva ca // VamP_24.6 //
analyzed: tvad āyattam guro kāryam surāṇām tat kuruṣva ca
iti evam uktaḥ devaiḥ tu devācāryaḥ bravīt idam

original: yadi varṣādhipo 'haṃ syāṃ tato yāsyāmi devatāḥ // VamP_24.7 //
analyzed: yadi varṣādhipaḥ ham syām tatas yāsyāmi devatāḥ
āṣāḍhe māsi mārga ṛkṣe candra kṣaya tithiḥ hi yā

original: tasyāṃ purandaraḥ prītaḥ piṇḍaṃ pitṛṣu bhaktitaḥ // VamP_24.8 //
analyzed: tasyām purandaraḥ prītaḥ piṇḍam pitṛṣu bhaktitaḥ
prādāt tila madhu unmiśram haviṣya annam kuruṣu atha

original: tataḥ prītāstu pitarastāṃ prāhustanayāṃ nijāma // VamP_24.9 //
analyzed: tatas prītāḥ tu pitaraḥ tām prāhuḥ tanayām nijāma

original: menāṃ devāśca śailāya himayuktāya vai daduḥ /
analyzed: menām devāḥ ca śailāya hima yuktāya vai daduḥ
tām menām himavān labdhvā prasādāt daivateṣu atha
prītimān abhavat ca asau rarāma ca yathā icchayā

original: tato himādriḥ pitṛkanyayā samaṃ samarpayan vai viṣayān yathaiṣṭam /
analyzed: tatas himādriḥ pitṛ kanyayā samam samarpayan vai viṣayān yathaiṣṭam

original: ajījanat sā tanayāśca tisro rūpātiyuktāḥ surayoṣitopamāḥ // VamP_24.11 //
analyzed: ajījanat sā tanayāḥ ca tisraḥ rūpa ati yuktāḥ sura yoṣitā upamāḥ
iti śrī vāmanapurāṇe caturviṃśaḥ dhyāyaḥ
pulastyaḥ uvāca

original: rāgiṇi nāma saṃjātā jyeṣṭhā menāsutā mune // VamP_25.2 //

original: kartuṃ tapaḥ prayātāstā devāstā dadṛśuḥ śubhāḥ // VamP_25.5 //

original: bharadvāja śṛṇuṣva tvamaṅgirastvaṃ śṛṇuṣva ca // VamP_26.9 //
analyzed: bharadvāja śṛṇuṣva tvam aṅgiraḥ tvam śṛṇuṣva ca
mama āsīt dakṣa tanujā priyā sā dakṣa kopataḥ

original: utsasarja satī prāṇān yogadṛṣṭya purā kilaḥ // VamP_26.10 //
analyzed: utsasarja satī prāṇān yoga dṛṣṭya purā kilaḥ
sā adya bhūyas samudbhūtā śailarāja sutā umā

original: sā madarthāya śailendro yācyatāṃ dvijasattamāḥ // VamP_26.11 //
analyzed: sā mad arthāya śailendraḥ yācyatām dvijasattamāḥ
pulastyaḥ uvāca
saptarṣayaḥ tu evam uktāḥ bāḍham iti abruvan vacaḥ
om namaḥ śaṅkarāya iti proktvā jagmuḥ himālayam
tatas pi arundhatīm śarvaḥ prāha gacchasva sundari

original: purandhryo hi purandhrīṇāṃ gatiṃ dharmasya ve viduḥ // VamP_26.13 //
analyzed: purandhryaḥ hi purandhrīṇām gatim dharmasya ve viduḥ
iti evam uktā durlaṅghyam loka ācāram tu arundhatī

original: namaste rudra ityuktvā jagāma patinā saha // VamP_26.14 //
analyzed: namaḥ te rudraḥ iti uktvā jagāma patinā saha
gatvā himādri śikharam oṣadhiprastham eva ca
dadṛśuḥ śailarājasya purīm sura purīm iva
tatas saṃpūjyamānāḥ te śaila yoṣidbhiḥ ādarāt
sunābha ādibhiḥ avyagraiḥ pujyamānāḥ tu parvataiḥ
gandharvaiḥ kiṃnaraiḥ yakṣaiḥ tathā anyaiḥ tad purassaraiḥ
viviśuḥ bhavanam ramyam himādreḥ hāṭaka ujjavalam
tatas sarve mahātmānāḥ tapasā dhauta kalmaṣāḥ
samāsādya mahādvāram saṃtasthuḥ dvāḥstha kāraṇāt
tatas tu tvaritaḥ bhyāgāt dvāḥsthaḥ driḥ gandhamādanaḥ

original: dhārayan vai kare daṇḍaṃ padmarāgamayaṃ mahat // VamP_26.19 //
analyzed: dhārayan vai kare daṇḍam padmarāga mayam mahat
tatas tam ūcuḥ munayaḥ gatvā śailapatim śubham
nivedaya asmān saṃprāptān mahat kāri arthinaḥ vayam
iti evam uktaḥ śaila indraḥ ṛṣibhiḥ gandhamādanaḥ
jagāma tatra yatra āste śailarājaḥ dribhiḥ vṛtaḥ

original: niṣaṇṇo bhuvi jānubhyāṃ dattvā hastau mukhe giriḥ /
analyzed: niṣaṇṇaḥ bhuvi jānubhyām dattvā hastau mukhe giriḥ
daṇḍam nikṣipya kakṣāyām idam vacanam abravīt
gandhamādanaḥ uvāca

original: ime hi ṛṣayaḥ prāptāḥ śailarāja tavārthinaḥ /
analyzed: ime hi ṛṣayaḥ prāptāḥ śailarāja tava arthinaḥ

original: dvāre sthaitāḥ kāryiṇaste tava darśanalālasāḥ // VamP_26.23 //
analyzed: dvāre sthaitāḥ kāryiṇaḥ te tava darśana lālasāḥ
pulastyaḥ uvāca
dvāḥstha vākyam samākarṇya samutthāya acala īśvaraḥ
svayam abhyāgamat dvāri samādāya arghyam uttamam
tān rcya arghya ādinā śailaḥ samānīya sabhā talam
uvāca vākyam vākya jñaḥ kṛta āsana parigrahān
himavān uvāca
anabhra vṛṣṭiḥ kim iyam uta aho kusumam phalam
apratarkyam acintyam ca bhavat āgamanam tu idam
adya prabhṛti dhanyaḥ smi sattamāḥ
saṃśuddha dehaḥ yat bhavantaḥ mama ajiram
ātma saṃsarga saṃśuddham kṛtavantaḥ dvijottamāḥ

original: dṛṣṭipūtaṃ padākrāntaṃ tīrthaṃ sārasvataṃ yathā // VamP_26.28 //
analyzed: dṛṣṭi pūtam pada ākrāntam tīrtham sārasvatam yathā

original: dāso 'haṃ bhavatāṃ viprāḥ kṛtapuṇyaś ca sāṃpratam /
analyzed: dāsaḥ ham bhavatām viprāḥ kṛta puṇyaḥ ca sāṃpratam

original: yenārthino hi te yūyaṃ tanmamājñātumarhatha // VamP_26.29 //
analyzed: yena arthinaḥ hi te yūyam tat mama ājñātum arhatha
sa dāraḥ ham samam putraiḥ bhṛtyaiḥ naptṛbhiḥ avyayāḥ
smi sthitaḥ yuṣmad ājñā kārī tat ucyatām
pulastyaḥ uvāca
śailarāja vacaḥ śrutvā ṛṣayaḥ saṃśita vrataḥ
ūcuḥ aṅgirasam vṛddham kāryam adrau nivedaya
iti evam coditaḥ sarvaiḥ ṛṣibiḥ kaśyapa ādibhiḥ

original: pratyuvāca paraṃ vākyaṃ girirājaṃ tamaṅgirāḥ // VamP_26.32 //
analyzed: pratyuvāca param vākyam giri rājam tam aṅgirāḥ
aṅgirāḥ uvāca

original: śrūyatāṃ parvataśreṣṭha yena kāryeṇa vai vayam /
analyzed: śrūyatām parvata śreṣṭha yena kāryeṇa vai vayam
samāgatāḥ tvad sadanam arundhatyā samam gire
yaḥ sau mahātmā sarva ātmā dakṣa yajña kṣayaṅkaraḥ
jīmūtaketuḥ śatrughnaḥ yajñabhoktā svayam prabhuḥ

original: yamīśvaraṃ vadantyeke śivaṃ sthāṇau bhavaṃ haram // VamP_26.35 //
analyzed: yam īśvaram vadanti eke śivam sthāṇau bhavam haram
bhīmam ugram maheśānam mahādevam paśoḥ patim

original: vayaṃ tena preṣitāḥ smastvatsakāśaṃ girīśvara // VamP_26.36 //
analyzed: vayam tena preṣitāḥ smaḥ tvad sakāśam girīśvara

original: iyaṃ yā tvatsutā kālī sarvalokeṣu sundarī /
analyzed: iyam yā tvad sutā kālī sarva lokeṣu sundarī

original: tāṃ prārthayati deveśastāṃ bhavān dātumarhati // VamP_26.37 //
analyzed: tām prārthayati deveśaḥ tām bhavān dātum arhati

original: sa eva dhanyo hi pitā yasya putrī śubhaṃ patim /
analyzed: saḥ eva dhanyaḥ hi pitā yasya putrī śubham patim
rūpa abhijana saṃpattyā prāpnoti giri sattama
yāvantaḥ jaṅgama agamyāḥ bhūtāḥ śaila caturvidhāḥ

original: teṣāṃ mātā tviyaṃ devī yataḥ proktaḥ pitā haraḥ // VamP_26.39 //
analyzed: teṣām mātā tu iyam devī yatas proktaḥ pitā haraḥ

original: praṇamya śaṅkaraṃ devāḥ praṇamantu sutāṃ tava /
analyzed: praṇamya śaṅkaram devāḥ praṇamantu sutām tava

original: kuruṣva pādaṃ śatrūṇāṃ mūrdhni bhasmapariplutam // VamP_26.40 //
analyzed: kuruṣva pādam śatrūṇām mūrdhni bhasma pariplutam

original: yācitāro vayaṃ śarvo varo dātā tvamapyumā /
analyzed: yācitāraḥ vayam śarvaḥ varaḥ dātā tvam api umā

original: vadhūḥ sarvajaganmātā kuru yacchreyase tava // VamP_26.41 //
analyzed: vadhūḥ sarva jagat mātā kuru yat śreyase tava
pulastyaḥ uvāca
tat vacaḥ ṅgirasaḥ śrutvā kālī tasthau adhomukhī
harṣam āgatya sahasā punar dainyam upāgatā
tatas śaila patiḥ prāha parvatam gandhamādanam
gaccha śailān upāmantrya sarvān āgāntuḥ mahasi
tatas śīghrataraḥ śailaḥ gṛhāt gṛham agāt javī
meru ādīn parvata śreṣṭhān ājuhāva samantataḥ
te pi ājagmuḥ tvarāvantaḥ kāryam matvā mahat tadā
viviśuḥ vismaya āviṣṭāḥ sauvarṇeṣu āsaneṣu te
udayaḥ hemakūṭaḥ ca ramyakaḥ mandaraḥ tathā
uddālakaḥ vāruṇaḥ ca varāhaḥ garuḍa āsanaḥ
śuktimān vegasānuḥ ca śṛṅvān
citrakūṭaḥ trikūṭaḥ ca tathā mandaraka acalaḥ
vindhyaḥ ca malayaḥ ca eva durdaraḥ
kailāsa adriḥ mahendraḥ ca niṣadhaḥ ñjanaparvataḥ
ete pradhānāḥ girayaḥ tathā anye kṣudra parvatāḥ

original: uviṣṭāḥ sabhāyāṃ vai praṇipatya ṛṣiṃśca tān // VamP_26.49 //
analyzed: uviṣṭāḥ sabhāyām vai praṇipatya ṛṣin ca tān

original: tato girīśaḥ svāṃ bhāryā menāmāhūtavāṃśca saḥ /
analyzed: tatas girīśaḥ svām bhāryāḥ menām āhūtavān ca saḥ

original: samāgacchata kalyāṇī samaṃ putreṇa bhāminī // VamP_26.50 //
analyzed: samāgacchata kalyāṇī samam putreṇa bhāminī
sā abhivandya ṛṣīṇām hi cāraṇān ca tapasvinī

original: sarvān jñātīn samābhāṣya viveśa sasutā tataḥ // VamP_26.51 //
analyzed: sarvān jñātīn samābhāṣya viveśa sa sutā tatas
tatas driṣu mahā śaile upaviṣṭeṣu nārada

original: uvāca vākyaṃ vākyajñaḥ sarvānābhāṣya susvaram // VamP_26.52 //
analyzed: uvāca vākyam vākya jñaḥ sarvān ābhāṣya su svaram
himavān uvāca

original: ime saptarṣayaḥ puṇyā yācitāraḥ sutāṃ mama /
analyzed: ime saptarṣayaḥ puṇyāḥ yācitāraḥ sutām mama

original: maheśvarārthaṃ kanyāṃ tu taccāvedyaṃ bhavatsu vai // VamP_26.53 //
analyzed: maheśvara artham kanyām tu tat ca āvedyam bhavatsu vai

original: tad vadadhvaṃ yathāprajñaṃ jñātayo yūyameva me /
analyzed: tat vadadhvam yathāprajñam jñātayaḥ yūyam eva me

original: nollaṅghya yuṣmān dāsyāmi tatkṣamaṃ vaktumarhatha // VamP_26.54 //
analyzed: na ullaṅghya yuṣmān dāsyāmi tat kṣamam vaktum arhatha
pulastyaḥ uvāca
himavat vacanam śrutvā meru ādyāḥ sthāvara uttamāḥ

original: sarva evābruvan vākyaṃ sthitāḥ sveṣvāsaneṣu te // VamP_26.55 //
analyzed: sarve eva abruvan vākyam sthitāḥ sveṣu āsaneṣu te
yācitāraḥ ca munayaḥ varaḥ tripura hā haraḥ

original: dīyatāṃ śaila kālīyaṃ jāmātābhimato hi naḥ // VamP_26.56 //
analyzed: dīyatām śaila kālīyam jāmātā abhimataḥ hi naḥ
menā api atha āha bhartāram śṛṇu śailendra mad vacaḥ
pitṛn ārādhya devaiḥ taiḥ dattā anena eva hetunā
yaḥ tu asyām bhūtapatinā putraḥ jātaḥ bhaviṣyati

original: sa haniṣyati daityaindraṃ mahiṣaṃ tārakaṃ tathā // VamP_26.58 //
analyzed: sa haniṣyati daitya aindram mahiṣam tārakam tathā

original: ityevaṃ menayā proktaḥ śailaiḥ śaileśvaraḥ sutām /
analyzed: iti evam menayā proktaḥ śailaiḥ śaileśvaraḥ sutām

original: provāca putri dattāsi śarvāya tvaṃ mayādhunā // VamP_26.59 //
analyzed: provāca putri dattā asi śarvāya tvam mayā adhunā
ṛṣīn uvāca kālī iyam mama putrī tapodhanāḥ
praṇāmam saṃkara vadhūḥ bhakti namrā karoti
tatas pi arundhatī kālī mahkam āropya cāṭukaiḥ
lajjamānām samāśvāsya hara nāma uditaiḥ śubhaiḥ
tatas saptarṣayaḥ procuḥ śailarāja niśāmaya
jāmitra guṇa saṃyuktām tithim puṇyām su maṅgalām
uttarā phālgunī yogam tṛtīye hni hima aṃśumān

original: gamiṣyati ca tatrokto muhūrtto maitranāmakaḥ // VamP_26.63 //
analyzed: gamiṣyati ca tatra uktaḥ muhūrttaḥ maitra nāmakaḥ

original: tasyāṃ tithyāṃ haraḥ pāṇiṃ grahīṣyati samantrakam /
analyzed: tasyām tithyām haraḥ pāṇim grahīṣyati sa mantrakam
tava putryāḥ vayam yāmaḥ tat anujñātum arhasi
tatas saṃpūjya vidhinā phala mūla ādibhiḥ śubhaiḥ
visarjayāmāsa śanais śailarāj ṛṣi puṅgavān
te te tu ākramya marudālayam
āsādya mandara girim bhūyas vandanta śaṅkaram
praṇamya ūcuḥ maheśānam bhavān bharttā adrijā vadhuḥ
sa brahyakāḥ trayaḥ lokāḥ drakṣyanti ghanavāhanam
tatas maheśvaraḥ prītaḥ munīn sarvān anukramāt

original: pūjayāmāsa vidhinā arundhatyā samaṃ haraḥ // VamP_26.68 //
analyzed: pūjayāmāsa vidhinā arundhatyā samam haraḥ

original: tataḥ saṃpūjitā jagmuḥ surāṇāṃ mantraṇāya te /
analyzed: tatas saṃpūjitāḥ jagmuḥ surāṇām mantraṇāya te
te pi ājagmuḥ haram draṣṭum brahma viṣṇu indra bhāskarāḥ
geham tatas bhyetya maheśvarasya kṛta praṇāmāḥ viviśuḥ mahā ṛṣe

original: sasmāra nandipramukhāṃśca savānabhyetya te vandya haraṃ niṣaṇṇāḥ // VamP_26.70 //
analyzed: sasmāra nandi pramukhān ca savān abhyetya te vandya haram niṣaṇṇāḥ

original: devairgaṇaiścāpi vṛto girīśaḥ sa śobhate muktajaṭāgrabhāraḥ /
analyzed: devaiḥ gaṇaiḥ ca api vṛtaḥ girīśaḥ sa śobhate mukta jaṭā agra bhāraḥ

original: yatā vane sarjjakadambamadhye prarohamūlo 'tha vanaspatirvai // VamP_26.71 //
analyzed: yatā vane sarjja kadamba madhye vanaspatiḥ vai
iti śrī vāmanapurāṇe ṣaḍviṃśaḥ dhyāyaḥ
pulastyaḥ uvāca
samāgatān surān dṛṣṭvā nandiḥ ākhyātavān vibhoḥ

original: athotthāya hariṃ bhaktyā pariṣvajya nyapīḍayat // VamP_27.1 //
analyzed: athā utthāya harim bhaktyā pariṣvajya nyapīḍayat
brahmaṇām śirasā natvā samābhāṣya śatakratum

original: ālokyānyān suragaṇān saṃbhāvayat sa śaṅkaraḥ // VamP_27.2 //
analyzed: ālokya anyān sura gaṇān saṃbhāvayat sa śaṅkaraḥ
gaṇāḥ ca jaya deva iti vīrabhadra purogamāḥ
śaivāḥ pāśupata ādyāḥ ca viviśuḥ mandarālam
tatas tasmāt mahā śailam kailāsam saha daivataiḥ

original: jagāma bhagavān śarvaḥ kartuṃ vaivāhikaṃ vidhim // VamP_27.4 //
analyzed: jagāma bhagavān śarvaḥ kartum vaivāhikam vidhim
tatas tasmin mahā śaile deva mātā aditiḥ śubhā
surabhiḥ surasā ca anyāḥ cakrarmaṇḍanamākulāḥ
samunnāta jaṭā bhāraḥ vṛṣabha sthaḥ virājate

original: tasyāgrato gaṇāḥ svaiḥ svairārūḍhā yānti vāhanaiḥ /
analyzed: tasya agratas gaṇāḥ svaiḥ svaiḥ ārūḍhāḥ yānti vāhanaiḥ
devāḥ ca pṛṣṭhatas jagmuḥ hutāśana purogamāḥ
vainateyam samārūḍhaḥ saha lakṣmyā janārdanaḥ

original: prayāti devapārśvastho haṃsena ca pitāmahaḥ // VamP_27.9 //
analyzed: prayāti deva pārśva sthaḥ haṃsena ca pitāmahaḥ
gaja adhirūḍhaḥ deva indraḥ chatram śukla paṭam vibhuḥ

original: dhārayāmāsa vitataṃ śacyā saha sahasradṛk // VamP_27.10 //
analyzed: dhārayāmāsa vitatam śacyā saha sahasradṛś
yamunā saritām śreṣṭhā bāla vyajanam uttamam

original: śvetaṃ pragṛhya hastena kacchape saṃsthitā yayau // VamP_27.11 //
analyzed: śvetam pragṛhya hastena kacchape saṃsthitā yayau
haṃsa kunda ndu saṃkāśam bāla vyājanam uttamam
sarasvatī sarit śreṣṭhā gaja ārūḍhā samādadhe
ṛtavaḥ ṣaṭ samādāya kusumam gandha saṃyutam
pañca varṇam maheśānam jagmuḥ te kāma cāriṇaḥ
matta mairāvaṇa nibham gajam āruhya vegavān
anulepanam ādāya yayau tatra pṛthūdakaḥ
gandharvāḥ tumbaru mukhāḥ gāyantaḥ madhura svaram
anujagmuḥ mahādevam vādayantaḥ ca kinnarāḥ
nṛtyantyāḥ psaraḥ ca eva stuvantaḥ munayaḥ ca tam

original: gandharvā yānti deveśaṃ trinetraṃ śūlapāṇinam // VamP_27.16 //
analyzed: gandharvāḥ yānti deveśam trinetram śūlapāṇinam

original: ekādaśa tathā koṭyo rudrāṇāṃ tatra vai yayuḥ /
analyzed: ekādaśa tathā koṭyaḥ rudrāṇām tatra vai yayuḥ
dvādaśa eva āditeyānām aṣṭau koṭyaḥ
saptaṣaṣṭiḥ tathā koṭyaḥ gaṇānām ṛṣi sattama
caturviśat tathā jagmuḥ ṛṣīṇām ūrdhvaretasām
asaṃkhyātāni yūthāni yakṣa kinnara rakṣasām
anujagmuḥ maheśānam vivāhāya samākulāḥ
tatas kṣaṇena deveśaḥ kṣmādhara adhipateḥ talam
saṃprāptāḥ tu āgaman śailāḥ kuñjara sthāḥ samantataḥ
tatas nanāma bhagavān trinetraḥ sthāvara adhipam
śailāḥ praṇemuḥ īśānam sau muditaḥ bhavat
samam suraiḥ pārṣadaiḥ ca viveśa vṛṣaketanaḥ

original: nandinā darśite mārge śailarājapuraṃ mahat // VamP_27.22 //
analyzed: nandinā darśite mārge śailarāja puram mahat
jīmūtaketuḥ āyātaḥ iti evam nagara striyaḥ
nijam karma parityajya darśana vyāpṛtāḥ abhavan
mālya arddham anyā ca ādāya kareṇa ekena bhāminī
keśapāśam dvitīyena śaṅkara abhimukhī gatā
anya alaktaka rāga āḍhyam pādam kṛtvā ākula īkṣaṇā
an alaktakam ekam hi haram draṣṭum upāgatā
ekena akṣṇā añjitena eva śrutvā bhīmam upāgatam

original: sāñjanāṃ ca pragṛhyānyā śalākāṃ suṣṭhu dhāvati // VamP_27.26 //
analyzed: sa añjanām ca pragṛhya anyā śalākām suṣṭhu dhāvati
anyā sarasanam vāsaḥ pāṇinā ādāya sundarī
unmattā iva agamat nagnā hara darśana lālāsā
anya atikrāntam īśānam śrutvā stana bhara alasā

original: anindata ruṣā bālā yauvanaṃ svaṃ kṛśodarī // VamP_27.28 //
analyzed: anindata ruṣā bālā yauvanam svam kṛśa udarī

original: itthaṃ sa nagarastrīṇāṃ kṣobhaṃ saṃjanayan haraḥ /
analyzed: ittham sa nagara strīṇām kṣobham saṃjanayan haraḥ
jagāma vṛṣabha ārūḍhaḥ divyam śvaśura mandiram

original: tataḥ praviṣṭaṃ prasamīkṣya śaṃbhuṃ śailendraveśmanyabalā bruvanti /
analyzed: tatas praviṣṭam prasamīkṣya śaṃbhum śaila indra veśmani abalāḥ bruvanti

original: sthāne tapo duścaramambikāyāścīrṇaṃ mahāneṣa surastu śaṃbhuḥ // VamP_27.30 //
analyzed: sthāne tapaḥ duścaram ambikāyāḥ cīrṇam mahān eṣa suraḥ tu śaṃbhuḥ

original: sa eṣa yenāṅgamānaṅgatāṃ kṛtaṃ kandarpanāmnaḥ kusumāyudhasya /
analyzed: saḥ eṣa yena aṅgam ānaṅga tām kṛtam kandarpa nāmnaḥ kusumāyudhasya

original: kratoḥ kṣayī dakṣavināśakartā bhagākṣihā śūladharaḥ pinākī // VamP_27.31 //
namo namaḥ śaṅkara śūlapāṇe mṛgāricarmāmbara kālaśatro /
analyzed: namaḥ namaḥ śaṅkara śūlapāṇe mṛgāri carma ambara kālaśatro
mahā ahi hāra aṅkita kuṇḍalāya namaḥ namaḥ pārvati vallabhāya

original: itthaṃ saṃstūyamānaḥ surāpatividhṛtenātapatreṇa śaṃbhuḥ siddhairvandyaḥ sayakṣairahikṛtavalayī cārubhasmopaliphtaḥ /
analyzed: ittham saṃstūyamānaḥ surāpati vidhṛtena ātapatreṇa śaṃbhuḥ siddhaiḥ vandyaḥ sa yakṣaiḥ ahi kṛta valayī cāru bhasma upaliphtaḥ

original: agrasthenāgrajena pramuditamanasā viṣṇunā cānugena vaivāhīṃ maṅgalāḍhyāṃ hutavahamuditāmārurohātha vedīm // VamP_27.33 //
analyzed: agra sthena agrajena pramudita manasā viṣṇunā ca anugena vaivāhīm maṅgala āḍhyām hutavaha muditām āruroha atha vedīm

original: āyāte tripurāntake sahacaraiḥ sārdhaṃ ca spatarṣibhirvyagro 'bhūd girirājaveśmanijanaḥ kālyāḥ samālaṅkṛtau /
analyzed: āyāte tripurāntake sahacaraiḥ sārdham ca spata ṛṣibhiḥ vyagraḥ bhūt girirāja veśma ni janaḥ kālyāḥ samālaṅkṛtau

original: vyākulyaṃ samupāgatāśca girayaḥ pūjādinā devatāḥ prāyovyākulitā bhavanti suhṛdaḥ kanyāvivāhotsukāḥ // VamP_27.34 //
analyzed: vyākulyam samupāgatāḥ ca girayaḥ pūjā ādinā devatāḥ prāyas vyākulitāḥ bhavanti suhṛdaḥ kanyā vivāha utsukāḥ

original: prasādhya devīṃ girijāṃ tataḥ strayo dukūlaśuklābhivṛtāṅgayaṣcikām /
analyzed: prasādhya devīm girijām tatas strayaḥ dukūla śukla abhivṛta aṅga yaṣcikām

original: bhrātrā sunābena tadotsave kṛte sā śaṅkarābhyāśamathopapāditā // VamP_27.35 //
analyzed: bhrātrā sunābena tadā utsave kṛte sā śaṅkara abhyāśam atha upapāditā

original: tataḥ śubhe harmyatale hiraṇmaye sthitāḥ surāḥ saṃkarakāliceṣṭitam /
analyzed: tatas śubhe harmya tale hiraṇmaye sthitāḥ surāḥ saṃkara kāli ceṣṭitam

original: pasyanti devo 'pi samaṃ kuśāṅgyā lokānujuṣṭaṃ padamāsasāda // VamP_27.36 //
analyzed: pasyanti devaḥ pi samam kuśāṅgyā loka anujuṣṭam padam āsasāda

original: yatra krīḍā vicitrāḥ sakusumataravo vāriṇo bindupātairgandhāḍhyairgandhacūrṇaiḥ praviralamavanau guṇḍitau guṇḍikāyām /
analyzed: yatra krīḍāḥ vicitrāḥ sa kusuma taravaḥ vāriṇaḥ bindu pātaiḥ gandha āḍhyaiḥ gandha cūrṇaiḥ praviralam avanau guṇḍitau guṇḍikāyām

original: muktādāmaiḥ prakāmaṃ haragiritanayā krīḍanārthaṃ tadāghyanat paścātsindūrapuñjairaviratavitataiś cakratuḥ kṣmāṃ suraktām // VamP_27.37 //
analyzed: muktā dāmaiḥ prakāmam haragiri tanayā krīḍana artham tadā aghyanat paścāt sindūra puñjaiḥ avirata vitataiḥ cakratuḥ kṣmām su raktām

original: evaṃ krīḍāṃ haraḥ kṛtvā samaṃ ca girikanyayā /
analyzed: evam krīḍām haraḥ kṛtvā samam ca giri kanyayā

original: āgacchad dakṣiṇāṃ vedimṛṣibhiḥ sevitāṃ dṛḍhām // VamP_27.38 //
analyzed: āgacchat dakṣiṇām vedim ṛṣibhiḥ sevitām dṛḍhām
atha ājagāma himavān śukla lāmbara dharaḥ śuciḥ
pavitra pāṇiḥ ādāya madhuparkam atha ujjvalam
upaviṣṭaḥ trinetraḥ tu śākrīm diśam apaśyata
saptarṣikān ca śailandraḥ su upaviṣṭaḥ valokayan
sukha āsīna asya śarvasya giriḥ
provāca vacanam śrīmān dharma sādhanam ātmanaḥ
himavān uvāca

original: matputrīṃ bhagavan kālīṃ pautrīṃ ca pulahāgraje /
analyzed: mad putrīm bhagavan kālīm pautrīm ca pulahāgraje
pitṝṇām api dauhitrīm pratīccha imām mayā udyatām
pulastyaḥ uvāca
iti evam uktvā śaila indraḥ hastam hastena yojayan
prādāt pratīccha bhagavan idam uccais udīrayan
hi uvāca

original: na me 'sti mātā na pitā tathaiva na jñātayo vāpi ca bānadhavāśca /
analyzed: na me sti mātā na pitā tathā eva na jñātayaḥ vā api ca bāna dhavāḥ ca

original: nirāśrayo 'haṃ kiriśṛṅgavāsī sutāṃ pratīcchāsi tavādrirāja // VamP_27.44 //
analyzed: nirāśrayaḥ ham kiri śṛṅga vāsī sutām tava adrirāja
iti evam uktvā varadaḥ vapīḍayat karam kareṇa adrikumārikāyāḥ

original: sā cāpi saṃsparśamavāpya śaṃbhoḥ parāṃ mudaṃ labdhavatī surarṣe // VamP_27.45 //
analyzed: sā ca api saṃsparśam avāpya śaṃbhoḥ parām mudam labdhavatī surarṣe
tathā adhirūḍhaḥ vedim saha adri putryā

original: dattvā ca lājān kalamasya śuklāṃstato viriñco girijāmuvāca // VamP_27.46 //
analyzed: dattvā ca lājān kalamasya śuklān tatas viriñcaḥ girijām uvāca
kāli pasyasva vadanam bhartuḥ śaśadhara prabham

original: samadṛṣṭiḥ sthirā bhūtvā kuruṣvāgneḥ pradakṣiṇam // VamP_27.47 //
analyzed: sama dṛṣṭiḥ sthirā bhūtvā kuruṣva agneḥ pradakṣiṇam
tatas mbikā hara mukhe dṛṣṭe śaityam upāgatā
yathā arka raśmi saṃtaptā prāpya vṛṣṭim iva avaniḥ
bhūyas prāha vibhoḥ vaktram īkṣasva iti pitāmahaḥ
lajjayā sā api dṛṣṭā iti śanais brahmāṇam abravīt
samam girijayā tena hutāśaḥ tris pradakṣiṇam

original: kṛto lājāśca haviṣā samaṃ kṣiptā hutāśane // VamP_27.50 //
analyzed: kṛtaḥ lājāḥ ca haviṣā samam kṣiptāḥ hutāśane
tatas hara aṅghriḥ mālinyā gṛhītaḥ hāya kāraṇāt

original: kiṃ yācasi ca dāsyāmi muñcasveti haro 'bravīt // VamP_27.51 //
analyzed: kim yācasi ca dāsyāmi muñcasva iti haraḥ bravīt

original: mālinī śaṅkaraṃ prāha matsakhyā dehi śaṅkara /
analyzed: mālinī śaṅkaram prāha mad sakhyā dehi śaṅkara
saubhāgyam nija gotrīyam tatas mokṣam avāpsyasi

original: athovāca mahādevo dattaṃ mālini muñca mām /
analyzed: athā uvāca mahādevaḥ dattam mālini muñca mām

original: saubhāgyaṃ nijagotrīyaṃ yo 'syāstaṃ śṛṇu vacmi te // VamP_27.53 //
analyzed: saubhāgyam nija gotrīyam syāḥ tam śṛṇu vacmi te
sau pīta ambara dharaḥ śaṅkhadhṛk madhusūdanaḥ

original: etadīyo hi saubhāgyo datto 'smadgotrameva hi // VamP_27.54 //
analyzed: etadīyaḥ hi saubhāgyaḥ dattaḥ smad gotram eva hi
iti evam ukte vacane pramumoca vṛṣadhvajam
mālinī nija gotrasya śubha cāritra mālinī

original: yadā haro hi mālinyā gṛhītaścaraṇe śubhe /
analyzed: yadā haraḥ hi mālinyāḥ gṛhītaḥ caraṇe śubhe

original: tadā kālīmukhaṃ brahma dadarśa śaśino 'dhikam // VamP_27.56 //
analyzed: tadā kālī mukham brahma dadarśa śaśinaḥ dhikam
tat dṛṣṭvā kṣobham agamat śukra cyutim avāpa ca

original: tacchukraṃ bālukāyāṃ ca khilīcakre sasādhvasaḥ // VamP_27.57 //
analyzed: tat śukram bālukāyām ca khilīcakre sa sādhvasaḥ
tatas bravīt varaḥ brahman na dvijān hantum arhasi

original: amī maharṣayo dhanyā vālakhilyāḥ pitāmaha // VamP_27.58 //
analyzed: amī mahā ṛṣayaḥ dhanyāḥ vālakhilyāḥ pitāmaha
tatas maheśa vākya ante samuttasthuḥ tapasvinaḥ
aṣṭāśīti sahasrāṇi vālakhilyāḥ iti smṛtāḥ

original: tato vivāhe nirvṛtte praviṣṭaḥ kautukaṃ haraḥ /
analyzed: tatas vivāhe nirvṛtte praviṣṭaḥ kautukam haraḥ

original: reme sahomayā rātriṃ prabhāte punarutthitaḥ // VamP_27.60 //
analyzed: reme saha umayā rātrim prabhāte punar utthitaḥ

original: tato 'draputrīṃ samavāpya śaṃbhuḥ saraiḥ samaṃ bhūtagaṇaiś ca hṛṣṭaḥ /
analyzed: tatas draputrīm samavāpya śaṃbhuḥ saraiḥ samam bhūta gaṇaiḥ ca hṛṣṭaḥ

original: saṃpūjitaḥ parvatapārthivena sa mandaraṃ śīghramupādajagāma // VamP_27.61 //
analyzed: saṃpūjitaḥ parvata pārthivena sa mandaram śīghram upādajagāma

original: tataḥ surān brahmaharīndramukhyān praṇamya saṃpūjya yathāvibhāgam /
analyzed: tatas surān brahma hari indra mukhyān praṇamya saṃpūjya yathāvibhāgam
visarjya bhūtaiḥ sahitaḥ mahīdhram adhyāvasat mandaram aṣṭamūrtiḥ
pulastyaḥ uvāca

original: tato girau vasan rudraḥ svecchayā vicaran mune /
analyzed: tatas girau vasan rudraḥ sva icchayā vicaran mune

original: viśvakarmāṇamāhūya provāca kuru me guham // VamP_28.1 //
analyzed: viśvakarmāṇam āhūya provāca kuru me guham
tatas cakāra śarvasya gṛham svastika lakṣaṇam
yojanāni catuḥṣaṣṭiḥ pramāṇena hiraṇmayam
danta torama nirvyūham muktā jāla antaram śubham
śuddha sphaṭika sopānam vaiḍūrya kṛta parūpakam
sapta kakṣam su vistīrṇam sarvaiḥ samuditam guṇaiḥ
tatas devapatiḥ cakre yajñam gārhasthya lakṣaṇam
tam pūrva caritam mārgam anuyāti sma śaṅkaraḥ
tathā sataḥ trinetrasya mahān kālaḥ bhyagāt mune
ramataḥ saha pārvatyā dharma apekṣaḥ jagatpatiḥ

original: tataḥ kadācinnarmārthaṃ kālītyuktā bhavena hi // VamP_28.6 //
analyzed: tatas kadācid narma artham kālī iti uktā bhavena hi
pārvatī manyunā āviṣṭā śaṅkaram vākyam abravīt
saṃrohati iṣuṇā viddham vanam paraśunā hatam

original: vācā duruktāṃ bībhatsaṃ na prarohati vākkṣatam // VamP_28.7 //
analyzed: vācā duruktām bībhatsam na prarohati vākkṣatam
vāc sāyakāḥ vadanāt niṣpatanti taiḥ āhataḥ śocati rātri ahāni

original: na tān vimuñceta hi paṇḍito janastamadya dharma vitathaṃ tvayā kṛtam // VamP_28.8 //
analyzed: na tān vimuñceta hi paṇḍitaḥ janaḥ tam adya dharma vitatham tvayā kṛtam
tasmāt vrajāmi devaveśa tapaḥ taptum anuttamam

original: tathā yatiṣye yathā bhavān kālīti vakṣyati // VamP_28.9 //
analyzed: tathā yatiṣye yathā bhavān kāli iti vakṣyati
iti evam uktvā girijā praṇamya ca maheśvaram
anujñātā tris ijā divam evā utpapāta ha
samutpatya ca vegena himādri śikharam śivam

original: ṭaṅkacchinnaṃ prayatnena vidhātrā nirmitaṃ tathā // VamP_28.11 //
analyzed: ṭaṅkacchinnam prayatnena vidhātrā nirmitam tathā

original: tato 'vatīrya sasmāra jayāṃ ca vijayāṃ tathā /
analyzed: tatas vatīrya sasmāra jayām ca vijayām tathā
jayantīm ca mahā puṇyām caturtha umā parājitām

original: tāḥ saṃsmṛtāḥ samājagmuḥ kālīṃ draṣṭuṃ hi devatāḥ /
analyzed: tāḥ saṃsmṛtāḥ samājagmuḥ kālīm draṣṭum hi devatāḥ

original: anujñātāstathā devyā śuśrūṣāṃ cakrire śubhāḥ // VamP_28.13 //
analyzed: anujñātāḥ tathā devyā śuśrūṣām cakrire śubhāḥ
tatas tapasi pārvatyām sthitāyām himavat vanāt

original: samājagāma taṃ deśaṃ vyāghro daṃṣṭrānakhāyudhaḥ // VamP_28.14 //
analyzed: samājagāma tam deśam vyāghraḥ daṃṣṭrā nakha āyudhaḥ
eka pāda sthitāyām tu devyām vyāghraḥ tu acintayat

original: yadā patiṣyate ceyaṃ tadādāsyāmi vai aham // VamP_28.15 //
analyzed: yadā patiṣyate ca iyam tadā ādāsyāmi vai aham
iti evam cintayan eva datta dṛṣṭiḥ mṛgādhipaḥ
paśyamānaḥ tu vadanam eka dṛṣṭiḥ ajāyata

original: tato varṣaśataṃ devī gṛṇantī brahmamaḥ padam /
analyzed: tatas varṣa śatam devī gṛṇantī brahmamaḥ padam

original: tapo 'varṣaśataṃ devī gṛṇantī brahma tribhuvaneśvaraḥ // VamP_28.17 //
analyzed: tapaḥ varṣa śatam devī gṛṇantī brahma tribhuvana īśvaraḥ
pitāmahaḥ tatas uvāca devīm prītaḥ smi śāsvate

original: tapasā dhūtapāpāsi varaṃ vṛṇu yathepsitam // VamP_28.18 //
analyzed: tapasā dhūta pāpā asi varam vṛṇu yathā īpsitam
athā uvāca vacaḥ kālī vyāghrasya kamalodbhava

original: varado bhava tenāhaṃ yāsye prītimanuttamām // VamP_28.19 //
analyzed: vara daḥ bhava tena aham yāsye prītim anuttamām
tatas prādāt varam brahmā vyāgrasya adbhuta karmaṇaḥ

original: gāṇapatyaṃ vibhau bhaktimajeyatvaṃ ca dharmitām // VamP_28.20 //
analyzed: gāṇapatyam vibhau bhaktim ajeya tvam ca dharmi tām
varam vyāghrāya da tvā evam śivakāntām athā bravīt

original: vṛṇīṣva varamavyagrā varaṃ dāsye tavāmbike // VamP_28.21 //
analyzed: vṛṇīṣva varam avyagrā varam dāsye tava ambike

original: tato varaṃ girisutā prāha devī pitāmaham /
analyzed: tatas varam girisutā prāha devī pitāmaham

original: varaḥ pradīyatāṃ mahyaṃ varṇaṃ kanakasaṃnibham // VamP_28.22 //
analyzed: varaḥ pradīyatām mahyam varṇam kanaka saṃnibham

original: tathetyuktvā gato brahmā parvatī cābhavat tataḥ /
analyzed: tathā iti uktvā gataḥ brahmā parvatī ca abhavat tatas
kośam kṛṣṇam parityajya padma kiñjalka sannibhāḥ

original: tasmāt kośācca saṃjātā bhūyaḥ kātyāyanī mune /
analyzed: tasmāt kośāt ca saṃjātā bhūyas kātyāyanī mune
tām abhyetya sahasrākṣaḥ pratijagrāha dakṣiṇām

original: provāca girijāṃ devo vākyaṃ svārthāya vāsavaḥ // VamP_28.24 //
analyzed: provāca girijām devaḥ vākyam sva arthāya vāsavaḥ
indraḥ uvāca

original: iyaṃ pradīyatāṃ mahyaṃ bhaginī me 'stu kauśikī /
analyzed: iyam pradīyatām mahyam bhaginī me stu kauśikī
tvad kośa saṃbhavā ca iyam kauśikī kauśikaḥ pi aham
tām prādāt iti saṃśrutya kauśikīm rūpa saṃyutām

original: sahasrākṣo 'pi tāṃ gṛhya vindhyaṃ vegājjagāma ca // VamP_28.26 //
analyzed: sahasrākṣaḥ upi tām gṛhya vindhyam vegāt jagāma ca
tatra gatvā tu athā uvāca tiṣṭhasva atra mahā bale

original: pūjyamānā surairnāmnā khyātā tvaṃ vindhyavāsinī // VamP_28.27 //
analyzed: pūjyamānā suraiḥ nāmnā khyātā tvam vindhyavāsinī

original: tatra sthāpya harirdevīṃ dattvā siṃhaṃ ca vāhanam /
analyzed: tatra sthāpya hariḥ devīm dattvā siṃham ca vāhanam
bhava amara ari hantrī iti uktvā svargam upāgamat

original: umāpi taṃ varaṃ labdhvā mandaraṃ punetya ca /
analyzed: umā api tam varam labdhvā mandaram puna itya ca

original: praṇamya ca maheśānaṃ sthitā savinayaṃ mune // VamP_28.29 //
analyzed: praṇamya ca maheśānam sthitā sa vinayam mune
tatas maraguruḥ śrīmān pārvatyā sahitaḥ vyayaḥ

original: tasthau vraṣasahasraṃ hi mahāmohanake mune // VamP_28.30 //
analyzed: tasthau vraṣa sahasram hi mahāmohanake mune
mahā moha sthite rudre bhuvanāḥ celuḥ uddhatāḥ

original: cakṣubhuḥ sāgarāḥ sapta devāś ca bhayamāgaman // VamP_28.31 //
analyzed: cakṣubhuḥ sāgarāḥ sapta devāḥ ca bhayam āgaman

original: tataḥ surāḥ sahendreṇa brahmaṇaḥ sadanaṃ gatāḥ /
analyzed: tatas surāḥ saha indreṇa brahmaṇaḥ sadanam gatāḥ

original: praṇamyocurmaheśānaṃ jagat kṣubdhaṃ tu kiṃ tvidam // VamP_28.32 //
analyzed: praṇamya ūcuḥ maheśānam jagat kṣubdham tu kim tu idam
tān uvāca bhavaḥ nūnam mahāmohanake sthitaḥ

original: tenākrāntāstvime lokā jagmuḥ kṣobhaṃ duratyayam // VamP_28.33 //
analyzed: tena ākrāntāḥ tu ime lokāḥ jagmuḥ kṣobham duratyayam

original: ityuktvā so 'bhavat tūṣṇīṃ tato 'pyūcuḥ surā harim /
analyzed: iti uktvā saḥ bhavat tūṣṇīm tatas pi ūcuḥ surāḥ harim

original: āgaccha śakrar gacchāmo yāvat tanna samāpyate // VamP_28.34 //
analyzed: āgaccha śakraḥ gacchāmaḥ yāvat tat na samāpyate
samāpte mohvane bālaḥ yaḥ vyayaḥ

original: sa nūnaṃ devarājasya padamaindaṃ hariṣyati // VamP_28.35 //
analyzed: sa nūnam devarājasya padam aindam hariṣyati
tatas marāṇām vacanāt vivekaḥ bala ghātinaḥ
bhayāt jñānam tatas naṣṭam bhāvi karma pracodanāt

original: tataḥ śakraḥ suraiḥ sārdhaṃ vahninā ca sahasradṛk /
analyzed: tatas śakraḥ suraiḥ sārdham vahninā ca
jagāma mandara girim tad śṛṅge nyaviśat tatas
aśaktāḥ sarve eva ete praveṣṭum tat bhava ajiram

original: cintayitvā tu suciraṃ pāvakaṃ te vyasarjayan // VamP_28.38 //
analyzed: cintayitvā tu su ciram pāvakam te vyasarjayan

original: sa cābhyetya suraśreṣṭho dṛṣṭvā dvāre ca nandinam /
analyzed: sa ca abhyetya sura śreṣṭhaḥ dṛṣṭvā dvāre ca nandinam

original: duṣpraveśaṃ ca taṃ matvā cintāṃ vahniḥ parāṃ gataḥ // VamP_28.39 //
analyzed: duṣpraveśam ca tam matvā cintām vahniḥ parām gataḥ
sa tu cintā arṇave magnaḥ prāpaśyat śaṃbhu sadmanaḥ

original: niṣkrāmanatīṃ mahāpaṅktiṃ haṃsānāṃ vimalāṃ tathā // VamP_28.40 //
analyzed: mahā paṅktim haṃsānām vimalām tathā
asau upāyaḥ iti uktvā haṃsa rūpaḥ hutāśanaḥ
vañcayitvā pratīhāram praviveśa hara ajiram
praviśya sūkṣma mūrtiḥ ca kapardinaḥ

original: prāha prahasya gambhīraṃ devā dvāri sthitā iti // VamP_28.42 //
analyzed: prāha prahasya gambhīram devāḥ dvāri sthitāḥ iti
tat śratvā sahasā utthāya parityajya gireḥ sutām
viniṣkrantaḥ jirāt śarvaḥ vahninā saha nārada
viniṣkrānte surapatau devāḥ mudita mānasāḥ
śirobhiḥ avanīm jagmuḥ sa indra arka śaśi pāvakāḥ

original: tataḥ prītyā surānāha vadadhvaṃ kāryamāśu me /
analyzed: tatas prītyā surān āha vadadhvam kāryam āśu me
praṇāma avanatānām vaḥ dāsye ham varam uttamam
devāḥ ūcuḥ
yadi tuṣṭaḥ si devānām varam dātum iha icchasi
tat idam tyajyatām tāvat mahā maithunam īśvara
īśvaraḥ uvāca
evam bhavatu saṃtyaktaḥ mayā bhāvaḥ mara uttamāḥ

original: mamedaṃ teja udriktaṃ kaścid devaḥ pratīcchatu // VamP_28.47 //
analyzed: mama idam tejaḥ udriktam kaścid devaḥ pratīcchatu
pulastyaḥ uvāca
iti uktāḥ śaṃbhunā devāḥ sa indra candra divākarāḥ

original: asīdanta yathā magnāḥ paṅke vṛndārakā iva // VamP_28.48 //
analyzed: asīdanta yathā magnāḥ paṅke vṛndārakāḥ iva
sīdaḥ tu daivateṣu evam hutāsaḥ bhyetya śaṅkaram

original: provāca muñca tejastvaṃ pratīcchāmyeṣa śaṅkara // VamP_28.49 //
analyzed: provāca muñca tejaḥ tvam pratīcchāmi eṣa śaṅkara
tatas mumoca bhagavān tat retaḥ skannam eva tu

original: jalaṃ tṛṣānate vai yadvat tailapānaṃ pipāsitaḥ // VamP_28.50 //
analyzed: jalam tṛṣā ānate vai yadvat taila pānam pipāsitaḥ

original: tataḥ pīte tejasi vai śārve devena vahninā /
analyzed: tatas pīte tejasi vai śārve devena vahninā

original: svasthāḥ surāḥ samāmantrya haraṃ jagmustriviṣṭapam // VamP_28.51 //
analyzed: svasthāḥ surāḥ samāmantrya haram jagmuḥ triviṣṭapam
saṃprayāteṣu deveṣu nija mandiram
samabhyetya mahādevīm idam vacanam abravīt
devi devaiḥ iha abhyetya yatnāt preṣya hutāśanam

original: nītaḥ prokto niṣiddhastu putrotpattiṃ tavodarāt // VamP_28.53 //
analyzed: nītaḥ proktaḥ niṣiddhaḥ tu putra utpattim tava udarāt
sā api bhartuḥ vacaḥ śrutvā kruddhā rakta anta locanā

original: śaśāpa daivatān sarvān naṣṭaputrodbhavā śivā // VamP_28.54 //
analyzed: śaśāpa daivatān sarvān naṣṭa putra udbhavā śivā
yasmāt na icchanti te duṣṭāḥ mama putram atha aurasam

original: tasmāt te na janaṣyantisvāsuyoṣitsu putrakān // VamP_28.55 //
analyzed: tasmāt te na janaṣyanti svāsu yoṣitsu putrakān
evam śaptvā surān gaurī śauca śālām upāgamat

original: āhūya mālinīṃ svanātuṃ matiṃ cakre tapodhanā // VamP_28.56 //
analyzed: āhūya mālinīm svanātum matim cakre tapodhanā
mālinī surabhim gṛhya ślakṣṇam udvartanam śubhā
devī aṅgam udvirtayate karābhyām kanaka prabham

original: tatsvedaṃ pārvatī caiva mene kīdṛgguṇena hi // VamP_28.57 //
analyzed: tad svedam pārvatī ca eva mene kīdṛś guṇena hi
mālinī tūrṇam agamat gṛham snānasya kāraṇāt

original: tasyāṃ gatāyāṃ śaileyī malāccakre gajānanam // VamP_28.58 //
analyzed: tasyām gatāyām śaileyī malāt cakre gajānanam
catur bhujam pīna vakṣam puruṣam lakṣaṇa anvitam

original: kṛtvotsasarja bhūmyāṃ ca sthitā bhadrāsane punaḥ // VamP_28.59 //
analyzed: kṛtvā utsasarja bhūmyām ca sthitā bhadrāsane punar
mālinī tad śiraḥ knānam dadau vihasatī tadā

original: īṣaddhāsāmumā dṛṣṭvā mālinīṃ prāha nārada // VamP_28.60 //
analyzed: īṣat hāsām umā dṛṣṭvā mālinīm prāha nārada
kimartham bhīru śanakais hasasi tvam atīva ca
sā athā uvāca hasāmi evam bhavatyāḥ tanayaḥ kila
bhaviṣyati iti devena proktaḥ nandī gaṇādhipaḥ

original: tacchutvā mama hāso 'yaṃ saṃjāto 'dya kṛśodari // VamP_28.62 //
analyzed: tat śutvā mama hāsaḥ yam saṃjātaḥ kṛśa udari
yasmāt devaiḥ putra kāmaḥ śaṅkaraḥ vinivāritaḥ

original: etacchrutvā vaco devī sasnau tatra vidhānataḥ // VamP_28.63 //
analyzed: etat śrutvā vacaḥ devī sasnau tatra vidhānataḥ

original: snātvārcya śaṅkaraṃ bhaktyā samabhyāgād gṛhaṃ prati /
analyzed: snātvā arcya śaṅkaram bhaktyā samabhyāgāt gṛham prati

original: tataḥ śaṃbhuḥ samāgatya tasmin bhadrāsane tvapi // VamP_28.64 //
analyzed: tatas śaṃbhuḥ samāgatya tasmin bhadrāsane tu api
snātaḥ tasya tatas dhastāt sthitaḥ sa mala pūruṣaḥ
tad saṃparkāt samuttasthau phūtkṛtya karam uttam

original: apatyaṃ hi viditvā ca prītimān bhuvaneśvaraḥ // VamP_28.66 //
analyzed: apatyam hi viditvā ca prītimān bhuvana īśvaraḥ
tam ca ādāya haraḥ nandim uvāca bhaga netra hā

original: rudraḥ snātvarcya devādīn vāgbhiradbhiḥ pitṛnapi // VamP_28.67 //
analyzed: rudraḥ snātvā arcya deva ādīn vāgbhiḥ adbhiḥ pitṛn api
japtvā sahasranāmānam umāpārśvam upāgataḥ

original: sametya devīṃ vihasan śaṅkaraḥ śūladhṛg vaḥ // VamP_28.68 //
analyzed: sametya devīm vihasan śaṅkaraḥ śūladhṛk vaḥ

original: prāha tvaṃ paśya śaileyi svasutaṃ gumasaṃyutam /
analyzed: prāha tvam paśya śaileyi sva sutam guma saṃyutam
iti uktā parvatasutā sametya apasyat adbhutam
yat tad aṅga malāt divyam kṛtam gajamukham naram

original: tataḥ prīti girisutā taṃ putraṃ pariṣaṣvaje // VamP_28.70 //
analyzed: tatas prīti girisutā tam putram pariṣaṣvaje
mūrdhni ca enam upāghrāya tatas śarvaḥ bravīt umām

original: nāyakena vinā devi tava bhūto 'pi putrakaḥ // VamP_28.71 //
analyzed: nāyakena vinā devi tava putrakaḥ
yasmāt jātaḥ tatas nāmnā bhaviṣyati vināyakaḥ
eṣa vighna sahasrāṇi sura ādīnām kariṣyati
pūjayiṣyanti ca eva asya lokāḥ devi cara acarāḥ
iti evam uktvā devyāḥ tu dattavān tanayāya hi

original: sahāyaṃ tu gaṇaśreṣṭhaṃ nāmnā khyātaṃ ghaṭodaram /
analyzed: sahāyam tu gaṇa śreṣṭham nāmnā khyātam ghaṭodaram

original: tathā mātṛgaṇā ghorā bhūtā vighnakarāśca ye // VamP_28.74 //
analyzed: tathā mātṛ gaṇāḥ ghorāḥ bhūtāḥ vighna karāḥ ca ye
te sarve parameśena devyāḥ prītyā upapāditāḥ

original: devī ca svasutaṃ dṛṣṭvā parāṃ mudamavāpa ca // VamP_28.75 //
analyzed: devī ca sva sutam dṛṣṭvā parām mudam avāpa ca
reme tha śaṃbhunā sārdham mandare cāru kandare

original: evaṃ bhūyo 'bhavad devī iyaṃ kātyāyanī vibho /
analyzed: evam bhūyas bhavat devī iyam kātyāyanī vibho

original: yā jaghāna mahādaityai purā śumbhaniśumbhakau // VamP_28.76 //
analyzed: yā jaghāna mahā daityai purā śumbha niśumbhakau

original: etat tavoktaṃ vacanaṃ śubhākhyaṃ yathodbhavaṃ parvatato mṛḍānyāḥ /
analyzed: etat tava uktam vacanam śubha ākhyam yathā udbhavam parvatataḥ mṛḍānyāḥ

original: svargyaṃ yaśasyaṃ ca tathāghahāri ākhyanamūrjaskaramadriputryāḥ // VamP_28.77 //
analyzed: svargyam yaśasyam ca tathā agha hāri ākhyanam ūrjaskaram adri putryāḥ
iti śrī vāmanapurāṇe aṣṭāviṃśaḥ dhyāyaḥ
pulastyaḥ uvāca
kaśyapasya danuḥ nāma bhāryā āsīt dvijasattama

original: tasyāḥ putratrayaṃ cāsīt sahasrākṣād balādhikam // VamP_29.1 //
analyzed: tasyāḥ putra trayam ca āsīt sahasrākṣāt bala adhikam
jyeṣṭhaḥ sumbhaḥ iti khyātaḥ niśumbhaḥ ca aparaḥ suraḥ
tṛtīyaḥ namuciḥ nāma mahā bala samanvitaḥ
sau namuciḥ iti evam khyātaḥ suraḥ

original: taṃ hantumicchati hariḥ pragṛhya kuliśaṃ kare // VamP_29.3 //
analyzed: tam hantum icchati hariḥ pragṛhya kuliśam kare
tridiva īśam samāyāntam namuciḥ tad bhayāt atha
praviveśa ratham bhānoḥ tatas na aśakat acyutaḥ
śakraḥ tena atha samayam cakre saha mahātmanā
avadhya tvam varam prādāt śastraiḥ astraiḥ ca nārada
tatas vadhya tvam ājñāya śastrāt āstrāt ca narada
saṃtyajya bhāskara ratham pātālam upayāt atha
sa nimajjan api jale sāmudram phena suttamam
dadṛśe dānava patiḥ tam pragṛhya idam abravīt
yat uktam devapatinā vāsavena vacaḥ stu tat

original: ayaṃ spṛśatu māṃ phenaḥ parābhyāṃ gṛhya dānavaḥ // VamP_29.8 //
analyzed: ayam spṛśatu mām phenaḥ parābhyām gṛhya dānavaḥ
mukha nāsā akṣikā arṇa ādīn saṃmamārja yathā icchayā
tasmin śakraḥ vajram antarhitam api īśvaraḥ

original: tenāsau bhagnanāsāsyaḥ papāta ca mamāra ca /
analyzed: tena asau bhagna nāsā āsyaḥ papāta ca mamāra ca

original: samaye ca tathā naṣṭe brahmahatyāspṛśaddharim // VamP_29.10 //
analyzed: samaye ca tathā naṣṭe brahmahatyā aspṛśat harim

original: sa vai tīrthaṃ samāsādya snātaḥ pāpādamucyata /
analyzed: sa vai tīrtham samāsādya snātaḥ pāpāt amucyata

original: tato 'sya bhrātarau vīrau kruddhau sumbhaniśumbhakau // VamP_29.11 //
analyzed: tatas sya bhrātarau vīrau kruddhau sumbha niśumbhakau
udyogam su mahat kṛtvā surān bādhitum āgatau
surāḥ te pi sahasrākṣam puraskṛtya viniryayuḥ
jitāḥ tu ākramya daityābhyām sa balāḥ sa padānugāḥ

original: śakrasyāhṛtya ca gajaṃ yāmyaṃ ca mahiṣaṃ balāt // VamP_29.13 //
analyzed: śakrasya āhṛtya ca gajam yāmyam ca mahiṣam balāt

original: varuṇasya maṇicchatraṃ gadāṃ vai mārutatasya ca /
analyzed: varuṇasya maṇi chatram gadām vai mārutatasya ca
nidhanaḥ padma śaṅkha ādyāḥ hṛtāḥ tu ākramya dānavaiḥ

original: trailokyaṃ vaśagaṃ cāste tābhyāṃ nārada sarvataḥ /
analyzed: trailokyam vaśa gam ca āste tābhyām nārada sarvatas
tadā ājagmuḥ mahī pṛṣṭham dadṛśuḥ te mahā asuram
rakta bījam athā ūcuḥ te kaḥ bhavān iti saḥ bravīt

original: sa cāha daityo 'smi vibho sacivo mahiṣasya tu // VamP_29.16 //
analyzed: sa ca āha daityaḥ smi vibho sacivaḥ mahiṣasya tu
rakta bīja iti vikhyātaḥ mahā vīryaḥ mahā bhujaḥ

original: amātyau rucirau vīrau caṇḍamuṇḍāviti śrutau // VamP_29.17 //
analyzed: amātyau rucirau vīrau caṇḍa muṇḍau iti śrutau

original: tāvāratāṃ salile magnau bhayād devyā mahābhujau /
analyzed: tau āratām salile magnau bhayāt devyāḥ mahā bhujau

original: yastvāsīt prabhūrasmākaṃ mahiṣo nāma dānavaḥ // VamP_29.18 //
analyzed: yaḥ tu āsīt prabhūḥ asmākam mahiṣaḥ nāma dānavaḥ
nihataḥ sa mahādevyā vindhya śaile su vistṛte

original: bhavantau kasya tanayau kau vā nāmnā piraśrutau /
analyzed: bhavantau kasya tanayau kau vā nāmnā piraśrutau
kiṃvīryau kiṃprabhāvau ca etat śaṃsitum arhathaḥ
śumbha niśumbhau ūcatuḥ

original: ahaṃ śuṃbha iti khyāto danoḥ putrastathaurasaḥ /
analyzed: aham śuṃbhaḥ iti khyātaḥ danoḥ putraḥ tathā aurasaḥ

original: niśumbho 'yaṃ mama bhrātā kanīyān śatrupūgahā // VamP_29.20 //
analyzed: niśumbhaḥ yam mama bhrātā kanīyān śatru pūga hā
anena ha guśas devāḥ sa indra rudra divākarāḥ

original: sametya nirjitā vīrā ye 'nye ca balavattarāḥ // VamP_29.21 //
analyzed: sametya nirjitāḥ vīrāḥ ye nye ca balavattarāḥ
tat ucyatām kayā daityaḥ nihataḥ mahiṣa asuraḥ
yāvat tām ghātayiṣyāvaḥ sva sainya parivāritau
ittham toḥ tu vadatoḥ narmadāyāḥ taṭe mune

original: jalavāsād viniṣkrāntau caṇḍamuṇḍau ca dānavau // VamP_29.23 //
analyzed: jala vāsāt viniṣkrāntau caṇḍa muṇḍau ca dānavau
tatas bhyetya asura śreṣṭhau rakta bījam samāśritau

original: ūcaturvacanaṃ ślakṣṇaṃ ko 'yaṃ tava purassaraḥ // VamP_29.24 //
analyzed: ūcatuḥ vacanam ślakṣṇam kaḥ yam tava purassaraḥ

original: sa cobhau prāha daityo 'sau śumbho nāma surārdanaḥ /
analyzed: sa ca ubhau prāha daityaḥ sau śumbhaḥ nāma sura ardanaḥ

original: kanīyānasya ca bhrātā dvitīyo hi niśumbhakaḥ // VamP_29.25 //
analyzed: kanīyānasya ca bhrātā dvitīyaḥ hi niśumbhakaḥ

original: etāvāśritya tāṃ duṣṭāṃ mahiṣaghnīṃ na saṃśayaḥ /
analyzed: etau āśritya tām duṣṭām mahiṣa ghnīm na saṃśayaḥ
aham vivāhayiṣyāmi ratna bhūtām jagattraye
caṇḍaḥ uvāca

original: na samyaguktāṃ bhavatā ratnārhe 'si na sāmpratam /
analyzed: na samyak uktām bhavatā ratna arhe si na sāmpratam

original: yaḥ prabhuḥ syātsa ratnārhastasmācchumbhāya yojyatām // VamP_29.27 //
analyzed: yaḥ prabhuḥ syāt sa ratna arhaḥ tasmāt śumbhāya yojyatām
tadā ācacakṣe śumbhāya nisumbhāya ca kauśikīm

original: bhūyo 'pi tadvidhāṃ jātāṃ kauśikīṃ rūpaśālinīm // VamP_29.28 //
analyzed: bhūyas u pi tadvidhām jātām kauśikīm rūpa śālinīm

original: tataḥ śumbho nijaṃ dūtaṃ sugrīvaṃ nāma dānavam /
analyzed: tatas śumbhaḥ nijam dūtam sugrīvam nāma dānavam

original: daityaṃ ca preṣayāmāsa sakāśaṃ vindhyavāsinīm // VamP_29.29 //
analyzed: daityam ca preṣayāmāsa sakāśam vindhyavāsinīm

original: sa gatvā tadvacaḥ śrutvā devyāgatya mahāsuraḥ /
analyzed: sa gatvā tad vacaḥ śrutvā devyā āgatya mahā asuraḥ
niśumbha śumbau āha idam manyunā abipariplutaḥ
sugrīvaḥ uvāca
yuvayoḥ vacanāt devīm pradeṣṭum daitya nāyakau
gatavān aham adyā eva tām aham vākyam abruvam
yathā śumbho ti vikhyātaḥ kakudmī dānaveṣu api

original: sa tvāṃ prāha mahābhāge prabhurasmi jagattraye // VamP_29.32 //
analyzed: sa tvām prāha mahābhāge prabhuḥ asmi jagattraye

original: yāni svarge mahīṣṭaṣṭhe pātāle cāpi sundari /
analyzed: yāni svarge mahīṣṭaṣṭhe pātāle ca api sundari

original: ratnāni santi tāvanti mama veśmani nityaśaḥ // VamP_29.33 //
analyzed: ratnāni santi tāvanti mama veśmani nityaśas
tvam uktā caṇḍa muṇḍābhyām ratna bhūtā kṛśa udari

original: tasmād bhajasvamāṃ vā tvaṃ nuśumbhaṃvā mamānujam // VamP_29.34 //
analyzed: tasmāt bhajasva amām vā tvam mama anujam

original: sā cāha māṃ vihasatī śṛṇu sugrīva madvacaḥ /
analyzed: sā ca āha mām vihasatī śṛṇu sugrīva mad vacaḥ

original: satyamuktaṃ trilokeśaḥ śumbho ratnārha eva ca // VamP_29.35 //
analyzed: satyamuktam triloka īśaḥ śumbhaḥ ratnārhaḥ eva ca

original: kiṃ tvasti durvinītāyā hṛdaye me manorathaḥ /
analyzed: kim tu asti durvinītāyāḥ hṛdaye me manorathaḥ

original: yo māṃ vijayate yuddhe sa bhatā syānmahāsura // VamP_29.36 //
analyzed: yaḥ mām vijayate yuddhe sa syāt mahā asura
mayā ca uktā avaliptā asi yaḥ jayet sa sura asurān

original: sa tvāṃ kathaṃ na jayate sā tvamuttiṣṭha bhāminī // VamP_29.37 //
analyzed: sa tvām katham na jayate sā tvam uttiṣṭha bhāminī

original: sātha māṃ prāha kiṃ kurmi yadanālocitaḥ kṛtaḥ /
analyzed: sā atha mām prāha kim kurmi yat anālocitaḥ kṛtaḥ

original: manorathastu tad gaccha sumbhāya tvaṃ nivedaya // VamP_29.38 //
analyzed: manorathaḥ tu tat gaccha sumbhāya tvam nivedaya
tayā evam uktaḥ tu abhyāgām tvad sakāśam mahā asura

original: sā cāgnikoṭisadṛśī matvaivaṃ kuru yatkṣamam // VamP_29.39 //
analyzed: sā ca agni koṭi sadṛśī matvā evam kuru yat kṣamam
pulastyaḥ uvāca
iti sugrīva vacanam niśamya sa mahā asuraḥ

original: prāha dūrasthitaṃ sumbho dānavaṃ dhūmralocanam // VamP_29.40 //
analyzed: prāha dūra sthitam sumbhaḥ dānavam dhūmra locanam
śumbhaḥ uvāca
dhūmrākṣa gaccha tām duṣṭām keśa ākarṣaṇa vihvalām

original: sāparādhāṃ yatā dāsīṃ kṛtvā śīghramihānaya // VamP_29.41 //
analyzed: sa aparādhām yatā dāsīm kṛtvā śīghram iha ānaya
yaḥ ca asyāḥ pakṣa kṛt kaścid bhaviṣyati mahā balaḥ

original: sa hantavyo 'vicāryaiva yadi hi syāt pitāmahaḥ // VamP_29.42 //
analyzed: sa hantavyaḥ vicārya eva yadi hi syāt pitāmahaḥ
saḥ evam uktaḥ śumbhena dhūmrākṣo kṣauhiṇī śataiḥ
vṛtaḥ ṣaḍbhiḥ mahā tejāḥ vindhyam kirim upādravat

original: sa tatra dṛṣṭvā tāṃ durgāṃ bhrāntadṛṣṭiruvāca ha /
analyzed: sa tatra dṛṣṭvā tām durgām bhrānta dṛṣṭiḥ uvāca ha
ehi ehi mūḍhe bhartāram śumbham icchasva kauśikī
na ced balāt nayiṣyāmi keśa ākarṣaṇa vihvalām
śrī devī uvāca

original: preṣito 'sīha śumbhena balānnetuṃ hi māṃ kila /
analyzed: preṣitaḥ sīha śumbhena balāt netum hi mām kila

original: tatra kiṃ hyabalā kuryād yathecchasi tathā kuru // VamP_29.45 //
analyzed: tatra kim hi abalā kuryāt yathā icchasi tathā kuru
pulastyaḥ uvāca
evam uktaḥ vibhāvaryā balāvān dhūmra locanaḥ
sambhyadhāvat tvaritaḥ gadām ādāya vīryavān
tam āpatantam sa gadam huṅkāreṇa eva kauśikī
sa balam bhasmasāt cakre śuṣkam agniḥ iva indhanam
tatas hāhākṛtam abhūt jagati asmin carācare

original: sabalaṃ bhasmasānnītaṃ kauśikyā vīkṣya dānavam // VamP_29.48 //
analyzed: sa balam bhasmasāt nītam kauśikyā vīkṣya dānavam
tat ca śumbhaḥ śuśrāva mahat śabdam udīritam
athā ādideśa balinau caṇḍa muṇḍau mahā asurau

original: ruruṃ ca balināṃ śreṣṭhaṃ tathā jagmurmudānvitāḥ /
analyzed: rurum ca balinām śreṣṭham tathā jagmuḥ mudā anvitāḥ
teṣām ca sainyam atulam gaja aśva ratha saṃkulam
samājagāma sahasā yatra āste kośa saṃbhavā
tadā āyāntam ripu balam dṛṣṭvā koṭi śata avaram
siṃhaḥ dravat dhuta saṭaḥ pāṭayan dānavān raṇe
kāṃścid kara prahāreṇa kāṃścid āsyena līlayā
nakharaiḥ kāṃścid ākramya urasā pramamātha ca
te vadhyamānāḥ siṃhena giri kandara vāsinā
bhūtaiḥ ca devī anucaraiḥ caṇḍa muṇḍau samāśrayan
tau ārttam sva balam dṛṣṭvā kopa prasphurita adharau
samādravetām durgām vai pataṅgau iva pāvakam

original: tāvāpatantau raudrau vai dṛṣṭvā krodhapariplutā // VamP_29.55 //
analyzed: tau āpatantau raudrau vai dṛṣṭvā krodha pariplutā
tri sākhām bhrukuṭīm vaktre cakāra parameśvarī
bhrukuṭī kuṭulāt devyāḥ lalāṭa phalakāt drutam

original: kālī karālavadanā niḥsṛtā yoginī śubā // VamP_29.56 //
analyzed: kālī karāla vadanā niḥsṛtā yoginī śubā
khaṭvāṅgam ādāya kareṇa raudram asiñca kālāñjana kośam ugram
saṃśuṣka gātrā rudhira āpluta aṅgī narendra mūrdhnā srajam udvahantī

original: kāṃścit khaḍgena ciccheda khaṭvāṅgena parān raṇe /
analyzed: kāṃścid khaḍgena ciccheda khaṭvāṅgena parān raṇe

original: nyaṣūdayad bhṛśaṃ kruddhā saratāśvagajān ripūn // VamP_29.58 //
analyzed: nyaṣūdayat bhṛśam kruddhā saratā aśva gajān ripūn
carma aṅkuśam mudgaram ca sa dhanuṣkam sa ghaṇṭikam

original: kuñjaraṃ saha yantreṇa pratikṣepa muke 'mbikā // VamP_29.59 //
analyzed: kuñjaram saha yantreṇa pratikṣepa muke mbikā
sa cakra kūbara ratham sa sārathi turaṅgamam

original: samaṃ yodhena vadane kṣipya carvayate 'mbikā // VamP_29.60 //
analyzed: samam yodhena vadane kṣipya carvayate mbikā
ekam jagrāha keśeṣu grīvāyam aparam tathā
pādena ākramya ca eva anyam preṣayāmāsa mṛtyave

original: tatastu tad balaṃ devyā bhakṣitaṃ sabalādhipam /
analyzed: tatas tu tat balam devyā bhakṣitam sa bala adhipam

original: rururdṛṣṭvā pradudrāva taṃ caṇḍi dadṛśe svayam // VamP_29.62 //
analyzed: ruruḥ dṛṣṭvā pradudrāva tam caṇḍi dadṛśe svayam
ājaghāna atha śirasi khaṭvāṅgena mahā asuram

original: sa papāta hato bhūmyāṃ chinnamūla iva drumaḥ // VamP_29.63 //
analyzed: sa papāta hataḥ bhūmyām chinna mūlaḥ iva drumaḥ
tatas tam patitam dṛṣṭvā paśoḥ iva vibhāvarī
kośam utkartayāmāsa karṇa ādi caraṇa antikam

original: sā ca kośaṃ samādāya vabandha vimalā jaṭāḥ /
analyzed: sā ca kośam samādāya vabandha vimalāḥ jaṭāḥ

original: ekā na bandhamagamat tāmutpāṭyākṣipad bhuvi // VamP_29.65 //
analyzed: ekā na bandham agamat tām utpāṭya ākṣipat bhuvi
sā jātā sutarām raudrī taila abhyakta śiroruhā

original: kuṣṇārdhamardhaśuklaṃ ca dhārayantī svakaṃ vapuḥ // VamP_29.66 //
analyzed: kuṣṇa ardham ardha śuklam ca dhārayantī svakam vapuḥ
sā bravīt idam varam ekam tu mārayāmi mahā asuram

original: tasyā nāma tadā cakre caṇḍamārīti viśrutam // VamP_29.67 //
analyzed: tasyāḥ nāma tadā cakre caṇḍamārī iti viśrutam
prāha gacchasva subhage caṇḍa muṇḍā viha ānaya

original: svayaṃ hi mārayiṣyāmi tāvānetuṃ tvamarhasi // VamP_29.68 //
analyzed: svayam hi mārayiṣyāmi tau ānetum tvam arhasi
śrutvā evam vacanam devyāḥ sā abhyadravat tau ubhau
pradudruvatuḥ bhaya ārttau diśam āśritya dakṣiṇām
tatas tau api vegena prādhāvat tyakta vāsasau
sā adhiruhya mahā vegam rāsabham garuḍa upamam

original: yato gatau ca tau dautyau tatraivānuyayau śivā /
analyzed: yatas gatau ca tau dautyau tatra evā anuyayau śivā

original: sā dadarśa tadā pauṇḍraṃ mahiṣaṃ vai masya ca // VamP_29.71 //
analyzed: sā dadarśa tadā pauṇḍram mahiṣam vai ca
sā tasya utpāṭayāmāsa viṣāṇam bhujaga ākṛtim
tam pragṛhya kareṇa eva dānavau anvagāt javāt

original: tau cāpi bhūmiṃ saṃtyajya jagmaturgaganaṃ tadā /
analyzed: tau ca api bhūmim saṃtyajya jagmatuḥ gaganam tadā

original: vegenābisṛtā sā ca rāsabhena maheśvarī // VamP_29.73 //
analyzed: vegena abisṛtā sā ca rāsabhena maheśvarī
tatas dadarśa garuḍam pannaga indram

original: karkoṭakaṃ sa dṛṣṭvā ūrdhvaromā vyajāyata // VamP_29.74 //
analyzed: karkoṭakam sa dṛṣṭvā ūrdhvaromā vyajāyata
bhayāt māryaḥ ca garuḍaḥ māṃsa piṇḍa upamaḥ babhau

original: nyapataṃstasya patrāṇi raudrāṇi hi patattriṇaḥ // VamP_29.75 //
analyzed: nyapatan tasya patrāṇi raudrāṇi hi patattriṇaḥ
khagendra patrāṇi ādāya nāgam karkoṭakam tathā
vegena anusarat devī caṇḍa muṇḍau bhaya āturau

original: saṃprāptau ca tadā devyā caṇḍamuṇḍau mahāsurau /
analyzed: saṃprāptau ca tadā devyā caṇḍa muṇḍau mahā asurau
baddhau karkoṭakena eva baddhvā vindhyam upāgamat
nivedayitvā kauśikyai kośam ādāya bheravam
śirobhiḥ dānava indrāṇām tārkṣya patraiḥ ca śobhanaiḥ
kṛtvā srajam anaupamyām caṇḍikāyai nyavedayat

original: ghargharāṃ ca mṛgendrasya carmaṇaḥ sā samārpayat // VamP_29.79 //
analyzed: ghargharām ca mṛgendrasya carmaṇaḥ sā samārpayat
srajam anyaiḥ khagendrasya patraiḥ mūrghni nibadhya ca

original: ātmanā sā papau pānaṃ rudhiraṃ dānaveṣvapi // VamP_29.80 //
analyzed: ātmanā sā papau pānam rudhiram dānaveṣu api

original: caṇḍā tvādāya caṇḍaṃ ca muṇḍaṃ cāsuranāyakam /
analyzed: caṇḍā tvā ādāya caṇḍam ca muṇḍam ca asura nāyakam

original: cakāra kupitā durgā viśiraskau mahāsurau // VamP_29.81 //
analyzed: cakāra kupitā durgā viśiraskau mahā asurau
tayoḥ eva ahinā devī śekharam suṣkarevatī

original: kṛtvā jagāma kauśikyāḥ sakāśaṃ māryayā saha // VamP_29.82 //
analyzed: kṛtvā jagāma kauśikyāḥ sakāśam māryayā saha
sametya sā abravīt devi gṛhyatām śekhara uttamaḥ
grathitaḥ daitya śīrṣābhyām nāga rājena veṣṭitaḥ

original: taṃ śekharaṃ śivā gṛhya caṇḍāyā mūrdhni vistṛtam /
analyzed: tam śekharam śivā gṛhya caṇḍāyāḥ mūrdhni vistṛtam

original: babandha prāha caivaināṃ kṛtaṃ karma sudāruṇam // VamP_29.84 //
analyzed: babandha prāha ca eva enām kṛtam karma su dāruṇam
śekharam caṇḍa muṇḍābhyām yasmāt dhārayase śubham
tasmāt loke tava khyātiḥ cāmuṇḍā iti bhaviṣyati

original: ityevamuktvā vacanaṃ trinetrā mā caṇḍamuṇḍasrajadhāriṇīṃ vai /
analyzed: iti evam uktvā vacanam trinetrā mā caṇḍa muṇḍa sraja dhāriṇīm vai

original: digvāsasaṃ cābhyavadat pratītā niṣūdaya khāribalānyamūni // VamP_29.86 //
analyzed: digvāsasam ca abhyavadat pratītā niṣūdaya khāri balāni amūni

original: sā tvevamuktātha viṣāṇakoṭyā suvegayuktena ca rāsabhena /
analyzed: sā tu evam uktā atha viṣāṇa koṭyā su vega yuktena ca rāsabhena
niṣūdayantī ripu sainyam ugram cacāra ca anyān asurān cakhāda

original: tato 'mbikāyāstvatha carmamuṇḍayā māryā ca siṃhena ca bhūtasaṃghaiḥ /
analyzed: tatas mbikāyāḥ tu atha carmamuṇḍayā māryā ca siṃhena ca bhūta saṃghaiḥ
nipātyamānāḥ danu puṅgavāḥ te kakudminam śumbham upāśrayanta
iti śrī vāmanapurāṇe ekonatriṃśaḥ adhyāyaḥ
pulastyaḥ uvāca

original: caṇḍamuṇḍau ca nihatau sainyaṃ ca vidrutam /
analyzed: caṇḍa muṇḍau ca nihatau sainyam ca vidrutam
samādideśa atibalam raktabījam mahā asuram
akṣauhiṇīnām triṃśadbhiḥ koṭibhiḥ parivāritam
tam āpatantam daityānām balam dṛṣṭvā eva caṇḍikā

original: mumoca siṃhanādaṃ vai tābhyāṃ saha maheśvarī // VamP_30.2 //
analyzed: mumoca siṃha nādam vai tābhyām saha maheśvarī
ninadantyāḥ tatas devyāḥ brahmāṇī mukhataḥ bhavat
haṃsa yukta vimāna sthā sā akṣasūtra kamaṇḍaluḥ

original: mahāhivalayā raudrā jātā kuṇḍalinī kṣaṇāt // VamP_30.4 //
analyzed: mahā ahi valayā raudrā jātā kuṇḍalinī kṣaṇāt

original: kaṇṭhādatha ca kaumārī barhipatrā ca śaktinī /
analyzed: kaṇṭhāt atha ca kaumārī barhipatrā ca śaktinī
samudbhūtā ca deva ṛṣe mayūra vara vāhanā
bāhubhyām garuḍa ārūḍhā śaṅkha cakra gadā sinī
śārṅga bāṇa dharā jātā vaiṣṇavī rūpa śālinī
mahā ugra muśalā raudrā daṃṣṭra ullikhita bhū talā

original: vārāhī pṛṣṭhato jātā śeṣanāgopari śthitā // VamP_30.7 //
analyzed: vārāhī pṛṣṭhatas jātā śeṣa nāga upari śthitā
vajra aṅkuśa udyata karā nānā alaṅkāra bhūṣitā
jātā gaja indra paṣṭha sthā māhendrī stana maṇḍalāt
vikṣipantī saṭā ākṣepaiḥ graha nakṣatra tārakāḥ
nakhinī hṛdayāt jātā nārasiṃhī su dāruṇā
tābhiḥ nipātyamānam tu nirīkṣya balam āsuram

original: nanāda bhūyo nādān vai caṇḍikā nirbhayā ripūn /
analyzed: nanāda bhūyas nādān vai caṇḍikā nirbhayā ripūn
tat ninādam mahat śrutvā trailokya pratipūrakam
samājagāma deveśaḥ śūlapāṇiḥ trilocanaḥ

original: abhyetya vandya caivaināṃ prāha vākyaṃ tadāmbikaṃ // VamP_30.11 //
analyzed: abhyetya vandya ca eva enām prāha vākyam tadā ambikam

original: samāyāto 'smi vai durge dehyājñāṃ kiṃ karomi te /
analyzed: samāyātaḥ smi vai durge dehi ājñām kim karomi te

original: tadvākyasamakālaṃ ca devyā dehodbhavā śivā // VamP_30.12 //
analyzed: tad vākya sama kālam ca devyāḥ deha udbhavā śivā

original: jātā sā cāha deveśaṃ gaccha dautyena śaṅkara /
analyzed: jātā sā ca āha deveśam gaccha dautyena śaṅkara

original: brūhi śumbhaṃ niśumbhaṃ ca yadi jīvitumicchatha // VamP_30.13 //
analyzed: brūhi śumbham niśumbham ca yadi jīvitum icchatha

original: tad gacchadhvaṃ durācārāḥ saptamaṃ hi rasātalam /
analyzed: tat gacchadhvam durācārāḥ saptamam hi rasātalam

original: vāsavo labhatāṃ svargaṃ devāḥ santu gatavyathā // VamP_30.14 //
analyzed: vāsavaḥ labhatām svargam devāḥ santu gata vyathā
yajantu brāhmaṇāḥ yāmī varṇāḥ yajñān ca sāmpratam
noced bala avalepena bhavantaḥ yoddhum icchatha
tat āgacchadhvam avyagrāḥ eṣā aham viniṣūdaye

original: yatastu sā śivaṃ dautye nyayojayat nārada // VamP_30.16 //
analyzed: yatas tu sā śivam dautye nyayojayat nārada
tatas nāma mahādevyāḥ śivadūtī iti ajāyata
te ca api śaṅkara vacaḥ śrutvā garva samanvitam

original: huṅkṛtvābhyadravan sarve yatra kātyāyanī sthitā // VamP_30.17 //
analyzed: huṅkṛtvā abhyadravan sarve yatra kātyāyanī sthitā
tatas śaraiḥ śaktibhiḥ aṅkurvaraiḥ paraśvadhaiḥ śūla bhuśuṇḍi paṭṭiśaiḥ

original: prāsaiḥ sunīkṣṇaiḥ parighaiśca vistṛtairvavarṣatudaityavarau sureśvarīm // VamP_30.18 //
analyzed: prāsaiḥ su nīkṣṇaiḥ parighaiḥ ca vistṛtaiḥ vavarṣatu daitya varau sureśvarīm

original: sā cāpi bāṇairvarakāmukacyutaiś ciccheda śastrāṇyatha bāhubhiḥ saha /
analyzed: sā ca api bāṇaiḥ vara kāmuka cyutaiḥ ciccheda śastrāṇi atha bāhubhiḥ saha

original: jaghāna cānyāt raṇacaṇḍavikramā mahāsurān bāṇaśatairmaheśvarī // VamP_30.19 //
analyzed: jaghāna ca anyāt raṇa caṇḍa vikramā mahā asurān bāṇa śataiḥ maheśvarī

original: mārī triśūlena jaghāna cānyān khaṭvāṅgapātairaparāṃśca kauśikī /
analyzed: mārī triśūlena jaghāna ca anyān khaṭvāṅga pātaiḥ aparān ca kauśikī
mahā jala kṣepa hata prabhāvān brāhmī tathā anyān asurān cakāra
māheśvarī śūla vidārita urasaḥ cakāra dagdhān aparān ca vaiṣṇavī

original: śaktyā kumārī kuliśena caindrī tuṇḍena cakreṇa varāharūpiṇī // VamP_30.21 //
analyzed: śaktyā kumārī kuliśena ca aindrī tuṇḍena cakreṇa varāha rūpiṇī
nakhaiḥ vibhinnān api nāla siṃhī

original: rudrastriśūlena tathaiva cānyān vināyakaścāpi paraśvadhena // VamP_30.22 //
analyzed: rudraḥ triśūlena tathā eva ca anyān vināyakaḥ ca api paraśvadhena

original: evaṃ hi devyā vividhaistu rūpairnipātyamānā danupugavāste /
analyzed: evam hi devyāḥ vividhaiḥ tu rūpaiḥ nipātyamānāḥ danu pugavāḥ te

original: petuḥ pṛthivyāṃ bhuvi cāpi bhūtaiste bhakṣyamāṇāḥ pralayaṃ prajagmuḥ // VamP_30.23 //
analyzed: petuḥ pṛthivyām bhuvi ca api bhūtaiḥ te bhakṣyamāṇāḥ pralayam prajagmuḥ
te vadhyamānāḥ tu atha devatābhiḥ mahā asurāḥ mātṛbhiḥ ākulāḥ ca

original: vimuktakeśāstaralekṣaṇā bhayāt te raktabījaṃ śaraṇaṃ hi jagmuḥ // VamP_30.24 //
analyzed: vimukta keśāḥ tarala īkṣaṇāḥ bhayāt te raktabījam śaraṇam hi jagmuḥ

original: sa raktabījaḥ sahasābhyupetya varāstramādāya ca mātṛmaṇḍatam /
analyzed: sa raktabījaḥ sahasā abhyupetya vara astram ādāya ca mātṛ maṇḍatam

original: vidrāvayan bhūtagaṇān samantād viveśa kopāt sphuritādharaśca // VamP_30.25 //
analyzed: vidrāvayan bhūta gaṇān samantāt viveśa kopāt sphurita adharaḥ ca

original: tamāpatantaṃ prasamīkṣya mātaraḥ śastraiḥ śitāgrairditajaṃ vavarṣuḥ /
analyzed: tam āpatantam prasamīkṣya mātaraḥ śastraiḥ śita agraiḥ dita jam vavarṣuḥ

original: yo raktabindurnyapatat pṛthivyāṃ sa tatpramāṇastvasuro 'pi jajñe // VamP_30.26 //
analyzed: yaḥ rakta binduḥ nyapatat pṛthivyām sa tad pramāṇaḥ tu asuraḥ jajñe
tatas tat āścarya mayam nirīkṣya sā kauśikī keśinim abhyuvāca

original: pibasva caṇḍe rudhiraṃ tvarātervitatya vaktraṃ vaḍavānalābham // VamP_30.27 //
analyzed: pibasva caṇḍe rudhiram tvarāteḥ vitatya vaktram vaḍavānala ābham

original: sā tvevamuktā varadāmbikā hi vitatya vaktraṃ vikarālamugram /
analyzed: sā tu evam uktā vara dā ambikā hi vitatya vaktram vikarālam ugram

original: oṣṭhaṃ nabhaspṛk pṛthivīṃ spūśantaṃ kṛtvādharaṃ tiṣṭhati carmamuṇḍā // VamP_30.28 //
analyzed: oṣṭham nabha spṛś pṛthivīm spūśantam kṛtvā adharam tiṣṭhati carma muṇḍā

original: tato 'mbikā keśavikarṣaṇākulaṃ kṛtvā ripuṃ prākṣipata svavaktre /
analyzed: tatas mbikā keśa vikarṣaṇa ākulam kṛtvā ripum prākṣipata sva vaktre

original: bibheda śūlena tathāpyurastaḥ kṣatodbhavānye nyapataṃśca vaktre // VamP_30.29 //
analyzed: bibheda śūlena tathā api urastaḥ kṣata udbhavān ye nyapatan ca vaktre

original: tatastu śoṣaṃ prajagāma raktaṃ raktakṣaye hīnabalo babhūva /
analyzed: tatas tu śoṣam prajagāma raktam rakta kṣaye hīna balaḥ babhūva

original: taṃ hīnavīryaṃ śatadhā cakāra cakreṇa cāmīkarabhūṣitena // VamP_30.30 //
analyzed: tam hīna vīryam śatadhā cakāra cakreṇa cāmīkara bhūṣitena

original: tasmin viśaste danusainyanāte te dānavā dīnataraṃ vineduḥ /
analyzed: tasmin viśaste danu sainya nāte te dānavāḥ dīnataram vineduḥ

original: hā tāta ha bhrātariti bruvantaḥ kta yāsi tiṣṭhasva muhūrttamehi // VamP_30.31 //
analyzed: hā tāta ha bhrātar iti bruvantaḥ kta yāsi tiṣṭhasva muhūrttam ehi
tathā apare vilulita keśapāśāḥ viśīrṇa varma ābharaṇāḥ digambarāḥ

original: nipātitā dharaṇitale mṛḍānyā pradudruvurgirivaramuhya daityāḥ // VamP_30.32 //
analyzed: nipātitāḥ dharaṇi tale mṛḍānyā pradudruvuḥ giri varam uhya daityāḥ

original: viśīrṇavarmāyudhabhūṣaṇaṃ tat balaṃ nirīkṣyaiva hi dānavendraḥ /
analyzed: viśīrṇa varma āyudha bhūṣaṇam tat balam nirīkṣya eva hi dānava indraḥ
viśīrma cakra akṣa rathaḥ niśumbhaḥ krodhāt mṛḍānīm samupājagāma

original: khaḍgaṃ samādāya ca carma bhāsvaraṃ dhunvan śiraḥ prekṣya ca rūpamasyāḥ /
analyzed: khaḍgam samādāya ca carma bhāsvaram dhunvan śiraḥ prekṣya ca rūpam asyāḥ

original: saṃstambhamohajvarapīḍite 'tha citre yathāsau likhito babhūva // VamP_30.34 //
analyzed: saṃstambha moha jvara pīḍite citre yathā asau likhitaḥ babhūva

original: taṃ stambhitaṃ vīkṣya surāmagre provāca devī vacanaṃ vihasya /
analyzed: tam stambhitam vīkṣya surām agre provāca devī vacanam vihasya

original: anena vīryeṇa surāstvayā jitā anena māṃ prārthayase balena // VamP_30.35 //
analyzed: anena vīryeṇa surāḥ tvayā jitāḥ anena mām prārthayase balena

original: śrutvā tu vākyaṃ kauśikyā dānavaḥ sucirādiva /

original: puṣpavṛṣṭiṃ ca mumucuḥ surāḥ kātyāyanīṃ prati // VamP_30.48 //

original: kṣuraprābhyāṃ samaṃ pādau dvau ciccheda dvipasya sā /

original: namo 'stu te sarvamayi trinetre namo namaste varade prasīda // VamP_30.61 //

original: brahmāṇī tvaṃ mṛḍānī varaśikhigamanā śaktihastā kumārī vārāhī tvaṃ suvaktrā khagapatigamanā vaiṣṇavī tvaṃ saśārṅgo /

analyzed: durdṛśyā nārasiṃhī tvam tathā aindrī sa vajrā tvam mārī carma muṇḍa āśava gamana ratā yoginī yoga siddhā

original: dṛṣṭvā papraccha genāyaṃ tava garbhaḥ samāhitaḥ // VamP_31.12 //

original: sā cāha śaṅkaraṃ yattacchrukraṃ pītaṃ hi vahninā /
analyzed: sā ca āha śaṅkaram yat tat śrukram pītam hi vahninā

original: tadaśaktena tenādya nikṣiptaṃ mayi sattama // VamP_31.13 //
analyzed: tat aśaktena tena adya nikṣiptam mayi sattama

original: garbhasya varttate kālo na papāta ca karhicit // VamP_31.14 //
analyzed: garbhasya varttate kālaḥ na papāta ca karhicit

original: tatrāsti yojanaśataṃ raudraṃ śaravaṇaṃ mahat // VamP_31.15 //
analyzed: tatra asti yojana śatam raudram śaravaṇam mahat
tatra eva kṣipa su śreṇi vistīrṇe giri sānuni

original: sā śrutvā brahmaṇo vākyaṃ rūpiṇī girimāgatā /
analyzed: sā śrutvā brahmaṇaḥ vākyam rūpiṇī girim āgatā

original: sā tu saṃtyajya taṃ bālaṃ brahmāṇaṃ sahasāgamat /

āpaḥ mayī mantra vaśāt saṃjātā akuṭilā satī

original: tejasā cāpi śārveṇa raukmaṃ śaravaṇaṃ mahat /
analyzed: tejasā ca api śārveṇa raukmam śaravaṇam mahat
tad nivāsa ratāḥ ca anye pādapāḥ mṛga pakṣiṇaḥ

bāla arka dīptiḥ saṃjātaḥ bālaḥ kamala locanaḥ

mukhe ṅguṣṭham samākṣipya ruroda ghana rāj iva

original: dadṛśuḥ svecchayā yāntyo bālaṃ śaravaṇe sthitam // VamP_31.22 //
analyzed: dadṛśuḥ sva icchayā yāntyaḥ bālam śaravaṇe sthitam

original: ahaṃ pūrvamahaṃ pūrvaṃ tasmai stanye 'bhicukruśuḥ // VamP_31.23 //

original: vivadantīḥ sa tā dṛṣṭāvā ṣaṇmukhaḥ samajāyata /

original: abībharaṃśca tāḥ sarvāḥ śiśuṃ snehācca kṛttikāḥ // VamP_31.24 //

original: kārttikeyeti vikhyāto jātaḥ sa balināṃ varaḥ // VamP_31.25 //
analyzed: kārttikeya iti vikhyātaḥ jātaḥ sa balinām varaḥ

original: kiyatpramāṇaḥ putraste varttate sāmprataṃ guhaḥ // VamP_31.26 //
analyzed: kiyat pramāṇaḥ putraḥ te varttate sāmpratam guhaḥ

original: provāca putraṃ deveśa na vedmi katamo guhaḥ // VamP_31.27 //
analyzed: provāca putram deveśa na vedmi katamaḥ guhaḥ

original: taṃ prāha bhagavān yattu tejaḥ pītaṃ purā tvayā /
analyzed: tam prāha bhagavān yat tu tejaḥ pītam purā tvayā

original: traiyambalaṃ trilokeśa jātaḥ śaravaṇe śiśuḥ // VamP_31.28 //
analyzed: traiyambalam triloka īśa jātaḥ śaravaṇe śiśuḥ

original: veginaṃ meṣamāruhya kuṭilā taṃ dadarśa ha // VamP_31.29 //
analyzed: veginam meṣam āruhya kuṭilā tam dadarśa ha

original: tataḥ papraccha kuṭilā śīghraṃ kva vrajase kave /
analyzed: tatas papraccha kuṭilā śīghram kva vrajase kave

original: so 'bravīt putraduṣṭyarthaṃ jātaṃ śaravaṇe śiśum // VamP_31.30 //
analyzed: saḥ bravīt putra duṣṭi artham jātam śaravaṇe śiśum

original: sābravīt tanayo mahyaṃ mametyāha ca pāvakaḥ /
analyzed: sā bravīt tanayaḥ mahyam mama iti āha ca pāvakaḥ
vivadantau dadarsa atha svecchā cārī janārdanaḥ

original: tau papraccha kimarthaṃ vā vivādamiha cakrathaḥ /
analyzed: tau papraccha kimartham vā vivādam iha cakrathaḥ
tau ūcatuḥ vutra hetoḥ rudra śukra udbhavāya hi
tau uvāca hariḥ devaḥ gaccha tam tripurāntakam
