iti uktau vāsudevena kuṭila agnī hara antikam
sambhyetya ūcatuḥ tathyam kasya putra iti nārada
rudraḥ tat vākyam ākarṇya harṣa nirbhara mānasaḥ
diṣṭyā diṣṭyā iti girijām prodbhūta pulakaḥ bravīt

original: tato 'mbikā prāha haraṃ deva gacchāma śiśum /
analyzed: tatas mbikā prāha haram deva gacchāma śiśum

original: praṣṭuṃ samāśrayed yaṃ sa tasya putro bhaviṣyati // VamP_31.36 //
analyzed: praṣṭum samāśrayet yam sa tasya putraḥ bhaviṣyati
bāḍham iti eva bhagavān samuttasthau vṛṣadhvajaḥ

original: sahomayā kuṭilayā pāvakena ca dhīmatā // VamP_31.37 //
analyzed: saha umayā kuṭilayā pāvakena ca dhīmatā
saṃprāptāḥ te śaravaṇam hara agni kuṭila ambikāḥ

original: dadṛśuḥ śiśukaṃ taṃ ca kṛttikotsaṅgaśāyinam // VamP_31.38 //
analyzed: dadṛśuḥ śiśukam tam ca kṛttikā utsaṅga śāyinam
tatas sa bālakaḥ teṣām matvā cintitam ādarāt

original: yogī caturmūrtirabhūt ṣaṇmukhaḥ sa śiśustvapi // VamP_31.39 //
analyzed: yogī catur mūrtiḥ abhūt ṣaṇmukhaḥ sa śiśuḥ tu api
kumāraḥ śaṅkaram agāt viśākhaḥ gaurim āgamat
kuṭilām agamat śākhaḥ mahāsenaḥ gnim abhyayāt

original: tataḥ prītiyuto rudra umā ca kuṭilā tathā /
analyzed: tatas prīti yutaḥ rudraḥ umā ca kuṭilā tathā

original: pāvakaścāpi deveśaḥ parāṃ mudamavāpa ca // VamP_31.41 //
analyzed: pāvakaḥ ca api deveśaḥ parām mudam avāpa ca
tatas bruvan kṛttikāḥ tāḥ ṣaṇmukhaḥ kim hara ātmajaḥ

original: tā abravīddharaḥ pratītyā vidhivad vacanaṃ mune // VamP_31.42 //
analyzed: tāḥ abravīt haraḥ pratītyā vidhivat vacanam mune

original: nāmnā tu kārttikeyo hi yuṣmākaṃ tanayastvasau /
analyzed: nāmnā tu kārttikeyaḥ hi yuṣmākam tanayaḥ tu asau
kuṭulāyāḥ kumāra iti putraḥ yam bhavitā avyayaḥ
skandaḥ iti eva vikhyātaḥ gaurīputraḥ bhavatu asau

original: guha ityeva nāmnā ca mamāsau tanayaḥ smṛtaḥ // VamP_31.44 //
analyzed: guhaḥ iti eva nāmnā ca mama asau tanayaḥ smṛtaḥ

original: māhāsena iti khyāto hutāśasyāstu putrakaḥ śāradvata iti khyātaḥ sutaḥ śaravaṇasya ca // VamP_31.45 //
analyzed: māhāsenaḥ iti khyātaḥ hutāśasya astu putrakaḥ śāradvataḥ iti khyātaḥ sutaḥ śaravaṇasya ca
evam eva mahā yogī pṛthivyām khyātim eṣyati

original: ṣaḍāsyatvān mahābāhuḥ ṣaṇmukho nāma gīyate // VamP_31.46 //
analyzed: ṣaṣ āsya tvāt mahā bāhuḥ ṣaṇmukhaḥ nāma gīyate
iti evam uktvā bhagavān śūlapāṇiḥ pitāmaham
sasmāra daivataiḥ sārddha te pi ājagmuḥ tvarā anvitāḥ
praṇipatya ca kāmārim umām ca girinandinīm

original: dṛṣṭvā hutāśanaṃ prītyā kuṭilāṃ kṛttikāstathā // VamP_31.48 //
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā hutāśanam prītyā kuṭilām kṛttikāḥ tathā

original: dadṛśurbālamatyugraṃ ṣaṇmukhaṃ sūryasaṃnibham muṣṇantamiva cakṣuṃṣi tejasā svena devatāḥ // VamP_31.49 //
analyzed: dadṛśuḥ bālam ati ugram ṣaṇmukham sūrya saṃnibham muṣṇantam iva cakṣuṃṣi tejasā svena devatāḥ
kautuka abhivṛtāḥ sarve evam ūcuḥ sura uttamāḥ

original: devakāryaṃ tvayā deva kṛtaṃ devyāgninā tathā // VamP_31.50 //
analyzed: deva kāryam tvayā deva kṛtam devyā agninā tathā
tat uttaṣṭha vrajāmaḥ tīrtham aujasam avyayam
kurukṣetre sarasvatyām abhiṣñcāma ṣaṣ mukham
senāyāḥ patiḥ astu eṣa deva gandharva kiṃnarāḥ

original: mahiṣaṃ ghātayatveṣa tārakaṃ ca sudāruṇam // VamP_31.52 //
analyzed: mahiṣam ghātayatu eṣa tārakam ca su dāruṇam
bāḍham iti abravīt śarvaḥ samuttasthuḥ surāḥ tatas
kumāra sahitāḥ jagmuḥ kurukṣetram mahā phalam
tatra eva devatāḥ sa indrāḥ rudra brahma janārdanāḥ
yatnam asya abhiṣeka ārtam cakruḥ muni gaṇaiḥ saha
tatas mbunā sapta samudra vāhinī nadī jalena api mahā phalena
vara oṣadhībhiḥ ca sahasra mūrttibhiḥ tadā abhyaṣiñcan gumacyuta ādyāḥ
abhiṣiñcati senānyām kumāre divya rūpiṇi
jaguḥ gandharva patayaḥ nanṛtuḥ ca apsaraḥ gaṇāḥ

original: abhiṣiktaṃ kumāraṃ ca giriputrī nirīkṣya hi /
analyzed: abhiṣiktam kumāram ca giri putrī nirīkṣya hi
snehāt utsaṅga gam skandam mūrdhni ajighrat murhur muhur
jighratī kārttikeyasya abhiṣeka ārdram ānanam
bhāti adri jā yathā indrasya deva mātā aditiḥ purā

original: tadābhiṣiktaṃ tanayaṃ dṛṣṭvā śarvo mudaṃ yayau /
analyzed: tadā abhiṣiktam tanayam dṛṣṭvā śarvaḥ mudam yayau

original: pāvakaḥ kṛttikāścaiva kuṭilā ca yaśasvinī // VamP_31.59 //
analyzed: pāvakaḥ kṛttikāḥ ca eva kuṭilā ca yaśasvinī
tatas bhiṣiktā asya haraḥ senāpatye guhasya tu
pramathān caturaḥ pradāt śakra tulya parākramān
ghaṇṭākarṇa lohitākṣam nandisenam ca dāruṇam

original: caturthaṃ balināṃ mukhyaṃ khyātaṃ kumudamālinam // VamP_31.61 //
analyzed: caturtham balinām mukhyam khyātam kumudamālinam

original: haradattān gaṇān dṛṣṭvā devāḥ skandasya nārada /
analyzed: hara dattān gaṇān dṛṣṭvā devāḥ skandasya nārada

original: pradaduḥ pramathān svān svān sarve brahmapurogamāḥ // VamP_31.62 //
analyzed: pradaduḥ pramathān svān svān sarve brahma purogamāḥ

original: sthāṇuṃ brahma gaṇaṃ prādād viṣṇuḥ prādād gaṇatrayam /
analyzed: sthāṇum brahma gaṇam prādāt viṣṇuḥ prādāt gaṇatrayam

original: saṃkramaṃ vikramaṃ caiva tṛtīyaṃ ca parākramam // VamP_31.63 //
analyzed: saṃkramam vikramam ca eva tṛtīyam ca parākramam
utkesam paṅkajam śakraḥ raviḥ daṇḍaka piṅgalau
candraḥ maṇim vasumaṇim aśvinau vatsa nandinau
jyotiḥ hutāśanaḥ prādāt javalajjihvam tathā aparam

original: kundaṃ mukundaṃ kusumaṃ trīn dhātānucarān dadau // VamP_31.65 //
analyzed: kundam mukundam kusumam trīn dhātā anucarān dadau
cakra anucakrau tvaṣṭām ca vedha atisthira susthirau

original: pāṇityajaṃ kālakañca prādāt pūṣā mahābalau // VamP_31.66 //
analyzed: pāṇityajam kālakañca prādāt pūṣā mahā balau
svarṇamālam ghanāhvam ca himavān pramatha uttamau
prādāt eva ucchritaḥ vindhyaḥ tu atiśṛṅgam ca pārṣadam
suvarcasam ca varuṇaḥ pradadau ca ativarcasam
saṃgraham vigraham ca abdhiḥ nāgāḥ jaya mahājayau
unmādam ca puṣpadantam tathā ambikā
ghasam ca atighasam vāyuḥ prādāt anucarau ubhau
parigham caṭakam bhīmam dahati dahanau tathā

original: pradadāvaṃśumān pañca pramathān ṣaṇmukhāya hi // VamP_31.70 //
analyzed: pradadau aṃśumān pañca pramathān ṣaṇmukhāya hi
yamaḥ pramātham unmātham kālasenam mahāmukham
tālapatram nāḍijaṅgham ṣaṭ eva anucarān dadau

original: suprabhaṃ ca sukarmāṇaṃ dadau dhātā gaṇeśvarau /
analyzed: suprabham ca sukarmāṇam dadau dhātā gaṇeśvarau

original: suvrataṃ satyasandhaṃ ca mitraḥ pradāda dvijottama // VamP_31.72 //
analyzed: suvratam satyasandham ca mitraḥ pradāda dvijottama
anantaḥ śaṅkupīṭhaḥ ca nikumbhaḥ kumudaḥ mbujaḥ

original: ekākṣaḥ kunaṭī cakṣuḥ kirīṭī kalaśodaraḥ // VamP_31.73 //
analyzed: eka akṣaḥ kunaṭī cakṣuḥ kirīṭī kalaśa udaraḥ

original: gaṇāḥ pañcadaśaite hi yakṣairdattā guhasya tu // VamP_31.74 //
analyzed: gaṇāḥ pañcadaśā ete hi yakṣaiḥ dattāḥ guhasya tu
kālindyāḥ kālakandaḥ ca narmadāyāḥ raṇa utkaṭaḥ
sahasra bāhuḥ sītāyāḥ vañjūlāyāḥ sita udaraḥ
mandākinyāḥ tathā nandaḥ vipāśāyāḥ priyaṅkaraḥ
airāvatyāḥ caturddaṣṭraḥ ṣoḍaśa akṣaḥ vitastayā

original: mārjāraṃ sauśikī prādāt krathakrauñcau ca gautamī // VamP_31.77 //
analyzed: mārjāram sauśikī prādāt kratha krauñcau ca gautamī
bāhudā śatasīrṣam ca vāhāḥ gonanda nandikau

original: bhīmaṃ bhīmarathī prādād vegāriṃ sarayūrdadau // VamP_31.78 //
analyzed: bhīmam bhīmarathī prādāt vegārim sarayūḥ dadau
aṣṭa bāhum dadau kāśī subāhum api gaṇḍakī

original: mahānadī citradevaṃ citrā citrarathaṃ dadau // VamP_31.79 //
analyzed: mahānadī citra devam citrā citra ratham dadau
kuhūḥ kuvalayam prādāt madhu varṇam madhu udakā

original: jambūkaṃ dhūtapāpā ca veṇā śvetānanaṃ dadau // VamP_31.80 //
analyzed: jambūkam dhūtapāpā ca veṇā śvetānanam dadau
śrutavarma ca revā sāgaraveginam

original: prabhāvārthaṃ sahaṃ prādāt kāñcanā kanakekṣaṇam // VamP_31.81 //
analyzed: prabhāva artham saham prādāt kāñcanā kanaka īkṣaṇam
gṛdhra patram ca vimalā cāru vaktram manoharā
dhūta pāpāḥ mahā rāvam karṇāḥ vidruma saṃnibham
suprasādam suveṇuḥ ca jiṣṇu meghavatī dadau

original: yajñabāhuṃ viśālā ca sarasvatyo dadurgaṇān // VamP_31.83 //
analyzed: yajñabāhum viśālā ca sarasvatyaḥ daduḥ gaṇān
kuṭilā tanayasya ādāda daśa śakra balān gaṇān

original: karālaṃ sitakeśaṃ ca kṛṣṇakeśaṃ jaṭādharam // VamP_31.84 //
analyzed: karālam sita keśam ca kṛṣṇa keśam jaṭā dharam
megha nādam caturddaṣṭram vidyu jihvam daśa ānanam
soma apyayanam eva ugram deva yājinam eva ca
haṃsa āsyam kuṇḍa jaṭharam bahu grīvam haya ānanam

original: kūrmagrīvaṃ ca pañcaitān daduḥ putrāya kṛttikāḥ // VamP_31.86 //
analyzed: kūrmagrīvam ca pañca etān daduḥ putrāya kṛttikāḥ
sthāṇujaṅgham kumbhavaktram lohajaṅgham mahānanam

original: piṇḍākāraṃ ca pañacaitān daduḥ skandāyaṭa carṣayaḥ // VamP_31.87 //
analyzed: piṇḍa ākāram ca pañca ca etān daduḥ ca ṛṣayaḥ

original: cāṣavaktraṃ ca jambūkaṃ dadau tīrthaḥ pṛthūdakaḥ // VamP_31.88 //
analyzed: cāṣavaktram ca jambūkam dadau tīrthaḥ pṛthūdakaḥ
cakratīrtham sucajakrākṣam makarāśram gayāśiraḥ

original: gaṇaṃ pañcaśikhaṃ nāma dadau kanakhalaḥ svakam // VamP_31.89 //
analyzed: gaṇam pañcaśikham nāma dadau kana khalaḥ svakam
bandhudattam vājiśiraḥ bāhuśālam ca puṣkaram

original: sarvauñjasaṃ māhiṣakaṃ mānasaḥ piṅgalaṃ yathā // VamP_31.90 //
analyzed: sarvauñjasam māhiṣakam mānasaḥ piṅgalam yathā
rudram auśanasaḥ prādāt tatas nye mātaraḥ daduḥ
vasudāmām somatīrthaḥ prabhāsaḥ nandinīm api
indratīrtham viśokām ca udapānaḥ ghanasvanām
sapta sārasvataḥ prādāt mātaraḥ caturaḥ udbhutāḥ
gītapriyām mādhavīm ca tīrthanemim smita ānanām
ekacūḍām nāgatīrthaḥ kurukṣetram palāsadām
brahmayoniḥ caṇḍaśilām bhadrakālīm triviṣṭapaḥ
cauṇḍīm bhaiṇḍīm yoga bhaiṇḍīm prādāt caraṇa pāvanaḥ
sopānīyām mahī prādāt śālikām mānasaḥ hradaḥ
śakaghaṇṭām śatānandām tathā ulūkhalamekhalām
padmāvatī mādhavīm ca dadau badarikāśramaḥ

original: suṣamāmaikacūḍāṃ ca devīṃ dhamadhamāṃ tathā // VamP_31.96 //
analyzed: suṣamām aikacūḍām ca devīm dhamadhamām tathā
utkrāthanīm vedamitrām kedāraḥ mātaraḥ dadau

original: sunakṣatrāṃ kadrulāṃ ca suprabhātāṃ muṅgalām // VamP_31.97 //
analyzed: su nakṣatrām kadrulām ca su prabhātām muṅgalām
deva mitrām citrasenām dadau rudra mahā ālayaḥ
koṭarām ūrdhvaṇīm ca śrīmatīm bahuputrikām

original: palitāṃ kamalākṣīṃ ca prayāgo mātaro dadau /
analyzed: palitām kamalākṣīm ca prayāgaḥ mātaraḥ dadau

original: sūpalāṃ madhukumbhāṃ ca khyātiṃ dahadahāṃ parām // VamP_31.99 //
analyzed: sūpalām madhukumbhām ca khyātim dahadahām parām
prādāt khaṭakaṭām ca anyām sarva pāpa vimocanaḥ
saṃtānikām vikalikām kramaḥ catvara vāsinīm
jaleśvarīm kukkuṭikām sudāmām lohamekhalām
vapuṣmatī utmukākṣī ca kokanāmā mahāśanī

original: raudrā karkaṭikā tuṇḍā śvetatīrtho dadau tvimāḥ // VamP_31.101 //
analyzed: raudrā karkaṭikā tuṇḍā śvetatīrthaḥ dadau tu imāḥ

original: etāni bhūtāni gaṇāṃśca mātaro dṛṣṭvā mahātmā vinatātanūjaḥ /
analyzed: etāni bhūtāni gaṇān ca mātaraḥ dṛṣṭvā mahātmā vinatā tanūjaḥ

original: dadau mayūraṃ svasutaṃ mahājavaṃ tathāruṇastāmracūḍaṃ ca putram // VamP_31.102 //
analyzed: dadau mayūram sva sutam mahā javam tathā aruṇaḥ tāmracūḍam ca putram

original: śakti hutāśo 'drisutā ca vastraṃ daṇḍaṃ guruḥ sā kuṭilā kamaṇḍalum /
analyzed: śakti hutāśaḥ drisutā ca vastram daṇḍam guruḥ sā kuṭilā kamaṇḍalum

original: mālāṃ hariḥ śūladharaḥ patākāṃ kaṇṭhe ca hāraṃ maghavānurastaḥ // VamP_31.103 //
analyzed: mālām hariḥ śūla dharaḥ patākām kaṇṭhe ca hāram maghavān urastaḥ
gaṇaiḥ vṛtaḥ mātṛbiḥ anvayātaḥ mayūra saṃsthaḥ vara śakti pāṇiḥ

original: sainyādhipatye sa kṛto bhavena rarāja sūryeva mahāvapuṣmān // VamP_31.104 //
analyzed: sainya ādhipatye sa kṛtaḥ bhavena rarāja sūryā iva mahā vapuṣmān
iti śrī vāmanapurāṇe ekatriṃśaḥ dhyāyaḥ
pulastyaḥ uvāca
senāpatye bhiṣiktaḥ tu kumāraḥ daivataiḥ atha

original: praṇipatya bhavaṃ bhaktyā girijāṃ pāvakaṃ śucim // VamP_32.1 //
analyzed: praṇipatya bhavam bhaktyā girijām pāvakam śucim
ṣaḍ kṛttikāḥ ca śirasā praṇamya kuṭilām api

original: brahmāṇaṃ ca namaskṛtya idaṃ vacanamabravīt // VamP_32.2 //
analyzed: brahmāṇam ca namaskṛtya idam vacanam abravīt
kumāraḥ uvāca

original: namo 'stu bhavatāṃ devā oṃ namo 'stu tapodhanāḥ /
analyzed: namaḥ stu bhavatām devāḥ om namaḥ stu tapodhanāḥ
yuṣmad prasādāt jeṣyāmi śatrū mahiṣa tārakau

original: śiśurasmi na jānāmi vaktuṃ kiñcana devatāḥ /
analyzed: śiśuḥ asmi na jānāmi vaktum kiñcana devatāḥ

original: dīyatāṃ brahmaṇā sārddhamanujña mama sāmpratam // VamP_32.4 //
analyzed: dīyatām brahmaṇā sārddham anujña mama sāmpratam
iti evam ukte vacane kumāreṇa mahātmanā

original: mukhaṃ nirīkṣanti surāḥ sreve vigatasādhyamāḥ // VamP_32.5 //
analyzed: mukham nirīkṣanti surāḥ sreve vigata sādhyamāḥ
śaṅkaparaḥ pi suta snehāt samutthāya prajāpatim
ādāya dakṣiṇe pāṇau skanda antikam upāgamat

original: athomā prāha tanayaṃ putra ehyehi śatruhan /
analyzed: atha umā prāha tanayam putraḥ ehi ehi śatru han
vandasva caraṇau divyau viṣṇoḥ loka namaskṛtau

original: tato vihasyāha guhaḥ ko 'yaṃ mātarvadasva mām /
analyzed: tatas vihasya āha guhaḥ kaḥ yam mātar vadasva mām
yasya ādarāt praṇāmaḥ yam kriyate madvidhaiḥ janaiḥ

original: taṃ mātā prāha vacanaṃ kṛte karmaṇi padmabhūḥ /
analyzed: tam mātā prāha vacanam kṛte karmaṇi padmabhūḥ

original: vakṣyate tava yo 'yaṃ hi mahātmā garuḍadhvajaḥ // VamP_32.9 //
analyzed: vakṣyate tava yaḥ yam hi mahātmā garuḍadhvajaḥ

original: kevalaṃ tviha māṃ devastvatpitā prāha śaṅkaraḥ /
analyzed: kevalam tu iha mām devaḥ tvad pitā prāha śaṅkaraḥ

original: nānyaḥ parataro 'smāddhi vayamanye ca dehinaḥ // VamP_32.10 //
analyzed: na anyaḥ parataraḥ smāt hi vayam anye ca dehinaḥ
pārvatyā gadite skandaḥ praṇipatya janārdanam
tasthau kṛta añjali puṭaḥ tu ājñām prārthayate cyutāt
kṛta añjali puṭam skandam bhagavān bhūtabhāvanaḥ

original: kṛtvā svastyayanaṃ devo hyanujñāṃ pradadau tataḥ // VamP_32.12 //
analyzed: kṛtvā svastyayanam devaḥ hi anujñām pradadau tatas
nāradaḥ uvāca
yat tat svastyayanam puṇyam kṛtavān garuḍadhvajaḥ
śikhidhvajāya viprarṣe tat me vyākhyātum arhasi
pulastyaḥ uvāca

original: śṛṇu svastyayanaṃ puṇyaṃ yatprāha bhagavān hariḥ /
analyzed: śṛṇu svastyayanam puṇyam yat prāha bhagavān hariḥ

original: skandasya vijayārthāya mahiṣasya vadhāya ca // VamP_32.14 //
analyzed: skandasya vijaya arthāya mahiṣasya vadhāya ca

original: svasti te kurutāṃ brahma padmayonī rajoguṇaḥ /
analyzed: svasti te kurutām brahma padmayoniḥ rajaḥ guṇaḥ
svasti cakra aṅkita karaḥ viṣṇuḥ te vidadhatu ājaḥ

original: svasti te śaṅkaro bhaktyā sapatnīko vṛṣadhvajaḥ /
analyzed: svasti te śaṅkaraḥ bhaktyā sa patnīkaḥ vṛṣadhvajaḥ

original: pāvakaḥ svasti tubhyaṃ ca karotu śikhivāhana // VamP_32.16 //
analyzed: pāvakaḥ svasti tubhyam ca karotu śikhivāhana

original: divākaraḥ svasti karotu tubhyaṃ somaḥ sabhaumaḥ sabudho guruśca /
analyzed: divākaraḥ svasti karotu tubhyam somaḥ sa bhaumaḥ sa budhaḥ guruḥ ca

original: kāvyaḥ sadā svasti karotu tubhyaṃ śanaiścaraḥ svastyayanaṃ karotu // VamP_32.17 //
analyzed: kāvyaḥ sadā svasti karotu tubhyam śanaiścaraḥ svastyayanam karotu
marīciḥ atriḥ pulahaḥ pulastyaḥ kratuḥ vasiṣṭhaḥ bhṛguḥ aṅgirāḥ ca

original: mṛkaṇḍujaste kurutāṃ hi svasti svasti sadā sapta maharṣayaśca // VamP_32.18 //
analyzed: mṛkaṇḍu jaḥ te kurutām hi svasti svasti sadā sapta mahā ṛṣayaḥ ca
viśva īśvinau sādhya marut gaṇa agnayaḥ divākarāḥ śūla dharāḥ maheśvarāḥ

original: yakṣāḥ piśācā vasavo 'tha kinnarāḥ te svasti kurvantu sadodyatāstvamī // VamP_32.19 //
analyzed: yakṣāḥ piśācāḥ vasavaḥ tha kinnarāḥ te svasti kurvantu sadā udyatāḥ tu amī

original: nāgāḥ suparṇāḥ saritaḥ sarāṃsi tīrthāni puṇyāyatanāḥ samudrāḥ /
analyzed: nāgāḥ suparṇāḥ saritaḥ sarāṃsi tīrthāni puṇya āyatanāḥ samudrāḥ

original: mahābalā bhūtagaṇā gaṇendrāḥ te svasti kurvantu sadā samudyatāḥ // VamP_32.20 //
analyzed: mahā balāḥ bhūta gaṇāḥ gaṇa indrāḥ te svasti kurvantu sadā samudyatāḥ
svasti dvipādikebhyaḥ te catuṣpādebhyaḥ eva ca
svasti te bahu pādebhyaḥ tu a pādebhyaḥ pi anāmayam

original: prācīṃ dig rakṣatāṃ vajrī dakṣiṇāṃ daṇḍanāyakaḥ /
analyzed: prācīm diś rakṣatām vajrī dakṣiṇām daṇḍanāyakaḥ

original: pāśī pratīcīṃ rakṣatu lakṣmāmaśuḥ pātu cottarām // VamP_32.22 //
analyzed: pāśī pratīcīm rakṣatu lakṣmām aśuḥ pātu ca uttarām
vahniḥ dakṣima pūrvā ca kuberaḥ dakṣiṇa aparām
pratīcīm uttarām vāyuḥ śivaḥ pūrva uttarām api
dhruvaḥ śivaḥ

original: musatī lāṅgalī cakrī dhanuṣmānantareṣu ca // VamP_32.24 //
analyzed: musatī lāṅgalī cakrī dhanuṣmān anantareṣu ca
vārāhaḥ mbunidhau pātu durge pātu nṛkesarī

original: sāmavedadhvaniḥ śrīmān sarvalataḥ pātu mādhavaḥ // VamP_32.25 //
analyzed: sāmaveda dhvaniḥ śrīmān sarva lataḥ pātu mādhavaḥ
pulastyaḥ uvāca
evam kṛta svastyayanaḥ guhaḥ śakti dharaḥ

original: praṇipatya surān sarvān samutpatata bhūtalāt // VamP_32.26 //
analyzed: praṇipatya surān sarvān samutpatata bhū talāt

original: tamanveva gaṇāḥ sarve dattā ye muditaiḥ suraiḥ /
analyzed: tam anu eva gaṇāḥ sarve dattāḥ ye muditaiḥ suraiḥ

original: anujagmuḥ kumāraṃ te kāmarūpā vihaṅgamāḥ // VamP_32.27 //
analyzed: anujagmuḥ kumāram te kāmarūpāḥ vihaṅgamāḥ
mātaraḥ ca tathā sarvāḥ samutpetuḥ nabhastalam

original: samaṃ skandena balinā hantukāmā mahāsurān // VamP_32.28 //
analyzed: samam skandena balinā hantu kāmāḥ mahā asurān
tatas su dīrgham adhvānam gatvā skandaḥ bravīt gaṇān
bhūmyām tūrṇam mahā vīryāḥ kurudhvam avatāraṇam
gaṇāḥ guha vacaḥ śrutvā avatīrya mahī talam
ārāt patantaḥ tad deśam nādam cakruḥ bhayaṅkaram
tad ninādaḥ mahīm sarvām āpūrya ca nabhastalam
viveśa arṇava randhreṇa pātālam dānava ālayam

original: śrutaḥ sa mahiṣeṇātha tārakema ca dhīmatā /
analyzed: śrutaḥ sa mahiṣeṇa atha tārakema ca dhīmatā
virojanena jambhena kujambhena asureṇa ca

original: te śrutvā sahasā nādaṃ vajrapātopamaṃ dṛḍham /
analyzed: te śrutvā sahasā nādam vajra pāta upamam dṛḍham
kim etat iti saṃcintya tūrṇam jagmuḥ tadā andhakam
te sametya andhakena eva samam dānava puṅgavāḥ
mantrayāmāsuḥ udvignāḥ tam śabdam prati nārada
mantrayatsu ca daityeṣu bhū talāt sūkarānanaḥ
pātāla ketuḥ daitya indraḥ rasātalam
sa bāṇa viddhaḥ vyathitaḥ kampamānaḥ muhur muhur
abravīt vacanam dīnam samabhyetya andhaka asuram
pātālaketuḥ uvāca
gataḥ daitya indra gālavasya āśramam prati

original: taṃ vidhvaṃsayituṃ yatnaṃ samārabdhaṃ balānmayā // VamP_32.37 //
analyzed: tam vidhvaṃsayitum yatnam samārabdham balāt mayā
yāvat sūka rūpeṇa praviśāmi tam āśramam

original: na jāne taṃ naraṃ rājan yena me prahitaḥ śaraḥ // VamP_32.38 //
analyzed: na jāne tam naram rājan yena me prahitaḥ śaraḥ
śara saṃbhinna jatruḥ ca bhayāt tasya mahā javaḥ

original: praṇaṣṭa āśramāt tasmāt sa ca māṃ pṛṣṭhato 'nvagāt // VamP_32.39 //
analyzed: praṇaṣṭaḥ āśramāt tasmāt sa ca mām pṛṣṭhatas nvagāt
turaṅga khura nirghoṣaḥ śrūyate sura
tiṣṭha tiṣṭha iti vadataḥ tasya śūrasya pṛṣṭhatas
tad bhayāt asmi jaladhim saṃprāptaḥ dakṣiṇa arṇavam
tatrasthān nānā veṣa ākṛtīn narān

original: kecid garjanti ghanavat pratigarjanti cāpare // VamP_32.41 //
analyzed: kecid garjanti ghana vat pratigarjanti ca apare
anye ca ūcuḥ vayam nūnam nighnāmaḥ mahiṣa asuram
tārakam ghātayāmaḥ vadanti anye su taijasaḥ
tat śrutvā sutarām trāsaḥ mama jātaḥ sureśvara
mahā arṇavam parityajya patitaḥ smi bhaya āturaḥ

original: dharaṇyāṃ vivṛtaṃ gartaṃ sa māmanvapatad balī /
analyzed: dharaṇyām vivṛtam gartam sa mām anvapatat balī
tad bhayāt saṃparityajya hiraṇyapuram ātmanaḥ
tava antikam anuprāptaḥ prasādam kartum arhasi

original: tacchratvā cāndhako vākyaṃ prāha meghasvanaṃ vacaḥ // VamP_32.45 //
analyzed: tat śratvā ca andhakaḥ vākyam prāha megha svanam vacaḥ

original: na bhetavyaṃ tvayā tasmāt satyaṃ goptāsmi dānava /
analyzed: na bhetavyam tvayā tasmāt satyam goptāsmi dānava
mahiṣaḥ tārakaḥ ca ubhau bāṇaḥ ca balinām varaḥ
an ākhyāya eva te vīrāḥ tu andhakam mahiṣa ādayaḥ
sva parigraha saṃyuktāḥ bhūmim yuddhāya niryayuḥ
yatra te dāruma ākārāḥ gaṇāḥ cakruḥ mahā svanam

original: tatra daityāḥ samājagmuḥ sāyudhāḥ sabalā mune // VamP_32.48 //
analyzed: tatra daityāḥ samājagmuḥ sa āyudhāḥ sa balāḥ mune
daityān āpatataḥ dṛṣṭvā kārtikeya gaṇāḥ tatas

original: abhyadravanta sahasā sa cogro mātṛmaṇḍalaḥ // VamP_32.49 //
analyzed: abhyadravanta sahasā sa ca ugraḥ mātṛ maṇḍalaḥ

original: teṣāṃ purassaraḥ sthāṇuḥ pragṛhya parighaṃ balī /
analyzed: teṣām purassaraḥ sthāṇuḥ pragṛhya parigham balī

original: niṣūdayat parabalaṃ kruddho rudraḥ paśūniva // VamP_32.50 //
analyzed: niṣūdayat para balam kruddhaḥ rudraḥ paśūn iva
tam nighnantam mahādevam nirīkṣya kalaśa udaraḥ

original: kuṭhāraṃ pāṇinādāya hanti sarvān mahāsurān // VamP_32.51 //
analyzed: kuṭhāram pāṇinā ādāya hanti sarvān mahā asurān
jvālāmukhaḥ bhaya karaḥ kareṇa ādāya ca asuram

original: sarathaṃ sagajaṃ sāśvaṃ vistṛte vadane 'kṣipata // VamP_32.52 //
analyzed: sa ratham sa gajam sa aśvam vistṛte vadane kṣipata
daṇḍakaḥ ca api saṃkruddhaḥ prāsa pāṇiḥ mahā asuram
sa vāhanam prakṣipati samutpāṭya mahā armave
śaṅku karṇaḥ ca musalī halena ākṛṣya dānavān

original: saṃcūrṇayati mantrīva rājānaṃ prāsabhṛd vaśī // VamP_32.54 //
analyzed: saṃcūrṇayati mantrī iva rājānam prāsa bhṛt vaśī

original: dvidhā tridhā ca bahudhā cakre daiteyadānavān // VamP_32.55 //
analyzed: dvidhā tridhā ca bahudhā cakre daiteya dānavān
piṅgalaḥ daṇḍam udyāmya yatra yatra pradhāvati

original: tatra tatra pradṛśyante rāśayaḥ śāvadānavaiḥ // VamP_32.56 //
analyzed: tatra tatra pradṛśyante rāśayaḥ śāva dānavaiḥ
sahasranayanaḥ śūlam bhrāmayan vai gaṇāgraṇīḥ
nijaghāna asurān vīraḥ sa vāji ratha kuñjarān
bhīmaḥ sa surān
nijaghāna yathā eva indraḥ vajra vṛṣṭyā naga uttamān

original: bhrāmayan mudgaraṃ vegānnijaghāna balād ripūn // VamP_32.59 //
analyzed: bhrāmayan mudgaram vegāt nijaghāna balāt ripūn
giri bhedī talena eva sa āroham kuñjaram raṇe

original: bhasma cakre mahāvego rathaṃ ca rathinā saha // VamP_32.60 //
analyzed: bhasma cakre mahā vegaḥ ratham ca rathinā saha
nāḍījaṅghaḥ ṅghri pātaiḥ ca muṣṭibhiḥ jānunā asurān
kīlabhiḥ vajra tulyābhiḥ jaghāna balavān mune
kūrma grīvaḥ grīvayā eva śiramā caraṇena ca

original: luṇṭhanena tatā daityān nijaghāna savāhanān // VamP_32.62 //
analyzed: luṇṭhanena tatā daityān nijaghāna sa vāhanān
piṇḍārakaḥ tu tuṇḍena śṛṅgābhyām ca kalipriya
vidārayati saṃgrāme dānavān samara uddhatān
tatas tat sainyam atulam vadhyamānam gaṇeśvaraiḥ
pradudrāva atha mahiṣaḥ tārakaḥ ca gaṇāgraṇīḥ
te hanyamānāḥ pramathāḥ dānava abhayām vara āyudhaiḥ

original: parivārya samantāt te yuyudhuḥ kupitāstadā // VamP_32.65 //
analyzed: parivārya samantāt te yuyudhuḥ kupitāḥ tadā
haṃsa āsyaḥ paṭṭiśena atha jaghāna mahiṣa asuram
ṣoṭaśa akṣaḥ triśūlena śata śīrṣaḥ vara asinā
śrutāyudhaḥ tu gadayā viśokaḥ musalena tu
bandhudattaḥ tu śūlena mūrdhni daityam atāḍayat
tathā anyaiḥ pārṣadaiḥ yuddhe śūla śakti ṛṣṭi paṭṭiśaiḥ

original: nākampat tāḍyamāno 'pi maināka iva parvataḥ // VamP_32.68 //
analyzed: na akampat tāḍyamānaḥ pi mainākaḥ iva parvataḥ
tārakaḥ bhadrakālyā ca tathā ulūkhalayā raṇe
vadhyate ca ekacūḍāyāḥ dāryate parama āyudhaiḥ
tau tāḍyamānau pramathaiḥ mātṛbhiḥ ca mahā asurau

original: na kṣobhaṃ jagmaturvirau kṣobhayantau gaṇānapi // VamP_32.70 //
analyzed: na kṣobham jagmatuḥ virau kṣobhayantau gaṇān api
mahiṣaḥ gadayā tūrṇam prahāraiḥ pramathān atha

original: parājitya parādhāvat kumāraṃ prati sāyudhaḥ // VamP_32.71 //
analyzed: parājitya parādhāvat kumāram prati sa āyudhaḥ
tam āpatantam mahiṣam su cakra akṣaḥ nirīkṣya hi
cakram udyamya saṃkruddhaḥ rurodha danu nandanam
gadā cakra aṅkita karau gaṇa asura mahā rathai

original: ayudhyetāṃ tada brahman laghu citraṃ ca suṣṭhu ca // VamP_32.73 //
analyzed: ayudhyetām tada brahman laghu citram ca suṣṭhu ca

original: gadāṃ mumoca mahiṣaḥ samāvidhya gaṇāya tu /
analyzed: gadām mumoca mahiṣaḥ samāvidhya gaṇāya tu
su cakra akṣaḥ nijam cakram utsasarja asuram prati
gadām chittvā su tīkṣṇa aram cakram mahiṣam ādravat

original: tata uccukruśurdaityā hā hato mahiṣastivati // VamP_32.75 //
analyzed: tatas uccukruśuḥ daityāḥ hā hataḥ mahiṣaḥ tivati
tat śrutvā abhyadravat bāṇaḥ prāsam āvidhya vegavān

original: jaghāna cakraṃ raktākṣaḥ pañjamuṣṭiśatena hi // VamP_32.76 //
analyzed: jaghāna cakram raktākṣaḥ pañja muṣṭi śatena hi
pañca bāhu śatena api su cakra akṣam babandha saḥ
balavān api bāṇena niṣprayatna gatiḥ kṛtaḥ

original: sucakrākṣaṃ sacakraṃ hi baddhaṃ bāṇāsureṇa hi /
analyzed: su cakra akṣam sa cakram hi baddham bāṇāsureṇa hi
dṛṣṭvā adravat gadā pāṇiḥ makara akṣaḥ mahā balaḥ

original: gadayā mūrdhni bāṇaṃ hi nijaghāna mahābalaḥ /
analyzed: gadayā mūrdhni bāṇam hi nijaghāna mahā balaḥ
vedanā ārttaḥ mumoca atha sucakrākṣam mahā asuraḥ

original: sa cāpi tena saṃyukto vrīḍāyukto mahāmanāḥ // VamP_32.79 //
analyzed: sa ca api tena saṃyuktaḥ vrīḍā yuktaḥ mahā manāḥ
sa saṃgrāmam parityajya sāligrāmam upāyayau
bāṇaḥ pi makārākṣeṇa tāḍitaḥ bhūt parāṅmukhaḥ
prabhajyata balam sarvam daityānām sura tāpasa
tatas sva balam īkṣya eva prabhagnam tārakaḥ balī
khaḍga udyata karaḥ daityaḥ pradudrāva gaṇeśvarān

original: tatastu tenāpratimena sāsinā te haṃsavaktrapramukhā gaṇeśvarāḥ /
analyzed: tatas tu tena apratimena sa asinā te haṃsa vaktra pramukhāḥ gaṇeśvarāḥ

original: samātaraścāpi parājitā raṇe skandaṃ bhayārttāḥ śaraṇaṃ prapedire // VamP_32.82 //
analyzed: sa mātaraḥ ca api parājitāḥ raṇe skandam bhaya ārttāḥ śaraṇam prapedire

original: bhaganān gaṇān vīkṣya maheśvarātmajastaṃ tārakaṃ sāsinamāpatantam /
analyzed: gaṇān vīkṣya maheśvara ātmajaḥ tam tārakam sa asinam āpatantam

original: dṛṣṭvaiva śaktyā hṛdaye bibheda sa bhinnamarmā nyapatat pṛthivyām // VamP_32.83 //
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā eva śaktyā hṛdaye bibheda sa bhinna marmā nyapatat pṛthivyām
tasmin hate bhrātari bhagna darpaḥ bhaya āturaḥ bhūt mahiṣaḥ mahā ṛṣe

original: saṃtyajya saṃgrāmaśiro durātmā jagāma śailaṃ sa dimācalākhyam // VamP_32.84 //
analyzed: saṃtyajya saṃgrāma śiraḥ durātmā jagāma śailam sa dimācala ākhyam

original: bāṇo 'pi vīre nihate 'tha tārake gate himādriṃ mahiṣe bhayātte /
analyzed: bāṇaḥ pi vīre nihate tha tārake gate himādrim mahiṣe bhayāt te

original: bhayād viveśogramapāṃ nidhānaṃ garṇairbale vadhyati sāparādhe // VamP_32.85 //
analyzed: bhayāt viveśa ugram apām nidhānam garṇaiḥ bale vadhyati sa aparādhe

original: hatvā kumāro raṇamurdhni tārakaṃ pragṛhya śaktiṃ mahatā javena /
analyzed: hatvā kumāraḥ raṇa murdhni tārakam pragṛhya śaktim mahatā javena

original: mayūramāruhya śikhaṇḍamaṇḍitaṃ yayau nihantuṃ mahiṣāsurasya // VamP_32.86 //
analyzed: mayūram āruhya śikhaṇḍa maṇḍitam yayau nihantum mahiṣa asurasya

original: sa pṛṣṭhataḥ prekṣya śikaṇḍiketanaṃ samāpatantaṃ varaśaktipāṇinam /
analyzed: sa pṛṣṭhatas prekṣya śikaṇḍi ketanam samāpatantam vara śakti pāṇinam

original: kailāsamutsṛjya himācalaṃ tathā krauñcaṃ samabhyetva guhaṃ viveśa // VamP_32.87 //
analyzed: kailāsam utsṛjya himācalam tathā krauñcam samabhyetvā guham viveśa

original: daityaṃ praviṣṭaṃ sa pinākisūnurjugopa yatnād bhagavān suho 'pi /
analyzed: daityam praviṣṭam sa pināki sūnuḥ jugopa yatnāt bhagavān

original: svabandhuhantā bhavitā kathaṃ tvahaṃ saṃcintayanneva tataḥ sthito 'bhūt // VamP_32.88 //
analyzed: sva bandhu hantā bhavitā katham tu aham saṃcintayan eva tatas sthitaḥ bhūt
tatas bhyagāt puṣkarasaṃbhavaḥ tu haraḥ murāriḥ tridaseśvaraḥ ca

original: abhyetya cocurmahiṣaṃ saśailaṃ bhindasva śaktyā kuru devakāryam // VamP_32.89 //
analyzed: abhyetya ca ūcuḥ mahiṣam sa śailam bhindasva śaktyā kuru deva kāryam

original: tat kārtikeyaḥ priyameva tathyaṃ śrutvā vacaḥ prāha surān vihasya /
analyzed: tat kārtikeyaḥ priyam eva tathyam śrutvā vacaḥ prāha surān vihasya

original: kathaṃ hi mātāmahanaptṛkaṃ vadhe svabhrātaraṃ bhrātṛsutaṃ ca mātuḥ // VamP_32.90 //
analyzed: katham hi mātāmaha naptṛkam vadhe sva bhrātaram bhrātṛ sutam ca mātuḥ

original: eṣā śrutiścāpi purātanī kila gāyanti yāṃ vedavido maharṣayaḥ /
analyzed: eṣā śrutiḥ ca api purātanī kila gāyanti yām veda vidaḥ mahā ṛṣayaḥ

original: kṛtvā ca yasyā matamuttamāyāḥ svargaṃ vrajanti tvatipāpino 'pi // VamP_32.91 //
analyzed: kṛtvā ca yasyāḥ matam uttamāyāḥ svargam vrajanti tu ati pāpinaḥ

original: gāṃ brāhmaṇaṃ vṛddhamathāptavākyaṃ bālaṃ svabandhuṃ lalanāmaduṣṭām /
analyzed: gām brāhmaṇam vṛddham atha āpta vākyam bālam sva bandhum lalanām aduṣṭām

original: kṛtāparādhā api naiva vadhyā ācāryamukhyā guravastathaiva // VamP_32.92 //
analyzed: kṛta aparādhāḥ api nā eva vadhyāḥ ācārya mukhyāḥ guravaḥ tathā eva

original: evaṃ jānan dharmamagryaṃ surendrā nāhaṃ hanyāṃ bhātaraṃ mātuleyam /
analyzed: evam jānan dharmam agryam sura indrāḥ na aham hanyām bhātaram mātuleyam

original: yadā daityo nirgāmiṣyad guhāntaḥ tadā śaktyā ghātāyiṣyāmi śatrum // VamP_32.93 //
analyzed: yadā daityaḥ nirgāmiṣyat guhā antar tadā śaktyā śatrum

original: śrutvā kumāravacanaṃ bhagavānmaharṣe kṛtvā matiṃ svahṛdaye guhamāha śakraḥ /
analyzed: śrutvā kumāra vacanam bhagavān mahā ṛṣe kṛtvā matim sva hṛdaye guham āha śakraḥ

original: matto bhavān na matimān vadase kimarthaṃ vākyaṃ śṛṇuṣva hariṇā gaditaṃ hi pūrvam // VamP_32.94 //
analyzed: mattaḥ bhavān na matimān vadase kimartham vākyam śṛṇuṣva hariṇā gaditam hi pūrvam
na ekasya arthe bahūn hanyāt iti śāstreṣu niścayaḥ

original: ekaṃ hanyād bahubhyor'the na pāpī tena jāyate / //
analyzed: ekam hanyāt bahubhyaḥ ṛthe na pāpī tena jāyate
etat śrutvā mayā pūrvam samaya sthena ca agnija

original: nihato namuciḥ pūrvaṃ sodaro 'pi mamānujaḥ // VamP_32.96 //
analyzed: nihataḥ namuciḥ pūrvam sodaraḥ mama anujaḥ
tasmāt bahūnām arthāya sa kroñcam mahiṣa asuram
ghātayasva parākramya śaktyā pāvaka dattayā
purandara vacaḥ śrutvā krodhāt ārakta locanaḥ

original: kumāraḥ prāha vacanaṃ kampamānaḥ śatakratum // VamP_32.98 //
analyzed: kumāraḥ prāha vacanam kampamānaḥ śatakratum

original: mūḍha kiṃ te balaṃ bāhvoḥ śārīraṃ cāpi vṛtrahan /
analyzed: mūḍha kim te balam bāhvoḥ śārīram ca api vṛtrahan

original: yenādhikṣipase māṃ tvaṃ dhruvaṃ na matimānasi // VamP_32.99 //
analyzed: yena adhikṣipase mām tvam dhruvam na matimān asi
tam uvāca sahasrākṣaḥ tvattaḥ ham balavān guha

original: taṃ gṛhaḥ prāha ehyehi yuddhyasva balavān yadi // VamP_32.100 //
analyzed: tam gṛhaḥ prāha ehi ehi yuddhyasva balavān yadi
śakraḥ prāha atha balavān jñāyate kṛttikāsuta

original: pradakṣiṇaṃ śīghrataraṃ yaḥ kuryāt krauñcameva hi // VamP_32.101 //
analyzed: pradakṣiṇam śīghrataram yaḥ kuryāt krauñcam eva hi

original: śrutvā tadvacanaṃ skando mayūraṃ prohya vegavān /
analyzed: śrutvā tat vacanam skandaḥ mayūram prohya vegavān
pradakṣiṇam pāda cārī karttu tūrṇataraḥ byagāt
śakraḥ vatīrya nāga indrāt pādena atha pradakṣiṇam

original: kṛtvā tasthauguho 'bhyetya mūḍhaṅkiṃ saṃsthito bhavān // VamP_32.103 //
analyzed: kṛtvā tasthau guhaḥ bhyetya mūḍham kim saṃsthitaḥ bhavān

original: tamindraḥ prāha kauṭilyaṃ mayā pūrvaṃ pradakṣiṇaḥ /
analyzed: tam indraḥ prāha kauṭilyam mayā pūrvam pradakṣiṇaḥ

original: kṛto 'sya na tvayā pūrvaṃ kumāraḥ śakramabravīt // VamP_32.104 //
analyzed: kṛtaḥ sya na tvayā pūrvam kumāraḥ śakram abravīt

original: mayā pūrvaṃ mayā pūrvaṃ vivadanatau parasparam /
analyzed: mayā pūrvam mayā pūrvam vivadanatau parasparam
prāpya ūcatuḥ maheśāya brahmaṇe mādhavāya ca
athā uvāca hariḥ skandam praṣṭum arhasi parvatam
yaḥ yam vacakṣyati pūrvam krauñcam abhyetya pāvakiḥ

original: papracchādrimidaṃ kena kṛtaṃ pūrvaṃ pradakṣiṇam // VamP_32.106 //
analyzed: papraccha adrim idam kena kṛtam pūrvam pradakṣiṇam
tat mādhava vacaḥ śrutvā krauñcam abhyetya pāvakiḥ

original: papracchādrimidaṃ kena kṛtaṃ pūrvaṃ pradakṣiṇam // VamP_32.107 //
analyzed: papraccha adrim idam kena kṛtam pūrvam pradakṣiṇam
iti evam uktaḥ krauñcaḥ tu prāha pūrvam mahāmatiḥ

original: cakāra gotrabhit paścāttvāyā kṛtamatho guha // VamP_32.108 //
analyzed: cakāra gotrabhid kṛtam atho guha
evam bruvantam krauñcam sa krodhāt prasphurita adharaḥ

original: bibheda śaktyā kauṭilyo mahiṣeṇa samaṃ tadā // VamP_32.109 //
analyzed: bibheda śaktyā kauṭilyaḥ mahiṣeṇa samam tadā

original: tasminhate 'tha tanaye balavān sunābho vegena bhūmidharapārthivastathāgāt /
analyzed: tasmin hate tha tanaye balavān sunābhaḥ vegena bhūmidhara pārthivaḥ tathā agāt

original: brahmendrarudraśvivasupradhānā jagmurdivaṃ mahiṣamīkṣya hataṃ guhena // VamP_32.110 //
analyzed: brahma indra rudra śvi vasu pradhānāḥ jagmuḥ divam mahiṣam īkṣya hatam guhena

original: svamātulaṃ bīkṣya balī kumāraḥ śaktiṃ samutpāṭya nihantukāmaḥ /
analyzed: sva mātulam bīkṣya balī kumāraḥ śaktim samutpāṭya nihantu kāmaḥ
nivāritaḥ cakradhareṇa vegāt āliṅgya dorbhyāḥ guruḥ iti udīrya

original: sunābhamabhyetya himācalastu pragṛhya haste 'nyata eva nītavān /
analyzed: sunābham abhyetya himācalaḥ tu pragṛhya haste nyatas eva nītavān

original: hariḥ kumāraṃ saśikhaṇḍinaṃ nayadvegāddivaṃ pannagaśatrupatraḥ // VamP_32.112 //
analyzed: hariḥ kumāram sa śikhaṇḍinam nayat vegāt divam pannaga śatru patraḥ

original: tato guhaḥ prāha hariṃ sureśaṃ mohena naṣṭo bhagavan vivekaḥ /
analyzed: tatas guhaḥ prāha harim sureśam mohena naṣṭaḥ bhagavan vivekaḥ

original: bhrātā mayā mātulajo nirastastasmāt kariṣye svaśarīraśoṣam // VamP_32.113 //
analyzed: bhrātā mayā mātula jaḥ nirastaḥ tasmāt kariṣye sva śarīra śoṣam

original: taṃ prāha viṣṇurvraja tīrthavarthaṃ pṛthūdakaṃ pāpataroḥ kuṭhāram /
analyzed: tam prāha viṣṇuḥ vraja pṛthu udakam pāpa taroḥ kuṭhāram

original: snātvaughavatyāṃ haramīkṣya bhaktyā bhaviṣyase sūryasamaprabhāvaḥ // VamP_32.114 //
analyzed: snātvā oghavatyām haram īkṣya bhaktyā bhaviṣyase sūrya sama prabhāvaḥ

original: ityevamukto hariṇā kumārastvabhyetya tīrthaṃ prasamīkṣya śaṃbhum /
analyzed: iti evam uktaḥ hariṇā kumāraḥ tu abhyetya tīrtham prasamīkṣya śaṃbhum

original: snātvārcya devān sa raviprakāśo jagāma śailaṃ sadanaṃ harasya // VamP_32.115 //
analyzed: snātvā arcya devān sa ravi prakāśaḥ jagāma śailam sadanam harasya
sucakranetraḥ pi mahā āśrame tapaḥ cacāra śaile pavanāśanaḥ tu

original: ārādhayāno vṛṣabhadhvajaṃ tadā haro 'sya tuṣṭo varado babhūva // VamP_32.116 //
analyzed: ārādhayānaḥ vṛṣabhadhvajam tadā tuṣṭaḥ vara daḥ babhūva

original: devāt sa vavre varamāyudhārthe cakraṃ tathā vai ripubāhuṣaṇḍam /
analyzed: devāt sa vavre varam āyudha arthe cakram tathā vai ripu bāhu ṣaṇḍam

original: chindyādyathā tvapratimaṃ kareṇa bāṇasya tanme bhagavān dadātu // VamP_32.117 //
analyzed: chindyāt yathā tu apratimam kareṇa bāṇasya tat me bhagavān dadātu

original: tamāha śaṃbhurvraja dattametad varaṃ hi cakrasya tavāyudhāsya /
analyzed: tam āha śaṃbhuḥ vraja dattam etat varam hi cakrasya tava āyudha asya

original: bāṇasya tadbāhubalaṃ pravṛddhaṃ saṃchetsyate nātra vicāraṇāsti // VamP_32.118 //
analyzed: bāṇasya tat bāhu balam pravṛddham saṃchetsyate na atra vicāraṇā asti
vare pradatte tripurāntakena gaṇeśvaraḥ skandam upājagāma

original: nipatya pādau prativandya hṛṣṭo nivedayāmāsa haraprasādam // VamP_32.119 //
analyzed: nipatya pādau prativandya hṛṣṭaḥ nivedayāmāsa hara prasādam
evam tava uktam mahiṣa asurasya vadham trinetra ātmaja śakti bhedāt

original: krauñcasya mṛtyuḥ śaraṇāgatārthaṃ pāpāpahaṃ puṇyavivardhanaṃ ca // VamP_32.120 //
analyzed: krauñcasya mṛtyuḥ śaraṇa āgata artham pāpa apaham puṇya vivardhanam ca
iti śrī vāmanapurāṇe dvātriṃśaḥ dhyāyaḥ
nāradaḥ uvāca
mantrayatām prāptaḥ daityānām śara tāḍitaḥ

original: sa kena vada nirbhinnaḥ śareṇa ditijeśvaraḥ // VamP_33.1 //
analyzed: sa kena vada nirbhinnaḥ śareṇa ditija īśvaraḥ
pulastyaḥ uvāca
āsīt nṛpaḥ raghu kule ripu jit mahā ṛṣe tasya ātmajaḥ guma gaṇa eka nirdhiḥ mahātmā

original: sūro 'sainyadamano balavān suhṛtsu viprāndhadīnakṛpaṇeṣu samānabhāvaḥ // VamP_33.2 //
analyzed: sūro sainya damanaḥ balavān suhṛtsu vipra andha dīna kṛpaṇeṣu samāna bhāvaḥ

original: ṛtadhvajo nāma mahān mahīyān sa gālavārthe turagādhipūḍhaḥ /
analyzed: ṛtadhvajaḥ nāma mahān mahīyān sa gālava arthe turaga adhipūḍhaḥ

original: pātālaketuṃ nijaghāna pṛṣṭhe bāṇena candrārdhanibhena vegāt // VamP_33.3 //

original: yenāsau patriṇā daityaṃ nijaghāna nṛpātmajaḥ // VamP_33.4 //
analyzed: yena asau patriṇā daityam nijaghāna nṛpa ātmajaḥ
pulastyaḥ uvāca

original: purā tapastapyati gālavarṣirmahāśrame sve satataṃ niviṣṭaḥ /
analyzed: purā tapaḥ tapyati gālava ṛṣiḥ mahā āśrame sve satatam niviṣṭaḥ

original: papātālaketustapaso 'sya vighnaṃ karoti mauḍhyāt sa samādhibhaṅgam // VamP_33.5 //
analyzed: papāta alaketuḥ tapasaḥ sya vighnam karoti mauḍhyāt sa samādhi bhaṅgam

original: na ceṣyata'sau tapaso vyayaṃ hi śakto 'pi karttu tvatha bhasmasāt tam /
analyzed: na tapasaḥ vyayam hi karttu tu atha bhasmasāt tam

original: ākāśamīkṣyātha sa dīrghamuṣṇaṃ mumoca niḥśvāsamanuttamaṃ hi // VamP_33.6 //
analyzed: ākāśam īkṣya atha sa dīrgham uṣṇam mumoca niḥśvāsam anuttamam hi

original: tato 'mbarād vājivaraḥ papāta babhūva vāṇī tvaśarīriṇī ca /
analyzed: tatas mbarāt vāji varaḥ papāta babhūva vāṇī tu aśarīriṇī ca

original: asau turaṅgo balavān krameta ahnā sahasrāṇi tu yojanānām // VamP_33.7 //
analyzed: asau turaṅgaḥ balavān krameta ahnā sahasrāṇi tu yojanānām

original: sa taṃ pragṛhyaśvavaraṃ narendraṃ ṛtadhvajaṃ yojya tadāttaśastram /
analyzed: sa tam pragṛhya aśva varam narendram ṛtadhvajam yojya tat ātta śastram

original: sthitastapasyeva tato maharṣirdaityaṃ sametya viśikhairnṛpajo bibheda // VamP_33.8 //
analyzed: sthitaḥ tapasi eva tatas mahā ṛṣiḥ daityam sametya viśikhaiḥ nṛpa jaḥ bibheda

original: vāk kasyādehinī jātā paraṃ kautūhalaṃ mama // VamP_33.9 //
analyzed: vāc kasya adehinī jātā param kautūhalam mama
pulastyaḥ uvāca
viśvavasuḥ nāma mahā indragāyanaḥ gandharva rājaḥ balavān yaśasvī

original: nisṛṣṭavān bhūvalaye turaṅgaṃ ṛtadhvajasyaiva sutārthamāśu // VamP_33.10 //
analyzed: nisṛṣṭavān bhū valaye turaṅgam ṛtadhvajasya eva suta artham āśu
nāradaḥ uvāca

original: rājñaḥ kuvalayāśvasya kor'tho nṛpasutasya ca // VamP_33.11 //
analyzed: rājñaḥ kuvalayāśvasya kaḥ ṛthaḥ nṛpa sutasya ca
pulastyaḥ uvāca
viśvavasoḥ śīla guṇa upapannā āsīt purandhrīṣu varā triloke

original: lāvaṇyarāśiḥ śaśikāntitulyā madālasā nāma madālasaiva // VamP_33.12 //
analyzed: lāvaṇya rāśiḥ śaśi kānti tulyā madālasā nāma madālasā eva

original: tāṃ nandane devaripustarasvī saṃkrīḍatīṃ rūpavatīṃ dadarśa /
analyzed: tām nandane deva ripuḥ tarasvī saṃkrīḍatīm rūpavatīm dadarśa

original: pātālaketustu jahāra tanvīṃ tasyārthataḥ so 'śvavaraḥ pradattaḥ // VamP_33.13 //
analyzed: pātālaketuḥ tu jahāra tanvīm tasya arthataḥ saḥ śvavaraḥ pradattaḥ

original: hatvā ca daityaṃ nṛpatestanūjo labdhvā varorūmapi saṃsthito 'bhūt /
analyzed: hatvā ca daityam nṛpateḥ tanūjaḥ labdhvā vara ūrūm api saṃsthitaḥ bhūt

original: dṛṣṭo yathā devapatirmahendraḥ śacyā tathā rājasuto mṛgākṣyā // VamP_33.14 //
analyzed: dṛṣṭaḥ yathā devapatiḥ mahā indraḥ śacyā tathā rāja sutaḥ mṛgākṣyā
