original: evaṃ niraste mahiṣe tārake ca mahāsure /
analyzed: evam niraste mahiṣe tārake ca mahā asure

original: hiraṇyākṣasuto dhīmān kimaceṣṭata vai punaḥ // VamP_33.15 //
analyzed: hiraṇyākṣa sutaḥ dhīmān kim aceṣṭata vai punar
pulastyaḥ uvāca

original: tārakaṃ nihataṃ dṛṣṭvā mahiṣaṃ ca raṇe 'ndhakaḥ /
analyzed: tārakam nihatam dṛṣṭvā mahiṣam ca raṇe ndhakaḥ
krodham cakre su durbuddhiḥ devānām deva sainya hā
tatas su alpa parīvāraḥ pragṛhya parigham kare

original: nirjagāmātha pātālād vicacāra ca medinīma // VamP_33.17 //
analyzed: nirjagāma atha pātālāt vicacāra ca
tatas vicaratā tena mandare cāru kandare

original: dṛṣṭā gaurī ca girijā sakhīmadhye sthitāśubhā // VamP_33.18 //
analyzed: dṛṣṭā gaurī ca girijā sakhī madhye sthitā aśubhā
tatas bhūt kāma bāṇa ārttaḥ sahasā eva andhakaḥ suraḥ

original: tāṃ dṛṣṭvā cārusarvāṅgīṃ girirājasutāṃ vane // VamP_33.19 //
analyzed: tām dṛṣṭvā cāru sarva aṅgīm giri rāja sutām vane
athā uvāca asuraḥ mūḍhaḥ vacanam manmatha andhakaḥ

original: kasyeyaṃ cārusarvāṅgī vane carati sundarī // VamP_33.20 //
analyzed: kasya iyam cāru sarva aṅgī vane carati sundarī
iyam yadi bhavet nā eva mama antaḥpura vāsini

original: tanmadīyena jīvena kriyate niṣphalena kim // VamP_33.21 //
analyzed: tat madīyena jīvena kriyate niṣphalena kim
yat asyāḥ tanu madhyāyāḥ na piraṣvaṅgavān aham

original: ato dhiṅ mama rūpeṇa kiṃ sthireṇa prayojanam // VamP_33.22 //
analyzed: atas dhik mama rūpeṇa kim sthireṇa prayojanam

original: sa me bandhuḥ sa sacivaḥ sa bhrātā sāmparāyikaḥ /
analyzed: sa me bandhuḥ sa sacivaḥ sa bhrātā sāmparāyikaḥ

original: yo māmasitakeśāṃ tāṃ yojayen mṛgalocanām // VamP_33.23 //
analyzed: yaḥ mām asita keśām tām yojayet mṛga locanām
ittham vadati daitya indre prahlādaḥ buddhi sāgaraḥ

original: pidhāya karṇo hastābhyāṃ śiraḥkampaṃ vaco 'bravīt // VamP_33.24 //
analyzed: pidhāya karṇaḥ hastābhyām śiraḥ kampam vacaḥ bravīt

original: mā maivaṃ vada daityendra jagato jananī tviyam /
analyzed: mā mā evam vada daitya indra jagataḥ jananī tu iyam
lokanāthasya bhāryā uyam śaṅkarasya triśūlinaḥ
mā kuruṣva su durbuddhim sadyas kula vināśinīm

original: bhavataḥ paradāroyaṃ mā nimajja rasātale // VamP_33.26 //
analyzed: bhavataḥ para dārā iyam mā nimajja rasātale

original: satsu kutsitamevaṃ hi asatsvapi hi kutsitam /
analyzed: satsu kutsitam evam hi asatsu api hi kutsitam
śatravaḥ te prakurvantu para dāra avagāhanam

original: kiñcit tvayā na śrutaṃ daityanātha gītaṃ ślokaṃ gādhinā pārthivena /
analyzed: kiñcid tvayā na śrutam daitya nātha gītam ślokam gādhinā pārthivena

original: dṛṣṭvā sainyaṃ vipradhenuprasaktaṃ tathyaṃ pathyaṃ sarvaloke hitaṃ ca // VamP_33.28 //
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā sainyam vipra dhenu prasaktam tathyam pathyam sarva loke hitam ca

original: varaṃ prāṇāstyājyā na ca piśunavādeṣvabhiratiḥ varaṃ maunaṃ kāryaṃ na ca vacanamuktaṃ yadanṛtam /
analyzed: varam prāṇāḥ tyājyāḥ na ca piśuna vādeṣu abhiratiḥ varam maunam kāryam na ca vacanam uktam yat anṛtam

original: varaṃ klībairbhāvyaṃ na ca parakagalatrābhigamanaṃ varaṃ bhikṣārthitvaṃ na ca paradhanāsvādamasakṛt // VamP_33.29 //
analyzed: varam klībaiḥ bhāvyam na ca paraka galatra abhigamanam varam bhikṣā arthi tvam na ca para dhana āsvādam asakṛt
sa prahlāda vacaḥ śrutvā kroda andhaḥ madana arditaḥ
iyam sā śatru jananī iti evam uktvā pradudruve
tatas nu adhāvan daiteyāḥ yantra muktāḥ iva upalāḥ
tān rurodha balāt nandī vajra udyata karaḥ vyayaḥ
maya tāra purogāḥ te vāritāḥ drāvitāḥ tathā
kuliśa ūna āhatāḥ tūrṇam jagmuḥ bhītāḥ diśaḥ daśa
tān arditān raṇe dṛṣṭvā nandinā andhaka dānavaḥ
parigheṇa samāhatya pātayāmāsa nandinam
śailādim patitam dṛṣṭvā dhāvamānam tathā andhakam

original: śatarūpābhavad gaurī bhayāt tasya durātmanaḥ // VamP_33.34 //
analyzed: śatarūpā bhavat gaurī bhayāt tasya durātmanaḥ

original: tataḥ sa devīgaṇamadhyasaṃsthitaḥ paribhramanna bhāti mahāsurendraḥ /
analyzed: tatas sa devī gaṇa madhya saṃsthitaḥ paribhraman na bhāti mahā asura indraḥ

original: yathā vane mattakarī paribhraman kareṇumadhye madaloladṛṣṭiḥ // VamP_33.35 //
analyzed: yathā vane matta karī paribhraman kareṇu madhye mada lola dṛṣṭiḥ

original: na pirajñātavāṃstatra kā tu sā girikanyakā /
analyzed: na piḥ ajñātavān tatra kā tu sā giri kanyakā

original: nātrāścaryaṃ na paśyanti catvāro 'mī sadaiva hi // VamP_33.36 //
analyzed: na atra āścaryam na paśyanti catvāraḥ sadā eva hi

original: na paśyatīha jātyandho rāgāndho 'pi na paśyati /
analyzed: na paśyati iha jāti andhaḥ na paśyati

original: na paśyati madonmatto lobhāktānto na paśyati /
analyzed: na paśyati mada unmattaḥ lobha akta antaḥ na paśyati
saḥ paśyamānaḥ girijām paśyan api tadā andhakaḥ

original: prahāraṃ nādadat tāsāṃ yuvatya iti cintayan /
analyzed: prahāram na adadat tāsām yuvatyaḥ iti cintayan

original: tato devyā sa duṣṭātmā śatavaryā nirākṛtaḥ // VamP_33.38 //
analyzed: tatas devyā sa duṣṭa ātmā śata varyā nirākṛtaḥ
kuṭṭitaḥ pravaraiḥ śastraiḥ nipapāta mahī tale
vīkṣya andhakam nipatitam śatarūpā vibhāvarī
tasmāt sthānāt apākramya gatā antardhānam ambikā
patitam ca andhakam dṛṣṭvā daitya dānava yūthapāḥ
kurvāntaḥ su mahā śabdam prādravanta raṇa arthinaḥ

original: teṣāmāpatatāṃ śabdaṃ śrutvā tasthau gaṇeśvaraḥ // VamP_33.41 //
analyzed: teṣām āpatatām śabdam śrutvā tasthau gaṇeśvaraḥ

original: ādāya vajraṃ balavān maghavāniva gaṇeśvaraḥ // VamP_33.42 //
analyzed: ādāya vajram balavān maghavān iva gaṇeśvaraḥ
sambhyetya ambikām dṛṣṭvā vavande caraṇau śubhau

original: devī ca tā nijā mūrtiḥ prāha gacchadhvamicchayā // VamP_33.43 //
analyzed: devī ca tāḥ nijāḥ mūrtiḥ prāha gacchadhvam icchayā
viharadhvam mahī pṛṣṭhe pūjyamānāḥ naraiḥ iha

original: vasatirbhavatīnāṃ ca udyāneṣu vaneṣu ca // VamP_33.44 //
analyzed: vasatiḥ bhavatīnām ca udyāneṣu vaneṣu ca

original: vanaspatiṣu vṛkṣeṣu gacchadhvaṃ praṇipatyāmbikāṃ kramāt // VamP_33.45 //
analyzed: vanaspatiṣu vṛkṣeṣu gacchadhvam praṇipatya ambikām kramāt
dakṣu savāsu jagmuḥ tāḥ stūyamānāḥ ca kinnaraiḥ
andhakaḥ pi smṛtim labdhvā apaśyan adrinandinīm

original: svabalaṃ nirjitaṃ dṛṣṭvā tataḥ pātālamādravāt // VamP_33.46 //
analyzed: sva balam nirjitam dṛṣṭvā tatas pātālam ādravāt

original: tato durātmā sa tadāndhako mune pātālamabhyetya divā na bhuṅkte /
analyzed: tatas durātmā sa tadā andhakaḥ mune pātālam abhyetya divā na bhuṅkte

original: rātrau na śete madaneṣutāḍito gaurīṃ smarankāmabalābhipannaḥ // VamP_33.47 //
analyzed: rātrau na śete madana iṣu tāḍitaḥ gaurīm smaran kāma bala abhipannaḥ
iti śrī vāmnapurāṇe trayastriṃśaḥ adhyāyaḥ
nāradaḥ uvāca

original: kva gataḥ śaṅkaro hyāsīdyenāmbā nandinā saha /
analyzed: kva gataḥ śaṅkaraḥ hi āsīt yena ambā nandinā saha
anadhakam yodhayāmāsa etat me vaktum arhasi
pulastyaḥ uvāca
yadā varṣa sahasram tu mahāmohe sthitaḥ
tadā prabhṛti nistejāḥ kṣīṇa vīryaḥ pradṛśyate
svam ātmānam nirīkṣya atha nistejaḥ uṅgam maheśvaraḥ

original: taporthāya tathā cakre matiṃ matimatāṃ varaḥ // VamP_34.3 //
analyzed: tapaḥ rthāya tathā cakre matim matimatām varaḥ
sa mahā vratam utpādya samāśvāsya ambikām vibhuḥ

original: śailādiṃ sthāpya goptāraṃ vicacāra mahītalam // VamP_34.4 //
analyzed: śailādim sthāpya goptāram vicacāra mahī talam
dhārayāṇaḥ kaṭī deśe mahāśaṅkhasya mekhalām

original: kapālaṃ dakṣiṇe haste savye gṛhya kamaṇḍalum /
analyzed: kapālam dakṣiṇe haste savye gṛhya kamaṇḍalum
eka aha vāsī vṛkṣe hi śaila sānu nadīṣu aṭan
sthānam trailokyam āsthāya mūla āhāraḥ mbu bhojanaḥ
vāyu āhāraḥ tadā tasthau nava variṣa śatam kramāt

original: tato vīṭāṃ sukhe kṣipya nirucchvāso 'bhavad yatiḥ /
analyzed: tatas vīṭām sukhe kṣipya nirucchvāsaḥ bhavat yatiḥ
vistṛte himavat puṣṭhe ramye sama śilā tale
tatas vīṭā vidārya eva kapālam parameṣṭhanaḥ
sā arciṣmatī jaṭā madhyāt niṣaṇṇā dharaṇī tale
vīṭayā tu patantyā adriḥ dāritaḥ kṣmā samaḥ bhavat

original: jātastīrthavaraḥ pumyaḥ kedāra iti viśrutaḥ // VamP_34.10 //
analyzed: jātaḥ tīrtha varaḥ pumyaḥ kedāraḥ iti viśrutaḥ

original: tato haro varaṃ prādāt kedārāya vṛṣadhvajaḥ /
analyzed: tatas haraḥ varam prādāt kedārāya vṛṣadhvajaḥ
puṇya vṛddhi karam brahman pāpa ghnam mokṣa sādhanam

original: ye jalaṃ tāvake tīrthe pītvā saṃyamino narāḥ // VamP_34.12 //
analyzed: ye jalam tāvake tīrthe pītvā saṃyaminaḥ narāḥ
ṣaṣ māsāt nivṛttāḥ para pākataḥ

original: teṣāṃ hṛtpaṅkajeṣveva malliṅgaṃ bhavitā dhruvam // VamP_34.13 //
analyzed: teṣām hṛd paṅkajeṣu eva mad liṅgam bhavitā dhruvam
na ca asya pāpa abhiratiḥ bhaviṣyati kadācana

original: pitṝṇāmakṣayaṃ śrāddhaṃ bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ // VamP_34.14 //
analyzed: pitṝṇām akṣayam śrāddham bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ
snāna dāna tapāṃsi iha homa japya ādikāḥ kriyāḥ
bhaviṣyanti akṣayāḥ nṝṇām mṛtānām apunarbhavaḥ

original: etad varaṃ harāt tīrthaṃ prāpya puṣṇāti devatāḥ /
analyzed: etat varam harāt tīrtham prāpya puṣṇāti devatāḥ
punāti puṃsām kedāraḥ trinetra vacanam yathā

original: kedārāya varaṃ dattvā jagama tvarito haraḥ /
analyzed: kedārāya varam dattvā jagama tvaritaḥ haraḥ

original: snātuṃ bhānusutāṃ devīṃ kālindīṃ pāpanāśinīm // VamP_34.17 //
analyzed: snātum bhānusutām devīm kālindīm pāpa nāśinīm
tatra snātvā śuciḥ bhūtvā jagāma atha sarasvatīm

original: vṛtāṃ tīrthaśataiḥ puṇyaiḥ plakṣajāṃ pāpanāśinīm // VamP_34.18 //
analyzed: vṛtām tīrtha śataiḥ puṇyaiḥ plakṣajām pāpa nāśinīm
avatīrmaḥ tatas snātum nimagnaḥ ca mahā ambhasi

original: drupadāṃ nāma gāyatrīṃ jajāpāntarjale haraḥ // VamP_34.19 //
analyzed: drupadām nāma gāyatrīm jajāpa antar jale haraḥ
nimagne śaṅkare devyām sarasvatyām kalipriya

original: sāgrāḥ saṃvatsaro jāto na conmajjata īśvaraḥ // VamP_34.20 //
analyzed: sāgrāḥ saṃvatsaraḥ jātaḥ na ca unmajjate īśvaraḥ
etasmin antare brahman bhuvanāḥ sapta sa arṇavāḥ

original: celuḥ peturdharaṇyāṃ ca nakṣatrāstārakaiḥ saha // VamP_34.21 //
analyzed: celuḥ petuḥ dharaṇyām ca nakṣatrāḥ tārakaiḥ saha
āsanebhyaḥ pracalitāḥ devāḥ śakra purogamāḥ

original: svastyastu lokebhya iti japantaḥ paramarṣayaḥ // VamP_34.22 //
analyzed: svasti astu lokebhyaḥ iti japantaḥ parama ṛṣayaḥ
tatas kṣubdheṣu lokeṣu devāḥ brahmāṇam āgaman

original: dṛṣṭvocuḥ kimidaṃ lokāḥ kṣubdhāḥ saṃśayamāgatāḥ // VamP_34.23 //
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā ūcuḥ kim idam lokāḥ kṣubdhāḥ saṃśayam āgatāḥ

original: tānāha padmasaṃbhūto naitad vedmi ca kāraṇam /
analyzed: tān āha padma saṃbhūtaḥ na etat vedmi ca kāraṇam

original: tadāgacchata vo yuktaṃ draṣṭuṃ cakragadādharam // VamP_34.24 //
analyzed: tadā āgacchata vaḥ yuktam draṣṭum cakra gadā dharam
pitāmahena evam uktāḥ devāḥ śakra ṣuraḥ gamāḥ
pitāmaham puraskṛtya murāri sadanam gatāḥ
nāradaḥ uvāca

original: ko 'sau surārirdevarṣe devo yakṣo nu kinnaraḥ /
analyzed: kaḥ sau surāriḥ deva ṛṣe devaḥ yakṣaḥ nu kinnaraḥ

original: daityo rākṣaso vāpi pārthivo vā taducyatām // VamP_34.26 //
analyzed: daityaḥ rākṣasaḥ vā api pārthivaḥ vā tat ucyatām
pulastyaḥ uvāca

original: yo 'sau murārirdevarṣe devo yakṣo nu kinnaraḥ /
analyzed: sau murāriḥ deva ṛṣe devaḥ yakṣaḥ nu kinnaraḥ

original: daityo rākṣaso vāpi pārthivo vā taducyatām // VamP_34.27 //
analyzed: daityaḥ rākṣasaḥ vā api pārthivaḥ vā tat ucyatām
nāradaḥ uvāca

original: yau'sau mura iti khyātaḥ kasya putraḥ sa gīyate /
analyzed: yausau muraḥ iti khyātaḥ kasya putraḥ sa gīyate

original: kathaṃ ca nahataḥ saṃkhye viṣṇunā tad vadasva me // VamP_34.28 //
analyzed: katham ca nahataḥ saṃkhye viṣṇunā tat vadasva me
pulastyaḥ uvāca
śruyatām kathayiṣyāmi mura asura nibarhaṇam
vicitram idam ākhyānam puṇyam pāpa praṇāśanam
kaśyapasya aurasaḥ putraḥ muraḥ nāma danudbhavaḥ

original: sa dadarśa raṇe śastān ditiputrān surottamaiḥ // VamP_34.30 //
analyzed: sa dadarśa raṇe śastān diti putrān sura uttamaiḥ
tatas sa maraṇāt bhītaḥ taptvā varṣa gaṇān bahūn
ārādhayāmāsa vibhum brahmāṇam aparājitam

original: tato 'sya tuṣṭo varadaḥ prāha vatsa varaṃ vṛṇu /
analyzed: tatas sya tuṣṭaḥ vara daḥ prāha vatsa varam vṛṇu

original: sa ca vavre varaṃ daityo varamenaṃ pitāmahāt // VamP_34.32 //
analyzed: sa ca vavre varam daityaḥ varam enam pitāmahāt

original: yaṃ yaṃ karatalenāhaṃ spṛśeyaṃ samare vibho /
analyzed: yam yam kara talena aham spṛśeyam samare vibho
sa sa mad hasta saṃspṛṣṭaḥ tu amaraḥ pi mara tvataḥ
bāḍham iti āha bhagavān brahma lokapitāmahaḥ
tatas bhyāgāt mahā tejāḥ muraḥ suragirim balī
sametya āhvayate devam yakṣam kinnaram eva vā

original: na kaścid yuyudhe tena samaṃ daityena nārada // VamP_34.35 //
analyzed: na kaścid yuyudhe tena samam daityena nārada
tatas marāvatīm ṛddhaḥ sa gatvā śakram āhvayat

original: na cāsya saha yoddhuṃ vai matiṃ cakre purandaraḥ // VamP_34.36 //
analyzed: na ca asya saha yoddhum vai matim cakre purandaraḥ
tatas sa karam udyamya praviveśa amarāvatīm
praviśantam na tam kaścid nivārayitum utsahet
sa gatvā śakra sadanam provāca indram muraḥ tadā

original: dehi yuddhaṃ sahasrākṣa no cet svargaṃ parityaja // VamP_34.38 //
analyzed: dehi yuddham sahasrākṣa no ced svargam parityaja
iti evam uktaḥ muruṇā brahman harihayaḥ tadā
svarga rājyam parityajya bhūcaraḥ samajāyata
tatas gaja indra kuliśau hṛtau śakrasya śatruṇā

original: sakalatro mahātejāḥ saha devaiḥ sutena ca // VamP_34.40 //
analyzed: sa kalatraḥ mahā tejāḥ saha devaiḥ sutena ca

original: kālindāyā dakṣime kūle niveśya svapuraṃ sthitaḥ /
analyzed: kālindāyāḥ dakṣime kūle niveśya sva puram sthitaḥ
muruḥ ca api mahā bhogān bubhuje svarga saṃsthitaḥ
dānavāḥ ca apare raudrāḥ maya tāra purogamāḥ

original: muramāsādya modante svarge sukutino yathā // VamP_34.42 //
analyzed: muram āsādya modante svarge sukutinaḥ yathā
sa kadācid mahī pṛṣṭham samāyātaḥ mahā asuraḥ

original: ekākī kuñjarārūḍhaṃ sarayūṃ nimnagāṃ prati // VamP_34.43 //
analyzed: ekākī kuñjara ārūḍham sarayūm nimnagām prati
sa sarayvāḥ taṭe vīram rājānam sūrya vaṃśa jam
dadṛśaḥ raghu nāmānam dīkṣitam yajña karmaṇi
tam upotya avravīt daityaḥ yuddham me dīyatām iti

original: no cennivartatāṃ yajño neṣṭavyā devatāstvayā // VamP_34.45 //
analyzed: no ced nivartatām yajñaḥ neṣṭavyāḥ devatāḥ tvayā
tam upetya mahā tejāḥ mitrāvarum asaṃbhavaḥ

original: provāca buddhimān brahman vasiṣṭhastapatāṃ varaḥ // VamP_34.46 //
analyzed: provāca buddhimān brahman vasiṣṭhaḥ tapatām varaḥ
kim te jitaiḥ naraiḥ daitya ajitān anuśāsaya

original: prahartumicchasi yadi taṃ nivāraya cāntakam // VamP_34.47 //
analyzed: prahartum icchasi yadi tam nivāraya ca antakam

original: sa balī śāsanaṃ tubhyaṃ na karoti mahāsura /
analyzed: sa balī śāsanam tubhyam na karoti mahā asura

original: tasmiñjite hi vijitaṃ sarvaṃ manyasva bhūtalam // VamP_34.48 //
analyzed: tasmin jite hi vijitam sarvam manyasva bhū talam
sa tat vasiṣṭha vacanam niśamya danu puṅgavaḥ
jagāma dharmarājānam vijetum daṇḍapāṇinam

original: tamāyāntaṃ yamaḥ śrutvā matvāvadhyaṃ ca saṃyuge /
analyzed: tam āyāntam yamaḥ śrutvā matvā avadhyam ca saṃyuge
sa samāruhya mahiṣam keśava antikam āgamat
sametya ca abhivādya enam provāca mura ceṣṭitam

original: sa cāha gaccha māmadya prepayasva mahāsuram // VamP_34.51 //
analyzed: sa ca āha gaccha mām adya prepayasva mahā asuram
sa vāsudeva vacanam śrutvā abhyāgāt tvarā anvitaḥ

original: etasminnantare daityaḥ saṃprāpto nagarīṃ muraḥ // VamP_34.52 //
analyzed: etasmin antare daityaḥ saṃprāptaḥ nagarīm muraḥ

original: tamāgataṃ yamaḥ prāha kiṃ muro karttumicchasi /
analyzed: tam āgatam yamaḥ prāha kim muro karttum icchasi

original: vadasva vacanaṃ karttā tvadīyaṃ dānaveśvara // VamP_34.53 //
analyzed: vadasva vacanam karttā tvadīyam dānava īśvara
muruḥ uvāca
yama prajā saṃyama anannivṛttim karttum arhasi

original: no cet tavādya chittvāhaṃ mūrdhānaṃ pātaye bhuvi // VamP_34.54 //
analyzed: no ced tava adya chittvā aham mūrdhānam pātaye bhuvi

original: tamāha dharmarāḍ brahman yadi māṃ saṃyamād bhavān /
analyzed: tam āha dharmarāj brahman yadi mām saṃyamāt bhavān

original: gopāyati muro satyaṃ kariṣye vacanaṃ tava/cha /
analyzed: gopāyati muro satyam kariṣye vacanam tavacha

original: 34.55 murastamāha bhavataḥ kaḥ saṃyantā vadasva māma /
analyzed: muraḥ tam āha bhavataḥ kaḥ saṃyantā vadasva māma

original: ahamena parājitya vārayāmi na saṃśayaḥ // VamP_34.56 //
analyzed: aham ena parājitya vārayāmi na saṃśayaḥ
yamaḥ tam prāham mām viṣṇuḥ devaḥ cakra gadā dharaḥ

original: śvetadvīpanivāsī yaḥ sa māṃ saṃyamate 'vyayaḥ // VamP_34.57 //
analyzed: śvetadvīpa nivāsī yaḥ sa mām saṃyamate vyayaḥ
tam āha daitya śārdūlaḥ kva asau vasati durjayaḥ

original: svayaṃ tatra gamiṣyāmi tasya saṃyamanodyataḥ // VamP_34.58 //
analyzed: svayam tatra gamiṣyāmi tasya saṃyamana udyataḥ

original: tamuvāca yamo gaccha kṣīrodaṃ nāma sāgaram /
analyzed: tam uvāca yamaḥ gaccha kṣīrodam nāma sāgaram
tatra āste bhagavān viṣṇuḥ lokanāthaḥ jagat mayaḥ
muraḥ tat vākyam ākarṇya prāha gacchāmi keśavam

original: kiṃ tu tvayā na tāvaddhi saṃyamyā dharma mānavāḥ // VamP_34.60 //
analyzed: kim tu tvayā na tāvat hi saṃyamyāḥ dharma mānavāḥ

original: sa prāha gaccha tvaṃ tāvat pravartiṣye jayaṃ prati /
analyzed: sa prāha gaccha tvam tāvat pravartiṣye jayam prati

original: saṃyanturvā yathā syāddhi tato yuddhaṃ samācara // VamP_34.61 //
analyzed: saṃyantuḥ vā yathā syāt hi tatas yuddham samācara
iti evām uktvā vacanam dugdha abdhim agamat muraḥ
yatra āste śeṣa paryaṅke catur mūrtiḥ janārdanaḥ
nāradaḥ uvāca
caturmūrttiḥ katham viṣṇuḥ ekaḥ eva nigadyate
sarvaga tvāt katham api avyakta tvāt ca tat vada
pulastyaḥ uvāca
avyaktaḥ sarva gaḥ pi iha ekaḥ eva mahā mune
caturmūrtiḥ jagannāthaḥ yatā brahman tathā śṛṇu
apratarkyam anirdeśyam śuklam śāntam param padam
vāsudeva ākhyam āvyaktam smṛtam dvādaśa patrakam
nāradaḥ uvāca
katham śuklam katham śāntam apratarkyam aninditam

original: kānyasya dvādaśaivoktā patrakā tāni me vada // VamP_34.66 //
analyzed: kāni asya dvādaśa eva uktā tāni me vada
pulastyaḥ uvāca
śṛṇuṣva guhyam paramam parameṣṭhi prabhāṣitam

original: śrataṃ sanatkumārema tenākhyātaṃ ca tanmama // VamP_34.67 //
analyzed: śratam sanatkumāra ima tena ākhyātam ca tat mama
nāradaḥ uvāca
kaḥ yam sanatkumāra iti yasya uktam brahmaṇā svayam

original: tavāpi tena gaditaṃ vada māmanupūrvaśaḥ // VamP_34.68 //
analyzed: tava api tena gaditam vada mām anupūrvaśas
pulastyaḥ uvāca
dharmasya bhāryā ahiṃsā ākhyā tasyām putra catuṣṭayam
saṃjātam muni sārdula yoga śāstra vicārakam
jyeṣṭhaḥ sanatkumāraḥ bhūt dvitīyaḥ ca sanātanaḥ

original: tṛtīyaḥ sanako nāma caturthaśca sanandanaḥ // VamP_34.70 //
analyzed: tṛtīyaḥ sanakaḥ nāma caturthaḥ ca sanandanaḥ
sāṃkhya vettāram aparam kapilam voḍhum āsurim

original: dṛṣṭvā pañcaśikhaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ yogayuktaṃ taponidhim // VamP_34.71 //
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā pañcaśikham śreṣṭham yoga yuktam tapaḥ nidhim
jñāna yogam na te dadyuḥ jyāyāṃsaḥ pi kanīyasām
mānam uktam mahā yogam kapila ādīn apāsataḥ
sanatkumāraḥ ca abhyetya brahmāṇam kamalodbhavam
apṛcchat yoga vijñānam tam uvāca prajāpatiḥ
brahmā uvāca
kathayiṣyāmi te sādhya yadi putra tvam icchasi

original: yasya kasya na vaktavyaṃ tatsatyaṃ nānyatheti hi // VamP_34.74 //
analyzed: yasya kasya na vaktavyam tat satyam na anyathā iti hi
sanatkumāraḥ uvāca

original: putra evāsmi deveśa yataḥ śiṣyo 'smyahaṃ vibho /
analyzed: putraḥ eva asmi deveśa yatas śiṣyaḥ smi aham vibho

original: na viseṣo 'sti putrasya śiṣyasya ca pitāmaha // VamP_34.75 //
analyzed: na viseṣaḥ sti putrasya śiṣyasya ca pitāmaha
brahmā uvāca
viśeṣaḥ śiṣya putrābhyām vidyate dharmanandana
dharma karma samāyoge tathā api gadataḥ śruṇu
put nāmnaḥ narakāt trāti putraḥ tena iha gīyate

original: seṣapāpaharaḥ śiṣya itīyaṃ vaidikī śrutiḥ // VamP_34.77 //
analyzed: śiṣyaḥ iti iyam vaidikī śrutiḥ
sanatkumāraḥ uvāca

original: ko 'yaṃ punnāmako deva narakāt trāti putrakaḥ /
analyzed: kaḥ yam put nāmakaḥ deva narakāt trāti putrakaḥ

original: kasmāccheṣaṃ tataḥ pāpaṃ harecchiṣyaśca tadvada // VamP_34.78 //
analyzed: kasmāt śeṣam tatas pāpam haret śiṣyaḥ ca tat vada
brahmā uvāca

original: etat purāṇaṃ paramaṃ maharṣe yogāṅgayuktaṃ ca sadaiva yacca /
analyzed: etat purāṇam paramam mahā ṛṣe yoga aṅga yuktam ca sadā eva yat ca

original: tathaiva cograṃ bhayahāri mānavaṃ vadāmi te sādhya niśāmayainam // VamP_34.79 //
analyzed: tathā eva ca ugram bhaya hāri mānavam vadāmi te sādhya niśāmaya enam
iti śrī vāmanapurāṇe catustriṃśaḥ dhyāyaḥ
brahmā uvāca
para dāra abhigamanam pāpīyāṃsa upasevanam

original: pāruṣyaṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ prathamaṃ narakaṃ smṛtam // VamP_35.1 //
analyzed: pāruṣyam sarva bhūtānām prathamam narakam smṛtam
phala steyam mahā pāpam phala hīnam tathā aṭanam

original: chedanaṃ vṛkṣajātīnāṃ dvitīyaṃ narakaṃ smṛtam // VamP_35.2 //
analyzed: chedanam vṛkṣa jātīnām dvitīyam narakam smṛtam
varjya ādānam tathā duṣṭam avadhya vadha bandhanam
vivādam artha hetu uttham tṛtīyam narakam smṛtam
bhaya dam sarva sattvānām bhavabhūti vināśanam

original: bhraṃśanaṃ nijadharmāṇāṃ caturthaṃ narakaṃ smṛtam // VamP_35.4 //
analyzed: bhraṃśanam nija dharmāṇām caturtham narakam smṛtam
māraṇam mitra kauṭilyam lithyā abhiśapanam ca yat
miṣṭaukā aśanam iti uktam pañcamam tu nṛ pācanam
yantraḥ phala ādi haraṇam yamanam yoganāśanam
yāna yugyasya haraṇam ṣaṣṭham uktam nṛpācanam
rāja bhāga haram mūḍham rāja jāyā niṣevaṇam

original: rājye tvahitakāritvaṃ saptamaṃ nirayaṃ smṛtam // VamP_35.7 //
analyzed: rājye tu ahita kāri tvam saptamam nirayam smṛtam
lubdha tvam lolupa tvam ca labdha dharma artha nāśanam
lālā saṃkīrṇam eva uktam aṣṭamam narakam smṛtam
viproṣyam brahma haraṇam brāhmaṇānām vinindanam
virodham bandhubhiḥ ca uktam navamam nara pācanam
śiṣṭa ācāra vināśam ca śiṣṭa dveṣam śiśoḥ vadham
śāstra steyam dharma nāśam daśamam parikīrtitam
ṣaṣ aṅga nidhanam ghoram ṣāṅguṇya pratiṣedhanam
ekādaśamam eva uktam narakam sadbhiḥ uttamam
satsu nityam sadā vairam anācāram asatkriyā
saṃskāra parihīna tvam idam dvādaśamam smṛtam
hāniḥ dharma artha kāma nāma apavargasya hāraṇam
saṃbhedaḥ saṃvidām etat trayodaśamam ucyate

original: kṛpaṇaṃ dharmahīnaṃ ca yad varjyaṃ yacca vahnidam /
analyzed: kṛpaṇam dharma hīnam ca yat varjyam yat ca vahni dam
narakam tat vigarhitam
ajñānam ca api amuyatvam aśaucam aśubha āvaham
smṛtam tat pañcadaśa mamastya vacanāni ca
ālasyam vai ṣoḍaśamam ākrośam ca viśeṣataḥ
sarvasya ca ātatāyi tva lam āvāseṣu agni dīpanam
icchā ca para dāreṣu narakāya nigadyate

original: īrṣaryābhāvaśca satyeṣu uddhṛttaṃ tu vigarhitam // VamP_35.17 //
analyzed: īrṣarya abhāvaḥ ca satyeṣu tu vigarhitam
etaiḥ tu pāpaiḥ puruṣaḥ punnamā ādyaiḥ na saṃśayaḥ

original: saṃyuktaḥ prīṇayed devaṃ saṃtatyā jagataḥ patim // VamP_35.18 //
analyzed: saṃyuktaḥ prīṇayet devam saṃtatyā jagataḥ patim

original: prītaḥ sṛṣṭyā tu śubhayā sa pāpādyena mucyate /
analyzed: prītaḥ sṛṣṭyā tu śubhayā sa pāpa ādyena mucyate
puṃnāma narakam ghoram vināśayati sarvatas

original: etasmāt kāraṇāt sādhya sutaḥ putreti gadyate /
analyzed: etasmāt kāraṇāt sādhya sutaḥ putra iti gadyate

original: ataḥ paraṃ pravakṣyāmi śeṣapāpasya lakṣaṇam // VamP_35.20 //
analyzed: atas param pravakṣyāmi śeṣa pāpasya lakṣaṇam
ṛmam deva ṛṣi bhūtānām manuṣyāṇām viśeṣataḥ

original: pitṛṇāṃ ca dvijaśreṣṭha sarvarvaṇeṣu caikatā // VamP_35.21 //
analyzed: pitṛṇām ca dvijaśreṣṭha sarvarvaṇeṣu ca ekatā
oṅkārāt api nirvṛttiḥ pāpa kārya kṛtaḥ ca yaḥ
matsya ādaḥ ca mahā pāpam agamyā gamanam tathā
ghṛta ādi vikrayam ghoram caṇḍāla ādi parigrahaḥ
sva doṣa ācchādanam pāpam para doṣa prakāśanam
matsari tvam vāc duṣṭa tvam niṣṭura tvam tathā param
ṭāki tvam tālavādi tvam nāmnā vācā api adharma jam
dāruṇa tvam adhārmikyam naraka āvaham ucyate

original: etaiśca pāpaiḥ saṃyuktaḥ prīṇayed yadi śaṅkaram // VamP_35.25 //
analyzed: etaiḥ ca pāpaiḥ saṃyuktaḥ prīṇayet yadi śaṅkaram
jñāna ādhi rama śeṣeṇa śeṣa pāpam jayet tatas

original: śārīraṃ vācikaṃ yat tu mānasaṃ kāyikaṃ tathā // VamP_35.26 //
analyzed: śārīram vācikam yat tu mānasam kāyikam tathā
pitṛ mātṛ kṛtam yat ca kṛtam yat ca āśritaiḥ naraiḥ
bhrātṛbhiḥ bāndhavaiḥ ca api tasmin janmani dharmaja

original: tatsarvaṃ vilayaṃ yāti sa dharmaḥ sutaśiṣyayoḥ /
analyzed: tat sarvam vilayam yāti sa dharmaḥ suta śiṣyayoḥ

original: viparīte bhavet sādhya viparītaḥ padakramaḥ // VamP_35.28 //
analyzed: viparīte bhavet sādhya viparītaḥ padakramaḥ
tasmāt putraḥ ca śiṣyaḥ ca vidhātavyau vipaścitā
etad artham abhidhyāya śiṣyāt śreṣṭhataraḥ sutaḥ

original: seṣāt tārayate śiṣyaḥ sarvato 'pi hi putrakaḥ // VamP_35.29 //
analyzed: tārayate śiṣyaḥ sarvatas pi hi putrakaḥ
pulastyaḥ uvāca
pitāmaha vacaḥ śrutvā sādhyaḥ prāha tapodhanaḥ

original: triḥ satyaṃ tava putro 'haṃ deva yogaṃ vadasva me // VamP_35.30 //
analyzed: tris satyam tava putraḥ ham deva yogam vadasva me
tam uvāca mahā yogī yadi

original: dāsyete ca tataḥ sūnurdāyādo me 'si putraka // VamP_35.31 //
analyzed: dāsyete ca tatas sūnuḥ dāyādaḥ me si putraka
sanatkumāraḥ provāca dāyāda parikalpanā

original: yeyaṃ hi bhavatā proktā tāṃ me vyākhyātumarhasi // VamP_35.32 //
analyzed: yā iyam hi bhavatā proktā tām me vyākhyātum arhasi
tat uktam sādhya mukhyena vākyam śrutvā pitāmahaḥ

original: prāha prahasya bhagavān kśruṇu vatseti nārada // VamP_35.33 //
analyzed: prāha prahasya bhagavān kśruṇu vatsa iti nārada
brahmā uvāca

original: aurasaḥ kṣetrajaścaiva dattaḥ kṛtrima eva ca /
analyzed: aurasaḥ kṣetrajaḥ ca eva dattaḥ kṛtrimaḥ eva ca
dāyādāḥ bāndhavāḥ tu ṣaṭ
amīṣu ṣaṭpu putreṣu

original: gotrasmyaṃ kule vṛttiḥ pratiṣṭha śāśvatī tathā // VamP_35.35 //
analyzed: gotrasmyam kule vṛttiḥ pratiṣṭha śāśvatī tathā
kānīnaḥ ca sahoḍhaḥ ca krītaḥ paunarbhavaḥ tathā
svayedattaḥ pāraśavaḥ ṣaṣ a dāyāda bandhavāḥ
amībhiḥ ṛṇa piṇḍa ādi kathā na eva iha vidyate
nāma dhārakāḥ eva iha na gotra kula saṃmatāḥ

original: tat tasya vacanaṃ śrutvā brahmaṇaḥ sanakāgrajaḥ /
analyzed: tat tasya vacanam śrutvā brahmaṇaḥ sanakāgrajaḥ

original: uvācaiṣāṃ viśeṣaṃ me brahman vyākhyātumahasi // VamP_35.38 //
analyzed: uvāca eṣām viśeṣam me brahman vyākhyātum ahasi
tatas bravīt surapatiḥ viśeṣam śṛṇu putraka

original: auraso yaḥ svayaṃ jātaḥ pratibimbamivātmanaḥ // VamP_35.39 //
analyzed: aurasaḥ yaḥ svayam jātaḥ pratibimbam iva ātmanaḥ

original: klībonmatte vyasanini patyau tasyājñayā tu yā /
analyzed: klība unmatte vyasanini patyau tasya ājñayā tu yā

original: bhāryā hyanāturā putraṃ janayet kṣetrajastu saḥ // VamP_35.40 //
analyzed: bhāryā hi anāturā putram janayet kṣetrajaḥ tu saḥ

original: mātāpitṛbhyāṃ yo dattaḥ sa dattaḥ parigīyate /
analyzed: mātā pitṛbhyām yaḥ dattaḥ sa dattaḥ parigīyate
mitraputram mitradattam kṛtrimam prāhuḥ uttamāḥ

original: na jñāyate gṛhe kena jātastviti sa gūñakaḥ /
analyzed: na jñāyate gṛhe kena jātaḥ tu iti sa gūñakaḥ
bāhmataḥ svayam ānītaḥ saḥ upaviddhaḥ prakīrtitaḥ
kanyā jātaḥ tu kānīnaḥ sagarbha ūḍhaḥ sahokaḥ

original: mūlyairgṛhītaḥ krītaḥ syād dvividhaḥ syāt punarbhavaḥ // VamP_35.43 //
analyzed: mūlyaiḥ gṛhītaḥ krītaḥ syāt dvividhaḥ syāt punarbhavaḥ

original: dattvaikasya ca yā kanyā hṛtvānyasya pradīyate /
analyzed: dattvā ekasya ca yā kanyā hṛtvā anyasya pradīyate

original: tajjālastanayo jñeyo loke paunarbhavo mune // VamP_35.44 //
analyzed: tad jālaḥ tanayaḥ jñeyaḥ loke paunarbhavaḥ mune
durbhikṣe vyasane ca api yena ātmā viniveditaḥ
sa svayandattaḥ ityuḥ tathā anyaḥ kāraṇa antaraiḥ

original: brāhmaṇasya sutaḥ śūdrayāṃ jāyate yastu suvrata /
analyzed: brāhmaṇasya sutaḥ śūdrayām jāyate yaḥ tu suvrata

original: ūḍhāyāṃ vāpyanūḍhāyāṃ sa pāraśava ucyate // VamP_35.46 //
analyzed: ūḍhāyām vā api anūḍhāyām sa pāraśavaḥ ucyate

original: etasmāt kāraṇāt putra na svayaṃ dātumarhasi /
analyzed: etasmāt kāraṇāt putra na svayam dātum arhasi

original: svamātmānaṃ gaccha śīghraṃ pitarau samupāhvaya // VamP_35.47 //
analyzed: svam ātmānam gaccha śīghram pitarā samupāhvaya
tatas sa mātā pitarau sasmāra vacanāt vibhoḥ

original: tāvājagmaturīśānaṃ draṣṭuṃ vai dampatī mune // VamP_35.48 //
analyzed: tau ājagmatuḥ īśānam draṣṭum vai dampatī mune
dharmaḥ hiṃsā ca deveśam praṇipatya nyaṣīdatām
upaviṣṭau sukha āsīnau sādhyaḥ vacanam abravīt
sanatkumāraḥ uvāca
yogam jigamiṣuḥ tāta vrahmāṇam samacūcudam

original: sa coktavān māṃ putrārthe tasmāt tvaṃ dātumarhasi // VamP_35.50 //
analyzed: sa ca uktavān mām putra arthe tasmāt tvam dātum arhasi
tau evam uktau putreṇa yoga ācāryam pitāmaham
uktavantau prabho yam hi āvayoḥ tanayaḥ tava
adya prabhṛti ayam putraḥ tava brahman bhaviṣyati
iti uktvā jagmatuḥ sūrṇa yena eva a byāgatau yathā
pitāmahaḥ u tam putram sādhyam saddhi naya anvitam
sanatkumāram provāca yogam dvādaśa patrakam

original: śikhāsaṃśthaṃ tu oṅkāraṃ meṣo 'sya śirasi sthitaḥ /
analyzed: tu oṅkāram meṣaḥ śirasi sthitaḥ

original: māso vaiśākhanāmā ca prathamaṃ patrakaṃ smṛtam // VamP_35.54 //
analyzed: māsaḥ vaiśākha nāmā ca prathamam patrakam smṛtam
nakāraḥ mukha saṃsthaḥ hi vṛṣaḥ tatra prakīrtitaḥ
jyeṣṭha māsāḥ ca tat patram dvitīyam parikīrtitam
mokāraḥ bhujayoḥ yugmam mithunaḥ tatra saṃsthitaḥ

original: māso āṣāḍhanāmā ca tṛtīyaṃ patrakaṃ smṛtam // VamP_35.56 //
analyzed: ca tṛtīyam patrakam smṛtam
bhakāram netra yugalam tatra karkaṭakaḥ sthitaḥ

original: māsaḥ śrāvaṇa ityuktaścaturthaṃ patrakaṃ smṛtam // VamP_35.57 //
analyzed: māsaḥ śrāvaṇaḥ iti uktaḥ caturtham patrakam smṛtam

original: gakāraṃ hṛdayaṃ proktaṃ siṃho vasati tatra ca /
analyzed: gakāram hṛdayam proktam siṃhaḥ vasati tatra ca

original: māso bhādrastathā proktaḥ pañcamaṃ patrakaṃ smṛtam // VamP_35.58 //
analyzed: māsaḥ bhādraḥ tathā proktaḥ pañcamam patrakam smṛtam

original: vakāraṃ kavacaṃ vidyāt kanyā tatra pratiṣiṭhatā /
analyzed: vakāram kavacam vidyāt kanyā tatra pratiṣiṭhatā

original: māsaścāśvayujo nāma ṣṣṭhaṃ tat patrakaṃ smṛtam // VamP_35.59 //
analyzed: māsaḥ ca āśvayujaḥ nāma tat patrakam smṛtam
tekāram astra grāmam ca tulā rāśiḥ kṛta āśrayaḥ

original: māsaśca kārtiko nāma saptamaṃ patrakaṃ smṛtam // VamP_35.60 //
analyzed: māsaḥ ca kārtikaḥ nāma saptamam patrakam smṛtam
vākāram nābhi saṃyuktam sthitaḥ tatra tu vṛścikaḥ

original: māso mārgaśiro nāma tvaṣṭamaṃ patrakaṃ smṛtam // VamP_35.61 //
analyzed: māsaḥ mārgaśiraḥ nāma tu aṣṭamam patrakam smṛtam
sukāram jaghanam proktam tatrasthaḥ ca dhanurdharaḥ

original: pauṣati gadito māso navamaṃ parikīrtitam // VamP_35.62 //
analyzed: gaditaḥ māsaḥ navamam parikīrtitam
dekāraḥ ca ūru yugalam makaraḥ api atra saṃsthitaḥ

original: māgho nigadito māsaḥ patrakaṃ daśamaṃ smṛtam // VamP_35.63 //

analyzed: vākāraḥ janu yugmam ca kumbhaḥ tatra ādi saṃsthitaḥ
patrakam phālgunam proktam tat ekādaśam uttamam

original: pādau yakāro mīno 'pi sa caitre vasate mune /
analyzed: pādau yakāraḥ mīnaḥ pi sa caitre vasate mune

original: idaṃ dvādaśamaṃ proktaṃ patraṃ vai keśavasya hi // VamP_35.65 //
analyzed: idam dvādaśamam proktam patram vai keśavasya hi

original: dvādaśāraṃ tathā cakraṃ ṣaṣṇābhi dviyutaṃ tathā /
analyzed: dvādaśa aram tathā cakram dvi yutam tathā
tri vyūham eka mūrtiḥ ca tathā uktaḥ parameśvaraḥ
etat tava uktam devasya rūpam dvādaśa patrakam

original: yasmin jñāte muniśreṣṭha na bhūyo maraṇaṃ bhavet // VamP_35.67 //
analyzed: yasmin jñāte muni śreṣṭha na bhūyas maraṇam bhavet
dvitīyam uktam sattva āḍhyam catur varṇam catur mukham
catur bāhum udāra aṅgam śrīvatsa dharam avyayam
tṛtīyaḥ tamasaḥ māma śeṣa mūrtiḥ sahasrapād
caturthaḥ rājasaḥ nāma rakta varṇaḥ caturmukhaḥ
dvi bhujaḥ dhārayan mālam sṛṣṭi kṛt ca ādi pūruṣaḥ
avyāktāt trayaḥ vyaktāḥ mahā mune
atas marīci pramukhāḥ tathā anye sahasraśas

original: etat tavoktaṃ munivarya rūpaṃ vibhoḥ purāṇaṃ matipuṣṭivardhanam /
analyzed: etat tava uktam muni varya rūpam vibhoḥ purāṇam mati puṣṭi vardhanam

original: cuturbhujaṃ taṃ sa mururdurātmā kṛtāntavākyāt punarāsasāda // VamP_35.72 //
analyzed: cuturbhujam tam sa muruḥ durātmā kṛtānta vākyāt punar āsasāda

original: tamāgataṃ prāha mune madhughnaḥ prāpto 'si kenāsura kāraṇena /
analyzed: tam āgatam prāha mune madhughnaḥ prāptaḥ si kena asura kāraṇena

original: sa prāha yoddhuṃ saha vai tvayādya taṃ prāha bhūyaḥ suraśatruhantā // VamP_35.73 //
analyzed: sa prāha yoddhum saha vai tvayā adya tam prāha bhūyas sura śatru hantā

original: yadīha māṃ yoddhumupāgato 'si tat kampeta te hṛdayaṃ kimartham /
analyzed: yadi iha mām yoddhum upāgataḥ si tat kampeta te hṛdayam kimartham

original: jvarāturasyeva muhurmuhurvai tannāsmi yotsye saha kātareṇa / /
analyzed: jvara āturasya iva muhur muhur vai tat na asmi yotsye saha kātareṇa

original: 35.74 ityevamukto madhusūdanena murustadā sve hṛdaye svahastam /
analyzed: iti evam uktaḥ madhusūdanena muruḥ tadā sve hṛdaye sva hastam

original: kathaṃ kva kasyeti muhustathoktvā nipātayāmāsa vipannabuddhiḥ // VamP_35.75 //
analyzed: katham kva kasya iti muhur tathā uktvā nipātayāmāsa vipanna buddhiḥ

original: hariśca cakraṃ mṛdulāghavena mumoca taddhatakamalasya śatroḥ /
analyzed: hariḥ ca cakram mṛdu lāghavena mumoca tat hata kamalasya śatroḥ

original: ciccheda devāstu gatavyathābhavan devaṃ prasaṃsanti ca padmanābham // VamP_35.76 //
analyzed: ciccheda devāḥ tu gata vyathāḥ abhavan devam prasaṃsanti ca padmanābham

original: etat tavoktaṃ muradaityanāśanaṃ kṛtaṃ hi yuktyā śitacakrapāṇinā /
analyzed: etat tava uktam mura daitya nāśanam kṛtam hi yuktyā śita cakra pāṇinā

original: ataḥ prasiddhiṃ samupājagāma murārirityeva vibhurnṛsiṃhaḥ // VamP_35.77 //
analyzed: atas prasiddhim samupājagāma murāriḥ iti eva vibhuḥ nṛsiṃhaḥ
iti śrī vāmanapurāṇe pañcatriṃśaḥ
pulastyaḥ uvāca
tatas murāri bhavanam samabhyetya surāḥ tatas
ūcuḥ devam namaskṛtya jagat saṃkṣubdhi kāraṇam
tat śrutvā bhagavān prāha gacchāmaḥ hara mandiram

original: sa tavtsyati mahājñānī jagatkṣubdhaṃ caracaram // VamP_36.2 //
analyzed: sa mahājñānī jagat kṣubdham caracaram
tayā uktāḥ devāḥ śakra purogamāḥ
janārdanam puraskṛtya prajāgmuḥ mandaram girim

original: na tatra devaṃ na vṛṣaṃ na devīṃ na ca nandinam // VamP_36.3 //
analyzed: na tatra devam na vṛṣam na devīm na ca nandinam
śūnyam girim apaśyanta ajñāna timira āvṛtāḥ

original: tān mūḍhadṛṣṭīn saṃprokṣya devān viṣṇurmahādyutiḥ // VamP_36.4 //
analyzed: tān mūḍha dṛṣṭīn saṃprokṣya devān viṣṇuḥ mahā dyutiḥ

original: provāca kiṃ na paśyadhvaṃ maheśaṃ purataḥ sthitam /
analyzed: provāca kim na paśyadhvam maheśam puratas sthitam
tam ūcuḥ na eva deveśam paśyāmaḥ girijāpatim

original: na vidmaḥ kāraṇaṃ tacca yena dṛṣṭirhatā hi naḥ /
analyzed: na vidmaḥ kāraṇam tat ca yena dṛṣṭiḥ hatā hi naḥ
tān uvāca jagat mūrtiḥ yūyam devasya sāgasaḥ
pāpiṣṭhāḥ garbha hantāraḥ mṛḍānyāḥ sva artha tatparāḥ

original: tena jñānaviveko vai hṛto devevana śūlinā // VamP_36.7 //
analyzed: tena jñāna vivekaḥ vai hṛtaḥ śūlinā
yena agratas sthitam api na paśyatha
tasmāt kāya viśuddhi artham deva dṛṣṭi artham ādarāt
saṃśuddhāḥ kurudhvam snānam īśvare

original: kṣīrasnāne prayuñjīta sārddha kumbhaśataṃ surāḥ // VamP_36.9 //
analyzed: kṣīra snāne prayuñjīta sārddha kumbha śatam surāḥ
dadhi snāne cutaḥṣaṣṭiḥ dvātriṃśat haviṣoḥ haṇe

original: pañcagavyasya śuddhasya kumbhāḥ ṣoḍaśa kīrtitāḥ // VamP_36.10 //
analyzed: pañcagavyasya śuddhasya kumbhāḥ ṣoḍaśa kīrtitāḥ

original: maduno 'ṣṭau jalasyoktāḥ sarve te dviguṇāḥ surāḥ /
analyzed: ṣṭau jalasya uktāḥ sarve te dviguṇāḥ surāḥ
tatas rocanayā devam aṣṭottaraśatena hi
anulimpet kuṅkumena candanena ca bhaktitaḥ
bilva patraiḥ sa kamalaiḥ dhattūra sura candanaiḥ
mandāraiḥ pārijātaiḥ ca atimuktaiḥ tathā arcayet

original: aguruṃ saha kāleyaṃ candanenāpi dhūpayet // VamP_36.13 //
analyzed: agurum saha kāleyam candanena api dhūpayet
japtavyam śatarūdrīyam ṛgveda uktaiḥ padakramaiḥ

original: evaṃ kṛte tu deveśaṃ paśyadhvaṃ netareṇa ca // VamP_36.14 //
analyzed: evam kṛte tu deveśam paśyadhvam na itareṇa ca
iti uktāḥ vāsudevena devāḥ keśavam abruvan
vidhānam taptakṛcchrasya kathyatām madhusūdana
yasmin cirṇe kāya śuddhiḥ bhavate sārvakālikī
vāsudevaḥ uvāca
tri aham uṣṇam pibet apaḥ tri aham uṣṇam payaḥ pivet

original: palā dvādaśa toyasya palāṣṭau payasaḥ surāḥ /
analyzed: palāḥ dvādaśa toyasya pala aṣṭau payasaḥ surāḥ

original: ṣaṭpalaṃ sarpiṣaḥ proktaṃ divase divase pibet // VamP_36.17 //
analyzed: ṣaṣ palam sarpiṣaḥ proktam divase divase pibet
pulastyaḥ uvāca
iti evam ukte vacane surāḥ kāya viśuddhaye
taptakṛcchra rahasyam vai cakruḥ śakra purogamāḥ
tatas vrate surāḥ cīrṇe vimuktāḥ pāpataḥ bhavan
vimukta pāpāḥ deveśam vāsudevam atha abruvan
kva asau vada jagannātha śaṃbhuḥ tiṣṭhati keśava
yam kṣīra ādi abhiṣekeṇa snāpayāmaḥ vidhānataḥ
athā uvāca surān viṣṇuḥ eva tiṣṭhati śaṅkaraḥ

original: maddehe kiṃ na paśyadhvaṃ yogāścāyaṃ pratiṣṭhitaḥ // VamP_36.21 //
analyzed: mad dehe kim na paśyadhvam yogāḥ ca ayam pratiṣṭhitaḥ
tam ūcuḥ na eva paśyāmaḥ tvattaḥ vai tripurāntakam

original: satyaṃ vada sureśāna maheśānaḥ kva tiṣṭhati // VamP_36.22 //
analyzed: satyam vada sureśāna maheśānaḥ kva tiṣṭhati
tatas vyaya ātmā sa hariḥ sva hṛd paṅkaja śāyinam
darśayāmāsa devānām murāriḥ liṅgam aiśvaram
tatas surāḥ krameṇa eva kṣīra ādibhiḥ anantaram
snāpayāñcakrire liṅgam śāśvatam dhruvam avyayam
gorocanayā tu ālipya candanena sugandhinā
bilva patra ambujaiḥ devam pūjayāmāsuḥ añjasā
pradhūpya aguruṇā bhaktyā nivedya parama oṣadhīḥ
japtvā aṣṭaśata nāmānam praṇāmam cakrire tatas
iti evam cintayantaḥ ca devau etau hari īśvarau
katham yoga tvam āpannau sattva andha tamasā udbhavau
surāṇām cintitam jñātvā viśva mūrti bhūt vibhuḥ
sarva lakṣaṇa saṃyuktaḥ sarva āyudha dharaḥ vyayaḥ
sārddham trinetram kamala ahi kuṇḍalam jaṭā guḍākeśa khaga ṛṣabha dhvajam
sa mādhavam hāra bhujaṅga vakṣasam pīta ajina ācchanna kaṭi pradeśam
cakra asi hastam hala śārṅga pāṇim pināka śūla ajagava anvitam ca
kaparda khaṭvāṅga kapāla ghaṇṭā sa śaṅkha ṭaṅkāra ravam mahā ṛṣe

original: dṛṣṭvaiva devā hariśaṅkaraṃ taṃ namo 'stu te sarvagatāvyayeti /
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā eva devāḥ hari śaṅkaram tam namaḥ stu te sarva gata avyaya iti

original: proktvā praṇāmaṃ kamalāsanādyāścakrurmatiṃ caikatarāṃ niyujya // VamP_36.31 //
analyzed: proktvā praṇāmam kamalāsana ādyāḥ cakruḥ matim ca ekatarām niyujya
tān eka cittān vijñāya devān devapatiḥ hariḥ
pragṛhya abhyadravat tūrṇam kurukṣetram svam āśramam
paśyanta deveśam sthāṇu bhūtam jale śucim
dṛṣṭvā anamaḥ sthāṇava iti proktvā sarve hi upāviśan
tatas bravīt surapatiḥ ehi ehi dīyatām varaḥ
kṣubdham jagat jagannāthaḥ unmajjasva priya atithe
tatas tām madhurām vāṇīm śuśrāva vṛṣabhadhvajaḥ

original: śrutvottasthau ca vaigena sarvavyāpī nirañjanaḥ // VamP_36.35 //
analyzed: śrutvā uttasthau ca vaigena sarva vyāpī nirañjanaḥ
namaḥ stu srva debhyaḥ provāca prahasan haraḥ

original: sa cāgataḥ suraiḥ sendraḥ praṇato vinayānvitaiḥ // VamP_36.36 //
analyzed: sa ca āgataḥ suraiḥ sa indraḥ praṇataḥ vinaya anvitaiḥ
tam ūcuḥ devatāḥ sarvaḥ tyajyatām
mahāvratam trayaḥ lokāḥ kṣubdhāḥ tvattaḥ sāvṛtāḥ
athā uvāca mahādevaḥ mayā tyaktaḥ mahā vrataḥ

original: tataḥ surā divaṃ jagmurhṛṣṭāḥ prayatamānasāḥ // VamP_36.38 //
analyzed: tatas surāḥ divam jagmuḥ hṛṣṭāḥ prayata mānasāḥ
tatas pi kampate pṛthvī sa abdhi dvīpa acalā mune
tatas bhicintayat rudraḥ kimartham kṣubhitā mahī
tatas paryacarat śūlī kurukṣetram samantataḥ
dadarśa ughavatī tīre uśanasam tapaḥ nidhim
tatas bravīt surapatiḥ kimartham tapyate tapaḥ

original: jagatkṣobhakaraṃ vipra tacchīghraṃ kathyatāṃ mama // VamP_36.41 //
analyzed: jagat kṣobha karam vipra tat śīghram kathyatām mama
uśanāḥ uvāca
tava ārādhana kāma artham tapyate hi mahat tapaḥ

original: saṃjīvanīṃ śubhāṃ vidyāṃ jñātumicche trilocana // VamP_36.42 //
analyzed: saṃjīvanīm śubhām vidyām jñātum icche trilocana
haraḥ uvāca
tapasā parituṣṭaḥ smi su taptena tapodhana

original: tasmāt saṃjīvanīṃvidyāṃ bhavān jñāsyati tattavattaḥ // VamP_36.43 //
analyzed: tasmāt saṃjīvanīm vidyām bhavān jñāsyati tat tavattaḥ
varam labdhvā tatas śukraḥ tapasaḥ saṃnyavarttata
tathā api calate pṛthvī sa abdhi bhūbhṛt naga āvṛtā
tatas gamat mahādevaḥ saptasārasvatam śuciḥ

original: dadarśa nṛtyamānaṃ ca ṛṣiṃ maṅkaṇasaṃjñitam // VamP_36.45 //
analyzed: dadarśa nṛtyamānam ca ṛṣim maṅkaṇa saṃjñitam

original: bhāvena poplūyati bālavat sa bhujau prasāryaiva nanartta vegāt /
analyzed: bhāvena poplūyati bāla vat sa bhujau prasārya eva nanartta vegāt

original: tasyaiva vegena samāhatā tu cacāla bhūrbhūmidharaiḥ sahaiva // VamP_36.46 //
analyzed: tasya eva vegena samāhatā tu cacāla bhūḥ bhūmidharaiḥ saha eva

original: taṃ śaṅgaro 'bhyetya kare nigṛhya provāca vākyaṃ prahasan maharṣe /
analyzed: tam śaṅgaraḥ bhyetya kare nigṛhya provāca vākyam prahasan mahā ṛṣe

original: kiṃ bhāvito nṛtyasi kena hetunā vadasva māmetya kimatra tuṣṭiḥ // VamP_36.47 //
analyzed: kim bhāvitaḥ nṛtyasi kena hetunā vadasva mām etya kim atra tuṣṭiḥ

original: sa brāhmaṇaḥ prāha mamādya tuṣṭiryeneha jātā śṛṇu tad dvijendra /
analyzed: sa brāhmaṇaḥ prāha mama adya tuṣṭiḥ yena iha jātā śṛṇu tat dvijendra

original: bahūn gaṇān vai mama tapyatastapaḥ saṃvatsarān kāyaviśoṣaṇārtham // VamP_36.48 //
analyzed: bahūn gaṇān vai mama tapyataḥ tapaḥ saṃvatsarān kāya viśoṣaṇa artham

original: tato 'nupaśyāmi karāt kṣatotthaṃ nirgacchate śākarasaṃ mameha /
analyzed: tatas nu paśyāmi karāt kṣata uttham nirgacchate śāka rasam mama iha

original: tenādya tuṣṭo 'smi bhṛśaṃ dvijendra yenāsmi nṛtyāmi subhāvitātmā // VamP_36.49 //
analyzed: tena adya tuṣṭaḥ smi bhṛśam dvijendra yena asmi nṛtyāmi su bhāvita ātmā

original: taṃ prāha śaṃbhurdvija paśya mahyaṃ bhasma pravṛtto 'ṅgulito 'tiśuklam /
analyzed: tam prāha śaṃbhuḥ dvija paśya mahyam bhasma

original: saṃtāḍanādeva na ca praharṣo mamāsti nṛnaṃ hi bhavān pramattaḥ // VamP_36.50 //
analyzed: saṃtāḍanāt eva na ca praharṣaḥ mama asti hi bhavān pramattaḥ

original: śrutvātha vākyaṃ vṛṣabhadhvajasya matvā munirmaṅkaṇako maharṣe /
analyzed: śrutvā atha vākyam vṛṣabhadhvajasya matvā muniḥ maṅkaṇakaḥ mahā ṛṣe

original: nṛtyaṃ parityajya suvismito 'tha vavanda pādau vinayāvanamraḥ // VamP_36.51 //
analyzed: nṛtyam parityajya vavanda pādau vinaya avanamraḥ

original: tamāha śaṃbhurdvija gaccha lokaṃ taṃ brahmaṇo durgamamavyayasya /
analyzed: tam āha śaṃbhuḥ dvija gaccha lokam tam brahmaṇaḥ durgamam avyayasya

original: idaṃ ca tīrthaṃ pravaraṃ pṛthivyāṃ pṛthūdakasyāstu samaṃ phalena // VamP_36.52 //
analyzed: idam ca tīrtham pravaram pṛthivyām pṛthūdakasya astu samam phalena
sāṃnidhyam atra eva sura asurāṇām gandharva vidyādhara kinnarāṇām

original: sadāstu dharmasya nidhānamagryaṃ sārasvataṃ pāpamalāpahāri // VamP_36.53 //
analyzed: sadā astu dharmasya nidhānam agryam sārasvatam pāpa mala apahāri
suprabhā kāñcānākṣī ca suveṇuḥ vimalodakā

original: manoharā caughavatī viśālā ca sarasvatī // VamP_36.54 //
analyzed: manoharā ca oghavatī viśālā ca sarasvatī
etāḥ sapta sarasvatyaḥ nivisiṣyanti nityaśas
somapāla phalam sarvāḥ prayacchanti su puṇya dāḥ
bhavān api kurukṣetre mūrtim sthāpya garīyasīm
gamiṣyati mahā puṇyam brahma lokam su durgamam
iti evam uktaḥ devena tapodhanaḥ

original: mūrtti sthāpya kurukṣetre brahmalokamagād vaśī // VamP_36.57 //
analyzed: sthāpya kurukṣetre brahma lokam agāt vaśī
gate maṅkaṇake pṛthvī niścalā samajāyata
athā agāt mandaram śaṃbhuḥ nijam āvasatham śuciḥ

original: etat tavoktaṃ dvija śaṅkarastu gatastadāsīt tapase 'tha śaile /
analyzed: etat tava uktam dvija śaṅkaraḥ tu gataḥ tadā āsīt tapase śaile

original: śūnye 'bhyagād dṛṣṭamatirhi devyā saṃyodhito yena hi kāraṇena // VamP_36.59 //
analyzed: śūnye bhyagāt dṛṣṭa matiḥ hi devyā saṃyodhitaḥ yena hi kāraṇena
iti śrī vāmanapurāṇe ṣaṭtriśaḥ adhyāyaḥ
nārādaḥ uvāca
gataḥ ndhakaḥ tu pātāle kim aceṣṭata dānavaḥ
śaṅkaraḥ yat ca akāra tat ucyatām
pulāstyaḥ uvāca
pātāla sthaḥ ndhakaḥ brahman bādhyate madana agninā
saṃtpata vigrahaḥ sarvān dānavān idam abravīt

original: sa me suhṛtsa me bandhuḥ sa bhrāta sa pitā mama /
analyzed: sa me suhṛd sa me bandhuḥ sa bhrāta sa pitā mama
yaḥ tām adri sutām śīghnam mama anti kam upānayet
evam bruvati daitya inde andhake madana andhake
megha gambhīra nirghoṣam prahalādaḥ vākyam abravīt

original: yeyaṃ girisutā vīra sā mātā dharmatastava /
analyzed: yā iyam girisutā vīra sā mātā dharmataḥ tava

original: pitā trinayano devaḥ śrūyatāmatra kāraṇam // VamP_37.5 //
analyzed: pitā trinayanaḥ devaḥ śrūyatām atra kāraṇam
tava pitrā hi aputrā ima dharma nityena dānava

original: ārādhito mahādevaḥ putrārthāya purā kila // VamP_37.6 //
analyzed: ārādhitaḥ mahādevaḥ putra arthāya purā kila
tasmai dattaḥ dānava

original: putrakaḥ putrakāmāsya proktvetyaṃ vacanaṃ vibho // VamP_37.7 //
analyzed: putrakaḥ putra kāmā asya proktvā ityam vacanam vibho
netra trayam hiraṇyākṣa narma artham umayā mama
pihitam yoga saṃsthasya tatas ndham abhavat tamaḥ
tasmāt ca tamasaḥ jātaḥ bhūtaḥ nīla ghana svanaḥ
tat itam gṛhyatām daitya tava upayikam ātmajam

original: yadā tu lokavidviṣṭaṃ duṣṭaṃ karma kariṣyati /
analyzed: yadā tu loka vidviṣṭam duṣṭam karma kariṣyati
trailokya jananīm ca api dhamaḥ

original: ghātayiṣyati vā vipraṃ yadā prakṣipta cāsurān /
analyzed: ghātayiṣyati vā vipram yadā ca asurān
tadā asya svayam eva aham kariṣye kāya śodhanam
evam uktvā gataḥ śaṃbhum sva sthānam mandara acalam
tvad pitā api samabhyāgāt tvām ādāya rasātalam
etena kāraṇena ambā śaileyī bhavitā tava

original: sarvasyāpīha jagato guruḥ śaṃbhuḥ pitā dhruvam // VamP_37.13 //
analyzed: sarvasya api iha jagataḥ guruḥ śaṃbhuḥ pitā dhruvam
bhavān api tapaḥ yuktaḥ śāstra vettā guṇa āplutaḥ

original: nedṛśe pāpasaṃkalpe matiṃ kuryād bhavadvidhaḥ // VamP_37.14 //
analyzed: na īdṛśe pāpa saṃkalpe matim kuryāt bhavadvidhaḥ
trailokya prabhuḥ avyaktaḥ bhavaḥ sarvaiḥ namaskṛtaḥ
ajeyaḥ tasya bhāryā iyam na tvam arhe marārdana

original: na cāpi śaktaḥ prāptuṃ tāṃ bhavāñśailanṛpātmajām /
analyzed: na ca api śaktaḥ prāptum tām bhavān śaila nṛpa ātmajām

original: ajitvā sagaṇaṃ rudraṃ sa ca kāmo 'dya durlabhaḥ // VamP_37.16 //
analyzed: a jitvā sa gaṇam rudram sa ca kāmaḥ durlabhaḥ

original: yastaret sāgaraṃ dorbhyā pātayed bhuvi bhāskaram /
analyzed: yaḥ taret sāgaram dorbhyā pātayet bhuvi bhāskaram
merum utpāṭayet vā api sa jayet śūlapāṇinam
uta āhosvit imāḥ śakyāḥ kriyāḥ kartum nareḥ balāt

original: na ca śakyo haro jetuṃ satyaṃ satyaṃ mayoditam // VamP_37.18 //
analyzed: na ca śakyaḥ haraḥ jetum satyam satyam mayā uditam

original: kiṃ tvayā na śrutaṃ daitya yathā daṇḍo mahīpaliḥ /
analyzed: kim tvayā na śrutam daitya yathā daṇḍaḥ mahī paliḥ
para strī kāmavān mūḍhaḥ sa rāṣṭraḥ nāśam āptavān
āsīt daṇḍaḥ nāma nṛpaḥ prabhūta bala vāhanaḥ

original: sa ca vavre mahātejāḥ paurohityāya bhārgavam // VamP_37.20 //
analyzed: sa ca vavre mahā tejāḥ paurohityāya bhārgavam
īje ca vividhaiḥ yajñaiḥ nṛpatiḥ

original: sukrasyāsīcca duhitā arajā nāma nāmataḥ // VamP_37.21 //
analyzed: sukrasya āsīt ca duhitā arajā nāma nāmataḥ
śukraḥ kadācid agamat vṛṣuparvāṇam āsuram
tena arcitaḥ ciram tatra tasthau bhārgava sattmaḥ
arajā sva gṛhe vahnim śuśruṣantī mahā asura
atiṣṭhata su cāru aṅgī tatas byāgāt narādhipaḥ

original: sa papraccha kva śukroti tamūcuḥ paricārikāḥ /
analyzed: sa papraccha kva śukrā iti tam ūcuḥ paricārikāḥ

original: gataḥ sa bhagavān śukro yājanāya danoḥ sutam // VamP_37.24 //
analyzed: gataḥ sa bhagavān śukraḥ yājanāya danoḥ sutam

original: papraccha nṛpatiḥ kā tu tiṣṭhate bhārgavāśrame /
analyzed: papraccha nṛpatiḥ kā tu tiṣṭhate bhārgava āśrame
tāḥ tam ūcuḥ guroḥ putrī saṃtiṣṭhati arajā nṛpa
tām āśrame śukra sutām draṣṭum ikṣvāku nandanaḥ
praviveśa mahā bāhuḥ dadarśa arajasam tatas
tām tṛṣṭvā kāma saṃtaptaḥ tad kṣaṇāt eva pārthivaḥ
saṃjātaḥ daṇḍaḥ tu kṛtānta bala coditaḥ
tatas visarjayāmāsa bhṛtyān bhrātṛn suhṛttamān

original: śukraśiṣyānapi balī ekākī nṛpa āvrajat // VamP_37.28 //
analyzed: śukra śiṣyān api balī ekākī nṛpaḥ āvrajat
tam āgatam śukra sutā pratyutthāya yaśasvinī
pūjayāmāsa saṃhṛṣṭā bhrātṛ bhāvena dānava
tatas tām āha nṛpatiḥ bāle kāma agni vāriṇā
mām samāhlādayasva adya sva pariṣvaṅga vāriṇā

original: sāpi prāha nṛpaśreṣṭha mā vinīnasa āturaḥ /
analyzed: sā api prāha nṛpa śreṣṭha mā vinīnasaḥ āturaḥ

original: pitā mama mahākrodhāt tridaśānapi nirdahet // VamP_37.31 //
analyzed: pitā mama mahā krodhāt tridaśān api nirdahet
mūḍha buddhe bhavān bhrātā mama asi tu anayā āplutaḥ
bhaginī dharmataḥ te ham bhavān śiṣyaḥ pituḥ mama

original: so 'brovīd bhīru māṃ śukraḥ kālena paridhakṣyati /
analyzed: saḥ brovīt bhīru mām śukraḥ kālena paridhakṣyati
kāma agniḥ nirdahati mām adyā eva tanu madhyame

original: sā prāha daṇḍaṃ nṛpātiṃ muhūrta paripālaya /
analyzed: sā prāha daṇḍam nṛpātim muhūrta paripālaya

original: tameva yācasva guruṃ sa te dāsyatyasaṃśayam // VamP_37.34 //
analyzed: tam eva yācasva gurum sa te dāsyati asaṃśayam

original: daṇḍo 'bravīt sutanvaṅgi kālakṣepo na me kṣamaḥ /
analyzed: daṇḍaḥ bravīt su tanu aṅgi kālakṣepaḥ na me kṣamaḥ
cyuta avasara kartṛ tve vighnaḥ jāyeta sundari
tatas bravīt ca virajāḥ na aham tvām pārthiva ātmaja

original: dātuṃ śaktā svamātmānaṃ svatantrā na hi yoṣitaḥ // VamP_37.36 //
analyzed: dātum śaktā svam ātmānam svatantrāḥ na hi yoṣitaḥ

original: kiṃ vā te bahunoktena mā tvaṃ nāśaṃ narādhipa /
analyzed: kim vā te bahunā uktena mā tvam nāśam narādhipa
gacchasva śukra śāpena sa bhṛtya jñāti bāndhavaḥ
tatas bravīt narapatiḥ su tanu śṛṇu ceṣṭitam

original: citrāṅgadāyā yad vṛttaṃ purā devayuge śubhe // VamP_37.38 //
analyzed: citrāṅgadāyāḥ yat vṛttam purā deva yuge śubhe
viśvakarṇa sutā sādhvī nāmnā citrāṅgadā bhavat
rūpa yauvana saṃpannā padma hīnā iva padminī
sā kadācid mahā araṇyam sakhībhiḥ parivāritā

original: jagāma nemiṣaṃ nāma snātuṃ kamalalocanā // VamP_37.40 //
analyzed: jagāma nemiṣam nāma snātum kamala locanā
sā snātum avatīrṇā ca atha abhyāgāt nareśvaraḥ
sudeva tanayaḥ dhīmān surathaḥ nāma nāmataḥ

original: tāṃ dadarśa ca tanvaṅgīṃ śubhāṅgo madanāturaḥ // VamP_37.41 //
analyzed: tām dadarśa ca tanvaṅgīm śubha aṅgaḥ madana āturaḥ

original: taṃ dṛṣṭvā sā sakhīrāha vacanaṃ satyasaṃyutam /
analyzed: tam dṛṣṭvā sā sakhīḥ āha vacanam satya saṃyutam

original: madarthe ca kṣamaṃ me 'sya svapradānaṃ surūpiṇaḥ /
analyzed: mad arthe ca kṣamam me sya sva pradānam surūpiṇaḥ

original: sakhyastāmabruvan bālā na pragalbha'si sundari // VamP_37.43 //
analyzed: sakhyaḥ tām abruvan bālā na pragalbhasi sundari

original: na te yuktamihātmānaṃ dātuṃ narapateḥ svayam /
analyzed: na te yuktam iha ātmānam dātum narapateḥ svayam

analyzed: etasmin antare rājā surathaḥ satyavād sudhī

original: tvaṃ mugdhe mohayasi māṃ dṛṣṭyaiva madirekṣaṇe // VamP_37.46 //
analyzed: tvam mugdhe mohayasi mām dṛṣṭyā eva madirā īkṣaṇe
tvad dṛṣṭiḥ apātena smareṇa abhyetya tāḍitaḥ
tat mām kuca tale talpe abhiśāyitum arhasi
no ced pradhakṣyate kāmaḥ bhūyas bhūyas tidarśanāt

original: tataḥ sā cārusarvāṅgī rājño rājīvalocanā // VamP_37.48 //
analyzed: tatas sā cāru sarva aṅgī rājñaḥ rājīva locanā

original: evaṃ purā tayā tainvyā paritrātaḥ sa bhūpatiḥ // VamP_37.49 //
analyzed: evam purā tayā tainvyā paritrātaḥ sa bhūpatiḥ

original: arajaskābravīd daṇḍaṃ tasyā yad vṛttamuttaram // VamP_37.50 //
analyzed: arajaskā bravīt daṇḍam tasyāḥ yat vṛttam uttaram

original: kiṃ tvayā na pirajñātaṃ tasmāt te kathayāmyaham /
analyzed: kim tvayā na tasmāt te kathayāmi aham

analyzed: tadā tayā tu tanvaṅgyā surathasya mahīpateḥ

original: yasmād dharmaṃ parityajya strībhāvān mandacetase // VamP_37.52 //
analyzed: yasmāt dharmam parityajya strī bhāvāt manda cetase

original: vivāharahitā naiva sukhaṃ lapsyasi bhartṛtaḥ // VamP_37.53 //
analyzed: vivāha rahitā nā eva sukham lapsyasi bhartṛtaḥ

original: na ca putraphalaṃ naiva patinā yogameṣyasi /
analyzed: na ca putra phalam nā eva patinā yogam eṣyasi
utsṛṣṭa mātre śāpe tu hi apovāha trayodaśa

original: tatastāṃ siṣicuḥ sakhyaḥ sarasvatyā jalena hi /

sā sicyamānā sutarām śiśireṇa api atha ambhasā

original: tāṃ mṛtāmiti vijñāya jagmuḥ sakhyastvarānvitāḥ // VamP_37.57 //
analyzed: tām mṛtām iti vijñāya jagmuḥ sakhyaḥ tvarā anvitāḥ

original: sā ca tāsvapi sarvāsu gatāsu vanamuttamam // VamP_37.58 //
analyzed: sā ca tāsu api sarvāsu gatāsu vanam uttamam

original: apaśyantī nāpatiṃ tathā snigdhaṃ sakhījanam // VamP_37.59 //
analyzed: a paśyantī nāpatim tathā snigdham sakhī janam
nipapāta sarasvatyāḥ payasi sphurita īkṣaṇā

original: tāṃ vegāt kāñcanākṣī tu mahānadyāṃ nareśvara // VamP_37.60 //
analyzed: tām vegāt kāñcanākṣī tu mahā nadyām nareśvara

original: tayāpi tasyāstadbhāvyaṃ viditvātha viśāṃ pate // VamP_37.61 //
analyzed: tayā api tasyāḥ tat bhāvyam viditvā atha viśām pate

original: evaṃ tasyāḥ svatantrāyā eṣāvasthā śrutā mayā // VamP_37.62 //
analyzed: evam tasyāḥ svatantrāyāḥ eṣā avasthā śrutā mayā

original: tāṃ prāha putri kasyāsi sutā surasutopamā /
analyzed: tām prāha putri kasya asi sutā sura sutā upamā

original: tataḥ sā prāha tamṛṣiṃ yathātathyaṃ kṛśodarī /
analyzed: tatas sā prāha tam ṛṣim yathātathyam kṛśa udarī
śrutvā ārṣiḥ kopam agamat aśapat śilpinām vapam

original: yojitā naiva patinā tasmācchākhāmṛgo 'stu saḥ // VamP_37.65 //

original: ityuktvā sa mahāyogī bhūyaḥ snātvā vidhānataḥ /

original: upāsya paśvimāṃ sandhyāṃ pūjayāmāsa śaṅkaram // VamP_37.66 //
analyzed: upāsya paśu imām sandhyām pūjayāmāsa śaṅkaram

original: tatra sthitāyā rambhoru khyātā devavatī śubhā /
analyzed: tatra sthitāyāḥ rambhā ūru khyātā devavatī śubhā
āgamiṣyati daityasya putrī kandaramālinaḥ
tathā anyā suhyaka sutā nandayantī iti viśrutā
añjanasya eva tatra api sameṣyati tapasvinī
tathā aparā vedavatī parjanya duhitā śubhā
yadā tisraḥ sameṣyanti sapta godāvare jale
hāṭaka ākhye mahādeva tadā saṃyogam eṣyasi
iti evam uktā muninā bālā citrāṅgadā tadā
saptagodāvaram tīrtham agamat tvaritā tatas
saṃprāpya tatra deveśam pūjayantī trilocanam
samadhyāste śuci parā phala mūla aśanā bhavat
sa ca ṛṣiḥ jñāna saṃpannaḥ śrīkaṇṭha āyatane likhat
ślokam ekam mahā ākhyānam tasyāḥ ca priya kāmyayā

original: na so 'sti kaścit tridaśo 'suro vā yakṣo 'tha martyo rajanīcaro vā /
analyzed: na saḥ sti kaścid suraḥ vā martyaḥ rajanīcaraḥ vā

original: idaṃ hi duḥkhaṃ mṛgaśāvanetryā nirmārjayed yaḥ svaparākrameṇa // VamP_37.75 //
analyzed: idam hi duḥkham mṛgaśāva netryā nirmārjayet yaḥ sva parākrameṇa

original: ityevamuktvā sa munirjagāma draṣṭuṃ vibhuṃ puṣkaranāthamīḍyam /

original: nadīṃ payoṣṇīṃ munivṛndavandyāṃ saṃcintayanneva viśālanetrām // VamP_37.76 //
analyzed: nadīm payoṣṇīm muni vṛnda vandyām saṃcintayan eva viśāla netrām
iti śrī vāmanapurāṇe saptatriṃśaḥ dhyāyaḥ
daṇḍaḥ uvāca

original: smarantyāḥ surathaṃ vīraṃ mahān kālaḥ samabhyagāt // VamP_38.1 //
analyzed: smarantyāḥ suratham vīram mahān kālaḥ samabhyagāt
viśvakarmā api muninā śaptaḥ vānara tām gataḥ

śākveyam parvata śreṣṭham samāvasati sundari
tatra āsataḥ sta su ciram phala mūlāni atha aśnataḥ
tyagāt varārohe bahu varṣa gaṇaḥ vane
ekadā daitya śārdūlaḥ kandara ākhyaḥ sutām priyām

original: tāṃ ca tad vanamāyāntīṃ samaṃ pitrā varānanām /

original: dadarśa vānaraśreṣṭhaḥ prajagrāha bālat kare // VamP_38.6 //

original: tato gṛhītāṃ kapinā sa daityaḥ svasutāṃ śube /

original: kandaro vīkṣya saṃkruddhaḥ khḍgamudyamya cādravat // VamP_38.7 //
analyzed: kandaraḥ vīkṣya saṃkruddhaḥ khḍgam udyamya ca adravat

tathā eva saha cāru aṅgyā himācalam upāgataḥ

original: tasmin mahāśrame puṇye sthāpya devavatīṃ kapiḥ /
analyzed: tasmin mahā āśrame puṇye sthāpya devavatīm kapiḥ

analyzed: nyamañjata sa kālindyām paśyataḥ dānavasya hi

original: jagāma ca mahātejāḥ pātālaṃ nilayaṃ nijam // VamP_38.11 //

original: tāṃ dṛṣṭvāmanyata śrīmān seyaṃ devavatī dhruvam /
analyzed: tām dṛṣṭvā amanyata śrīmān sā iyam devavatī dhruvam

original: tanme vṛthā śramo jāto jalamajjanasaṃbhavaḥ // VamP_38.15 //
analyzed: tat me vṛthā śramaḥ jātaḥ jala majjana saṃbhavaḥ

original: sā tad bhayācca nyapatannadīṃ caiva hiraṇvatīm // VamP_38.16 //

original: samāste vai mahātejāḥ saṃvatsaragaṇān bahūn // VamP_38.18 //

original: nītā deśaṃ mahāpuṇyaṃ kośalaṃ sādhubhuryutam // VamP_38.19 //

original: upaviṣṭā śilavāpaṭṭe tato vācaṃ praśuśrave // VamP_38.21 //
analyzed: upaviṣṭā śilavā paṭṭe tatas vācam praśuśrave

original: na so 'sti puruṣaḥ kaścid yastaṃ brūyāt tapodhanam /

original: sā śrutvā tāṃ tadā vārṇīṃ vispaṣṭākṣarasaṃyutām /

original: prāha kenāsi baddhastvaṃ pāpinā vada bālaka // VamP_38.25 //
analyzed: prāha kena asi baddhaḥ tvam pāpinā vada bālaka

original: sa tāmāha mahābhāge baddho 'smi kapinā vaṭe /

original: jaṭāsvevaṃ suduṣṭena jīvāmi tapaso balāt // VamP_38.26 //
analyzed: jaṭāsu evam su duṣṭena jīvāmi tapasaḥ balāt
purā unmatta purā iti eva tatra devaḥ maheśvaraḥ

original: tatrāsti tapaso rāśiḥ pitā mama ṛtadhvajaḥ // VamP_38.27 //
analyzed: tatra asti tapasaḥ rāśiḥ pitā mama ṛtadhvajaḥ

original: tato māmabravīt tāto nāma kṛtvā śubhānane /

jābālī iti parikhyāya tat śṛṇuṣva śubha ānane
pañca varṣa sahasrāṇi bālaḥ eva bhaviṣyasi

viṃśatim yauvana sthāyī vīryeṇa dviguṇam tatas

original: pañcavarṣaśatān bālo bhokṣyase bandhanaṃ dṛḍham // VamP_38.31 //
analyzed: pañca varṣa śatān bālaḥ bhokṣyase bandhanam dṛḍham
daśa varṣa śatāni eva kaumāre kāya pīḍanam
yauvane pāramān bhogān dvi sahasra samāḥ tathā
catvāriśat śatāni eva vārdhake kleśam uttamam
lapsyase bhūmi śayyā āḍhyam kadanna aśana bhojanam
iti evam uktaḥ pitrā aham bālaḥ pañca abda deśikaḥ

original: vicarāmi mahīpṛṣṭhaṃ gacchan snātuṃ hiraṇvatīm // VamP_38.34 //
analyzed: vicarāmi mahī pṛṣṭham gacchan snātum hiraṇvatīm

original: imāṃ devavatīṃ gṛhyaṃ mūḍha nyastāṃ mahāśrame // VamP_38.35 //
analyzed: imām devavatīm gṛhyam mūḍha nyastām mahā āśrame
mām samādāya visphurantam prayatnataḥ
vaṭa agre smin udbbandha jaṭābhiḥ api sundari

original: tathā ca rakṣā kapinā kṛtā bhīru nirantaraiḥ /
analyzed: tathā ca rakṣā kapinā kṛtā bhīru nirantaraiḥ
latā pāśaiḥ mahā yantram adhastāt duṣṭabuddhinā
abhedyaḥ yam an ākramyaḥ upariṣṭāt tathā api adhas

original: diśāṃ mukeṣu sarveṣu kṛtaṃ yantraṃ latāmayam // VamP_38.38 //
analyzed: diśām mukeṣu sarveṣu kṛtam yantram latā mayam
saṃyamya mām kapi varaḥ mara parvatam

original: yathecchayā mayā dṛṣṭametat te gaditaṃ śubhe // VamP_38.39 //
analyzed: yathā icchayā mayā dṛṣṭam etat te gaditam śubhe
bhavatī kā mahā araṇye lalanā parivarjitā

original: samāyātā sucārvaṅgī kena sārthena māṃ vada // VamP_38.40 //
analyzed: samāyātā su cāru aṅgī kena sārthena mām vada
sā bravīt aḍhjanaḥ nāma suhyaka indraḥ pitā mama
nandayantī iti me nāma pramlocā garbha saṃbhavā

original: tatra me jātake proktamṛṣiṇā mudgalena hi /
analyzed: tatra me jātake proktam ṛṣiṇā mudgalena hi

original: iyaṃ narendramahiṣī bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ // VamP_38.42 //
analyzed: iyam narendra mahiṣī bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ
tad vākya sama kālam ca vyanadat devadundubhiḥ
śivā ca aśiva nirghoṣā tatas bhūyas
na saṃdehaḥ narapateḥ mahā rājñī bhaviṣyati

original: tato jagāma sa ṛṣirevamuktvā vaco 'dbhutam // VamP_38.44 //
analyzed: tatas jagāma saḥ ṛṣiḥ evam uktvā vacaḥ dbhutam

original: tad bhayācca mayā hyātmā kṣiptaḥ sāgaragājale /
analyzed: tat bhayāt ca mayā hi ātmā kṣiptaḥ sāgaragā jale

original: śrutvā jābāliratha tad vacanaṃ vai tayoditam /

original: prāha sundari gacchasva śrīkaṇṭhaṃ yamunātaṭe // VamP_38.47 //
analyzed: prāha sundari gacchasva śrīkaṇṭham yamunā taṭe
tatra āgacchati madhyāhne mad pitā śarvam arcitum
tasmai nivedaya ātmānam tatra śreyaḥ
tatas tu tvaritā kāle nandayantī taponidhim
paritrāṇa artham agamat himādreḥ yamunām nadīm
sā tu adīrgheṇa kālena kanda mūla phala aśanā
saṃprāptā śaṅkara sthānam yatra āgacchati tāpasaḥ
tatas sā devadeveśam śrīkaṇṭham loka vanditam

original: teṣāmarthaṃ hi vijñāya sā tadā cāruhāsinī /
analyzed: teṣām artham hi vijñāya sā tadā cāru hāsinī
tat jābālī uditam ślokam alikhat ca anyam ātmanaḥ

original: sā cāvasthāmimāṃ prāptā kaścinmāṃ trātumīśvaraḥ // VamP_38.53 //
analyzed: sā ca avasthām imām prāptā kaścid mām trātum īśvaraḥ
iti ullikhya śilā paṭṭe gatā snātum yamasvasām
dadṛse ca āśrama varam matta kokila nāditam
tatas manyata sā atrarṣiḥ nūnam tiṣṭhati sattamaḥ

original: ityevaṃ cintayantī sā saṃpraviṣṭā mahāśramam // VamP_38.55 //
analyzed: iti evam cintayantī sā saṃpraviṣṭā mahā āśramam

original: tato dadarśa devābhāṃ sthitāṃ devavatīṃ śubhām /
analyzed: tatas dadarśa deva ābhām sthitām devavatīm śubhām
saṃśuṣka āsyām calat netrām parimlānām iva abjinīm
sā ca apatantīm dadṛśe yakṣajām daitya nandinī
kā iyam iti eva saṃcintya samutthāya sthitā abhavat
tatas nyonyam samāliṅgya gāḍham gāḍham suhṛttyā
papracchatuḥ tathā anyaḥ yam kathayāmāsatuḥ tadā
te parijñāta tattva arthe anyonyam lalanā uttame
samāsīne kathābhiḥ te nānā rūpābhiḥ ādarāt
etasmin antare prāptaḥ śrīkaṇṭham snātum ādarāt
sa tattva jñaḥ muni śreṣṭhaḥ akṣarāṇi avalokayan

original: sa dṛṣṭvā vācayitvā ca tamarthamadhigamya ca /
analyzed: sa dṛṣṭvā vācayitvā ca tam artham adhigamya ca
muhūrtam dhyānam āsthāya vyajānāt ca taponidhiḥ

original: tataḥ saṃpūjya deveśaṃ tvarayā sa ṛtadhvajaḥ /
analyzed: tatas saṃpūjya deveśam tvarayā saḥ ṛtadhvajaḥ
ayodhyām agamat kṣipram draṣṭum ikṣvākum īśvaram
tam dṛṣṭvā nṛpati śreṣṭham tāpasaḥ vākyam abravīt
śrūyatām nara sārdūla vijñaptiḥ mama pārthiva
mama putraḥ guṇaiḥ yuktaḥ sarva sa astra viśāradaḥ

original: udbddhaḥ kapinā rājan viṣayānate tavaiva hi // VamP_38.64 //
analyzed: udbddhaḥ kapinā rājan viṣaya ānate tava eva hi
tam hi mocayitum nā anyaḥ śaktaḥ tvad tad anayāt ṛte
śakuniḥ nāma rāja indra sa hi astra vidhi pāragaḥ
tat muneḥ vākyam ākarṇya pitā mama kṛśa udari

original: ādideśa priyaṃ putraṃ śakuniṃ tāpasānvaye // VamP_38.66 //
analyzed: ādideśa priyam putram śakunim tāpasa anvaye

original: tataḥ sa prahitaḥ pitrā bhrātā mama mahābhujaḥ /
analyzed: tatas sa prahitaḥ pitrā bhrātā mama mahā bhujaḥ

original: saṃprāpto bandhanoddeśaṃ samaṃ hi paramarṣiṇā // VamP_38.67 //
analyzed: saṃprāptaḥ bandhana uddeśam samam hi parama ṛṣiṇā
dṛṣṭvā nyagrodham atyuccam praroha āstṛta diṅmukham
dadarśa vṛkṣa śikhare udbaddham ṛṣi putrakam
tāḥ ca sarvān latā pāśān dṛṣṭvān sa samantataḥ

original: dṛṣṭvā sa muniputraṃ taṃ svajaṭāsaṃyataṃ vaṭe // VamP_38.69 //
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā sa muni putram tam sva jaṭā saṃyatam vaṭe
dhanuḥ ādāya balavān adhijyam sa cakāra ha
lāghavāt ṛṣi putram tam rakṣan ciccheda mārgaṇaiḥ

original: kapinā yat kṛtaṃ sarvaṃ latāpāśaṃ caturdiśam /
analyzed: kapinā yat kṛtam sarvam latā pāśam caturdiśam

original: pañcavarṣaśate kāle gate śaktastadā śaraiḥ // VamP_38.71 //
analyzed: pañca varṣa śate kāle gate śaktaḥ tadā śaraiḥ
latā ācchannam tatas tūrṇam āruroha muniḥ vaṭam

original: prāptaṃ svapitaraṃ dṛṣṭvā jābāliḥ saṃyato 'pi san // VamP_38.72 //
analyzed: prāptam sva pitaram dṛṣṭvā jābāliḥ saṃyataḥ pi san
ādarāt pitaram mūrdhnā vavandata vidhānataḥ

original: saṃpariṣvajya sa munirmūrdhnyāghrāya sutaṃ tataḥ // VamP_38.73 //
analyzed: saṃpariṣvajya sa muniḥ mūrdhni āghrāya sutam tatas
unmocayitum ārabdhaḥ na śaśāka su saṃyatam
tatas tūrṇam dhanuḥ nyasya bāṇān ca śakuniḥ balī

original: āruroha vaṭaṃ tūrṇaṃ jaṭā mocayituṃ tadā /
analyzed: āruroha vaṭam tūrṇam jaṭāḥ mocayitum tadā

original: na ca śaknoti saṃcchannaṃ dṛḍhaṃ kapivarema hi // VamP_38.75 //
analyzed: na ca śaknoti saṃcchannam dṛḍham kapi varema hi

original: yadā na śakitā stena saṃpramocayituṃ jaṭāḥ /
analyzed: yadā na śakitāḥ stena saṃpramocayitum jaṭāḥ
tadā avatīrṇaḥ śakuniḥ sahitaḥ parama ṛṣiṇā
jagrāha ca dhanuḥ bāṇān cakāra śara maṇḍapam

original: lāghavādarddhacandraistāṃ śākhāṃ ciccheda sa tridhā // VamP_38.77 //
analyzed: lāghavāt arddhacandraiḥ tām śākhām ciccheda sa tridhā
śākhayā kṛttayā ca asau bhāra vāhī tapodhanaḥ
śara sopāna mārgeṇa avatīrṇaḥ pādapāt

original: tasmiṃstadā sve tanaye ṛtadhvajastrāte narendrasya sutena dhanvinā /
analyzed: tasmin tadā sve tanaye ṛtadhvajaḥ trāte narendrasya sutena dhanvinā

original: jābālinā bhāravahena saṃyutaḥ samājagāmātha nadīṃ sa sūryajām // VamP_38.79 //
analyzed: jābālinā bhāravahena saṃyutaḥ samājagāma atha nadīm sa sūryajām
iti śrī vāmanapurāṇe aṣṭātriṃśaḥ dhyāyaḥ
daṇḍakaḥ uvāca
etasmin antare bāle yakṣa asura sute śubhe

original: samāgate haraṃ draṣṭuṃ śrīkaṇṭhaṃ yogināṃ varam // VamP_39.1 //
analyzed: samāgate haram draṣṭum śrīkaṇṭham yoginām varam
dadṛśāte parimlāna saṃśuṣka kusumam vibhum
bahu niramā lalya saṃyuktam gate tasmin ṛtadhvaje

original: tatastaṃ vīkṣya deveśaṃ te ubhe api kanyake /
analyzed: tatas tam vīkṣya deveśam te ubhe api kanyake
snāpayetām vidhānena pūjayetām aharniśam
tābhyām sthitābhyām tatra eva ṛṣipa abhyāgamat vanam

original: draṣṭuṃ śrikaṇṭhamavyaktaṃ gālavo nāma nāmataḥ // VamP_39.4 //
analyzed: draṣṭum śrikaṇṭham avyaktam gālavaḥ nāma nāmataḥ
sa dṛṣṭvā kanyakā yugmam kasya idam iti cintayan

original: praviveśa śuciḥ snātvā kālindyā vimale jale // VamP_39.5 //
analyzed: praviveśa śuciḥ snātvā kālindyāḥ vimale jale
tatas nupūjayāmāsa śrīkaṇṭham gālavaḥ muniḥ

original: gāyete susvaraṃ gītaṃ yakṣāsurasute tataḥ // VamP_39.6 //
analyzed: gāyete su svaram gītam yakṣa asura sute tatas
tatas svaram samākarṇya gālavaḥ te ajānata

original: gandharvakanyeka caite saṃdeho nātra vidyate // VamP_39.7 //
analyzed: ca ete saṃdehaḥ na atra vidyate
saṃpūjya devam īśānam gālavaḥ tu vidhānataḥ
kṛta japyaḥ samadhyāste kanyābhyām a bivāditaḥ

original: tataḥ papraccha sa muniḥ kanyake kasya kathyatām /
analyzed: tatas papraccha sa muniḥ kanyake kasya kathyatām
kula alaṅkāraṇe bhakti yukte bhavasya hi
tam ūcatuḥ muni śreṣṭham yāthātathyam śubha ānane
jātaḥ vidita vṛttāntaḥ gālavaḥ tapatām varaḥ

original: samuṣya tatra rajanīṃ tābhyāṃ saṃpūjito muniḥ /
analyzed: samuṣya tatra rajanīm tābhyām saṃpūjitaḥ muniḥ

original: prātarutthāya gaurīsaṃ saṃpūjya ca vidhānataḥ // VamP_39.11 //
analyzed: prātar utthāya gaurīsam saṃpūjya ca vidhānataḥ
te upetya abravīt yāsye puṣkarāraṇyam uttamam
āmantrayāmi vām kanye samanujñātum arhathaḥ
tatas te ūcatuḥ brahan durlabham darśanam tava
kimartham puṣkara araṇyam bhavān yāsyati atha ādarāt
te uvāca mahā tejāḥ mahat kārya samanvitaḥ

original: kārtikī puṇyadā bhāvimāsānte puṣkareṣu hi // VamP_39.14 //
analyzed: kārtikī puṇya dā bhāvi māsa ante puṣkareṣu hi

original: te ūcaturvayaṃ yāmo bhavān yatra gamiṣyati /
analyzed: te ūcatuḥ vayam yāmaḥ bhavān yatra gamiṣyati

original: na tvayā sma vinā brahmanniha casthātuṃ hi śaknuvaḥ // VamP_39.15 //
analyzed: na tvayā sma vinā brahman iha ca sthātum hi śaknuvaḥ
bāḍham āha ṛṣi śreṣṭhaḥ tatas natvā maheśvaram

original: gate te ṛṣiṇā sārddhū puṣkarāraṇyamādarāt // VamP_39.16 //
analyzed: gate te ṛṣiṇā sārddhū puṣkara araṇyam ādarāt
tathā anye ṛṣayaḥ tatra samāyātāḥ sahasraśas
pārthivāḥ jānapadyāḥ ca muktvā ekam tam ṛtadhvajam
tatas snātāḥ ca kārtikyām ṛṣayaḥ puṣkareṣu atha
rājānaḥ ca mahābhāgāḥ nābhāga ikṣvāku saṃyutāḥ
gālavaḥ pi samam tābhyām kanyakābhyām avātarat

original: snātuṃ sa puṣkare tīrthe madhyame dhanuṣākṛtau // VamP_39.19 //
analyzed: snātum sa puṣkare tīrthe madhyame dhanuṣākṛtau
nimagnaḥ ca api dadṛśe mahā matsyam jaleśayam ṣa
bahvībhiḥ matsya kanyābhiḥ prīyamāṇam punar punar

original: sa tāścāha timirmugdhāḥ yūyaṃ dharmaṃ na jānatha /
analyzed: sa tāḥ ca āha timiḥ mugdhāḥ yūyam dharmam na jānatha

original: janāpavādaṃ ghoraṃ hi na śaktaḥ soḍhumulbaṇam // VamP_39.21 //
analyzed: jana apavādam ghoram hi na śaktaḥ soḍhum ulbaṇam
tāḥ tam ūcuḥ mahā matsyam kim na pasyasi gālavam

original: tāpasaṃ kanyakābhyāṃ vai vicarantaṃ yathecchayā // VamP_39.22 //
analyzed: tāpasam kanyakābhyām vai vicarantam yathā icchayā
yadi asau api dharma ātmā na bibheti tapodhanaḥ

original: janāpavādāt tatkiṃ tvaṃ bibheṣu jalamadhyagaḥ // VamP_39.23 //
analyzed: jana apavādāt tat kim tvam bibheṣu jala madhya gaḥ
tatas tāḥ ca āha sa timiḥ na eṣa vetti tapodhanaḥ

original: rāgāndho nāpi ca bhayaṃ vijānāti subāliśaḥ // VamP_39.24 //
analyzed: rāga andhaḥ nā api ca bhayam vijānāti su bāliśaḥ
tat śrutvā matsya vacanam gālavaḥ vrīḍayā yutaḥ

original: nottattāra nimagno 'pi tasthau sa vijitendriyaḥ // VamP_39.25 //
analyzed: na uttattāra nimagnaḥ pi tasthau sa vijita indriyaḥ

original: snātvā te api rambhoru samuttīrya taṭe sthite /
analyzed: snātvā te api rambhā ūru samuttīrya taṭe sthite
pratīkṣantyau muni varam tad darśana samutsuke

original: 39.26 vṛttā ca puṣkare yātrā gatā lokā yathāgatam /
analyzed: vṛttā ca puṣkare yātrā gatāḥ lokāḥ yathāgatam
ṛṣayaḥ pārthivāḥ ca anye nānā jānapadaḥ tadā
tatra sthitā ekā sudatī viśvakarma tanuruhā
citra aṅgadā su cāru aṅgī vīkṣantī tanu madhyame

original: te sthite cāpi vīkṣantyau pratīkṣantyau ca gālavam /
analyzed: te sthite ca api vīkṣantyau pratīkṣantyau ca gālavam

original: saṃsthite nirjane tīrthe gālavo 'ntarjale tathā // VamP_39.29 //
analyzed: saṃsthite nirjane tīrthe gālavaḥ ntar jale tathā
tatas bhyāgāt vedavatī nāmnā gandharva kanyakā
parjanya tanayā sādhvī ghṛtācīḥ garbha saṃbhavā

original: sā cābhyetya jale puṇye snātvā madhyamapuṣkare /
analyzed: sā ca abhyetya jale puṇye snātvā madhyamapuṣkare
dadarśa kanyā tritayam ubhayoḥ taṭayoḥ sthitam
citrāṅgadām athā abhyetya paryapṛcchat aniṣṭhuram

original: kāsi kena ca kāryeṇa nirjane sthitavatyasi // VamP_39.32 //
analyzed: kā asi kena ca kāryeṇa nirjane sthitavatī asi

original: sā tāmuvāca putrīṃ māṃ vindasva suravradhakeḥ /
analyzed: sā tām uvāca putrīm mām vindasva suravradhakeḥ
citrāṅgadā iti suśreṇi vikhyātām viśvakarmaṇaḥ
sā ahambhayā āgātā bhadre snātum puṇyām sarasvatīm

original: naimiṣe kāñcanākṣīṃ tu vikhyātāṃ dharmamātaram // VamP_39.34 //
analyzed: naimiṣe kāñcanākṣīm tu vikhyātām dharmamātaram
tatra āgatā atha rājñā aham dṛṣṭā vaidarbhakeṇa hi

original: surathena sa kāmārto māmeva śaraṇaṃ gataḥ // VamP_39.35 //
analyzed: surathena sa kāma ārtaḥ mām eva śaraṇam gataḥ
mayā ātmā tasya datta śva sakhībhiḥ vāryamāṇayā

original: tataḥ śaptāsmi tātena viyuktāsmi ca bhūbhujā // VamP_39.36 //
analyzed: tatas śaptā asmi tātena viyuktā asmi ca bhūbhujā
martum kṛta matiḥ bhadre vāritā guhyakena ca

original: śrīkaṇṭhamagamaṃ draṣṭuṃ tato godāvaraṃ jalam // VamP_39.37 //
analyzed: śrīkaṇṭham agamam draṣṭum tatas godāvaram jalam
tasmāt imam samāyātā tīrtha pravaram uttam

original: na cāpi dṛṣṭaḥ surathaḥ sa manohlādanaḥ patiḥ // VamP_39.38 //
analyzed: na ca api dṛṣṭaḥ surathaḥ sa manaḥ hlādanaḥ patiḥ

original: bhavatī cātra kā bāle vṛtte yātrāphale 'dhunā /
analyzed: bhavatī ca atra kā bāle vṛtte yātrā phale dhunā

original: samāgatā hi tacchaṃsa mama satyena bhāmini // VamP_39.39 //
analyzed: samāgatā hi tat śaṃsa mama satyena bhāmini
sā bravīt śruyatām yā asmi mandabhāgyā kṛśa udarī

original: yatā yātrāphale vṛtte samāyātāsmi puṣkaram // VamP_39.40 //
analyzed: yatā yātrā phale vṛtte samāyātāsmi puṣkaram

original: parjanyasya ghṛtācyāṃ tu jātā vedavatīti hi /
analyzed: parjanyasya ghṛtācyām tu jātā vedavatī iti hi

original: ramamāṇā vaneddeśe dṛṣṭāsmi kapanā sakhi // VamP_39.41 //
analyzed: ramamāṇā vana id deśe dṛṣṭā asmi kapanā sakhi

original: sa cābhyetyābravīt kā tvaṃ yāsi devavatīti hi /
analyzed: sa ca abhyetya abravīt kā tvam yāsi devavatī iti hi
ānīta āsya śramāt kena bhū pṛṣṭhāt meru parvatam
tatas mayā uktaḥ na eva asmi kape devavatī iti aham
nāmnā vedavatī iti evam meroḥ api kṛta āśrayā
tatas tena ati duṣṭena vānareṇa hi abhidrutā
samārūḍhā asmi sahasā bandujīvam naga uttamam
tena api vṛkṣaḥ tarasā pāda ākrāntaḥ tu abhajyata
tatas asya vipulām vṛkṣam prākṣipat sāgara ambhasi
saha tena eva vṛkṣeṇa patitā asmi aham ākulā
tatas plavaṅgamaḥ vakṣam prākṣipat sāgara ambhasi
saha tena eva vṛkṣeṇa patitā asmi aham ākulā
tatas umbara talāt vṛkṣam nipatantam yadṛcchayā

original: dadṛśuḥ sarvabhūtāni stāvarāṇi carāṇi ca // VamP_39.47 //
analyzed: dadṛśuḥ sarva bhūtāni stāvarāṇi carāṇi ca

original: tato hāhākṛtaṃ lokairmā patantīṃ nirīkṣya hi /
analyzed: tatas hāhākṛtam lokaiḥ mā patantīm nirīkṣya hi

original: ūcuśca siddhagandharvāḥ kaṣṭaṃ seyaṃ mahātmanaḥ // VamP_39.48 //
analyzed: ūcuḥ ca siddha gandharvāḥ kaṣṭam sā iyam mahātmanaḥ
indradyumnasya mahiṣī gaditā brahmaṇā svayam
manoḥ putrasya vīrasya sahasra kratu yājinaḥ

original: tāṃ vāṇīṃ madhurāṃ śrutvā mohamasmyāgatā tataḥ /
analyzed: tām vāṇīm madhurām śrutvā moham asmi āgatā tatas

original: na ca jāne sa kenāpi vṛkṣaśchinnaḥ sahasradhā // VamP_39.50 //
analyzed: na ca jāne sa kena api vṛkṣaḥ chinnaḥ sahasradhā
tatas smi vegāt balinā hṛta anala sakhena hi

original: samānītāsmayahamimaṃ tvaṃ dṛṣṭā cādya sundari // VamP_39.51 //
analyzed: samānītā asmai aham imam tvam dṛṣṭā ca adya sundari

original: taduttaṣṭhasva gacchāvaḥ pucchāvaḥ ka ime sthite /
analyzed: tat uttaṣṭhasva gacchāvaḥ pucchāvaḥ ke ime sthite

original: kanyake anupaśye hi puṇkarasyottare taṭe // VamP_39.52 //
analyzed: kanyake anupaśye hi puṇkarasya uttare taṭe
evam uktvā varāṅgī sā tayā su tanu kanyayā

original: jagāma kanyake draṣṭuṃ praṣṭuṃ kāryasamutsukā // VamP_39.53 //
analyzed: jagāma kanyake draṣṭum praṣṭum kārya samutsukā

original: tato gatvā paryapucchat te ūcaturubhe api /
analyzed: tatas gatvā paryapucchat te ūcatuḥ ubhe api
yāthātathyam tayoḥ tābhyām svam ātmānam niveditam
tatas tāḥ turaḥ upi iha sapta godāvaram jalam

original: saṃprāpya tīrthe piṣṭhanti arcantyo hāṭakeśvaram // VamP_39.55 //
analyzed: saṃprāpya tīrthe piṣṭhanti arcantyaḥ hāṭakeśvaram
tatas bahūn varṣa gaṇān babhramuḥ te janāḥ trayaḥ
tāsām arthāya śakuniḥ jābāliḥ sa ṛtadhvajaḥ
bhāra vāhī tatas khinnaḥ daśa bdaśatike gate

original: kāle jagāma nirvedāt samaṃ pitrā tu śākalam // VamP_39.57 //
analyzed: kāle jagāma nirvedāt samam pitrā tu śākalam
tasmin narapatiḥ śrīmān indradyumnaḥ manoḥ sutaḥ

original: samadhyāste sa vijñāya sārghapātro viniryayau // VamP_39.58 //
analyzed: samadhyāste sa vijñāya sa arghapātraḥ viniryayau
samyak saṃpūjitaḥ tena sa jābāliḥ ṛtadhvajaḥ
sa ca ikṣvāku sutaḥ dhīmān śakuniḥ bhrātṛ ja urcitaḥ

original: tato vākyaṃ muniḥ prāha indradyumnaṃ ṛtadhvajaḥ /
analyzed: tatas vākyam muniḥ prāha indradyumnam ṛtadhvajaḥ
rājan naṣṭa balā asmākam nandayantī iti viśrutā
tasya arthe ca eva vasudhā smābhiḥ aṭitā nṛpa
tasmāt uttiṣṭha mārgasva sāhāyyam kartum arhasi
athā uvāca nṛpaḥ brahman mama api lalanā uttamā

original: naṣṭā kṛtaśramasyāpi kasyāhaṃ kathayāmi tām // VamP_39.62 //
analyzed: naṣṭā kṛta śramasya api kasya aham kathayāmi tām
ākāśāt parpata ākāraḥ patamānaḥ naja uttamaḥ
siddhānām vākyam ākarṇya bāṇaiḥ chinnaḥ sahasradhā

original: na caiva sā varārohā vibhinnā lāghāvānmayā /
analyzed: na ca eva sā varārohā vibhinnā lāghāvān mayā

original: na ca jānāmi sā kutra tasmād gacchāmi mārgitum // VamP_39.64 //
analyzed: na ca jānāmi sā kutra tasmāt gacchāmi mārgitum
sa nṛpaḥ samutthāya tvarā anvitaḥ

original: syandanāni dvijābhyāṃ sa bhrātṛputrāya cārpayat // VamP_39.65 //
analyzed: syandanāni dvijābhyām sa bhrātṛ putrāya ca arpayat
te dhiruhya rathān tūrṇam mārgante vasudhām kramāt
badaryāśramam āsādya dadṛśuḥ tapasām nidhim
tapasā karśitam dīnam mala paṅka jaṭā dharam
niḥśvāsa āyāsa paramam prathame vayasi sthitam
tam upetya abravīt rājā indradyumnaḥ mahā bhujaḥ
tapasvin yauvane ghoram āsthitaḥ si su duścaram
tapaḥ kimartham tat śaṃsa kim abhipretam ucyatām

original: so 'bravīt ko bhavān brūhi mamātmānaṃ suhṛttayā // VamP_39.69 //
analyzed: saḥ bravīt kaḥ bhavān brūhi mama ātmānam suhṛd tayā
paripṛcchasi śoka ārtam parikhinnam tapaḥ nvitam

original: sa prāha rājāsmi vibho tapasvin śākale pure // VamP_39.70 //
analyzed: sa prāha rājā asmi vibho tapasvin śākale pure

original: manoḥ putraḥ priyo bhrātā ikṣvākoḥ kathitaṃ tava /
analyzed: manoḥ putraḥ priyaḥ bhrātā ikṣvākoḥ kathitam tava

original: sa cāsmai pūrvacaritaṃ sarvaṃ kathitavān nṛpaḥ // VamP_39.71 //
analyzed: sa ca asmai pūrva caritam sarvam kathitavān nṛpaḥ
śrutvā provāca rājarṣiḥ mā muñcasva kalevaram

original: āgaccha yāmi tanvaṅgīṃ vicetuṃ bhrātṛjo 'si me // VamP_39.72 //
analyzed: āgaccha yāmi tanvaṅgīm vicetum bhrātṛ jaḥ si me
iti uktvā saṃpariṣvajya nṛpam dhamanisaṃtatam

original: samāropya rathaṃ tūrṇaṃ tāpasābhyāṃ nyavedayat // VamP_39.73 //
analyzed: samāropya ratham tūrṇam tāpasābhyām nyavedayat
ṛtadhvajaḥ sa putraḥ tu tam dṛṣṭvā pṛthivīpatim

original: provāca rājannehyohi kariṣyāmi tava priyam // VamP_39.74 //
analyzed: provāca rājan nehyaḥ hi kariṣyāmi tava priyam

original: yāsau citrāṅgadā nāma tvayā dṛṣṭā hi naimiṣe /
analyzed: yā asau citrāṅgadā nāma tvayā dṛṣṭā hi naimiṣe

original: saptagodāvaraṃ tīrthaṃ sā mayaiva visarjitā // VamP_39.75 //
analyzed: saptagodāvaram tīrtham sā mayā eva visarjitā
tadā agacchatha gacchamaḥ saudevasya eva kāraṇāt
tatra asmākam sameṣyanti kanyāḥ tisraḥ tathā aparāḥ
iti evam uktvā saḥ ṛṣiḥ samāśvāsya sudevajam

original: śakuniṃ puratajha kṛtvā sendradyumnaḥ saputrakaḥ // VamP_39.77 //
analyzed: śakunim puratajha kṛtvā sa indradyumnaḥ sa putrakaḥ
syandanena aśva yuktena gantum samupacakrame

original: saptagodāvaraṃ tīrthaṃ yatra tāḥ kanyakā gatāḥ // VamP_39.78 //
analyzed: saptagodāvaram tīrtham yatra tāḥ kanyakāḥ gatāḥ
etasmin antare tanvī ghṛtācī śoka saṃyutā
vicacāra udayagirim vicinvantī sutām nijām
tam āsasāda ca kapim paryapṛcchat tathā apsarāḥ

original: kiṃ bālā na tvayā dṛṣṭā kape satyaṃ vadasva māṃ // VamP_39.80 //
analyzed: kim bālā na tvayā dṛṣṭā kape satyam vadasva mām

original: tasyāstad vacanaṃ śrutvā sakapiḥ prāha bālikām /
analyzed: tasyāḥ tat vacanam śrutvā sa kapiḥ prāha bālikām

original: dṛṣṭā devavatī nāmnā mayā nyastā mahāśrame // VamP_39.81 //
analyzed: dṛṣṭā devavatī nāmnā mayā nyastā mahā āśrame
kālindyāḥ vimale tīrthe mṛga pakṣi samanvite
śrakaṇṭha āyatanasya agre mayā satyam tava uditam

original: sā prāha vānarapate nāmnā vedavatīti sā /
analyzed: sā prāha vānarapate nāmnā vedavatī iti sā

original: na hi devavatī khyātā tadāccha vrajāvahe // VamP_39.83 //
analyzed: na hi devavatī khyātā tadā accha vrajāvahe
ghṛtācyāḥ tat vacaḥ śrutvā vānaraḥ tvarita kramaḥ
pṛṣṭhatas syāḥ samāgacchan nadīm anu eva kauśikīm
te ca api kauśikīm prāptāḥ rājarṣi pravarāḥ trayaḥ

original: dvitaye tāpasābhyāṃ ca rathaiḥ paramavegibhiḥ // VamP_39.85 //
analyzed: dvitaye tāpasābhyām ca rathaiḥ parama vegibhiḥ
avatīrya rathebhyaḥ te snātum abhyāgaman nadīm

original: ghṛtācyapi nadīṃ snātaṃ supaṇyamājagāma ha // VamP_39.86 //
analyzed: ghṛtācī api nadīm snātam supaṇyam ājagāma ha

original: tāmanveva kapiḥ prāyād dṛṣṭo jābālinā tathā /
analyzed: tām anu eva kapiḥ prāyāt dṛṣṭaḥ jābālinā tathā

original: dṛṣṭvaiva pitaraṃ pārthivaṃ ca mahābalam // VamP_39.87 //
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā eva pitaram pārthivam ca mahā balam
sa yā iva punar āyāti vānaraḥ tāta vegavān

original: pūrvaṃ jaṭāsveva balādyona baddho 'smi pādape // VamP_39.88 //
analyzed: pūrvam jaṭāsu eva baddhaḥ smi pādape
tat jābāli vacaḥ śrutvā śakuniḥ krodha saṃyutaḥ
sa śaram dhanuḥ ādāya idam vacanam abravīt

original: brahman pradīyatāṃ mahyamājñā tāta vadasva māma /
analyzed: brahman pradīyatām mahyam ājñā tāta vadasva māma
yāvat enam nihanmi adya śareṇa ekena vānaram
iti evam ukte vacane sarva bhūta hite rataḥ

original: maharṣiḥ śakuniṃ prāha detuyuktaṃ vaco mahat // VamP_39.91 //
analyzed: mahā ṛṣiḥ śakunim prāha detu yuktam vacaḥ mahat

original: na kaścittāta kenāpi badhyate hanyate 'pi vā /
analyzed: na kaścid tāta kena api badhyate hanyate vā
vadha bandhau pūrva karma vaśyau nṛpati nandana
iti evam uktvā śakunim ṛṣiḥ vānaram abravīt
ehi ehi vānara asmākam sāhāyyam kartum arhasi
iti evam uktaḥ muninā bāle sa kapi kuñjaraḥ
kṛta añjali puṭaḥ bhūtvā praṇipatya idam abravīt

original: mamājñā dīyatāṃ brahman śādhi kiṃ karavāṇyaham // VamP_39.94 //
analyzed: mama ājñā dīyatām brahman śādhi kim karavāṇi aham

original: ityakte prāha sa munistaṃ vānarapatiṃ vacaḥ /
analyzed: iti akte prāha sa muniḥ tam vānara patim vacaḥ
mama putraḥ tvayā udbaddhaḥ jaṭāsu vaṭa pādape
na ca unmocayitum vṛkṣāt śaknuyāma u pi yatnataḥ

original: tadanena narendreṇa tridhā kṛtvā tu śākhinaḥ // VamP_39.96 //
analyzed: tat anena narendreṇa tridhā kṛtvā tu śākhinaḥ

original: śākhāṃ vahati matsūnuḥ śirasā tāṃ vimocaya /
analyzed: śākhām vahati mad sūnuḥ śirasā tām vimocaya
daśa varṣa śatāni asya śākhām vai vahataḥ gaman

original: na ca so 'sti pumān kaścid yaco hyunmocayituṃ kṣamaḥ /
analyzed: na ca saḥ sti pumān kaścid hi unmocayitum kṣamaḥ
saḥ ṛṣeḥ vākyam ākarṇya kapiḥ jābālinaḥ jaṭāḥ
śanais unmocayāmāsa kṣaṇāt unmocitāḥ ca tāḥ
tatas prītaḥ muni śreṣṭhaḥ

original: kapiṃ prāha vṛṇiṣva tvaṃ varaṃ yanmanasopsitam /
analyzed: kapim prāha vṛṇiṣva tvam varam yat manasā upsitam
ṛtadhvaja vacaḥ śrutvā imam varam ayācata
viśvakarmā mahā tejāḥ kapi tve pratisaṃsthitaḥ

original: brahman bhavānvaraṃ mahyaṃ yadi dātumihecchati // VamP_39.101 //
analyzed: brahman bhavān varam mahyam yadi dātum iha icchati
tat sva dattaḥ mahā ghoraḥ mama śāpaḥ nivartyatām

original: citrāṅgadāyāḥ pitaraṃ māṃ tvaṣṭāraṃ tapodhana // VamP_39.102 //
analyzed: citrāṅgadāyāḥ pitaram mām tvaṣṭāram tapodhana
abhijānīhi bhavataḥ śāpāt vāratām gatm

original: subahūni ca pāpāni mayā yāni kṛtāni hi // VamP_30.103 //
analyzed: su bahūni ca pāpāni mayā yāni kṛtāni hi
kapi cāpalya doṣeṇa tāni me yāntu saṃkṣyam

original: tato ṛthadhvajaḥ prāha śāpasyānto bhaviṣyati // VamP_39.104 //
analyzed: tatas ṛthadhvajaḥ prāha śāpasya antaḥ bhaviṣyati
yadā ghṛtācyām tanayam janiṣyasi mahā balam

original: ityevamuktāḥ saṃhṛṣṭaḥ sa tadā kapikuñjaraḥ // VamP_39.105 //
analyzed: iti evam uktāḥ saṃhṛṣṭaḥ sa tadā kapi kuñjaraḥ
snātum tūrṇam mahā nadyām avatīrṇaḥ kṛśa udari

original: tatastu sarve kramāśaḥ snātvār'cya pitṛdevatāḥ // VamP_39.106 //
