analyzed: tatas tu sarve kramāśas snātvā arcya pitṛ devatāḥ
jagmuḥ hṛṣṭāḥ rathebhyaḥ te ghṛtācī divam utpatat

original: tāmanveva mahāvegaḥ sa kapiḥ plavatāṃ varaḥ // VamP_39.107 //
analyzed: tām anu eva mahā vegaḥ sa kapiḥ plavatām varaḥ
dadṛśe rūpa saṃpannām ghṛtācīm sa plavaṅgamaḥ

original: sāpi taṃ balināṃ śreṣṭhaṃ dṛṣṭvaiva kapikuñjaram // VamP_30.108 //
analyzed: sā api tam balinām śreṣṭham dṛṣṭvā eva kapi kuñjaram
jñātvā athata viśvakarmāṇam kāmayāmāsa kāminī

original: tato 'nu parvataśreṣṭhe khyāte kolāhale kapiḥ // VamP_39.109 //
analyzed: tatas nu parvata śreṣṭhe khyāte kolāhale kapiḥ

original: ramayāmāsa tāṃ tanvīṃ sā ca taṃ vānarottamam /
analyzed: ramayāmāsa tām tanvīm sā ca tam vānara uttamam

original: evaṃ ramantau suciraṃ saṃprāptau vindhyaparvatam // VamP_39.110 //
analyzed: evam ramantau su ciram saṃprāptau vindhya parvatam
rathaiḥ pañca api tat tīrtham saṃprāptāḥ te nara uttamāḥ
maghyāhna maye prītāḥ sapta godāvaram jalam
prāpya viśrāma hetu artham avateruḥ tvarā anvitāḥ
teṣām sārathayaḥ ca aśvān snātvā pīta udaka āplutān
ramaṇīye vana uddeśe pracāra arthe samutsṛjan
śāḍhvala āḍhyeṣu deśeṣu muhurttāt eva vājinaḥ
tṛptāḥ samādravan sarve devāyatanam uttamam

original: turaṅgakhuranirghoṣaṃ śrutvā tā yoṣitāṃ varāḥ // VamP_39.114 //
analyzed: turaṅga khura nirghoṣam śrutvā tāḥ yoṣitām varāḥ
kim etat iti ca uktvā eva prajagmuḥ hāṭakeśvaram

original: āruhya balabhīṃ tāstu samudaikṣanta sarvaśaḥ // VamP_39.115 //
analyzed: āruhya balabhīm tāḥ tu samudaikṣanta sarvaśas
apaśyan tīrtha salile snāyamānān nara uttamān
tatas citrāṅgadā dṛṣṭvā jaṭā maṇḍala dhāriṇam

original: surathaṃ hasatī prāha saṃrohatpulakā sakhīm // VamP_39.116 //
analyzed: suratham hasatī prāha saṃrohat pulakā sakhīm

original: yo 'sau yuvā nīlaghanaprakāśaḥ saṃdṛśyate dīrghabhujaḥ sūrūpaḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ sau yuvā nīla ghana prakāśaḥ saṃdṛśyate dīrgha bhujaḥ sūrūpaḥ

original: sa eva nūnaṃ naradevasūnurvṛto mayā pūrvataraṃ patiryaḥ // VamP_39.117 //
analyzed: saḥ eva nūnam naradeva sūnuḥ vṛtaḥ mayā pūrvataram patiḥ yaḥ
yaḥ ca eva jāmbū vanada tulya varṇaḥ śvetam jaṭā bhāram adhārayiṣyat

original: sa eṣa nūnaṃ tapatāṃ variṣṭho ṛtadhvajo nātra vicāramasti // VamP_39.118 //
analyzed: saḥ eṣa nūnam tapatām variṣṭhaḥ ṛta dhvajaḥ na atra vicāram asti
tatas bravīt atho hṛṣṭā nandayantī sakhī janam
sya eva sutaḥ jāvāliḥ na atra saṃśayaḥ
iti evam uktvā vacanam balabhyāḥ avatīrya ca
samāsata agratas śaṃbhoḥ gāyantyaḥ gītikām śubhām

original: namo 'stu śarva śaṃbo trinetra cārugātra trailokyanātha umāpate dakṣayajñavidhvaṃsakara
analyzed: namaḥ stu śarva śaṃbo trinetra cāru gātra trailokya nātha umāpate dakṣa yajña vidhvaṃsa kara

original: kāmāhganāsana ghora pāpapraṇāśana mahāpuruṣa mahogramūrte sarvasattvakṣayaṅkara śubhaṅkara
analyzed: ghora pāpa praṇāśana mahāpuruṣa mahā ugra mūrte sarva sattva kṣayaṅkara śubhaṅkara

original: maheśvara triśūladhārin smarāre guhāvāsin digvāsaḥ mahāśaṅkaśekhara (5)
analyzed: maheśvara triśūla dhārin smarāre guhā vāsin digvāsaḥ mahāśaṅkaśekhara

original: jaṭādhara kapālamālāvibhūṣikaśarīra vāmacakṣuḥ bāmadeva prajādhyakṣa bhagākṣṇoḥ kṣayaṅkara
analyzed: jaṭā dhara kapāla mālā vibhūṣika śarīra vāma cakṣuḥ bāma deva prajādhyakṣa bhaga akṣṇoḥ kṣayaṅkara

original: bhīmasena mahāsenanātha paśupate kāmāṅgadahana catvaravāsin śiva mahādeva īśāna saṃkara
analyzed: bhīmasena mahāsena nātha paśupate kāma aṅga dahana catvara vāsin śiva mahādeva īśāna saṃkara

original: bhīma bhava vaṣabhadhvaja jaṭila prauḍha mahānāṭyeśvara bhūriratna (10)
analyzed: bhīma bhava vaṣabhadhvaja jaṭila prauḍha mahā nāṭya īśvara bhūri ratna

original: avimuktaka rudraśvara sthāṇo ekaliṅga kālindīpriya śrīkaṇṭha nīlakaṇṭha aparājita
analyzed: avimuktaka rudraśvara sthāṇo ekaliṅga kālindīpriya śrīkaṇṭha nīlakaṇṭha aparājita

original: ripubhayaṅkara saṃtoṣapate vāmadeva aghora tatpuruṣa mahāghora aghoramūrtta śānta
analyzed: ripu bhayaṅkara saṃtoṣa pate vāmadeva aghora tatpuruṣa mahā ghora aghora mūrtta śānta
sarasvatī kānta kīnāṭa sahasra mūrtte mahā udbhava

original: vibo kālāgnirudra hara mahīdharapriya sarvatīrthādhivāsa haṃsa kāmeśvara kedārādhipate
analyzed: vibo kālāgni rudra hara mahīdhara priya sarva tīrtha adhivāsa haṃsa kāmeśvara kedāra adhipate

original: paripūrṇa mucukunda madhunivāsin kṛpāṇapāṇe bhayaṅkara vidyārāja somarāja kāmarāja
analyzed: paripūrṇa mucukunda madhunivāsin kṛpāṇa pāṇe bhayaṅkara vidyārāja somarāja kāmarāja
uñjaka añjana rāja kanyā hṛd acala vasate samudra śāyin

original: gajamukha ghaṇṭeśvara gokarṇa brahmayone sahasravaktrākṣicaraṇa hāṭakeśvara namo 'stu te /
analyzed: gajamukha ghaṇṭeśvara gokarṇa brahmayone sahasravaktra akṣi caraṇa hāṭakeśvara namaḥ stu te
etasmin antare prāptāḥ sarve eva ṛṣi pārthivāḥ
draṣṭum trailokya kartāram tryambakam hāṭakeśvaram
samārūḍhāḥ ca su snātāḥ dadṛśuḥ yoṣitaḥ ca tāḥ
sthitāḥ tu puratas tasya gāyantyaḥ geyam uttamam
tatas sudeva tanayaḥ viśvakarma sutām priyām
dṛṣṭvā hṛṣita cittaḥ tu saṃrohat pulakaḥ babhau
ṛtadhvajaḥ pi tanvaṅgīm dṛṣṭvā citrāṅgadām sthitām
pratyabhijñāya yoga ātmā babhau mudita mānasaḥ
tatas tu sahasā abhyetya deveśam hāṭakeśvaram

original: saṃpūjayantastryakṣaṃ te stuvantaḥ saṃsthitāḥ kramāt // VamP_39.125 //
analyzed: saṃpūjayantaḥ tryakṣam te stuvantaḥ saṃsthitāḥ kramāt
citrāṅgadā api tān dṛṣṭvā ṛtadhvaja purogamān
samam tābhiḥ kṛsāṅgībhiḥ abhyutthāya abhyavādayat

original: sa ca tāḥ pratinandyaiva samaṃ putreṇa tāpasaḥ /
analyzed: sa ca tāḥ pratinandya eva samam putreṇa tāpasaḥ
samam nṛpatibhiḥ hṛṣṭaḥ saṃviveśa yathāsukham

original: tataḥ kapivaraḥ prāpto ghṛtācyā saha sundari /
analyzed: tatas kapi varaḥ prāptaḥ ghṛtācyā saha sundari
snātvā godāvarī tīrthe didṛkṣuḥ hāṭakeśvaram
paśyat sutām tanvīm ghṛtācī śubha darśanām

original: sāpi tāṃ mātaraṃ dṛṣṭvā hṛṣṭābhūdvaravarṇinī // VamP_39.129 //
analyzed: sā api tām mātaram dṛṣṭvā hṛṣṭā abhūt varavarṇinī

original: tato ghṛtācī svāṃ putrīṃ pariṣvajya nyapīḍayat /
analyzed: tatas ghṛtācī svām putrīm pariṣvajya nyapīḍayat
snehāt sa vāṣpa nayanām muhur tām
tatas ṛtadhvajaḥ śrīmān kapim vacanam abravīt
gaccha netum guhyakam tvam añjana adrau mahā añjanam
pātālāt api daitya īśam vīram kandara mālinam
svargāt gandharva rājānam parjanyam śīghram ānaya
iti evam ukte muninā prāha devavatī kapim
gālavam vānara śreṣṭhaḥ iha ānetum tvam arhasi
iti evam ukte vacane kapiḥ maruta vikramaḥ
gatvā añjanam samāmantrya jagāma amaraparvatam
parjanyam tatra ca āmantrya preṣayitvā mahā āśrame
saptagodāvare tīrthe pātālam agamat kapiḥ
tatra āmantrya mahā vīryam kapiḥ kandara mālinam
pātālāt abhiniṣkramya mahīm paryacarat javī
gālam tapasaḥ yonim dṛṣṭvā māhiṣmatīm anu
samutpatya anayat śīghram saptagodāvaram jalam
tatra snātvā vidhānena saṃprāptaḥ hāṭakeśvaram

original: dadṛśe nandayantī ca sthitāṃ devavatīmapi // VamP_39.138 //
analyzed: dadṛśe nandayantī ca sthitām devavatīm api
tam dṛṣṭvā gālavam ca eva samutthāya abhyavādayat
sa ca arciṣyan mahādevam mahā ṛṣīn abhyavādayat

original: te cāpi nṛpatiśreṣṭhastaṃ saṃpūjya tapodhanam // VamP_39.139 //
analyzed: te ca api nṛpati śreṣṭhaḥ tam saṃpūjya tapodhanam
praharṣam atulam gatvā upaviṣṭāḥ yathāsukham
teṣu upaviṣṭeṣu tadā vānara upanimantritāḥ
samāyātāḥ mahātmānaḥ yakṣa gandharva dānavāḥ
tān āgatān samīkṣya eva putryaḥ tāḥ pṛthu locanāḥ
sneha ārdra nayanāḥ sarvāḥ tadā sasvajire pitṝn
nandayantī ādikā dṛṣṭvā sa pitṛkā varānanā
sa vāṣpa nayanā jātā viśvakarma sutā tadā

original: atha tāmāha sa muniḥ satyaṃ satyadhvajo vacaḥ // VamP_39.143 //
analyzed: atha tām āha sa muniḥ satyam satya dhvajaḥ vacaḥ

original: mā viṣādaṃ kṛtāḥ putri pitāyaṃ tava vānaraḥ /
analyzed: mā viṣādam kṛtāḥ putri pitā ayam tava vānaraḥ
sā tad vacanam ākarṇya vrīḍā upahata cetanā
katham tu viśvakarmā asau vānara tvam gataḥ dhunā

original: duṣputryāṃ mayijātāyaṃ tasmāt tyakṣe kalevaram // VamP_39.145 //
analyzed: duṣputryām mayi jātā ayam tasmāt tyakṣe kalevaram
iti saṃcintya manasā ṛtadhvajam uvāca ha
paritrāyasva mām brahman pāpa upahata cetanām
pitṛ ghnī martum icchāmi tat anujñātum arhasi

original: athovāca munistanvīṃ mā viṣādaṃ kṛthādhunā // VamP_39.147 //
analyzed: athā uvāca muniḥ tanvīm mā viṣādam kṛthāḥ adhunā

original: bhāvyasya naiva nāśo 'sti nanmā tyākṣīḥ kalevaram /
analyzed: bhāvyasya nā eva nāśaḥ sti nan mā tyākṣīḥ kalevaram
bhaviṣyati pitā tubhyam pi amara varddhakiḥ

original: jāte 'patye ghṛtācyāṃ tu nātra kāryā vicāraṇā /
analyzed: jāte patye ghṛtācyām tu na atra kāryā vicāraṇā
iti evam ukte vacane muninā bhāvitātmanā

original: ghṛtācī tāṃ sambhyetya prāha citrāṅgadāṃ vacaḥ /
analyzed: ghṛtācī tām sambhyetya prāha citrāṅgadām vacaḥ

original: putri tyajasva śokaṃ tvaṃ māsaurdaśabhirātmajaḥ // VamP_39.150 //
analyzed: putri tyajasva śokam tvam mā asauḥ daśabhiḥ ātmajaḥ
bhaviṣyati putuḥ tubhyam mad sakāśāt na saṃśayaḥ

original: ityevamuktā saṃhṛṣṭā babhau citrāṅgadā tadā // VamP_39.151 //
analyzed: iti evam uktā saṃhṛṣṭā babhau citrāṅgadā tadā
pratīkṣantī su cāru aṅgī vivāhe pitṛ darśanam

original: sarvāstā api tāvantaṃ kālaṃ sutanukanyakāḥ // VamP_39.152 //
analyzed: sarvāḥ tāḥ api tāvantam kālam su tanu kanyakāḥ

original: pratyaikṣanta vivāhaṃ hi tasyā eva priyepsayā /
analyzed: pratyaikṣanta vivāham hi tasyāḥ eva priya īpsayā
tatas daśasu māseṣu samatīteṣu atha apsarāḥ
godāvarī tīrthe prasūtā tanayam nalam
jāte patye kapi tvāt ca viśvakarmā api amucyata
samabhyetya priyām putrīm paryaṣvajata ca ādarāt

original: tataḥ prītena manasā sasmāra suravarddhakiḥ // VamP_39.155 //
analyzed: tatas prītena manasā sasmāra suravarddhakiḥ
surāṇām adhipam śakram saha eva sura kinnaraiḥ
tvaṣṭrā atha saṃsmṛtaḥ śakraḥ marut gaṇa vṛtaḥ tadā
suraiḥ sa rudraiḥ saṃprāptaḥ tat tīrtha hāṭaka āhvayam
samāyāteṣu deveṣu gandharveṣu apsarassu ca
indradyumnaḥ muni śreṣṭham ṛtadhvajam uvāca ha
jābāleḥ dīyatām brahman sutā kandara mālinaḥ
gṛhṇātu vidhivat pāṇim daiteyyāḥ tanayaḥ tava

original: nandayantīṃ ca śakuniḥ pariṇetuṃ svarūpavān // VamP_39.159 //
analyzed: nandayantīm ca śakuniḥ pariṇetum sva rūpavān
mama iyam vedavatī astu tvāṣṭroyī surathasya ca
bāḍham iti abravīt hṛṣṭaḥ muniḥ manu sutam nṛpam
tatas nucakruḥ saṃhṛṣṭāḥ vivāha vidhim uttamam

original: ṛtvijo 'bhūd gālavastu hutvā havyaṃ vidhanataḥ // VamP_39.161 //
analyzed: ṛtvijaḥ bhūt gālavaḥ tu hutvā havyam vidhanataḥ
gāyante tatra gandharvāḥ nṛtyante psarasaḥ tathā
ādau jābālinaḥ pāṇiḥ gṛhītaḥ daitya kanyayā
indradyumnena tadanu vedavatyāḥ vidhānataḥ
tatas śakuninā pāṇiḥ gṛhītaḥ yakṣa kanyayā
citrāṅgadāyāḥ kalyāṇi surathaḥ pāṇim agrahīt
evam kramāt vivāhaḥ tu nirvṛttaḥ tanu madhyame

original: vṛtte munirvivāhe tu śakrādīn prāha daivatān /
analyzed: vṛtte muniḥ vivāhe tu śakra ādīn prāha daivatān
asmin tīrthe bhavadbhiḥ tu saptagodāvare sadā
stheyam viśeṣataḥ māsam imam mādhavam uttamam

original: bāḍhamuktvā surāḥ sarve jagmurhṛṣṭā divaṃ kramāt // VamP_39.166 //
analyzed: bāḍham uktvā surāḥ sarve jagmuḥ hṛṣṭāḥ divam kramāt
munayaḥ munim ādāya sa putram jagmuḥ ādarāt

original: bhāryāścādāya rājānaḥ svaṃ svaṃ nagaramāgatāḥ // VamP_39.167 //
analyzed: bhāryāḥ ca ādāya rājānaḥ svam svam nagaram āgatāḥ
prahṛṣṭāḥ sukhinaḥ tasthuḥ bhuñjate viṣayān priyān

original: citrāṅgadāyāḥ kalyāṇi evaṃ vṛttaṃ purā kila /
analyzed: citrāṅgadāyāḥ kalyāṇi evam vṛttam purā kila
tat mām kamala patra akṣi bhajasva lalanā uttame
iti evam uktvā naradeva sūnuḥ tām bhūmidevasya sutām vara ūrum

original: stuvanmṛgākṣīṃ mṛdunā krameṇa sā cāpi vākyaṃ nṛpatiṃ babhāṣe // VamP_39.169 //
analyzed: stuvan mṛga akṣīm mṛdunā krameṇa sā ca api vākyam nṛpatim babhāṣe
iti śrī vāmanapurāṇe ekonacatvāriṃśaḥ dhyāyaḥ
arajāḥ uvāca

original: nātmānaṃ tava dāsyāmi buhanoktena kiṃ tava /
analyzed: na ātmānam tava dāsyāmi kim tava

original: rakṣantī bhavataḥ śāpādātmānaṃ ca mahī pate // VamP_40.1 //
analyzed: rakṣantī bhavataḥ śāpāt ātmānam ca mahī pate
prahlādaḥ uvāca
ittham vivadamānām tām bhārgava indra sutām balāt
kāma upahata citta ātmā vyadhvaṃsayata manda dhīḥ
tām kṛtvā cyuta cāpitrām mada andhaḥ pṛthivīpatiḥ

original: niścakrāmāśramāt tasmād gataśca nagaraṃ nijam // VamP_40.3 //
analyzed: niścakrāma āśramāt tasmāt gataḥ ca nagaram nijam
sā api śukra sutā tanvī arajā rajasā āplutā
āśramāt atha nira gatya bahis tasthau adhas sukhī
cintayantī sva pitaram rudatī ca muhur muhur
mahā graha upataptā iva rohiṇī śaśinaḥ priyā
tatas bahutithe kāle samāpte yajña karmaṇi
pātālāt āgamat śukraḥ kham āśrama padam muniḥ

original: āśramānte ca dadṛśe sutāṃ daitya rajakhalām /
analyzed: āśrama ante ca dadṛśe sutām daitya raja khalām
megha lekhām iva ākāśe saṃdhyā rāgeṇa rañjitām

original: tāṃ dṛṣṭvā paripapraccha putri kenāsi dharṣitā /
analyzed: tām dṛṣṭvā paripapraccha putri kena asi dharṣitā

original: kaḥ krīḍati saroṣeṇa samamāśīviṣeṇa hi // VamP_40.8 //
analyzed: kaḥ krīḍati sa roṣeṇa samam āśīviṣeṇa hi
kaḥ yāmyām nagarīm gamiṣyati su durmatiḥ
yaḥ tvām suddha samācārām vidhvaṃsayati pāpa kṛt

original: tataḥ svapitaraṃ dṛṣṭvā kampamānā punaḥ punāḥ /
analyzed: tatas sva pitaram dṛṣṭvā kampamānā punar

original: rudantī vrīḍayopetā mandaṃ mandamuvāca ha // VamP_40.10 //
analyzed: rudantī vrīḍayā upetā mandam mandam uvāca ha
tava śiṣyeṇa daṇḍena vāryamāṇena ca asakṛt
balāt anāthā rudatī nītā aham vacanīya tām
etat putryāḥ vacaḥ śrutvā krodha saṃrakta locanaḥ
upaspṛśya śuciḥ bhūtvā idam vacanam abravīt
yasmāt mattaḥ hi abhayam uttamam

original: gauravaṃ ca tiraskṛtya cyutadharmārajā kṛtā // VamP_40.13 //
analyzed: gauravam ca tiraskṛtya cyuta dharma āra jā kṛtā

original: tasmāt sarāṣṭraḥ sabalaḥ sabhṛtyo vāhanaiḥ saha /
analyzed: tasmāt sa rāṣṭraḥ sa balaḥ sa bhṛtyaḥ vāhanaiḥ saha
sapta rātra antarāt bhasma grāva vṛṣṭyāḥ bhaviṣyati

original: ityevamuktvā munipuṅgavo 'sau śaptvā sa daṇḍaṃ svasutāmuvāca /
analyzed: iti evam uktvā muni puṅgavaḥ sau śaptvā sa daṇḍam sva sutām uvāca

original: tvaṃ pāpamokṣārthamihaiva putri tiṣṭhasva kalyāṇi tapaścarantī // VamP_40.15 //
analyzed: tvam pāpa mokṣa artham iha eva putri tiṣṭhasva kalyāṇi tapaḥ carantī
śpatvā ittham bhagavān śukraḥ daṇḍam ikṣvāku nandanam
jagāma śiṣya sahitaḥ pātālam dānava ālayam
daṇḍaḥ pi bhasmasāt bhūtaḥ sa rāṣṭra bala vāhanaḥ
mahatā sapta rātra antare tadā
evam tat ṛṇḍaka araṇyam parityajya nati devatā

original: ālayaṃ rākṣasānāṃ tu kṛtaṃ devena śaṃbhunā // VamP_40.18 //
analyzed: ālayam rākṣasānām tu kṛtam devena śaṃbhunā
evam para kalatrāṇi nayanti sukṛtīn api

original: bhasmabhūtān prākṛtāṃstu mahāntaṃ ca parābhavam // VamP_40.19 //
analyzed: bhasma bhūtān prākṛtān tu mahāntam ca parābhavam
tasmāt andhaka durbuddhiḥ na kāryā bhavatā tu iyam
prākṛtā api dahet nārī kim uta ahodrinandinī

original: śaṅkaro 'pi na daityeśa śakyo jetuṃ surāsuraiḥ /
analyzed: śaṅkaraḥ api na daitya īśa śakyaḥ jetum sura asuraiḥ
draṣṭum api amita ojaskaḥ kimu yodhayitum raṇe
pulastyaḥ uvāca
iti evam ukte vacane kruddhaḥ tāmra īkṣaṇaḥ śvasan
vākyam āha mahā tejāḥ prahlādam ca andhaka asuraḥ
kim mama asau raṇe yoddhum śaktaḥ trimayano sura
ekākī dharma rahitaḥ bhasma aruṇita vigrahaḥ
na andhakaḥ bibhiyāt indrāt na amarebhyaḥ kathañcana

original: sa kathaṃ vṛṣapatrākṣād bibheti strīmukhekṣakāt // VamP_40.24 //
analyzed: sa katham vṛṣa patra akṣāt bibheti strī mukha īkṣakāt

original: tacchrutvāsya vaco ghoraṃ prahlādaḥ prāha nārada /
analyzed: tat śrutvā asya vacaḥ ghoram prahlādaḥ prāha nārada

original: na samyaguktaṃ bhavatā viruddhaṃ dharmator'thataḥ // VamP_40.25 //
analyzed: na samyak uktam bhavatā viruddham dharma torthataḥ
hutāśana pataṅgābhyām siṃha kroṣṭukayoḥ iva
gaja indra maśakābhyām ca rukma pāṣāṇayoḥ iva
eteṣām ebhiḥ uditam yāvat antaram andhaka

original: tāvadevāntaraṃ cāsti bhavato vā harasya ca // VamP_40.27 //
analyzed: tāvat eva antaram ca asti bhavataḥ vā harasya ca

original: vārito 'si mayā vīra bhūyo bhūyaśca vāryase /
analyzed: vāritaḥ si mayā vīra bhūyas bhūyas ca vāryase
śṛṇuṣva vākyam deva ṛṣeḥ asitasya mahātmanaḥ

original: yo dharmaśīlo jitamānaroṣo vidyāvinīto na paropatāpī /
analyzed: yaḥ dharma śīlaḥ jita māna roṣaḥ vidyā vinītaḥ na para upatāpī

original: svadāratuṣṭaḥ paradāravarjo natasya loke bhayamasti kiñcit // VamP_40.29 //
analyzed: sva dāra tuṣṭaḥ para dāra varjaḥ natasya loke bhayam asti kiñcid

original: yo dharmahīnaḥ kalahapriyaḥ sadā paropatāpī śrutiśāstravarjitaḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ dharma hīnaḥ kalaha priyaḥ sadā para upatāpī śruti śāstra varjitaḥ

original: parārthadāreṣsuravarṇasaṃgamī sukhaṃ na vindeta paratra ceha // VamP_40.30 //
analyzed: para artha dāra iṣsuḥ avarṇa saṃgamī sukham na vindeta paratra ca iha
dharma anvitaḥ bhūt manuḥ arka putraḥ sva dāra saṃtuṣṭa manāḥ tu agastyaḥ
etāni puṇyāni kṛtāni amībhiḥ mayā nibaddhāni kula krama uktyā

original: tejonvitāḥ śāpavarakṣamāśca jātāśca sarve surasiddhapūjyāḥ // VamP_40.32 //
analyzed: tejaḥ nvitāḥ śāpa vara kṣamāḥ ca jātāḥ ca sarve sura siddha pūjyāḥ
adharma yuktaḥ ṅga sutaḥ babhūva vibhuḥ ca nityam kalaha priyaḥ bhūt
para upatāpī namuciḥ durātmā parā bala īpsuḥ nahuṣaḥ ca rājā
parārtha lipsuḥ dijitaḥ hiraṇyadṛś mūrkhaḥ tu tasya api anujaḥ su durmatiḥ

original: avarṇasaṃgī yadusttamaujā ete vinaṣṭāstvanayāt purā hi // VamP_40.34 //
analyzed: avarṇa saṃgī yadu uttamaujāḥ ete vinaṣṭāḥ tu anayāt purā hi

original: tasmād dharmo na saṃtyājyo dharmo hi paramā gatiḥ /
analyzed: tasmāt dharmaḥ na saṃtyājyaḥ dharmaḥ hi paramā gatiḥ

original: dharmahīnā narā yānti rauravaṃ narakaṃ mahat // VamP_40.35 //
analyzed: dharma hīnāḥ narāḥ yānti rauravam narakam mahat

original: dharmastu gaditaḥ puṃbhistāraṇe divi ceha ca /
analyzed: dharmaḥ tu gaditaḥ puṃbhiḥ tāraṇe divi ca iha ca

original: patanāya tathādharma iha loke paratra ca // VamP_40.36 //
analyzed: patanāya tathā adharmaḥ iha loke paratra ca
tyājyam dharma anvitaiḥ nityam para dāra upasevanam
nayanti para dārāḥ hi narakān ekaviṃśatim
sarveṣām api varṇānām eṣa dharmaḥ dhruvaḥ ndhaka
parārtha para dāreṣu yadā vāñchām kariṣyati

original: sa yāti narakaṃ ghoraṃ rauravaṃ bahulāḥ samāḥ // VamP_40.38 //
analyzed: sa yāti narakam ghoram rauravam bahulāḥ samāḥ
evam purā asura pate devarṣiḥ asitaḥ vyāyaḥ
prāha dharma vyavasthānam khaga indrāya aruṇāya hi
tasmāt su dūratas varjet para dārān vicakṣaṇāḥ
nayanti nikṛti prajñam para dārāḥ parābhavam
pulastyaḥ uvāca
iti evam ukte vacane prahlādam prāha ca andhakaḥ

original: bhavān dharmaparastveko nāhaṃ dharma samācare // VamP_40.41 //
analyzed: bhavān dharma paraḥ tu ekaḥ na aham dharma samācare
iti evam uktvā prahlādam andhakaḥ prāha śambaram

original: gaccha śambara śailendraṃ mandaraṃ vada śaṅkaram // VamP_40.42 //
analyzed: gaccha śambara śaila indram mandaram vada śaṅkaram
bhikṣo kimartham śaula indram svarga upamyam sa kandaram

original: paribhuñjasi kenādya tava datto vadasva māma // VamP_40.43 //
analyzed: paribhuñjasi kena adya tava dattaḥ vadasva māma
tiṣṭhanti śāsane mahyam devāḥ śakra purogamāḥ

original: tat kimarthaṃ nivasase māmanādṛtya mandare // VamP_40.44 //
analyzed: tat kimartham nivasase mām an ādṛtya mandare
yadi iṣṭaḥ tava śaila indraḥ kriyatām vacanam mama

original: yeyaṃ hi bhavataḥ patnī sā me śīghraṃ pradīyatām // VamP_40.45 //
analyzed: yā iyam hi bhavataḥ patnī sā me śīghram pradīyatām

original: ityuktaḥ sa tadā tena śambaro mandaraṃ drutam /
analyzed: iti uktaḥ sa tadā tena śambaraḥ mandaram drutam

original: jagāma tatra yatrāste saha devyā pinākadhṛk // VamP_40.46 //
analyzed: jagāma tatra yatra āste saha devyā pinākadhṛk
gatvā uvāca andhaka vacaḥ yāthātathyam danoḥ sutaḥ

original: tamuttaraṃ haraḥ prāha śṛṇvatyā girikanyayā // VamP_40.47 //
analyzed: tam uttaram haraḥ prāha śṛṇvatyā giri kanyayā
mama ayam mandaraḥ dattaḥ sahasrākṣeṇa dhīmatā

original: tanna śaknomyahaṃ tyaktuṃ vinājñāṃ vṛkṣavairiṇaḥ // VamP_40.48 //
analyzed: tat na śaknomi aham tyaktum vinā ājñām vṛkṣa vairiṇaḥ
yat ca abravīt dīyatām me giriputrī iti dānavaḥ

original: tadeṣā yātu svaṃ kāmaṃ nāhaṃ vārayituṃ kṣamaḥ // VamP_40.49 //
analyzed: tat eṣā yātu svam kāmam na aham vārayitum kṣamaḥ
tatas bravīt girisutā śambaram muni sattama

original: brūhi gatvāndhakaṃ vīra mama vākyaṃ vipaścitam // VamP_40.50 //
analyzed: brūhi gatvā andhakam vīra mama vākyam vipaścitam
aham patākā saṃgrāme bhavān īśaḥ ca devinau

original: prāmadyūtaṃ paristīrya yo jeṣyati sa lapsyate // VamP_40.51 //
analyzed: prāma dyūtam paristīrya yaḥ jeṣyati sa lapsyate
iti evam uktaḥ matimān śambaraḥ ndakam āgamat
samāgamya abravīt vākyam śarva gauryoḥ ca bhāṣitam
tat śratvā dānava patiḥ krodha dīpta īkṣaṇaḥ śvasan
samāhūya abravīt vākyam duryodhanam idam vacaḥ

original: gaccha śīghraṃ mahābāho bherīṃ sānnāhikīṃ dṛḍhām /
analyzed: gaccha śīghram mahā bāho bherīm sānnāhikīm dṛḍhām
tāḍayasva su viśrabdham duḥśīlām iva yoṣitam
samādiṣṭaḥ ndhakena atha bherīm duryodhanaḥ balāt
tāḍayāmāsa vegena yathāprāṇena bhūyasā

original: sā tāḍitā balavatā bherī duryodhanena hi /
analyzed: sā tāḍitā balavatā bherī duryodhanena hi

original: satvaraṃ bhairavaṃ rāvaṃ rurāva surabhī yathā // VamP_40.56 //
analyzed: satvaram bhairavam rāvam rurāva surabhī yathā
tasyāḥ tam svaram ākarṇya sarve eva mahā asurāḥ

original: samāyātāḥ sabhāṃ tūrṇaṃ kimetaditi vādinaḥ // VamP_40.57 //
analyzed: samāyātāḥ sabhām tūrṇam kim etat iti vādinaḥ
yāthātathyam ca tān sarvān āha senāpatiḥ balī

original: te cāpi balināṃ śreṣṭhāḥ sannaddhā yuddhakāṅkṣiṇaḥ // VamP_40.58 //
analyzed: te ca api balinām śreṣṭhāḥ sannaddhāḥ yuddha kāṅkṣiṇaḥ
saha andhakāḥ niryayuḥ te gajaiḥ uṣṭraiḥ hayaiḥ rathaiḥ
andhakaḥ ratham āsthāya pañcanalva praṇamāṇataḥ
tryambakam sa parājetum kṛtabuddhiḥ viniryayau

original: jambhaḥ kujambho huṇḍaśca tuhuṇḍaḥ śambaro baliḥ // VamP_40.60 //
analyzed: jambhaḥ kujambhaḥ huṇḍaḥ ca tuhuṇḍaḥ śambaraḥ baliḥ
bāṇāḥ kārtasvaraḥ hastī sūryaśatruḥ mahodaraḥ

original: ayaḥśuṅkuḥ śibiḥ śālvo vṛṣaparvā virocanaḥ // VamP_40.61 //
analyzed: ayaḥśuṅkuḥ śibiḥ śālvaḥ vṛṣaparvā virocanaḥ
śarabhaḥ śalabhaḥ ca eva vipracittiḥ ca vīryavān
duryodhanaḥ ca pākaḥ ca vipākaḥ kāla śambarau

original: ete cānye ca bahavo mahāvīryā mahābalāḥ /
analyzed: ete ca anye ca bahavaḥ mahā vīryāḥ mahā balāḥ
prajagamuḥ utsukāḥ yoddhum nānā āyudha dharāḥ raṇe
ittham durātmā danu sainya pālaḥ tadā andhakaḥ yoddhu manāḥ hareṇa

original: mahācalaṃ mandaramabhyupeyivān sa kālapāśāvasito hi mandadhīḥ // VamP_40.64 //
analyzed: mahā acalam mandaram abhyupeyivān sa kāla pāśa avasitaḥ hi manda dhīḥ
iti śrī vāmanapurāṇe catvāriśaḥ dhyāyaḥ
pulāstyaḥ uvāca
śambare yāte samāhūya atha nandinam

original: prāhāmantraya śailāde ye sthitāstava śāsane // VamP_41.1 //
analyzed: prāha āmantraya śailāde ye sthitāḥ tava śāsane
tatas maheśa vacanāt nandī tūrṇataram gataḥ

original: upaspṛśya jalaṃ śrīmān sasmāra gaṇanāyakān // VamP_41.2 //
analyzed: upaspṛśya jalam śrīmān sasmāra gaṇa nāyakān
nandinā saṃsmṛtāḥ sarve gaṇanāthāḥ sahasraśas
samutpatya tvarā yuktāḥ praṇatāḥ tridasa īśvaram
āgatān ca gaṇān nandī kṛta añjali puṭaḥ vyayaḥ
sarvān nivedayāmāsa śaṅkarāya mahātmane
nandī uvāca
yān etān paśyase śaṃbho tri netrān jaṭilān śucīn

original: ete rudrā iti khyātāḥ koṭya ekādaśaiva tu // VamP_41.5 //
analyzed: ete rudrāḥ iti khyātāḥ koṭyaḥ ekādaśā eva tu
vānara āsyān paśyase yān śārdūla sama vikramān
eteṣām dvārapālāḥ te yaśaḥ dhanāḥ
ṣaṣ mukhān paśyase yān ca śakti pāṇīn śikhi dhvajān

original: ṣaṭ ca ṣaṣṭistathā koṭyaḥ skandanāmnaḥ kumārakān // VamP_41.7 //
analyzed: ṣaṭ ca ṣaṣṭiḥ tathā koṭyaḥ skanda nāmnaḥ kumārakān
etāvatyaḥ tathā koṭya śākhāḥ nāma ṣaṣ ānanāḥ
viśākhāḥ tāvat evā uktāḥ naigameyāḥ ca śaṅkara
sapta koṭi śatam śaṃbho amī vai pramatha uttamāḥ

original: ekaikaṃ prati deveśa tāvatyo hyapi mātaraḥ // VamP_41.9 //
analyzed: ekaikam prati deveśa tāvatyaḥ hi api mātaraḥ
bhasma aruṇita dehāḥ ca tri netrāḥ śūla pāṇayaḥ

original: ete śaivā iti proktāstava bhaktā gaṇeśvarāḥ // VamP_41.10 //
analyzed: ete śaivāḥ iti proktāḥ tava bhaktāḥ gaṇeśvarāḥ
tathā pāśupatāḥ ca anye bhasma prahāraṇāḥ vibho
ete gaṇāḥ tu asaṃkhyātāḥ sahāya artham samāgatāḥ
pināka dhāriṇaḥ raudrāḥ gaṇāḥ kāla mukha apare
tava bhaktāḥ samāyātāḥ jaṭā maṇḍalinā udbhutāḥ
khaṭvāṅga yodhinaḥ vīrāḥ rakta carma samāvṛtāḥ

original: ime prāptā gaṇā yoddhuṃ mahāvratina uttamāḥ // VamP_41.13 //
analyzed: ime prāptāḥ gaṇāḥ yoddhum mahāvratinaḥ uttamāḥ
digvāsasaḥ mauninaḥ ca ghaṇṭā praharaṇāḥ tathā

original: nirāśrayā nāma gaṇāḥ samāyātā jagadguro // VamP_41.14 //
analyzed: nirāśrayāḥ nāma gaṇāḥ samāyātāḥ jagadguro
sārdha dvi netrāḥ padma akṣāḥ śrīvatsa aṅkita vakṣasaḥ
samāyātāḥ khaga ārūḍhāḥ vṛṣabha dhvajinaḥ vyayāḥ
mahāpāśupatāḥ nāma cakra śūla dharāḥ tathā

original: bhairavo viṣṇunā sārddhamabhedenārcito hi yai // VamP_41.16 //
analyzed: bhairavaḥ viṣṇunā sārddham abhedena arcitaḥ hi
ime mṛga undra vadanāḥ śūla bāṇa dhanuḥ dharāḥ
gaṇāḥ tvad roma saṃbhūtāḥ vīrabhadra purogamāḥ

original: ete cānye ca bahavaḥ śataśo 'tha sahasraśaḥ /
analyzed: ete ca anye ca bahavaḥ sahasraśas
sahāya artham tava āyātāḥ yathāprītyā ādiśasva tān
tatas bhyetya gaṇāḥ sarve praṇemuḥ vṛṣabhadhvajam
tān kareṇa eva bhagavān samāśvāsya upaveśayat
mahāpāśupatān dṛṣṭvā samutthāya maheśvaraḥ
saṃpariṣvajatā adhyakṣān te praṇemuḥ maheśvaram

original: tatastadadbhutatamaṃ dṛṣṭvā sarve gaṇeśvarāḥ suciraṃ vismitākṣāśca vailakṣyamagamat param // VamP_41.21 //
analyzed: tatas tat adbhutatamam dṛṣṭvā sarve gaṇeśvarāḥ su ciram vismita akṣāḥ ca vailakṣyam agamat param
vismita akṣān gaṇān dṛṣṭvā sailadiḥ yoginām varaḥ

original: prāha prahasya deveśaṃ śūlapāṇiṃ gaṇādhipam // VamP_41.22 //
analyzed: prāha prahasya deveśam śūlapāṇim gaṇādhipam

original: vismitāmī gaṇā deva sarva eva maheśvara /
analyzed: vismitāḥ amī gaṇāḥ deva sarve eva maheśvara

original: mahāpāśupatānāṃ hi yat tvayāliṅganaṃ kṛtam // VamP_41.23 //
analyzed: mahāpāśupatānām hi yat tvayā āliṅganam kṛtam
tat eteṣām mahādeva sphuṭam trailokya vindakam

original: rūpaṃ jñānaṃ vivekaṃ ca vadasva svecchayā vibho // VamP_41.24 //
analyzed: rūpam jñānam vivekam ca vadasva sva icchayā vibho
pramatha adhipateḥ vākyam viditvā bhūtabhāvanaḥ

original: babhāṣe tān gaṇān sarvān bhāvābhāvavicāriṇaḥ // VamP_41.25 //
analyzed: babhāṣe tān gaṇān sarvān bhāva abhāva vicāriṇaḥ
rudraḥ uvāca
bhavdbhiḥ bhakti saṃyuktaiḥ haraḥ bhāvena pūjitaḥ
ahaṅkāra vimūḍhaiḥ ca nindadbhiḥ vaiṣṇavam padam
tena ajñānena bhavataḥ u ādṛtya anuvirodhitāḥ

original: yo 'haṃ sa bhagavān viṣṇurviṣṇuryaḥ so 'hamavyayaḥ // VamP_41.27 //
analyzed: yaḥ ham sa bhagavān viṣṇuḥ viṣṇuḥ yaḥ saḥ ham avyayaḥ
na āvayoḥ vai viśeṣaḥ sti ekā mūrtiḥ dvidhā sthitā
tat amībhiḥ nara vyāghraiḥ bhakti bhāva yutaiḥ gaṇaiḥ

original: yathāhaṃ vai parijñāto na bhavadbhistathā dhruvam /
analyzed: yathā aham vai parijñātaḥ na bhavadbhiḥ tathā dhruvam
yena aham ninditaḥ nityam bhavadbhiḥ mūḍha buddhibhiḥ

original: tena jñānaṃ hi vai naṣṭaṃ nātastvāliṅgitā mayā /
analyzed: tena jñānam hi vai naṣṭam na atas tu āliṅgitā mayā
iti evam ukte vacane gaṇāḥ procuḥ maheśvaram
katham bhavān yathā aikyena saṃsthitaḥ sti janārdanaḥ

original: bhavān hi nirmalaḥ suddhaḥ śāntaḥ suklo nirañjanaḥ // VamP_41.31 //
analyzed: bhavān hi nirmalaḥ suddhaḥ śāntaḥ suklaḥ nirañjanaḥ
sa ca api añjana saṃkāśaḥ katham tena iha yujyate
teṣām vacanam artha āḍhyam śrutvā jīmūtavāhanaḥ
vihasya megha gambhīram gaṇān idam uvāca ha
śrūyatām sarvam ākhyāsye sva yaśaḥ varddhanam vacaḥ

original: na tveva yogyā yūyaṃ hi mahājñānasya karhicit /
analyzed: na tu eva yogyāḥ yūyam hi mahā jñānasya karhicit

original: apavādabhayād guhyaṃ bhavatāṃ hi prakāśaye // VamP_41.34 //
analyzed: apavāda bhayāt guhyam bhavatām hi prakāśaye
priyadhvam api ca etena yat mad cittā astu nityaśas
eka rūpa ātmakam deham kurudhyam yatnam āsthitāḥ
payasā haviṣā ādyaiḥ ca snāpanena prayatnataḥ
candana ādibhiḥ ekāgraiḥ na me prītiḥ prajāyate
yatnāt krakacam ādāya chindadhvam mama vigraham
naraka arhāḥ bhavat bhaktāḥ rakṣāmi sva yaśaḥ ṛthataḥ
mā ayam vadiṣyate lokaḥ mahāntam apavādinam
yathā patanti narake hara bhaktāḥ tapasvinaḥ
vrajanti narakam ghoram iti evam parivādinaḥ

original: ator'thaṃ na kṣipāmyadya bhavato narake 'dbhute // VamP_41.39 //
analyzed: atortham na kṣipāmi adya bhavataḥ narake dbhute
yat nindadhvam jagannātham puṣkarākṣam ca mad mayam

original: sa caiva sadṛśo loke vidyate sacarācare /
analyzed: sa ca eva sadṛśaḥ loke vidyate sacarācare

original: śvetamūrtiḥ sa gavān pīto rakto 'ñjanaprabhaḥ // VamP_41.40 //
analyzed: śveta mūrtiḥ sa gavān pītaḥ raktaḥ ñjana prabhaḥ

original: na tasya sadṛśo loke vidyate sacarācare /
analyzed: na tasya sadṛśaḥ loke vidyate sacarācare

original: śvetamūrtiḥ sa bhagavān pīto rakto 'ñjanaprabhaḥ // VamP_41.41 //
analyzed: śveta mūrtiḥ sa bhagavān pītaḥ raktaḥ ñjana prabhaḥ

original: tasmāt parataraṃ loke nānyad dharma hi vidyate /
analyzed: tasmāt parataram loke na anyat dharma hi vidyate

original: sāttvikaṃ rājasaṃ caiva tāmasaṃ miśrakaṃ tathā /
analyzed: sāttvikam rājasam ca eva tāmasam miśrakam tathā

original: sa eva dhatte bhagavān sarvapūjyaḥ sadāśivaḥ // VamP_41.42 //
analyzed: saḥ eva dhatte bhagavān sarva pūjyaḥ sadāśivaḥ
śaṅkarasya vacaḥ śrutvā śaiva ādyā pramatha uttamāḥ
pratyūcuḥ bhagavan brūhi sadāśiva viśeṇam
teṣām tat bhāṣitam śrutvā pramathānām atha īśvaraḥ
darśayāmāsa tad rūpam sadā śaivam nirañjanam

original: tataḥ paśyanti hi gaṇāḥ tamīsaṃ vai śahasraśaḥ /
analyzed: tatas paśyanti hi gaṇāḥ tamīsam vai śahasraśas
sahasra vaktra caraṇam sahastra bhujam īśvaram
daṇḍa pāṇim su durdṛśyam lokaiḥ vyāptam samantataḥ
daṇḍa saṃsthā asya dṛśyante deva praharaṇāḥ tathā

original: tata ekamukhaṃ bhūyo dadṛśuḥ śaṅkaraṃ gaṇāḥ /
analyzed: tatas eka mukham bhūyas dadṛśuḥ śaṅkaram gaṇāḥ

original: raudraiśca vaiṣṇavaiścaiva vṛtaṃ cihnaiḥ sahasraśaḥ // VamP_41.47 //
analyzed: raudraiḥ ca vaiṣṇavaiḥ ca eva vṛtam cihnaiḥ sahasraśas
khaga dhvajam vṛṣa ārūḍham vṛṣa dhvajam

original: yathā yathā trinayano rūpaṃ dhatte guṇāgraṇīḥ /
analyzed: yathā yathā tri nayanaḥ rūpam dhatte guṇāgraṇīḥ

original: tathā tathā tvajāyanta mahāpāśupatā gaṇāḥ // VamP_41.49 //
analyzed: tathā tathā tu ajāyanta mahā pāśupatāḥ gaṇāḥ
tatas bhavat ca eka rūpī śaṅkaraḥ bahu rūpavān
dvi rūpaḥ ca abhavat yogī eka rūpaḥ pi arūpavān

original: kṣaṇācchvetaḥ kṣaṇād raktaḥ pīto nīlaḥ kṣaṇādapi // VamP_41.50 //
analyzed: kṣaṇāt śvetaḥ kṣaṇāt raktaḥ pītaḥ nīlaḥ kṣaṇāt api
miśrakaḥ varṇa hīnaḥ ca mahāpāśupataḥ tathā

original: kṣaṇād bhavati rudrendraḥ kṣaṇācchaṃbhuḥ prabhākaraḥ // VamP_41.51 //
analyzed: kṣaṇāt bhavati rudra indraḥ kṣaṇāt śaṃbhuḥ prabhākaraḥ
kṣaṇa arddhāt śaṅkaraḥ viṣṇuḥ kṣaṇāt śarvaḥ pitāmahaḥ
tatas tat adbhutatamam dṛṣṭvā śaiva ādayaḥ gaṇāḥ
ajānanta tad aikyena brahma viṣṇu īśa bhāskarān
yadā abhinnam amanyanta devedevam sadāśivam
tadā nirdhūta pāpāḥ te samajāyanta pārṣadāḥ
teṣu evam dhūta pāpeṣu abhinneṣu hari īśvaraḥ
prīta ātmā vibabho śaṃśuḥ bravīt vacaḥ

original: parituṣṭo 'smi vaḥ sarve jñānenānena suvratāḥ // VamP_41.55 //
analyzed: parituṣṭaḥ smi vaḥ sarve jñānena anena suvratāḥ
vṛṇudhvam varam ānantyam dāsye vaḥ manasā īpsitam
ūcuḥ te dehi bhagavan varam asmākam īśvara

original: bhinnadṛṣṭyudbhavaṃ pāpaṃ yattad bhraṃśaṃ prayātu naḥ // VamP_41.56 //
analyzed: bhinnadṛṣṭi udbhavam pāpam yat tat bhraṃśam prayātu naḥ
pulastyaḥ uvāca
bāḍham iti abravīt śarvaḥ cakre nirdhūta kalpaṣān
saṃpariṣvajatā avyaktaḥ tān sarvān gaṇa yūthapān
iti vibhunā praṇata ārti hareṇa gaṇapatayaḥ vṛṣa megha rathena
śruti gadita anugamena iva mandaram girim avatatya samadhya vasantam
ācchāditaḥ giri varaḥ pramathaiḥ ghana ābhaiḥ śukla tanuḥ īśvara pāda juṣṭaḥ

original: nīlājinātatatanuḥ śaradabhravarṇo yadvad vibhāti balavān vṛṣabho harasya // VamP_41.59 //
analyzed: nīla ajina ātata tanuḥ śarad abhra varṇaḥ yadvat vibhāti balavān vṛṣabhaḥ harasya
iti śrī vāmanapurāṇe ekacatvāriśaḥ dhyāyaḥ
pulastyaḥ uvāca
etasmin antare prāptaḥ samam daityaiḥ tathā andhakaḥ
mandaram parvata śreṣṭham pramatha āśrita kandaram
pramathāḥ dṛṣṭvā cakruḥ kilakilā dhvanim
pramathāḥ ca api saṃrabdhāḥ jaghnuḥ tūryāṇi anekaśas
sa ca avṛṇot mahā nādaḥ rodasī pralaya upamaḥ
śuśrāva vāyu mārga sthaḥ vighna rājaḥ vināyakaḥ
samabhyayāt su saṃkruddhaḥ pramathaiḥ abhisaṃvṛtaḥ

original: mandaraṃ parvataśreṣṭhaṃ dadṛśe pitaraṃ tathā // VamP_42.4 //
analyzed: mandaram parvata śreṣṭham dadṛśe pitaram tathā
praṇipatya tathā bhaktyā vākyam āha maheśvaram

original: kiṃ tiṣṭhasi jagannātha samuttiṣṭha raṇotsukaḥ // VamP_42.5 //
analyzed: kim tiṣṭhasi jagannātha samuttiṣṭha raṇa utsukaḥ
tatas vighneśa vacanāt jagannāthaḥ mbikām vacaḥ
prāha yāsye ndhakam hantum stheyam eva apramattayā

original: tato girisutā devaṃ samāliṅgya punaḥ punaḥ /
analyzed: tatas girisutā devam samāliṅgya punar punar

original: samīkṣya sasnehaharaṃ prāha gaccha jayāndhakam // VamP_42.7 //
analyzed: samīkṣya sa sneha haram prāha gaccha jaya andhakam
tatas mara guroḥ gaurī candanam rocana añjanam
prativandya su saṃprītā pādau eva abhyavandata

original: tato haraḥ prāha vaco yaśasyaṃ mālinīmapi /
analyzed: tatas haraḥ prāha vacaḥ yaśasyam mālinīm api

original: jayāṃ ca vijayāṃ caiva jayantīṃ cāparājitām // VamP_42.9 //
analyzed: jayām ca vijayām ca eva jayantīm ca aparājitām
yuṣmābhiḥ apramattābhiḥ stheyam gehe su rakṣite
rakṣaṇīyā prayatnena giri putrī pramādataḥ

original: iti saṃdiśya tāḥ sarvāḥ samāruhya vṛṣaṃ vibhuḥ /
analyzed: iti saṃdiśya tāḥ sarvāḥ samāruhya vṛṣam vibhuḥ

original: nirjagāma gṛhāt tuṣṭo jayepsuḥ śūladhṛg balī // VamP_42.11 //
analyzed: nirjagāma gṛhāt tuṣṭaḥ jaya īpsuḥ śūladhṛk balī
nirgacchataḥ tu bhavanāt īśvarasya gaṇa adhipāḥ
samantāt parivārya eva jaya śabdān ca cakrire

original: raṇāya nirgacchati lokapāle maheśvare śūladhare maharṣe /
analyzed: raṇāya nirgacchati lokapāle maheśvare śūla dhare mahā ṛṣe

original: śubhāni saumyāni sumaṅgalāni jātānī cihnāni jayāya śaṃbhoḥ // VamP_42.13 //
analyzed: śubhāni saumyāni su maṅgalāni cihnāni jayāya śaṃbhoḥ

original: śivā sthitā vāmatare 'tha bhāge prayāti cāgre svanamunnadantī /
analyzed: śivā sthitā vāmatare bhāge prayāti ca agre svanam unnadantī

original: kravyādasaṃghāś ca tathāmiṣaiṇaḥ prayānti hṛṣṭāstṛṣitāsṛgarthe // VamP_42.14 //
analyzed: kravyāda saṃghāḥ ca tathā āmiṣa eṇaḥ prayānti hṛṣṭāḥ tṛṣita asṛj arthe
dakṣiṇa aṅgam nakha antam vai samakampata śūlinaḥ

original: śakuniś cāpi hārīto maunī yāti parāṅgamukhaḥ // VamP_42.15 //
analyzed: śakuniḥ ca api hārītaḥ maunī yāti para aṅga mukhaḥ
nimittāni īdṛśān dṛṣṭvā bhūta bhavya bhavaḥ vibhuḥ

original: śailādiṃ prāha vacanaṃ sasmitaṃ śaśiśekharaḥ // VamP_42.16 //
analyzed: śailādim prāha vacanam sa smitam śaśiśekharaḥ
haraḥ uvāca

original: nandin jajo 'dya me bhāvī na kathañcit parājayaḥ /
analyzed: nandin me bhāvī na kathañcid parājayaḥ
nimittāni iha dṛsyante saṃbhūtāni gaṇeśvara
tat śaṃbhu vacanam śrutvā śailādiḥ prāha saṃkaram

original: kaḥ saṃdeho mahādeva yat tvaṃ jayasi śātravān // VamP_42.18 //
analyzed: kaḥ saṃdehaḥ mahādeva yat tvam jayasi śātravān
tat śaṃbhu vacanam śrutvā śailādiḥ prāha śaṅkaram
samādideśa yuddhāya mahāpaśupataiḥ saha
te bhyetya dānava balam mardayanti sma vegitāḥ
nānā śastra dharāḥ vīrāḥ vṛkṣān aśanayaḥ yathā
te vadhyamānāḥ balibhiḥ pramathaiḥ daitya dānavāḥ
pravṛttāḥ pramathān hantum kūṭamudgara pāṇayaḥ
tatas mbara tale devāḥ sa indra viṣṇu pitāmahāḥ
sa sūrya agni purogāḥ tu samāyātāḥ didṛkṣavaḥ
tatas mbara tale ghoṣaḥ sa svanaḥ samajāyata
gīta vādya ādi saṃmiśraḥ dundubhīnām kali priya
tatas paśyatsu deveṣu mahāpāśupata ādayaḥ

original: gaṇāstaddānavaṃ sainyaṃ jighāṃsanti sma kopitāḥ // VamP_42.24 //
analyzed: gaṇāḥ tat dānavam sainyam jighāṃsanti sma kopitāḥ
catur aṅga balam dṛṣṭvā hanyamānam gaṇeśvaraiḥ
krodha anvitaḥ tuhuṇḍaḥ tu vegonā abisasāra ha
ādāya parigham ghoram paṭṭa udbddham ayasmayam
rājatam rājate tyartham indra dhvajam iva ucchritam

original: taṃ bhrāmayāno balavān nijaghāna raṇe gaṇān /
analyzed: tam bhrāmayānaḥ balavān nijaghāna raṇe gaṇān
rudra ādyāḥ skanda paryantāḥ te bhajyanta bhaya āturāḥ
tat prabhagnam balam dṛṣṭvā gaṇanāthaḥ vināyakaḥ
samādravata vegena tuhuṇḍam danuruṅgavam
āpatantam gaṇapatim dṛṣṭvā daityaḥ durātmavān
parigham pātayāmāsa gumbha pṛṣṭhe mahā balaḥ
vināyakasya tad kumbhe parigham vajra bhūṣaṇam

original: śatadhā tvagamad brahman meroḥ kūṭa ivāśaniḥ // VamP_42.30 //
analyzed: śatadhā tu agamat brahman meroḥ kūṭe iva aśaniḥ

original: parighaṃ viphalaṃ dṛṣṭvā samāyāntaṃ ca pārṣadam /
analyzed: parigham viphalam dṛṣṭvā samāyāntam ca pārṣadam

original: babandha bāhupāśena rāhū rakṣan hi mātulam // VamP_42.31 //
analyzed: babandha bāhu pāśena rāhuḥ rakṣan hi mātulam
sa baddhaḥ bāhu pāsena balāt ākṛṣya dānavam
samājaghāna śiraśi kuṭhāreṇa mahodaraḥ

original: kāṣṭhavat sa dvidhā bhūto nipapāta dharātale /
analyzed: kāṣṭha vat sa dvidhā bhūtaḥ nipapāta dharā tale
tathā api na atyajat rāhuḥ balavān dānava īśvaraḥ

original: sa mokṣārthe 'karod yatnaṃ na śaśāka ca nārada // VamP_42.33 //
analyzed: sa mokṣa arthe karot yatnam na śaśāka ca nārada

original: vināyakaṃ saṃyatamīkṣya rāhuṇā kuṇḍodaro nāma gaṇeśvaro 'tha /
analyzed: vināyakam saṃyatam īkṣya rāhuṇā kuṇḍodaraḥ nāma

original: pragṛhya tūrṇa muśalaṃ mahātmā rāhuṃ durātmānamasau jaghāna // VamP_42.34 //
analyzed: pragṛhya tūrṇa muśalam mahātmā rāhum durātmānam asau jaghāna

original: tato gaṇeśaḥ kalaśadhvajastu prāsena rāhuṃ hṛdaye bibheda /
analyzed: tatas gaṇeśaḥ kalaśadhvajaḥ tu prāsena rāhum hṛdaye bibheda

original: ghaṭodaro vai gadayā jaghāna khaḍgena rakṣo 'dhipatiḥ sukeśī // VamP_42.35 //
analyzed: ghaṭodaraḥ vai gadayā jaghāna khaḍgena rakṣaḥ dhipatiḥ sukeśī
sa taiḥ caturbhiḥ paritāḍyamānaḥ gaṇādhipam rāhuḥ atha utsasarja
saṃtyakta mātraḥ tha paraśvadhena tuhuṇmūrddhānam atho bibheda

original: hate tuhuṇḍe vimukhe ca rāhau gaṇeśvarāḥ krodhaviṣaṃ mumukṣavaḥ /
analyzed: hate tuhuṇḍe vimukhe ca rāhau gaṇeśvarāḥ krodha viṣam mumukṣavaḥ
pañca eka kāla anala sannikāśāḥ viśānti senām danu puṅgavānām
tām badhyamānām sva camūm samīkṣya cabaliḥ balī māruta tulya vegaḥ

original: gadāṃ samāvidhya jaghāna mūrdhni vināyakaṃ kumbhataṭe kare ca // VamP_42.38 //
analyzed: gadām samāvidhya jaghāna mūrdhni vināyakam kumbha taṭe kare ca
kuṇḍodaram bhagna kaṭim cakāra mahodaram śīrṇa śiraḥ kapālam
kumbha dhvajam cūrṇita saṃdhi bandham ghaṭa udaram ca ūru vibhinna saṃdhim

original: gaṇādhipāṃstān vimukhān sa kṛtvā balanvito vīrataro 'surendraḥ /
analyzed: gaṇa adhipān tān vimukhān sa kṛtvā bala nvitaḥ sura indraḥ

original: samabhyadhāvat tvarito nihantuṃ gaṇeśvarān skandaviśākhamukhyān // VamP_42.40 //
analyzed: samabhyadhāvat tvaritaḥ nihantum gaṇeśvarān skanda viśākha mukhyān

original: tamāpatantaṃ bhagavān samīkṣya maheśvaraḥ śreṣṭhatamaṃ gaṇānām /
analyzed: tam āpatantam bhagavān samīkṣya maheśvaraḥ śreṣṭhatamam gaṇānām

original: śailādimāmantrya vaco babhāṣe gacchasva daityān jahi vīra yuddha // VamP_42.41 //
analyzed: śailādim āmantrya vacaḥ babhāṣe gacchasva daityān jahi vīra yuddha
iti evam uktaḥ vṛṣabhadhvajena vajram samādāya śilāda sūnuḥ

original: baliṃ sambhyetya jaghāna mūrdhni saṃmohitaḥ so 'vanimāsasāda // VamP_42.42 //
analyzed: balim sambhyetya jaghāna mūrdhni saṃmohitaḥ saḥ vanim āsasāda

original: saṃmohitaṃ bhrātṛsutaṃ viditvā balī kujambho musalaṃ pragṛhya /
analyzed: saṃmohitam bhrātṛ sutam viditvā balī kujambhaḥ musalam pragṛhya

original: saṃbhrāmayaṃstūrṇataraṃ sa vegāt sasarja nandiṃ prati jātakopaḥ // VamP_42.43 //
analyzed: saṃbhrāmayan tūrṇataram sa vegāt sasarja nandim prati jāta kopaḥ

original: tamāpatantaṃ musalaṃ pragṛhya kareṇa tūrṇa bhagavān sa nandī /
analyzed: tam āpatantam musalam pragṛhya kareṇa tūrṇa bhagavān sa nandī

original: jaghāna tenaiva kujambhamāhave sa prāṇahīno nipapāta bhūmau // VamP_42.44 //
analyzed: jaghāna tena eva kujambham āhave sa prāṇa hīnaḥ nipapāta bhūmau

original: hatvā kujambhaṃ musalena nandī vajreṇa vīraḥ śataśo jaghāna /
analyzed: hatvā kujambham musalena nandī vajreṇa vīraḥ śataśas jaghāna

original: te vadhyamānā gaṇanāyakena duryodhanaṃ vai śaraṇaṃ prapannāḥ // VamP_42.45 //
analyzed: te vadhyamānāḥ gaṇanāyakena duryodhanam vai śaraṇam prapannāḥ
duryodhanaḥ prekṣya gaṇādhipena vajra apahāraiḥ nihatān ditīśān

original: prāsaṃ samāvidhya taḍitprakāśaṃ nandiṃ pracikṣepa hato 'si vai bruvan // VamP_42.46 //
analyzed: prāsam samāvidhya taḍit prakāśam nandim pracikṣepa hataḥ vai bruvan

original: tamāpatantaṃ kuliśena nandī bibheda guhyaṃ piśuno yathā naraḥ /
analyzed: tam āpatantam kuliśena nandī bibheda guhyam piśunaḥ yathā naraḥ

original: tatprāsamālakṣya tadā nikṛttaṃ saṃvarttya muṣṭiṃ gaṇamāsasāda // VamP_42.47 //
analyzed: tad prāsam ālakṣya tadā nikṛttam saṃvarttya muṣṭim gaṇam āsasāda

original: tato 'sya nandī kulisena tṛrṇa śiro 'cchinat tālaphalaprakāśam /
analyzed: tatas sya nandī kulisena śiraḥ chinat tāla phala prakāśam

original: hato 'tha bhūmau nipapāta vegād daityāśca bhītā vigatā diśo daśa // VamP_42.48 //
analyzed: bhūmau nipapāta vegāt daityāḥ ca bhītāḥ vigatāḥ diśaḥ daśa

original: tato hataṃ svaṃ tanayaṃ nirīkṣya hastī tadā nandinamājagāma /
analyzed: tatas hatam svam tanayam nirīkṣya hastī tadā nandinam ājagāma
pragṛhya bāṇāsanam ugra vegam bibheda bāṇaiḥ yama daṇḍa kalpaiḥ
gaṇān sandīn vṛṣabha dhvajān tān dhārābhiḥ eva ambuḥ astu śailān
te chādyamāna asura bāma jālaiḥ vināyaka ādyāḥ samantāt

original: parāṅmukhān vīkṣya gaṇān kumāraḥ śaktyā pṛṣatkāntha vārayitvā /
analyzed: parāṅmukhān vīkṣya gaṇān kumāraḥ śaktyā pṛṣatkāntha vārayitvā

original: tūrṇaṃ sabhabhyetya ripuṃ samīkṣya pragṛhya śaktyā hṛdaye vibheda // VamP_42.51 //
analyzed: tūrṇam ripum samīkṣya pragṛhya śaktyā hṛdaye vibheda
śakti nirbhinna hṛdayaḥ hastī bhūmyām papāta ha

original: mamāra cāripṛtanā jātā bhūyaḥ parāṅmukhī // VamP_42.52 //
analyzed: mamāra ca ari pṛtanā jātā bhūyas parāṅmukhī
amarāri balam dṛṣṭvā bhagnam kruddhāḥ gaṇeśvarāḥ

original: purato nandinaṃ kṛtvā jighāṃsanti sma dānavān // VamP_42.53 //
analyzed: puratas nandinam kṛtvā jighāṃsanti sma dānavān
te vadhyamānāḥ pramathaiḥ daityāḥ ca api parāṅmukhāḥ
bhūyas nivṛttāḥ balinaḥ kārttasvara purogamāḥ
tān nivṛttān samīkṣya eva krodha dīpta īkṣaṇaḥ śva śasan
nandiṣeṇaḥ vyāghramukhaḥ nivṛttaḥ ca api vegavān
tasmin nivṛtte gaṇape paṭṭiśa agra kare tadā
kārttasvaraḥ nivavṛte gadām ādāya nārada
tam āpatantam jvalana prakāśam gamaḥ samīkṣya eva mahā asura indram

original: taṃ paṭṭiśaṃ bhrāmya jaghāna mūrdhni kārtasvaraṃ visvaramunnadantam // VamP_42.57 //
analyzed: tam paṭṭiśam bhrāmya jaghāna mūrdhni kārtasvaram visvaram unnadantam
tasmin hate samāvidhya turaṅga kandharaḥ

original: babandha vīraḥ saha paṭṭiśena gaṇeśvaraṃ cāpyatha nandiṣeṇam // VamP_42.58 //
analyzed: babandha vīraḥ saha paṭṭiśena gaṇeśvaram ca api atha nandiṣeṇam

original: nandiṣeṇaṃ tathā baddhaṃ samīkṣya balināṃ varaḥ /
analyzed: nandiṣeṇam tathā baddham samīkṣya balinām varaḥ
viśākhaḥ kapitaḥ bhyetya śaktipāṇiḥ avasthitaḥ
tam dṛṣṭvā balinām śreṣṭhaḥ pāśa pāṇiḥ ayaḥśirāḥ
saṃyodhayāmāsa balī viśākham kukkuṭadhvajam
viśākham saṃniruddham vai raṇe
śākhaḥ ca naigameyaḥ ca tūrṇam ādravatām ripum
ekatas naigameyena bhinnaḥ śaktyā tu ayaḥsirāḥ
śākhaḥ ca naigameyaḥ ca tūrṇam ādravatām ripum

original: sa tribhiḥ śaṅkarasutaiḥ pīḍyamāno jahau paṇam /
analyzed: sa tribhiḥ śaṅkara sutaiḥ pīḍyamānaḥ jahau paṇam

original: te prāptāḥ śambaraṃ tūrṇaṃ prekṣyamāṇā gaṇeśvarāḥ // VamP_42.63 //
analyzed: te prāptāḥ śambaram tūrṇam prekṣyamāṇāḥ gaṇeśvarāḥ
pāśam śaktyā samāhatya caturbhiḥ śaṅkara ātmajaiḥ
jagāma vilayam tūrṇam ākāsāt iva bhū talam
pāśe nirāśa tām yāte śambaraḥ kātara īkṣaṇaḥ

original: diśo 'tha bheje devarṣe kumāraḥ sainyamardayat // VamP_42.65 //
analyzed: diśaḥ tha bheje deva ṛṣe kumāraḥ sainyam ardayat
taiḥ vadhyamānā pṛtanā mahā ṛṣe sā adānavī rudra sutaiḥ gaṇaiḥ ca

original: viṣaṇṇārūpā bhayavihvalāṅgī jagāma sukraṃ śaraṇaṃ bhayārtā // VamP_42.66 //
analyzed: viṣaṇṇā rūpā bhaya vihvala aṅgī jagāma sukram śaraṇam bhaya ārtā
iti śrī vāmanapurāṇe dvicatvāriṃśaḥ dhyāyaḥ
pulastyaḥ uvāca
tatas svaisainyam ālakṣya nihatam pramathaiḥ atha

original: andhako 'bhyetya śukraṃ tu idaṃ vacanamabravīt // VamP_43.1 //
analyzed: andhakaḥ bhyetya śukram tu idam vacanam abravīt
bhagavan tvām mā āśritya vayam bādhāma devatāḥ
atha anyān api vipra ṛṣe gandharva sura kinnarān

original: tadiyaṃ paśya bhagavan mayā guptā varūthinī /
analyzed: tat iyam paśya bhagavat mayā guptā varūthinī

original: anāthena yathā nārī pramathairapi kālyate // VamP_43.3 //
analyzed: anāthena yathā nārī pramathaiḥ api kālyate
kujambha ādyāḥ ca nihatāḥ bhrātaraḥ mama bhārgava
akṣayāḥ pramathāḥ ca amī kurukṣetra phalam yathā

original: tasmāt kuruṣva śreyo no na jīyema yathā paraiḥ /
analyzed: tasmāt kuruṣva śreyaḥ naḥ na jīyema yathā paraiḥ

original: jayema ca parān yuddhe tathā tvaṃ kurtumarhasi // VamP_43.5 //
analyzed: jayema ca parān yuddhe tathā tvam kurtum arhasi
śukraḥ ndhaka vacaḥ śrutvā sāntvayan parama adbhutam
vacanam prāha deva ṛṣe brahmarṣiḥ dānava īśvaram

original: tvaddhitārtha yatiṣyāmi kariṣyāmi tava priyam // VamP_43.6 //
analyzed: tvad hita artha yatiṣyāmi kariṣyāmi tava priyam
iti evam uktvā vacanam vidyām saṃjīvanīm kaviḥ
tadā vidhānena śuci vrataḥ
tasyām āvartyamānāyām vidyāyām asura īśvarāḥ

original: ye hatāḥ prathamaṃ yuddhe dānavāste samutthitāḥ // VamP_43.8 //
analyzed: ye hatāḥ prathamam yuddhe dānavāḥ te samutthitāḥ
kujambha ādiṣu daityeṣu nandī śaṅkaram abravīt
yuddhāya abhyāgateṣu eva nandī śaṅkaram abravīt

original: mahādeva vaco mahyaṃ śṛṇu tvaṃ paramādbhutam /
analyzed: mahādeva vacaḥ mahyam śṛṇu tvam parama adbhutam

original: avicintyamasahyaṃ ca mṛtānāṃ jīvanaṃ punaḥ // VamP_43.10 //
analyzed: a vicintyam asahyam ca mṛtānām jīvanam punar
ye hatāḥ pramathaiḥ daityāḥ yathāśaktyā raṇa ajire

original: te samujjīvitā bhūyo bhārgāveṇātha vidyāyā // VamP_43.11 //
analyzed: te samujjīvitāḥ bhūyas bhārgāveṇa atha vidyāyā
tat idam taiḥ mahādeva mahat karma kṛtam raṇe
saṃjātam su alpam eva īśa śukra vidyā bala akṣayam
iti evam ukte vacane nandinā kula nandinā
pratyuvāca prabhuḥ prītya sva artha sādhanam uttamam
gaccha sukram gaṇapate mama antikam upānaya

original: ahaṃ taṃ saṃyamiṣyāmi yathāyogaṃ sametya hi // VamP_43.14 //
analyzed: aham tam saṃyamiṣyāmi yathāyogam sametya hi
iti evam uktaḥ rudreṇa nandī gaṇapatiḥ tatas
samājagāma daityānām camum śukra jighṛkṣayā
tam dadarśa asura śreṣṭhaḥ balavān haya kandharaḥ

original: saṃrurodha tadā mārgaṃ sihasyeva paśurvane // VamP_43.16 //
analyzed: saṃrurodha tadā mārgam sihasya iva paśuḥ vane
samupetya ahanat nandī vajreṇa śataparvaṇā

original: sa papātātha niḥsaṃjño yayau nandī tatastvaran // VamP_43.17 //
analyzed: sa papāta atha niḥsaṃjñaḥ yayau nandī tatas tvaran
tatas kujambhaḥ jambhaḥ ca balaḥ vṛtraḥ tu ayaḥśirāḥ
pañca dānava śārdulāḥ nandinam samupādravan
tathā anye dānava śreṣṭha maya hlāda purogamāḥ
nānā praharaṇāḥ yuddhe gaṇanātham abhidravan
tatas gaṇānām adhipam kuṭyamānam mahā balaiḥ
samapaśyanta devāḥ tam pitāmaha purogamāḥ

original: taṃ dṛṣṭvā bhagavān brahma prāha śakrapurogamān /
analyzed: tam dṛṣṭvā bhagavān brahma prāha śakra purogamān
sāhāyyam kriyatām śaṃbhoḥ etat antaram uttamam
pitāmaha uktam vacanam śrutvā devāḥ sa vāsavāḥ
samāpatanta vegena śiva sainyam atha ambarāt
teṣām āpatatām vegaḥ pramathānām bale babhau
āpagānām mahā vegam patantīnām mahā arṇave
tatas halahalā śabdaḥ samajāyata ca ubhayoḥ
balayoḥ ghora saṃkāśaḥ sura pramathayoḥ atha
tam antaram upāgamya nandī saṃgṛhya vegavān

original: rathād bhārgavamākrāmat siṃhaḥ kṣudramṛgaṃ yathā // VamP_43.25 //
analyzed: rathāt bhārgavam ākrāmat siṃhaḥ kṣudra mṛgam yathā
tam ādāya hara abhyāśam āgamat gaṇanāyakaḥ

original: nipātya rakṣiṇaḥ sarvānatha śukraṃ nyavedayat // VamP_43.26 //
analyzed: nipātya rakṣiṇaḥ sarvān atha śukram nyavedayat

original: tamānītaṃ kaviṃ śarvaḥ prākṣipad vadane prabhuḥ /
analyzed: tam ānītam kavim śarvaḥ prākṣipat vadane prabhuḥ

original: bhārgavaṃ tvāvṛtatanuṃ jaṭhare sa nyaveśayat // VamP_43.27 //
analyzed: bhārgavam tu āvṛta tanum jaṭhare sa nyaveśayat
sa śaṃbhunā kavi śrṣṭhaḥ grastaḥ jaṭharam āsthitaḥ
tuṣṭāva bhagavān tam tam muniḥ vāgbhiḥ atha ādarāt
śukraḥ uvāca
vara dāya namaḥ tubhyam harāya guṇa śāline

original: śaṅkarāya maheśāya tryambakāya namo namaḥ // VamP_43.29 //
analyzed: śaṅkarāya maheśāya tryambakāya namaḥ namaḥ
jīvanāya namaḥ tubhyam loka nātha vṛṣākape

original: madanāgne kālaśatro vāmadevāya te namaḥ // VamP_43.30 //
analyzed: madana agne kāla śatro vāmadevāya te namaḥ
sthāṇave viśvarūpāya vāmanāya sadāgate

original: mahādevāya śarvāya īśvarāya namo namaḥ // VamP_43.31 //
analyzed: mahādevāya śarvāya īśvarāya namaḥ namaḥ

original: trinayana hara bhava śaṅkara umāpate jīmūtaketo śuhāgṛha śmaśānanirata bhūtivilepana sūlapāṇe paśupate gopate tatpuruṣasattma namo namaste
analyzed: trinayana hara bhava śaṅkara umāpate jīmūtaketo śuhā gṛha śmaśāna nirata bhūti vilepana sūlapāṇe paśupate gopate tatpuruṣa sattma namaḥ namaḥ te

original: itthaṃ stutaḥ kavivarema haro 'tha bhaktyā prīto varaṃ varaya dadmi tavetyuvāca /
analyzed: ittham stutaḥ bhaktyā prītaḥ varam varaya dadmi tava iti uvāca

original: sa prāha devavara dehi varaṃ mamādya yadvai tavaiva jaṭharāt pratinirgamo 'stu // VamP_43.32 //
analyzed: sa prāha deva vara dehi varam mama adya yat vai tava eva jaṭharāt

original: tato haro 'kṣīṇi tadā nirudhya prāha dvijendrādya vinirgamasva /
analyzed: tatas haro kṣīṇi tadā nirudhya prāha dvijendra adya vinirgamasva

original: ityuktamātro vibhunā cacāra devodare bhārgavapuṅgavastu // VamP_43.33 //
analyzed: iti ukta mātraḥ vibhunā cacāra deva udare bhārgava puṅgavaḥ tu
paribhraman dadarśa atha śaṃbhoḥ eva udare kaviḥ
bhuvana arṇava pātālān vṛtān sthāvarajaṅmaiḥ
ādityān vasavaḥ rudrān viśvedevān gaṇān tathā
yakṣān kiṃpuruṣa ādi ādīn gandharva apsarasām gaṇān
munīn manuja sādhyān ca paśu kīṭa pipīlikān

original: vṛkṣagulmān girīn vallyaḥ phalamūlauṣadhāni ca // VamP_43.36 //
analyzed: vṛkṣa gulmān girīn vallyaḥ phala mūla auṣadhāni ca
sthāla sthān ca jala sthān ca animiṣān nimiṣān api
catuṣpadān sa dvipadān sthāvarān jaṅgamān api
avyaktān ca eva vyaktān ca sa guṇān nirguṇān api
sa dṛṣṭvā kautuka āviṣṭaḥ paribabhrāma bhārgavaḥ

original: tatrāsato bhārgavasya divyaḥ saṃvatsaro gataḥ // VamP_43.38 //
analyzed: tatra āsataḥ bhārgavasya divyaḥ saṃvatsaraḥ gataḥ
na ca anam alabhat brahman tatas śrāntaḥ bhavat kaviḥ

original: sa śrantaṃ vīkṣya cātmānaṃ nālabhannirgamaṃ vaśī /
analyzed: sa śrantam vīkṣya ca ātmānam na alabhat nirgamam vaśī
bhikti namraḥ mahādevam śaraṇam samupāgam
śukraḥ uvāca
viśvarūpa mahārūpa viśvarūpa akṣa sūtradhṛk

original: sahasrākṣa mahādeva tvāmahaṃ śaraṇaṃ gataḥ // VamP_43.40 //
analyzed: sahasrākṣa mahādeva tvām aham śaraṇam gataḥ

original: namo 'stu te śaṅkara śarva śaṃbho sahasranetrāṅghribhujaṅgabhūṣaṇa /
analyzed: namaḥ stu te śaṅkara śarva śaṃbho sahasranetra aṅghri bhujaṅga bhūṣaṇa

original: dṛṣṭvaiva sarvān bhuvanāṃstavodare śrānto bhavantaṃ śaraṇaṃ prapannaḥ // VamP_43.41 //
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā eva sarvān bhuvanān tava udare śrāntaḥ bhavantam śaraṇam prapannaḥ

original: ityevamukte vacane mahātmā śaṃbhurvacaḥ prāha tato vihasya /
analyzed: iti evam ukte vacane mahātmā śaṃbhuḥ vacaḥ prāha tatas vihasya

original: nirgaccha putro 'si mamādhunā tvaṃ śiśnena bho bhārgavavaṃśacandra // VamP_43.42 //
analyzed: nirgaccha mama adhunā tvam śiśnena bho bhārgava vaṃśa candra

original: nāmnā tu śukreti carācarāstvāṃ stoṣyanti naivātra vicāramanyat /
analyzed: nāmnā tu śukrā iti carācarāḥ tvām stoṣyanti nā evā atra vicāram anyat

original: ityevamuktvā bhagavān mumoca śiśnena śukraṃ sa ca nirjagāma // VamP_43.43 //
analyzed: iti evam uktvā bhagavān mumoca śiśnena śukram sa ca nirjagāma
vinirgataḥ bhārgau avaṃśacandraḥ śukra tvam āpadya mahā anubhāvaḥ

original: praṇamya śaṃbhuṃ sa jagāma tūrṇa mahāsurāṇāṃ balamuttamaujāḥ // VamP_43.44 //
analyzed: praṇamya śaṃbhum sa jagāma tūrṇa mahā asurāṇām balam uttama ojāḥ
bhārgave punar āyāte dānavāḥ muditāḥ abhavan
punar yuddhāya vidadhuḥ matim saha gaṇeśvaraiḥ
gaṇeśvarāḥ tān asurān saha amarā gaṇaiḥ atha

original: yuyudhuḥ saṃkulaṃ yuddhaṃ sarva eva jayepsavaḥ // VamP_43.46 //
analyzed: yuyudhuḥ saṃkulam yuddham sarve eva jaya īpsavaḥ
sura gaṇānām ca devatānām ca yudhyatām
dvandva yuddhūm samabhavat ghora rūpam tapodhana
andhakaḥ nandinam yuddham śaṅkukarṇam tu ayaḥśirāḥ
kumbhadhvajam baliḥ dhīmān nandiṣeṇam virocanaḥ
aśvagrīvaḥ viśākham ca śākhaḥ vṛtram ayodhayat
vāṇaḥ tathā naigameyam balam rākṣasa puṅgavaḥ
vināyakaḥ māhāvīrya paraśvadha dharaḥ raṇe
saṃkruddhaḥ rākṣasa śreṣṭham tuhuṇḍam samayodhayat
duryodhanaḥ ca balinam ghaṇṭākarṇam ayodhayat

original: hastī ca kuṇḍajaṭharaṃ hlādo vīraṃ ghaṭodaram /
analyzed: hastī ca kuṇḍajaṭharam hlādaḥ vīram ghaṭodaram

original: ete hi balināṃ śreṣṭhā dānavāḥ pramathāstathā /
analyzed: ete hi balinām śreṣṭhāḥ dānavāḥ pramathāḥ tathā

original: saṃyodhayanti devarṣe divyābdānāṃ śatani ṣaṭ // VamP_43.51 //
analyzed: saṃyodhayanti deva ṛṣe divya abdānām ṣaṣ
śatakratum atha āyāntam vajrapāṇim abhisthitam

original: vārayāmāsa balavān jambho nāma mahāsuraḥ // VamP_43.52 //
analyzed: vārayāmāsa balavān jambhaḥ nāma mahā asuraḥ
sambhunāmā asura patiḥ sa
mahā ojasam kujambhaḥ ca viṣṇum daitya anta kāriṇam
vivasvantam raṇe śālvaḥ varuṇam triśirāḥ tathā

original: dvimūrdhā pavanaṃ somaṃ rāhurmitraṃ virūpadhṛk // VamP_43.54 //
analyzed: dvi mūrdhā pavanam somam rāhuḥ mitram virūpa dhṛk

original: aṣṭau ye vasavaḥ khyātā dharādyāste mahāsurān /
analyzed: aṣṭau ye vasavaḥ khyātāḥ dharā ādyāḥ te mahā asurān
aṣṭau eva mahā iṣvāsān vārayāmāsuḥ āhave
sarabhaḥ śalakṣaḥ pākaḥ vipṛthuḥ pṛthuḥ
vātā api ca ilvalaḥ ca eva nānā śastra astra yodhinaḥ
viśvedeva gaṇān sarvān viṣvaksena purogamān

original: eka eva raṇe raudraḥ kālanemirmahāsuraḥ // VamP_43.57 //
analyzed: ekaḥ eva raṇe raudraḥ kālanemiḥ mahā asuraḥ
ekādaśā eva ye rudrāḥ tān ekaḥ pi raṇa utkaṭaḥ
yodhayāmāsa tejasvī vidyunmālī mahā asuraḥ
dvau aśvinau ca narakaḥ bhāskarān eva śambaraḥ
sādhyān marut gaṇān ca eva nivāta kavaca ādayaḥ
evam dvandrava sahasrāṇi pramatha amara dānavaiḥ

original: kṛtāni ca surābdānāṃ daśatīḥ ṣaṭ mahāmune // VamP_43.60 //
analyzed: kṛtāni ca sura abdānām daśatīḥ ṣaḍ mahā mune
yadā na śakitāḥ yoddhum daivataiḥ amara arayaḥ

original: tadā māyaṃ samāśritya grasantaḥ kramaśo 'vyayān // VamP_43.61 //
analyzed: tadā māyam samāśritya grasantaḥ kramaśas vyayān
tatas bhavat śaila pṛṣṭham prāvṛṣ abhra sama prabhaiḥ
āvṛtam varjitam sarvaiḥ pramathaiḥ amaraiḥ api

original: dṛṣṭvā śūnyaṃ giriprasthaṃ grastāṃś ca pramathāmarān /
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā śūnyam giri prastham grastān ca pramatha amarān
krodhāt utpādayāmāsa rudraḥ jṛmbhāyikām vaśī
tayā spṛṣṭāḥ danu sutāḥ alasāḥ manda bhāṣiṇaḥ

original: vadanaṃ vikṛtaṃ kṛtvā muktaśastraṃ vijṛmbhire // VamP_43.64 //
analyzed: vadanam vikṛtam kṛtvā mukta śastram vijṛmbhire
jṛmbhamāṇeṣu ca tadā ca dānaveṣu gaṇeśvarāḥ
surāḥ ca niryayuḥ tūrṇam daitya dehebhyaḥ ākulā
megha prabhebhyaḥ daityebhyaḥ nirgacchantaḥ mara uttamāḥ

original: śobhante padmapatrākṣā meghebhya iva vidyutaḥ // VamP_43.66 //
analyzed: śobhante padma patra akṣāḥ meghebhyaḥ iva vidyutaḥ
gaṇa amareṣu ca samam nirgateṣu tapodhana
ayudhyanta mahātmānaḥ bhūyas eva ati kopitāḥ
tatas tu devaiḥ sa gaṇaiḥ dānavāḥ śarva pālitaiḥ
parājīyanta saṃgrāme bhūyas bhūyas tu aharniśam
tatas trinetraḥ svaim saṃdhyām sapta abdha śatike gate
kāle bhyupāsata tadā saḥ ṣṭādaśa bhujaḥ vyayaḥ

original: saṃspṛśyāpaḥ sarasvatyāṃ snātvā ca vidhinā haraḥ /
analyzed: saṃspṛśya apaḥ sarasvatyām snātvā ca vidhinā haraḥ
kṛtārthaḥ bhaktimān mūrdhnā puṣpa añjalim upākṣipat
tatas nanāma śirasā tatas cakre pradakṣiṇam
hiraṇya garbha iti ādityam upatasthe jajāpa ha
tvaṣṭre namaḥ namaḥ te stu samyak uccārya śūladhṛk

original: nanarta bhāvagambhīraṃ dordaṇḍaṃ bhrāmayan balāt // VamP_43.72 //
analyzed: nanarta bhāvagambhīram dos daṇḍam bhrāmayan balāt
parinṛtyati deveśe gaṇāḥ ca eva amarāḥ tathā
nṛtyante bhāva saṃyuktāḥ harasya anuvilāsinaḥ
sandhyām upāsya deveśaḥ parinṛtya yathā icchayā
yuddhāya dānavaiḥ sarvaiḥ trinetra bhuja pālitaiḥ
tatas mara gaṇāḥ sarvaiḥ trinetra bhuja pālitaiḥ
dānavāḥ nirjitāḥ sarve balibhiḥ bhaya varjitaiḥ

original: svabalaṃ nirjitaṃ dṛṣṭvā matvājeyaṃ ca śaṅkam /
analyzed: sva balam nirjitam dṛṣṭvā matvā ajeyam ca śaṅkam
andhakaḥ sundam āhūya idam vacanam abrīt

original: sunda bhrātāsi me vīra viśvasyaḥ sarvavastuṣu /
analyzed: sunda bhrātā asi me vīra viśvasyaḥ sarva vastuṣu

original: tadvadāmyadya yadvākyaṃ tacchrutvā yatkṣamaṃ kuru // VamP_43.77 //
analyzed: tat vadāmi adya yat vākyam tat śrutvā yat kṣamam kuru
raṇa paṭuḥ dharma ātmā kāraṇa antaraiḥ

original: samāsate hi hṛdaye padmākṣī śailanandinī // VamP_43.78 //
analyzed: samāsate hi hṛdaye padmākṣī śailanandinī
tat uttiṣṭhasva gacchāmaḥ yatra āste cāru hāsinī
tatra enām mohayiṣyāmi hara rūpeṇa dānava
bhavān bhavasya anucaraḥ bhava nandī gaṇa īśvaraḥ

original: tato gatvātha bhuktvā tāṃ jeṣyāmi pramathān surān // VamP_43.80 //
analyzed: tatas gatvā atha bhuktvā tām jeṣyāmi pramathān surān
iti evam ukte vacane bāḍham sundaḥ
samajāyata śailādiḥ andhakaḥ
nandi rudrau tatas bhūtvā mahā asura camūpatī
saṃprāptau mandara girim prahāraiḥ kṣata vigrahau
hastam ālambya sundasya andhakaḥ hara mandiram
viveśa nirviśaṅkena cittena asura sattamaḥ
tatas girisutā dūrāt āyāntam vīkṣya ca andhakam
maheśvara vapuḥ chnnam prahāraiḥ jarjara chavim
sundam śaila ādi rūpa stham avaṣṭamya āviśat tatas

original: taṃ dṛṣṭvā mālinīṃ prāha suyaśāṃ vijayāṃ jayām // VamP_43.85 //
analyzed: tam dṛṣṭvā mālinīm prāha suyaśām vijayām jayām

original: jaye paśyasva devasya madarthe vigrahaṃ kṛtam /
analyzed: jaye paśyasva devasya mad arthe vigraham kṛtam
śatrubhiḥ dānava varaiḥ tat uttiṣṭhasva satvaram
ghṛtam ānaya paurāṇam bījikām lavaṇam dadhi
vraṇa bhaṅgam kariṣyāmi svayam eva pinākinaḥ
kuruṣva śīghram su yaśe sva bhartuḥ vraṇa nāśanam
iti evam uktvā vacanam samatthāya varāsanāt
abhyudyayau tadā bhaktvā manyamānā vṛṣadhvajam

original: śūlapāṇestataḥ sthitvā rūpaṃ cihnāni yatnataḥ // VamP_43.89 //
analyzed: śūlapāṇeḥ tatas sthitvā rūpam cihnāni yatnataḥ
anviyeṣa tatas brahman ā ubhau pārśva sthitau vṛṣau

original: sā jñātvā dānavaṃ raudraṃ māyācchāditavigrahm // VamP_43.90 //
analyzed: sā jñātvā dānavam raudram māyā ācchādita vigrahm
apayānam tadā cakre girirāja sutā mune
devyāḥ cintitam ājñāya sundam suraḥ
samādravata vegena hara kāntām vibhāvarīm

original: samādravata daiteyo yena mārgeṇa sāgamat // VamP_43.92 //
analyzed: samādravata daiteyaḥ yena mārgeṇa sā agamat
apaskāra antaram bhañjan pāda plutibhiḥ ākulaḥ

original: tamāpatantaṃ dṛṣṭvaiva girijā prādravad bhayāt // VamP_43.93 //
analyzed: tam āpatantam dṛṣṭvā eva girijā prādravat bhayāt

original: gṛhaṃ tyaktvā hayupavanaṃ sakhībhiḥ sahitā tadā /
analyzed: gṛham tyaktvā hayu pavanam sakhībhiḥ sahitā tadā
tatra api anujagāma asau mada andhaḥ muni puṅgava

original: tathāpi na śaśaṣainaṃ tapaso gopanāya tu /
analyzed: tathā api na śaśaṣa enam tapasaḥ gopanāya tu
tad bhayāt āviśat gaurī śveta arka kusumam śuci
vijaḍayā ādyāḥ mahā gulme saṃprayātāḥ layam mune
naṣṭāyām ā atha pārvatyām bhūyas hairaṇyalocaniḥ
sundam haste samādāya sva sainyam punar āgamat
andhake purā āyāte sva balam muni sattama
prāvartata mahā yuddham pramatha asurayoḥ atha
tatas mara gaṇa śreṣṭhaḥ viṣṇuḥ cakra gadā dharaḥ
nijaghāna asura balam śaṅkara priya kāmyayā
śārṅga cāpa cyutaiḥ bāṇaiḥ saṃsyūtāḥ dānava ṛṣabhāḥ

original: pañca ṣaṭ sapta cāṣṭau vā vraghnapādairghanā iva /
analyzed: pañca ṣaḍ sapta ca aṣṭau vā vraghna pādaiḥ ghanāḥ iva
gadayā kāṃścid avadhīt cakreṇa anyān janārdanaḥ
khaṅgena ca cakarta anyān dṛṣṭyā anyān bhasma āsāt vyadhāt

original: halenākṛṣya caivānyān mu salena vyacūrṇayat // VamP_43.101 //
analyzed: halena ākṛṣya ca eva anyān salena vyacūrṇayat
garuḍaḥ pakṣapātābhyām tuṇḍena api urasā ahanat

original: sa cādipuruṣo dhātā purāṇāḥ prapitāmahaḥ // VamP_43.102 //
analyzed: sa ca ādipuruṣaḥ dhātā purāṇāḥ prapitāmahaḥ
bhrāmayan vipulam padmam abhyaṣiñcata vāriṇā
saṃspṛṣṭāḥ brahma toyena sarva tīrtha mayena hi
gaṇa amara gaṇāḥ ca āsan nava nāga śata adhikāḥ
dānavāḥ tena toyena saṃspṛṣṭāḥ ca agha hāriṇā
sa vāhanāḥ kṣayam jagmuḥ kuliśena iva parvatāḥ

original: dṛṣṭvā brahmaharī yuddhe ghātayantau mahāsurān // VamP_43.105 //
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā brahma harī yuddhe ghātayantau mahā asurān
śatakratuḥ ca dudrāva pragṛhya kuliśam balī
tam āpatantam saṃprekṣya balaḥ dānava sattamaḥ

original: muktvā devaṃ gadāpāṇiṃ vimānasthaṃ ca padmajam /
analyzed: muktvā devam gadā pāṇim vimāna stham ca padmajam
śakram evā adravat yoddhum muṣṭim udyāmya nārada
balavān dānava patiḥ ajeyaḥ deva dānavaiḥ
tam āpatantam tridaśeśvaraḥ tu doṣṇām sahasreṇa yata abalena

original: vajraṃ paribhrāmya balasya mūrdhni cikṣepa he mūḍha hato 'syudīrya // VamP_43.108 //
analyzed: vajram paribhrāmya balasya mūrdhni cikṣepa he mūḍha

original: sa tasya mūrdhni pravaro 'pi vajro jagāma tūrṇaṃ hi sahasradhā mune /
analyzed: sa tasya mūrdhni pravaraḥ pi vajraḥ jagāma tūrṇam hi sahasradhā mune

original: balo 'dravad devapatiśca bhītaḥ parāṅmukho 'bhṛt samarānmaharṣe // VamP_43.109 //
analyzed: balaḥ dravat devapatiḥ ca bhītaḥ parāṅmukhaḥ bhṛt samarāt mahā ṛṣe

original: taṃ cāpi jambho vimukhaṃ nirīkṣya bhūtvāgrataḥ prāha na yuktametat /
analyzed: tam ca api jambhaḥ vimukham nirīkṣya bhūtvā agratas prāha na yuktam etat

original: tiṣṭhasva rājāsi carācarasya na rājadharme gaditaṃ palāyanam // VamP_43.110 //
analyzed: tiṣṭhasva rājā asi carācarasya na rāja dharme gaditam palāyanam
sahasrākṣaḥ jambha vākyam nikhamya bhītaḥ tūrṇam viṣṇum āgāt mahā ṛṣe

original: upetyāha śrūyatāṃ vākyamīśa tvaṃ me nātho bhūtabhavyeśa viṣṇo // VamP_43.111 //
analyzed: upetya āha śrūyatām vākyam īśa tvam me nāthaḥ bhūta bhavya īśa viṣṇo
jambhaḥ tarjayate tyartham mām nirāyudham īkṣya hi

original: āyudhaṃ dehi bhagavān tvāmahaṃ śaraṇaṃ gataḥ // VamP_43.112 //
analyzed: āyudham dehi bhagavān tvām aham śaraṇam gataḥ

original: tamuvāca hariḥ śakraṃ tyaktvā darpa vrajādhunā /
analyzed: tam uvāca hariḥ śakram tyaktvā darpa vraja adhunā

original: prārthayasvāyudhaṃ vahniṃ sa te dāsyatyasaṃśayam // VamP_43.113 //
analyzed: prārthayasva āyudham vahnim sa te dāsyati asaṃśayam
janārdana vacaḥ śrutvā śakraḥ tvarita vikramaḥ
śaraṇam pāvakam agāt idam ca uvāca nārada
śakraḥ uvāca

original: nighnano mebalaṃ vajraṃ kṛśāno śatadhā gatam /
analyzed: nighnanaḥ mebalam vajram kṛśāno śatadhā gatam
eṣa ca āhūyate jambhaḥ tasmāt dehi āyudham mama
pulastyaḥ uvāca

original: tamāha bhagavān vahniḥ prīto 'si tava vāsava /
analyzed: tam āha bhagavān vahniḥ prītaḥ si tava vāsava

original: yattvaṃ darpa parityajya māmeva śaraṇaṃ gataḥ // VamP_43.116 //
analyzed: yat tvam darpa parityajya mām eva śaraṇam gataḥ
iti uccārya sva śaktyāḥ tu śaktim niṣkrāmya bhāvataḥ

original: prādādindrāya bhagavān rocamāno divaṃ gataḥ // VamP_43.117 //
analyzed: prādāt indrāya bhagavān rocamānaḥ divam gataḥ
tām ādāya tadā śaktim śata ghaṇṭām su dāruṇām
pratyudyayau tadā jambham hantu kāmaḥ rimardanaḥ
tena ati yaśasā daityaḥ sahasā eva abhisaṃdrutaḥ

original: krodhaṃ cakre tadā jambha nijaghāna gajādhipam // VamP_43.119 //
analyzed: krodham cakre tadā jambha nijaghāna gaja adhipam
jambha muṣṭi nipātena bhagna kumbha kaṭaḥ gajaḥ

original: nipapāta yathā śailaḥ śakravajrahataḥ purā // VamP_43.120 //
analyzed: nipapāta yathā śailaḥ śakra vajra hataḥ purā
patamānāt dvipa indrāt tu śakraḥ ca āplutya vegavān
tyaktvā eva mandara girim papāta vasudhā tale
patamāna harim śiddhāḥ cāraṇāḥ ca tadā bruvan

original: mā mā śakra patasvādya bhūtale tiṣṭha vāsava // VamP_43.122 //
analyzed: mā mā śakra patasva adya bhū tale tiṣṭha vāsava

original: sa teṣāṃ vacanaṃ śrutvā yogī tasthau kṣaṇaṃ tadā /
analyzed: sa teṣām vacanam śrutvā yogī tasthau kṣaṇam tadā

original: prāha caitān kathaṃ yotsye apatraḥ śatrubhiḥ sahaḥ // VamP_43.123 //
analyzed: prāha ca etān katham yotsye apatraḥ śatrubhiḥ sahaḥ
tam ūcuḥ deva gandharvāḥ mā viṣādam vraja īśvara

original: yudhyasva tvaṃ samāruhyapreṣayiṣyāma yadā ratham // VamP_43.124 //
analyzed: yudhyasva tvam samāruhya preṣayiṣyāma yadā ratham
iti evam uktvā vipulam ratham svastika lakṣaṇam
vānara dhvaja saṃyuktam haribhiḥ haribhiḥ yutam
śuddha jāmbhūnada mayam kiṅkiṇī jāla maṇḍitam
śakrāya preṣayāmāsuḥ viśvāvasu purogamāḥ
tam āgatam udīkṣya atha hīnam sārathinā hariḥ

original: prāha yotsye kathaṃ yuddhe saṃyamiṣye kathaṃ hayān // VamP_43.127 //
analyzed: prāha yotsye katham yuddhe saṃyamiṣye katham hayān
yadi kaścid hi sārathyam kariṣyati mama adhunā

original: tato 'haṃ ghātaye śatrūn nānyatheti kathañcana // VamP_43.128 //
analyzed: tatas ham ghātaye śatrūn na anyathā iti kathañcana
tatas bruvan te gandharvāḥ na asmākam sārathiḥ vibho
vidyate svayam eva aśvān tvam saṃyantum iha arhasi
iti evam ukte gavān tyaktvā syandanam uttamam
kṣamā talam nipapāta eva paribhraṣṭa sraj ambaraḥ
calat mauliḥ mukta kacaḥ paribhraṣṭa āyudha aṅgadaḥ

original: patamānaṃ sahasrākṣaṃ dṛṣṭvā bhūḥ samakampata // VamP_43.131 //
analyzed: patamānam sahasrākṣam dṛṣṭvā bhūḥ samakampata
pṛthivyām kampamānāyām śamīkarṣeḥ tapasvinī

original: bhāryābravīt prabho bālaṃ bahiḥ kuru yathāsukham // VamP_43.132 //
analyzed: bhāryā bravīt prabho bālam bahis kuru yathāsukham

original: sa tu śīlāvacaḥ śrutvā kimarthamiti cāvravīt /
analyzed: sa tu śīlā vacaḥ śrutvā kimartham iti ca avravīt

original: sā cāha śrūyatāṃ nātha daivajñaparibhāṣitam // VamP_43.133 //
analyzed: sā ca āha śrūyatām nātha daivajña paribhāṣitam
yadā iyam kampate bhūmiḥ tadā prakṣipyate bahis

original: yadbāhyato muniśreṣṭha tad bhaved dviguṇaṃ mune // VamP_43.134 //
analyzed: yat bāhyatas muni śreṣṭha tat bhavet dviguṇam mune
etat vākyam tadā śrutvā bālam ādāya putrakam

original: nirāśaṅko bahiḥ śīghraṃ prākṣipat kṣmātale dvijaḥ // VamP_43.135 //
analyzed: nirāśaṅkaḥ bahis śīghram prākṣipat kṣmā tale dvijaḥ
bhūyas go yugala arthāya praviṣṭaḥ bhāryayā dvijaḥ
nivāritaḥ gatā velā arddhūhāniḥ bhaviṣyati
iti evam ukte deva ṛṣe bahis nirgamya vegavān
dadarśa bāla dvitayam sama rūpam avasthitam

original: taṃ dṛṣṭvā devatāḥ pūjya bhāryāṃ cādbhutadarśanām /
analyzed: tam dṛṣṭvā devatāḥ pūjya bhāryām ca adbhuta darśanām

original: prāha tattvaṃ na vindāmi yat pṛcchāmi vadasva tat // VamP_43.138 //
analyzed: prāha tattvam na vindāmi yat pṛcchāmi vadasva tat
bālasya asya dvitīyasya ke bhaviṣyat guṇāḥ vada

original: bhāgyāni cāsya yaccoktaṃ karmatat kathayādhunā // VamP_43.139 //
analyzed: bhāgyāni ca asya yat ca uktam karma tat kathaya adhunā

original: sābravīnnādya te vakṣye vadiṣyāmi punaḥ prabho /
analyzed: sā bravīt na adya te vakṣye vadiṣyāmi punar prabho

original: so 'bravīd vada me 'dyaiva nocennāśnāmi bhojanam // VamP_43.140 //
analyzed: saḥ bravīt vada me dyā eva na uced na aśnāmi bhojanam

original: sā prāha śrūyatāṃ brahman vadiṣye vacanaṃ hitam /
analyzed: sā prāha śrūyatām brahman vadiṣye vacanam hitam

original: kātareṇādya yatpṛṣṭaṃ bhāvyaḥ kārurayaṃ ki // VamP_43.141 //
analyzed: kātareṇa adya yat pṛṣṭam bhāvyaḥ kāruḥ ayam ki

original: ityuktāvati vākye tu bāla eva tvecetanaḥ /
analyzed: iti uktau ati vākye tu bālaḥ eva tu ecetanaḥ

original: jagāma sāhyaṃ śakrasya kartuṃ sautyaviśāradaḥ // VamP_43.142 //
analyzed: jagāma sāhyam śakrasya kartum sautya viśāradaḥ
tam vrajantam hi gandharvāḥ viśvāvasu purogamāḥ
jñātvā indrasya eva sāhāyye tejasā samavardhayan

original: gandharvatejasā yuktaḥ śiśuḥ śakraṃ sametya hi /
analyzed: gandharva tejasā yuktaḥ śiśuḥ śakram sametya hi

original: provācaihyehi deveśa priyo yantā bhavāmi te // VamP_43.144 //
analyzed: provāca ehi ehi deveśa priyaḥ yantā bhavāmi te

original: tacchratvāsya hariḥ prāha kasya putro 'si bālaka /
analyzed: tat śratvā asya hariḥ prāha kasya putraḥ si bālaka

original: saṃyantāsi kathaṃ cāśvān saṃśayaḥ pratibhāti me // VamP_43.145 //
analyzed: saṃyantāsi katham ca aśvān saṃśayaḥ pratibhāti me
saḥ bravīt ṛṣi teja uttham kṣmā bhavanam viddhi vāsava
gandharva tejasā yuktam vāji yāna vani śāradam

original: tatchravā bhagavāñchakraḥ khaṃ bheje yogināṃ varaḥ /
analyzed: tat śravāḥ bhagavān śakraḥ kham bheje yoginām varaḥ
sa ca api vipra tanayaḥ mātaliḥ nāma viśrutaḥ
tatas dhirūḍhaḥ tu ratham śakraḥ tridaśa puṅgavaḥ
raśmīn śamīka tanayaḥ mātaliḥ pragṛhītavān
tatas mandaram āgamya viveśa ripu vāhinīm

original: praviśan dadṛśe śrīmān patitaṃ kārsukaṃ mahat // VamP_43.149 //
analyzed: praviśan dadṛśe śrīmān patitam kārsukam mahat
sa śaram pañca varṇa ābham sita rakta asita aruṇam
pāṇḍu chāyam sura śreṣṭhaḥ tam jagrāha sa mārgaṇam
tatas manasā devān rajaḥ sattva tamaḥ mayān

original: namaskṛtya śaraṃ cāpe sādhijye viniyojayat // VamP_43.151 //
analyzed: namaskṛtya śaram cāpe sa adhijye viniyojayat
tatas niśceruḥ ati ugrāḥ śarāḥ barhiṇa vāsasaḥ
brahma īśatha viṣṇu nāma aṅkāḥ sūdayantaḥ surān raṇe

original: ākāśaṃ vidiśaḥ pṛthvīṃ diśaśca sa śarotkaraiḥ /
analyzed: ākāśam vidiśaḥ pṛthvīm diśaḥ ca sa śara utkaraiḥ
sahasrākṣaḥ ti paṭubhiḥ chādayāmāsa nārada

original: gajo viddho hayo bhinnaḥ pṛthivyāṃ patito rathaḥ /
analyzed: gajaḥ viddhaḥ hayaḥ bhinnaḥ pṛthivyām patitaḥ rathaḥ

original: mahāmātro dharāṃ prāptaḥ sadyaḥ sīdañcharāturaḥ // VamP_43.154 //
analyzed: mahāmātraḥ dharām prāptaḥ sadyas sīdan śara āturaḥ
padāti patitaḥ bhūmyām śakra mārgaṇa tāḍitaḥ
hata pradhāna bhūyiṣṭham balam tat abhavat ripoḥ

original: taṃ śakrabāṇabhihataṃ durāsadaṃ sainyaṃ samālakṣya tadā kujambhaḥ /
analyzed: tam śakra bāṇa abhihatam durāsadam sainyam samālakṣya tadā kujambhaḥ

original: jambhāsuraścāpi sureśamavyayaṃ prajagamaturgṛhya gade sughore // VamP_43.156 //
analyzed: jambha asuraḥ ca api sureśam avyayam prajagamatuḥ gṛhya gade su ghore
tau āpatantau bhagavān nirīkṣya sudarśanena ari vināśanena

original: viṣṇuḥ kujambhaṃ nijaghāna vegāt sa syandanād gāmagamad gatāsuḥ // VamP_43.157 //
analyzed: viṣṇuḥ kujambham nijaghāna vegāt sa syandanāt gām agamat gatāsuḥ

original: tasmin hate bhrātari mādhavena jambhastataḥ krodhavaśaṃ jagāma /
analyzed: tasmin hate bhrātari mādhavena jambhaḥ tatas krodha vaśam jagāma

original: krodhānvitaḥ śakramupādravad raṇe siṃhaṃ yataiṇo 'tivipannabuddhiḥ // VamP_43.158 //
analyzed: krodha anvitaḥ śakram upādravat raṇe siṃham yata eṇaḥ ti vipanna buddhiḥ

original: tamāpatantaṃ prasamīkṣya śakrastyaktvaiva cāpaṃ saśaraṃ mahātmā /
analyzed: tam āpatantam prasamīkṣya śakraḥ tyaktvā eva cāpam sa śaram mahātmā

original: jagrāha śaktiṃ yamadaṇḍakalpāṃ tāmagnidattāṃ ripave sasarja // VamP_43.159 //
analyzed: jagrāha śaktim yama daṇḍa kalpām tām agni dattām ripave sasarja

original: śaktiṃ saghaṇṭāṃ kṛtaniḥsvanāṃ vai dṛṣṭvā patantīṃ gadayā jaghāna /
analyzed: śaktim sa ghaṇṭām kṛta niḥsvanām vai dṛṣṭvā patantīm gadayā jaghāna

original: gadāṃ ca kṛtvā sahasaiva bhasmasād bibheda jambhaṃ hṛdaye ca tūrṇam // VamP_43.160 //
analyzed: gadām ca kṛtvā sahasā eva bhasmasāt bibheda jambham hṛdaye ca tūrṇam

original: śaktyā sa bhinno hṛdaye surāriḥ papāta bhūmyāṃ vigatāsureva /
analyzed: śaktyā sa bhinnaḥ hṛdaye surāriḥ papāta bhūmyām vigata asuḥ eva

original: taṃ vīkṣya bhūmau patitaṃ visaṃjñaṃ daityāstu bhītā vimukhā babhūvuḥ // VamP_43.161 //
analyzed: tam vīkṣya bhūmau patitam visaṃjñam daityāḥ tu bhītāḥ vimukhāḥ babhūvuḥ

original: jambhe hate daityabale ca bhagne gaṇāstu hṛṣṭā harimarcayantaḥ /
analyzed: jambhe hate daitya bale ca bhagne gaṇāḥ tu hṛṣṭāḥ harim arcayantaḥ

original: vīryaṃ praśaṃsanti śatakratośca sa gotrabhiccharvamupetya tasthau // VamP_43.162 //
analyzed: vīryam praśaṃsanti śatakratoḥ ca sa gotrabhid śarvam upetya tasthau
iti śrī vāmanapurāṇe tricatvāriśaḥ adhyāyaḥ
pulastyaḥ uvāca
tasmin tadā daitya bale ca bhagne śukraḥ

original: ehyehi vīrādya gṛhaṃ mahāsura yotsyāma bhūyo harametya śailam // VamP_44.1 //
analyzed: ehi ehi vīra adya gṛham mahā asura yotsyāma bhūyas haram etya śailam
tam uvāca andhakaḥ brahman na samyak bhavatā uditam
raṇāt na eva apayāsyāmi kulam vyapadiśan svayam

original: paśya tvaṃ dvijaśārdūla mama vīryaṃ sudurdharam /
analyzed: paśya tvam dvija śārdūla mama vīryam su durdharam
deva dānava gandharvān jeṣye sa indra maheśvaram
iti evam uktvā vacanam hiraṇyākṣa sutaḥ ndhakaḥ
samāśvāsya abravīt śaṃbhum sāritham sārithim madhura akṣaram
sārthe vāhaya ratham hara abhyāśam mahā bala
yāvat nihanmi bāṇa eghaiḥ pramatha amara vāhinīm
iti andhaka vacaḥ śrutvā sārathiḥ turagān tadā
kṛṣma varṇān mahā vegān kaśayā abhyāhanat mune

original: te yatnato 'pi turaghāḥ preryamāṇā haraṃ prati /
analyzed: te turaghāḥ preryamāṇāḥ haram prati

original: jaghaneṣvavasīdantaḥ kṛcchre ṇohuśca taṃ ratham // VamP_44.7 //
analyzed: jaghaneṣu avasīdantaḥ kṛcchre na ūhuḥ ca tam ratham
vahantaḥ turagāḥ daityam prāptāḥ pramatha vāhinīm
saṃvatsareṇa sāgreṇa vāyu vega samāḥ api
tatas kārmukam ānamya bāṇa jālaiḥ gaṇeśvarān
surān saṃchādayāmāsa sa indra upendra maheśvarān
bāṇaiḥ a chāditam īkṣya eva balam trailokya rakṣitā
surān provāca bhagavān cakrapiṇiḥ janārdanaḥ
viṣṇuḥ uvāca

original: kiṃ tiṣṭhadhvaṃ suraśreṣṭhā hatenānena vai jayaḥ /
analyzed: kim tiṣṭhadhvam sura śreṣṭhāḥ hatena anena vai jayaḥ

original: tasamānmadvacanaṃ śīghraṃ kriyatāṃ vai jayepsavaḥ // VamP_44.11 //
analyzed: tasamāt mad vacanam śīghram kriyatām vai jaya īpsavaḥ
śātyantām asya tura agāḥ samam rathakuṭumbinā

original: bhajyatāṃ syandanaścāpi virathaḥ kriyatāṃ ripuḥ // VamP_44.12 //
analyzed: bhajyatām syandanaḥ ca api virathaḥ kriyatām ripuḥ

original: virathaṃ tu kṛtaṃ paścādenaṃ dhakṣyati śaṅkaraḥ /
analyzed: viratham tu kṛtam paścāt enam dhakṣyati śaṅkaraḥ
na upekṣyaḥ śatruḥ uddiṣṭaḥ deva ācāryeṇa devatāḥ
iteyava muktāḥ pramathāḥ vāsudevena sa amarāḥ

original: cakrurvegaṃ sahendreṇa samaṃ cakradhareṇa ca // VamP_44.14 //
analyzed: cakruḥ vegam saha indreṇa samam cakradhareṇa ca
turagāṇām sahasram tu megha ābhānām janārdanaḥ
nimiṣa antara mātreṇa gadayā vinipothayat
hata aśvāt syandanāt skandaḥ pragṛhya ratha sārathim

original: śaktyā vibhinnahṛdayaṃ gatāsuṃ vyasṛjad bhuvi // VamP_44.16 //
analyzed: śaktyā vibhinna hṛdayam gatāsum vyasṛjat bhuvi
vināyaka ādyāḥ pramathāḥ samam śakreṇa daivataiḥ
sa dhvaja akṣam ratham tūrṇam abhañjanta tapodhanāḥ
sahasā sa mahā tejāḥ virathaḥ tyajya kārmukam
gadām ādāya balavān abhidudrāva daivatān
padāni aṣṭau tatas gatvā megha gambhīrayā girā

original: sthitvā provāca daityendro mahādevaṃ sa hetumat // VamP_44.19 //
analyzed: sthitvā provāca daitya indraḥ mahādevam sa hetumat
bhikṣo bhavān saha anīkaḥ tu asahāyaḥ smi sāmpratam

original: tathāpi tvāṃ vijeṣyāmi paśya me 'dya parākramam // VamP_44.20 //
analyzed: tathā api tvām vijeṣyāmi paśya me dya parākramam
tat vākyam śaṅkaraḥ śrutvā sa indrān sura gaṇān tadā

original: brahmaṇā sahitān sarvān svaśarīre nyaveśayat // VamP_44.21 //
analyzed: brahmaṇā sahitān sarvān sva śarīre nyaveśayat
śarīra sthān tān pramathān kṛtvā devān ca śaṅkaraḥ

original: prāha ehyehi tuṣṭātman ahameko 'pi saṃśthitaḥ // VamP_44.22 //
analyzed: prāha ehi ehi tuṣṭa ātman aham ekaḥ saṃśthitaḥ
tam dṛṣṭvā mahat āścaryam sarva amara gaṇa kṣayam
daityaḥ śaṅkaram abhyāgāt gadām ādāya vegavān
tam āpatantam bhagavān dṛṣṭvā tyaktvā vṛṣottamam
śūlapāṇiḥ giri prasthe padātiḥ pratyatiṣṭhata
vegena eva āpatantam ca bibheda urasi bhairavaḥ

original: dāruṇaṃ sumahad rūpaṃ kṛtvā trailokyabhīṣaṇam // VamP_44.25 //
analyzed: dāruṇam su mahat rūpam kṛtvā trailokya bhīṣaṇam
daṃṣṭrā karālam ravi koṭi saṃnibham mṛgāri carma abhivṛtam jaṭā dharam
bhujaṅga hāra amala kaṇṭha kandaram viṃśa ardha bāhum sa ṣaṣ ardha locanam
etādṛsena rūpeṇa bhagavān bhūta bhāvananaḥ

original: bibheda śatruṃ śūlena śubhadaḥ śāśvataḥ śivaḥ // VamP_44.27 //
analyzed: bibheda śatrum śūlena śubha daḥ śāśvataḥ śivaḥ
sa śūlam bhairavam gṛhya bhinne pi urasi dānavaḥ
vijahāra ativegena krośa mātram mahā mune
tatas kathañcid bhagavān saṃstabhya ātmanām ātmanā
tūrṇam utpāṭayāmāsa śūlena sa gadam ripum
daitya adhipaḥ tava api gadām hara mūrdhni nyapātayat

original: karābhyāṃ gṛhya śūlaṃ ca samutpatata dānavaḥ // VamP_44.30 //
analyzed: karābhyām gṛhya śūlam ca samutpatata dānavaḥ
saṃsthitaḥ sa mahā yogī sarva ādhāraḥ prajāpatiḥ
gadā pāta kṣatāt bhūri caturdhā asṛk atha apatat
pūrva dhārā samudbhūtaḥ bhairavaḥ gni sama prabhaḥ
vidyārāja iti vikhyātaḥ padma mālā vibhūṣitaḥ
tathā dakṣiṇa dhārā utthaḥ bhairavaḥ preta maṇḍitaḥ
atha protīcī dhārā utthaḥ bhairavaḥ patra bhūṣitaḥ
udagdhārā bhavaḥ ca anyaḥ bhairavaḥ śūla bhūṣitaḥ
somarāja iti vikhyātaḥ cakra mālā vibhūṣitaḥ
kṣatasya rudhirāt jātaḥ bhairavaḥ śūla bhūṣitaḥ
bhūmi sthāt rudhirāt jātaḥ bhairavaḥ śūla bhūṣitaḥ
khyātaḥ lalitarājā iti saubhāñjana sama prabhaḥ

original: evaṃ hi saptarūpo 'sau kathyate bhairavo mune /
analyzed: evam hi kathyate bhairavaḥ mune
vighnarājaḥ ṣṭamaḥ proktaḥ bhairavāṣṭakam ucyate
evam mahātmanā daityaḥ śūla protaḥ mahā asurāḥ

original: chatravad dhārito brahman bhairaveṇa triśulinā // VamP_44.39 //
analyzed: chatra vat dhāritaḥ brahman bhairaveṇa triśulinā
tasya asṛk ulbaṇam brahman śūlabhedāt avāpatat
yena akaṣṭham mahādevaḥ nimagnaḥ sapta mūrtimān

original: tataḥ svedo 'bhavad bhūri śramajaḥ śaṅkarasya tu /
analyzed: tatas svedaḥ bhavat bhūri śrama jaḥ śaṅkarasya tu
lalāṭa phalake tasmāt jātā kanyā asṛj āplutā
yat bhūbhyām nyapatat vipra sveda binduḥ śiva ānanāt
tasmāt aṅgara puñja ābhaḥ bālakaḥ samajāyata
sa bālaḥ taṣitaḥ tyartham papau rudhiram āndhakam
kanyā ca utkṛtya saṃjātam asṛj vililihe dbhutā
tatas tām āha bāla arka prabhām bhairava mūrtimān

original: śaṅkaro varado loke śreyor'thāya vaco mahat // VamP_44.44 //
analyzed: śaṅkaraḥ vara daḥ loke śreyaḥ arthāya vacaḥ mahat
tvām pūjayiṣyanti surāḥ ṛṣaḥ pitaraḥ uragāḥ
yakṣa vidyādharāḥ ca eva mānavāḥ ca śubhaṅkari

original: tvāṃ stoṣyanti sadā devi balipuṣpotkaraiḥ karaiḥ /
analyzed: tvām stoṣyanti sadā devi bali puṣpa utkaraiḥ karaiḥ

original: carcciketi subhaṃ nāma yasmādā rudhiracarcitā // VamP_44.46 //
analyzed: carccikā iti subham nāma yasmāt ā rudhiracarcitā
iti evam uktā varadena carcikā bhūta anujātā hari carma vāsinī

original: mahīṃ samantād vicacāra sundarī sthānaṃ gatā haiṅgulatādrimuttamam // VamP_44.47 //
analyzed: mahīm samantāt vicacāra sundarī sthānam gatā haiṅgu latā adrim uttamam

original: tasyāṃ gatāyāṃ varadaḥ kujasya prādād varaṃ sarvavarottamaṃ yat /
analyzed: tasyām gatāyām vara daḥ kujasya prādāt varam sarva vara uttamam yat

original: grahādhipatyaṃ jagātāṃ śubhāśubhaṃ bhaviṣyati tvadvarāgaṃ mahātmana // VamP_44.48 //
analyzed: graha ādhipatyam jagātām śubha aśubham bhaviṣyati mahātmana
haraḥ ndhakam varṣa sahasra mātram divyam sva netra arka hutāśanena

original: cakāra saṃśuṣkatanuṃ tvaśoṇitaṃ tvagasthiśeṣaṃ bhagavān sa bhairavaḥ // VamP_44.49 //
analyzed: cakāra saṃśuṣka tanum tu a śoṇitam tvac asthi śeṣam bhagavān sa bhairavaḥ

original: tatrāgninā netrabhavena śuddhaḥ sa muktapāpo 'surarāḍ babhuva /
analyzed: tatra agninā netra bhavena śuddhaḥ sa mukta pāpaḥ surarāj babhuva

original: tataḥ prajānāṃ bahurūpamīśaṃ nāthaṃ hi sarvasya carācarasya // VamP_44.50 //
analyzed: tatas prajānām bahu rūpam īśam nātham hi sarvasya carācarasya

original: jñātvā sa sarveśvaramīśamavyayaṃ trailokyanāthaṃ varadaṃ vareṇyam /
analyzed: jñātvā sa sarva īśvaram īśam avyayam trailokya nātham vara dam vareṇyam

original: sarvaiḥ surādyairnatamīḍyamādyaṃ tato 'ndhakaḥ stotramidaṃ cakāra // VamP_44.51 //
analyzed: sarvaiḥ sura ādyaiḥ natam īḍyam ādyam tatas ndhakaḥ stotram idam cakāra
andhakaḥ uvāca

original: namo 'stu te bhairava bhīmamūrte trilokagoptre śitaśūladhāriṇe /
analyzed: namaḥ stu te bhairava bhīma mūrte triloka goptre śita śūla dhāriṇe

original: viṃśārddhabāho bhujageśahāra trinetra māṃ pāhi vipannabuddhim // VamP_44.52 //
analyzed: viṃśa arddha bāho bhujaga īśa hāra trinetra mām pāhi vipanna buddhim
jayasva sarveśvara viśvamūrtte sura asuraiḥ vandita pāda pīṭha

original: trailokyamāturgurave vṛṣāṅka bhītaḥ śaraṇyaṃ śaraṇāgato 'smi // VamP_44.53 //
analyzed: trailokya mātuḥ gurave vṛṣāṅka bhītaḥ śaraṇyam śaraṇa āgataḥ smi

original: tvāṃ nātha devāḥ śivamīrayanti siddhā haraṃ sthāṇuṃ maharṣayaśca /
analyzed: tvām nātha devāḥ śivam īrayanti siddhāḥ haram sthāṇum mahā ṛṣayaḥ ca

original: bhīmaṃ ca yakṣā manujā maheśvaraṃ bhūtāśca bhūtādhipamāmananti // VamP_44.54 //
analyzed: bhīmam ca yakṣāḥ manujāḥ maheśvaram bhūtāḥ ca bhūta adhipam āmananti

original: niśācarā ugramupārcayanti bhaveti puṇyāḥ pitaro namanti /
analyzed: niśācarāḥ ugram upārcayanti bhava iti puṇyāḥ pitaraḥ namanti

original: dāso 'smi tubhyaṃ hara pāhi mahyaṃ pāpakṣayaṃ me kuru lokanātha // VamP_44.55 //
analyzed: dāsaḥ smi tubhyam hara pāhi mahyam pāpa kṣayam me kuru lokanātha
bhāvan tri devaḥ tri yugaḥ tri dharmā tri puṣkaraḥ ca asi vibho trinetra

original: trayyāruṇistritivyayātman punīhi māṃ tvāṃ śaraṇaṃ gato 'smi // VamP_44.56 //
analyzed: trayyāruṇiḥ triti vyaya ātman punīhi mām tvām śaraṇam gataḥ smi
triṇāciketaḥ tri pada pratiṣṭhaḥ ṣaḍaṅga vid tvam viṣayeṣu alubdhaḥ

original: trailokyanātho 'si punīhi śaṃbho dāso 'smi bhītaḥ śaraṇāgataste // VamP_44.57 //
