analyzed: trailokya nāthaḥ si punīhi śaṃbho dāsaḥ smi bhītaḥ śaraṇa āgataḥ te

original: kṛtaṃ mahat śaṅkara te 'parādhaṃ mayā mahābhūtapate girīśa /
analyzed: kṛtam mahat śaṅkara te parādham mayā mahā bhūtapate girīśa

original: kāmāriṇā nirjitamānasena prasādaye tvāṃ śirasā nato 'smi // VamP_44.58 //
analyzed: kāma ariṇā nirjita mānasena prasādaye tvām śirasā nataḥ smi
pāpaḥ ham pāpa karmā aham pāpa ātmā pāpa saṃbhavaḥ

original: trāhi māṃ deva īśāna sarvapāpaharo bhava // VamP_44.59 //
analyzed: trāhi mām devaḥ īśāna sarva pāpa haraḥ bhava

original: mā me krudhyasva deveśa tvayā caitādṛśo 'smayaham /
analyzed: mā me krudhyasva deveśa tvayā

original: sṛṣṭaḥ pāpasamācāro me prasanno bhaveśvara // VamP_44.60 //
analyzed: sṛṣṭaḥ pāpa samācāraḥ me prasannaḥ bhava īśvara

original: tvaṃ karttā caiva dhātā ca tvaṃ jayastvaṃ mahājayaḥ /
analyzed: tvam karttā ca eva dhātā ca tvam jayaḥ tvam mahājayaḥ
tvam maṅgalyaḥ tvam oṅkāraḥ tvam īśānaḥ dhruvaḥ vyayaḥ
tvam brahma sṛṣṭi kṛt nāthaḥ tvam viṣṇuḥ tvam maheśvaraḥ

original: tvamindrastvaṃ vaṣaṭkāro dharmastvaṃ ca surottamaḥ // VamP_44.62 //
analyzed: tvam indraḥ tvam vaṣaṭkāraḥ dharmaḥ tvam ca surottamaḥ
sūkṣmaḥ tvam vyakta rūpaḥ tvam tvam avyaktaḥ tvam īśvaraḥ

original: tvayā sarvamidaṃ vyāptaṃ jagat sthāvarajaṅgamam // VamP_44.63 //
analyzed: tvayā sarvam idam vyāptam jagat sthāvara jaṅgamam
tvam ādiḥ antaḥ madhyaḥ ca tvam anādiḥ sahasrapād
vijayaḥ tvam sahasrākṣaḥ virūpākṣaḥ mahā bhujaḥ
antar vyāpī haṃsaḥ cyutaḥ
gīrvāṇa patiḥ avyagraḥ rudraḥ paśupatiḥ śivaḥ
traividyaḥ tvam jita krodhaḥ jita ariḥ vijita indriyaḥ

original: jayaśca śūlapāṇistvaṃ trāhi māṃ śaraṇāgatam // VamP_44.66 //
analyzed: jayaḥ ca śūlapāṇiḥ tvam trāhi mām śaraṇa āgatam
pulastyaḥ uvāca

original: itthaṃ maheśvaro brahman stuto daityādhipena tu /
analyzed: ittham maheśvaraḥ brahman stutaḥ daitya adhipena tu
prīti yuktaḥ viṅgala akṣaḥ hairaṇyākṣim uvāca ha
siddhaḥ si dānava pate parituṣṭaḥ smi te ndhaka

original: varaṃ varaya bhadraṃ te yamicchasi vināmbikām // VamP_44.68 //
analyzed: varam varaya bhadram te yam icchasi vinā ambikām
andhakaḥ uvāca
ambikā jananī mahyam bhagavān tryambakaḥ pitā
vandāmi caraṇau mātuḥ vandanīyā mama ambikā
vara daḥ si yadi īśāna tat yātu vilayam mama

original: śārīraṃ mānasaṃ vāgjaṃ duṣkṛtaṃ durvicintitam // VamP_44.70 //
analyzed: śārīram mānasam vāc jam duṣkṛtam durvicintitam

original: tathā me dānavo bhāvo vyapayātu maheśvara /
analyzed: tathā me dānavaḥ bhāvaḥ vyapayātu maheśvara

original: sthirāstu tvayi bhaktistu varametat prayaccha me // VamP_44.71 //
analyzed: sthirā astu tvayi bhaktiḥ tu varam etat prayaccha me
mahādevaḥ uvāca

original: evaṃ bhavatu daityendra pāpaṃ te yātu saṃkṣayam /
analyzed: evam bhavatu daitya indra pāpam te yātu saṃkṣayam
muktaḥ si daitya bhāvāt ca bhṛṅgī gaṇapatiḥ bhava
iti evam uktvā vara daḥ śūla grāt avatārya tam
nirmārjya nija hastena cakre nirvraṇam andhakam
tatas sva dehataḥ devān brahma ādīn ājuhāva saḥ
te niśceruḥ mahātmānaḥ namasyantaḥ trilocanam
gaṇān sa nandīn āhūya sanniveśya tadā agratas

original: bhṛṅginaṃ darśayāmāsa dhruvaṃ naiṣo 'ndhakati hi // VamP_44.75 //
analyzed: bhṛṅginam darśayāmāsa dhruvam nā eṣaḥ hi
tam dṛṣṭvā dānava patim saṃśuṣka piśitam ripum
gaṇa ādhipatyam āpannam praśaśaṃsuḥ vṛṣadhvajam
tatas tān prāha bhagavān saṃpariṣvajya devatāḥ

original: gacchadhvaṃ svāni dhiṣṇyāni bhuñjadhvaṃ tridivaṃ sukham // VamP_44.77 //
analyzed: gacchadhvam svāni dhiṣṇyāni bhuñjadhvam tridivam sukham
sahasrākṣaḥ pi saṃyātu parvatam malayam śubham

original: tatra svakāryaṃ kṛtvaiva paścād yātu triviṣṭapam // VamP_44.78 //
analyzed: tatra sva kāryam kṛtvā eva paścāt yātu triviṣṭapam
iti evam uktvā tridaśān samābhāṣya vyasarjayat

original: te visṛṣṭā maheśena surā jagmustrakṣiviṣṭapam // VamP_44.79 //
analyzed: te visṛṣṭāḥ maheśena surāḥ jagmuḥ trakṣi viṣṭapam

original: mahendro malayaṃ gatvā kṛtvā kāryaṃ divaṃ gataḥ /
analyzed: mahendraḥ malayam gatvā kṛtvā kāryam divam gataḥ
gateṣu śakrapa agryeṣu deveṣu bhagavān ciśavaḥ

original: gaṇāśca śaṅkaraṃ dṛṣṭvā svaṃ svaṃ vāhanamāsthitāḥ // VamP_44.81 //
analyzed: gaṇāḥ ca śaṅkaram dṛṣṭvā svam svam vāhanam āsthitāḥ
jagmuḥ te śubha lokāni mahā bhogāni nārada
yatra kāma dudhāḥ gāvaḥ sarva kāma phala drumāḥ

original: svāṃ svāṃ gatiṃ prayāteṣu pramatheṣu maheśvaraḥ // VamP_44.83 //
analyzed: svām svām gatim prayāteṣu pramatheṣu maheśvaraḥ
samādāya andhakam haste sa nandiḥ śailam abhyagāt
dvābhyām varṣa sahasrābhyām punar āgāt varaḥ gṛhm
dadṛśe ca gireḥ putrīm śveta arka kusuma sthitām
samāyātam nirīkṣya eva sarva lakṣaṇa saṃyutam
tyaktvā arka puṣpam nirgatya sakhīḥ tāḥ samupāhvayat
samāhūtāḥ ca devyā tāḥ jaya ādyāḥ tūrmama agaman
tābhiḥ parivṛtā tasthau hara darśana lālasā

original: tatastrinetro girijāṃ dṛṣṭvā prekṣya ca dānavam // VamP_44.87 //
analyzed: tatas trinetraḥ girijām dṛṣṭvā prekṣya ca dānavam

original: nandinaṃ ca tathā harṣādāliliṅge gireḥ sutām /
analyzed: nandinam ca tathā harṣāt āliliṅge gireḥ sutām

original: athovācaiṣa dāsaste kṛto devi mayāndhakaḥ // VamP_44.88 //
analyzed: athā uvāca eṣa dāsaḥ te kṛtaḥ devi mayā andhakaḥ

original: ityuccāryāndhakaṃ caiva putra pahyehi satvaram // VamP_44.89 //
analyzed: iti uccārya andhakam ca eva putra sa tvaram

original: ityukto vibhunā nandī andhakaśca gaṇeśvaraḥ // VamP_44.90 //

samāgamya ambikā pādau vavandatuḥ ubhau api
andhakaḥ tadā gaurīm bhakti namraḥ mahā mune

original: stutiṃ cakre mahāpuṇyāṃ pāpaghnīṃ śrutīsaṃmitām // VamP_44.91 //
analyzed: stutim cakre mahā puṇyām pāpa ghnīm śrutī saṃmitām

analyzed: om namasye bhāvānīm bhūta bhavya priyām loka dhātrīm janitrīm skanda mātaram mahādeva priyām

original: dhāriṇīṃ syandinīṃ cetanāṃ trailokyamātaraṃ dharitrīṃ devamātaramathejyāṃ smṛtiṃ
analyzed: dhāriṇīm syandinīm cetanām trailokya mātaram dharitrīm deva mātaram atha ijyām smṛtim

original: dayāṃ lajjāṃ kāntimagryāmasūyāṃ matiṃ sadāpāvanīṃ daityasainyakṣayakarīṃ mahāmāyāṃ
analyzed: dayām lajjām kāntim agryām asūyām matim sadā pāvanīm daitya sainya kṣaya karīm mahā māyām

original: vaijayantī suśubhāṃ kālarātriṃ govindabhaginīṃ śailarājapūtrīṃ sarvadevārcitāṃ sarvabhūtārcitāṃ
analyzed: vaijayantī su śubhām kālarātrim govinda bhaginīm śailarāja pūtrīm sarva deva arcitām sarva bhūta arcitām

original: vidyāṃ sarasvatīṃ trinayanamahiṣīṃ namasyāmī mṛḍānīṃ śaraṇyāṃ śaraṇamupāgato 'haṃ namo namaste /

original: prāha putra prasannāsmi vṛṇuṣva paramuttamam // VamP_44.92 //

bhṛṅgiḥ uvāca

original: tatheśvare ca satataṃ bhaktirastu mamāmvike // VamP_44.93 //
analyzed: tathā īśvare ca satatam bhaktiḥ astu mama amvike

original: evaṃ purā dānavasattamaṃ taṃ maheśvareṇātha virūpadṛṣṭyā /
analyzed: evam purā dānava sattamam tam maheśvareṇa atha virūpa dṛṣṭyā

original: kṛtvaiva rūpaṃ bhayadaṃ ca bhairavaṃ bhṛṅgitvamīsena kṛtaṃ svabhaktyā // VamP_44.95 //
analyzed: kṛtvā eva rūpam bhaya dam ca bhairavam bhṛṅgi tvam īsena kṛtam sva bhaktyā

original: etat tavoktaṃ harakīrtivardhanaṃ puṇyaṃ pavitraṃ śubhadaṃ maharṣe /
analyzed: etat tava uktam hara kīrti vardhanam puṇyam pavitram śubha dam mahā ṛṣe

iti śrī vāmapurāṇe catuścatvāriśaḥ dhyāyaḥ
nāradaḥ uvāca
malaye mahā indreṇa yat kṛtam brāhmaṇa ṛṣabha

original: niṣpāditaṃ svakaṃ kāryaṃ tanme vyākhyātumarhasi // VamP_45.1 //
analyzed: niṣpāditam svakam kāryam tat me vyākhyātum arhasi
pulastyaḥ uvāca

original: kṛtaṃ lokahitaṃ brahmannātmanaśca tathā hitam // VamP_45.2 //
analyzed: kṛtam loka hitam brahman ātmanaḥ ca tathā hitam
andha asurasya anucarāḥ maya tā purogamāḥ
te nirjitāḥ sura gaṇaiḥ pātāla gamana utsukāḥ
dadṛśuḥ malayam śailam siddha adhyuṣita kandaram
latā vitā saṃchannam matta sattva samākulam
candanaiḥ uraga ākrāntaiḥ suśītaiḥ abhisevitam
mādhavī kusuma āmodam ṛṣi arcita haram girim
tam dṛṣṭvā śītala chāyam śrāntāḥ vyāyāma karṣitāḥ
maya tāra purogāḥ te nivāsam samarocayan
teṣu tatra upaviṣṭeṣu prāṇa tṛpti pradaḥ nilaḥ
vivāti śītaḥ śanakais dakṣiṇaḥ gandha saṃyutaḥ

original: tatraiva ca ratiṃ cakraḥ sarva eva mahāsurāḥ /
analyzed: tatra eva ca ratim cakraḥ sarve eva mahā asurāḥ
kurvantaḥ loka saṃpūjye viddha iṣam devatā gaṇe

original: sa cāpi dadṛśe gacchan pathi gomātaraṃ hariḥ // VamP_45.9 //
analyzed: sa ca api dadṛśe gacchan pathi gomātaram hariḥ

original: tasyāḥ pradakṣiṇāṃ kṛtvā dṛṣṭvā śailaṃ ca suprabham /
analyzed: tasyāḥ pradakṣiṇām kṛtvā dṛṣṭvā śailam ca su prabham

original: dadṛśe dānavān sarvān saṃhṛṣṭān bhogasaṃyutān // VamP_45.10 //
analyzed: dadṛśe dānavān sarvān saṃhṛṣṭān bhoga saṃyutān
atha ājuhāva bala hā sarvān eva mahā asurān
te ca api āyayuḥ avyagrāḥ vikirantaḥ śera utkarān
tān āgatān bāṇa jālaiḥ ratha sthaḥ dbhuta darśanā

original: chādayāmāsa viprarṣe girīn vṛṣṭyā yathā ghanaḥ // VamP_45.12 //
analyzed: chādayāmāsa viprarṣe girīn vṛṣṭyā yathā ghanaḥ
tatas bāṇaiḥ avacchādya maya ādīn dānavān hariḥ
pākam jaghāna tīkṣṇa agraiḥ mārgaṇaiḥ kaṅga vāsasaiḥ
tatra nāma vibhuḥ lobhe śāsana tvāt śaraiḥ dṛḍhaiḥ
pākaśāsana tām śakraḥ sarva amara patiḥ vibhuḥ
tathā anyam pura nāmānam bāṇāsura sutam śaraiḥ
su puṅkhaiḥ dārayāmāsa tatas bhūt sa purandaraḥ
hatvā ittham samare jaiṣīt gotrabhid dānavam balam
tat ca api vijitam brahman rasātalam upāgamat
etad artham sahasrākṣaḥ preṣitaḥ malaya acalam
tryambakena muni śreṣṭha kim anyat śrotum icchasi
nāradaḥ uvāca
kimartham daivata patiḥ gauntrabhid kathyate hariḥ

original: eṣa me saṃśayo brahman hṛdi saṃparivartate // VamP_45.18 //
analyzed: eṣa me saṃśayaḥ brahman hṛdi saṃparivartate
pulastyaḥ uvāca

original: śruyatāṃ gotrabhicchakraḥ kīrtito hi yathā mayā /
analyzed: śruyatām gotrabhid śakraḥ kīrtitaḥ hi yathā mayā
hate hiraṇyakaśipau yat cakāra ari mardanaḥ
ditiḥ vinaṣṭa putrā tu kaśyapam prāha nārada

original: vibho nātho 'si me dehi śakrahantāramātmajam // VamP_45.20 //
analyzed: vibho me dehi śakra hantāram ātmajam
kaśyapaḥ tām uvāca atha yadi tvam asita īkṣaṇe
śauca ācāra samāyuktā sthāsyase daśatīḥ daśa
saṃvatsarāṇām divyānām tatas trailokya nāyakam

original: janayiṣyasi putraṃ tvaṃ śatrughnaṃ nānyathā priye // VamP_45.22 //
analyzed: janayiṣyasi putram tvam śatrughnam na anyathā priye
iti evam uktā sā bhartrā ditiḥ niyamam āsthitā
garbhādhānam ṛṣiḥ kṛtvā jagāma udayaparvatam
gate tasmin muni śreṣṭhe sahasrākṣaḥ sa tvaram
tam āśramam upāgamya ditim vacanam abravīt
kariṣyāmi anuśuśrūṣām bhavatyāḥ yadi manyase
bāñam iti abravīt devī bhāvi karma pracoditā
samidh āharaṇa ādīni tasyāḥ cakre purandaraḥ

original: vinītātmā ca kāryārthā chidrānveṣī bhujaṅgavat // VamP_45.26 //
analyzed: vinīta ātmā ca kārya arthā chidra anveṣī bhujaṅga vat

original: ekadā sā tapoyuktā śauce mahati saṃsthitā /
analyzed: ekadā sā tapaḥ yuktā śauce mahati saṃsthitā
daśa varṣa śata ante tu śiraḥ snātā tapasvinī
jānubhyām upari sthāpya mukta keśāḥ nijam śiraḥ
suṣvāpa keśa prāntaiḥ tu saṃśliṣṭa caraṇā abhavat
tam antaram aśaucasya jñātvā devaḥ sahasradṛś
viveśa mātuḥ udaram nāsā randhreṇa nārada
praviśya jaṭharam kruddhaḥ daitya mātuḥ purandaraḥ
dadarśa ūrdhva mukam bālam kaṭi nyasta karam mahat
tasya eva āsye tha dadṛśe peśīm māṃsasya vāsavaḥ
śuddha sphaṭika saṃkāśām karābhyām jagṛhe tha tām
tatas kopa samādhmātaḥ māṃsa peśīm śatakratuḥ

original: karābhyaṃ mardayāmāsa tataḥ sā kaṭhinābhavat // VamP_45.32 //
analyzed: mardayāmāsa tatas sā kaṭhinā bhavat

original: ūrdhvenārdhaṃ ca vavṛdhe tvadhor'dhaṃ vavṛdhe tathā /
analyzed: ūrdhvena ardham ca vavṛdhe tu adhordham vavṛdhe tathā
śataparvā atha kuliśaḥ saṃjātaḥ māṃsa peśitaḥ
tena eva garbham ditijam vajreṇa śataparvaṇā

original: ciccheda saptadhā brahman sa ruroda ca visvaram // VamP_45.34 //
analyzed: ciccheda saptadhā brahman sa ruroda ca visvaram
ditiḥ ajānāt śakra coṣṭitam

original: śuśrāva vācaṃ putrasya rudamānasya nārada // VamP_45.35 //
analyzed: śuśrāva vācam putrasya rudamānasya nārada

original: śakro 'pi prāha mā mūḍha rudasveti sughargharam /
analyzed: śakraḥ pi prāha mā mūḍha rudasva iti sughargharam
iti evam uktvā ca ekaikam bhūyas ciccheda saptadhā

original: te jātā maruto nāma devabhṛtyāḥ śatakratoḥ /
analyzed: te jātāḥ marutaḥ nāma deva bhṛtyāḥ śatakratoḥ

original: 45.37 tataḥ sakuliśaḥ śakro nirgamya jaṭharāt tadā /
analyzed: tatas sa kuliśaḥ śakraḥ nirgamya jaṭharāt tadā

original: ditiṃ kṛtāñjalipuṭaḥ prāha bhītastu śāpataḥ // VamP_45.38 //

etad artham baliḥ daityaḥ kṛtaḥ rājā kalipriya
mantra pradātā prahlādaḥ śukraḥ ca āsīt purohitaḥ
jñātvā abhiṣiktam daiteyam virocana sutam balim

original: didṛkṣavaḥ samāyātāḥ samayāḥ sarva eva hi // VamP_47.2 //
analyzed: didṛkṣavaḥ samāyātāḥ samayāḥ sarve eva hi
tān āgatān nirīkṣya eva pūjayitvā yatā akramama

original: papraccha kulajān sarvān kiṃnu śreyaskaraṃ mama // VamP_47.3 //
analyzed: papraccha kula jān sarvān kiṃnu śreyaskaram mama
tam ucuḥ sarve eva enam śṛṇuṣva sura mardana

original: yat te śreyaskaraṃ karma yadasmākaṃ hitaṃ tathā // VamP_47.4 //
analyzed: yat te śreyaskaram karma yat asmākam hitam tathā
pitāmahaḥ tava āsīt dānava pālakaḥ
hiraṇyakaśipuḥ vīraḥ sa śakraḥ bhūt jagattraye
tam āgamya suraśreṣṭhaḥ viṣṇuḥ siṃha vapuḥ dharaḥ

original: pratyakṣaṃ dānavendrāṇāṃ nakhaistaṃ hi vyadārayat // VamP_47.6 //
analyzed: pratyakṣam dānava indrāṇām nakhaiḥ tam hi vyadārayat
apakṛṣṭam tathā rājyam āndhakasya mahātmanaḥ
teṣām arthe mahā bāho śaṅkarema triśūlinā

original: tathā tava pitṛvyo 'pi jambhaḥ śakreṇa ghātitaḥ /
analyzed: tathā tava pitṛvyaḥ u pi jambhaḥ śakreṇa ghātitaḥ

original: kujambho viṣṇunā cāpi pratyakṣaṃ paśuvat tava // VamP_47.8 //
analyzed: kujambhaḥ viṣṇunā ca api pratyakṣam paśu vat tava

original: śambhuḥ pāko mahendreṇa bhrātā tava sudarśanaḥ /
analyzed: śambhuḥ pākaḥ mahā indreṇa bhrātā tava sudarśanaḥ

original: virocanastava pitā nihataḥ kathayāmi te // VamP_47.9 //
analyzed: virocanaḥ tava pitā nihataḥ kathayāmi te

original: śrutvā go6kṣayaṃ brahman kṛta śakreṇa dānavaḥ /
analyzed: śrutvā brahman kṛta śakreṇa dānavaḥ
udyogam kārayāmāsa saha sarvaiḥ mahā asuraiḥ
rathaiḥ anye gajaiḥ anye vājibhiḥ ca apare surāḥ
padātayaḥ tathā eva anye jagmuḥ yuddhāya daivataiḥ
mayaḥ gre yāti balavān senā nāthaḥ bhayaṅkaraḥ

original: sainyasya madhye ca baliḥ kālanemiśca ṣṛṣṭhataḥ // VamP_47.12 //
analyzed: sainyasya madhye ca baliḥ kālanemiḥ ca ṣṛṣṭhatas
vāma pārśvam avaṣṭabhya śālavaḥ prathita vikramaḥ

original: prayāti dakṣiṇaṃ ghoraṃ tārakākhyo bhayaṅkaraḥ // VamP_47.13 //
analyzed: prayāti dakṣiṇam ghoram tāraka ākhyaḥ bhayaṅkaraḥ
dānavānām sahasrāṇi prayutāni arbudāni ca

original: saṃprayātāni yuddhāya devaiḥ saha kalipriya // VamP_47.14 //
analyzed: saṃprayātāni yuddhāya devaiḥ saha kalipriya

original: uvāca yāma daityāṃstān yoddhuṃ sabalasaṃyutān // VamP_47.15 //
analyzed: uvāca yāma daityān tān yoddhum sa bala saṃyutān
iti evam uktvā vacanam surarāj syandanam balī
samāruroha bhagavān yata mātali vājinam

svam svam vāhanam āruhya niśceruḥ yuddha kāṅkṣimaḥ

original: ādityā vasavo rudrāḥ sādhyā viśve 'śvinau tathā /
analyzed: ādityāḥ vasavaḥ rudrāḥ sādhyāḥ viśve śvinau tathā
vidyādharāḥ guhyakāḥ ca yakṣa rākṣasa pannagāḥ
rājarṣayaḥ tathā siddhāḥ nānā bhūtāḥ ca saṃhatāḥ
gajān anye rathān anye hayān anye samāruhan
vimānāni ca subhrāṇi pakṣi vāhyāni nārada

original: samāruhyādravan sarve yato daityabalaṃ sthitam // VamP_47.20 //
analyzed: samāruhya adravan sarve yatas daitya balam sthitam

original: etasmin viṣṇuḥ suraśreṣṭha adhiruhya samabhyagāt // VamP_47.21 //
analyzed: etasmin viṣṇuḥ suraśreṣṭha adhiruhya samabhyagāt

original: vavanda mūrdhnāvanataḥ saha sarvaiḥ surottamaiḥ // VamP_47.22 //
analyzed: vavanda mūrdhnā avanataḥ saha sarvaiḥ sura uttamaiḥ
tatas gre deva sainyasya kārtikeyaḥ gadā dharaḥ
pālayan jaghanam viṣṇuḥ yāti madhye
vāmam jantaḥ vrajate mune
dakṣiṇam varuṇaḥ pārśvam avaṣṭabhya avrajat balī
tatas marāṇām pṛtanā yaśasvinī skanda indra viṣṇu vambupa sūrya pālitā
nānā astra śastra udyata dos samūhā samāsasāda ari balam mahīdhre

original: nirvṛkṣe pakṣirahite jāto devāsuro raṇaḥ // VamP_47.26 //

original: saṃdyānuraktaḥ sadṛśo meghaḥ khe suratāpasa // VamP_47.28 //
analyzed: saṃdyā anuraktaḥ sadṛśaḥ meghaḥ khe sura tāpasa

original: tadāsīt tumulaṃ yuddhaṃ na prājñāyata kiñcana /

original: tato viśasano raudro daityānāṃ daivataiḥ saha /

original: nirjitāḥ samare daityaiḥ samaṃ skandena nārada // VamP_47.33 //

original: daiteyāḥ śaraṇaṃ jagmuḥ kālanemiṃ mahāsurām // VamP_47.35 //

original: tebhyaḥ sa cābhayaṃ dattvā jñātvājeyaṃ ca mādhavam /
analyzed: tebhyaḥ sa ca abhayam dattvā jñātvā ajeyam ca mādhavam

original: yaṃ yaṃ kareṇa spṛśati devaṃ yakṣaṃ sakinnaram /

original: saṃrambhād dānavendro vimṛdati ditijaiḥ saṃyuto devasainyaṃ sendraṃ sārka sacandraṃ karacaraṇanakhairaskṣatrahīno 'pi vegāt /
analyzed: saṃrambhāt dānava indraḥ ditijaiḥ saṃyutaḥ deva sainyam sa indram sa arka sa candram kara caraṇa nakhaiḥ askṣatra hīnaḥ u pi vegāt

original: cakrairvaiśvānarābhaistvavanigaganayostiryagūrdhvaṃ samantāt prāpte 'nte kālavahnerjagadakhilamidaṃ rūpamāsīd didhakṣoḥ // VamP_47.38 //
analyzed: cakraiḥ vaiśvānara ābhaiḥ tu avani gaganayoḥ tiryak ūrdhvam samantāt prāpte nte kāla vahneḥ jagat akhilam idam rūpam āsīt didhakṣoḥ

original: taṃ dṛṣṭvā varddhamānaṃ ripamatibalinaṃ devagandharvamukhyāḥ siddhāḥsādhyāśvimukhyā bhayataraladṛśaḥ prādravan dikṣu sarve /
analyzed: tam dṛṣṭvā varddhamānam ripa mati balinam deva gandharva mukhyāḥ siddhāḥ sādhya aśvi mukhyāḥ bhaya tarala dṛśaḥ prādravan dikṣu sarve
poplūyantaḥ ca daityāḥ harim amara gaṇaiḥ arcitam cāru maulim nānā śastra astra pātaiḥ vigalita yaśasam cakruḥ utsikta darpāḥ

original: tānitthaṃprekṣya daityān mayabalipuragān kālanemipradhānān bāṇairākṛṣya śārṅga tvanavaratamurobhedibirvajrakalpaiḥ /
analyzed: tān ittham prekṣya daityān maya bali pura gān kālanemi pradhānān bāṇaiḥ ākṛṣya śārṅga tu anavaratam uraḥ bhedibiḥ vajra kalpaiḥ

original: kopādāraktadṛṣṭiḥ sarathagajahayān dṛṣṭinirdhūtavīryān nārācakhyaiḥ supuṅkhairjalad iva girīn chādayāmāsa viṣṇuḥ // VamP_47.40 //
analyzed: kopāt ārakta dṛṣṭiḥ sa ratha gaja hayān dṛṣṭi nirdhūta vīryān nārāca khyaiḥ su puṅkhaiḥ jalat iva girīn chādayāmāsa viṣṇuḥ
taiḥ vāṇaiḥ chādyamānāḥ hari kara nuditaiḥ kāladaṇḍa prakāśaiḥ nārācaiḥ ardhacandraiḥ bāli maya purāgāḥ bhīta bhītāḥ tu ārantaḥ

original: prārambe dānavendraṃ śatavadanamatho preṣayan kālanemiṃ sa prāyād devasainyaprabhumamitabalaṃ keśavaṃ lokanātham // VamP_47.41 //

original: taṃ dṛṣṭvā śataśīrṣamudyatagadaṃ śailendraśṛṅgākṛtiṃ viṣṇuḥ śārṅgamapāsya satvaramatho jagrāha cakraṃ kare /

original: so 'pyenaṃ prasamīkṣya daityaviṭapapracchedanaṃ māninaṃ provācātha vihasya taṃ ca suciraṃ meghasvano dānavaḥ // VamP_47.42 //
analyzed: saḥ pi enam prasamīkṣya daitya viṭapa pracchedanam māninam provāca atha vihasya tam ca su ciram megha svanaḥ dānavaḥ

original: ayaṃ sa danuputrasainyavitrāsakṛdriṣuḥ paramakopitaḥ sa madhorvighātakṛt /

original: yadyeṣa saṃprati mamāhavamabhyuṣaiti nṛnaṃ na yāti nilayaṃ nijamambujākṣaḥ /

original: ityevamuktvā madhusūdanaṃ vai sa kālanemiḥ sphuritādharoṣṭhaḥ /

original: taṃ vainateyo 'pyupasā khagottmo nipātayāmāsa mune dharaṇyām /

iti śrī vāmanapurāṇe saptacatvāriṃśaḥ dhyāyaḥ
pulastyaḥ uvāca

original: saṃnivṛtte tato bāṇe dānavāḥ satvaraṃ punaḥ /

original: nivṛttā devatānāṃ ca saśastrā yuddhalālasāḥ // VamP_48.1 //
analyzed: nivṛttāḥ devatānām ca sa śastrāḥ yuddha lālasāḥ

original: prāhāmantrya surān sarvān yudhyadhvaṃ vigatajvarāḥ // VamP_48.2 //
analyzed: prāha āmantrya surān sarvān yudhyadhvam vigata jvarāḥ
viṣṇunā atha samādiṣṭāḥ devāḥ śakra purogamāḥ
yuyudhuḥ dānavaiḥ sārdham viṣṇuḥ tu antaradhīyata
mādhavam gatam ājñāya śukraḥ balim uvāca ha
govindena murāḥ tyaktāḥ tvam jayasva adhunā bale
sa purohita vākyena prītaḥ yāte janārdane
gadām ādāya dejasvī deva sainyam abhidrutaḥ
bāṇaḥ bāhu sahasreṇa gṛhya praharaṇāni atha
deva sainyam abhidrutya nijaghāna sahasraśas
māyām āsthāya taiḥ taiḥ rūpa antaraiḥ mune

original: yodhayāmāsa balāvān surāṇāṃ ca varūchinīm // VamP_48.7 //
analyzed: yodhayāmāsa balāvān surāṇām ca varūchinīm
vidyujjihvaḥ praribhadraḥ vṛṣaparvā śatekṣaṇaḥ

original: vipāko vikṣaraḥ sainyaṃ te 'pi devānupādravan // VamP_48.8 //
analyzed: vipākaḥ vikṣaraḥ sainyam te devān upādravan
te hanyamānāḥ ditijaiḥ devāḥ śakra purogamāḥ

original: gate janārdane deve prāyaśo vimukhyābhavan // VamP_48.9 //
analyzed: gate janārdane deve prāyaśas vimukhyāḥ abhavan
tān prabhagnān sura gāṇān bali bāṇā purogamāḥ
pṛṣṭhatas ca adravan sarve trailokya vijigīṣavaḥ
saṃbādhyamānāḥ daiteyaiḥ davāḥ sa indrāḥ bhaya āturāḥ
triviṣṭapam parityajya brahma lokam upāgatāḥ
brahma lokam gateṣu ittham sa indreṣu api sureṣu vai
svarga bhoktā baliḥ jātaḥ sa putra bhrātṛ bāndhavaḥ
śakraḥ bhūt bhagavān brahman baliḥ bāṇaḥ yamaḥ bhavat
varuṇaḥ bhūnmayaḥ somaḥ rāhuḥ hlodaḥ hutāśanaḥ
svarbhānuḥ abhavat sūryaḥ śukraḥ ca āsīt bṛhaspatiḥ
ye nye pi adhikṛtāḥ devāḥ teṣu jātāḥ surārayaḥ

original: devāsuro 'bhūt saṃgrāmo yatra śakro 'pyabhūd baliḥ // VamP_48.15 //
analyzed: deva asuraḥ bhūt saṃgrāmaḥ yatra śakraḥ u pi abhūt baliḥ

original: pātālāḥ sapta tasyāsn vaśe lokatrayaṃ tathā /
analyzed: pātālāḥ sapta vaśe loka trayam tathā
bhūḥ bhuvaḥ svar iti khyātam daśa loka adhipaḥ baliḥ

original: svarge svayaṃ nivasati bhuñjan bhogān sudarlabhān /
analyzed: svarge svayam nivasati bhuñjan bhogān su darlabhān
tatra upāsanta gandharvāḥ viśvāvasu purogamāḥ
tilottamā ādyā apsarasaḥ nṛtyanti sura tāpasa
vādayanti ca vādyāni yakṣa vidyādhara ādayaḥ
vividhān api bhogān ca bhuñjan daitya īśvaraḥ bali

original: sasmāra manasā brahman prahlādaṃ svapitāmaham // VamP_48.19 //
analyzed: sasmāra manasā brahman prahlādam sva pitāmaham
saṃsmṛtaḥ naptṛṇā ca asau suraḥ
samabhyāgāt tvarā yuktaḥ pātālāt svargam avyayam
tam āgatam samīkṣya eva tyaktvā siṃhāsanam baliḥ
kṛta añjali puṭaḥ bhūtvā vavande caraṇau ubhau
pādayoḥ patitam vīram prahlādaḥ tvaritaḥ balim
samutthāpya viveśa parama āsane

original: laṃ baliḥ prāha bhostāta tvatprasādāt surā mayā /
analyzed: laṃ baliḥ prāha bhoḥ tāta tvad prasādāt surā mayā

original: nirjitāḥ śakrarājyaṃ ca hṛtaṃ vīryabalānmayā // VamP_48.23 //
analyzed: nirjitāḥ śakra rājyam ca hṛtam vīrya balāt mayā
tat idam tāta mad vīrya vinirjita sura uttamam

original: trailokyarājyaṃ bhuñja tvaṃ mayi bhṛtye puraḥsthite // VamP_48.24 //
analyzed: trailokya rājyam bhuñja tvam mayi bhṛtye puras sthite

original: etāvatā puṇyayutaḥ syāmahaṃ tāta yat svayam /
analyzed: etāvatā puṇya yutaḥ syām aham tāta yat svayam
tvad aṅghri pūjā abhirataḥ tvad ucchiṣṭa anna bhojanaḥ

original: na sā pālayato rājyaṃ dhṛtirbhavati sattama /
analyzed: na sā pālayataḥ rājyam dhṛtiḥ bhavati sattama

original: yā dhṛtirguruśuśruṣāṃ kurvato jāyate vibho // VamP_48.26 //
analyzed: yā dhṛtiḥ guru śuśruṣām kurvataḥ jāyate vibho
tatas tat uktam balinā vākyam śrutvā dvijottama
prahlādaḥ prāha vacanam dharma kāma artha sādhanam

original: mayā kṛtaṃ rājyamakaṇṭakaṃ purā praśāsitā bhūḥ suhṛdo 'nupūjitāḥ /
analyzed: mayā kṛtam rājyam akaṇṭakam purā praśāsitā bhūḥ suhṛdaḥ nupūjitāḥ

original: dattaṃ yatheṣṭaṃ janināstathātmajāḥ sthito bale samprati yogasādhakaḥ // VamP_48.28 //
analyzed: dattam yatheṣṭam sthitaḥ bale samprati yoga sādhakaḥ
gṛhītam vidhivat mayā bhūyas rpitaḥ tava

original: evaṃ bhava gurūṇāṃ tvaṃ sadā suśrūṣaṇe rataḥ // VamP_48.29 //
analyzed: evam bhava gurūṇām tvam sadā suśrūṣaṇe rataḥ
iti evam uktvā vacanam kare tu ādāya dakṣiṇe

original: śākre siṃhāsane brahman baliṃ tūrṇaṃ nyaveśayat // VamP_48.30 //
analyzed: śākre siṃhāsane brahman balim tūrṇam nyaveśayat
saḥ upaviṣṭaḥ mahā indrasya sarva ratna maye śubhe
siṃha hāsane daitya patiḥ śuśubhe maghavān iva

original: prahlādaṃ prāha vacanaṃ meghagambhīrayā girā // VamP_48.32 //
analyzed: prahlādam prāha vacanam megha gambhīrayā girā
yat mayā tāta kartavyam trailokyam parirakṣatā
dharma artha kāma mokṣebhyaḥ tat ādiśatu me bhavān
tad vākya sama kālam ca śukraḥ prahlādam abravīt
yat yuktam tat mahā bāho vadasva adya uttaram vacaḥ
vacanam bali śukrābhyām śrutvā suraḥ
prāha dharma artha saṃyuktam prahlādaḥ vākyam uttamam

original: yadāyatyāṃ kṣamaṃ rājan yaddhitaṃ bhuvanasya ca /
analyzed: yat āyatyām kṣamam rājan yat hitam bhuvanasya ca

original: avirodhena dharmasya arthasyopārjanaṃ ca yat // VamP_48.36 //
analyzed: avirodhena dharmasya arthasya upārjanam ca yat
sarva sattva anugamanam kāma varga phalam ca yat

original: paratreha ca yacchreyaḥ putra tatkarma āraca // VamP_48.37 //
analyzed: paratra iha ca yat śreyaḥ putra tat karma
yatā ślāghyam prayāsi adya yathā kīrtiḥ bhavet tava

original: yatā nāyaśaso yogastathā kuru mahāmate // VamP_48.38 //
analyzed: yatā na ayaśasaḥ yogaḥ tathā kuru mahāmate
etad artha śriyam dīptām kāṅkṣante puruṣa uttamāḥ

original: kulajo vyasane magnaḥ sakhā cārthabahiḥ kṛtaḥ /
analyzed: kula jaḥ vyasane magnaḥ sakhā ca artha bahis kṛtaḥ

original: vṛddho jñātirguṇī vipraḥ kīrtīśca yaśasā saha // VamP_48.40 //
analyzed: vṛddhaḥ jñātiḥ guṇī vipraḥ kīrtīḥ ca yaśasā saha

original: tasmād yathaite nivasanti putra rājyasthitasyeha kulodgatādyāḥ /
analyzed: tasmāt yathā ete nivasanti putra rājya sthitasya iha kula udgata ādyāḥ

original: tathā yatsvāmalasattvaceṣṭa yathā yaśasvī bhavitāsi loke // VamP_48.41 //
analyzed: tathā yathā yaśasvī bhavitāsi loke
bhūbhyām sadā brāhmaṇa bhūṣitāyām kṣatra anvitāyām dṛḍha vāpitāyām

original: tasmād dvijāgryāḥ śrutiśāstrayuktā narādhipāṃste kratubhirdvijendrā yajñāgnidhūmena nṛpasya śāntiḥ // VamP_48.43 //
analyzed: tasmāt dvijāgryāḥ śruti śāstra yuktāḥ narādhipān te kratubhiḥ dvijendrāḥ yajña agni dhūmena nṛpasya śāntiḥ
tapaḥ dhyayana saṃpannāḥ yājana adhyāpane ratāḥ
santu viprāḥ bale pūjyāḥ tvattaḥ nujñām avāpya hi
svādhyāya yajña niratāḥ dātāraḥ śastra jīvinaḥ
kṣatriyāḥ santu daitya indra prajā pālana dharmiṇaḥ
yajña adhyayana saṃpannāḥ dātāraḥ kṛṣi kāriṇaḥ
pāśupālyam prakurvantu veśyāḥ vipaṇi jīvinaḥ
brāhmaṇa kṣatriya viśām sadā śuśruṣaṇe ratāḥ
śūdrāḥ santu asura śreṣṭha tava ājñā kāriṇaḥ sadā
yadā varṇāḥ svadharma sthāḥ bhavanti ditija īśvara
dharma vṛddhiḥ tadā syāt vai dharma vṛddhau nṛpa udayaḥ

original: tasmād varṇāḥ svadharmasthāstvayā kāryāḥ sadā bale /
analyzed: tasmāt varṇāḥ svadharma sthāḥ tvayā kāryāḥ sadā bale
tad vṛddhau bhavataḥ vṛddhiḥ tad vā anau hāniḥ ucyate

original: itthaṃ vacaḥ śrāṇya mahāsurendro baliṃ mahātmā sa babhūva tūṣṇīm /
analyzed: ittham vacaḥ śrāṇya mahā asura indraḥ balim mahātmā sa babhūva tūṣṇīm

original: tato yadājñāpayase kariṣye itthaṃ baliḥ prāha vaco maharṣe // VamP_48.50 //
analyzed: tatas yadā ājñāpayase kariṣye ittham baliḥ prāha vacaḥ mahā ṛṣe
iti śrī vāmanapurāṇe aṣṭacatvāriṃśaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: tato gateṣu deveṣu brahmalokaṃ prati dvija /
analyzed: tatas gateṣu deveṣu brahma lokam prati dvija

original: kalistadā dharmayutaṃ jagad dṛṣṭvā kṛte yathā /
analyzed: kaliḥ tadā dharma yutam jagat dṛṣṭvā kṛte yathā

original: brahmāṇaṃ śaraṇaṃ bheje svabhāvasya niṣeṇāt // VamP_49.2 //
analyzed: brahmāṇam śaraṇam bheje svabhāvasya niṣeṇāt

original: gatvā sa dadṛśe devaṃ sendrairdevaiḥ samanvitam /

original: svadīptyā dyotayantaṃ ca svadeśaṃ sasurāsuram // VamP_49.3 //
analyzed: sva dīptyā dyotayantam ca sva deśam sa sura asuram

original: mama svabhāvo balinā nāśito devasattama // VamP_49.4 //
analyzed: mama svabhāvaḥ balinā nāśitaḥ deva sattama

original: taṃ prāha bhagavān yogī svabhāvaṃ jagato 'pi hi /
analyzed: tam prāha bhagavān yogī svabhāvam jagataḥ u hi

original: na kevalaṃ hi bhavato hṛtaṃ tena balīyasā // VamP_49.5 //
analyzed: na kevalam hi bhavataḥ hṛtam tena balīyasā

original: paśyasva tiṣya devendraṃ varuṇaṃ ca samārutam /
analyzed: paśyasva tiṣya deva indram varuṇam ca sa mārutam

original: bhāskaro 'pi hi dīnatvaṃ prayāto hi balād baleḥ // VamP_49.6 //
analyzed: bhāskaraḥ u pi hi dīna tvam prayātaḥ hi balāt baleḥ

original: na tasya kaścit trailokye pratiṣeddhāsti karmaṇaḥ /
analyzed: na tasya kaścid trailokye pratiṣeddhā asti karmaṇaḥ

original: ṛte sahasraṃ śirasaṃ hariṃ daśaśatāṅghrikam // VamP_49.7 //
analyzed: ṛte sahasram śirasam harim daśa śata aṅghrikam

original: ma bhūmiṃ ca tathā nākaṃ rājyaṃ lakṣmīṃ yaso 'vyayaḥ /
analyzed: bhūmim ca tathā nākam rājyam lakṣmīm yasaḥ vyayaḥ
samāhariṣyati baleḥ kartuḥ saddharma gocaram
iti evam uktaḥ devena brahmaṇā kaliḥ avyayaḥ

original: dīnān dṛṣṭvā sa śakrādīn vibhītakavanaṃ gataḥ // VamP_49.9 //
analyzed: dīnān dṛṣṭvā sa śakra ādīn vibhītaka vanam gataḥ
kṛtaḥ prāvarttata tadā kaleḥ na āsāt jagattraye

original: dayā dānaṃ tvānṛśaṃsyaṃ śuśruṣā yajñakarma ca // VamP_49.11 //
analyzed: dayā dānam tu ānṛśaṃsyam śuśruṣā yajña karma ca

svadharma sthāyinaḥ varṇāḥ hi āśramān ca aviśn dvijāḥ

dharma uttare vartamāne brahman asmin jagattraye

original: papraccha kāsi māṃ brūhi kenāsyarthena cāgatā // VamP_49.15 //

original: bale śṛṇuṣva yāsmi tvāmāyātā mahiṣi balāt // VamP_49.16 //

original: tena tyaktastu maghavā tato 'haṃ tvāmihāgatā // VamP_49.17 //
analyzed: tena tyaktaḥ tu maghavā tatas ham tvām iha āgatā

śveta ambara dharā ca eva śveta sraj anulepanā
rakta ambara dharā ca anyā rakta sraj anulepanā
rakta vāji sāma ārūḍhā rakta aṅgī rājasī hi sā
pīta ambarā pīra varṇā pīta mālya anulepanā
sauvarṇa syandana carā tāmasam guṇam āśritā
nīla ambarā nīla gandhām anulepanā

original: yā sā śvetāmbharā śvetā sattvāḍhyā kuñjarasthitā // VamP_49.22 //

original: prajāpatibhyastāṃ prādāt śukrāya ca viśaḥsu ca /

original: sā dānavān naiṛtāṃś ca śūdrān vidyādharānapi /

analyzed: evam vibhaktāḥ tāḥ nāryaḥ tena devena cakriṇā
etāsām ca sva rūpaḥ tāḥ tiṣṭhanti nidhayaḥ vyayāḥ

śastra astra ādika vastrāṇi raktā padmaḥ nidhiḥ smṛtaḥ

original: oṣadhyaḥ paśavaḥ pītā mahānīlo nidhiḥ sthitaḥ /

original: anyeṣāmapi saṃhartrī nīlā śaṅkho nidhiḥ sthitaḥ /

original: etāsu saṃsthitānāṃ ca yāni rūpāṇi dānava /

original: ityevaṃ kathitastubhyaṃ teṣāṃ dānava nirṇayaḥ // VamP_49.40 //

original: prabhā matiḥ śramā bhūtirvidyā nītirdayā tathā // VamP_49.49 //
analyzed: prabhā matiḥ śramā bhūtiḥ vidyā nītiḥ dayā tathā

analyzed: jagāma brahmasadanam saha devaiḥ śacīpatiḥ

original: brahmā provāca śakraitad bhujyate svakṛtaṃ phalam /

analyzed: śakraḥ papraccha bho brūhi kim mayā duṣkṛtam kṛtam

original: kṛntanaṃ prāptavān garbho yadaśaucā hi sā bhavat // VamP_50.7 //
analyzed: kṛntanam prāptavān garbhaḥ yat aśaucā hi sā bhavat
tatas bravīt kaśyapaḥ tu mātuḥ deṣaḥ sa dāsa tām

original: gatastato vinihato dāso 'pi kuliśena bho // VamP_50.8 //
analyzed: gataḥ tatas vinihataḥ kuliśena bho
tat śrutvā kaśyapa vacaḥ prāha śakraḥ pitāmaham

original: vināśaṃ pāpmano brūhi prāyaścittaṃ vibho mama // VamP_50.9 //
analyzed: vināśam pāpmanaḥ brūhi prāyaścittam vibho mama
brahmā provāca deveśam vasiṣṭhaḥ kaśyapaḥ tathā

original: hitaṃ sarvasya jagataḥ śakrasyāpi viśeṣataḥ // VamP_50.10 //
analyzed: hitam sarvasya jagataḥ śakrasya api viśeṣataḥ
śaṅkha cakra gadā pāṇiḥ mādhavaḥ puruṣottamaḥ

original: taṃ prapadyasva śaraṇaṃ sa te śreyo vidhāsyati // VamP_50.11 //
analyzed: tam prapadyasva śaraṇam sa te śreyaḥ vidhāsyati

original: sahasrākṣo 'pi vacanaṃ gurūṇāṃ sa niśamya vai /
analyzed: sahasrākṣaḥ vacanam gurūṇām sa niśamya vai
provāca su alpa kālena kasmin prāpyaḥ bahu udayaḥ
tam ūcuḥ devatāḥ martye su alpa kāle mahā udayaḥ

original: ityevamuktaḥ surarāḍ viriñcinā marīciputreṇa ca kaśyapena /
analyzed: iti evam uktaḥ surarāj viriñcinā marīci putreṇa ca kaśyapena
tathā eva mitrāvaruṇa ātmajena vegāt mahī pṛṣṭham avāpya tasthau
kāliñjarasya uttaratas su puṇyaḥ tathā himādreḥ api dakṣiṇa sthaḥ

original: suśasthalāt pūrvata eva viśruto vasoḥ purāt piścimato 'vatasthe // VamP_50.14 //
analyzed: suśasthalāt pūrvatas eva viśrutaḥ vasoḥ purāt piścimataḥ vatasthe

original: pūrvaṃ gayena nṛvarema yatra yaṣṭo 'śvamedhaḥ śatakṛtsadakṣiṇaḥ /
analyzed: pūrvam gayena nṛ varema yatra yaṣṭaḥ śvamedhaḥ śata kṛt sa dakṣiṇaḥ
manuṣyemedhaḥ śata kṛt sahasra kṛt narendrasūyaḥ ca sahasra kṛt vai

original: tathā purā duryajanaḥ surāsuraiḥ khyāto mahāmedha iti prasiddhaḥ /
analyzed: tathā purā duryajanaḥ sura asuraiḥ khyātaḥ mahāmedhaḥ iti prasiddhaḥ

original: yatrāsya cakre bhagavān murāriḥ vāstavyamavyaktatanuḥ khamūrtimat /
analyzed: yatra asya cakre bhagavān murāriḥ vāstavyam avyakta tanuḥ kha mūrtimat

original: khyātiṃ jagāmātha gadādhareti mahāghavṛkṣasya śitaḥ kuṭhāraḥ // VamP_50.16 //
analyzed: khyātim jagāma atha gadādhara iti mahā agha vṛkṣasya śitaḥ kuṭhāraḥ
yasmin dvijendrāḥ śruti śāstra varjitāḥ sama tvam āyānti pitāmahena

original: sakṛt pitṛn yatra ca saṃprapūjya bhaktyā tvananyena hi cetasaiva /
analyzed: sakṛt pitṛn yatra ca saṃprapūjya bhaktyā tu ananyena hi cetasā eva

original: phalaṃ mahāmedhamakhasya mānavā labhantyanantyaṃ bhagavatprasādāt // VamP_50.17 //
analyzed: phalam mahā medha makhasya mānavāḥ labhanti anantyam bhagavat prasādāt
mahā nadī yatra sura ṛṣi kanyāḥ jala apadeśāt himaśailam etya
cakre jagat pāpa vinaṣṭim agryām saṃdarśana prāśanam añjanena
tatra śakraḥ samabhyetya mahā nadyāḥ taṭe dbhute
ārādhanāya devasya kṛtvā āśramam avasthitaḥ
prātaḥsnāyī tu adhas śāyī eka bhaktaḥ tu a yācitaḥ

original: tapastepe sahasrākṣaḥ stuvan devaṃ gadādharam // VamP_50.20 //
analyzed: tapaḥ tepe sahasrākṣaḥ stuvan devam gadādharam
tasya evam tapyataḥ smayak jita sarva indriyasya hi
kāma krodha vihīnasya sāgraḥ saṃvatsaraḥ gataḥ

original: tato gadādharaḥ prīto vāsavaṃ prāha nārada /
analyzed: tatas gadādharaḥ prītaḥ vāsavam prāha nārada

original: gaccha prīto 'smi bhavato muktapāpo 'si sāmpratam // VamP_50.22 //
analyzed: gaccha prītaḥ smi bhavataḥ mukta pāpaḥ si sāmpratam

original: nijaṃ rājyaṃ ca deveśa prāpsyase na cirādiva /
analyzed: nijam rājyam ca deveśa prāpsyase na cirāt iva

original: yatiṣyāmi tathā śakra bhāvi śreyo yatā tava // VamP_50.23 //
analyzed: yatiṣyāmi tathā śakra bhāvi śreyaḥ yatā tava
iti evam uktaḥ gadādhareṇa visarjitaḥ snāpya manoharāyām

original: snātasya devasya tadainaso narāstaṃ procurasmānanusāsayasva // VamP_50.24 //
analyzed: snātasya devasya tad ainasaḥ narāḥ tam procuḥ asmān anusāsayasva

original: provāca tān bhīṣaṇakarmakārān nāmnā pulindān mama pāpasaṃbhavāḥ /
analyzed: provāca tān bhīṣaṇa karmakārān nāmnā pulindān mama pāpa saṃbhavāḥ
vasadhvam eva antaram adri sukhyayoḥ himādri kāliñjarayoḥ pulindāḥ
iti evam uktvā surarāj pulindān vimukta pāpaḥ mara siddha yakṣaiḥ
saṃpūjyamānaḥ nujagāma camam mātuḥ tadā dharma nivāsam īḍyam
dṛṣṭvā aditim mūrdhni kṛtāñjaliḥ tu vinā āmra mauliḥ samupājagām

original: praṇamya pādau kamalodarābhau nivedayāmāsa tapastadātmanaḥ // VamP_50.27 //
analyzed: praṇamya pādau kamala udara ābhau nivedayāmāsa tapaḥ tadā ātmanaḥ

original: papraccha sā kāraṇamīśvaraṃ tam āghrāya cāliṅgya sahāśrudṛṣṭyā /
analyzed: papraccha sā kāraṇam īśvaram tam āghrāya ca āliṅgya saha aśru dṛṣṭyā

original: sa cācacakṣe balinā raṇe jayaṃ tadātmano devagaṇaiśca sārdham // VamP_50.28 //
analyzed: sa ca ācacakṣe balinā raṇe jayam tadā ātmanaḥ deva gaṇaiḥ ca sārdham

original: śrutvaiva sā śokapariplutāṅgī jñātvā jitaṃ daityasutaiḥ sutaṃ tam /
analyzed: śrutvā eva sā śoka paripluta aṅgī jñātvā jitam daitya sutaiḥ sutam tam

original: duḥkhānvitā devamanādyamīḍyaṃ jagāma viṣṇuṃ śaraṇaṃ vareṇyam // VamP_50.29 //
analyzed: duḥkha anvitā devam anādyam īḍyam jagāma viṣṇum śaraṇam vareṇyam
nāradaḥ uvāca
kasmin janitrī sura sattamānām sthāne hṛṣīkeśam anantam ādyam

original: carācarasya prabhavaṃ purāṇamārādhayāmāsa śubhe vada tvam // VamP_50.30 //
analyzed: carācarasya prabhavam purāṇam ārādhayāmāsa śubhe vada tvam
pulastyaḥ uvāca
surāraṇiḥ śakram avekṣya dīnam parājitam dānava nāyakena

original: site 'tha pakṣe marārkṣager'ke ghṛtārciṣaḥ syādatha saptame 'hni / /
analyzed: site tha pakṣe mara arkṣa ga irke ghṛtārciṣaḥ syāt atha saptame hni  /

original: 50.31 dṛṣṭvaive devaṃ tridaśādhipaṃ taṃ mahodaye śakradiśādhirūḍham /
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā eve devam tridaśādhipam tam mahodaye śakra diśā adhirūḍham

original: nirāśanā saṃyatavāk sucitā tadopatasthe śaraṇaṃ surendram // VamP_50.32 //
analyzed: nirāśanā saṃyata vāc su citā tadā upatasthe śaraṇam surendram
aditiḥ uvāca
jayasva divya ambuja kośa caura jayasva saṃsāra taroḥ kuṭhāra
jayasva pāpa indhana jātavedaḥ tamaḥ ogha saṃrodha namaḥ namaḥ te

original: namo 'su te bhāskara divyamūrte trailokyalakṣmītilakāya te namaḥ /
analyzed: namaḥ su te bhāskara divya mūrte trailokya lakṣmī tilakāya te namaḥ

original: tvaṃ kāraṇaṃ sarvacarācarasya nātho 'si māṃ pālaya viśvamūrte // VamP_50.34 //
analyzed: tvam kāraṇam sarva carācarasya nāthaḥ si mām pālaya viśvamūrte

original: tvayā jagannātha jaganmayena nāthena śakro nijarājyahānim /
analyzed: tvayā jagannātha jagat mayena nāthena śakraḥ nija rājya hānim

original: avāptāvān śatruparābhavaṃ ca tato bhavantaṃ śaraṇaṃ prapannā // VamP_50.35 //
analyzed: avāptāvān śatru parābhavam ca tatas bhavantam śaraṇam prapannā

original: ityevamuktvā surupūjitaṃ sā ālikhya raktena hi candanena /
analyzed: iti evam uktvā suru pūjitam sā ālikhya raktena hi candanena

original: saṃpūjayitvā karavīrapuṣyaiḥ saṃdhūpya dhūpaiḥ kaṇamarkabhojyam // VamP_50.36 //
analyzed: saṃpūjayitvā karavīra puṣyaiḥ saṃdhūpya dhūpaiḥ kaṇam arka bhojyam

analyzed: nivedya ca eva ājya yutam mahārham annam mahā indrasya hitāya devī

original: stavena puṇyena ca saṃstuvantī sthitā nirāhāramathopavāsam // VamP_50.37 //
analyzed: stavena puṇyena ca saṃstuvantī sthitā nirāhāram atha upavāsam

original: tato dvitīye 'hni kṛtapraṇāmā snātvā vidhānena ca pūjayitvā /
analyzed: tatas dvitīye hni kṛta praṇāmā snātvā vidhānena ca pūjayitvā

original: dattvā dvijebhyaḥ kaṇakaṃ tilājyaṃ tato 'grataḥ sā prayatā babhūva // VamP_50.38 //
analyzed: dattvā dvijebhyaḥ kaṇakam tila ājyam tatas gratas sā prayatā babhūva
tatas prītaḥ bhavat bhānuḥ ghṛta arciḥ sūrya maṇḍalāt
viniḥsṛtya yā agratas sthitvā idam vacanam abravīt
su prītaḥ tava aham dakṣa nandini

original: prāpsyase durlabhaṃ kāmaṃ matprasādānna saṃśayaḥ // VamP_50.40 //
analyzed: prāpsyase durlabham kāmam mad prasādāt na saṃśayaḥ

original: rājyaṃ tvattanayānāṃ vai dāsye devi surāraṇi /
analyzed: rājyam tvad tanayānām vai dāsye devi surāraṇi
dānavān dhvaṃsayiṣyāmi saṃbhūya evā udare tava

original: tad vākyaṃ vāsudevasya śrutvā brahman surāraṇiḥ /
analyzed: tat vākyam vāsudevasya śrutvā brahman surāraṇiḥ

original: provāca jagatāṃ yoniṃ vepamānā punaḥ punaḥ // VamP_50.42 //
analyzed: provāca jagatām yonim vepamānā punar punar
katham tvām udareṇa aham voḍhum śakṣyāmi durdharam
yasya udare jagat sarvam vasate sthāṇu jaṅgamam
kaḥ tvām dhārayitum nātha śaktaḥ trailokya dhārī asi

original: yasya saptārṇavāḥ kukṣau nivasanti sahādribhiḥ // VamP_50.44 //
analyzed: yasya sapta arṇavāḥ kukṣau nivasanti saha adribhiḥ

original: tasmād yathā surapatiḥ śakraḥ syāt surarāḍiha /
analyzed: tasmāt yathā surapatiḥ śakraḥ syāt surarāj iha

original: yathā ca na mama kleśastathā kuru janārdana // VamP_50.45 //
analyzed: yathā ca na mama kleśaḥ tathā kuru janārdana
viṣṇuḥ uvāca
satyam etat mahābhāge durdharaḥ smi sura asuraiḥ

original: tathāpi saṃbhaviṣyāmi ahaṃ devyudare tava // VamP_50.46 //
analyzed: tathā api saṃbhaviṣyāmi aham devī udare tava
ātmānam bhuvanān śailān tvām ca devi sa kaśyapām

original: dhārayiṣyāmi yogena mā viṣādaṃ kuthāmbike // VamP_50.47 //
analyzed: dhārayiṣyāmi yogena mā viṣādam kuthā ambike
tava udare ham dākṣeyi saṃbhaviṣyāmi vai yadā
tadā nistejasaḥ daityāḥ sabhaviṣyanti asaṃśayam
iti evam uktvā bhagavān viveśa tasyāḥ ca bhūyas rigaṇa pramardī

original: svatejasoṃ'śena viveśa devyāḥ tadodare śakrahitāya vipra // VamP_50.49 //
analyzed: sva tejasā oṃśena viveśa devyāḥ tadā udare śakra hitāya vipra
iti śrī vāmanapurāṇe pañcāśaḥ dhyāyaḥ
pulastyaḥ uvāca
devamātuḥ sthite udare vāmana ākṛtau
nistejasaḥ surāḥ jātāḥ yathā uktam viśvayoninā
nistejasaḥ surān dṛṣṭvā prahlādam dānava īśvaram
baliḥ dānava śārdūlaḥ idam vacanam abravīt
baliḥ uvāca

original: tāta nistejaso daityāḥ kena jātāstu hetunā /
analyzed: tāta nistejasaḥ daityāḥ kena jātāḥ tu hetunā
kathyatām param ajñaḥ si śubha aśubha viśārada
pulastyaḥ uvāca
tad pautra vacanam śrutvā muhūrtam dhyānam āstitaḥ

original: kimarthaṃ tejaso hāniriti kasmādatīva ca // VamP_51.4 //
analyzed: kimartham tejasaḥ hāniḥ iti kasmāt atīva ca
sa jñātvā vāsudeva uttham bhayam daityeṣu anuttamam

original: cintayāmāsa yogātmā kva viṣṇuḥ sāṃprataṃ sthitaḥ // VamP_51.5 //
analyzed: cintayāmāsa yoga ātmā kva viṣṇuḥ sāṃpratam sthitaḥ

original: adho nābheḥ sa pātālān sapta saṃcintya nārada /
analyzed: adhas nābheḥ sa pātālān sapta saṃcintya nārada
nābeḥ upari bhūḥ ādit lokān cartum iyāt vaśī
bhūmim sa paṅkaja ākārām tad madhye paṅkaja ākṛtim

original: meruṃ dadarśa śailendraṃ śātakaumbhaṃ maharddhimat // VamP_51.7 //
analyzed: merum dadarśa śaila indram śātakaumbham mahā ṛddhimat
tasya upari mahā puryaḥ tu aṣṭau loka patīḥ tathā
teṣām ātuḥ sa dadṛśe mṛga pakṣi gaṇaiḥ vṛtam
tad adhastāt mahā puṇyam āśramam sura pūjitam
devamātuḥ sa dadṛśe mṛga pakṣi gaṇaiḥ vṛtam
tām dṛṣṭvā deva jananīm sarva tejaḥ adhikām mune
viveśa dānava patiḥ anveṣṭum madhusūdanam
sa dṛṣṭavān jagannātham mādhavam vāmana ākṛtim
sarva bhīta vareṇyam tam devamātuḥ atha udare
tam dṛṣṭvā puṇḍarīkākṣam śaṅkha cakra gadā dharam
sura asura gaṇaiḥ sarvaiḥ sarvatas vyāpta vigraham
tena eva krama yogena dṛṣṭvā vāmana tām gatam
daitya tejaḥ haram viṣṇum prakṛti sthaḥ bhavat tatas
athā uvāca mahā buddhiḥ virojana sutam balim

original: prahlādo madhuraṃ vākyaṃ praṇamya madhusūdanam // VamP_51.14 //
analyzed: prahlādaḥ madhuram vākyam praṇamya madhusūdanam
prahlādaḥ uvāca
śrūyatām sarvam ākhyāsye yatas vaḥ bhayam āgatam

original: yena nistejaso daityā jātā daityendra hetunā // VamP_51.15 //
analyzed: yena nistejasaḥ daityāḥ jātāḥ daitya indra hetunā
bhavatā nirjitāḥ devāḥ sa indra rudra arka pāvakāḥ

original: prayātāḥ śaraṇaṃ devaṃ hariṃ tribhuvaneśvaram // VamP_51.16 //
analyzed: prayātāḥ śaraṇam devam harim tribhuvana īśvaram
sa teṣām abhayam dattvā śakra ādinām jagadguruḥ
avatīrṇaḥ mahā bāhuḥ adityāḥ jaṭhare hariḥ
hṛtāni vaḥ tena bale tejāṃsi iti matiḥ mama

original: nālaṃ tamo viṣahituṃ sthātuṃ sūryodayaṃ bale // VamP_51.18 //
analyzed: na alam tamaḥ viṣahitum sthātum sūrya udayam bale
pulastyaḥ uvāca
prahlāda vacanam śrutvā krodha prasphurita adharaḥ
prahlādam āha atha baliḥ bhāvi karma pracoditaḥ
baliḥ uvāca

original: tāta ko 'ya harirnāma yato no bhayamāgatam /
analyzed: tāta kaḥ hariḥ nāma yatas naḥ bhayam āgatam

original: santi me śataśo daityā vāsudevabalādhikāḥ // VamP_51.20 //
analyzed: santi me śataśas daityāḥ vāsudeva bala adhikāḥ
sahasraśas yaiḥ amarāḥ sa indra rudra agni mārutāḥ

original: nirjitya tyājitāḥ svargaṃ bhagnadarpā raṇājire // VamP_51.21 //
analyzed: nirjitya tyājitāḥ svargam bhagna darpāḥ raṇa ajire

original: yena sūryarathād vegāt cakraṃ kṛṣṭaṃ mahājavam /
analyzed: yena sūrya rathāt vegāt cakram kṛṣṭam mahā javam
sa vipracittiḥ balavān mama sainya purassaraḥ
ayaḥśuṅku śivaḥ śaṃbhuḥ asilomā vilomakṛt
triśirāḥ makarākṣaḥ ca vṛṣaparvā natekṣamaḥ
ete ca anaye ca balinaḥ nānā āyudha visāra dāḥ

original: yeṣāmekaikaśo viṣṇuḥ kalāṃ nārhati ṣoḍaśīm // VamP_51.24 //
analyzed: yeṣām ekaikaśas viṣṇuḥ kalām na arhati ṣoḍaśīm
pulastyaḥ uvāca
pautrasya etat vacaḥ śrutvā prahlādaḥ krodha mūrchitaḥ
dhik dhik iti āha sa balim vaikuṇṭha ākṣepa vādinam
dhik tvām pāpa samāra āram duṣuṭa buddhim su bāliśam

original: hariṃ nindayato jihvā kathaṃ na patitā tava // VamP_51.26 //
analyzed: harim nindayataḥ jihvā katham na patitā tava
śocyaḥ tvam asi durbuddhe nindanīyaḥ ca sādhubhiḥ
yat trailokya gurum viṣṇum abhinindasi durmate

original: śocyaścāsmi na saṃdeho yena jātaḥ pitā tava /
analyzed: śocyaḥ ca asmi na saṃdehaḥ yena jātaḥ pitā tava

original: yasya tvaṃ karkaśaḥ putro jāto devāvamānyakaḥ // VamP_51.28 //
analyzed: yasya tvam karkaśaḥ putraḥ jātaḥ deva avamānyakaḥ

original: bhavān kila vijānāti tathā cāmī mahāsurāḥ /
analyzed: bhavān kila vijānāti tathā ca amī mahā asurāḥ

original: yatā nānyaḥ priyaḥ kaścinmama tasmājjanārdanāt // VamP_51.29 //
analyzed: yatā na anyaḥ priyaḥ kaścid mama tasmāt janārdanāt
jānan api priyataram prāṇebhyaḥ pi harim mam
sarva īśvara īśvaram devam katham ninditavān asi
guruḥ pūjyaḥ tava pitā pūjyaḥ tasya api aham guruḥ
mama api pūjyaḥ bhagavān guruḥ loka guruḥ hariḥ
guroḥ guru guruḥ mūḍha pūjyaḥ pajyatamaḥ tava

original: pūjyaṃ nindayase pāpa kathaṃ na patito 'syadhaḥ // VamP_51.32 //
analyzed: pūjyam pāpa katham na
śocanīyāḥ durācārāḥ dānavāmī kṛtāḥ tvayā

original: yeṣāṃ tvaṃ karkaśo rājā vāsudevasya nindakaḥ // VamP_51.33 //
analyzed: yeṣām tvam karkaśaḥ rājā vāsudevasya nindakaḥ
yasmāt pūjya ūrcanīyaḥ ca bhavatā ninditaḥ hariḥ
tasmāt pāpa samācarā rājya nāśam avāpnuhi

original: yatā nānyat priyataraṃ vidyate mama keśavāt /
analyzed: yatā na anyat priyataram vidyate mama keśavāt

original: manasā karmaṇā vācā rājyabhraṣṭastathā pata // VamP_51.35 //
analyzed: manasā karmaṇā vācā rājya bhraṣṭaḥ tathā pata

original: yatā na tasmādaparaṃ vyatiriktaṃ hi vidyate /

analyzed: samuttārya prasannāḥ te papracchuḥ sarve eva hi

original: kimarthaṃ patito 'sīha kenākṣipto 'si no vada // VamP_52.56 //
analyzed: kimartham patitaḥ si iha kena ākṣiptaḥ si naḥ vada
teṣām ākarṇya vacanam kampamānaḥ muhur muhur
prāha dhundhu purogān tām śrūyatām atra kāraṇam
brāhmaṇaḥ guṇavān āsīt prabhāsaḥ iti viśrutaḥ

original: sarvasāstrārthavit prājño gotrataś cāpi vāruṇaḥ // VamP_52.58 //
analyzed: sarva sāstra artha vid prājñaḥ gotrataḥ ca api vāruṇaḥ
tasya putra dvayam jātam manda prajñam su duḥkhitam

original: tatra jyeṣṭho mama bhrātā kanīyānaparastvaham // VamP_52.59 //
analyzed: tatra jyeṣṭhaḥ mama bhrātā kanīyān aparaḥ tu aham

original: netrabhāsa iti khyāto jyeṣṭho bhrātā mamāsura /
analyzed: netrabhāsaḥ iti khyātaḥ jyeṣṭhaḥ bhrātā mama asura

original: mama nāma pitā cakre gatibhāseti kautukāt // VamP_52.60 //
analyzed: mama nāma pitā cakre gati bhāsā iti kautukāt
ramyaḥ ca āvasathaḥ bandho śubhaḥ ca āsīt pituḥ mama
triviṣṭapa guṇaiḥ yuktaḥ cāru rūpaḥ mahā asura

original: tataḥ kālena mahatā āvayoḥ sa pitā mṛtaḥ /
analyzed: tatas kālena mahatā āvayoḥ sa pitā mṛtaḥ
tasya ūrdhvadehikam kṛtvā gṛham āvām samāgatau

original: tato mayoktaḥ sa bhrātā vibhajāma gṛhaṃ vayam /
analyzed: tatas mayā uktaḥ sa bhrātā vibhajāma gṛham vayam

original: tenokto naiva bhavato vidyate bhāgā ityaham // VamP_52.63 //
analyzed: tena uktaḥ na eva bhavataḥ vidyate bhāgāḥ iti aham
kubja vāmana khañjānām klībānām śvitriṇām api

original: unmattānāṃ tathāndhānāṃ dhanabhāgo na vidyate // VamP_52.64 //
analyzed: unmattānām tathā andhānām dhana bhāgaḥ na vidyate
śayyā āsana sthāna mātram sva icchayā anna bhuja kriyā

original: etāvad dīyate tebhyo nārthabhāgaharā hi te // VamP_52.65 //
analyzed: etāvat dīyate tebhyaḥ na artha bhāga harāḥ hi te

original: evamukte mayā soktaḥ kimarthaṃ paitṛkād gṛhāt /
analyzed: evam ukte mayā saḥ uktaḥ kimartham paitṛkāt gṛhāt

original: dhanārthabhāgamarhāmi nāhaṃ nyāyena kena vai // VamP_52.66 //
analyzed: dhana artha bhāgam arhāmi na aham nyāyena kena vai
iti uktau ati vākye sau bhrātā me kopa saṃyutaḥ
samutkṣipya ākṣipan nadyām asyām mām iti kāraṇāt

original: mamāsyāṃ nimnagāyāṃ tu madhyena plavato gataḥ /
analyzed: mama asyām nimnagāyām tu madhyena plavataḥ gataḥ
kālaḥ saṃvatsara ākhyaḥ tu yuṣmābhiḥ iha ca uddhṛtaḥ

original: ke bhavanto 'tra saṃprāptāḥ sasnehā bāndhavā iva /
analyzed: ke bhavantaḥ tra saṃprāptāḥ sa snehāḥ bāndhavāḥ iva

original: ko 'yaṃ ca śakrapratimo dīkṣito yo mahābhujaḥ // VamP_52.69 //
analyzed: kaḥ yam ca śakra pratimaḥ dīkṣitaḥ yaḥ mahā bhujaḥ
tat me sarvam samākhyātāḥ yāthātathyam tapodhanāḥ

original: maharddhisaṃyutā yūyaṃ sānukampāśca me bhṛśam // VamP_52.70 //
analyzed: mahā ṛddhi saṃyutāḥ yūyam sa anukampāḥ ca me bhṛśam
tat vāmana vacaḥ śrutvā bhārgavāḥ dvijasattamāḥ

original: procurvaṃ dvijā brahman gotraścāpi bhārgavāḥ // VamP_52.71 //
analyzed: procuḥ vam dvijāḥ brahman gotraḥ ca api bhārgavāḥ
asau api mahā tejāḥ dhundhuḥ nāma mahā asuraḥ

original: dātā bhoktā vibhaktā ca dīkṣito yajñakarmaṇi // VamP_52.72 //
analyzed: dātā bhoktā vibhaktā ca dīkṣitaḥ yajña karmaṇi
iti evam uktvā deveśam vāmanam bhārgavāḥ tatas
procuḥ daitya patim sarve vāmana artha karam vacaḥ
dīyatām asya daitya indra sarva upaskara saṃyutam

original: śrīmadāvasathaṃ dāsyo ratnāni vividhāni ca // VamP_52.74 //
analyzed: śrīmat āvasatham dāsyaḥ ratnāni vividhāni ca
iti dvijānām vacanam śrutvā daitya patiḥ vacaḥ

original: prāha dvijendra te dadmi yāvadicchasi vai dhanam // VamP_52.75 //
analyzed: prāha dvijendra te dadmi yāvat icchasi vai dhanam

original: dāste gṛhaṃ hiraṇyaṃ ca vājinaḥ syandanān gajān /
analyzed: dāste gṛham hiraṇyam ca vājinaḥ syandanān gajān
prayacchāmi adya bhavataḥ vriyatām īpsitam vibho
tat vākyam dānava pateḥ śrutvā vāmanaḥ
prāha asura patim dhundhum sva artha siddhi karam vacaḥ

original: sodareṇāpi hi bhrātrā hriyante yasya saṃpadaḥ /
analyzed: sodareṇa api hi bhrātrā hriyante yasya saṃpadaḥ

original: tasyākṣamasya yaddattaṃ kimanyo na hariṣyati // VamP_52.78 //
analyzed: tasya akṣamasya yat dattam kim anyaḥ na hariṣyati
dāsī dāsān ca bhṛtyān ca gṛham ratnam paricchadam
samartheṣu dvijendreṣu prayacchasva mahā bhuja
mama pramāṇam ālokya māmakam ca pada trayam

original: saṃprayacchasva daityendra nādhikaṃ rakṣituṃ kṣamaḥ // VamP_52.80 //
analyzed: saṃprayacchasva daitya indra na adhikam rakṣitum kṣamaḥ

original: ityevamukte vacane mahātmanā vihasya daityādhipatiḥ saṛtvijaḥ /
analyzed: iti evam ukte vacane mahātmanā vihasya daitya adhipatiḥ sa ṛtvijaḥ

original: prādād dvijendrāya padatrayaṃ tadā yadā sa nānyaṃ pragṛhāṇa kiñcit // VamP_52.81 //
analyzed: prādāt dvijendrāya pada trayam tadā yadā sa nā anyam pragṛhāṇa kiñcid
krama trayam tāvat avekṣya dattam mahā sura indreṇa vibhuḥ yaśasvī

original: cakre tato laṅghayituṃ trivikramaṃ rūpamanantaśaktiḥ // VamP_52.82 //
analyzed: cakre tatas laṅghayitum trivikramam rūpam ananta śaktiḥ

original: kṛtvā ca rūpaṃ ditijāṃśca hatvā praṇamya carṣin prathamakrameṇa /
analyzed: kṛtvā ca rūpam ditijān ca hatvā praṇamya ca ṛṣin prathama krameṇa

original: mahīṃ mahīdhraiḥ sahitāṃ sahārmavāṃ jahāra ratnākarapattanairyutām // VamP_52.83 //
analyzed: mahīm mahīdhraiḥ sahitām sa hārmavām jahāra ratna ākara pattanaiḥ yutām

original: bhuvaṃ sanākaṃ tridasādhivāsaṃ somārkaṛkṣair abhimaṇḍitaṃ nabhaḥ /
analyzed: bhuvam sa nākam tridasa adhivāsam soma arka ṛkṣaiḥ abhimaṇḍitam nabhaḥ

original: devo dvitīyena jahāra vegāt krameṇa devapriyamīpsurīśvaraḥ // VamP_52.84 //
analyzed: devaḥ dvitīyena jahāra vegāt krameṇa deva priyam īpsuḥ īśvaraḥ

original: kramaṃ tṛtīyaṃ na yadāsya pūritaṃ tadātikopād danupuṅgavasya /
analyzed: kramam tṛtīyam na yadā asya pūritam tadā ati kopāt danu puṅgavasya

original: papāta pṛṣṭhe bhagavāṃstrivikramo merupramāṇena tu vigraheṇa // VamP_52.85 //
analyzed: papāta pṛṣṭhe bhagavān trivikramaḥ meru pramāṇena tu vigraheṇa
patatā vāsudevena dānava upari nārada
triṃśat yojana sāhasrī bhūmeḥ gartā dṛḍhīkṛtā

original: tato daityaṃ samutpāṭya tasyāṃ prakṣipya vegataḥ /
analyzed: tatas daityam samutpāṭya tasyām prakṣipya vegataḥ
avarṣat sikatā vṛṣṭyā tām gartām apūrayata
tatas svargam sahasrākṣaḥ vāsudeva prasādataḥ
surāḥ ca sarve trailokyam avāpuḥ nirupadravāḥ
bhagavān api daitya indram sikatā arṇave
kālindya rūpam ādhāya tatra eva antaradhīyata

original: evaṃ purā viṣṇurabhūcca vāmano dhundhuṃ vijetuṃ ca trivikramo 'bhūt /
analyzed: evam purā viṣṇuḥ abhūt ca vāmanaḥ dhundhum vijetum ca trivikramaḥ bhūt

original: yasmin sa daityendrasuto jagāma mahāśrame puṇyayuto maharṣe // VamP_52.90 //
analyzed: yasmin sa daitya indra sutaḥ jagāma mahā āśrame puṇya yutaḥ mahā ṛṣe
iti śrī vāmanapurāṇe dvipañcāśaḥ dhyāyaḥ
pulastyaḥ uvāca
kālindī salile snātvā pūjayitvā trivikramam

original: upoṣya rajanīmekāṃ liṅgabhedaṃ giriṃ yayau // VamP_53.1 //
analyzed: upoṣya rajanīm ekām liṅga bhedam girim yayau

original: tatra snātvā ca vimale bhavaṃ dṛṣṭvā ca bhaktitaḥ /
analyzed: tatra snātvā ca vimale bhavam dṛṣṭvā ca bhaktitaḥ
upoṣya rajanīm ekām tīrtham kedāram āvrajat
tatra snātvā arcya ca īśānam mādhavam ca api abhedataḥ

original: uṣitvā vāsarān sapta kubjāmraṃ prajagāma ha // VamP_53.3 //
analyzed: uṣitvā vāsarān sapta kubjāmram prajagāma ha

original: tataḥ sutīrthe snātvā ca sopavāsī jitendriyaḥ. hṛṣīkeśaṃ samabhyarcya yayau badarikāśramam // VamP_53.4 //
analyzed: tatas sutīrthe snātvā ca sa upavāsī jita indriyaḥ hṛṣīkeśam samabhyarcya yayau badarikāśramam

original: tatroṣya nārāyaṇamarcya bhaktyā snātvātha vidvān sa sarasvatījale /
analyzed: tatra uṣya nārāyaṇam arcya bhaktyā snātvā atha vidvān sa sarasvatī jale

original: varāhatīrthe garuḍāsanaṃ sa dṛṣṭvātha saṃpūjya subhaktimāṃśca // VamP_53.5 //
analyzed: varāhatīrthe garuḍa āsanam sa dṛṣṭvā atha saṃpūjya su bhaktimān ca
bhadrakarṇe tatas gatvā jayeśam śaśiśekharam

original: dṛṣṭvā saṃpūjya ca śivaṃ vipāśāmabhito yayau // VamP_53.6 //
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā saṃpūjya ca śivam vipāśām abhitas yayau
tasyām snātvā samabhyarcya devadevam dvija priyam
upavāsī irāvatyām dadarśa parameśvaram
yam ārādhya dvijaśreṣṭha śākale vai purūravāḥ

original: samavāpa paraṃ rūpamaiśvarya ca sudurlabham // VamP_53.8 //
analyzed: samavāpa param rūpam aiśvarya ca su durlabham
kuṣṭha roga abhibhūtaḥ ca yam samārāghya vai bhṛguḥ
ārogyam atulam prāpa saṃtānam api ca akṣayam
nāradaḥ uvāca
katham purūravāḥ viṣṇum ārāghya dvijasattama

original: virūpatvaṃ samutsṛjya rūpaṃ prāpa śriyā saha // VamP_53.10 //
analyzed: virūpa tvam samutsṛjya rūpam prāpa śriyā saha
pulastyaḥ uvāca
śrūyatām kathayiṣyāmi kathām pāpu praṇāśinīm
pūrvam tretā yugasya ādau yathāvṛttam tapodhana

original: madradeśa iti khyāto deśo vai brahmaṇaḥ suta /
analyzed: madra deśaḥ iti khyātaḥ deśaḥ vai brahmaṇaḥ suta

original: śākalaṃ nāma nagaraṃ khyātaṃ sthānīyamuttamam // VamP_53.12 //
analyzed: śākalam nāma nagaram khyātam sthānīyam uttamam
tasmin vipaṇi vṛtti sthaḥ sudharma ākhyaḥ bhavat vaṇij
dhana āḍhyaḥ guṇavān bhogī nānā sa astra viśāradaḥ

original: sa tvekadā nijād rāṣṭrāt surāṣṭraṃ gantumadyataḥ /
analyzed: sa tu ekadā nijāt rāṣṭrāt surāṣṭram gantum adyatas
sārthena mahatā yuktaḥ nānā vipaṇa paṇyavān
gacchataḥ pathi tasya atha maru bhūmau kalipriya
abhavat dasyutaḥ rātrau avaskandaḥ ti duḥsahaḥ
tatas sa hṛta sarva svaḥ vaṇij guḥkha samanvitaḥ

original: asahāyo marau tasmiṃś cacāronmattavad vaśī // VamP_53.16 //
analyzed: asahāyaḥ marau tasmin cacāra unmatta vat vaśī
caratā tat araṇyam vai duḥkha ākrāntena nārada

original: ātmā iva śamīvṛkṣo marāvāsāditaḥ śubhaḥ // VamP_53.17 //
analyzed: ātmā iva śamī vṛkṣaḥ marau āsāditaḥ śubhaḥ

original: taṃ mṛgauḥ pikṣikṣiścaiva hīnaṃ dṛṣṭvā śamītarum /
analyzed: tam mṛgauḥ pikṣi kṣiḥ ca eva hīnam dṛṣṭvā śamī tarum
śrāntaḥ kṣudh tṛṣ parīta ātmā tasya adhas samupāviśat
suptaḥ ca api su viśrāntaḥ madhyāhne punar utyitaḥ
samapaśyat atha āyāntam pretam preta śataiḥ vṛtam
udvāhyantam atha anyena pretena preta nāyakam
piṇḍāśibhiḥ ca puratas dhāvadbhiḥ rūkṣa vigrahaiḥ
atha ājagāma pretaḥ sau paryaṭitvā vanāni ca

original: upāgamya śamīmūle vaṇikputraṃ dadarśa saḥ // VamP_53.21 //
analyzed: upāgamya śamī mūle vaṇij putram dadarśa saḥ
svāgatena abhivādya enam samābhāṣya parasparam
sukha upaviṣṭaḥ chāyāyām pṛṣṭvā kuśalam āptavān

original: tataḥ pretādhipatinā pṛṣṭaḥ sa tu vaṇiksakhaḥ /
analyzed: tatas pretādhipatinā pṛṣṭaḥ sa tu vaṇij sakhaḥ

original: kuta āgamyate brūhi kva sādho vā gamiṣyasi // VamP_53.23 //
analyzed: kutas āgamyate brūhi kva sādho vā gamiṣyasi
katham ca idam mahā araṇyam mṛga pakṣi vivarjitam
samāpannaḥ si bhadram te sarvam ākhyātum arhasi
evam pretādhipatinā vaṇij pṛṣṭaḥ samāsatas
sarvam ākhyātavān brahman sva deśa dhana vicyutim

original: tasya śrutvā sa vṛttāntaṃ tasya duḥkhena duḥkhitaḥ /
analyzed: tasya śrutvā sa vṛttāntam tasya duḥkhena duḥkhitaḥ

original: vamikputraṃ tataḥ prāha pretapālaḥ svabandhuvat // VamP_53.26 //
analyzed: vamik putram tatas prāha pretapālaḥ sva bandhu vat

original: evaṃ gate 'pi mā śokaṃ kartumarhasi suvrata /
analyzed: evam gate mā śokam kartum arhasi suvrata

original: bhūyo 'pyarthāḥ bhaviṣyanti yadi bhāgyabalaṃ tava // VamP_53.27 //
analyzed: bhūyas u pi arthāḥ bhaviṣyanti yadi bhāgya balam tava
bhāgya kṣaya īrthāḥ kṣīyante bhavanti abhyudaye punar

original: kṣīṇasyāsya śarīrasya cintayā nodayo bhavet // VamP_53.28 //
analyzed: kṣīṇasya asya śarīrasya cintayā nā udayaḥ bhavet
iti uccārya samāhūya svān bhṛtyān vākyam abravīt

original: adyātithirayaṃ pūjyaḥ sadaiva svajano mama // VamP_53.29 //
analyzed: adyā atithiḥ ayam pūjyaḥ sadā eva sva janaḥ mama

original: asmin samāgate pretāḥ prītirjātā mamātulā // VamP_53.30 //
analyzed: asmin samāgate pretāḥ prītiḥ jātā mama atulā

original: evaṃ hi vadatastasya mṛtpātraṃ sudṛḍhaṃ navam /
analyzed: evam hi vadataḥ tasya mṛd pātram su dṛḍham navam
dadhi odanena saṃpūrṇam ājagāma yathā īpsitam

original: tathā navā ca sudṛḍhā saṃpūrṇā paramāmbhasā /
analyzed: tathā navā ca su dṛḍhā saṃpūrṇā parama ambhasā

original: vāridhānī ca saṃprāptā pretānāmagrataḥ sthitā // VamP_53.32 //
analyzed: vāri dhānī ca saṃprāptā pretānām agratas sthitā
tam āgatam sa salilam annam vīkṣya mahāmatiḥ
prāha uttiṣṭha vaṇij putra tvam āhnikam upācara
tatas tu vāridhānyāḥ tau salilena vidhānataḥ
kṛta āhnikau ubhau jātau vaṇij pretapatiḥ tathā
tatas vaṇij sutāya ādau dadhi odanam atha icchayā

original: dattvā tebhyaśca sarvebhyaḥ pretebhyo vyadadāt tataḥ // VamP_53.35 //
analyzed: dattvā tebhyaḥ ca sarvebhyaḥ pretebhyaḥ vyadadāt tatas
bhuktavatsu ca sarveṣu kāmataḥ mbhasi sevite
anantaram sabubhuje pretapālaḥ bara aśanam
prakāma tṛpte preta ca vāri dhānya odanam tathā
antardhānam agāt brahman vaṇij putrasya paśyataḥ
tatas tat adbhutatamam dṛṣṭvā sa matimān vaṇij

original: papraccha taṃ pretapālaṃ kautūhalamanā vaśī // VamP_53.38 //
analyzed: papraccha tam pretapālam kautūhala manāḥ vaśī
araṇye nirjane sādho kutas nnasya samudbhavaḥ
kutas ca vāri dhānī iyam saṃpūrṇā parama ambhasā

original: tathāmī tava ye bhṛtyāstvattaste varmataḥ kṛśāḥ /
analyzed: tathā amī tava ye bhṛtyāḥ tvattaḥ te varmataḥ kṛśāḥ

original: bhavānapi ca tejasvī kiñcitpuṣṭavapuḥ śubhaḥ // VamP_53.40 //
analyzed: bhavān api ca tejasvī kiñcid puṣṭa vapuḥ śubhaḥ
śukla vastra parīdhānaḥ bahūnām paripālakaḥ

original: sarvametanmamācakṣva ko bhavān kā śamī tviyam // VamP_53.41 //
analyzed: sarvam etat mama ācakṣva kaḥ bhavān kā śamī tu iyam
ittham vaṇij suta vacaḥ śrutvā asau preta nāyakaḥ
śaśaṃsa sarvam asya ādyam yathāvṛttam purātanam
aham āsam purā vipraḥ śākale nagara uttame
somaśarmā iti vikhyātaḥ bahulā garbha saṃbhavaḥ

original: mamāsti ca vaṇik śrīmān prāti veśyo mahādhanaḥ /
analyzed: mama asti ca vaṇij śrīmān veśyaḥ mahādhanaḥ

original: sa tu somaśravā nāma viṣṇubhakto mahāyaśāḥ // VamP_53.44 //
analyzed: sa tu somaśravāḥ nāma viṣṇu bhaktaḥ mahā yaśāḥ

original: so 'haṃ kadaryo mūḍhātmā dhane 'pi sati durmatiḥ /
analyzed: saḥ ham kadaryaḥ mūḍha ātmā dhane sati durmatiḥ

original: na dadāmi dvijātibhyo na cāśnāmyannamuttamam // VamP_53.45 //
analyzed: na dadāmi dvijātibhyaḥ na ca aśnāmi annam uttamam
pramādāt yadi bhuñjāmi dadhi kṣīra ghṛta anvitam

original: tato rātrau nṛbhir ghoraistāḍyate mama vigrahaḥ // VamP_53.46 //
analyzed: tatas rātrau nṛbhiḥ ghoraiḥ tāḍyate mama vigrahaḥ
prātar bhavati me ghorā mṛtyu tulyā viṣūcikā

original: na ca kaścinmābhyāse tatra tiṣṭhati bāndhavaḥ // VamP_53.47 //
analyzed: na ca kaścid mā abhyāse tatra tiṣṭhati bāndhavaḥ
katham katham api prāṇāḥ mayā saṃpratidhāritāḥ
evam etādṛśaḥ pāpī nivasāmi ati nirghṛṇaḥ
sauvīra tila piṇyāka saktu śāka ādi bha ūnaiḥ
kṣapayāmi kadanna ādyaiḥ ātmānam kāla yāpanaiḥ
evam tatra āsataḥ mahyam mahān kālaḥ bhyagāt atha
śravaṇadvādaśī nāma māsi bhādrapade bhavat

original: tato nāgariko loko gataḥ snātuṃ hi saṃgamam /
analyzed: tatas nāgarikaḥ lokaḥ gataḥ snātum hi saṃgamam
irāvatyāḥ naḍvalāyāḥ brahma kṣatra purassaraḥ
prātiveśya prasaṃgena tatra api anugataḥ smi aham
kṛta upavāsaḥ śucimān ekādaśyām yata vrataḥ
tatas saṃgama toyena vāri dhānīm dṛḍhām navām
saṃpūrṇām vastu saṃvītām chatra upānaha saṃyutām
sṛt pātram api miṣṭasya pūrṇam dadhyodanasya ha
pradattam brāhmaṇa indrāya śucaye jñāna dharmiṇe

original: tadeva jīvatā dattaṃ mayā dānaṃ vaṇiksuta /
analyzed: tat eva jīvatā dattam mayā dānam vaṇij suta

original: varṣāṇāṃ saptatīnāṃ vai nānyad dattaṃ hi kiñcana // VamP_53.55 //
analyzed: varṣāṇām saptatīnām vai na anyat dattam hi kiñcana
mṛtaḥ preta tvam āpannaḥ dattvā preta annam eva hi
amī ca a datta dānāḥ tu mad annena upajīvinaḥ
etat te kāraṇam proktam yat tat annam mayā ambhasā

original: dattaṃ tadidamāyāti madhyāhne 'pi dine dine // VamP_53.57 //
analyzed: dattam tat idam āyāti madhyāhne dine dine

original: yāvannāhaṃ ca bhuñjāmi na tāvat kṣayameti vai /
analyzed: yāvat na aham ca bhuñjāmi na tāvat kṣayam eti vai

original: mayi bhukte ca pīte ca sarvamantarhitaṃ bhavet // VamP_53.58 //
analyzed: mayi bhukte ca pīte ca sarvam antarhitam bhavet
yat ca ātapatram adadam saḥ yam jātaḥ śamī taruḥ

original: uvānadyugale datte preto me vāhano 'bhavat // VamP_53.59 //
analyzed: uvānat yugale datte pretaḥ me vāhanaḥ bhavat
iyam dharma jña mayā kīnāśa tātmanaḥ
śravaṇa dvādaśī puṇyam tava ukyam
iti evam ukte vacane vaṇij putraḥ bravīt vacaḥ
yat mayā tāta karttavyam tat anujñātum arhasi

original: tat tasya vacanaṃ śrutvā vaṇikputrasya nārada /
analyzed: tat tasya vacanam śrutvā vaṇij putrasya nārada

original: pretapālo vacaḥ prāha svārthasiddhikaraṃ tataḥ // VamP_53.62 //
analyzed: pretapālaḥ vacaḥ prāha sva artha siddhi karam tatas

original: yat tvayā tāta karttavyaṃ maddhitārthaṃ mahāmate /
analyzed: yat tvayā tāta karttavyam mad hita artham mahāmate

original: kathayiṣyāmi tat samyak tava śreyaskaraṃ mama // VamP_53.63 //
analyzed: kathayiṣyāmi tat samyak tava śreyaskaram mama
gayāyām tīrtha juṣṭāyām snātvā śauca samanvitaḥ

original: mama nāma samuddiśya piṇḍanirvapaṇaṃ kuru // VamP_53.64 //
analyzed: mama nāma samuddiśya piṇḍa nirvapaṇam kuru
tatra piṇḍa pradānena preta bhāvāt aham sakhe
muktaḥ tu sarva dātṛṇām yāsyāmi sahalokatām

original: yatheyaṃ dvādaśī puṇyā māsi prauṣṭhapade sitā /
analyzed: yathā iyam dvādaśī puṇyā māsi prauṣṭhapade sitā
budha śravaṇa saṃyuktā sā ati śreyaskarī smṛtā
iti evam uktvā vaṇijam pretarājaḥ nugaiḥ saha
sva nāmāni yathānyāyam samyak ākhyātavān śuciḥ
preta skandhe samāropya tyājitaḥ maru maṇḍalam

original: ramye 'tha śūrasenākhye deśe prāptaḥ sa vai vaṇik // VamP_53.68 //
analyzed: ramye śūrasena ākhye deśe prāptaḥ sa vai vaṇij
sva karma dharma yogena dhanam uccāvacam bahu
uvā arjayitvā prayayau gayāśīrṣam anuttamam
piṇḍa nirvapaṇam tatra pretānām anupūrvaśas
cakāra sva pitṝṇām ca dāyādānām anantaram
ātmanaḥ ca mahā buddhiḥ mahā bodhyam tilaiḥ vinā
piṇḍa nirvapaṇam cakre tathā anyān api gotra jān
evam pradatteṣu atha vai piṇḍeṣu preta bhāvataḥ

original: vimuktāste dvija pretā brahmalokaṃ tato gatāḥ // VamP_53.72 //
analyzed: vimuktāḥ te dvija pretāḥ brahma lokam tatas gatāḥ
sa ca api hi vaṇij putraḥ nijam ālayam āvrajat
śravaṇa dvādaśīm kṛtvā kāladharmam upeyivān
gandharva loke su ciram bhogān bhuktvā su durlabhān

original: mānuṣyaṃ janmamāsādya sa babhau śākale virāṭ // VamP_53.74 //
analyzed: mānuṣyam janmam āsādya sa babhau śākale virāj
kāladharmam avāpya asau guhyakā vāsam āśrayat

original: tatroṣya suciraṃ kālaṃ bhogān bhuktvātha kāmataḥ /
analyzed: tatra uṣya su ciram kālam bhogān bhuktvā atha kāmataḥ
martya lokam anuprāpya rājanya tanayaḥ bhavat
tatra api kṣatra vṛtti sthaḥ dāna bhoga rataḥ vaśī
gograhe ri gaṇān jitvā kāladharmam upeyivān

original: śakralokaṃ sa saṃprāpya devaiḥ sarvaiḥ supūjitaḥ // VamP_53.77 //
analyzed: śakra lokam sa saṃprāpya devaiḥ sarvaiḥ su pūjitaḥ
puṇya kṣayāt paribhraṣṭaḥ śākale saḥ bhavat dvijaḥ
tatas vikaṭa rūpaḥ sau sarva śāstra artha pāragaḥ
vivāhayat dvija sutām rūpeṇa anupamām dvija

original: sāvamene ca bharttāraṃ suśīlamapi bhāminī // VamP_53.79 //
analyzed: sā avamene ca bharttāram suśīlam api bhāminī
virūpam iti manvānā su duḥkhitaḥ
tatas nirveda saṃyuktaḥ gatvā āśrama padam mahat
irāvatyāḥ taṭe śrīmān rūpa dhāriṇam āsadat
tam ārādhya jagannātham nakṣatrapuruṣeṇa hi
surūpa tām avāpya agryām tasmin eva ca janmani
tatas priyaḥ bhūt bhāryāyāḥ bhogavān ca abhavat vaśī
śravaṇa dvādaśī bhaktaḥ pūrva abhyāsāt ajāyata
evam purā asau dvija puṅgavaḥ tu ku rūpa rūpaḥ bhagavat prasādāt

original: anaṅgarūpapratimo babhūva mṛśca rājā sa purūravābhūt // VamP_53.83 //
analyzed: anaṅga rūpa pratimaḥ babhūva mṛḥ ca rājā sa purūravā abhūt
iti śrī vāmanapurāṇe tripañcāśaḥ dhyāyaḥ
nāradaḥ uvāca

original: purūravā dvijaśreṣṭha yathā devaṃ śriyaḥ patim /
analyzed: purūravāḥ dvijaśreṣṭha yathā devam śriyaḥ patim
nakṣatrapuruṣa ākhyena ārādhayata tat vada
pulastyaḥ uvāca
śrūyatām kathayiṣyāmi nakṣatrapuruṣa vratam

original: nakṣatrāṅgani devasya yāni yānīha nārada // VamP_54.2 //
analyzed: nakṣatra aṅgani devasya yāni yāni iha nārada

original: mūlarkṣaṃ caraṇau viṣṇorjaṅghe dve rohiṇī smṛte /
analyzed: mūla ṛkṣam caraṇau viṣṇoḥ jaṅghe dve rohiṇī smṛte

original: dve jānunī tathāśvinyau saṃstite rūpadhārimaḥ // VamP_54.3 //
analyzed: dve jānunī tathā aśvinyau saṃstite rūpadhārimaḥ
āṣāḍham dve dvayam ca ūrvoḥ guhya stham phālgunī dvayam
kaṭi sthāḥ kṛttikāḥ ca eva vāsudevasya saṃsthitāḥ
prauṣṭhapadyā dvayam pārśve kukṣibhyām revatī sthitā
uraḥsaṃsthā tu anurādhā śraviṣṭhā pṛṣṭhasaṃsthitā
viśākhā bhujayoḥ hastaḥ kara dvayam udāhṛtam
punarvasuḥ atha aṅgulyaḥ nakhāḥ sārpam tathā ucyate

original: grīvāsthaitā tathā jyeṣṭhā śravaṇaṃ karṇayoḥ sthitam /
analyzed: grīvā sthā etā tathā jyeṣṭhā śravaṇam karṇayoḥ sthitam
mukhasaṃsthaḥ tathā puṣyaḥ svātiḥ dantāḥ prakīrtitāḥ

original: hanū dve vāruṇaścokto nāsā paitra udāhṛtaḥ /
analyzed: hanū dve vāruṇaḥ ca uktaḥ nāsā paitraḥ udāhṛtaḥ
mṛgaśīrṣam nayanayoḥ rūpa dhāriṇi tiṣṭhati

original: citrā caiva lalāṭe tu bharaṇī tu tathā śiraḥ /
analyzed: citrā ca eva lalāṭe tu bharaṇī tu tathā śiraḥ
śiroruha sthā ca eva ārdrā nakṣatra aṅgam idam hareḥ
vidhānam saṃpravakṣyāmi yathāyogena nārada

original: saṃpūjito hariḥ kāmān vidadhāti yathepsitān // VamP_54.10 //
analyzed: saṃpūjitaḥ hariḥ kāmān vidadhāti yathā īpsitān
caitra māse sita aṣṭamyām yadā mūla gataḥ śaśī

original: tadā tu bhagavatpādau pūjayet tu vidhānataḥ /
analyzed: tadā tu bhagavat pādau pūjayet tu vidhānataḥ

original: nakṣatrasannidhau dadyād viprendrāya ca bhojanam // VamP_54.11 //
analyzed: nakṣatra sannidhau dadyāt vipra indrāya ca bhojanam
jānunī ca aśvinī yoge pūjayet atha bhaktitaḥ

original: dohade ca haviṣyānnaṃ pūrvavad dvijabhojanam // VamP_54.12 //
analyzed: dohade ca haviṣya annam pūrvavat dvija bhojanam

original: āṣāḍhābhyāṃ tathā dvābhyāṃ dvāvūrū pūjayed budhaḥ /
analyzed: āṣāḍhābhyām tathā dvābhyām dvau ūrū pūjayet budhaḥ

original: salilaṃ śiśiraṃ tatra dohade ca prakīrtitam // VamP_54.13 //
analyzed: salilam śiśiram tatra dohade ca prakīrtitam

original: dodahe ca payo gavyaṃ deyaṃ ca dvijabhojanam // VamP_54.14 //
analyzed: dodahe ca payaḥ gavyam deyam ca dvija bhojanam
kṛttikāsu kaṭiḥ pūjyā sa upavāsaḥ jita indriyaḥ
deyam ca dohadam viṣṇoḥ su gandha kusuma udakam
pārśve bhādrapada yugme pūjayitvā vidhānataḥ

original: guḍaṃ salehakaṃ dadyād dohade devakīrtitam // VamP_54.16 //
analyzed: guḍam sa lehakam dadyāt dohade deva kīrtitam
dve kukṣī revatī yoge dohade mudga modakāḥ

original: anurādhāsu jaṭharaṃ ṣaṣṭhikānnaṃ ca dohade // VamP_54.17 //
analyzed: anurādhāsu jaṭharam ṣaṣṭhikā annam ca dohade

original: śraviṣṭhāyāṃ tathā pṛṣṭhaṃ sālibhaktaṃ ca dohade /
analyzed: śraviṣṭhāyām tathā pṛṣṭham sāli bhaktam ca dohade
bhuja yugmam viśākhāsu dohade parama udanam

original: haste hastau tathā pūjyau yāvakaṃ dohade smṛtam /
analyzed: haste hastau tathā pūjyau yāvakam dohade smṛtam
punarvasau aṅgulīḥ ca paṭolaḥ tatra dohade
āśleṣāsu nakhān pūjya dohade tittira āmiṣam

original: jyeṣṭhāyāṃ pūjayed grīvāṃ dohade tilamodakam // VamP_54.20 //
analyzed: jyeṣṭhāyām pūjayet grīvām dohade tilamodakam

original: śravaṇe śravaṇau pūjyau dadhibhaktaṃ ca dohade /
analyzed: śravaṇe śravaṇau pūjyau dadhi bhaktam ca dohade

original: puṣye mukhaṃ pūjayeta dohade ghṛtapāyasam // VamP_54.21 //
analyzed: puṣye mukham pūjayeta dohade ghṛta pāyasam
svāti yoge ca daśanāḥ dohade tilaśaṣkulī

original: dātavyā keśavaprītyai brahmaṇasya ca bhojanam // VamP_54.22 //
analyzed: dātavyā keśava prītyai ca bhojanam
hanū śatabhiṣā yoge pūjayet ca prayatnataḥ
priyaṅgu raktaśāli annam dohadam madhuvidviṣaḥ

original: maghāsu nāsikā pūjyā madhu dadyācca dohade /
analyzed: maghāsu nāsikā pūjyā madhu dadyāt ca dohade

original: mṛgottamāṅge nayane mṛgamāṃsaṃ ca dohade // VamP_54.24 //
analyzed: mṛga uttamāṅge nayane mṛga māṃsam ca dohade
citrā yoge lalāṭam ca dohade cāru bhojanam

original: bharaṇīṣu śiraḥ pūjyaṃ cāru bhaktaṃ ca dohade // VamP_54.25 //
analyzed: bharaṇīṣu śiraḥ pūjyam cāru bhaktam ca dohade
saṃpūjanīyāḥ vidvadbhiḥ ārdrā yoge śiroruhāḥ

original: viprāṃśca bhojayed bhaktayā dohade ca guḍārdrakam // VamP_54.26 //
analyzed: viprān ca bhojayet bhaktayā dohade ca guḍa ārdrakam
nakṣetra yogeṣu eteṣu sampūjya jagataḥ patim
pārite dakṣiṇān dadyāt strī puṃsoḥ cāru vāsasī
chatra upānah śveta yugam sapta dhānyāni kāñcanam

original: ghṛtapātraṃ ca matiman brāhmaṇāya nivedayet // VamP_54.28 //
analyzed: ghṛta pātram ca matiman brāhmaṇāya nivedayet
prati nakṣatra yogena pūjanīyāḥ dvijātayaḥ

original: nakṣatramaya evaiṣa puruṣaḥ śāśvato mataḥ // VamP_54.29 //
analyzed: nakṣatra mayaḥ eva eṣa puruṣaḥ śāśvataḥ mataḥ
nakṣatrapuruṣa ākhyam hi vratānām uttamam vratam

original: pūrvaṃ kṛtaṃ hi bhṛguṇā sarvapātakanāśanam // VamP_54.30 //
analyzed: pūrvam kṛtam hi bhṛguṇā sarva pātaka nāśanam
aṅga upāṅgāni deva ṛṣe pūjayitvā jagadguroḥ
surūpāmi abhijāyante pratyaṅga aṅgāni ca eva hi
sapta janma kṛtam pāpam kula saṃga āgatam ca yat

original: pitṛmātṛsamutthaṃ ca tatsarvaṃ hanti keśavaḥ // VamP_54.32 //
analyzed: pitṛ mātṛ samuttham ca tat sarvam hanti keśavaḥ
