original: anantāṃ manasaḥ prītiṃ rūpaṃ cātīva śobhanam // VamP_54.33 //
analyzed: anantām manasaḥ prītim rūpam ca atīva śobhanam
vāc mādhuryam tathā kānti yat ca anyat abhivāñchitam
dadāti nakṣatra pumān pūjitaḥ tu janārdanaḥ
upoṣya samyak eteṣu krameṇa ṛkṣeṣu nārada

original: arundhatī mahābhāgā khyātimagryāṃ jagāma ha // VamP_54.35 //
analyzed: arundhatī mahābhāgā khyātim agryām jagāma ha
ādityaḥ tanaya arthāya nakṣatra aṅgam janārdanam
saṃpūjayitvā govindam revantam putram āptavān
rambhā rūpam avāpa agryam vāc mādhuryam ca menakā

original: kānti vidhuravāpāgryāṃ rājyaṃ rājā pūrūvāḥ // VamP_54.37 //
analyzed: rājyam rājā pūrūvāḥ
evam vidhānataḥ brahman nakṣatra aṅgaḥ janārdanaḥ

original: pūjito rūpadhārī yaistaiḥ prāptā tu sukāmitā // VamP_54.38 //
analyzed: pūjitaḥ rūpa dhārī yaiḥ taiḥ prāptā tu su kāmi tā

original: etat tavoktaṃ paramaṃ pavitraṃ dhanyaṃ yaśasyaṃ śubharūpadāyi /
analyzed: etat tava uktam paramam pavitram dhanyam yaśasyam śubha rūpa dāyi

original: nakṣatrapuṃsaḥ paramaṃ vidhānaṃ śṛṇuṣva puṇyāmiha tīrthayātrāma // VamP_54.39 //
analyzed: nakṣatra puṃsaḥ paramam vidhānam śṛṇuṣva puṇyām iha tīrtha yātrām
iti śrī vāmanapurāṇe catuṣpañcāśaḥ dhyāyaḥ
pulastyaḥ uvāca
irāvatīm anuprāpya puṇyām tām ṛṣi kanyakām
strātvā saṃpūjayāmāsa caitra aṣṭamyām janārdanam
nakṣatrapuruṣam cīrtvā vratam puṇya pradam śuciḥ

original: jagāma sa kurukṣetraṃ prahlādo dānaveśvaraḥ // VamP_55.2 //
analyzed: jagāma sa kurukṣetram prahlādaḥ dānava īśvaraḥ
airāvatena mantreṇa cakratīrtham sudarśanam

original: upāmantrya tataḥ sasnau vedoktavidhinā mune // VamP_55.3 //
analyzed: upāmantrya tatas sasnau veda ukta vidhinā mune
upoṣya kṣaṇadām bhaktyā kurudhvajam
kṛta śaucau jagāma atha draṣṭum puruṣakesarim

original: snātvā tu devikāyāṃ ca nṛsiṃhaṃ pratipūjya ca /
analyzed: snātvā tu devikāyām ca nṛsiṃham pratipūjya ca

original: tatreṣya rajanomekāṃ gokarṇaṃ dānavo yayau // VamP_55.5 //
analyzed: tatra iṣya rajanām ekām gokarṇam dānavaḥ yayau

original: tasmin snātvā tathā prācīṃ pūjyeśaṃ viśvakarmiṇam /
analyzed: tasmin snātvā tathā prācīm pūjya īśam viśvakarmiṇam

original: prācīne cāpare daityo draṣṭuṃ kāmeśvaraṃ yayau // VamP_55.6 //
analyzed: prācīne ca apare daityaḥ draṣṭum kāmeśvaram yayau

original: tatra snātvā ca dṛṣṭvā ca pūjayitvā ca śaṅkaram /
analyzed: tatra snātvā ca dṛṣṭvā ca pūjayitvā ca śaṅkaram

original: draṣṭuṃ yayau ca prahlādaḥ puṇḍarīkaṃ mahāmbhasi // VamP_55.7 //
analyzed: draṣṭum yayau ca prahlādaḥ puṇḍarīkam mahā ambhasi

original: tatra snātvā ca dṛṣṭvā ca saṃtarpya pitṛdevatāḥ /
analyzed: tatra snātvā ca dṛṣṭvā ca saṃtarpya pitṛ devatāḥ

original: puṇḍarīkaṃ ca saṃpūjya uvāsa divasatrayam // VamP_55.8 //
analyzed: puṇḍarīkam ca saṃpūjya uvāsa divasa trayam
viśākha yūpe tadanu dṛṣṭvā devam tathā ajitam

original: snātvā tathā kṛṣṇatīrthe trirātraṃ nyavasacchuciḥ // VamP_55.9 //
analyzed: snātvā tathā kṛṣṇatīrthe tri rātram nyavasat śuciḥ

original: tato haṃsapade haṃsaṃ dṛṣṭvā saṃpūjya ceśvaram /
analyzed: tatas haṃsa pade haṃsam dṛṣṭvā saṃpūjya ca īśvaram
jagāma asau payaḥ uṣṇāyām akhaṇḍam draṣṭum īśvaram
snātvā payoṣṇyāḥ salile pūjya akhaṇḍam jagatpatim

original: draṣṭuṃ jagāma matimān vitastāyāṃ kumārilam // VamP_55.11 //
analyzed: draṣṭum jagāma matimān vitastāyām kumārilam
tatra snātvā arcya deveśam bālakhilyaiḥ marīciṣaiḥ
ārādhyāmānam yat yatra kṛtam pāpa praṇāśanam

original: yatra sā surabhirdevī svasutāṃ kapilāṃ śubhām /
analyzed: yatra sā surabhiḥ devī sva sutām kapilām śubhām
deva priya artham asṛjat hita artham jagataḥ tathā

original: tatra devahrade snātvā śaṃbhuṃ saṃpūjya bhaktitaḥ /
analyzed: tatra devahrade snātvā śaṃbhum saṃpūjya bhaktitaḥ

original: vidhivaddadhi ca prāśya maṇimantaṃ tato yayau // VamP_55.14 //
analyzed: vidhivat dadhi ca prāśya maṇimantam tatas yayau

original: tatra tīrthavare snātvā prājāpatye mahāmatiḥ' dadarśa śaṃbhu brahmāṇaṃ deveśaṃ ca prajāpatim // VamP_55.15 //
analyzed: tatra tīrtha vare snātvā prājāpatye mahāmatiḥ dadarśa śaṃbhu brahmāṇam deveśam ca prajāpatim
vidhānataḥ tu tān devān pūjayitvā tapodhana

original: ṣaḍrātraṃ tatra ca sthitvā jagāma madhunandinīm // VamP_55.16 //
analyzed: ṣaṣ rātram tatra ca sthitvā jagāma madhunandinīm
madhumat salile snātvā devam cakradharam haram

original: śūlabāhuṃ ca govindaṃ dadarśa danupuṅgavaḥ // VamP_55.17 //
analyzed: śūla bāhum ca govindam dadarśa danu puṅgavaḥ
nāradaḥ uvāca
kimartham bhagavān śambhuḥ dadhāra atha sudarśanam

original: śūlaṃ tathā vāsudevo mamaitad brūhi pṛcchataḥ // VamP_55.18 //
analyzed: śūlam tathā vāsudevaḥ mama etat brūhi pṛcchataḥ
pulastyaḥ uvāca
śrūyatām kathayiṣyāmi kathām etām purātanīm
kathayāmāsa yām viṣṇuḥ bhaviṣya manave purā

original: jalodbhavo nāma mahāsurendro ghoraṃ sa taptvā tapa ugravīryaḥ /
analyzed: jalodbhavaḥ nāma mahā asura indraḥ ghoram sa taptvā tapaḥ ugra vīryaḥ

original: ārādhayāmāsa virañcimārāt sa tasya tuṣṭo varado babhūva // VamP_55.20 //
analyzed: ārādhayāmāsa virañcimārāt sa tasya tuṣṭaḥ vara daḥ babhūva
deva asurāṇām ajayaḥ mahā āhave nijaiḥ ca śastraiḥ amaraiḥ avadhyaḥ

original: brahmarṣiśāpaiśca nirīpsitārtho jale ca vahnau svaguṇopaharttā // VamP_55.21 //
analyzed: brahmarṣi śāpaiḥ ca nirīpsita arthaḥ jale ca vahnau sva guṇa upaharttā

original: evaṃprabhāvo danupuṅgavo 'sau devān maharṣīn nṛpatīn samagrān /
analyzed: evaṃprabhāvaḥ danu puṅgavaḥ sau devān mahā ṛṣīn nṛpatīn samagrān

original: ābādhamāno vicacāra bhūmyāṃ sarvāḥ kriyā nāśayadugramūrtiḥ // VamP_55.22 //
analyzed: ābādhamānaḥ vicacāra bhūmyām sarvāḥ kriyāḥ nāśayat ugra mūrtiḥ

original: tato 'marā bhūmibhavāḥ sabhūpāḥ jagmuḥ śaraṇyaṃ harimīśitāram /
analyzed: tatas marāḥ bhūmi bhavāḥ sa bhūpāḥ jagmuḥ śaraṇyam harim īśitāram

original: taiścāpi sārddha bhagavāñjagāma himālayaṃ yatra harastrinetraḥ // VamP_55.23 //
analyzed: taiḥ ca api sārddha bhagavān jagāma himālayam yatra haraḥ trinetraḥ

original: saṃmantrya devarṣihitaṃ ca kāryaṃ matiṃ ca kṛtvā nidhanāya śatroḥ /
analyzed: saṃmantrya devarṣi hitam ca kāryam matim ca kṛtvā nidhanāya śatroḥ

original: nijāyudhānāṃ ca viparyayaṃ tau devādhipau cakraturugrakarmiṇau // VamP_55.24 //
analyzed: nija āyudhānām ca viparyayam tau devādhipau cakratuḥ ugra karmiṇau

original: tataś cāsau dānavo viṣṇuśarvau samāyātau tajjighāṃsū sureśau /
analyzed: tatas ca asau dānavaḥ viṣṇu śarvau samāyātau tad jighāṃsū sureśau

original: matvājeyau śatrubhirghorarupau bhayāstoye nimnagāyāṃ viveśa // VamP_55.25 //
analyzed: matvā ajeyau śatrubhiḥ ghora rupau bhayāḥ toye nimnagāyām viveśa

original: jñātvā pranaṣṭaṃ tridivendraśatruṃ nadīṃ viśālāṃ madhumatsupuṇyām /
analyzed: jñātvā pranaṣṭam tridiva indra śatrum nadīm viśālām madhumat su puṇyām

original: dvayoḥ saśastrau taṭayorharīśau pracchannamūrtī sahasā babhūvatuḥ // VamP_55.26 //
analyzed: dvayoḥ sa śastrau taṭayoḥ hari īśau pracchanna mūrtī sahasā babhūvatuḥ

original: jalodbhavaścāpi jalaṃ vimucya jñātvā gatau śaṅkaravāsudevau /
analyzed: jalodbhavaḥ ca api jalam vimucya jñātvā gatau śaṅkara vāsudevau

original: diśassamīkṣya bhayakātarākṣo durgaṃ himādriṃ ca tadāruroha // VamP_55.27 //
analyzed: diśaḥ samīkṣya bhaya kātara akṣaḥ durgam himādrim ca tadā āruroha

original: mahīdhraśṛṅgopari viṣṇuśambhū cañcūryamāṇaṃ svaripuṃ ca dṛṣṭvā /
analyzed: mahīdhra śṛṅga upari viṣṇu śambhū cañcūryamāṇam sva ripum ca dṛṣṭvā

original: vegādubhau duduvatuḥ saśastrau viṣṇustriśūlī giriśaśca cakrī // VamP_55.28 //
analyzed: vegāt ubhau duduvatuḥ sa śastrau viṣṇuḥ triśūlī giriśaḥ ca cakrī

original: tābhyāṃ sa dṛṣṭastridaśottamābhyāṃ cakreṇa śūlena ca binnadehaḥ /
analyzed: tābhyām sa dṛṣṭaḥ tridaśa uttamābhyām cakreṇa śūlena ca binna dehaḥ

original: papāta śailāt tapanīyavarṇo yathāntarikṣād vimalā ca tārā // VamP_55.29 //
analyzed: papāta śailāt tapanīya varṇaḥ yathā antarikṣāt vimalā ca tārā

original: evaṃ triśulaṃ ca dadhāra viṣṇuścakraṃ trinetro 'pyarisūdanārtham /
analyzed: evam tri śulam ca dadhāra viṣṇuḥ cakram trinetraḥ pi ari sūdana artham
yatrā agha hantrī hi abhavat vitastā hara aṅghri pātāt śiśirācalāt tu

original: tatprāpya tīrthaṃ tridaśādhipābhyāṃ pūjāṃ ca kṛtvā hariśaṅkarābhyām /
analyzed: tat prāpya tīrtham tridaśa adhipābhyām pūjām ca kṛtvā hari śaṅkarābhyām

original: upoṣya bhaktyā himavantamāgād draṣṭuṃ girīśaṃ śivaviṣṇuguptam // VamP_55.31 //
analyzed: upoṣya bhaktyā himavantam āgāt draṣṭum girīśam śiva viṣṇu guptam

original: taṃ samabhyarcca vidhivad dattvā dānaṃ dvijātiṣu /
analyzed: tam samabhyarcca vidhivat dattvā dānam dvijātiṣu

original: vistute himavatpāde bhṛgutuṅgaṃ jagāma saḥ // VamP_55.32 //
analyzed: vistute himavat pāde bhṛgutuṅgam jagāma saḥ
yatra īśvaraḥ deva varasya viṣṇoḥ prādāt rathāṅga pravara āyudham vai

original: yena praciccheda tridhaiva śaṅkaraṃ jijñāsamāno 'strabalaṃ mahātmā // VamP_55.33 //
analyzed: yena praciccheda tridhā eva śaṅkaram jijñāsamānaḥ stra balam mahātmā
iti śrī vāmanapurāṇe pañcapañcāśaḥ dhyāyaḥ
nāradaḥ uvāca
bhagavan loka nāthāya viṣṇave viṣama īkṣaṇaḥ
kimartham āyudham cakram dattavān loka pūjitam
pulastyaḥ uvāca
śṛṇuṣva avahitaḥ bhūtvā kathām etām purātanīm
cakra pradāna saṃbaddhām śiva māhātmaya vardhinīm
āsīt dvijāti pravaraḥ veda vedāṃṅga pāragaḥ
gṛhāśramī mahābhāgaḥ vīta manyuḥ iti smṛtaḥ
tasya ātreyī mahābhāgaḥ bhāryā āsīt śīla saṃmatā
pativratā pati prāṇā dharma śīlā iti viśrutā
tasyām asya mahā ṛṣeḥ tu ṛtu kāla abhigāminaḥ

original: saṃbabhūva sutaḥ śrīmān upamanyuriti samṛtaḥ // VamP_56.5 //
analyzed: saṃbabhūva sutaḥ śrīmān upamanyuḥ iti samṛtaḥ
tam mātā muni śārdūla śāli piṣṭa rasena vai
poṣayāmāsa vadatī kṣīram etat su durgatā
saḥ jānānaḥ tha kṣīrasya svādu tām payaḥ iti atha
saṃbhāvanām api akarot śāli piṣṭa rase hi

original: sa tvekadā samaṃ pitrā kutracid dvijameśmani /
analyzed: sa tu ekadā samam pitrā kutracid dvijameśmani

original: kṣīraudanaṃ ca bubhuje susvādu prāṇapuṣṭidam // VamP_56.8 //
analyzed: kṣīraudanam ca bubhuje su svādu prāṇa puṣṭi dam
sa labdhvā anupamam svādam kṣīrasya ṛṣi dārakaḥ

original: mātrā dattaṃ dvitīye 'hni nādatte piṣṭavāri tat // VamP_56.9 //
analyzed: mātrā dattam dvitīye hni na ādatte piṣṭa vāri tat

original: rurodātha tato bālyāt poya'rthi cātako yathā /
analyzed: ruroda atha tatas bālyāt poyarthi cātakaḥ yathā

original: taṃ mātā rudatī prāha bāṣpagadgadayā girā // VamP_56.10 //
analyzed: tam mātā rudatī prāha bāṣpa gadgadayā girā
umāpatau paśupatau śūla dhāriṇi saṃkare

original: aprasanne virupākṣe kutaḥ kṣīreṇa bhojanam // VamP_56.11 //
analyzed: aprasanne virupa akṣe kutas kṣīreṇa bhojanam

original: yadīcchasi payo bhoktuṃ sadyaḥ puṣṭikaraṃ suta /
analyzed: yadi icchasi payaḥ bhoktum sadyas puṣṭi karam suta
tat ārādhaya deveśam virūpākṣam triśūlinam
tasmin tuṣṭe jagat dhāmni sarva kalyāṇa dāyini
prāpyate mṛta pāyi tvam kim punar kṣīra bhojanam
tat mātuḥ vacanam śrutvā vīta manyu sutaḥ bravīt

original: ko 'yaṃ virūpākṣa iti tvayārādhyastu kīrtitaḥ // VamP_56.14 //
analyzed: kaḥ yam virūpākṣaḥ iti tvayā ārādhyaḥ tu kīrtitaḥ
tatas sutam dharma śīlā dharma āḍhyam vākyam abravīt

original: yo 'yaṃ virupākṣa iti śrūyatāṃ kathayāmi te // VamP_56.15 //
analyzed: yaḥ yam virupākṣaḥ iti śrūyatām kathayāmi te
āsīt mahā asurapatiḥ śrīdāmaḥ iti viśrutaḥ

original: tenākramya jagatsarvaṃ śrīrnītā svavaśaṃ purā // VamP_56.16 //
analyzed: tena ākramya jagat sarvam śrīḥ nītā sva vaśam purā
niḥśrīkāḥ tu trayaḥ lokāḥ kṛtāḥ tena durātmānā
śrīvatsam vāsudevasya hartum aicchat mahā balaḥ
tam sya duṣṭam bhagavān abhiprāyam janārdanaḥ
jñātvā tasya vadha ākāṅkṣī maheśvaram upāgamat
etasmin antare śaṃbhuḥ yoga mūrti dharaḥ pyayaḥ
tasthau himācala prastham āśritya ślukṣṇa bhū talam
athā abhyetya jagannātham sahasraśirasam vibhum
ārādhayāmāsa hariḥ svayam ātmānam ātmanā
sāgram varṣa sahasram tu pādāṅguṣṭhena tastivān
gṛṇan tat paramam brahma yogi jñeyam alakṣaṇam

original: tataḥ prītaḥ prabhuḥ prādād viṣṇave paramaṃ varam /
analyzed: tatas prītaḥ prabhuḥ prādāt viṣṇave paramam varam

original: pratyakṣaṃ taijasaṃ śrīmān divyaṃ cakraṃ sudarśanam // VamP_56.22 //
analyzed: pratyakṣam taijasam śrīmān divyam cakram sudarśanam
tat dattvā devadevāya sarva bhūta bhaya pradam
kāla cakra nibham cakram śaṅkaraḥ viṣṇum abravīt
vara āyudhaḥ yam deveśa sarva āyudha nibarhaṇaḥ
sudarśanaḥ dvādaśa araḥ ṣaṣ nābhiḥ dvi yugaḥ javī
ārā saṃsthāḥ tu amī ca asya devāḥ māsāḥ ca rāśayaḥ

original: śiṣṭānāṃ rakṣaṇārthāya saṃsthitā ṛthavaśca ṣaṭ // VamP_56.25 //
analyzed: śiṣṭānām rakṣaṇa arthāya saṃsthitāḥ ṛthavaḥ ca ṣaṭ
agniḥ somaḥ tathā mitraḥ varuṇaḥ śacīpatiḥ

original: indrāgnī cāpyatho viśve prajāpataya eva ca // VamP_56.26 //
analyzed: indra agnī ca api atho viśve prajāpatayaḥ eva ca
hanūmān ca atha balāvān devaḥ dhanvantariḥ tathā
tapaḥ ca eva tapasyaḥ ca dvādaśā ete pratiṣṭhitāḥ
caitra ādyāḥ phālguna antāḥ ca māsāḥ tatra

original: tvamevamādhāya vibho varāyudhaṃ śatruṃ surāṇāṃ jahi mā viśaṅkithāḥ /
analyzed: tvam evam ādhāya vibho vara āyudham śatrum surāṇām jahi mā viśaṅkithāḥ

original: amogha eṣo 'mararājaḍapūjito dhṛto mayā netragatastapobalāt // VamP_56.28 //
analyzed: amoghaḥ eṣaḥ mara rājaḍa pūjitaḥ dhṛtaḥ mayā netra gataḥ tapaḥ balāt
iti uktaḥ viṣṇuḥ bhavam vacanam abravīt

original: kathaṃ śaṃbho vijānīyāmamogho mogha eva vā // VamP_56.29 //
analyzed: katham śaṃbho vijānīyām amoghaḥ moghaḥ eva vā
yadi amoghaḥ vibho cakraḥ sarvatra apratighaḥ tava

original: jijñāsārthaṃ tavaiveha prakṣepsyāmi pratīccha bhoḥ // VamP_56.30 //
analyzed: jijñāsā artham tava evā iha prakṣepsyāmi pratīccha bhoḥ
tat vākyam vāsudevasya niśamya āha vinākadhṛk
yadi evam prakṣipasva iti nirviśaṅkena cetasā
tat mahā īśāna vacanam śrutvā viṣṇuḥ sudarśanam

original: mumoca tejojijñāsuḥ śaṅkaraṃ prati vegavān // VamP_56.32 //
analyzed: mumoca tejaḥ jijñāsuḥ śaṅkaram prati vegavān
murāri kara vibhraṣṭam cakram abhyetya śūlinam

original: tridhā cakāra viśveśaṃ yajñeśaṃ yajñayājakam // VamP_56.33 //
analyzed: tridhā cakāra viśveśam yajñeśam yajña yājakam
haram hariḥ tridhā bhūtam dṛṣṭavā kṛttam mahā bhujaḥ
vrīḍā upapluta dehaḥ tu praṇipāta paraḥ bhavat
pāda praṇāma avanatam vīkṣya dāmodaram bhavaḥ
prāha prīti paraḥ śrīmān uttiṣṭhati punar punar
prākṛtaḥ yam mahā bāho vikāraḥ cakraneminā

original: nikṛtto na svarabhāvo me so 'cchedyo 'dāhya eva ca // VamP_56.36 //
analyzed: nikṛttaḥ na svara bhāvaḥ me saḥ chedyaḥ dāhyaḥ eva ca
tat yat etāni cakreṇa trīṇi bhāgāni keśava

original: kṛtāni tāni puṇyani bhaviṣyanti na saśayaḥ // VamP_56.37 //
analyzed: kṛtāni tāni puṇyani bhaviṣyanti na saśayaḥ
hiraṇyākṣaḥ smṛtaḥ hi ekaḥ suvarṇākṣaḥ tathā paraḥ
tṛtīyaḥ ca virūpākṣaḥ trayaḥ mī puṇya dāḥ nṛṇām
uttiṣṭha gacchasva vibho nihantum amara ardanam

original: śrīdāmni nihate viṣṇo nandayiṣyanti devatāḥ // VamP_56.39 //
analyzed: śrīdāmni nihate viṣṇo nandayiṣyanti devatāḥ
iti evam uktaḥ bhagavān harema garuḍadhvajaḥ

original: gatvā suragiriprasthaṃ śrīdāmānaṃ dadarśa ha // VamP_56.40 //
analyzed: gatvā suragiri prastham śrīdāmānam dadarśa ha

original: taṃ dṛṣṭvā devadarpaghnaṃ daityaṃ devavaro hariḥ /
analyzed: tam dṛṣṭvā deva darpa ghnam daityam deva varaḥ hariḥ

original: mumoca cakraṃ vegāḍhyaṃ hato 'sīti bruvanmuhuḥ // VamP_56.41 //
analyzed: mumoca cakram vega āḍhyam hataḥ sīti bruvan muhur

original: tatastu tenāpratipauruṣeṇa cakreṇa daityasya śiro nikṛttam /
analyzed: tatas tu tena apratipauruṣeṇa cakreṇa daityasya śiraḥ nikṛttam

original: saṃchinnasīrṣo nipapāta śailād vajrāhataṃ śailaśiro yathaiva // VamP_56.42 //
analyzed: saṃchinna sīrṣaḥ nipapāta śailāt vajra āhatam śaila śiraḥ yathā eva

original: tasamin hate devaripau murārirīśaṃ samārādhya virūpanetram /
analyzed: tasamin hate deva ripau murāriḥ īśam samārādhya virūpa netram

original: labdhvā ca cakraṃ pravaraṃ mahāyudhaṃ jagāma devo nilayaṃ payonidhim // VamP_56.43 //
analyzed: labdhvā ca cakram pravaram mahā āyudham jagāma devaḥ nilayam payonidhim
saḥ yam putra nirūpākṣaḥ devadevaḥ maheśvaraḥ

original: tamārādhaya cet sādho kṣīreṇocchasi bhojanam // VamP_56.44 //
analyzed: tam ārādhaya ced sādho kṣīreṇa ucchasi bhojanam
tat mātuḥ vacanam śrutvā vīta manyu sutaḥ balī

original: tamārādhya virūpākṣaṃ prāptaḥ kṣīreṇa bhojanam // VamP_56.45 //
analyzed: tam ārādhya virūpākṣam prāptaḥ kṣīreṇa bhojanam

original: evaṃ tavoktaṃ paramaṃ pavitraṃ saṃchedanaṃ śarvatanoḥ purā vai /
analyzed: evam tava uktam paramam pavitram saṃchedanam śarva tanoḥ purā vai

original: tattīrthavaryaṃ sa mahāsuro vai samāsasādātha supuṇyahetoḥ // VamP_56.46 //
analyzed: tat tīrtha varyam sa mahā asuraḥ vai samāsasāda atha su puṇya hetoḥ
iti śrī vāmanapurāṇaḥ ṣṭpañcāśaḥ dhyāyaḥ
pulastyaḥ uvāca
tasmin tīrtha vare snātvā dṛṣṭvā devam trilocanam

original: pūjayitvā suvarṇākṣaṃ naimiṣaṃ prayayau tataḥ // VamP_57.1 //
analyzed: pūjayitvā suvarṇākṣam naimiṣam prayayau tatas
tatra tīrtha sahasrāṇi triṃśat pāpa harāṇi ca
tomtyāḥ kāñcana akṣyāḥ ca guru dāyāḥ ca madhyatas
teṣu snātvā arcya deveśam pīta vāsasam acyutam
ṛṣīn api ca saṃpūjya naimiṣa araṇya vāsinaḥ
devadevam tathā īśānam saṃpūjya vidhinā tatas

original: gayāyāṃ gopatiṃ draṣṭuṃ jagāma sa mahāsuraḥ // VamP_57.4 //
analyzed: gayāyām gopatim draṣṭum jagāma sa mahā asuraḥ

original: tatra brahmadhvaje snātvā kṛtvā cāsya pradakṣiṇām /
analyzed: tatra brahmadhvaje snātvā kṛtvā ca asya pradakṣiṇām

original: piṇḍanirvapaṇaṃ puṇyaṃ pidṛṇāṃ sa cakāra ha // VamP_57.5 //
analyzed: piṇḍa nirvapaṇam puṇyam pidṛṇām sa cakāra ha

original: udapāne tathā snātvā tatrābhyarcya pitṝn vaśī /
analyzed: udapāne tathā snātvā tatra abhyarcya pitṝn vaśī

original: gadāpāṇiṃ samabhyarcya gopatiṃ cāpi śaṅkaram // VamP_57.6 //
analyzed: gadā pāṇim samabhyarcya gopatim ca api śaṅkaram
indratīrthe tathā snātvā saṃtarpya pitṛ devatāḥ
mahānadī jale snātvā sarayūm ājagāma saḥ
tasyām snātvā samabhyarcya gopratāre kuśeśayam

original: upoṣya rajanīmekāṃ virajāṃ nagarīṃ yayau // VamP_57.8 //
analyzed: upoṣya rajanīm ekām virajām nagarīm yayau

original: snātvā virajase tīrthe dattvā piṇḍaṃ pitṝṃs tathā /
analyzed: snātvā virajase tīrthe dattvā piṇḍam pitṝn tathā

original: darśanārtha yayau śrīmān ajitaṃ puruṣottamam // VamP_57.9 //
analyzed: darśana artha yayau śrīmān ajitam puruṣottamam
tam dṛṣṭvā puṇḍarīkākṣam akṣaram paramam śuciḥ

original: ṣaḍrātramuṣya tatraiva mahendraṃ dakṣiṇaṃ yayau // VamP_57.10 //
analyzed: ṣaṣ rātram uṣya tatra eva mahendram dakṣiṇam yayau
tatra deva varam śaṃbhum arddhanārīśvaram haram

original: dṛṣṭvārcya saṃpūjya pitṝn mahendraṃ cottaraṃ gataḥ // VamP_57.11 //
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā arcya saṃpūjya pitṝn mahā indram ca uttaram gataḥ

original: tatra devavaraṃ śaṃbhuṃ gopālaṃ somapāyinam. dṛṣṭvā snātvā somatīrthe sahyācalamupāgataḥ // VamP_57.12 //
analyzed: tatra deva varam śaṃbhum gopālam soma pāyinam dṛṣṭvā snātvā somatīrthe sahya acalam upāgataḥ

original: tatra snātvā mahodakyāṃ vaikuṇṭhaṃ cārcyaṃ bhaktitaḥ /
analyzed: tatra snātvā mahodakyām vaikuṇṭham ca arcyam bhaktitaḥ

original: surān pitṛn samabhyarcya pāriyātraṃ giriṃ gataḥ // VamP_57.13 //
analyzed: surān pitṛn samabhyarcya pāriyātram girim gataḥ
tatra snātvā lāhgalinyām pūjayitvā aparājitam

original: kaśerudeśaṃ cābhayetya viśvarūpaṃ dadarśa saḥ // VamP_57.14 //
analyzed: kaśeru deśam ca abhayā itya viśvarūpam dadarśa saḥ
yatra deva varaḥ śaṃbhuḥ gaṇānām tu su pūjitam
viśvarūpam atha ātmānam darśayāmāsa yoga vid
tatra maṅkuṇikā toye snātvā abhyaryya maheśvaram

original: jagāmādriṃ sa saugandhi prahlādo malāyācalam // VamP_57.16 //
analyzed: jagāma adrim sa saugandhi prahlādaḥ malāya acalam

original: mahāhrade tataḥ snātvā pūjayitvā ca śaṅkaram /
analyzed: mahāhrade tatas snātvā pūjayitvā ca śaṅkaram

original: tato jagāma yogātmā draṣṭuṃ vindhye sadāśivam // VamP_57.17 //
analyzed: tatas jagāma yoga ātmā draṣṭum vindhye sadāśivam
tatas vipāśā salile snātvā abhyarcya sadāśivam

original: trirātraṃ samupoṣyātha avantīṃ nagarīṃ yayo // VamP_57.18 //
analyzed: tri rātram samupoṣya atha avantīm nagarīm yayoḥ

original: tatra śiprājale snātvā viṣṇuṃ saṃpūjya bhaktitataḥ /
analyzed: tatra śiprā jale snātvā viṣṇum saṃpūjya bhakti tatas
śmaśāna stham dadarśa atha mahākāla vapuḥ dharam

original: tasmin hi sarvasattvānāṃ tena rūpeṇa śaṅkaraḥ /
analyzed: tasmin hi sarva sattvānām tena rūpeṇa śaṅkaraḥ

original: tāmasaṃ rūpamāsthāya saṃhāraṃ kurute vaśī // VamP_57.20 //
analyzed: tāmasam rūpam āsthāya saṃhāram kurute vaśī
tatrasthena sureśena śvetakiḥ nāma bhūpatiḥ
rakṣitaḥ tu antakam dagdhvā sarva būta apahāriṇam
tatra ati hṛṣṭaḥ vasati nityam śarvaḥ saha umayā
vṛtaḥ pramatha koṭībhiḥ bahubhiḥ tridaśa arcitaḥ
tam dṛṣṭvā atha mahākālam kāla kāla antaka antakam
śmasānanilayam śaṃbhum bhūtanātham jagatpatim

original: pūjayitvā śūladharaṃ jagāma niṣadhān prati // VamP_57.24 //
analyzed: pūjayitvā śūladharam jagāma niṣadhān prati
tatra amara īśvaram devam dṛṣṭvā saṃpūjya bhaktitaḥ

original: mahodayaṃ samabhyetya hayagrīvaṃ dadarśa saḥ // VamP_57.25 //
analyzed: mahodayam samabhyetya hayagrīvam dadarśa saḥ

original: aśvatīrthe tataḥ snātvā dṛṣṭvā ca turagānanam /
analyzed: aśvatīrthe tatas snātvā dṛṣṭvā ca turaga ānanam

original: śrīdharaṃ caiva saṃpūjya pañcālaviṣayaṃ yayau // VamP_57.26 //
analyzed: śrīdharam ca eva saṃpūjya pañcāla viṣayam yayau
tatra īśvara guṇaiḥ yuktam putram arthapateḥ atha

original: pāñcālikaṃ vaśī dṛṣṭvā prayāgaṃ parato yayau // VamP_57.27 //
analyzed: pāñcālikam vaśī dṛṣṭvā prayāgam paratas yayau
snātvā sannihite tīrthe yāmune loka viśrute

original: dṛṣṭvā vaṭeśvaraṃ rudraṃ mādhavaṃ yogaśāyinam // VamP_57.28 //
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā vaṭeśvaram rudram mādhavam yoga śāyinam
dvau eva bhaktitaḥ pūjyau pūjayitvā mahā asuraḥ
māgha māsam atha upoṣya tatas vārāṇasīm gataḥ

original: tato 'syāṃ varaṇāyaṃ ca tīrtheṣu ca pṛthak pṛthak /
analyzed: syām ca tīrtheṣu ca pṛthak pṛthak
sarva pāpa hara ādyeṣu snātvā arcya pitṛ devatāḥ
pradakṣimīkṛtya purīm pūjya avimukta keśavau

original: lolaṃ divākaraṃ dṛṣṭvā tato madhuvanaṃ yayau // VamP_57.31 //
analyzed: lolam divākaram dṛṣṭvā tatas madhuvanam yayau
tatra svayaṃbhuvam devam dadarśa asura sattamaḥ
tam abhyarcya mahā tejāḥ puṣkara araṇyam āgamat
teṣu triṣu api tīrtheṣu snātvā arcya pitṛ devatāḥ
puṣkarākṣam ayaḥ gandhi brahmāṇam ca api apūjayat
tatas bhūyas sarasvatyāḥ tīrthe trailokya viśrute
koṭitīrthe rudra koṭim dadarśa vṛṣabhadhvajam
naimiṣeyāḥ dvijavarāḥ māgadheyāḥ sa saindhavāḥ
dharmāraṇyāḥ pauṣkareyāḥ daṇḍaka araṇyakāḥ tathā
cāmpeyāḥ bhārukaccheyāḥ devikātīragāḥ ca ye

original: te tatra śaṅkaraṃ draṣṭuṃ samāyātā dvijātayaḥ // VamP_57.36 //
analyzed: te tatra śaṅkaram draṣṭum samāyātāḥ dvijātayaḥ
koṭi saṃkhyāḥ tapaḥ siddhāḥ hara darśa lālasāḥ

original: ahaṃ pūrvamahaṃ pūrvamityevaṃ vādino mun // VamP_57.37 //
analyzed: aham pūrvam aham pūrvam iti evam vādinaḥ mun

original: tān saṃkṣubdhān haro dṛṣṭvā maharṣīn dagdhakilbiṣān /
analyzed: tān saṃkṣubdhān haraḥ dṛṣṭvā mahā ṛṣīn dagdha kilbiṣān
teṣām eva anukampā artham koṭi mūrttiḥ abhūt bhavaḥ

original: tataste munayaḥ prītāḥ sarva eva maheśvaram /
analyzed: tatas te munayaḥ prītāḥ sarve eva maheśvaram
saṃpūjayantaḥ tasthuḥ vai tīrtham kṛtvā pṛthak pṛthak
iti evam rudrakoṭī iti nāmnā śaṃbhuḥ ajāyata

original: taṃ dadarśa mahātejāḥ prahlādo bhaktimān vaśī /
analyzed: tam dadarśa mahā tejāḥ prahlādaḥ bhaktimān vaśī

original: koṭitīrthe tataḥ snātvā tarpayitvā vasun pitṝn /
analyzed: koṭitīrthe tatas snātvā tarpayitvā pitṝn
rudrakoṭim samabhyarcya jagāma kurujāṅgalam
ta deva varam sthāṇum śaṅkaram pārvatī priyam
sarasvatī jale magnam dadarśa sura pūjitam
sārasvate mbhasi snātvā sthāṇum saṃpūjya bhaktitaḥ

original: snātvā dasāśvamedhe ca saṃpūjya ca surān pitṛn // VamP_57.42 //
analyzed: snātvā ca saṃpūjya ca surān pitṛn
sahasra liṅgam saṃpūjya snātvā kanyāhrade śuciḥ

original: abhivādya guruṃ śukraṃ somatīrthaṃ jagāma ha // VamP_57.43 //
analyzed: abhivādya gurum śukram somatīrtham jagāma ha

original: tatra snātvār'cya ca pitṛn somaṃ saṃpūjya bhaktitataḥ /
analyzed: tatra snātvā arcya ca pitṛn somam saṃpūjya bhakti tatas
kṣīrikā vāsam abhyetya snānam cakre mahā yaśāḥ
pradakṣiṇīkṛtya tarum varuṇam ca arcya buddhimān

original: bhūyaḥ kurudhvajaṃ dṛṣṭvā padmākhyāṃ nagarī gataḥ // VamP_57.45 //
analyzed: bhūyas kurudhvajam dṛṣṭvā padmākhyām nagarī gataḥ
tatra arcya mitrāvaruṇau bhāskarau loka pūjitau
kumāradhārām abhyetya dadarśa svāminam vaśī
snātvā kapiladhārāyām saṃtarpya arcya pitṛn surān

original: dṛṣṭvā skandaṃ samabhyarcya narmadāyāṃ jagāma ha // VamP_57.47 //
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā skandam samabhyarcya narmadāyām jagāma ha

original: tasyāṃ snātvā samabhyarcya vāsudevaṃ śriyaḥ patim /
analyzed: tasyām snātvā samabhyarcya vāsudevam śriyaḥ patim

original: jagāma bhūdharaṃ draṣṭuṃ vārāhaṃ cakradhāriṇam // VamP_57.48 //
analyzed: jagāma bhūdharam draṣṭum vārāham cakra dhāriṇam
snātvā kokāmuke tīrthe saṃpūjya dharaṇīdharam
tri sauvarṇam mahādevam arbuda īśam jagāma ha

original: tatra nārīhrade snātvā pūjayitvā ca śaṅkaram /
analyzed: tatra nārīhrade snātvā pūjayitvā ca śaṅkaram

original: kāliñjaraṃ samabhyetya nīlakaṇṭhaṃ dadarśa saḥ // VamP_57.50 //
analyzed: kāliñjaram samabhyetya nīlakaṇṭham dadarśa saḥ
nīlatīrtha jale snātvā pūjayitvā tatas śivam
jagāma sāgara anūpe prabhāse draṣṭum īśvaram

original: snātvā ca saṃgame nadyāḥ sarasvatyārṇaṃvasya ca /
analyzed: snātvā ca saṃgame nadyāḥ sarasvatyā arṇaṃvasya ca

original: someśvaraṃ lokapatiṃ dadarśa sa kapardinam // VamP_57.52 //
analyzed: soma īśvaram lokapatim dadarśa sa kapardinam
yaḥ dakṣa śāpa nirdagdhaḥ kṣayī tārādhipaḥ śaśī
āpyāyitaḥ śaṅkareṇa viṣṇunā sa kapardinā
tau arcya deva pravarau prajagāma mahālayam

original: tatra rudraṃ samabhyarcya prajagāmottarān kurūn // VamP_57.54 //
analyzed: tatra rudram samabhyarcya prajagāma uttarān kurūn
padmanābham sa tatra arcya saptagodāvaram yayau

original: tatra snātvār'cya viśveśaṃ bhīmaṃ trailokyavanditam // VamP_57.55 //
analyzed: tatra snātvā arcya viśveśam bhīmam trailokya vanditam

original: gatvā dāruvane śrīmān liṅgaṃ sa dadarśa ha /
analyzed: gatvā dāru vane śrīmān liṅgam sa dadarśa ha

original: tamarcya brāhmaṇīṃ gatvā snātvār'cya tridaśeśvaram // VamP_57.56 //
analyzed: tam arcya brāhmaṇīm gatvā snātvā arcya tridaśeśvaram
plakṣāvataraṇam gatvā śrīnivāsam apūjayat

original: tataśca kuṇḍinaṃ gatvā saṃpūjya prāmatṛptidam // VamP_57.57 //
analyzed: tatas ca kuṇḍinam gatvā saṃpūjya prāma tṛpti dam
śūrpārake catur bāhum pūjayitvā vidhānataḥ
māgadha araṇyam āsādya dadarśa vasudhādhipam
tam arcayitvā viśveśam sa jagāma prajā mukham

original: mahātīrthe tataḥ snātvā vāsudevaṃ praṇamya ca // VamP_57.59 //
analyzed: mahā tīrthe tatas snātvā vāsudevam praṇamya ca
śoṇam śam prāpya saṃpūjya skamavarmāṇam īśvaram
mahākośyām mahādevam haṃsa ākhyam bhaktimān atha
pūjayitvā jagāma atha saindhava araṇyam uttamam
tatra īśvaram sunetra ākhyam śaṅkha śūla dharam gurum
pūjayitvā mahā bāhuḥ prajāgāma triviṣṭapam
tatra devam maheśānam jaṭādharam iti śrutam

original: taṃ dṛṣṭvār'cya hariṃ cāsau tīrthaṃ kanakhalaṃ yayau // VamP_57.62 //
analyzed: tam dṛṣṭvā arcya harim ca asau tīrtham kanakhalam yayau
tatra arcya bhadrakālīśam vīrabhadram ca dānavaḥ

original: dhanādhipaṃ ca meghaṅkaṃ yayāvatha girivrajam // VamP_57.63 //
analyzed: dhanādhipam ca meghaṅkam yayau atha girivrajam
tatra devam paśupatim lokanātham maheśvaram
saṃpūjayitvā pidhivat kāmarūpam jagāma ha

original: śaśiprabhaṃ devavaraṃ trinetraṃ saṃpūjayitvā saha vai mṛḍānyā /
analyzed: śaśiprabham deva varam trinetram saṃpūjayitvā saha vai mṛḍānyā

original: jagāma tīrthapravaraṃ mahākhyaṃ tasmin mahādevamapūjayat // VamP_57.65 //
analyzed: jagāma tīrtha pravaram mahā ākhyam tasmin mahādevam apūjayat

original: tatastrikūṭaṃ girimatriputraṃ jagāma draṣṭuṃ sa hi cakrapāṇinam /
analyzed: tatas trikūṭam girim atri putram jagāma draṣṭum sa hi cakrapāṇinam

original: tamīḍya bhaktyā tu gajendrasokṣaṇaṃ jajāpa japyaṃ paramaṃ pavitram // VamP_57.66 //
analyzed: tam īḍya bhaktyā tu gaja indra sokṣaṇam jajāpa japyam paramam pavitram
tatra uṣya daitya īśvara sūnuḥ ādarāt māsa trayam mūla phala ambu bhakṣī

original: nivedya viprapravareṣu kāñcanaṃ jagāma ghoraṃ sa hi daṇḍakaṃ vanam // VamP_57.67 //
analyzed: nivedya vipra pravareṣu kāñcanam jagāma ghoram sa hi daṇḍakam vanam
tatra divyam mahā śākham vanaspati vapuḥ dharam
dadarśa puṇḍarīkākṣam mahā śvāpada vāraṇam
tasya adhasthāt tri rātram sa mahā bhāgavataḥ suraḥ

original: sthitaḥ sthiṇḍilaśāyī tu paṭhan sārasvataṃ stavam // VamP_57.69 //
analyzed: sthitaḥ sthiṇḍilaśāyī tu paṭhan sārasvatam stavam
tasmāt tīrtha varam vidvān sarva pāpa pramocanam

original: jagāma dānavo draṣṭuṃ sarvapāpaharaṃ harim // VamP_57.70 //
analyzed: jagāma dānavaḥ draṣṭum sarva pāpa haram harim
tasya agratas jajāpa asau stavau pāpa praṇāśanau

original: yau purā bhagavān prāha kroḍarūpī janārdanaḥ // VamP_57.71 //
analyzed: yau purā bhagavān prāha kroḍa rūpī janārdanaḥ
tasmāt atha agāt daitya indraḥ śālagrāmam mahā phalam
yatra saṃnihitaḥ viṣṇuḥ careṣu sthāvareṣu ca

original: 57.72 tatra sarvagataṃ viṣṇuṃ matvā cakre ratiṃ balī /
analyzed: tatra sarva gatam viṣṇum matvā cakre ratim balī
pūjayan bhagavat pādau mahā bhāgavataḥ mune
iyam tava uktā muni saṃgha juṣṭā prahlādatīrtha anugatiḥ su puṇyā

original: yatkīrttanācchravaṇāt sparśanācca vimuktapāpā manujā bhavanti // VamP_57.74 //
analyzed: yad kīrttanāt śravaṇāt sparśanāt ca vimukta pāpāḥ manujāḥ bhavanti
iti śrī vāmanapurāṇe saptapañcāśaḥ dhyāyaḥ
nāradaḥ uvāca

original: yān japyān bhagavadbha bhaktyā prahlādo dānavo 'japat /
analyzed: yān japyān bhagavat bha bhaktyā prahlādaḥ dānavaḥ japat
gaja indra mokṣaṇa ādīn tu caturaḥ tān vadasva me
pulastyaḥ uvāca
śṛṇuṣva kathayiṣyāmi japyān etān tapodhana

original: duḥsvapnanāśo bhavati yairuktaiḥ saṃśrutaiḥ smṛtaiḥ // VamP_58.2 //
analyzed: duḥsvapna nāśaḥ bhavati yaiḥ uktaiḥ saṃśrutaiḥ smṛtaiḥ
gajendra mokṣaṇam tu ādau śṛṇuṣva tad anantaram

original: sārasvataṃ tataḥ puṇyau pāpapraśamanau stavau // VamP_58.3 //
analyzed: sārasvatam tatas puṇyau pāpa praśamanau stavau
sarva ratna mayaḥ śrīmān trikūṭaḥ nāma parvataḥ
sutaḥ parvatarājasya sumeroḥ bhāskara dyuteḥ
utthitaḥ sāgaram bhittvā deva ṛṣi gaṇa sevitaḥ
apasarobhiḥ parivṛtaḥ śrīmān prasvaṇa ākulaḥ
gandharvaiḥ kinnaraiḥ yakṣaiḥ siddha cāraṇa pannagaiḥ
vidyādharaiḥ sa patnīkaiḥ saṃyataiḥ ca tapasvibhiḥ
vṛka dvīpi gaja indraḥ ca vṛ ātraḥ virājate
punnāgaiḥ karṇikāraiḥ ca bilva āmalaka pāṭalaiḥ
cūta nīpa kadambaiḥ ca candana aguru campakaiḥ
śālaiḥ tālaiḥ tamālaiḥ ca sarala arjuna parpaṭaiḥ
tathā anyaiḥ vividhaiḥ vṛkṣaiḥ sarvatas samalaṅkṛtaḥ
nānā dhātu aṅkitaiḥ śṛṅgaiḥ prasravadbhiḥ samantataḥ
śobhitaḥ rucira prakhyaiḥ tribhiḥ vistīrṇa sānubhiḥ
mṛgaiḥ śākhāmṛgaiḥ siṃdaiḥ mātaṅgaiḥ ca sadāmadaiḥ
jīvañjīvaka saṃghuṣṭaiḥ cakora śikhi nāditaiḥ

original: tasyaikaṃ kāñcanaṃ śṛṅgaṃ sevate yaṃ divākaraḥ /
analyzed: tasya ekam kāñcanam śṛṅgam sevate yam divākaraḥ
nānā puṣpa samākīrṇam nānā gandha adhivāsitam

original: dvitīyaṃ rājataṃ śṛṅgaṃ sevate yaṃ niśākaraḥ /
analyzed: dvitīyam rājatam śṛṅgam sevate yam niśākaraḥ
pāṇḍura ambuda saṃkāśam tuṣāra caya saṃnibham
vajra indranīla vaiḍūrya tejobhiḥ bhāsayan diśaḥ
tṛtīyam brahmasadanam prakṛṣṭam śṛṅgam uttamam

original: na tatkṛtaghnāḥ paśyanti na nṛśaṃsā na nāstikāḥ /
analyzed: na tat kṛtaghnāḥ paśyanti na nṛśaṃsāḥ na nāstikāḥ

original: nātaptatapaso loke ye ca pāpakṛto janāḥ // VamP_58.15 //
analyzed: na a tapta tapasaḥ loke ye ca pāpa kṛtaḥ janāḥ
tasya sānumataḥ pṛṣṭhe saraḥ kāñcana paṅkajam
kāraṇḍava samākīrṇam rājahaṃsa upaśobhitam
kumuda utpala kahlāraiḥ puṇḍarīkaiḥ ca maṇḍitam
kamalaiḥ śatapatraiḥ ca kāñcanaiḥ samalaṅkṛtam
patraiḥ marakata prakhyaiḥ puṣpaiḥ kāñcana saṃnibhaiḥ
gulmaiḥ kīcaka veṇūnām samantāt pariveṣṭitam
tasmin sarasi duṣṭa ātmā virūpaḥ ntar jaleśayaḥ
āsīt grāhaḥ gaja indrāṇām
atha danta ujjvala mukhaḥ kadācid gaja yūthapaḥ
mada srāvī jala ākāṅkṣī pāda cārī iva parvataḥ
vāsayan mada gandhena girim airāvata upamaḥ
gajaḥ hi añjana saṃkāśaḥ madāt calita locanaḥ
tṛṣitaḥ pātu kāmaḥ avatīrṇaḥ ca tat jalam
sa līlaḥ paṅkaja vane yūtha madhya gataḥ caran
gṛhītaḥ tena raudreṇa grāheṇa avyakta mūrtinā

original: paśyantīnāṃ kareṇūnāṃ krośantīnāṃ ca dāruṇam // VamP_58.23 //
analyzed: paśyantīnām kareṇūnām krośantīnām ca dāruṇam
hriyate paṅkaja vane grāheṇa ati balīyasā
vāruṇaiḥ saṃyataḥ pāśaiḥ niṣprayatna gatiḥ kṛtaḥ
veṣṭyamānaḥ su ghoraiḥ tu pāśaiḥ nāgaḥ dṛḍhaiḥ tathā

original: visphūrya ca yathāśakti vikrosaṃśca mahāravān // VamP_58.25 //
analyzed: visphūrya ca yathāśakti vikrosan ca mahā ravān
vyathitaḥ sa nirutsāhaḥ gṛhītaḥ ghora karmaṇā
parama āpadam āpannaḥ manasā acintayat harim
sa tu nāga varaḥ śrīmat nārāyaṇa parāyaṇaḥ

original: tameva śaraṇaṃ devaṃ gataḥ sarvātmanā tadā // VamP_58.27 //
analyzed: tam eva śaraṇam devam gataḥ sarva ātmanā tadā
eka ātmā nigṛhīta ātmā viśuddhena antarātmanā

original: na yoginaḥ prāpnuvanti tamasmi śaraṇaṃ gataḥ // VamP_59.77 //

original: yo vai nṛtyati rudrātmā praṇato 'smi janārdanam // VamP_59.85 //

original: ko 'nyo nāśayati balād darpaṃ haihayabhūpateḥ // VamP_59.102 //

original: ahanyahani yo dadyāt paṭhatyetacca tatsamam // VamP_59.108 //

original: yathaitat stayamuktaṃ me na hyalpamapi me mṛṣā /

original: etad bhadra mayā khyātaṃ tava pātakanāśanam /

original: jagādainaṃ stavaṃ viṣṇoḥ sarveṣāṃ copaśāntidam // VamP_59.113 //

analyzed: tatas śāpa apanodam tu stute lapsyasi keśave

original: stuhi bhaktiṃ dṛḍhāṃ kṛtvā tataḥ pāpād vimokṣyase // VamP_59.115 //
analyzed: stuhi bhaktim dṛḍhām kṛtvā tatas pāpāt vimokṣyase

original: stuto hi bhaktyā nṝṇāṃ vai sarvapāpaharo hariḥ // VamP_59.116 //
analyzed: stutaḥ hi bhaktyā nṝṇām vai sarva pāpa haraḥ hariḥ

original: tadaiva tapase śrīmān śālagrāmamagād vaśī // VamP_59.117 //
analyzed: tadā eva tapase śrīmān śālagrāmam agāt vaśī

original: etat te kathitaṃ brahman viṣṇoḥ sārasvataṃ stavam /
analyzed: etat te kathitam brahman viṣṇoḥ sārasvatam stavam

original: namo hiraṇyagarbhāya padmagarbhāya te namaḥ // VamP_60.8 //

original: oṣadhyo romasaṃbhūtā virājastvaṃ namo 'stu te // VamP_60.29 //

original: namasye śrīnivāsaṃ ca namasye puruṣottamam // VamP_61.17 //

original: yaśodharaṃ mahābāhuṃ namasye ca kuśapriyam // VamP_61.20 //

original: sanātanaṃ ca brahmāṇaṃ namasye brahmatatparam // VamP_61.25 //

original: namasye pāpahantāraṃ śaraṇyaṃ śaraṇaṃ vraje // VamP_61.28 //

original: etat pavitraṃ paramaṃ purāṇaṃ proktaṃ tvagastayena maharṣiṇā ca /

original: dhnyaṃ yaśasyaṃ bahupāpanāśanaṃ saṃkartanāt smāraṇāt saṃśravācca // VamP_61.29 //

analyzed: kurukṣetram samabhyāgāt yaṣṭum vairocanaḥ valiḥ
tasmin mahā dharma yute tīrthe brāhmaṇa puṅgavaḥ
śukraḥ dvijāti pravarān āmantrayat bhārgavān
bhṛgūn āmantryamāṇān vai śrutvā ātreyāḥ sa gautamāḥ
kauśika aṅgirasaḥ ca eva tatyajuḥ kurujāṅgalān
uttarāśām prajagmuḥ te nadīm anu śatadrukām

original: śātadrave jale snātvā vipāśāṃ prayayustataḥ // VamP_62.4 //
analyzed: śātadrave jale snātvā vipāśām prayayuḥ tatas
vijñāya tatra api aratim snātvā arcya pitṛ devatāḥ
prajagmuḥ kiraṇām puṇyām dineśa kiraṇa cyutām

original: tasyāṃ snātvār'cya deverṣe sarva eva maharṣayaḥ /
analyzed: tasyām snātvā arcya deva īrṣe sarve eva mahā ṛṣayaḥ
airāvatīm su puṇya udām snātvā jagmuḥ atha īśvarīm

original: devikāyā jale snātvā payoṣṇyāṃ caiva tāpasāḥ /
analyzed: devikāyāḥ jale snātvā payoṣṇyām ca eva tāpasāḥ

original: avatīrṇā mune snātumātreyādyāḥ śubhāṃ nadīm // VamP_62.7 //
analyzed: avatīrṇāḥ mune snātum ātreya ādyāḥ śubhām nadīm
tatas nimagnāḥ dadṛśuḥ pratibimbam atha ātmanaḥ
antar jale dvijaśreṣṭha mahat āścarya kārakam
unmajjane ca dadṛśuḥ punar vismita mānasāḥ

original: tataḥ snātvā samuttīrṇā ṛṣayaḥ sarva eva hi // VamP_62.9 //
analyzed: tatas snātvā samuttīrṇāḥ ṛṣayaḥ sarve eva hi
jagamuḥ tatas te brahman kathayantaḥ parasparam
cintayantaḥ ca satatam kim etat iti vismitāḥ
tatas dūrāt apaśyanta vana ṣaṇḍam su vistṛtam
vanam hara gala śyāmam khaga dhvani nināditam
ati tuṅga tayā vayoma āvṛṇvānam naga uttamam
vistṛtābhiḥ jaṭābhiḥ tu antar bhūmin ca nārada
kānanam puṣpitaiḥ vṛkṣaiḥ atibhāti samantataḥ
daśārddha varṇaiḥ sukha daiḥ nabhaḥ tārā gaṇaiḥ iva
tam dṛṣṭvā kamalaiḥ vyāptam puṇḍarīkaiḥ ca śobhitam

original: tadvat kokanadairvyāptaṃ vanaṃ padmavanaṃ yathā // VamP_62.14 //
analyzed: tadvat kokanadaiḥ vyāptam vanam padma vanam yathā
prajagmuḥ tuṣṭim atulām te hlādam paramam yayaḥ

original: viviśuḥ prītamanaso haṃsā iva mahāsaraḥ // VamP_62.15 //
analyzed: viviśuḥ prīta manasaḥ haṃsāḥ iva mahā saraḥ
tad madhye dadṛśuḥ puṇyam āśramam loka pūjitam
caturṇām lokapālānām vargāṇām muni sattama
dharma āśramam prāc mukham tu palāśa viṭapa āvṛtam
pratīcī abhimukham brahman arthasya ikṣu vana āvṛtam
dakṣiṇa abhimukham kāmyam rambhā aśoka vana āvṛtam
udak mukham ca mokṣasya śuddha sphaṭika varcasam
kṛtānte tu āśramī mokṣaḥ kāmaḥ tretā antare śramī

original: āśramyartho dvāparānte tiṣyādau dharma āśramī // VamP_62.19 //
analyzed: āśrami arthaḥ dvāpara ante tiṣya ādau dharmaḥ āśramī
tāni āśramāṇi munayaḥ dṛṣṭvā ātreya ādayaḥ vyayāḥ

original: tatraiva ca ratiṃ cakrurakhaṇḍe salilāplute // VamP_62.20 //
analyzed: tatra eva ca ratim cakruḥ akhaṇḍe salila āplute
dharma ādyaiḥ bhagavān viṣṇuḥ akhaṇḍa viśrutaḥ
catur murtiḥ jagannāthaḥ purvam eva pratiṣṭhitaḥ
tam arcayanti ṛṣayaḥ yoga ātmānaḥ bahu śrutāḥ
śuśrūṣayā atha tapasā brahmacaryeṇa nārada

original: evaṃ te nyavasaṃstatra sametā munayo vane /
analyzed: evam te nyavasan tatra sametāḥ munayaḥ vane
asurebhyaḥ tadā bhītāḥ su āśritya ākhaṇḍa parvatam
tathā anye brāhmaṇāḥ brahman aśmakuṭṭāḥ marīcipāḥ

original: snātvā jale hi kālindyāḥ prajagmurdakṣiṇāmukhāḥ // VamP_62.24 //
analyzed: snātvā jale hi kālindyāḥ prajagmuḥ dakṣiṇāmukhāḥ
avantiviṣayam prāpya viṣṇum āsādya saṃsthitāḥ
viṣṇoḥ api prasādena duṣpraveśam mahā asuraiḥ
bālakhilya ādayaḥ jagmuḥ avaśāḥ dānavāt bhayāt
rudrakoṭim samāśritya sthitāḥ te brahmacāriṇaḥ
evam gateṣu vipreṣu gautama āṅgirasa ādiṣu

original: śukrastu bhārgavān sarvān ninye yajñavidhau mune // VamP_62.27 //
analyzed: śukraḥ tu bhārgavān sarvān ninye yajña vidhau mune
adhiṣṭhite bhārgavaiḥ tu mahā yajñe mita dyute

original: yajñadīkṣāṃ baleḥ śukraścākāra vidhinā svayam // VamP_62.28 //
analyzed: yajña dīkṣām baleḥ śukraḥ ca akāra vidhinā svayam
śveta ambara dharaḥ daityaḥ śveta mālya anulepanaḥ
mṛga ajina āvṛtaḥ pṛṣṭhe barhi patra vicitritaḥ
samāste vitate yajñe sadasyaiḥ abhisaṃvṛtaḥ
hayagrīva pralamba ādyaiḥ maya bāṇa purogamaiḥ
patnī vindhyāvalī ca asya dīkṣitā yajña karmaṇi
lalanānām sahasrasya pradhānā ṛṣi kanyakā
śukreṇa aśvaḥ śveta varṇaḥ madhu māse su lakṇaḥ
mahīm vihartum utsṛṣṭaḥ tārakākṣaḥ nu agāt ca tam
evam aśve samutsṛṣṭe vitate yajña karmaṇi

original: gate ca māsatritaye hūyamāne ca pāvake // VamP_62.33 //
analyzed: gate ca māsa tritaye hūyamāne ca pāvake
pūjyamāneṣu daityeṣu miṣuna sthe divākare
suṣuve deva jananī mādhavam vāmana ākṛtim

original: taṃ jātamātraṃ bhagavantamīśaṃ nārāyaṇaṃ lokapatiṃ purāṇam /
analyzed: tam jāta mātram bhagavantam īśam nārāyaṇam lokapatim purāṇam

original: brahmā samabhyetya samaṃ maharṣibhiḥ stotraṃ jagādātha vibhormaharṣe // VamP_62.35 //
analyzed: brahmā samabhyetya samam mahā ṛṣibhiḥ stotram jagāda atha vibhoḥ mahā ṛṣe

original: namo 'stu te mādhava sattvamūrtte namo 'stu te śāśvata viśvarūpa /
analyzed: namaḥ stu te mādhava sattva mūrtte namaḥ stu te śāśvata viśvarūpa

original: namo 'stu te śatruvanendhanāgne namo 'stu vai pāpamahādavāgne // VamP_62.36 //
analyzed: namaḥ stu te śatru vana indhana agne namaḥ stu vai pāpa mahā dava agne
namaḥ te puṇḍarīkākṣa namaḥ te viśvabhāvana
namaḥ te jagāda ādhāra namaḥ te puruṣottama
nārāyaṇa jagat mūrte jagannātha gadādhara

original: pītavāsaḥ śriyaḥkānta janārdana namo 'stu te // VamP_62.38 //
analyzed: pīta vāsaḥ śriyaḥ kānta janārdana namaḥ stu te

original: bhavāṃstrātā ca goptā ca viśvātmā sarvago 'vyayaḥ /
analyzed: bhavān trātā ca goptā ca viśvātmā sarvagaḥ vyayaḥ

original: sarvadhārī dharādhārī rūpadhārī namo 'stu te // VamP_62.39 //
analyzed: sarva dhārī dharā dhārī rūpa dhārī namaḥ stu te
vardhasva vardhita aśeṣa trailokya sura pūjita
kuruṣva daivata pate maghonaḥ śru pramārjanam

original: tvaṃ dhātā ca vidhātā ca saṃhartā tvaṃ maheśvaraḥ /
analyzed: tvam dhātā ca vidhātā ca saṃhartā tvam maheśvaraḥ
mahālaya mahāyogin yoga śāyin namaḥ stu te

original: 62.41 itthaṃ stuto jagannāthaṃ sarvātmā sarvago hariḥ /
analyzed: ittham stutaḥ jagannātham sarvātmā sarvagaḥ hariḥ

original: provāca bhagavān mahyaṃ kurūpanayanaṃ vibho // VamP_62.42 //
analyzed: provāca bhagavān mahyam kuru upanayanam vibho
tatas cakāra devasya jātakarma ādikāḥ kriyāḥ
bharadvājaḥ mahā tejāḥ bārhaspatyaḥ tapodhanaḥ
vrata bandham kṛtavān

original: tato daduḥ prītiyutāḥ sarva eva varān kramāt // VamP_62.44 //
analyzed: tatas daduḥ prīti yutāḥ sarve eva varān kramāt
yajñopavītam pulahaḥ tu aham ca sita vāsasī
mṛga ajinam kumbhayoniḥ bharadvājaḥ tu mekhalām
pālāśam adadat daṇḍam marīciḥ brahmaṇāḥ sutaḥ
akṣasūtram vāruṇiḥ tu kauśyam vedam atha aṅgirāḥ

original: chatraṃ prādād raghū rājā upānadyugalaṃ nṛgaḥ /
analyzed: chatram prādāt raghuḥ rājā upānah yugalam nṛgaḥ
kamṇḍalum bṛhat tejāḥ prādāt viṣṇoḥ bṛhaspatiḥ
evam kṛta upanayanaḥ bhagavān bhūta bhāvanaḥ
saṃstūyamānaḥ u ṛṣibhiḥ sa aṅgam vedam adhīyata
bharadvājāt āṅgirasāt sāmavedam mahā dhvanim
mahat ākhyāna saṃyuktam gandharva sahitam mune
māsena ekena bagavān jñāna śruti mahā arṇavaḥ
loka cāra pravṛtti artham abhūt śruti viśāradaḥ
sarva śāstreṣu naipuṇyam gatvā kṣayaḥ vyayaḥ
provāca brāhmaṇa śreṣṭham bharadvājam idam vacaḥ
śrī vāmanaḥ uvāca
brahman vrajāmi dehi ājñām kurukṣetram mahā udayam

original: tatra daityapateḥ puṇyo hayamedhaḥ pravartate // VamP_62.52 //
analyzed: tatra daitya pateḥ puṇyaḥ hayamedhaḥ pravartate
samāviṣṭāni paśyasva tejāṃsi pṛthivī tale
ye saṃnidhānāḥ satatam mad aṃśāḥ puṇya vardhanāḥ

original: tenāhaṃ pratijānāmi kurukṣetraṃ gato baliḥ // VamP_62.53 //
analyzed: tena aham pratijānāmi kurukṣetram gataḥ baliḥ
bharadvājaḥ uvāca

original: svecchayā tiṣṭha vā gaccha nāhamājñāpayāmi te /
analyzed: sva icchayā tiṣṭha vā gaccha na aham ājñāpayāmi te

original: gamiṣyāmo vayaṃ viṣṇo baleradhvaraṃ mā khida // VamP_62.54 //
analyzed: gamiṣyāmaḥ vayam viṣṇo baleḥ adhvaram mā khida

original: yad bhavantamahaṃ deva paripṛcchāmi tad vada /
analyzed: yat bhavantam aham deva paripṛcchāmi tat vada

original: keṣu keṣu vibho nityaṃ sthāneṣu puruṣottama /
analyzed: keṣu keṣu vibho nityam sthāneṣu puruṣottama

original: sānnidhyaṃ bhavato brūhi jñātumicchāmi tattvataḥ // VamP_62.55 //
analyzed: sānnidhyam bhavataḥ brūhi jñātum icchāmi tattvataḥ
vāmanaḥ uvāca

original: śrūyatāṃ kathayiṣyāmi yeṣu yeṣu guro aham /
analyzed: śrūyatām kathayiṣyāmi yeṣu yeṣu guro aham
nivāsāmi su puṇyeṣu sthāneṣu bahu rūpavān
mama avatāraiḥ vasudhā nabhastalam pātālam ambhonidhayaḥ divan ca

original: diśaḥ samastā girayo 'mbudāśca vyāptā bharadvāja mamānurūpaiḥ // VamP_62.57 //
analyzed: diśaḥ samastāḥ girayaḥ mbudāḥ ca vyāptāḥ bharadvāja mama anurūpaiḥ

original: ye divyā ye ca bhaumā jalagaganacarāḥ sthāvarā jaṅgamāśca sendrāḥ sārkāḥ sacandrā yamavasuvaruṇā hyagnayaḥ sarvapālāḥ /
analyzed: ye divyāḥ ye ca bhaumāḥ jala gagana carāḥ sthāvarāḥ jaṅgamāḥ ca sa indrāḥ sa arkāḥ sa candrāḥ yama vasu varuṇāḥ hi agnayaḥ sarva pālāḥ

original: brahmādyāḥ sthāvarāntā dvijakhagamahitā mūrtimanto hyamūrtāḥ te sarve matprasūtā bahu vividhaguṇāḥ pūraṇārthaṃ pṛthivyāḥ // VamP_62.58 //
analyzed: brahma ādyāḥ sthāvara antāḥ dvija khaga mahitāḥ mūrtimantaḥ hi amūrtāḥ te sarve mad prasūtāḥ bahu vividha guṇāḥ pūraṇa artham pṛthivyāḥ

original: ete hi mukhyāḥ surasiddhadānavaiḥ pujyāstathā saṃnihitā mahītale /
analyzed: ete hi mukhyāḥ sura siddha dānavaiḥ pujyāḥ tathā saṃnihitāḥ mahī tale

original: yairdṛṣṭamātraiḥ sahasaiva nāśaṃ prayāti pāpaṃ dvijavarya kīrtanaiḥ // VamP_62.59 //
analyzed: yaiḥ dṛṣṭa mātraiḥ sahasā eva nāśam prayāti pāpam dvija varya kīrtanaiḥ
iti śrī vāmanapurāṇe dviṣaṣṭitamaḥ dhyāyaḥ
śrī bhagavān uvāca

original: ādyaṃ mātsyaṃ mahadrupaṃ saṃsthitaṃ mānase hrade /
analyzed: ādyam mātsyam mahat rupam saṃsthitam mānase hrade
sarva pāpa kṣaya karam kīrtana sparśana ādibhiḥ
kaurmam anyat sannidhānam kośikyām pāpa nāśanam

original: hayaśīrṣaṃ ca kṛṣṇāṃśe govindaṃ hastināpure // VamP_63.2 //
analyzed: hayaśīrṣam ca kṛṣṇa aṃśe govindam hastināpure

original: tatrivikramaṃ ca kālindyāṃ liṅgabhede bhavaṃ vibhum /
analyzed: tatrivikramam ca kālindyām liṅga bhede bhavam vibhum

original: kedāre mādhavaṃ śauriṃ kubjāmre hṛṣṭamūrdhajam // VamP_63.3 //
analyzed: kedāre mādhavam śaurim kubja āmre hṛṣṭa mūrdhajam
nārāyaṇam badarthām ca vārāhe garuḍāsanam

original: jayeśaṃ bhadrakarṇe ca vipāśāyāṃ dvijapriyam // VamP_63.4 //
analyzed: jayeśam bhadrakarṇe ca vipāśāyām dvija priyam
rūpadhāram irāvatyām kurukṣetre kurudhvajam

original: kṛtaśauce nṛsiṃhaṃ ca gokarṇe viśvakarmiṇam // VamP_63.5 //
analyzed: kṛtaśauce nṛsiṃham ca gokarṇe viśvakarmiṇam
prācīne kāmapālam ca puṇḍarīkam mahā ambhasi

original: viśākhayūpe hyajitaṃ haṃsaṃ haṃsapade tathā // VamP_63.6 //
analyzed: viśākha yūpe hi ajitam haṃsam haṃsapade tathā
paya uṣṇāyām akhaṇḍam ca vitastāyām kumārilam

original: maṇimatparvate śaṃbhuṃ brahmaṇye ca prajāpatim // VamP_63.7 //
analyzed: maṇimat parvate śaṃbhum brahmaṇye ca prajāpatim
madhunadyām cakra dharam śūlabāhum himālaye
viddhi viṣṇum muni śreṣṭa sthitam oṣadhi sānuni
bhṛgutuṅge suvarṇāśram naimiṣe pītavāsasam
gayāyām gopatim devam gadāpāṇinam īśvaram
trailokya nātham vara dam gopratāre kuśeśayam

original: arddhanārīśvaraṃ puṇye māhendre dabhiṇe girau // VamP_63.10 //
analyzed: arddhanārīśvaram puṇye māhendre dabhiṇe girau
gopālam uttare nityam mahendre soma pīthinam
vaikuṇṭham api sahya adrau pāriyātra parājitam
kaśeru deśe deveśam viśvarūpam tapodhanam

original: malayādrau ca saugandhiṃ vindhyapāde sadāśivam // VamP_63.12 //
analyzed: malaya adrau ca saugandhim vindhya pāde sadāśivam
avanati viṣaye viṣṇum niṣadheṣu amara īśvaram

original: pāñcālikaṃ ca brahmarṣe pāñcāleṣu vyavasthitam // VamP_63.13 //
analyzed: pāñcālikam ca brahmarṣe pāñcāleṣu vyavasthitam

original: svayaṃbhuvaṃ madhuvate ayogandhiṃ ca puṣkare // VamP_63.14 //
analyzed: svayaṃbhuvam madhuvate ayaḥ gandhim ca puṣkare
tathā eva vipra pravara vārāṇasyām ca keśavam
avimuktakam atra eva lolaḥ ca atra eva gīyate
padmāyām padma kiraṇam samudre vaḍavā sukham

original: kumāradhāre bāhlīśaṃ kārtikeyaṃ ca barhiṇam // VamP_63.16 //
analyzed: kumāradhāre bāhlīśam kārtikeyam ca barhiṇam
ajeśe śaṃbhum anagham sthāṇum ca kurujāṅgale
vanamālinam āhuḥ mām diṣkindhā vāsinaḥ janāḥ
vīram kuvalāya ārūḍham śaṅkha cakra gadā dharam
śrīvatsa ahkam udāra aṅgam narmadāyām śriyaḥ patim
māhiṣmatyām trinayanam tatra eva ca hutāśanam

original: arbude ca trisauparṇa kṣmādharaṃ sūkarācale // VamP_63.19 //
analyzed: arbude ca trisauparṇa kṣmādharam sūkara acale
triṇāciketam brahma ṛṣe prabhāse ca kapardinam
tathā eva atrā api vikhyātam tṛtīyam śaśisekharam

original: udaye śaśinaṃ sūryaṃ dhruvaṃ ca tritayaṃ sthitam /
analyzed: udaye śaśinam sūryam dhruvam ca tritayam sthitam

original: hemakūṭe hiraṇyākṣaṃ skandaṃ śaravaṇe mune // VamP_63.21 //
analyzed: hemakūṭe hiraṇyākṣam skandam śaravaṇe mune
mahālaye smṛtam rudram uttareṣu kuruṣu atha
padmanābham muni śreṣṭha sarva saukhya pradāyakam
saptagodāvare brahman vikhyātam hāṭakeśvaram

original: tatraiva ca mahāhaṃsaṃ prayāge 'pi vaṭeśvaram // VamP_63.23 //
analyzed: tatra eva ca mahāhaṃsam prayāge vaṭeśvaram
śoṇe ca rukma kavacam kuṇḍine ghrāṇa tarpaṇam
bhillī vane mahā yogam mādreṣu puruṣa uttamam
plakṣāvataraṇe viśvam śrīnivāsam dvijottama
śūrpārake caturbāhum magadhāyām sudhā patim
girivraje paśupatim śrīkaṇṭham yamunā taṭe
vanaspatim samākhyātam daṇḍaka araṇya vāsinam
kāliñjare nīlakaṇṭham sarayvām śaṃbhum uttamam
haṃsa yuktam mahākośyām sarva pāpa praṇāśanam
gokarṇe dakṣiṇe śarvam vāsudevam prajā mukhe
vinghyaśṛṅge mahāśairim kanthāyām madhusūdanam
trikūṭa śikhare brahman cakrapāṇinam īśvaram
lauhadaṇḍe hṛṣīkeśam kosalāyām manoharam
mahābāhum surāṣṭre ca navarāṣṭre yaśodharam
bhūdharam devakānadyām mahodāyām kuśa priyam
gomatyām chādita gadam śaṅkha uddhāre ca śaṅkhinam

original: sunetraṃ saindhavāraṇye śūraṃ śūrapure sthitam // VamP_63.31 //
analyzed: sunetram saindhavāraṇye śūram śūrapure sthitam
rudra ākhyam ca haraṇvatyām vīrabhadram triviṣṭape

original: śaṅkukarṇaṃ ca bhīmāyāṃ bhīmaṃ śālavane viduḥ // VamP_63.32 //
analyzed: śaṅkukarṇam ca bhīmāyām bhīmam śāla vane viduḥ
viśvāmitram ca gaditam kailāse vṛṣabhadhvajam
maheśam mahilā śaile kāmarūpe śaśiprabham
balabhyām api gomitram kaṭāhe paṅkajapriyam
upendram siṃhala dvīpe śakrāhve kundamālinam
rasātale ca vikhyātam sahasraśirasam mune
kālāgnirudram tatra eva tathā anyam kṛttivāsasam
sutale kūrmam acalam vitale paṅkajāsanam

original: mahātale guro khyātaṃ deveśaṃ chāgaleśvaram // VamP_63.36 //

original: maharlloke tathāgastyaṃ kapilaṃ ca jane sthitam // VamP_63.39 //
analyzed: mahar loke tathā agastyam kapilam ca jane sthitam

original: tad vākyaṃ bhārgavaṃ śrutvā daityanātheritaṃ varam /

original: kośakāra iti khyāta āsīd brahmaṃstaporataḥ // VamP_64.22 //

original: tasyāmasya suto jātaḥ prakṛtyā vai jaḍākṛtiḥ /

analyzed: mūka vat na ālapati sa na ca paśyati ca andha vat

manyamānā gṛha dvāri ṣaṣṭhe hani samutsṛjat

original: svaṃ śiśuṃ kṛśamādāya sūrpākṣī nāma nāmataḥ // VamP_64.26 //
analyzed: svam śiśum kṛśam ādāya sūrpākṣī nāma nāmataḥ

analyzed: tam ādāya jagāma atha bhoktum śālodare girau
tatas tām āgatām vīkṣya tasyāḥ bhartā ghaṭodaraḥ

original: sābravīt rākṣasapate mayā sthāpya nijaṃ śiśum /
analyzed: sā bravīt rākṣasa pate mayā sthāpya nijam śiśum

original: sa prāha na tvayā bhadre bhadramācaritaṃ tviti /
analyzed: sa prāha na tvayā bhadre bhadram ācaritam tu iti

original: mahājñānī dvijendro 'sau tataḥ śapsyati kopitaḥ // VamP_64.30 //
analyzed: mahā jñānī dvijendraḥ sau tatas śapsyati kopitaḥ

original: anyasya kasyacit putraṃ śīghramānaya sundari // VamP_64.31 //
analyzed: anyasya kasyacid putram śīghram ānaya sundari
iti evam uktā sā raudrā rākṣasī kāma cāriṇī

ruroda su svaram brahman prakṣipya aṅguṣṭham ānane
sā kranditam cirāt śrutvā dharmiṣṭhā patim abravīt
paśya svayam muni śreṣṭha sa śabdaḥ tanayaḥ tava
trastā sā nirjagāma atha gṛha madhyāt tapasvinī

original: sa cāpi brāhmaṇaśreṣṭhaḥ samapaśyata taṃ śiśum // VamP_64.35 //
analyzed: sa ca api brāhmaṇa śreṣṭhaḥ samapaśyata tam śiśum

original: tato vihasya provāca kośakāro nijāṃ priyām // VamP_64.36 //
analyzed: tatas vihasya provāca kośakāraḥ nijām priyām

original: ko 'pyaṭasmākaṃ chalayituṃ surūpī bhuvi saṃsthitaḥ // VamP_64.37 //
analyzed: kaḥ pi aṭ asmākam chalayitum surūpī bhuvi saṃsthitaḥ
iti uktvā vacanam mantrī mantraiḥ tam rākṣasa ātmajam
babandha ullikhya vasudhām sa kuśena atha pāṇinā
etasmin antare prāptā sūrpākṣī vipra bālakam
antardhāna gatā bhūmau cikṣepa gṛha dūrataḥ

original: taṃ kṣiptamātraṃ jagrāha kośakāraḥ svakaṃ sutam /
analyzed: tam kṣipta mātram jagrāha kośakāraḥ svakam sutam

original: sā cābhyetya grahītuṃ svaṃ nāśakad rākṣasī sutam // VamP_64.40 //
analyzed: sā ca abhyetya grahītum svam nā aśakat rākṣasī sutam
itas ca itas ca vibhraṣṭā sā bhartāram upāgamat
kathayāmāsā yat vṛttam sva dvija ātmaja hīriṇam
evam gatā ayam rākṣasyām brāhmaṇena mahātmanā
sa rābhasa śiśuḥ brahman bhāryāyai viniveditaḥ
sa ca ātma tanayaḥ pitrā kapilāyāḥ sa vatsayāḥ
dadhnā saṃyojitaḥ tyartham kṣīreṇa ikṣu rasena ca
dvau eva vardhitau bālau saṃjātau sapta vārṣikau
pitrā ca kṛta nāmānau niśākara divākarau
naiśācariḥ divākīrtiḥ niśākīrtiḥ sva putrakaḥ
tayoḥ cakāra vipraḥ sau vrata bandha kriyām kramāt
vrata bandhe kṛte vedam papāṭha asau divākaraḥ

original: niśākaro jaḍatayā na papāṭheti naḥ śrutam // VamP_64.46 //
analyzed: niśākaraḥ jaḍa tayā na papāṭha iti naḥ śrutam

original: taṃ bāndhavāśca pitarau mātā bhrātā gurustathā /
analyzed: tam bāndhavāḥ ca pitarau mātā bhrātā guruḥ tathā

original: paryanindaṃstathā ye ca janā malayavāsinaḥ // VamP_64.47 //
analyzed: paryanindan tathā ye ca janāḥ malaya vāsinaḥ

original: tataḥ sa pitrā kruddhena kṣiptaḥ kūpe nirūdake /
analyzed: tatas sa pitrā kruddhena kṣiptaḥ kūpe nirūdake
mahā śilām ca upari vai pidhānam avaropayat
evam kṣiptaḥ tadā kūpe samatīteṣu bhārgava

original: tasya mātāgamat kūpaṃ tamandhaṃ śilayācitam // VamP_64.49 //
analyzed: tasya mātā agamat kūpam tam andham śilayā ācitam
tatas daśasu varṣeṣu samatīteṣu bhārgava

original: tasya mātāgamat kūpaṃ tamandhaṃ śilayācitam // VamP_64.50 //
analyzed: tasya mātā agamat kūpam tam andham śilayā ācitam

original: sā dṛṣṭāvā nicitaṃ kūpaṃ śilayā girikalpayā /
analyzed: sā dṛṣṭāva ā nicitam kūpam śilayā giri kalpayā

original: uccaiḥ provāca keneyaṃ kūpopari śilā kṛtā // VamP_64.51 //
analyzed: uccais provāca kena iyam kūpa upari śilā kṛtā

original: kūpāntasthaḥ sa tāṃ vāṇīṃ śrutvā māturniśākaraḥ /
analyzed: kūpa antasthaḥ sa tām vāṇīm śrutvā mātuḥ niśākaraḥ

original: prāha pradattā pitrā me kūpopari śilā tviyam // VamP_64.52 //
analyzed: prāha pradattā pitrā me kūpa upari śilā tu iyam
sā ati bhītā abravīt kaḥ si kūpa antasthaḥ dbhuta svaraḥ

original: so 'pyāha tava putro 'smi niśākareti viśrutaḥ // VamP_64.53 //
analyzed: saḥ pi āha tava putraḥ smi niśākara iti viśrutaḥ

original: sābravīt tanayo mahyaṃ nāmnā khyāto divākaraḥ /
analyzed: sā bravīt tanayaḥ mahyam nāmnā khyātaḥ divākaraḥ

original: niśākareti nāmnāho na kaścit tanayo 'sti me // VamP_64.54 //
analyzed: niśākara iti nāmnā aho na kaścid tanayaḥ sti me
sa ca āha pūrva caritam mātuḥ niravaśeṣataḥ

original: sā śrutvā tāṃ śilāṃsubhraḥ samutkṣipyāntayo 'śripat // VamP_64.55 //
analyzed: sā śrutvā tām śilā aṃsu bhraḥ samutkṣipya antayoḥ śripat
sā uttīrya kūpāt bhagavat mātuḥ pādau avandata

original: sā svānurūpaṃ tanayaṃ dṛṣṭvā svasutasya ca // VamP_64.56 //
analyzed: sā sva anurūpam tanayam dṛṣṭvā sva sutasya ca
tatas tam ādāya sutam dharmiṣṭhā patim etya ca

original: kathayāmāsa tatsarvaṃ ceṣṭitaṃ svasutasya ca // VamP_64.57 //
analyzed: kathayāmāsa tat sarvam ceṣṭitam sva sutasya ca
tatas nvapṛcchat vipraḥ sau kim idam tāta kāraṇam

original: noktavān yadbhavān pūrvaṃ mahatkautūhalaṃ mama // VamP_64.58 //
analyzed: na uktavān yat bhavān pūrvam mahat kautūhalam mama
