original: prāha putro 'dbhutaṃ vākyaṃ mātaraṃ pitaraṃ tathā // VamP_64.59 //
analyzed: prāha putraḥ dbhutam vākyam mātaram pitaram tathā
śrūyatām kāraṇam tāta yena mūka tvam āśritam
mayā jaḍa tvam anagha tathā andha tvam sva cakṣuṣaḥ
pūrva māsam aham vipra kule vṛndārakasya tu
vṛṣākapeḥ ca tanayaḥ mālā garbha samudbhavaḥ
tatas pitā pāṭhayat mām śāstram dharma artha kāma dam

original: mokṣaśāstraṃ paraṃ tāta setihāsaśrutiṃ tathā // VamP_64.62 //
analyzed: mokṣa śāstram param tāta sa itihāsa śrutim tathā
saḥ ham tāta mahā jñānī parāvara viśāradaḥ
jātaḥ mada andhaḥ tena aham duṣkarma abhirataḥ bhavam
madāt samabhavat lebhaḥ tena naṣṭā pragalbha tā
vivekaḥ nāśam agamat mūrkha bhāvam upāgataḥ
mūḍha bhāva tayā ca atha jātaḥ pāpa rataḥ
para dāra para artheṣu matiḥ me ca sadā bhavat
para dāra abhimarśi tvāt para artha haraṇāt api
smi udbndhanena aham narakam rauravam gataḥ
tasmāt varṣa sahasra ante bhukta śiṣṭe tad āgasi

original: araṇye mṛgahā pāpaḥ saṃjāto 'haṃ mṛgādhipaḥ // VamP_64.67 //
analyzed: araṇye mṛga hā pāpaḥ saṃjātaḥ ham mṛgādhipaḥ
vyāghra tve saṃsthitaḥ tāta baddhaḥ pañjara gaḥ kṛtaḥ

original: narādhipena vibhunā nītaśca nagaraṃ nijam // VamP_64.68 //
analyzed: narādhipena vibhunā nītaḥ ca nagaram nijam
baddhasya piñjara sthasya vyāghra tve dhiṣṭhitasya ha
dharma artha kāma śāstrāṇi pratyabhāsanta sarvaśas
tatas nṛpati śārdūlaḥ gadā pāṇiḥ kadācana
eka vastra parīdhānaḥ nagarāt niryayau bahis

original: tasya bhāryā jitā nāma rūpeṇāpratimā bhuvi /
analyzed: tasya bhāryā jitā nāma rūpeṇa apratimā bhuvi

original: sā nirgate tu ramaṇe mamāntikamupāgatā // VamP_64.71 //
analyzed: sā nirgate tu ramaṇe mama antikam upāgatā
tām dṛṣṭvā vavṛdhe mahyam pūrva abhyāsāt manobhavaḥ

original: yathaiva dharmaśāstrāṇi tathāhamavadaṃ ca tām // VamP_64.72 //
analyzed: yathā eva dharma śāstrāṇi tathā aham avadam ca tām
rāja putri su kalyāṇi nava yauvana śālini

original: cittaṃ harasi me bhīru kokilā dhvaninā yathā // VamP_64.73 //
analyzed: cittam harasi me bhīru kokilāḥ dhvaninā yathā
sā mad vacanam ākarṇya provāca tanu madhyamā
katham eva āvayoḥ vyāghra rati yogam upeṣyati
tatas ham abruvam tāta rāja putrīm sumadhyamām
dvāram udghāṭayasva adya nirgamiṣyāmi sa tvaram
sā api ayabravīt divā vyāghra lokaḥ yam paripaśyati
rātrau udghāṭayiṣyāma tatas raṃsyāva sva icchayā
tām eva aham avocam vai kālakṣepe ham akṣamaḥ

original: tasmādudghāṭaya dvāraṃ māṃ bandhācca vimocaya // VamP_64.77 //
analyzed: tasmāt udghāṭaya dvāram mām bandhāt ca vimocaya
tatas sā pīvara śreṇī dvāram udghāṭayat mune

original: udghāṭite tato dvāre nirgato 'haṃ bahiḥ śraṇāt // VamP_64.78 //
analyzed: udghāṭite tatas dvāre nirgataḥ ham bahis
pāśāni nigaḍa ādīni chinnāni hi balāt mayā

original: sā gṛhītā ca nṛpaterbhāryā ramitumicchatā // VamP_64.79 //
analyzed: sā gṛhītā ca nṛpateḥ bhāryā ramitum icchatā
tatas dṛṣṭaḥ smi nṛpateḥ bhṛtyaiḥ atula vikramaiḥ
śastra hastaiḥ sarvatas ca taiḥ aham pariveṣṭitaḥ
mahā pāśaiḥ śṛṅkhalābhiḥ samāhatya ca mudgaraiḥ
vadhyamānaḥ bruvam aham mā mā hiṃsadhvam ākulāḥ
te mad vacanam ākarṇya matvā eva rajanīcaram

original: dṛḍhaṃ vṛkṣe samudbdhya ghātayanta tapodhana // VamP_64.82 //
analyzed: dṛḍham vṛkṣe samudbdhya ghātayanta tapodhana
bhayaḥ gataḥ ca narakam para dāra niṣevaṇāt
muktaḥ varṣa sahasra ante jātaḥ ham śvetagardabhaḥ
brāhmaṇasya āgniveśyasya gehe bahu kalatriṇaḥ

original: tatrāpi sarvavijñānaṃ pratyabhāsat tato mama // VamP_64.84 //
analyzed: tatra api sarva vijñānam pratyabhāsat tatas mama
upavana ahyaḥ kṛtaḥ ca asmi dvija yoṣidbhiḥ ādarāt
ekadā navarāṣṭrīyā bhāryā tasya agrajanmanaḥ
vimatiḥ nāmataḥ khyātā gantum aicchat gṛham pituḥ
tām uvāca patiḥ gaccha āruhyam śvetagardabham
māsena āgamanam kāryam na stheyam paratas tatas

original: ityevamuktā sā bhartrā tanvī māmadhiruhya ca // VamP_64.87 //
analyzed: iti evam uktā sā bhartrā tanvī mām adhiruhya ca
bandhanāt avamucya atha jagāma tvaritā mune

original: tator'dhapathi sā tanvī matpṛṣṭhādavaruhya vai // VamP_64.88 //
analyzed: tatas ūrdhva pathi sā tanvī mad pṛṣṭhāt avaruhya vai
avatīrṇā nadīm snātum svarūpā ca ārdra vāsasā
sa aṅga upāṅgām rūpavatīm dṛṣṭvā tām aham ādravam
mayā ca abhidrutā tūrṇam patitā pṛthivī tale

original: tasyāmupari bho tāta patito 'haṃ bhṛśāturaḥ // VamP_64.90 //
analyzed: tasyām upari bho tāta patitaḥ ham bhṛśa āturaḥ
hṛṣṭaḥ bhartrā anusṛṣṭena nṛṇā tad anusāriṇā

original: protkṣipya yaṣṭiṃ māṃ brahman samādhāvat tvarānvitaḥ // VamP_64.91 //
analyzed: protkṣipya yaṣṭim mām brahman samādhāvat tvarā anvitaḥ

original: tad bhayāt tāṃ parityajya pradruto dakṣiṇāmukhaḥ /
analyzed: tat bhayāt tām parityajya pradrutaḥ dakṣiṇāmukhaḥ
tatas bhidravataḥ tūrṇa khalīna rasanāḥ mune
mama āsaktāḥ vaṃśa gulme durmokṣe prāṇa nāśane
tatra āsaktasya ṣaṣ rātrāt mama abhūt jīvita kṣayaḥ
gataḥ smi narakam bhūyas tasmāt muktaḥ bhavam śukaḥ

original: mahāraṇye tathā baddhaḥ śabareṇa durātmanā // VamP_64.94 //
analyzed: mahā araṇye tathā baddhaḥ śabareṇa durātmanā
pañjare kṣipya vikrītaḥ vaṇij putrāya śāline
tena api antar pura vare yuvatīnām samīpatas
śabda śāstra vid iti eva doṣa ghnaḥ ca iti avasthitaḥ
tatra āsataḥ taruṇyaḥ tāḥ odana ambu phala ādibhiḥ
bhakṣyaiḥ ca dāḍima phalaiḥ puṣṇanti aharahar pitar
kadācid padma patra akṣī śyāmā pīna payodharā
su śroṇī tanu madhyā ca vaṇij putra priyā śubhā

original: nāmnā candrāvalī nāma samudghāṭyātha pañjaram // VamP_64.98 //
analyzed: nāmnā candrāvalī nāma samudghāṭya atha pañjaram
mām jagrāha su cāru aṅgī karābhyām cāru hāsinī
cakāra upari pīnābhyām karābhyām cāru hāsinī

original: cakāropari pīnābhyāṃ stanābhyāṃ sā hi māṃ tataḥ // VamP_64.99 //
analyzed: cakāra upari pīnābhyām stanābhyām sā hi mām tatas

original: tato 'haṃ kṛtavān bhāvaṃ tasyāṃ vilasituṃ plavan /
analyzed: tatas ham kṛtavān bhāvam tasyām vilasitum plavan
tatas nu plapataḥ tatra hāre markaṭa bandhanam
baddhaḥ ham pāpa saṃyuktaḥ mṛś ca tad anantaram

original: bhūyo 'pi narakaṃ ghoraṃ prapanno 'smi sudurmatiḥ // VamP_64.101 //
analyzed: bhūyas pi narakam ghoram prapannaḥ smi su durmatiḥ
tasmāt ca aham vṛṣa tvam vai gataḥ cāṇḍāla pakvaṇe

original: sa caikadā māṃ śakaṭe niyojya svāṃ vilāsinīm // VamP_64.102 //
analyzed: sa ca ekadā mām śakaṭe niyojya svām vilāsinīm
samāropya mahā tejāḥ gantum kṛta matiḥ vanam

original: tato 'grataḥ sa caṇḍālo gatastvevāsya pṛṣṭhataḥ // VamP_64.103 //
analyzed: tatas sa caṇḍālaḥ gataḥ tu eva asya pṛṣṭhatas
gāyantī yāti tat śrutvā jātaḥ ham vyathita indriyaḥ
pṛṣṭhaḥ tu samālokya viparyastaḥ tathā utplutaḥ
patitaḥ bhūmim agamam tat akṣe kṣaṇa vikramāt

original: yoktre subaddha evāsmi pañcatvamagamaṃ tataḥ // VamP_64.105 //
analyzed: yoktre su baddhaḥ eva asmi pañcatvam agamam tatas
bhūyas nimagnaḥ narake daśa varṣa śatāni api
atas tava gṛhe jātaḥ tu aham jātim anusmaran
tāvanti eva adya janmāni smarāmi ca anupūrvaśas

original: pūrvābhyāsācca śāstrāṇi bandhanaṃ cāgataṃ mama // VamP_64.107 //
analyzed: pūrva abhyāsāt ca śāstrāṇi bandhanam ca āgatam mama
tat aham jāta vijñānaḥ na ācariṣye kathaṃcana

original: pāpāni ghorarūpāṇi manasā karmaṇā girā // VamP_64.108 //
analyzed: pāpāni ghora rūpāṇi manasā karmaṇā girā
śubham vā api aśubham vā api svādhyāyam śāstra jīvikā

original: bandhanaṃ vā vadho vāpi pūrvābhyāsena jāyate // VamP_64.109 //
analyzed: bandhanam vā vadhaḥ vā api pūrva abhyāsena jāyate

original: jātiṃ yadā paurvikīṃ tu smarate tāta mānavaḥ /
analyzed: jātim yadā paurvikīm tu smarate tāta mānavaḥ

original: tadā sa tebhyaḥ pāpebhyo śubhavardhanāya pāpakṣayāyātha mune hyaraṇyam /
analyzed: tadā sa tebhyaḥ pāpebhyaḥ śubha vardhanāya pāpa kṣayāya atha mune hi araṇyam

original: bhavān divākīrtimimaṃ suputraṃ gārhasthyadharme viniyojayasva // VamP_64.110 //
analyzed: bhavān divākīrtim imam su putram gārhasthya dharme viniyojayasva

original: tasmād gamiṣye śubhavardhanāya pāpakṣayāyātha mune hyaraṇyam /
analyzed: tasmāt gamiṣye śubha vardhanāya pāpa kṣayāya atha mune hi araṇyam

original: bhavān divākīrtimimaṃ suputraṃ gārhasthyadharme viniyojayasva // VamP_64.111 //
analyzed: bhavān divākīrtim imam su putram gārhasthya dharme viniyojayasva
baliḥ uvāca

original: ityevamuktvā sa niśākarastadā praṇamya mātāpitarau maharṣe /
analyzed: iti evam uktvā sa niśākaraḥ tadā praṇamya mātā pitarau mahā ṛṣe

original: jagāma puṇyaṃ sadanaṃ murāreḥ khyātaṃ badaryāśramamādyamīḍyam // VamP_64.112 //
analyzed: jagāma puṇyam sadanam murāreḥ khyātam badaryāśramam ādyam īḍyam
evam purā abhyāsa ratasya puṃsaḥ bhavanti dāna adhyayana ādikāni

original: tasmācca pūrvaṃ dvijavarya vai mayā abhyastamāsīnnanu te bravīmi // VamP_64.113 //
analyzed: tasmāt ca pūrvam dvija varya vai mayā abhyastam āsīt nanu te bravīmi

original: dānaṃ tapo vādhyayanaṃ maharṣe steyaṃ mahāpātakamagnidāham /
analyzed: dānam tapaḥ vā adhyayanam mahā ṛṣe steyam mahāpātakam agni dāham

original: jñānāni caivābyasaṃtāṃ hi pūrvaṃ bhavanti dharmārthaśāṃsi nātha // VamP_64.114 //
analyzed: jñānāni hi pūrvam bhavanti dharma artha śāṃsi nātha
pulastyaḥ uvāca

original: ityevamuktvā balavān sa śukraṃ daityeśvaraḥ svaḥ gurumīśitāram /
analyzed: iti evam uktvā balavān sa śukram daitya īśvaraḥ svaḥ gurum īśitāram
dhyāyan tadā āste madhu kaiṭabha ghnam nārāyaṇam cakra gadā asi pāṇim
iti śrī vāmanapurāṇe catuḥṣaṣṭitamaḥ dhyāyaḥ
pulastyaḥ uvāca
etasmin antare prāptaḥ bhagavān vāmana ākṛtiḥ
uccais vacanam abravīt

original: oṅkārapūrvāḥ śrutayo makhe 'smin tiṣṭhanti rūpeṇa tapodhanānām /
analyzed: oṅkāra pūrvāḥ śrutayaḥ makhe smin tiṣṭhanti rūpeṇa tapodhanānām

original: yajño 'śvamedhaḥ pravaraḥ kratūnāṃ mukhyastathā satriṣu daityanāthaḥ // VamP_65.2 //
analyzed: pravaraḥ kratūnām mukhyaḥ tathā satriṣu daitya nāthaḥ
ittham vacanam ākarṇya dānava adhipatiḥ vaśī
sa arghapātraḥ samabhyāgāt yatra devaḥ sthitaḥ bhavat
tatas ūrcya devadeveśam arcyam argha ādinā asuraḥ
bharadvāja ṛṣiṇā sārdham yajña vāṭam praveśayat
praviṣṭa mātram deveśam pratipūjya

original: provāca bhagavan brūhi kiṃ dadmi tava mānada // VamP_65.5 //
analyzed: provāca bhagavan brūhi kim dadmi tava mānada
tatas bravīt suraśreṣṭhaḥ daitya rājānam avyayaḥ

original: vihasya suciraṃ kālaṃ bharadvājamavekṣya ca // VamP_65.6 //
analyzed: vihasya su ciram kālam bharadvājam avekṣya ca
guroḥ madīyasya guruḥ tasya asti agni parigrahaḥ

original: na sa dhārayate bhūmyāṃ pārakyāṃ jātavedasam // VamP_65.7 //
analyzed: na sa dhārayate bhūmyām pārakyām jātavedasam
tad artham abhiyācham mama dānava pārthiva
mad śarīra pramāṇena dehi rājan pada trayam
surāreḥ vacanam śrutvā baliḥ bhāryām avekṣya ca

original: bāṇaṃ ca tanayaṃ vīkṣya idaṃ vacanamabravīt // VamP_65.9 //
analyzed: bāṇam ca tanayam vīkṣya idam vacanam abravīt

original: na kevalaṃ pramāṇena vāmano 'yaṃ laghuḥ priye /
analyzed: na kevalam pramāṇena vāmanaḥ yam laghuḥ priye

original: yena kramatrayaṃ maurkhyād yācate buddhito 'pi ca // VamP_65.10 //
analyzed: yena krama trayam maurkhyāt yācate ca

original: prayo vidhātālpadhiyāṃ narāṇāṃ bahiṣkṛtānāṃ ca mahānubhāgyaiḥ /
analyzed: prayaḥ vidhātā alpa dhiyām narāṇām bahiṣkṛtānām ca mahā anubhāgyaiḥ

original: dhanādikaṃ bhūri na vai dadāti yatheha viṣṇorna bahuprayāsaḥ // VamP_65.11 //
analyzed: dhana ādikam bhūri na vai dadāti yathā iha viṣṇoḥ na bahu prayāsaḥ
na dadāti vidhiḥ tasya yasya bhāgya viparyayaḥ

original: mayi dātari yaścāyamadya yācet padatrayam // VamP_65.12 //
analyzed: mayi dātari yaḥ ca ayam adya yācet pada trayam

original: ityevamuktvā vacanaṃ mahātmā bhūyo 'pyuvācātha hariṃ danūjaḥ /
analyzed: iti evam uktvā vacanam mahātmā bhūyas u pi uvāca atha harim danūjaḥ

original: yācasva viṣṇo gajavājibhūmiṃ dāsīhiraṇyaṃ yadabhīpsitaṃ ca // VamP_65.13 //
analyzed: yācasva viṣṇo gaja vāji bhūmim dāsī hiraṇyam yat abhīpsitam ca

original: bhavān yācayitā viṣṇo ahaṃ dātā jagatpatiḥ /
analyzed: bhavān yācayitā viṣṇo aham dātā jagatpatiḥ

original: dāturyācayiturlajjā kathaṃ na syāt padatraye // VamP_65.14 //
analyzed: dātuḥ yācayituḥ lajjā katham na syāt pada traye

original: rasātalaṃ vā vṛthivīṃ bhuvaṃ nākamathāpi vā /
analyzed: rasātalam vā vṛthivīm bhuvam nākam atha api vā

original: etabhyaḥ katamaṃ dadyāṃ sthānaṃ yācasva vāmana // VamP_65.15 //
analyzed: etabhyaḥ katamam dadyām sthānam yācasva vāmana
vāmanaḥ uvāca
gaja aśva bhū hiraṇya ādi tad arthibhyaḥ pradīyatām

original: etāvatā tvahaṃ cārthī dehi rājan padatrayam // VamP_65.16 //
analyzed: etāvatā tu aham ca arthī dehi rājan pada trayam
iti evam ukte vacane vāmanena mahā asuraḥ
baliḥ bhṛṅgāram ādāya dadau viṣṇoḥ krama trayam

original: pāṇau tu patite toye divyaṃ rūpaṃ cakāra ha /
analyzed: pāṇau tu patite toye divyam rūpam cakāra ha
trailokya kramaṇa arthāya bahu rūpam jagat mayam
padbhyām bhūmiḥ tathā jaṅghe nabhaḥ trailokya vanditaḥ

original: satyaṃ tapo jānuyugme ūrubhyāṃ merumandarau // VamP_65.19 //
analyzed: satyam tapaḥ jānu yugme ūrubhyām meru mandarau
viśvedevā kaṭī bhāge marutaḥ vastiśīrṣa gāḥ

original: liṅge sthito manmathaśca vṛṣaṇābhyāṃ prajāpatiḥ // VamP_65.20 //
analyzed: liṅge sthitaḥ manmathaḥ ca vṛṣaṇābhyām prajāpatiḥ
kukṣibhyām arṇavāḥ sapta jaṭhare bhuvanāni ca

original: valiṣu triṣu nadyaśca yajñāstu jaṭhare sthitāḥ // VamP_65.21 //
analyzed: valiṣu triṣu nadyaḥ ca yajñāḥ tu jaṭhare sthitāḥ
iṣṭāpūrta ādayaḥ sarvāḥ kriyāḥ tatra tu saṃsthitāḥ

original: pṛṣṭhasthā vasavo devāḥ skandhau rudrairadhiṣaṭhitau // VamP_65.22 //
analyzed: pṛṣṭha sthāḥ vasavaḥ devāḥ skandhau rudraiḥ adhiṣaṭhitau

original: bāhavaśca diśaḥ sarvā vasavo 'ṣṭau kare smṛtāḥ /
analyzed: bāhavaḥ ca diśaḥ sarvāḥ vasavaḥ ṣṭau kare smṛtāḥ

original: hṛdaye saṃsthito brahmā kuliśo hṛdayāsthiṣu // VamP_65.23 //
analyzed: hṛdaye saṃsthitaḥ brahmā kuliśaḥ hṛdaya asthiṣu
śrī samudrāḥ uraḥ madhye candramāḥ manasi sthitaḥ
grīvā aditiḥ devamātā vidyāḥ tad valaya sthitāḥ

original: mukhe tu sāgnayo viprāḥ saṃskārā daśanacchadāḥ /
analyzed: mukhe tu sa agnayaḥ viprāḥ saṃskārāḥ daśanacchadāḥ
dharma kāma artha mokṣīyāḥ śāstraḥ śauca samanvitāḥ
lakṣmyā saha lalāṭa sthāḥ śravaṇābhyām atha aśvinau

original: śvāsastho mātariśvā ca marutaḥ sarvasaṃdhiṣu // VamP_65.26 //
analyzed: śvāsa sthaḥ mātariśvā ca marutaḥ sarva saṃdhiṣu
sarva sūktāni daśānā jihvā devī sarasvatī

original: candrādityau ca nayane pakṣmasthāḥ kṛttikādayaḥ // VamP_65.27 //
analyzed: candra ādityau ca nayane pakṣma sthāḥ kṛttikā ādayaḥ
śikhāyām devadevasya dhruvaḥ rājā nyaṣīdata

original: tārakā romakūpebhyo romāṇi ca maharṣayaḥ // VamP_65.28 //
analyzed: tārakāḥ romakūpebhyaḥ romāṇi ca mahā ṛṣayaḥ
guṇaiḥ sarva mayaḥ bhūtvā bhagavān bhūtabhāvanaḥ
krameṇa ekena jagatīm jahāra sacarācarām
bhūmim vikramamāṇasya mahā rūpasya tasya vai
dakṣiṇaḥ bhūt stanaḥ candraḥ sūryaḥ bhūt atha ca uttaraḥ
nakṣaḥ ca ākramataḥ nābhim sūrya indū savya dakṣiṇau
dvitīyena krameṇa atha svar mahar jana tāpasāḥ
krānta ardha ardhena vairājam madhyena apūryata ambaram
tatas pratāpinā brahman bṛhat viṣṇu aṅghriṇā ambare
brahmāṇḍa udaram āhatya nirālokam jagāma ha
viśvāṅghriṇā prasaratā kaṭāhaḥ bheditaḥ balān

original: kuṭilā viṣṇupāde tu sametya kuṭilā tataḥ // VamP_65.33 //
analyzed: kuṭilā viṣṇupāde tu sametya kuṭilā tatas
tasyāḥ viṣṇupadī iti evam nāma ākhyātam abhūt mune
tathā suranadī iti evam tām asevanta tāpasāḥ

original: bhagavānapyasaṃpūrṇe tṛtīye tu krame vibhuḥ // VamP_65.34 //
analyzed: bhagavān api asaṃpūrṇe tṛtīye tu krame vibhuḥ
samabhyetya balim prāha īṣat prasphurita adharaḥ
ṛmāt bhavati daitya indra bandhanam ghora darśanam

original: tvaṃ pūraya padaṃ tanme no ced bandhaṃ pratīccha bhoḥ // VamP_65.35 //
analyzed: tvam pūraya padam tat me no ced bandham pratīccha bhoḥ
tat murāri vacaḥ śrutvā vihasya atha baleḥ sutaḥ
bāṇaḥ prāha amarapatim vacanam hetu saṃyutam
bāṇaḥ uvāca

original: kṛtvā mahīmalpatarāṃ jagatpate svāyaṃbhuvādibhuvanāni vai ṣaṭ /
analyzed: kṛtvā mahīm alpatarām jagatpate svāyaṃbhuva ādi bhuvanāni vai ṣaḍ

original: kathaṃ baliṃ prārthayase suvistṛtāṃ yāṃ prāgbhavān no vipulāmathākarot // VamP_65.37 //
analyzed: katham balim prārthayase su vistṛtām yām prāk bhavān naḥ vipulām atha akarot

original: vibho sahī yāvatīyaṃ tvayādya sṛṣṭacā sametā bhuvanāntarālaiḥ /
analyzed: vibho sahī yāvatī iyam tvayā adya sṛṣṭacā sametā bhuvana antarālaiḥ

original: dattā ca tātena hi tāvatīyaṃ kiṃ vākchalenaiṣa nibadhyate 'dya // VamP_65.38 //
analyzed: dattā ca tātena hi tāvatī iyam kim vāc chalena eṣa nibadhyate

original: yā naiva śakya bhavatā hi pūrituṃ kathaṃ vitanyād ditijeśvaro 'sau /
analyzed: yā nā eva bhavatā hi pūritum katham vitanyāt

original: śaktastu saṃpūjayituṃ murāre prasīda mā bandhanamādiśasva // VamP_65.39 //
analyzed: śaktaḥ tu saṃpūjayitum murāre prasīda mā bandhanam ādiśasva

original: proktaṃ śrutau bhavatāpīśa vākyaṃ dānaṃ pātre bhavate saukhyadāyi /
analyzed: proktam śrutau bhavatā api īśa vākyam dānam pātre bhavate saukhya dāyi

original: deśe supuṇye varade yacca kāle taccāśeṣaṃ dṛśyate cakrapāṇe // VamP_65.40 //
analyzed: deśe su puṇye vara de yat ca kāle tat ca aśeṣam dṛśyate cakrapāṇe

original: dānaṃ bhūmiḥ sarvakāmapradeyaṃ bhavān pātraṃ devadevo jitātmā /
analyzed: dānam bhūmiḥ sarva kāma pradeyam bhavān pātram devadevaḥ jita ātmā

original: kālo jyeṣṭhāmūlayoge mṛgāṅgaḥ kurukṣetraṃ puṇyadeśaṃ prasiddham // VamP_65.41 //
analyzed: kālaḥ jyeṣṭhā mūla yoge mṛgāṅgaḥ kurukṣetram puṇya deśam prasiddham

original: kiṃ vā devo 'smadvidhairbuddhihīnaiḥ śikṣāpanīyaḥ sādhu vāsādhu caiva /
analyzed: kim vā devaḥ usmadvidhaiḥ buddhi hīnaiḥ śikṣāpanīyaḥ sādhu vā asādhu ca eva

original: svayaṃ śrutīnāmapi cādikarttā vyāpya sthitaḥ sadasad yo jagad vai // VamP_65.42 //
analyzed: svayam śrutīnām api ca ādikarttā vyāpya sthitaḥ sat asat yaḥ jagat vai

original: kṛtvā pramāṇaṃ svayaseva hīnaṃ padatrayaṃ yācitavān bhuvaśca /
analyzed: kṛtvā pramāṇam svayasā iva hīnam pada trayam yācitavān bhuvaḥ ca

original: kiṃ tvaṃ na gṛhṇāsi jagattrayaṃ bho rūpeṇa lokatrayavanditena // VamP_65.43 //
analyzed: kim tvam na gṛhṇāsi jagattrayam bho rūpeṇa loka traya vanditena

original: nātrāścaryaṃ yajjagad vai samagraṃ kramatrayaṃ naiva pūrṇaṃ tavādya /
analyzed: na atra āścaryam yat jagat vai samagram krama trayam nā eva pūrṇam tava adya

original: krameṇa tvaṃ laṅghayituṃ samartho līlāmetāṃ kṛtavān lokanātha // VamP_65.44 //
analyzed: krameṇa tvam laṅghayitum samarthaḥ līlām etām kṛtavān lokanātha

original: pramāṇahīnāṃ svayameva kṛtvā vasuṃdharāṃ mādhava padmanābha /
analyzed: pramāṇa hīnām svayam eva kṛtvā vasuṃdharām mādhava padmanābha

original: viṣṇo na badhnāsi baliṃ na dūre prabhuryadevecchati tatkaroti // VamP_65.45 //
analyzed: viṣṇo na badhnāsi balim na dūre prabhuḥ yat eva icchati tat karoti
pulastyaḥ uvāca
iti evam ukte vacane bāṇena bali sūnunā
provāca bhagavān vākyam ādikarttā janārdanaḥ
trivikramaḥ uvāca
yāni uktāni vacāṃsi ittham tvayā bāleya sāmpratam

original: teṣāṃ vaica hetusaṃyuktaṃ śṛṇu pratyuttaraṃ mama // VamP_65.47 //
analyzed: teṣām hetu saṃyuktam śṛṇu pratyuttaram mama
pūrvam uktaḥ tava pitā mayā rājan pada trayam

original: dehi mahyaṃ pramāṇena tadetat samanuṣṭhitam // VamP_65.48 //
analyzed: dehi mahyam pramāṇena tat etat samanuṣṭhitam

original: kiṃ na vetti pramāṇaṃ me balistava pitāsura /
analyzed: kim na vetti pramāṇam me baliḥ tava pitā asura

original: prāyacchad yena niḥśaṅkaṃ mamānantaṃ kramatrayam // VamP_65.49 //
analyzed: prāyacchat yena niḥśaṅkam mama anantam krama trayam
satyam krameṇa ca ekena krameyam bhūrbhuva ādikam
baleḥ api hita arthāya kṛtam etat krama trayam

original: tasmād yanmama bāleya tvatpitrāmbu kare mahat /
analyzed: tasmāt yat mama bāleya tvad pitrā ambu kare mahat

original: dattaṃ tenāyuretasya kalpaṃ yāvad bhaviṣyati // VamP_65.51 //
analyzed: dattam tena āyuḥ etasya kalpam yāvat bhaviṣyati
gate manvantare bāṇa śrāddhadevasya sāmpratam

original: sāvarṇike ca saṃprāpte balirindro bhaviṣyati // VamP_65.52 //
analyzed: sāvarṇike ca saṃprāpte baliḥ indraḥ bhaviṣyati
ittham proktvā bali sutam bāṇam devaḥ trivikramaḥ
provāca balim abhyetya vacanam madhura akṣaram
śrī bhagavān uvāca
āpūraṇāt dakṣiṇāyāḥ gaccha rājan mahā phalam

original: sutalaṃ nāma pātālaṃ vasa tatra nirāmayaḥ // VamP_65.54 //
analyzed: sutalam nāma pātālam vasa tatra nirāmayaḥ
baliḥ uvāca

original: sutale vasato nātha mama bhogāḥ kuto 'vyayāḥ /
analyzed: sutale vasataḥ nātha mama bhogāḥ kutas vyayāḥ

original: bhaviṣyanti tu yenāhaṃ nivatsyāmi nirāmayaḥ // VamP_65.55 //
analyzed: bhaviṣyanti tu yena aham nivatsyāmi nirāmayaḥ
trivikramaḥ uvāca
su tala sthasya daitya indra yāni bhogāni te

original: bhivaṣyanti mahārhāṇi tāni vakṣyāmi sarvaśaḥ // VamP_65.56 //
analyzed: mahārhāṇi tāni vakṣyāmi sarvaśas
dānāni a vidhittāni śrāddhāni aśrotriyāṇi ca
tathā adhītāni avratibhiḥ dāsyanti bhavataḥ phalam
tathā anyam utsavam puṇyam vṛtte śakra mahā utsave

original: dvārapratipadā nāma tava bhāvī mahotsavaḥ // VamP_65.58 //
analyzed: dvārapratipadā nāma tava bhāvī mahā utsavaḥ

original: tatra tvāṃ naraśārdūlā hṛṣṭāḥ puṣṭāḥ svalaṅkṛtāḥ /
analyzed: tatra tvām nara śārdūlāḥ hṛṣṭāḥ puṣṭāḥ su alaṅkṛtāḥ
puṣpa dīpa pradānena arjayiṣyanti yatnataḥ
tatra utsavaḥ sukhyatamaḥ bhaviṣyati divāniśam hṛṣṭa jana abhirāmam

original: yathaiva rājye bhavatastu sāmprataṃ tathaiva sā bhāvyatha kaumudī ca // VamP_65.60 //
analyzed: yathā eva rājye bhavataḥ tu sāmpratam tathā eva sā kaumudī ca

original: ityevamuktvā madhuhā ditīśvaraṃ visarjayitvā sutalaṃ sabhāryam /
analyzed: iti evam uktvā madhuhā ditīśvaram visarjayitvā sutalam sa bhāryam

original: yajñaṃ samādāya jagāma tūrṇaṃ sa śakrasadbhāmarasaṃghajuṣṭam // VamP_65.61 //
analyzed: yajñam samādāya jagāma tūrṇam sa śakra sat bhāmara saṃgha juṣṭam

original: dattvā maghone ca vibhustriviṣṭapaṃ kṛtvā ca devān makhabhāgabhoktṝn /
analyzed: dattvā maghone ca vibhuḥ triviṣṭapam kṛtvā ca devān makha bhāga bhoktṝn
antardadhe viśvapatiḥ mahā ṛṣe saṃpaśyatām eva murādhipānām

original: svargaṃ gate dhātari vāsudeve śālvo 'surāṇāṃ mahatā balena /
analyzed: svargam gate dhātari vāsudeve śālvaḥ surāṇām mahatā balena

original: kṛtvā puraṃ saubhamiti prasiddhaṃ tadāntarikṣe vicacāra kāmāt // VamP_65.63 //
analyzed: kṛtvā puram saubham iti prasiddham tadā antarikṣe vicacāra kāmāt
mayaḥ tu kṛtvā tripuram mahātmā suvarṇa tāmra āyasam agrya saukhyam

original: satārakākṣaḥ saha vaidyutena saṃtiṣṭhate bhṛtyakalatravān saḥ // VamP_65.64 //
analyzed: sa tārakākṣaḥ saha vaidyutena saṃtiṣṭhate bhṛtya kalatravān saḥ

original: baṇo 'pi devena hṛte triviṣṭape baddhe balau cāpi rasātalasthe /
analyzed: devena hṛte triviṣṭape baddhe balau ca api rasātala sthe

original: kṛtvā suguptaṃ bhuvi śoṇitākhyaṃ puraṃ sa cāste saha dānavendraiḥ // VamP_65.65 //
analyzed: kṛtvā su guptam bhuvi śoṇita ākhyam puram sa ca āste saha dānava indraiḥ

original: evaṃ purā cakradhareṇa viṣṇunā baddho balirvāmanarūpadhāriṇā /
analyzed: evam purā cakra dhareṇa viṣṇunā baddhaḥ baliḥ vāmana rūpa dhāriṇā
śakra priya artha sura kārya siddhaye hitāya vipra ṛṣabha go dvijānām
prādurbhavaḥ te kathitaḥ mahā ṛṣe puṇyaḥ śuciḥ vāmanasya agha hārī

original: śrute yasmin saṃsmṛte kīrtite ca pāpaṃ yāti prakṣayaṃ puṇyameti // VamP_65.67 //
analyzed: śrute yasmin saṃsmṛte kīrtite ca pāpam yāti prakṣayam puṇyam eti

original: etat proktaṃ bhavataḥ puṇyakīrtteḥ prādurbhāvo balibandho 'vyayasya /
analyzed: etat proktam bhavataḥ puṇya kīrtteḥ prādurbhāvaḥ bali bandhaḥ vyayasya

original: yaccāpyanyan śrotukāmo 'si vipra tatprocyatāṃ kathayiṣyāmyaśeṣam // VamP_65.68 //
analyzed: yat ca api anyan vipra tat procyatām kathayiṣyāmi aśeṣam
iti śrī vāmanapurāṇe pañcaṣaṣṭitamaḥ dhyaḥ
nāradaḥ uvāca
śrutam yathā bhagavatā baliḥ baddhaḥ mahātmanā

original: kiṃ tvastayanyattu praṣṭavyaṃ tacchrutvā kathayādya me // VamP_66.1 //
analyzed: kim praṣṭavyam tat śrutvā kathaya adya me
bhagavān devarājāya dattvā viṣṇuḥ triviṣṭapam

original: antardhānaṃ gataḥ kvāsau sarvātmā tāta kathyatām // VamP_66.2 //
analyzed: antardhānam gataḥ kva asau sarva ātmā tāta kathyatām
su tala sthaḥ ca daitya indraḥ kim akārṣīt tathā vada

original: kā ceṣṭā tasya viprarṣe tanme vyākhyātumarhasi // VamP_66.3 //
analyzed: kā ceṣṭā tasya viprarṣe tat me vyākhyātum arhasi
pulastyaḥ uvāca
antardhāya sura āvāsam vāmanaḥ bhūt avāmanaḥ
jagāma brahmasadanam adhiruhya uragāśanam
vāsudevam samāyāntam jñātvā brahma avyaya ātmakaḥ
samutthāya āyatha sauhārdāt sasvaje kamalāsanaḥ
pariṣvajya arcya vidhinā vedhāḥ pūjā ādinā harim
papraccha kim cireṇa iha bhavatā āgamanam kṛtam
athā uvāca jagatsvāmī mayā kāryam mahat kṛtam
surāṇām kratu bhāga artham svayaṃbho bali bandhanam
pitāmahaḥ tat vacanam śrutvā mudita mānasaḥ

original: kathaṃ kathamiti prāha tvaṃ māṃ darśitumarhasi // VamP_66.8 //
analyzed: katham katham iti prāha tvam mām darśitum arhasi
iti evam ukte vacane bhagavān garuḍadhvajaḥ
darśayāmāsa tat rūpam sarva deva mayam laghu
tam dṛṣṭvā puṇḍarīkākṣam yojana ayuta vistṛtam
tāvān eva ūrdhvāmānena tatas jaḥ praṇataḥ bhavat

original: tataḥ praṇamya suciraṃ sādhu sādhvityudīrya ca /
analyzed: tatas praṇamya su ciram sādhu sādhu iti udīrya ca
bhakti tamraḥ mahādevam padmajaḥ stotram īrayat

original: oṃ namaste devādhideva vāsudeva ekaśṛṅga bahurūpa vṛṣākape bhūtabhāvatana surāsuravṛṣa
analyzed: om namaḥ te deva adhideva vāsudeva ekaśṛṅga bahurūpa vṛṣākape bhūtabhāvatana sura asura vṛṣa

original: surāsuramathana pītavāsaḥ śrīnivāsa asuranirmitānta amitanirmita kapila mahākapila
analyzed: sura asura mathana pītavāsaḥ śrīnivāsa asura nirmita anta amita nirmita kapila mahākapila
viṣvaksena nārāyaṇa

original: dhruvadhvaja satyadhvaja khaṅgadhvaja tāladhvaja vaikuṇṭhaṃ puruṣottama vareṇya viṣṇo
analyzed: dhruvadhvaja satyadhvaja khaṅgadhvaja tāladhvaja vaikuṇṭham puruṣottama vareṇya viṣṇo

original: aparājita jaya jayanta vijaya kṛtāvarta mahādeva anāde ananta ādyāntamadhyanidhana
analyzed: aparājita jaya jayanta vijaya kṛta āvarta mahādeva anāde ananta ādya anta madhya nidhana
purañjaya dhanañjaya śuciśrava pṛśni garbha

original: kamalagarbha kamalāyatākṣa śrīpate viṣṇumūla mūlādhivāsa dharmādhivāsa dharmavāsa
analyzed: kamala garbha kamala āyata akṣa śrīpate viṣṇu mūla mūla adhivāsa dharma adhivāsa dharma vāsa

original: dharmādhyakṣa prajādhyakṣa gadādhara śrīdhara śrutidhara vanamālādhara lakṣmīdhara
analyzed: dharma adhyakṣa prajā adhyakṣa gadādhara śrīdhara śrutidhara vanamālādhara lakṣmīdhara
dharaṇīdhara

original: viriñje ārṣṭiṣeṇa mahāsena senādhyakṣa puruṣṭuta bahukalpa mahākalpa kalpanāmukha aniruddha sarvaga sarvātman dvādaśātmaka sūryātmaka somātmaka  #
analyzed: viriñje ārṣṭiṣeṇa mahāsena senā adhyakṣa puruṣṭuta bahu kalpa mahā kalpa kalpanāmukha aniruddha sarvaga sarvātman dvādaśa ātmaka sūrya ātmaka soma ātmaka
kāla ātmaka vyoma ātmaka bhūta ātmaka

original: rasātmaka paramātman sanātana muñjakeśa harikeśa guḍākeśa keśava nīla sūkṣma sthūla
analyzed: rasa ātmaka parama ātman sanātana muñjakeśa harikeśa guḍākeśa keśava nīla sūkṣma sthūla

original: pīta rakta śveta śvetādhivāsa raktāmbarapriya prītikara prītivāsa haṃsa nīlavāsa
analyzed: pīta rakta śveta śveta adhivāsa rakta ambara priya prīti kara prīti vāsa haṃsa nīla vāsa
sīra dhvaja sarva loka adhivāsa

original: kuśeśaya adhokṣaja govinda janārdana madhusūdana vāmana namaste /
analyzed: kuśeśaya adhokṣaja govinda janārdana madhusūdana vāmana namaḥ te

original: sahasraśīrṣo 'si sahasradṛgasi sahasrapādo 'si tvaṃ kamalo 'si mahāpuruṣo 'si sahasrabāhurasi sahasramūrtirasi tvaṃ devāḥ prāhuḥ sahasravadanaṃ  #
analyzed: sahasra śīrṣaḥ si sahasra dṛś asi sahasra pādaḥ si tvam kamalaḥ si mahā puruṣaḥ si sahasra bāhuḥ asi sahasra mūrtiḥ asi tvam devāḥ prāhuḥ sahasra vadanam
tenamasta

original: oṃ namaste viśvadeveśa viśvabhūḥ viśvātmaka viśvarūpa viśvasaṃbhava tvatto viśvāmidamabhavad
analyzed: om namaḥ te viśvadeva īśa viśva bhūḥ viśva ātmaka viśva rūpa viśva saṃbhava tvattaḥ

original: brāhmaṇāstvanmukhebhyo 'bhavan kṣatriyā doḥsaṃbhūtāḥ ūruyugmād viso 'bhavan śūdrāścaraṇakamalebhyaḥ (35)
analyzed: brāhmaṇāḥ tvad mukhebhyaḥ bhavan kṣatriyāḥ dos saṃbhūtāḥ ūru yugmāt bhavan śūdrāḥ caraṇa kamalebhyaḥ

original: nābhyā bhavato 'ntarikṣamajāyata indrāgnīvaktrato netrād bhānurabhūnmanasaḥ śaśāṅkaḥ
analyzed: nābhyāḥ bhavataḥ ntarikṣam ajāyata indra agnī vaktrataḥ netrāt bhānuḥ abhūt manasaḥ śaśāṅkaḥ

original: ahaṃ prasādajastava krodhāt tryambakaḥ prāṇājjāto bhavato mātariśvā śiraso dyaurajāyata
analyzed: aham prasāda jaḥ tava krodhāt tryambakaḥ prāṇāt jātaḥ bhavataḥ mātariśvā śirasaḥ dyauḥ ajāyata
śrotrāt diśaḥ bhūḥ iyam caraṇāt abhūt śrotra udbhavāḥ diśaḥ bhavataḥ svayaṃbhaḥ nakṣatrāḥ teja udbhavāḥ
mūrttayaḥ ca amūrtayaḥ ca sarve tvattaḥ samudbhūtāḥ

original: ato viśvātmako 'si oṃ nāste puṣpahāso 'si mahāhāso 'si paramo 'si oṃ kāro 'si vaṣaṭkāro
analyzed: atas viśva ātmakaḥ si om puṣpa hāsaḥ si mahā hāsaḥ si paramaḥ si om kāro si vaṣaṭkāro

original: 'si svarāhākāro 'si vauṣaṭkāro 'si svadhākāro 'si vedamayo 'si tīrthamayo 'si yajamānamayo 'si (45)
analyzed: si svarāhākāraḥ si vauṣaṭkāraḥ si svadhākāraḥ si veda mayaḥ si tīrtha mayaḥ si yajamāna mayaḥ si

original: yajñamayo 'si sarvadhātāsi yajñabhoktāsi śukradhātāsi bhūrda bhuvarda svarda svarṇada goda amṛtado 'sīti /
analyzed: yajña mayaḥ si sarva dhātā asi yajña bhoktā asi śukra dhātā asi bhūrda bhuvarda svarda svarṇa da go da amṛta daḥ si iti

original: oṃ brahmādirasi brahmayo 'si yajño 'si vedakāmo 'si vedyo 'si yajñadhāro 'si mahāmīno 'si mahāseno 'si mahāśirā asi /
analyzed: om brahma ādiḥ asi si yajñaḥ si veda kāmaḥ si vedyaḥ si yajña dhāraḥ si mahā mīnaḥ si mahā senaḥ si mahā śirāḥ asi

original: (50) nṛkesaryasi hotāsi homyo 'si havyo 'si hūyamāno 'si hayamedho 'si potāsi pāvayitāsi pūto 'si pūjyo 'si dātāsi hanyamāno 'si hriyamāṇo  #
analyzed: nṛ kesarī asi hotā asi homyaḥ si havyaḥ si hūyamānaḥ si hayamedhaḥ si potā asi pāvayitā asi pūtaḥ si pūjyaḥ si dātā asi hanyamānaḥ si hriyamāṇaḥ
si harttā asi iti om

original: nītirasi netāsi agryo 'si viśvadhāmāsi śubhāṇḍo 'si dhruvo 'si āraṇeyo 'si (55)
analyzed: nītiḥ asi netā asi agryaḥ si viśva dhāmā asi śubha aṇḍaḥ si dhruvaḥ si āraṇeyaḥ si

original: dhyāno 'si dhyeyo 'si jñeyo 'si jñāno 'si jñāno 'si yaṣṭāsi dāno 'si bhūmāsi īkṣyo
analyzed: dhyānaḥ si dhyeyaḥ si jñeyaḥ si jñānaḥ si jñānaḥ si yaṣṭā asi dānaḥ si bhūmā asi īkṣyaḥ

original: 'si brahmāsi hotāsi udgātāsi gatimatāṃ gatirasi jñānināṃ jñānamasi yogināṃ yogo 'si
analyzed: si brahmā asi hotā asi udgātā asi gatimatām gatiḥ asi jñāninām jñānam asi yoginām yogaḥ si

original: mokṣagāmināṃ mokṣo 'si śrīmatāṃ śrīrasi gṛhyo 'si pātāsi paramasi (60)
analyzed: mokṣa gāminām mokṣaḥ si śrīmatām śrīḥ asi gṛhyaḥ u si pātā asi param asi

original: somo 'si sūryo 'si dīkṣāsi dakṣiṇāsi naro 'si trinayano 'si mahānayano 'si ādityaprabhavo
analyzed: somaḥ si sūryaḥ si dīkṣā asi dakṣiṇā asi naraḥ si tri nayanaḥ si mahā nayanaḥ si āditya prabhavaḥ

original: 'si surottamo 'si śucirasi śukro 'si nabhosi nabhasyo 'si iṣo 'si ūrjo 'si saho 'si
analyzed: si sura uttamaḥ si śuciḥ asi śukraḥ si nabhaḥ asi nabhasyaḥ si iṣaḥ si ūrjaḥ si sahaḥ si
sahasyaḥ si tapaḥ si tapasyaḥ si madhura asi

original: mādhavo 'si kālo 'si saṃkramo 'si vikramo 'si parākramo 'si aśvagrīvo 'si mahāmedho
analyzed: mādhavaḥ si kālaḥ si saṃkramaḥ si vikramaḥ si parākramaḥ si aśvagrīvaḥ si mahā medhaḥ

original: 'si śaṅkaro 'si hariśvoro 'si śaṃbhurasi brahmeśo 'si sūryo 'si mitrāvaruṇo 'si prāgvaṃśakāyo
analyzed: si śaṅkaraḥ si si śaṃbhuḥ asi brahmā īśaḥ si sūryaḥ si mitrāvaruṇaḥ si prāgvaṃśa kāyaḥ
si bhṛta ādiḥ asi mahābhūtaḥ si ūrdhva karmā asi karttā asi
sarva pāpa vimocanaḥ si tri vikramaḥ si om namaḥ te
pulastyaḥ uvāca
ittham stutaḥ padmavena viṣṇuḥ tapasvibhiḥ ca adbhuta kārma kārī

original: provāca devaṃ prapitāmahaṃ tu varaṃ vṛṇīṣvāmalasattvavṛtte // VamP_66.12 //
analyzed: provāca devam prapitāmaham tu varam vṛṇīṣva amala sattva vṛtte

original: tamabravīt prītiyutaḥ pitāmaho varaṃ mamehādya vibho prayaccha /
analyzed: tam abravīt prīti yutaḥ pitāmahaḥ varam mama iha adya vibho prayaccha

original: rūpeṇa puṇyena vibo hyanena saṃsthīyatāṃ madbhavane murāre // VamP_66.13 //
analyzed: rūpeṇa puṇyena vibo hi anena saṃsthīyatām mad bhavane murāre

original: itthaṃ vṛte devavareṇa prādāt prabhustathāstviti tamavyayātmā /
analyzed: ittham vṛte deva vareṇa prādāt prabhuḥ tathā astu iti tam avyaya ātmā

original: tasthau hi rūpeṇa hi vāmanena saṃpūjyamānaḥ sadane svayaṃbhoḥ // VamP_66.14 //
analyzed: tasthau hi rūpeṇa hi vāmanena saṃpūjyamānaḥ sadane svayaṃbhoḥ

original: nṛtyanti tatrāpsarasāṃ samūhya gāyanti gītāni surendragāyanāḥ /
analyzed: nṛtyanti tatra apsarasām samūhya gāyanti gītāni sura indra gāyanāḥ
vidyādharāḥ tūryarān ca vādayan stuvanti deva asura siddha saṅghāḥ

original: tataḥ samārādhya vibhuṃ surādhipaḥ pitāmaho dhautamalaḥ sa śuddhaḥ /
analyzed: tatas samārādhya vibhum surādhipaḥ pitāmahaḥ dhauta malaḥ sa śuddhaḥ

original: svarge viriñciḥ sadanāt supuṣpāṇyānīya pūjāṃ pracakāra viṣṇoḥ // VamP_66.16 //
analyzed: svarge viriñciḥ sadanāt su puṣpāṇi ānīya pūjām pracakāra viṣṇoḥ

original: svarge sahasraṃ sa tu yojanānāṃ viṣṇoḥ pramāṇena hi vāmano 'bhūt tatrāsya śakraḥ pracakāra pūjāṃ svayaṃbhuvastulyaguṇāṃ maharṣe // VamP_66.17
analyzed: svarge sahasram sa tu yojanānām viṣṇoḥ pramāṇena hi vāmanaḥ bhūt tatra asya śakraḥ pracakāra pūjām svayaṃbhuvaḥ tulya guṇām mahā ṛṣe  /

original: etat tavoktaṃ bhagavāṃstrivikramaścakāra yad devahitaṃ mahātmā /
analyzed: etat tava uktam bhagavān trivikramaḥ cakāra yat deva hitam mahātmā

original: rasātalastho ditijaścakāra yattacchṛṇuṣvādya vadāmi vipra // VamP_66.18 //
analyzed: rasātala sthaḥ ditijaḥ cakāra yat tat śṛṇuṣva adya vadāmi vipra
iti śrī vāmanapurāṇe ṣaṭṣaṣṭitamaḥ dhyāyaḥ
pulastyaḥ uvāca
gatvā rasātalam daityaḥ mahārha maṇi citritam
śuddha sphaṭi sopānam kārayāmāsa vai puram
tatra madhye prāsādaḥ vajra vedikaḥ
muktā jāla antara dvāraḥ nirmitaḥ viśvakarmaṇā

original: tatrāste vividhān bhogān bhuñjan divyān sa mānuṣān /
analyzed: tatra āste vividhān bhogān bhuñjan divyān sa mānuṣān
nāmnā vindhyāvalī iti evam bhāryā asya dayitā bhavat
yuvatīnām sahasrasya pradhānā śīla maṇḍitā

original: tayā saha mahātejā reme vairocanirmune // VamP_67.4 //
analyzed: tayā saha mahā tejāḥ reme vairocaniḥ mune
bhoga āsaktasya daityasya vasataḥ su tale tadā

original: daityatejoharaḥ prāptaḥ capātāle vai sudarśanaḥ // VamP_67.5 //
analyzed: daitya tejaḥ haraḥ prāptaḥ capātāle vai sudarśanaḥ

original: cakre praviṣṭe pātālaṃ dānavānāṃ pure mahān /
analyzed: cakre praviṣṭe pātālam dānavānām pure mahān
babhai halahalā śabdaḥ kṣubhita arṇava saṃnibhaḥ

original: taṃ ca śrutvā mahāśabdaṃ baliḥ khaṅgaṃ samādade /
analyzed: tam ca śrutvā mahā śabdam baliḥ khaṅgam samādade
āḥ kim etat iti itthan ca papraccha asura puṅgavaḥ

original: tato vindhyāvalī prāha sāntvayantī nijaṃ patim /
analyzed: tatas vindhyāvalī prāha sāntvayantī nijam patim

original: kośe khaṅgaṃ samāveśya dharmapatnī śucivratā // VamP_67.8 //
analyzed: kośe khaṅgam samāveśya dharma patnī śuci vratā
etat bhagavataḥ cakram daitya cakra kṣayaṅkaram
saṃpūjanīyam daitya indra vāmanasya mahātmanaḥ
iti evam uktvā cāru aṅgī sa arghapātrā viniryayau
atha abhyāgāt sahasra aram viṣṇoḥ cakram sudarśanam
surapatiḥ prahvaḥ kṛta añjali puṭaḥ mune
saṃpūjya vidhivat cakram idam stotram udīrayat
baliḥ uvāca
namasyāmi hareḥ cakram daitya cakra vidāraṇam
sahasra aṃśum sahasra ābham sahasra āram su nirmalam
namasyāmi hareḥ cakram yasya nābhyām pitāmahaḥ

original: tuṇḍe triśūladhṛk śarva ārāmūle mahādrayaḥ // VamP_67.12 //
analyzed: tuṇḍe triśūladhṛk śarvaḥ ārā mūle mahā adrayaḥ

original: areṣu saṃsthitā devāḥ sendrāḥ sārkāḥ sapāvakāḥ /
analyzed: areṣu saṃsthitāḥ devāḥ sa indrāḥ sa arkāḥ sa pāvakāḥ

original: jave yasya sthito vāyurāpogniḥ pṛthivī nabhaḥ // VamP_67.13 //
analyzed: jave yasya sthitaḥ vāyuḥ āpaḥ agniḥ pṛthivī nabhaḥ
āra prānteṣu jīmūtāḥ saudāminī ṛkṣa tārakāḥ
munayaḥ yasya bālakhilya ādayaḥ tathā
tam āyudha varam vande vāsudevasya bhaktitaḥ

original: yanme pāpaṃ śarīrotthaṃ vāgjaṃ mānasameva ca // VamP_67.15 //
analyzed: yat me pāpam śarīra uttham vāc jam mānasam eva ca
tat me dahasva dīpta aṃśo viṣṇoḥ cakra sudarśana

original: yanme kulodbhavaṃ pāpaṃ paitṛkaṃ mātṛkaṃ tathā // VamP_67.16 //
analyzed: yat me kula udbhavam pāpam paitṛkam mātṛkam tathā
tat me harasva tarasā namaḥ te acyuta āyudha

original: ādhayo mama naśyantu vyādhayo yāntu saṃkṣayam /
analyzed: ādhayaḥ mama naśyantu vyādhayaḥ yāntu saṃkṣayam

original: tvannāmakīrtanāc cakra duritaṃ yātu saṃkṣayam // VamP_67.17 //
analyzed: tvad nāma kīrtanāt cakra duritam yātu saṃkṣayam
iti evam uktvā matimān samabhyarcya atha bhaktitaḥ
saṃsmaran puṇḍarīkākṣam sarva pāpa praṇāsanam
pūjitam balinā cakram kṛtvā nistejasaḥ surān

original: niścakrāmātha pātālād viṣuve dakṣime mune // VamP_67.19 //
analyzed: niścakrāma atha pātālāt viṣuve dakṣime mune
sudarśane nirgate tu baliḥ viklava tām gataḥ
paramām āpadam prāpya sasmāra sva pitāmaham

original: sa cāpi saṃsmṛtaḥ prāptaḥ sutalaṃ dānaveśvaraḥ /
analyzed: sa ca api saṃsmṛtaḥ prāptaḥ sutalam dānava īśvaraḥ

original: dṛṣṭvā tasthau mahātejāḥ sārghapātro balistadā // VamP_67.21 //
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā tasthau mahā tejāḥ sa arghapātraḥ baliḥ tadā
tam arcya vidhinā brahman pituḥ pitaram īśvaram
kṛta añjali puṭaḥ bhūtvā idam vacanam abravīt

original: 67.22 saṃsmṛto 'si mayā tāta suviṣaṇṇena cetasā tanme hitaṃ ca pathyaṃ ca śreyogryaṃ vada tāta me /
analyzed: saṃsmṛtaḥ si mayā tāta su viṣaṇṇena cetasā tat me hitam ca pathyam ca śreyogryam vada tāta me

original: 67.23 kiṃ kāryaṃ tāta saṃsāre vasatā puruṣoṇa hi /
analyzed: kim kāryam tāta saṃsāre vasatā hi

original: kṛtena yena vai nāsya bandhaḥ samupajāyate /
analyzed: kṛtena yena vai na asya bandhaḥ samupajāyate
saṃsāra arṇava magnānām narāṇām alpa cetasām

original: taraṇe yo bhavet potastanme vyākhyātumarhasi // VamP_67.25 //
analyzed: taraṇe yaḥ bhavet potaḥ tat me vyākhyātum arhasi
pulastyaḥ uvāca
etat vacanam ākarṇya tad pautrāt dānava īśvaraḥ

original: vicintya prāha vacanaṃ saṃsāre yadvitaṃ param // 67.26 //
analyzed: vicintya prāha vacanam saṃsāre yat vitam param
prahlādaḥ uvāca
sādhu dānava śārdūla yat te jātā matiḥ tu iyam

original: pravakṣyāmi hitaṃ te 'dya tathāneyeṣāṃ hitaṃ bale // VamP_67.27 //
analyzed: pravakṣyāmi hitam te dya tathā aneya iṣām hitam bale
bhava jaladhi gatānām dvāndva vāta āhatānām suta duhitṛ kalatra trāṇa bhāra arditānām

original: viṣamaviṣayatoye majjatāmaplāvānāṃ bhavati śaraṇameko viṣṇupoto narāṇām // VamP_67.28 //
analyzed: viṣama viṣaya toye majjatām aplāvānām bhavati śaraṇam ekaḥ viṣṇu potaḥ narāṇām

original: ye saṃśritā harimanantamanādimadhyaṃ nārāyaṇaṃ suraguruṃ śubhadaṃ vareṇyam /
analyzed: ye saṃśritāḥ harim anantam an ādi madhyam nārāyaṇam suragurum śubha dam vareṇyam

original: śuddhaṃ khagendragamanaṃ kamalālayeśaṃ te dharmarājakaraṇaṃ na viśanti dhīrāḥ /
analyzed: śuddham khagendra gamanam kamala ālaya īśam te dharmarāja karaṇam na viśanti dhīrāḥ

original: 67.29 svapuruṣamabhivīkṣya pāśahastaṃ vadati yamaḥ kila tasya karṇamūle /
analyzed: sva puruṣam abhivīkṣya pāśa hastam vadati yamaḥ kila tasya karṇa mūle

original: parihara madhusūdanaprannān prabhurahamanyanṛṇāṃ na vaiṣṇavānām // VamP_67.30 //
analyzed: parihara madhusūdana prannān prabhuḥ aham anya nṛṇām na vaiṣṇavānām
tathā anyat uktam nara sattamena ikṣvākuṇā bhakti yutena nūnam

original: ye viṣṇubhaktāḥ puruṣāḥ pṛthivyāṃ yamasya te nirviṣayā bhavanti // VamP_67.31 //
analyzed: ye viṣṇu bhaktāḥ puruṣāḥ pṛthivyām yamasya te nirviṣayāḥ bhavanti

original: sā jihvā yā hariṃ stauti taccittaṃ yattadarpitam /
analyzed: sā jihvā yā harim stauti tat cittam yat tad arpitam

original: tāveva kevalaṃ śalāghyau yau tatpūjākarau karau // VamP_67.32 //
analyzed: tau eva kevalam śalāghyau yau tad pūjā karau karau

original: nūnaṃ na tau karau proktau vṛkṣaśākhāgrapallavau /
analyzed: nūnam na tau karau proktau vṛkṣa śākhā agra pallavau

original: na yau pūjituṃ śaktau haripādāmbujadvayam // VamP_67.33 //
analyzed: na yau pūjitum śaktau hari pāda ambuja dvayam
nūnam tat kaṇṭha śālūkam athavā pratijihvakā

original: rogovānyo na sā jihvā yā na vakti harerguṇān // VamP_67.34 //
analyzed: rogaḥ uvā anyaḥ na sā jihvā yā na vakti hareḥ guṇān

original: śocanīyaḥ sa bandhūnāṃ jīvannapi mṛto naraḥ /
analyzed: śocanīyaḥ sa bandhūnām jīvan api mṛtaḥ naraḥ

original: yaḥ pādapaṅkajaṃ viṣṇorna pūjayati bhaktitaḥ // VamP_67.35 //
analyzed: yaḥ pāda paṅkajam viṣṇoḥ na pūjayati bhaktitaḥ

original: ye narā vāsudevasya satataṃ pūjane ratāḥ /
analyzed: ye narāḥ vāsudevasya satatam pūjane ratāḥ

original: mṛtā api na śocyāste satyaṃ satyaṃ mayoditam // VamP_67.36 //
analyzed: mṛtāḥ api na śocyāḥ te satyam satyam mayā uditam
śārīram mānasam vāc jam mūrta amūrtam carācaram
dṛśyam spṛsyam adṛśyam ca tat sarvam keśava ātmakam

original: yenārcito hi bhagavān caturdhā vai trivikramaḥ /
analyzed: yena arcitaḥ hi bhagavān caturdhā vai trivikramaḥ

original: tenārcitā na saṃdeho lokāḥ sāmaradānavāḥ // VamP_67.38 //
analyzed: tena arcitāḥ na saṃdehaḥ lokāḥ sa amara dānavāḥ
yatā ratnāni jaladheḥ asaṃkhyeyāni putraka

original: tathā guṇā hi devasya tvasaṃkhyātāstu cakriṇaḥ // VamP_67.39 //
analyzed: tathā guṇāḥ hi devasya tu asaṃkhyātāḥ tu cakriṇaḥ

original: ye śaṅkhacakrābjakaraṃ saśārṅgiṇaṃ khagendraketuṃ varadaṃ śriyaḥ patim /
analyzed: ye śaṅkha cakra abja karam sa śārṅgiṇam khaga indra ketum vara dam śriyaḥ patim

original: samāśrayante bhavabhītināśanaṃ saṃsāragarte na patanti te punaḥ // VamP_67.40 //
analyzed: samāśrayante bhava bhīti nāśanam saṃsāra garte na patanti te punar

original: yeṣāṃ manasi govindo nivāsī satataṃ bale /
analyzed: yeṣām manasi govindaḥ nivāsī satatam bale

original: na te paribhavaṃ yānti na mṛtyorudvijanti ca // VamP_67.41 //
analyzed: na te paribhavam yānti na mṛtyoḥ udvijanti ca

original: devaṃ sārṅgadharaṃ viṣṇuṃ ye prapannāḥ parāyaṇam /
analyzed: devam sārṅgadharam viṣṇum ye prapannāḥ parāyaṇam

original: na teṣāṃ yamasālokyaṃ na ca te narakaukasaḥ // VamP_67.42 //
analyzed: na teṣām yama sālokyam na ca te naraka okasaḥ
na tām gatim prāpnuvanti śruti śāstra viśāradāḥ

original: viprā dānavaśārdūla viṣṇubhaktā vrajanti yām // VamP_67.43 //
analyzed: viprāḥ dānava śārdūla viṣṇu bhaktāḥ vrajanti yām
yā gatiḥ daitya śārdūla hatānām tu mahā āhave

original: tato 'dikāṃ gatiṃ yānti viṣṇubhaktā narottamāḥ // VamP_67.44 //
analyzed: tatas dikām gatim yānti viṣṇu bhaktāḥ nara uttamāḥ
yā gatiḥ dharma śīlānām sāttvikānām mahātmanām
sā gatiḥ gaditā daitya bhagavat sevinām api
sarva āvāsam vāsudevam sūkṣmam avyakta vigraham
praviśanti mahātmānam tad bhaktāḥ na anya cetasaḥ
an anya manasaḥ bhaktyā ye namasyanti keśavam
śucayaḥ te mahātmānaḥ tīrtha bhūtāḥ bhavanti te
gacchan tiṣṭhan svapan jāgrat piban aścan abhīkṣṇaśas

original: dhyāyan nārāyaṇaṃ yastu na tato 'nyo 'sti puṇyabhāk /
analyzed: dhyāyan nārāyaṇam yaḥ tu na tatas sti puṇya bhāj
vaikuṇṭham khaḍga paraśum bhava bandha samucchidam
praṇipatya yathānyāyam saṃsāre na punar bhavet
kṣetreṣu vasate nityam krīḍan āste mita dyutiḥ
āsīnaḥ sarva deheṣu karmabhiḥ na sa badhyate

original: yeṣāṃ viṣṇuḥ priyontyante viṣṇoḥ satataṃ priyāḥ // VamP_67.50 //
analyzed: yeṣām viṣṇuḥ priyaḥ untyante viṣṇoḥ satatam priyāḥ
na te punar sambhavanti tad bhaktāḥ tad parāyaṇāḥ

original: dhyāyed dāmodaraṃ yastu bhaktinamror'cayeta vā // VamP_67.51 //
analyzed: dhyāyet dāmodaram yaḥ tu bhakti namra ūrcayeta vā
na sa saṃsāra paṅke smin majjate dānava īśvara
kalyam utthāya ye bhaktyā smaranti madhusūdanam
stuvanti api abhiśṛṇvanti durgaṇī atitaranti te
hari vākya amṛtam pītvā vimalaiḥ śrotra bhājanaiḥ

original: prahṛṣyati mano yeṣāṃ durgāṇyatitaranti te // VamP_67.53 //
analyzed: prahṛṣyati manaḥ yeṣām durgāṇi atitaranti te
yeṣām cakra gadā pāṇau bhaktiḥ avyabhicāriṇī

original: te yānti niyataṃ sthānaṃ yatra yogeśvaro hariḥ // VamP_67.54 //
analyzed: te yānti niyatam sthānam yatra yogeśvaraḥ hariḥ
viṣṇu karma prasaktānām bhaktānām yā parā gatiḥ

original: sā tu janmasahasreṇa na tapobhiravāpyate // VamP_67.55 //
analyzed: sā tu janma sahasreṇa na tapobhiḥ avāpyate

original: kiṃ japyaistasya mantrairvā kiṃ tapobhiḥ kimāśramaiḥ /
analyzed: kim japyaiḥ tasya mantraiḥ vā kim tapobhiḥ kim āśramaiḥ

original: yasya nāsti parā bhaktiḥ satataṃ madhusūdane // VamP_67.56 //
analyzed: yasya nā asti parā bhaktiḥ satatam madhusūdane

original: vṛthā yajñā vṛtā vedā vṛthā dānaṃ vṛthā śrutam /
analyzed: vṛthā yajñāḥ vṛtāḥ vedāḥ vṛthā dānam vṛthā śrutam

original: vṛthā tapaśca kīrtiśca yo dveṣṭi madhusūdanam // VamP_67.57 //
analyzed: vṛthā tapaḥ ca kīrtiḥ ca yaḥ dveṣṭi madhusūdanam
kim tasya bahuḥ bhar mantraiḥ bhaktiḥ yasya janārdane
namaḥ nārāyaṇāya iti mantraḥ sarva artha sādhakaḥ
viṣṇuḥ eva gatiḥ yoṣām kutas teṣām parājayaḥ
yeṣām indīvara śyāmaḥ hṛdaya sthaḥ janārdanaḥ
sarva maṅgala māṅgalyam vareṇyam vara dam prabhum
nārāyaṇam namaskṛtya sarva karmāṇi kārayet
viṣṭayaḥ vyatipātāḥ ca ye nye durnīti sambhavāḥ

original: te nāma smaraṇādviṣṇornāsaṃ yānti mahāsura // VamP_67.61 //
analyzed: te nāma smaraṇāt viṣṇoḥ nāsam yānti mahā asura
tīrtha koṭi sahasrāṇi tīrtha koṭi śatāni ca
nārāyaṇa praṇāmasya kalām na arhanti ṣoḍaśīm
pṛthivyām yāni tīrthāni puṇyāni āyatanāni ca
tāni sarvāṇi avāpnoti viṣṇoḥ nāma anukīrtanāt

original: prāpnuvanti na tāṃllokān vratino vā tapasvinaḥ /
analyzed: prāpnuvanti na tān lokān vratinaḥ vā tapasvinaḥ

original: prāpyante ye tu kṛṣṇasya namaskāraparairna raiḥ // VamP_67.64 //
analyzed: prāpyante ye tu kṛṣṇasya namaskāra paraiḥ na raiḥ
yaḥ pi anya devatā bhaktaḥ mithyā arcayati keśavam

original: so/'pi gacchati sādhūnāṃ sthānaṃ puṇyakṛtāṃ mahat // VamP_67.65 //
analyzed: saḥ upi gacchati sādhūnām sthānam puṇya kṛtām mahat
sātatyena hṛṣīkeśam pūjayitvā tu yat phalam

original: sucīrṇatapasāṃ nṝṇāṃ tatā phalaṃ na kadācana // VamP_67.66 //
analyzed: su cīrṇa tapasām nṝṇām phalam na kadācana

original: trisandhyaṃ padmānābhaṃ tu ye smaranti sumedhasaḥ /
analyzed: trisandhyam padmānābham tu ye smaranti sumedhasaḥ

original: te labhantyupavāsasya phalaṃ nāsatyatra saṃśayaḥ // VamP_67.67 //
analyzed: te labhanti upavāsasya phalam na asati atra saṃśayaḥ
satatam śāstra dṛṣṭena karmaṇā harim arcaya

original: tatprasādāt parāṃ siddhiṃ bale prāpsyasi śāśvatīm // VamP_67.68 //
analyzed: tad prasādāt parām siddhim bale prāpsyasi śāśvatīm
tad manāḥ bhava tad bhaktaḥ tad yājī tam namaskuru

original: tamevāśritya deveśaṃ sukhaṃ prāpyasi putraka // VamP_67.69 //
analyzed: tam eva āśritya deveśam sukham prāpyasi putraka

original: ādyaṃ hyanantamajaraṃ harimavyayaṃ ca ye vai smarantyaharaharnṛvarā bhuvisthāḥ /
analyzed: ādyam hi anantam ajaram harim avyayam ca ye vai smaranti aharahar nṛvarāḥ bhuvi sthāḥ

original: sarvatragaṃ śubhadaṃ brahmamayaṃ purāṇam te yānti vaiṣṇavapadaṃ dhruvamakṣayañca // VamP_67.70 //
analyzed: sarvatragam śubha dam brahma mayam purāṇam te yānti vaiṣṇava padam dhruvam akṣayam ca

original: ye mānavā vigatarāgaparāparajñā nārāyaṇaṃ suraguruṃ satataṃ smaranti /
analyzed: ye mānavāḥ vigata rāga para apara jñāḥ nārāyaṇam sura gurum satatam smaranti

original: te dhautapāṇḍurapuṭā iva rājahaṃsāḥ saṃsārasāgarajalasya taranti pāram // VamP_67.71 //
analyzed: te dhauta pāṇḍura puṭāḥ iva rājahaṃsāḥ saṃsāra sāgara jalasya taranti pāram
dhyāyanti ye satatam acyutam īśitāram niṣkalmaṣam pravara padma dala āyata akṣam

original: dhyānena tena hatakilbaṣavedanāste mātuḥ payodhararasaṃ na punaḥ pibanti // VamP_67.72 //
analyzed: dhyānena tena hata kilbaṣa vedanāḥ te mātuḥ payodhara rasam na punar pibanti
ye kīrtayanti vara dam vara padmanābham śaṅkha abja cakra vara cāpa gadā asi hastam

original: padmālayāvadanapaṅkajaṣaṭpadākhyaṃ nūnaṃ prayānti sadanaṃ madhughātinaste // VamP_67.73 //
analyzed: padmālayā vadana paṅkaja ṣaṭpada ākhyam nūnam prayānti sadanam madhughātinaḥ te

original: śṛṇvanti ye bhaktiparā manuṣyāḥ saṃkīrtyamānaṃ bhagavantamādyam /
analyzed: śṛṇvanti ye bhakti parāḥ manuṣyāḥ saṃkīrtyamānam bhagavantam ādyam

original: te muktapāpāḥ sukhino bhavanti yathāmṛtaprāśanatarpitāstu // VamP_67.74 //
analyzed: te mukta pāpāḥ sukhinaḥ bhavanti yathā amṛta prāśana tarpitāḥ tu

original: tasmād dhyānaṃ smaraṇaṃ kīrtanaṃ vā nāmnāṃ śravaṇaṃ paṭhatāṃ sajjanānām /
analyzed: tasmāt dhyānam smaraṇam kīrtanam vā nāmnām śravaṇam paṭhatām sat janānām

original: kāryaṃ viṣṇoḥ śraddadhānairmanuṣyaiḥ pūjātulyaṃ tat praśaṃsanti devā // VamP_67.75 //
analyzed: kāryam viṣṇoḥ śraddadhānaiḥ manuṣyaiḥ pūjā tulyam tat praśaṃsanti devāḥ
bāhyaiḥ tathā antaḥkaraṇaiḥ aviklavaiḥ yaḥ na arcayet keśavam īśitaram

original: puṣpaiśca patrairjalapallavādibhirnūnaṃ sa muṣṭo vidhitaskareṇa // VamP_67.76 //
analyzed: puṣpaiḥ ca patraiḥ jala pallava ādibhiḥ nūnam sa muṣṭaḥ vidhi taskareṇa
iti śrī vāmanapurāṇe saptaṣaṣṭitamaḥ dhyāyaḥ
baliḥ uvāca
bhavatā kathitam sarvam samārādhya janārdanam

original: yā gatiḥ prāpyate loke tāṃ me vaktumihārhasi // VamP_68.1 //
analyzed: yā gatiḥ prāpyate loke tām me vaktum iha arhasi
kena arcanena devasya prītiḥ samupajāyate

original: kāni dānāni śastāni prīṇanāya jagadguroḥ // VamP_68.2 //
analyzed: kāni dānāni śastāni prīṇanāya jagadguroḥ
upavāsa ādikam kāryam kasyām tithyām mahā udayam

original: kāni puṇyāni śastāni viṣṇostuṣṭipradāni vai // VamP_68.3 //
analyzed: kāni puṇyāni śastāni viṣṇoḥ tuṣṭi pradāni vai
yat ca anyat api karttavyam hṛṣṭa rūpaiḥ anālasaiḥ
tat api aśeṣam daitya indra mama ākhyātum iha arhasi
prahlādaḥ uvāca
śraddadhānaiḥ bhakti paraiḥ yāni uddiśya janārdanam
bale dānāni dīyante tān ūcuḥ munayaḥ kṣayān

original: tā eva tithayaḥ śastā yāsvabhyarcya jagatpatim /
analyzed: tāḥ eva tithayaḥ śastāḥ yāsu abhyarcya jagatpatim

original: taccittastanmayo bhūtvā upavāsī naro bhavet // VamP_68.6 //
analyzed: tad cittaḥ tanmayaḥ bhūtvā upavāsī naraḥ bhavet
pūjiteṣu dvijendreṣu pūjitaḥ syāt janārdanaḥ

original: etān dviṣanti ye mūḍhāste yānti narakaṃ dhruvam // VamP_68.7 //
analyzed: etān dviṣanti ye mūḍhāḥ te yānti narakam dhruvam
tān arcayet naraḥ bhaktyā brāhmaṇān viṣṇu tatparaḥ

original: evamāha hariḥ pūrvaṃ brāhmaṇā māmakī tanuḥ // VamP_68.8 //
analyzed: evam āha hariḥ pūrvam brāhmaṇāḥ māmakī tanuḥ
brāhmaṇaḥ na avamantavyaḥ budhaḥ vā api abudhaḥ vā
divyā tanuḥ viṣṇoḥ tasmāt tām arcayet naraḥ
tāni eva ca praśastāni kusumāni mahā asura
yāni syuḥ varṇa yuktāni rasa gandha yutāni ca
viśeṣataḥ pravakṣyāmi puṣpāṇi tithayaḥ tathā
dānāni ca praśastāni mādhava prīṇanāya tu

original: 68.11 jātī śatāhvā sumanāḥ kundaṃ bahupuṭaṃ tathā /
bāṇañca campakāśokaṃ karavīraṃ ca yūthikā // VamP_68.12 //
analyzed: bāṇam ca campaka aśokam karavīram ca yūthikā
pāribhadram pāṭalā ca bakulam giriśālinī

original: tilakaṃ ca japākusumaṃ pītakaṃ nāgaraṃ tvapi // VamP_68.13 //
analyzed: tilakam ca japā kusumam pītakam nāgaram tu api
etāni hi praśastāni kusumāni acyuta arcane

original: surabhīṇi tathānyāni varjayitvā tu ketakīm // VamP_68.14 //
analyzed: surabhīṇi tathā anyāni varjayitvā tu ketakīm
bilva patram śamī patram patram bhṛṅga mṛgāṅkayoḥ
tamāla āmalakī patram śastam keśava pūjane
yeṣām api hi ca puṣpāṇi praśastāni acyuta arcane
pallavāni api teṣām stuḥ patrāṇi arcā vidhau hareḥ
vīrudhām ca pravālena barhiṣā ca arcayet tathā
nānā rūpaiḥ ca ambu bhavaiḥ kamala indīvara ādibhiḥ
pravālaiḥ śucibhiḥ ślakṣṇaiḥ jala prakṣālitaiḥ bale
vanaspatīnām arcyeta tathā dūrvā agra pallavaiḥ
candanena anulimpeta kuṅkumena prayatnanataḥ
uśīra padmakābhyām ca tathā kālīyaka ādinā

original: mahiṣākhyaṃ kaṇaṃ dāru sihlakaṃ sāgaruṃ sitā /
śaṅkhaṃ jātīphalaṃ śrīśe dhūpāni syuḥ priyāṇi vai // VamP_68.20 //
analyzed: śaṅkham jātīphalam śrīśe dhūpāni syuḥ priyāṇi vai
haviṣā saṃskṛtāḥ ye tu yava godhūma śālayaḥ

original: tilamudgādayo māṣā vrīhayaśca priyā hareḥ // VamP_68.21 //
analyzed: tila mudga ādayaḥ māṣāḥ vrīhayaḥ ca priyāḥ hareḥ
go dānāni pavitrāṇi bhūmi dānāni ca anagha
vastra anna svarṇa dānāni prītaye madhughātinaḥ
māgha māse tilāḥ deyāḥ tiladhenuḥ ca dānava

original: indhanādīni ca tathā mādhavaprīṇanāya tu // VamP_68.23 //
analyzed: indhana ādīni ca tathā mādhava prīṇanāya tu
govinda prīṇana arthāya dātavyam puruṣa ṛṣabhaiḥ
caitre citrāṇi vastrāṇi śayanāni āsanāni ca
viṣṇoḥ prīti artham etāni deyāni brāhmaṇeṣu atha
gandha mālyāni deyāni vaiśākhe surabhīṇi vai
deyāni dvijamukhyebhyaḥ madhusūdana tuṣṭaye
uda kumbha ambu dhenum ca tālavṛntam su candanam

original: trivikramasya prītyarthaṃ dātavyaṃ sādhubhiḥ sadā // VamP_68.27 //
analyzed: trivikramasya prīti artham dātavyam sādhubhiḥ sadā
uvānat yugalam chatram lavaṇa āmalaka ādikam

original: āṣāḍhe vāmanaprītyai dātavyāni tu bhaktitaḥ // VamP_68.28 //
analyzed: āṣāḍhe vāmana prītyai dātavyāni tu bhaktitaḥ
ghṛtam ca kṣīra kumbhāḥ ca ghṛtadhenu phalāni ca
śrāvaṇe śrīdhara prītyai dātavyāni vipaścitā
māsi bhādrapade dadyāt pāyasam madhu sarpiṣī
hṛṣīkeśa prīṇana artham lavaṇam sa guḍa odanam
tilāḥ turaṅgam vṛṣabham dadhi tāmra āyasa ādikam
prīti artham padmanābhasya deyam āśvayuje naraiḥ
rajatam kanakam dīpāt maṇi muktāphala ādikam

original: dāmodarasya tuṣṭyarthaṃ pradadyāt kārtike naraḥ // VamP_68.32 //
analyzed: dāmodarasya tuṣṭi artham pradadyāt kārtike naraḥ
khara uṣṭra aśvatarān nāgān yāna yugyam aja āvikam

original: dātvayaṃ keśavaprītyai māsi mārgaśire naraiḥ // VamP_68.33 //
analyzed: dātu ayam keśava prītyai māsi mārgaśire naraiḥ
prāsāda nagara ādīni gṛha prāvaraṇa ādikam

original: nārāyaṇasya tuṣṭyarthaṃ pauṣe deyāni bhaktitaḥ // VamP_68.34 //
analyzed: nārāyaṇasya tuṣṭi artham pauṣe deyāni bhaktitaḥ
dāsī dāsam alaṅkāram annam ṣaṣ rasa saṃyutam
puruṣottamasya tuṣṭi artham pradeyam sārvakālikam
yat yat iṣṭatamam kiñcid yat vā api asti śuci gṛhe

original: tattadvi deyaṃ prītyarthaṃ devadevāya cakriṇe // VamP_68.36 //
analyzed: tat tat vi deyam prīti artham devadevāya cakriṇe

original: yaḥ kārayenmandiraṃ keśavasya puṇyāṃllokān sa jayecchāśvatān vai /
analyzed: yaḥ kārayet mandiram keśavasya puṇyān lokān sa jayet śāśvatān vai

original: dattvārāmān puṣpaphalābhipannān bhogān bhuṅkte kāmātaḥ ślāghanīyān // VamP_68.37 //
analyzed: dattvā ārāmān puṣpa phala abhipannān bhogān bhuṅkte kāmātaḥ ślāghanīyān

original: pitāmahasya purataḥ kulānyaṣṭau tu yāni ca /
analyzed: pitāmahasya puratas kulāni aṣṭau tu yāni ca
tārayet ātmanā sārdham viṣṇoḥ mandira kārakaḥ

original: imāś ca pitaro daitya gāthā gāyanti yoginaḥ /
analyzed: imāḥ ca pitaraḥ daitya gāthāḥ gāyanti yoginaḥ
puratas yadu siṃhasya jyāmaghasya tapasvinaḥ

original: api naḥ sa kule kaścid viṣṇubhakto bhaviṣyati /
analyzed: api naḥ sa kule kaścid viṣṇu bhaktaḥ bhaviṣyati
hari mandira kartā yaḥ bhaviṣyati śicivrataḥ
api naḥ santatau jāyet viṣṇu ālaya vilepanam

original: sammārjanaṃ ca dharmātmā kariṣyati ca bhaktitaḥ // VamP_68.41 //
analyzed: sammārjanam ca dharma ātmā kariṣyati ca bhaktitaḥ

original: api naḥ santatau jāto dhvajaṃ cakeśavamandire /
analyzed: api naḥ santatau jātaḥ dhvajam cakeśava mandire
dāsyate devadevāya dīpam puṣpa anulepanam
mahāpātaka yuktaḥ vā pātakī ca upapātakī
vimukta pāpaḥ bhavati viṣṇu āyatana citra kṛt
ittham pitṝṇām vacanam śrutvā nṛpati sattamaḥ

original: cakārāyatanaṃ bhūmyāṃ khyaṃ ca limpatāsura // VamP_68.44 //
analyzed: cakāra āyatanam bhūmyām khyam ca limpata asura
vibhūtibhiḥ keśavasya keśava ārādhane rataḥ
nānā dhātu vikāraiḥ ca pañca varṇaiḥ ca citrakaiḥ
dadau dīpāni vidhivat vāsudeva ālaye bale
sugandhi taila pūrṇāni ghṛta pūrṇāni ca svayam
nānā varṇāḥ vaijayantyaḥ mahārajana rañjitāḥ
ārāmāḥ vividhāḥ hṛdyāḥ puṣpa āḍhyāḥ phala śālinaḥ
latā pallava saṃchannāḥ devadārubhiḥ āvṛtāḥ
kāritāḥ ca mahā mañca adhiṣṭhitāḥ kuśalaiḥ janaiḥ
paurogava vidhāna jñaiḥ ratna saṃskāribhiḥ daḍhaiḥ
teṣu nityam prapūjyante yatayaḥ brahmacāriṇaḥ
śrotriyāḥ jñāna sampannāḥ dīna andha vikala ādayaḥ

original: itthaṃ sa nṛpatiḥ kṛtvā śraddadhāno jitendriyaḥ /
analyzed: ittham sa nṛpatiḥ kṛtvā śraddadhānaḥ jita indriyaḥ
jyāmaghaḥ viṣṇu nilayam gataḥ iti anuśuśrumaḥ
tam eva bale mārgam jyā magha kāritam
vrajanti nara śārdūla viṣṇu loka jigīṣavaḥ
tasmāt tvam api rāja indra kārayasva ālayam hareḥ
tam arcayasva yatnena brāhmaṇān ca bahu śrutān
paurāṇikān viśeṣeṇa sat ācāra ratān śucīn
vāsobhiḥ bhūṣaṇaiḥ ratnaiḥ gaubhiḥ bhū kanaka ādibhiḥ

original: vibhave sati devasya prīṇanaṃ kuru cakriṇaḥ // VamP_68.54 //
analyzed: vibhave sati devasya prīṇanam kuru cakriṇaḥ

original: evaṃ kriyāyogaratasya te 'dya nūnaṃ murāriḥ śubhado bhaviṣyati /
analyzed: evam kriyā yoga ratasya te nūnam murāriḥ śubha daḥ bhaviṣyati

original: narā na sīdanti bale samāśritā vibhuṃ jagannāthamanantamacyutam // VamP_68.55 //
analyzed: narāḥ na sīdanti bale samāśritāḥ vibhum jagannātham anantam acyutam
pulastyaḥ uvāca

original: ityevamuktvā vacanaṃ ditīśvaro vairocanaṃ satyamanuttamaṃ hi /
analyzed: iti evam uktvā vacanam ditīśvaraḥ vairocanam satyam anuttamam hi
saṃpūjitaḥ tena vimuktim āyayau saṃpūrṇa kāmaḥ hari pāda bhaktaḥ

original: gate hi tasmin mudite pitāmahe balerbabhau mandiraminduvarṇam /
analyzed: gate hi tasmin mudite pitāmahe baleḥ babhau mandiram indu varṇam

original: mahendraśilpipravaro 'tha keśavaṃ sa kārayāmāsa mahāmahīyān // VamP_68.57 //
analyzed: mahā indra śilpi pravaraḥ tha keśavam sa kārayāmāsa mahā mahīyān
svayam sva bhāryā sahitaḥ cakāra devālaye mārjana lepana ādikāḥ

original: kriyā mahātmā yavaśarkarādyāṃ baliṃ cakārāpratimāṃ madhudruhaḥ // VamP_68.58 //
analyzed: kriyāḥ mahātmā yava śarkarā ādyām balim cakāra apratimām madhudruhaḥ
dīpa pradānam svayam āyata akṣī vindhyāvalī viṣṇu gṛhe cakāra

original: geyaṃ sa dharmyaśravaṇaṃ ca dhīmān paurāṇikairvipravarairakārayat // VamP_68.59 //
analyzed: geyam sa dharmya śravaṇam ca dhīmān paurāṇikaiḥ vipra varaiḥ akārayat
tathāvidhasya asura puṅgavasya dharmye su mārge pratisaṃsthitasya
jagatpatiḥ divya vapuḥ janārdanaḥ tasthau mahātmā bali rakṣaṇāya

original: sūryāyutābhaṃ musalaṃ pragṛhya nighnan sa duṣṭāriyūthāpālān /
analyzed: sūrya ayuta ābham musalam pragṛhya nighnan sa duṣṭa ari yūthā pālān

original: dvāri sthito na pradadau praveśaṃ prākāragupte balino gṛhe tu // VamP_68.61 //
analyzed: dvāri sthitaḥ na pradadau praveśam prākāra gupte balinaḥ gṛhe tu

original: dvāri sthite dhātari rakṣapāle nārāyaṇe sarvaguṇābhirāme /
analyzed: dvāri sthite dhātari rakṣa pāle nārāyaṇe sarva guṇa abhirāme
prāsāda madhye harim īśitāram abhyarcayāmāsa sura ṛṣi mukhyam

original: sa evamāste 'surarāḍ balistu samarcayan vai haripādapaṅkajau /
analyzed: saḥ evam āste surarāj baliḥ tu samarcayan vai hari pāda paṅkajau

original: sasmāra nityaṃ haribhaṣitāni sa tasya jāto vinayāṅkuśastu // VamP_68.63 //
analyzed: sasmāra nityam hari bhaṣitāni sa tasya jātaḥ vinaya aṅkuśaḥ tu

original: idaṃ ca vṛttaṃ sa papāṭha daityarāṭ smaran suvākyāni guroḥ śubhāni /
analyzed: idam ca vṛttam sa papāṭha daitya rāj smaran su vākyāni guroḥ śubhāni

original: tathyāni pathyāni paratra ceha pitāmahasyendrasamasya vīraḥ // VamP_68.64 //
analyzed: tathyāni pathyāni paratra ca iha pitāmahasya indra samasya vīraḥ

original: ye vṛddhavākyāni samācaranti śrutvā duruktānyapi pūrvatastu /
analyzed: ye vṛddha vākyāni samācaranti śrutvā duruktāni api pūrvatas tu

original: snigdhāni paścānnavanītaśuddhā modanti te nātra vicāramasti // VamP_68.65 //
analyzed: snigdhāni paścāt navanīta śuddhāḥ modanti te na atra vicāram asti
āpad bhujaṅga daṣṭasya mantra hīnasya sarvadā

original: vṛddhavākyaiṣadhā nūnaṃ kurvanti kila nirviṣam // VamP_68.66 //
analyzed: vṛddha vākya aiṣadhāḥ nūnam kurvanti kila nirviṣam
vṛddha vākya amṛtam pītvā tad uktam anumānya ca

original: yā tṛptirjāyate puṃsā somapāne kutastathā // VamP_68.67 //
analyzed: yā tṛptiḥ jāyate puṃsā soma pāne kutas tathā

original: āpattau patitānāṃ yeṣāṃ vṛddhā na santi śāstāraḥ /
analyzed: āpattau patitānām yeṣām vṛddhāḥ na santi śāstāraḥ

original: te śocyā banadhūnāṃ jīvanto 'pīha mṛtatulyāḥ // VamP_68.68 //
analyzed: te śocyāḥ banadhūnām pi iha mṛta tulyāḥ
āpad grāha gṛhītānām vṛddhāḥ santi na paṇḍitāḥ

original: yeṣāṃ mokṣyitāre vai teṣāṃ sāntirna vidyate // VamP_68.69 //
analyzed: yeṣām mokṣyitāre vai teṣām sāntiḥ na vidyate
āpad jala nimagnānām hriyatām vyasana ūrmibhiḥ
vṛddha vākyaiḥ vinā nūnam na eva uttāram kathañcana

original: tasmād yo vṛddhavākyāni śṛṇuyād vidadhāti ca /
analyzed: tasmāt yaḥ vṛddha vākyāni śṛṇuyāt vidadhāti ca

original: sa sadyaḥ siddhimāpnoti yathā vairocano baliḥ // VamP_68.71 //
analyzed: sa sadyas siddhim āpnoti yathā vairocanaḥ baliḥ
iti śrī vāmanapurāṇe aṣṭaṣaṣṭitamaḥ dhyāyaḥ
pulastyaḥ uvāca

original: etanmayā puṇyatamaṃ purāṇaṃ tubhyaṃ tathā nārada kīrtitaṃ vai /
analyzed: etat mayā puṇyatamam purāṇam tubhyam tathā nārada kīrtitam vai

original: śrutvā ca kīrtyā parayā sameto bhaktyā ca viṣṇoḥ padamabhyupaiti // VamP_69.1 //
analyzed: śrutvā ca kīrtyā parayā sametaḥ bhaktyā ca viṣṇoḥ padam abhyupaiti
yathā pāpāni pūyante gaṅgā vāri vigāhanāt
tathā purāṇa śravaṇāt duritānām vināśanam

original: na tasya rogā jāyante na viṣaṃ cābhicārikam /
analyzed: na tasya rogāḥ jāyante na viṣam ca ābhicārikam

original: śarīre ca kule brahman yaḥ śruṇoti ca vāmanam // VamP_69.3 //
analyzed: śarīre ca kule brahman yaḥ śruṇoti ca vāmanam

original: śraṇoti nityaṃ vidhivacca bhaktyā saṃpūjayan yaḥ praṇataśca viṣṇum /
analyzed: nityam vidhivat ca bhaktyā saṃpūjayan yaḥ praṇataḥ ca viṣṇum

original: sa cāśvamedhasya sadakṣiṇasya phalaṃ samagraṃ parihinapāpaḥ // VamP_69.4 //
analyzed: sa ca aśvamedhasya sa dakṣiṇasya phalam samagram

original: prāpnoti dattasya suvarṇabhūmeraśvasya gonāgarathasya caiva nārī naraścāpi ca pādamekaṃ śṛṇvan śuciḥ puṇyatamaḥ pṛthivyām /
analyzed: prāpnoti dattasya suvarṇa bhūmeḥ aśvasya gonāga rathasya ca eva nārī naraḥ ca api ca pādam ekam śṛṇvan śuciḥ puṇyatamaḥ pṛthivyām

original: 69.5 snāne kṛte tīrthavare supuṇye gaṅgājale naimiṣapuṣkare vā /
analyzed: snāne kṛte tīrtha vare su puṇye gaṅgā jale naimiṣa puṣkare vā

original: kokāmukhe yat pravadanti viprāḥ prayāgamāsādya ca māghamāse // VamP_69.6 //
analyzed: kokāmukhe yat pravadanti viprāḥ prayāgam āsādya ca māgha māse

original: sa tatphalaṃ prāpya ca vāmanasya saṃkīrtayan nānyamanāḥ padaṃ hi /
analyzed: sa tat phalam prāpya ca vāmanasya saṃkīrtayan na anya manāḥ padam hi

original: gacchenmayā nārada te 'dya coktaṃ yad rājasūyasya phalaṃ prayacchet // VamP_69.7 //
analyzed: gacchet mayā nārada te ca uktam yat rājasūyasya phalam prayacchet

original: yad bhūmiloke suralokalabhye mahatsukhaṃ prāpya naraḥ samagram /
analyzed: yat bhūmi loke sura loka labhye mahat sukham prāpya naraḥ samagram

original: prāpanoti cāsya śravaṇānmaharṣe sautrāmaṇernāsti ca saṃśayo me // VamP_69.8 //
analyzed: ca asya śravaṇāt mahā ṛṣe sautrāmaṇeḥ nā asti ca saṃśayaḥ me

original: ratnasya dānasya ca yatphalaṃ bhaved yatsūryasya cendorgrahaṇe ca rāhoḥ /
analyzed: ratnasya dānasya ca yat phalam bhavet yat sūryasya ca indoḥ grahaṇe ca rāhoḥ

original: annasya dānena phalaṃ yathoktaṃ bubhukṣite vipravare ca sāgnike // VamP_69.9 //
analyzed: annasya dānena phalam yathā uktam bubhukṣite vipra vare ca sa agnike
durbhikṣa saṃpīḍita putra bhārye yāmī sadā poṣaṇa tatpare ca

original: devāgniviprarṣirate ca pitroḥ śuśruṣake bhrātari jyeṣṭhasāmne /
analyzed: deva agni vipra ṛṣi rate ca pitroḥ śuśruṣake bhrātari jyeṣṭhasāmne

original: yattatphalaṃ saṃpravadanti devāḥ sa tat phalaṃ labhate cāsya pāṭhāt // VamP_69.10 //
analyzed: yat tat phalam saṃpravadanti devāḥ sa tat phalam labhate ca asya pāṭhāt

original: caturdaśaṃ vāmanamāhuragryaṃ śrute ca yasyāghacayāśca nāśam /
analyzed: caturdaśam vāmanam āhuḥ agryam śrute ca yasya agha cayāḥ ca nāśam

original: prayānti nāstyatra ca saṃśayo me mahānti pāpānyapi nāradāśu // VamP_69.11 //
analyzed: prayānti nā asti atra ca saṃśayaḥ me mahānti pāpāni api nārada āśu
pāṭhāt saṃśravaṇāt vipra śrāvaṇāt api kasyacid

original: sarvapāpāni naśyanti vāmanasya sadā mude // VamP_69.12 //
analyzed: sarva pāpāni naśyanti vāmanasya sadā mude

original: idaṃ rahasyaṃ paramaṃ tavoktaṃ na vācyametaddharibhaktivarjite /
analyzed: idam rahasyam paramam tava uktam na vācyam etat hari bhakti varjite
dvijasya nindā rati hina dakṣiṇe sa hetu vākya āvṛta pāpa sattve

original: namo namaḥ kāraṇa vāmanāya nityaṃ yo vadenniyataṃ dvijaḥ /
analyzed: namaḥ namaḥ kāraṇa vāmanāya nityam yaḥ vadet niyatam dvijaḥ

original: tasya viṣṇuḥ padaṃ mokṣaṃ dadāti surapūjitaḥ // VamP_69.14 //
analyzed: tasya viṣṇuḥ padam mokṣam dadāti sura pūjitaḥ
vācakāya go bhū svarṇa vibhūṣaṇam

original: vittaśāṭhyaṃ na kartavyaṃ kurvan śravaṇanāśakam // VamP_69.15 //
analyzed: vitta śāṭhyam na kartavyam kurvan śravaṇa nāśakam
trisaṃdhyam ca paṭhan śṛṇvan sarva pāpa praṇāśanam
asūyā rahitam vipra sarva sampad pradāyakam
iti śrī vāmanapurāṇe ekonasaptatitamaḥ dhyāyaḥ
iti śrī vāmanapurāṇam samāptam
